name: Hampton Inn Alexander City
description: We’re right off Highway 280, 25 minutes away from Lake Martin, where you can boat, swim, or fish. In the fall, football fans can take a 45-minute drive to see the Auburn Tigers, while music lovers can soak in the nearby Alexander City Jazz Fest every summer. WiFi and hot breakfast are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Wetumpka
description: We’re on the banks of the Coosa River, a short walk from Wetumpka Civic Center and Elmore County Historical Society and Museum. Wind Creek Wetumpka Casino is a half-mile away and we’re 20 minutes from Montgomery. Daily hot breakfast, WiFi, and parking are on us. We have an out door pool and a business center.

name: Hampton Inn Auburn
description: We're off I-85, under 10 minutes from Chewacla State Park and Auburn University’s Jay & Susie Gogue Performing Arts Center. Auburn Softball Complex is under half a mile away and we’re 20 minutes from Tuskegee. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our outdoor pool.

name: Tru by Hilton Auburn
description: Make this Tru by Hilton your own. We’ll help, with free customizable breakfast and proximity to a wealth of Auburn activities, like Toomer’s Corner, the Jordan-Hare Stadium and Auburn University (home of the Tigers). Brush up on nature at the Louise Kreher Forest Ecology Preserve or explore the beautiful Chewacla State Park. While you’re here, WiFi and parking are free.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Auburn/Opelika
description: Our hotel is just off I-85, minutes away from Auburn University Municipal Airport, and three miles from Auburn University. Jordan Hare Stadium, Jonathan Bell Lovelace Museum, and the legendary Toomer’s Oaks are all four miles away. We have an outdoor pool and fitness center, and a hot breakfast is available in our Garden Grille & Bar. The WiFi’s on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Opelika - I-85 - Auburn Area
description: Just off I-85, we’re only a short drive from Chewacla State Park, 696 acres of lush land to hike, swim, mountain bike, or picnic. Explore the breweries, art, restaurants, and boutiques of Opelika’s vibrant downtown. We're just minutes from the business district, Auburn Research Park, and Auburn Industrial Park too. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Opelika Auburn
description: We're your launchpad into Auburn/Opelika, located off I-85 in bustling Tigertown. Staying with us places you minutes from Historic Downtown Opelika, the Robert Trent Jones Golf Trail, and Auburn University. Before heading out, fill your plate with more than 400 free breakfast options – or whip something up in your in-suite kitchen. WiFi is free, too.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Prattville
description: We're just off I-65, 10 minutes from Montgomery. You'll find a variety of restaurants within walking distance – and a Bass Pro Shops across the street. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our outdoor pool. Stretch your legs at Wilderness Park or the Robert Trent Jones Golf Trail's Capitol Hill course, both less than 15 minutes away.

name: Tru by Hilton Prattville
description: We are off I-65 and Route 82 in Prattville. High Point Town Center and Prattville Town Center shopping centers are less than three miles away. Capital Hill Golf Club, a 5-minute drive, has three championship 18-hole courses. Dining chains like Outback Steakhouse as well as local restaurants like Jim ‘N Nick’s Bar-B-Q are within a mile.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Athens-I-65 (Huntsville Area)
description: Just over three miles from Athens' city center, with easy I-65 access, we’re ideal for a quiet stay. Fill up on free breakfast before teeing off at Southern Gayles Golf Course or Canebrake Country Club. If you fancy a bite, we’re walking-distance from local restaurants and diners. Check out Alabama Veterans Museum if you have time. WiFi’s on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Decatur Ingalls Harbor
description: Our riverfront hotel is next to Ingalls Harbor, five minutes from downtown, and walking distance from the event center. Indulge in a free breakfast before visiting local attractions such as the Princess Theatre and Point Mallard Park. We're close to businesses including Cola-Cola, GE, and 3M. Prepare meals in your suite kitchen and stay connected with free WiFi.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Decatur Riverfront
description: We're 500 feet from the Tennessee River and the Steamboat Bill Memorial Bridge. It's a five-minute drive to local shops, eateries, and the Cook Museum of Natural Science downtown. Point Mallard Park and Decatur Morgan Hospital are under five miles away. Take a dip in any season in our heated indoor and outdoor pools.

name: Hampton Inn Madison Huntsville Airport
description: It's a free five-minute shuttle ride, with a reservation, from Huntsville International Airport (HSV) to our front door. We're next to I-565, only eight miles from the U.S. Space and Rocket Center and the University of Alabama in Huntsville. From there, it's just four miles to downtown and the Von Braun Center. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Madison Huntsville Airport
description: Find us off I-565, less than three miles from Huntsville International Airport. Downtown Huntsville, The U.S. Space & Rocket Center, Madison Ballpark, and the Botanical Gardens can be reached in 10 minutes. We offer spacious suites with kitchens, an outdoor saline pool, and a free hot breakfast every morning.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Huntsville-Village of Providence
description: Surrounded by shopping, local restaurants, and apartments in the upscale Village of Providence, you'll feel at home in Huntsville. Our location just off Highway 72 offers easy access to Redstone Arsenal, The University of Alabama – Huntsville, and Cummings Research Park. Blast off for an afternoon at the US Space and Rocket Center, just 10 minutes away.

name: Hampton Inn Huntsville/Village of Providence
description: We’re close to Boeing, Toyota and Redstone Arsenal – ideal for corporate guests – with the fun side of Huntsville on our doorstep, too. Check out the Botanical Garden and the U.S. Space & Rocket Center, or simply explore downtown Huntsville. Catch some college sports at the University of Alabama Huntsville or Alabama A&M University. Breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Hampton Inn Decatur
description: Our Decatur home is off Highway 67, five miles from Wilson Morgan Park. Enjoy our free hot breakfast before taking in some Alabama air at Wheeler National Wildlife Refuge or exploring Point Mallard Park, both within 15 minutes’ drive. Swim in our outdoor pool and work out in the fitness center. WiFi is free.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Huntsville/Research Park Area
description: We're located off I-565, in the heart of Cummings Research Park and close to Redstone Arsenal. Downtown Huntsville and Rocket City attractions like the Huntsville Botanical Garden and U.S. Space & Rocket Center are less than 15 minutes away. Shop, dine, or catch a movie at Bridge Street Town Center, four minutes away. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Huntsville/Research Park Area, AL
description: An all-suite, extended stay hotel in Huntsville, Alabama, adjacent to Cummings Research Park and a ten-minute walk from dining and shopping in Bridge Street Town Center. Choose from studios and one-bedroom suites featuring fully equipped kitchens, and free WiFi. There’s an outdoor pool, and Spin2 Cycle lets you run the treadmill while your clothes wash.

name: Hampton Inn Atmore
description: We’re just off I-65. Wind Creek Casino is half a mile away with more than a thousand games, plus movies, dining, and an arcade. Atmore city center is six miles away – in late July, the Old-Time Fiddlers' Convention draws musicians from across the state. Unwind in our outdoor pool, and enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Mobile - East Bay - Daphne
description: Make the most of the Gulf Coast with easy access to beaches and golf courses. We're just off I-10 and nine miles from downtown Mobile. Explore Spanish Fort Town Center and Eastern Shore Centre’s shops and restaurants – or cook in your suite's fully equipped kitchen. Kick back at our evening social, Monday – Thursday. WiFi and breakfast are also free.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Mobile East Bay / Daphne
description: We're by the I-10/US-98 intersection, just down the road from shops and restaurants around Jubilee Square. Tours of the USS Alabama, shipbuilding at Austal, and conventions in downtown Mobile are within 10 miles across the bay. We serve cooked-to-order breakfast, lunch, and dinner in our Garden Grille & Bar. Enjoy our indoor pool and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Mobile-East Bay/Daphne
description: We’re off I-90, on the shore of Mobile Bay. We’re a mile from Daphne’s Main Street, and you’ll find a good choice of dining options on the way. Take a stroll in Gator Park, opposite our hotel. Cross the Bay Bridge and you’re in Mobile, with historical attractions like the USS Alabama and the Fort of Colonial Mobile Museum. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Mobile- Downtown Historic District
description: We’re in the heart of downtown next to I-10 and the convention center, a few blocks from the business district. Within half a mile you'll find the cruise port, and attractions including the Saenger Theater, Gulf Coast Exploreum Science Center, Mobile Carnival Museum, and Space 301 art gallery. Hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Mobile Downtown
description: Find us next to Bienville Square, near the banks of the Mobile River. The Saenger Theater and Dauphin Street restaurants are a short walk away, and the Mobile Convention Center is within a half mile. Enjoy meals and happy hour drinks on the patio at Eugene's Monkey Bar and Grill, overlooking the square. We've got a fitness center, event space, and 24-hour shop. WiFi is free.

name: The Admiral Hotel Mobile, Curio  Collection by Hilton
description: Our hotel has been in the heart of Mobile for over 75 years, featuring an Art Deco-inspired interior and a ballroom for events and weddings. We're a short walk from the Mobile Convention Center, the Fort of Colonel Mobile, and a wide variety of eateries. Relax in a cabana by our outdoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Lanett-West Point
description: We are off I-85, within seven miles of Fort Tyler and the historic Griggs house. For a taste of the outdoors, visit Southern Harbor Marina for boating and swimming, just 11 miles away. Our location puts you 13 minutes from the Kia Plant and a half-hour from Auburn University. Fire up your taste buds with our free hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Phenix City- Columbus Area
description: Located off US 431 in Phenix City, we’re two miles from Columbus. The Columbus Georgia Convention and Trade Center is six minutes’ drive. Walk or bike the Chattahoochee Riverwalk, 12 minutes away. Visit Fort Benning, or the National Infantry Museum, less than 15 minutes’ drive. Columbus Airport is 20 minutes away. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Redmont Hotel Birmingham, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: As the oldest-running hotel in Birmingham, first opened in 1925, the Redmont combines the charisma of the 20s with contemporary luxury. Our downtown rooms are blocks from the theater district and Birmingham Civil Rights Institute. Feel at ease with in-room spa treatments, and enjoy a signature cocktail at the highest rooftop bar in the state.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Birmingham-Downtown-Tutwiler
description: Rest up in our historic Tutwiler building, minutes off I-20. We're a short walk from downtown Birmingham's Convention Center, Museum of Art, and Civil Rights Institute. Grab a bite to eat in the neighborhood. Free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and fitness center access are yours to enjoy.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Birmingham Downtown
description: We're within three miles of Birmingham Zoo, the Botanical Gardens and McWane Science Center. Discover local five-star restaurants or cook, in-suite, at your own speed. Fill up on free breakfast before exploring the Civil Rights Institute, just over a mile away, or catching a ballgame at Regions Field, two minutes from the door. WiFi’s on us, and pets are welcome.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Downtown Birmingham
description: In downtown, we're a block from minor league baseball at Regions Field, a quick walk from Children's Hospital and Railroad Park, and five blocks from the University of Alabama at Birmingham. Shops, restaurants, businesses, and two craft breweries are within a mile. Enjoy breakfast and dinner in our Garden Grille & Bar.

name: Hilton Birmingham at UAB
description: We’re in the vibrant Five Points South district, moments from the University of Alabama at Birmingham and the VA Medical Center. Our free shuttles take you to and from Birmingham Airport and destinations within two miles, including the Legacy Arena. We have parking with direct room access, an outdoor pool, and a courtyard complete with fire pits.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Birmingham Downtown Near UAB
description: Birmingham’s Five Points South district is yours. We’re minutes from McWane Science Center, Birmingham Civil Rights Institute, the Zoo, and Alabama Sports Hall of Fame. Grab our free shuttle to get around. We’re near many restaurants. For a quiet night, take advantage of your in-suite kitchen. WiFi, breakfast, and our evening social, Monday – Thursday, are free.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Birmingham
description: Find us within three miles of Birmingham attractions like the zoo, botanical gardens, and The Summit. We’ll take you anywhere local, including Birmingham–Shuttlesworth International Airport, which is a seven-minute ride away. Enjoy daily free made-to-order breakfast, complimentary evening receptions, our indoor pool, and fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn Birmingham/Mountain Brook
description: Tucked in the foothills of the Appalachian Mountains and only four miles from downtown Birmingham, our Mountain Brook hotel is the perfect base to navigate the 'last major Southern City'. Uncover why Alabama is dubbed "The Beautiful" with a stroll through the Birmingham Botanical Gardens. Fill up on free breakfast and complimentary WiFi while you stay with us.

name: Hampton Inn Birmingham I-65/Lakeshore Drive
description: Nature lovers will be close to Oak Mountain State Park’s 10,000 acres of woodland, the botanic gardens and Vulcan Park. Family days out are easy with Splash Adventure Water Park and Birmingham Zoo nearby. Take advantage of free breakfast before teeing off at Robert Trent Jones Golf Trail, and make sure to check out the Civil Rights Institute. WiFi is free.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Birmingham/Lakeshore Drive
description: We're off I-65 along Lakeshore Parkway, a short walk to shops and dining. The UAB campus and downtown Birmingham are 15 minutes away, and Birmingham-Shuttlesworth Airport is 12 miles from us. Enjoy breakfast and dinner in our Garden Grille, or order evening room service. Grab a drink or snack at our Pavilion Pantry, open 24 hours.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Birmingham Fultondale
description: We're between I-65 and Highway 31, within five minutes of the I-22 intersection. Downtown Birmingham is eight miles away, home to the Birmingham Civil Rights Institute and McWane Science Center. Birmingham-Shuttlesworth International Airport is a 15-minute drive. We're pet-friendly, with free breakfast and in-suite kitchens.

name: Hampton Inn Birmingham/Fultondale (I-65)
description: Located off I-65, we're 15 minutes from McWane Science Center and Railroad Park. Visit the Birmingham Civil Rights Institute and Alabama Jazz Hall of Fame, just 15 minutes away. A half hour drive will get you to the Birmingham Zoo, Riverchase Galleria Mall, and Birmingham Botanical Gardens. Enjoy the convenience of free WiFi and free hot breakfast.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Birmingham SE/Liberty Park
description: Our Birmingham hotel is in the Liberty Park area, amid Urban Center corporate park and a 10-minute drive from the athletic complex. Birmingham Zoo and the Birmingham Botanical Gardens are seven miles away. We have an indoor pool and over 2,000 sq. ft. of meeting space. Cooked-to-order breakfast is available in our Garden Grille, and WiFi's on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Birmingham East Irondale
description: Located near Birmingham International Airport, we’re a short drive from exciting attractions including Talladega Superspeedway. Petrol heads will love the Barber Vintage Motorsports Museum and Park nearby. We’re close to the famous Irondale Café, inspiration for the book and film 'Fried Green Tomatoes'. Here at our comfy hotel, breakfast and WiFi are free, and you can unwind with our indoor pool and fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn Birmingham-Colonnade 280
description: We're just off Highway 280 and I-459, and two miles from The Summit for a great range of shops and dining. Our free hot breakfast will set you up for the day, while Birmingham Botanical Gardens, 11 minutes' drive, is the perfect place to unwind. Enjoy our pool and fitness center, and stay connected with free WiFi.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Birmingham Perimeter Park
description: Our hotel is just off I-280 in Birmingham. We're a mile from upscale shopping and restaurants at The Summit, with a free shuttle service to and from the mall. Downtown, the Birmingham Zoo, and Birmingham-Shuttlesworth International Airport are within 20 minutes. Every stay starts with our signature warm chocolate chip cookie.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Birmingham-South/Inverness
description: We’re just 15 minutes from downtown Birmingham in the I-280 corridor. Explore Vulcan Park and Museum, the Botanical Gardens, Zoo, and shopping and dining at The Summit. Finish the night off at our free evening social, Monday – Thursday, or with a quiet meal, cooked in your own kitchen. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Calera
description: We’re just off I-65, about half an hour from Birmingham and an hour from Montgomery. Within ten miles of our hotel you’ll find a variety of attractions, such as the Heart of Dixie Railroad Museum, the University of Montevallo, the American Village, and Timberline Golf Course. Enjoy our free WiFi and hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Birmingham-Pelham (I-65)
description: We're a half mile from I-65, minutes from hiking, biking, and canoeing at Oak Mountain State Park. Head four miles north to go shopping at the Riverchase Galleria and catch an act at the StarDome Comedy Club. It's a 15-mile drive to Birmingham Zoo, Legacy Arena, and University of Alabama at Birmingham. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Birmingham-SW-Riverchase-Galleria
description: Whether soccer is your sport or shopping is your cardio, our suites are a convenient home base in Hoover, 15 minutes south of downtown Birmingham. We're less than a mile from Riverchase Sports Park, and the famed Galleria is just five minutes away. Start each day with free hot breakfast, and join us for our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Birmingham Hoover
description: Our suites are across from the Riverchase Galleria. We’re 20 minutes from downtown Birmingham, Regions Field, and the Barber Motorsports Track and Museum. We offer a free local shuttle to local destinations including Riverchase Office Park, two miles away. Enjoy free cooked-to-order breakfast and our complimentary evening reception.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Birmingham-Hoover-Galleria
description: Find us off I-459 and US Highway 31, seven minutes' drive to Hoover. For shops and dining, it's a short walk to Riverchase Galleria, Alabama's largest indoor shopping mall. Fuel up on our free hot breakfast, then hit the trails of Oak Mountain State Park, 10 miles away. Enjoy free WiFi and out indoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Birmingham/280 East-Eagle Point
description: We’re off Highway 280, just 20 minutes from central Birmingham, home of McWane Science Center, Birmingham Civil Rights Institute, and the Botanical Gardens. Browse neighborhood shops, or stretch your legs at Oak Mountain State Park, the largest in Alabama, 25 minutes from the door. Start each day with free hot breakfast, and enjoy WiFi on us.

name: Hampton Inn Cullman
description: Directly off I-65, we’re close to Cullman’s attractions. Ave Maria Grotto, known as ‘Jerusalem in miniature’, and Alabama nature at Smith Lake and Hurricane Creek Park are all within 20 minutes of your room. Cullman’s historic district is 10 minutes away, packed with antique stores. Start the day with free hot breakfast, and enjoy WiFi on us.

name: Hampton Inn Guntersville
description: We're right off US-431 with a private marina for easy access to world-class fishing in Lake Guntersville. Live entertainment and fresh gulf seafood are right next door at Wintzell's Oyster House. Start each day right with free hot breakfast, and stay connected with free WiFi. Enjoy relaxing lakeside views from our heated outdoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn Jasper
description: We’re less than an hour west of Birmingham-Shuttlesworth International Airport in the historic coal mining town of Jasper. Take a 20-minute drive to Old York Farms, where you’ll find Alabama’s frontier past and the Bull Pen steakhouse. Head east about 13 miles for golf at Horse Creek. Breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Fairhope-Mobile Bay
description: Discover Fairhope's boutique shopping, restaurants, and street markets from our downtown hotel. We're across the street from Fairhope Museum of History and five minutes from North Beach Park and Fairhope Municipal Pier. Kick the day off with free hot breakfast, and relax in our outdoor pool. WiFi's on us, and our fitness center makes staying in shape easy.

name: Tru by Hilton Mobile
description: Our hotel is next to Hank Aaron Stadium, close to I-65 and I-10. We're 10 minutes from Mobile attractions like Dauphin Street, the GulfQuest National Maritime Museum, and the USS Alabama. With board games, comfy chairs, and hot coffee and tea, our lobby has plenty of space to gather and recharge – and WiFi is free.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Mobile I-65 Government Boulevard
description: Just six miles from the downtown area, with Fort Conde, Oakleigh Period House Museum, the Bragg-Mitchell Mansion and Bellingrath Gardens nearby, staying with us is a true Alabama experience. Make the most of your in-room kitchen, free WiFi and breakfast before exploring the USS Alabama, or the boardwalks and beaches of Dauphin Island – a great day out for pets.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Mobile I-65/Airport Blvd, AL
description: We’re between Mobile Regional Airport, eight miles away, and central Mobile, five miles away. Fun is nearby at Gulf Coast Exploreum Science Center and Mobile Carnival Museum. Grab free breakfast before swinging by the Robert Trent Jones Golf Trail. Get creative in your in-suite kitchen, or join us for complimentary evening socials, Monday – Thursday. WiFi’s on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Mobile I-65@ Airport Blvd
description: We’re conveniently located on I-65@ Airport Blvd, near attractions, shops, restaurants and bars. Only minutes from the bayous, bays and beaches, kick back and enjoy southern hospitality including free WiFi, a comfy bed, hot breakfast and fitness center.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Mobile West I-65/Airport Blvd.
description: We're just off the I-65/Airport Boulevard intersection, moments from Bel Air Mall and several dining options. The University of South Alabama and Spring Hill College are within 15 minutes, and our hotel is less than 10 miles from Mobile Regional Airport and the Central Business District downtown. Our restaurant serves breakfast and dinner daily.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Mobile West I-10 Tillmans Corner
description: We're close to Coca-Cola, Walmart, and Amazon facilities as well as shops, dining, and popular attractions like Mobile International Speedway and Bellingrath Gardens. Relax in a spacious suite with kitchen and free WiFi. Start the day with a free hot breakfast before visiting the USS Alabama battleship or take a day trip to Dauphin Island for a beach retreat.

name: Hampton Inn Mobile-I-10/Bellingrath Gardens
description: We’re just off I-10 in Tillmans Corner, surrounded by restaurants and minutes from Mobile attractions. Tour the historic Bellingrath Gardens and Home, 10 miles from our doorstep. Downtown is just 15 minutes away. Relax on the patio by our outdoor pool, and enjoy free WiFi and hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Saraland Mobile
description: Just off I-65, we're 10 miles from central Mobile, home of the Mobile Convention Center and USS Alabama tours. Wildlife fans will be 20 minutes from Five Rivers Delta Safaris, offering cruises or leisurely fishing. If you prefer things tamer, the Mobile Botanical Gardens and Azalea City Golf Course are 16 minutes away. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Foley
description: We're across the road from shopping at Tanger Outlets, and two miles from US-98. It’s less than 10 minutes to OWA Entertainment Destination, Graham Creek Nature Reserve, and Foley Sports Complex. Beaches at Gulf Shores are around 20 minutes away. Every room is a suite and we offer free WiFi and free hot breakfast every morning.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Huntsville/Space Center
description: Off I-565, we're within a mile of the US Space & Rocket Center and Space Camp, Huntsville Botanical Garden, and the University of Alabama – Huntsville. Interstate access puts us five miles from downtown Huntsville and 10 miles from Huntsville International Airport. Enjoy access to our fitness center and outdoor pool.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Dothan
description: We're on the southwest side of The Circle, lined with retailers and dining in each direction. The fairgrounds, home to the National Peanut Festival, are 15 minutes away. Enjoy casual meals in our restaurant, open all day, and cool off with a cocktail in our resort-style outdoor pool. We'll welcome you with a warm chocolate chip cookie on arrival.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Dothan
description: We’re off Highway 231 in Dothan, which hosts the National Peanut Festival every fall. Enjoy the historical Landmark Park, visit the Opera House, or walk the mural trail. Take the kids to the Adventureland Theme Park, just 10 minutes away. Our hotel has an outdoor pool and a fitness center, plus free WiFi and hot breakfast.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Dothan
description: Off Highway 231, we’re across from Dothan Pavilion mall and restaurants. Adventureland and Dothan Regional Airport are 10 minutes away. Folklore Brewing & Meadery is a 20-minute drive, and Fort Rucker Army Base and Farley Nuclear Plant are a half-hour from our hotel. We’ve got an outdoor pool, restaurant, and fitness center.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Dothan
description: Start each day with a free breakfast before perusing Dothan Pavilion Shopping Center – within walking distance of our spacious, pet-friendly suites. We’re also steps from a movie theater and an eclectic mix of restaurants. Or stock your in-suite kitchen at our 24-hour store, cook up a storm, and make the most of the free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Ozark
description: We're right off Highway 231, just a 5-minute drive from downtown Ozark. Here to fish? Ed Lisenby Lake is a popular bass spot in Alabama and it's six minutes from our door. Discover more than 150 military aircraft at the U.S. Army Aviation Museum, 11 miles away. Cool off in our outdoor pool, and enjoy free breakfast and WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Enterprise
description: Enterprise, Alabama, has an unusual claim to fame: its Boll Weevil Monument, just a few minutes from our hotel. Head downtown, just two miles away, to check out the local dining and shopping scene. Rather stay in? The hotel has a fitness center, outdoor pool, and business center. The WiFi and breakfast are free.

name: Hampton Inn Troy
description: Settled in the heart of the city, we’re close to all manner of local attractions. Take in the great outdoors at the Pioneer Museum of Alabama with its 15 acres of woodland; check out the historic district’s antebellum homes or dabble in a little culture at the Crosby Theater or Johnson Center for the Arts. Don’t worry about WiFi or breakfast – they’re on us.

name: Hampton Inn Eufaula
description: We're in a quiet neighborhood off Highway 431. Discover the 19th Century Shorter Mansion, just nine minutes away, or visit Old Creek Town Park Recreation where you'll find a beach and nature trails. Enjoy free hot breakfast every morning. Our 24-hour convenience store will keep you stocked with snacks and travel essentials.

name: Hampton Inn Foley, AL
description: We're on Highway 59, two minutes from Lambert's Cafe and the premium shops at the Tanger Outlets Foley. Family fun at The Park at OWA and ballgames at the Foley Sports Complex are within 15 minutes of our hotel. Spend a day on Gulf Shores' white sand beaches, eight miles south. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our outdoor saltwater pool.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Florence-Downtown
description: Located off US 72 in the Shoals area of Florence, we’re a short walk from shops, restaurants, and the historic district. Visit the Civil War hospital at Pope’s Tavern Museum, and the University of North Alabama, both under a mile away. We’re less than 15 minutes from Helen Keller Birth Place and the Alabama Music Hall of Fame. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, WiFi, and our indoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn Florence-Midtown
description: We're right off US-13 in Florence's commercial district, three miles from the University of North Alabama. On the banks of the Tennessee River, you'll find scenery and recreation mixed with a dash of history. Shop and dine 10 minutes away at Florence Mall and Cox Creek Shopping Center. Enjoy free hot breakfast every morning.

name: Hampton Inn Gulf Shores
description: We're right off Highway 59/Gulf Shores Parkway. The pristine white sands of Gulf Shores Beach are a mile from our door, and so is Beach Boulevard dining. Alabama Gulf Coast Zoo, and The Track, for go-karting fun, are five minutes' drive away. Wake up to free hot breakfast and refresh in our outdoor pool. At night, unwind by the fire pit. WiFi and parking are on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Orange Beach Beachfront
description: Our hotel is just steps from the beach, with views of the Gulf of Mexico. We're close to coastal attractions and restaurants, and we have an outdoor pool with whirlpools and a seasonal tiki bar. Our Garden Grille & Bar is open for breakfast, and lunch and dinner can be delivered from Bubba’s Seafood.

name: The Lodge at Gulf State Park, a Hilton Hotel
description: Resting on the Gulf Coast, our eco-friendly resort is part of the 6,150-acre Gulf State Park — boasting 28 miles of trails and a freshwater fishing lake. We're adjacent to Gulf State Pier, with central Gulf Shores two miles away. Explore the area with our rental bikes, and enjoy a coast-facing infinity pool and 24-hour fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Orange Beach/Gulf Front
description: Overlooking the Gulf of Mexico, look forward to sunset views and private beach access. We're within a half-mile of local Orange Beach shops and quick bites, with Gulf State Park and Adventure Island amusement park less than five minutes away. Relax in our heated outdoor pool—with poolside Tiki Bar—and enjoy our fitness center, free hot breakfast, and WiFi on us.

name: Island House Hotel Orange Beach - a DoubleTree by Hilton
description: Enjoy breathtaking views of the Gulf of Mexico at our hotel in the heart of Orange Beach. Attractions like The Wharf, Adventure Island, and Palm Point Shopping Plaza are within two miles. Orange Beach Convention Center is an 11-minute drive away. Enjoy rooms with balconies, beach access, and our outdoor pool with space to relax.

name: Hampton Inn Fort Payne
description: We're just off I-59, half a mile from the DeKalb Regional Medical Center and Siemens Energy. Head a mile east on Glenn Boulevard into Fort Payne, where you can find local attractions and eateries like the Alabama Fan Club and Museum and the Vintage 1889 Cafe. Enjoy free daily hot breakfast and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Scottsboro
description: We're just off US-72, just two miles from Scottsboro's historic city center. See what you can find at the Unclaimed Baggage Center three miles away, and take in the natural beauty of Appalachia. Enjoy free hot breakfast daily and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Gadsden
description: We're just off the I-759/US-411 intersection, next to the Coosa River and the Gadsden Mall. Take a scenic nature walk through James D. Martin Wildlife Park a minute away, or drive five miles north to Noccalula Falls Park. Goodyear and Gadsden's medical district are three miles away. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our outdoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn Gadsden/Attalla I-59
description: We're next to I-59, centrally located between Atlanta, Chattanooga, Birmingham, and Huntsville. Hike and play mini golf at scenic Noccalula Falls Park, seven miles away. NASCAR races at Talladega Superspeedway are 36 miles south. Work in our business center, or in your room with our free WiFi. Enjoy free hot breakfast and our outdoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn Jacksonville-Anniston Area
description: We're at the foothills of the Appalachian Mountains, just five miles from Fort McClellan Army Base. Stay with us for graduation and football games – we're minutes from Jacksonville State University. Start your morning with our free hot breakfast. Enjoy an afternoon in our sunroom, or go for a swim in our outdoor pool.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Oxford/Anniston, AL
description: Off I-20, we're a mile from Oxford Exchange shops and dining. Talladega National Forest and Anniston are 15 minutes away, and we're within 25 minutes of Talladega Speedway and Cheaha State Park. Free perks include WiFi and access to our indoor pool and fitness center. Check out our restaurant and 24-hour snack shop.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Oxford-Anniston
description: Just off I-20, we’re 10 minutes from the restaurants, shops, and live music of downtown Anniston. Hike or bike the national forests of Cheaha State Park, less than 15 miles away. Enjoy astonishing panoramic views from Mount Cheaha, the state’s highest point. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Oxford, AL
description: With the city center and downtown Anniston three miles away, we're great for an activity-rich vacation. All kinds of driving are covered at Talladega Superspeedway and Cider Ridge Golf Club – just make sure to have some free, hot breakfast first. Wind down with a home-cooked meal in your in-suite kitchen, or walk the dog at Lake Wedowee. WiFi’s on us.

name: Hampton Inn Pell City
description: We're right on I-20, and a quick walk from shops and restaurants. Enjoy boating, fishing, and water sports at Logan Martin Lake, less than 20 minutes away. Start your day with free hot breakfast before visiting Talladega Superspeedway, or take a day trip to explore DeSoto Caverns (25 miles away). WiFi is free every day of your stay.

name: Hampton Inn Birmingham/Leeds, AL
description: We're right off I-20, five minutes from Barber Motorsports Park. Learn pro driving skills at Porsche Sport Driving School and discover racing history at the Barber Vintage Motorsports Museum. Find bargains across the highway at the Outlet Shops of Grand River, and watch a drive-in movie in the evening. Enjoy free hot breakfast and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Greenville
description: We're just off I-65, within a mile of a dozen restaurants. It's a short drive to the city's largest businesses including Hwashin, Hyundai Steel America, and Ozark Materials. Tee off at Cambrian Ridge, part of the Robert Trent Jones Golf Trail, 10 minutes away. Make your stay in Greenville extra comfy with our free daily hot breakfast and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Montgomery-South-Airport
description: We're just off I-65, under five minutes from corporations like the Hyundai plant, Glovis, and Coca-Cola. Montgomery Regional Airport is only five miles away. You can reach the Rosa Parks museum in downtown Montgomery, Alabama State University, or Maxwell Air Force Base in about 20 minutes. Free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our outdoor pool enhance your stay.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Huntsville Hampton Cove
description: We’re 10 minutes from downtown Huntsville, just by Highway 431. It’s 10 minutes to Huntsville Hospital, and 15 to Alabama A&M University and The University of Alabama in Huntsville. Enjoy a round at the Hampton Cove Golf Course, two miles away. Or explore the shops at the Bridge Street Town Center, 13 miles from our hotel. Relax in our large outdoor pool. WiFi and hot breakfast are free.

name: DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Huntsville South
description: Located off Memorial Parkway, our suites are five miles from downtown Huntsville. We're steps from neighborhood shopping, with the U.S. Space & Rocket Center nine miles away and the Redstone Arsenal campus 20 minutes from the door. A complimentary cookie welcomes you to the hotel, and we have an outdoor pool and 24-hour fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn Huntsville-Arsenal/South Pkway
description: We're just off Memorial Parkway, six miles from Redstone Arsenal. Blast off for the U.S. Space & Rocket Center, 15 minutes away. Just a mile from there, explore 112 acres of exotic landscapes at Huntsville Botanical Garden. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Huntsville South/Redstone Arsenal
description: Off Memorial Parkway, we're 15 minutes from Redstone Arsenal headquarters. Downtown Huntsville and Von Braun Center events are five miles away, while both the U.S. Space & Rocket Center and Huntsville Botanical Garden are within eight miles of our door. Enjoy our 24-hour fitness center and heated indoor pool and whirlpool.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton® Huntsville-Downtown, AL
description: We’re just a mile from downtown Huntsville attractions, with events at Von Braun Center five minutes from your door. Free breakfast is fuel for exploring the U.S. Space & Rocket Center, 10 minutes away. Make the most of neighborhood dining, or try your own in-suite kitchen. Join us for a complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday, and enjoy WiFi on us.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Montgomery
description: It’s the best of both worlds: our quiet, tree-lined neighborhood (ideal for dog-walking) is just four miles from downtown Montgomery’s Rosa Parks Museum and Civil Rights Memorial. Unwind at our evening social, Monday – Thursday, or with some home-cooking in an apartment-style suite. Fill up on free breakfast before teeing off at Robert Trent Jones Golf Trail. WiFi’s on us.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Montgomery EastChase
description: We're 15 minutes from downtown Montgomery, close to retailers and restaurants at Eastchase Market Center and The Shoppes at Eastchase, and within 20 minutes of the Montgomery Museum of Fine Arts. We offer free daily breakfast, WiFi, and an evening social Monday – Thursday. Kick back in the outdoor lounge with heated pool. The fitness center makes working out easy.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Tuscaloosa Downtown
description: We're on Jack Warner Parkway, steps from the River Walk and Tuscaloosa Amphitheater. University Boulevard dining is within a 15-minute walk, and the University of Alabama is 1.5 miles away. See the city from our rooftop restaurant and bar. We offer free breakfast, and each suite has a full kitchen. A fitness center, outdoor pool, and two sunlit boardrooms await.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Mobile Airport-University Area
description: Minutes from Mobile Regional Airport, our hotel is less than five miles from the University of South Alabama, Springhill College, Providence Hospital, and a Tennis Center. Cheer on the Mobile BayBears and enjoy ballpark-themed decorative touches in a town that is the birthplace of five Hall of Fame baseball players. Our spacious suites offer fully equipped kitchens. Breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Montgomery Hotel & Conference Center
description: Our hotel is across the street from Montgomery Convention Center. We're a five-minute walk from the Legacy Museum, the Montgomery Performing Arts Center, and Riverwalk Stadium, home of the Montgomery Biscuits. Our hotel features an indoor pool and fitness center. Enjoy free made-to-order breakfast and our complimentary evening reception.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Montgomery-Downtown
description: From our front doors it's an easy walk to The Legacy Museum, Montgomery Biscuits minor league baseball, and the Rosa Parks Museum. Reach the Alabama State Capitol in one mile, and Alabama State University half a mile farther. Discover plenty of restaurants within a few blocks. Enjoy local transportation, our hot breakfast, and WiFi – all free.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Montgomery Downtown
description: Our downtown hotel is just off I-65, blocks from the riverfront and Montgomery Convention Center. We're within a half-mile of the Rosa Parks Library, Legacy Museum, and other historic sites. Maxwell Air Force Base is a seven-minute drive away. Enjoy views of the city from our garden terrace, and a warm chocolate chip cookie when you arrive.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Montgomery East
description: Our hotel is off I-85, 10 minutes from downtown Montgomery. We're near Huntingdon College and Alabama State University, and seven minutes from Auburn University. Eastdale Mall, the Montgomery Zoo, and The Shoppes at Eastchase are within eight miles. Our Great American Grill serves breakfast, dinner, and evening room service.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Prattville
description: Offering the best of both worlds, we're set in a quiet suburban location, with shops and dining nearby, as well as historic downtown Prattville and the Autauga Creek Canoe Trail. Golf enthusiasts will love our proximity to Capitol Hill Golf Course, part of the RTJ Golf Trail. Your pet-friendly suite contains a kitchen and free WiFi. A hot breakfast is also included in your stay.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Montgomery-EastChase
description: Off I-85, we're five minutes from Auburn University Montgomery. You'll find the Shoppes at Eastchase and restaurants within a half-mile. We're within 20 minutes of the Civil Rights Trail's historical sites. You'll be just as close to Maxwell Air Force Base. Enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi, and relax in our fitness center and outdoor pool.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Montgomery - EastChase
description: Reach us from I-85 and discover the Shoppes at Eastchase and neighborhood dining within walking distance. We're 10 miles from the historic sites of the Civil Rights Trail in central Montgomery and the Alabama State Capitol. We have a fitness center, outdoor saltwater pool, and event space accommodating up to 250 guests.

name: Hampton Inn Jackson
description: We're next to US-43, with easy access to restaurants and shopping along the highway. Boise Paper is just four miles south, and outdoor activities like hiking and fishing are popular here in the beautiful Tombigbee River Valley. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and an outdoor pool to escape the Alabama heat.

name: Hampton Inn Winfield
description: We’re nestled in the quiet historic city of Winfield, directly off I-22. You’ll be just 10 minutes from central Winfield dining and historic sites, like the restored Vaudeville Pastime Theater. Experience Alabama nature at Bankhead National Forest, just half an hour away. Wake up to free hot breakfast, and enjoy WiFi on us.

name: Hampton Inn Birmingham/Trussville
description: Our Trussville hotel is off the I-59/I-459 intersection, just 20 minutes from Birmingham. We’re 15 minutes from car history at Barber Vintage Motorsports Museum, and just as close to Birmingham-Shuttlesworth International Airport. Enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi. Dinner’s on us, Tuesday and Wednesday evenings.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Birmingham/Trussville
description: We're at I-59 and I-459, with shops and dining in walking distance. Birmingham-Shuttlesworth Airport is nine miles away and downtown Birmingham is 12 miles from our hotel. Enjoy breakfast and dinner in our Great American Grill restaurant, or grab a drink and snack in the 24-hour Pavilion Pantry.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Mobile Providence Park/Airport
description: We’re next door to Providence Hospital and 10 minutes from Mobile Regional Airport. Our free shuttle covers the airport and local attractions. The historic USS Alabama, the GulfQuest National Maritime Museum, and Mobile Convention Center are 25 minutes away. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our outdoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn Selma
description: We’re right off US-80, with quick access to Old Town Historic District. Fuel up on our free hot breakfast before heading four miles away to the National Voting Rights Museum and Institute. Head 25 miles south for the historic Selma to Montgomery National Historic Trail. Enjoy free WiFi and our indoor pool.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Tuscaloosa Alabama Downtown
description: Find us in downtown Tuscaloosa, within a mile of the Bama Theater and Tuscaloosa City Hall. Tuscaloosa Riverwalk, Alabama Museum of Natural History, and the University of Alabama are within two miles. The Ol' Colony Golf Course is a 15-minute drive away. Enjoy our free made-to-order breakfast and complimentary evening reception.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Tuscaloosa Downtown University Boulevard
description: Find us at the corner of University Boulevard and Lurleen B Wallace Boulevard South in downtown Tuscaloosa, walking distance from restaurants, shops, and the Tuscaloosa Amphitheater. The Federal Building & Courthouse is half a mile away, and the University of Alabama campus is within easy reach. A free hot breakfast is served daily, or you can prepare meals in your in-suite kitchen.

name: Hampton Inn Tuscaloosa-University
description: Find us off Highway 82, across the street from The University of Alabama, and next door to Baumhower’s Victory Grille. The Paul W. Bryant Museum, University Mall, and Bryant Conference Center are two miles from our door. Cheer on the Crimson Tide at Bryant-Denny Stadium, just three miles away. We've got WiFi and hot breakfast covered.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Tuscaloosa
description: Located off I-20, we're three miles from the University of Alabama. Bryant-Denny Stadium and Paul Bryant Museum are minutes away, and downtown Tuscaloosa, Bama Theatre, and Tuscaloosa Amphitheater are within four miles. Enjoy breakfast, dinner, and evening room service from our Garden Grille, and drinks in our Pavilion Lounge.

name: Hampton Inn Tuscaloosa-East
description: We're next to I-20, only six miles from Crimson Tide games and events at the University of Alabama. It's just a minute further to downtown attractions like the River Walk and shows at the Tuscaloosa Amphitheater. Check out the Mercedes-Benz Visitor Center, 14 miles east. Free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our outdoor pool make your stay even better.

name: Valley Hotel Homewood Birmingham, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: None

name: Hilton Anchorage
description: We’re in the heart of downtown, within three blocks of the Egan and Dena'ina convention centers, 5th Avenue Mall, and the Alaska Center for the Performing Arts. Our lobby features an extensive collection of Alaskan art. Visit our fitness center and relax in our indoor pool and steam room. We have a business center open 24 hours.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Anchorage
description: Our suites are within six miles of downtown and Anchorage International Airport — we'll take you there on our free shuttle. We’re 15 minutes from the Tony Knowles Coastal Trail, where you can spot belugas and moose. Enjoy free made-to-order breakfast, our evening reception, and access to the indoor pool and fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn Anchorage
description: Our pet-friendly hotel is off Seward Highway, seven minutes from the Anchorage Museum and Anchorage 5th Avenue Mall. Ted Stevens Anchorage International Airport is 10 minutes away - our free airport shuttle will take you there. Visit the University of Alaska Anchorage, just three miles from us. Every stay with us includes free WiFi, pool access, and daily free hot breakfast.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Anchorage
description: We're 10 minutes from downtown and Anchorage International Airport. We offer a free shuttle to and from both. Enjoy the views at Westchester Lagoon, four miles away, or Beluga Point Sight, 15 miles. Our Garden Grille restaurant and bar serves breakfast and dinner, with evening room service. The Pavilion Pantry is open 24 hours for drinks and snacks.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Anchorage/Midtown
description: Make yourself at home in a spacious suite with a full kitchen and great amenities. Enjoy free breakfast, WiFi, and our airport shuttle. Take some time to relax in our indoor saline pool or warm up on the patio beside one of our firepits and BBQ grills.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Anchorage
description: Grab our free shuttle to/from Anchorage International Airport and downtown Anchorage, both 10 minutes away. You’ll be equally close to Merrill Field Airport. We’re 10 minutes from both the University of Alaska Anchorage and Alaska Pacific University campuses. WiFi, breakfast, and our evening social, Monday – Thursday, are on us. Enjoy your in-suite kitchen. Pets are welcome.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Fairbanks
description: You'll find us seven miles from Fairbanks International Airport. We offer a free shuttle to/from the airport and the Alaska Railroad depot. We're five miles from Fort Wainwright Army Base, and two miles from downtown. View locally made ice sculptures and a nightly Aurora show at the Fairbanks Ice Museum. Relax in our indoor pool and whirlpool. Hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Hampton Inn Phoenix/Anthem
description: Our hotel is right off I-17, across the street from the Outlets at Anthem and 15 minutes from Hurricane Harbor Phoenix water park. We're a 30-minute drive from downtown Phoenix and Sky Harbor Airport. We have an outdoor pool with sitting area, a fitness center, flexible meeting space, and free hot breakfast daily. WiFi's on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Phoenix North/Happy Valley
description: We’re near White Tank Mountain Regional Park, Adobe Dam Recreation Area, Lake Pleasant and Cave Creek. It’s not all nature; Phoenix International Raceway, Happy Valley Town Center and the Challenger Space Center are close by. Breakfast is on us, just like our corporate shuttle to businesses in a five-mile radius. When you find the time, enjoy our free WiFi.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Phoenix North-Happy Valley
description: Find us just off I-17, three miles from Phoenix Deer Valley Airport. Happy Valley Towne Center is a short walk away, or grab our free shuttle bus and take it easy. Family days at Hurricane Harbor are five minutes from the door. When the day is over, stop by our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday, or do a little in-suite cooking. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Phoenix North Happy Valley
description: Off I-17, we're two miles from Phoenix Deer Valley Airport and the outdoor Shops at Norterra. Hurricane Harbor waterpark is three miles away, and plenty of spring training fields are within 20 miles. Our hotel has a restaurant, outdoor pool, event space for 200 guests, and a free five-mile shuttle to local attractions.

name: Hampton Inn Phoenix/Glendale/Peoria
description: We're in baseball central, minutes from Seattle Mariners and San Diego Padres spring training at Peoria Sports Complex. Shops and restaurants galore are within walking distance and a mile away at Arrowhead Towne Center. It's 12 miles to Glendale and Grand Canyon University. Escape the heat in our outdoor pool. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Phoenix/Scottsdale
description: Near Loop 101, we're a half-mile from The Promenade shops and dining. Our free shuttle covers a five-mile radius, including TPC golf course and the Mayo Clinic. Stay 20 minutes south of Pinnacle Peak Park and just as close to Old Town Scottsdale, with downtown Phoenix half an hour away. Enjoy free WiFi, hot breakfast, and our outdoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Phoenix-Surprise
description: We're off US 60, about 25 miles northwest of metro Phoenix. The Banner Del E. Webb Medical Center is across the street, and restaurants are in walking distance. Catch Royals and Rangers spring training at Surprise Stadium just three miles away. The Wildlife World Zoo, Aquarium & Safari Park is nine miles' drive. Breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Scottsdale North/Perimeter Center
description: We're minutes from WestWorld of Scottsdale, and only three miles from Scottsdale Airpark and shopping at Kierland Commons. The Mayo Clinic Hospital can be reached in 10 minutes, and spring training at Salt River Fields is 15 minutes away. We serve breakfast and dinner in our Garden Grille & Bar, and snacks in our 24-hour Pavilion Pantry.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Surprise Phoenix
description: We're off US 60 and Loop 303. Several restaurants, the Aquatic Center, and spring training at Surprise Stadium are less than a mile away, and downtown Surprise is five minutes' drive. Enjoy freshly prepared meals in our restaurant or grab drinks and snacks from our 24-hour shop. We also offer room service. Unwind in our heated pool, and enjoy WiFi on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Phoenix-Goodyear
description: We're just off I-10, and a 10-minute drive from Phoenix Goodyear Airport. Phoenix-Sky Harbor International Airport is a 30-minute drive from us, and there are shops, restaurants, and a movie theater less than 10 minutes away at Market at Estrella Falls. We have an outdoor pool, 3,500 sq. ft of event space, and a free hot breakfast daily. WiFi's on us.

name: Tru by Hilton Goodyear Phoenix West
description: We’re off 1-10 at the Bullard Exit and six minutes to Goodyear Airport. Luke Air Force Base and PV-303 Business Park are within a 12-minute drive. Goodyear Ballpark is less than four miles away. The giant media wall at our game center is hard to miss. Enjoy free WiFi.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Phoenix/Avondale
description: We're just off I-10, a quarter mile from American Sports Centers. Take our free shuttle (available Mon.-Fri. upon request) to anywhere within five miles, including SanMar and Pepsico. University of Phoenix Stadium, Gila River Arena, and Westgate entertainment are within eight miles. Enjoy our heated outdoor pool. Breakfast and dinner are served in our Garden Grille & Bar.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Phoenix-Avondale
description: We’re just west of Phoenix – close to office complexes, Phoenix International Raceway for racing fans, Luke Air Force Base, and Universal Technical Institute. Championship golf awaits at The Wigwam, while gourmands will find their fix at a range of local eateries. Breakfast is on us, as is WiFi.

name: Tru by Hilton Phoenix Glendale Westgate
description: We're right in between the Westgate Entertainment District and State Farm Stadium, an eight-minute walk to both. Loop 101 is a mile from us for quick access around Phoenix. Fill up on free breakfast before hitting the Tanger Outlets, also walkable, and cool off in our outdoor pool. We have board games and 24/7 coffee in the lobby, plus a fitness center.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Phoenix Glendale-Westgate
description: With Gila River Arena, Ak-Chin Pavilion, and State Farm Stadium nearby, big-ticket excitement is everywhere. A 25-minute drive brings you to Phoenix International Raceway. Quieter days at Desert Mirage Golf Center and the Grand Canal Linear Park, are less than 2 miles away. Enjoy free WiFi and breakfast, with your own in-suite kitchen. Pets are welcome.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Phoenix Glendale-Westgate
description: Set off Loop 101, we're less than a mile from the Tanger Outlets and Westgate Entertainment District. See a show at Gila River Arena, just across the street, or cheer on the Cardinals at University of Phoenix Stadium, one mile from our door. Downtown Phoenix is only 15 miles away. Enjoy our outdoor pool and whirlpool. WiFi and hot breakfast are on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Buckeye Phoenix
description: Just off I-10, we’re steps away from the shopping and dining at Sundance Towne Center, and 10 minutes from Buckeye Municipal Airport. Skyline Regional Park and Verrado Golf Club are a short drive away, and we’re eight miles from the fishing and live music at Hidden Lake. Enjoy your in-suite kitchen and customizable workspace. WiFi’s on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Phoenix Downtown
description: Our 1930’s Art Deco building is blocks from Phoenix Convention Center, downtown Phoenix, and the Valley Metro light rail. Talking Stick Resort Arena and Chase Field are within one mile, and we're five miles from Phoenix Sky Harbor International Airport. We have free WiFi, a bar and restaurant, seasonal rooftop deck, and 24-hour snack shop.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Phoenix Downtown
description: Within an easy mile-long walk of our hotel, you'll find the Phoenix Convention Center, Chase Field, businesses including Ernst & Young, and a great choice of restaurants. It's four miles to Phoenix Sky Harbor Airport. In the evening, enjoy a drink or snack in our Lobby Lounge. Our business center and Suite Shop are open 24 hours, and hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Phoenix-Midtown-Downtown Area
description: We're next to St. Joseph's Hospital, a short walk from quick bites and the Thomas/Central Ave. light rail station, leading downtown. Chase Field ballgames, Phoenix Convention Center events, and Phoenix Sky Harbor Airport are all within 10 minutes of the hotel. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our fitness center and outdoor pool.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Phoenix Downtown North
description: Our location next to the Thomas/Central Metro station puts downtown Phoenix in reach: Chase Field, ASU, and the Phoenix Convention Center are a 15-minute ride away. We’re less than a mile from the Heard Museum and Phoenix Art Museum. We have a fitness center and indoor pool. Enjoy free breakfast and our complimentary evening reception.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Phoenix Midtown
description: Off I-17 and Highway 51, we’re within three miles of the Phoenix Art Museum, Phoenix Convention Center, and downtown dining and entertainment. We provide a free local shuttle. Our Garden Grille & Bar serves cooked-to-order breakfast, dinner, and evening room service. Enjoy the fitness center, outdoor pool, and heated whirlpool.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Phoenix North
description: Our hotel is off I-17, next door to the shopping, dining, and entertainment at Metrocenter and Castles N’ Coasters. We have a free shuttle covering a five-mile radius and we're 12 miles north of central Phoenix. Our outdoor space includes a pool, whirlpool, and firepits, and guests are welcomed with a warm DoubleTree cookie.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Phoenix-Metro Center
description: Find us off I-17, 20 minutes from Phoenix Sky Harbor International Airport and downtown. You’ll be 10 minutes from Arizona State University West, and 20 minutes from Grand Canyon University. Explore neighborhood dining, or try your in-suite kitchen. Join us Monday – Thursday for our complimentary evening social, and WiFi and breakfast are free. Pets are welcome.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Chandler Downtown
description: Find us in Downtown Chandler, a short walk from city offices, local dining, two breweries, and the Chandler Center for the Arts. Loop 202 is a mile south, making for easy access to Greater Phoenix. Sky Harbor Airport's just 20 minutes away. Torch calories in our fitness center or cool off in the outdoor pool. We offer covered parking and 1,800 sq. ft. of sunlit meeting space, plus free WiFi.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Phoenix Chandler Fashion Center
description: Stay in style off Highway 101, five minutes from Chandler's Fashion Center. The Cubs' and Angels' spring training facilities are 15 minutes away. With a fully equipped kitchen and separate living and dining areas, you'll have room to relax after a day of shopping or spectating. Enjoy free breakfast daily and join us Monday – Thursday for a complimentary evening social.

name: Hilton Phoenix Chandler
description: Off Route 101, our hotel is less than a mile from Chandler Museum and Chandler Fashion Center — the second largest mall in Arizona. Our free local shuttle covers a five-mile radius, encompassing the historic downtown area. Take some time to relax in our sauna, and enjoy our outdoor pool, whirlpool, and fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Phoenix Chandler-Fashion Center AZ
description: We're off Loop 202, about two miles from Chandler Fashion Center, with more than 180 stores, over 20 restaurants and entertainment, too. We offer a free shuttle there and to businesses within five miles of our hotel. Unwind at Ocotillo Golf Course, or the Wild Horse Pass Motorsports Park and Casino, all 10 minutes away. Each day, our hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Phoenix Chandler
description: It's not a mirage – this really is a desert oasis. After a long day of hiking, golf, or retail therapy, relax in your room (or poolside) with free WiFi. Cooking aficianados will love the kitchen included in every suite, and our 24-hour market has late-night cravings covered. Breakfast is always free, and pets are welcome.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Phoenix Tempe, University Research Park
description: Located off Route 101, we are within four miles of Discovery Business Campus, Kiwanis Park, and Chandler Fashion Center, with a free, five-mile radius shuttle for nearby transportation. Arizona State University is a 10-minute drive, and Mill Avenue District is nine miles away. Enjoy our all-day dining, pool, hot tub, and evening room service.

name: Hampton Inn Phoenix/Chandler
description: Boredom is not an option. We have Firebird International Raceway just a mile away, Chandler festivals, such as the spring Ostrich Fest, and Chandler Fashion Center nearby. Start the day with free breakfast and enjoy free WiFi. Business travelers are ideally placed for BE Aerospace, Honeywell, Intel and all that Phoenix’s ‘Silicon Desert’ has to offer.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Phoenix/Chandler
description: Centrally located, we’re 15 minutes from Phoenix Sky Harbor Airport, close to shopping and dining at Phoenix Premium Outlets and Arizona Mills. Golf more your thing? Three courses are just a swing away. Suites come with a full kitchen, living area, free WiFi, and HDTVs. Start the day with a free hot breakfast and join us Monday through Thursday for our complimentary evening social.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Phoenix Chandler
description: We’re off I-10 less than 10 minutes from Verizon and Intel's Chandler campus. Chandler Fashion Center, Phoenix Premium Outlets and Whirlwind Golf Club are within five miles — use our free shuttle. Downtown Phoenix and Sky Harbor Airport are just 17 miles away. Every stay starts with our signature warm chocolate chip cookie, and we have a heated outdoor pool.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Flagstaff
description: Our suites are next to North Arizona University and within a mile of historic downtown Flagstaff. The South Rim of the Grand Canyon is less than two hours away. We have a seasonal outdoor pool, whirlpool, and fitness center. Enjoy daily free made-to-order breakfast and our evening reception.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Flagstaff
description: Our hotel is off Historic Route 66, surrounded by local shops and bites, less than a mile from Riordan Mansion State Historic Park. We're five minutes from Northern Arizona University, and within an hour and a half of Grand Canyon National Park. Enjoy our seasonal outdoor pool, whirlpool spa with picture-window views, and 24-hour fitness center.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Flagstaff
description: We're off I-17 and I-40, less than a mile from Northern Arizona University, two miles from downtown Flagstaff, and well placed for exploring the Grand Canyon. Enjoy breakfast, dinner, and drinks in our Forest Meadows Street Café. Make use of our indoor pool, whirlpool, fitness center, 24-hour business center, and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Flagstaff
description: Find us off I-40 and I-17, one mile from Northern Arizona University and Riordan Mansion State Historic Park, and two miles from downtown dining and galleries. Visit Lowell Observatory – where Pluto was discovered – or check out Walnut Canyon National Monument, both within 20 minutes. Start your day with our hot breakfast – it's free, just like our WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Flagstaff East
description: Right off I-40, we're 10 minutes from Flagstaff Pulliam Airport. Sedona is 45 minutes south, and Grand Canyon National Park and the Petrified Forest are less than two hours away. We've got views of the San Francisco Peak Mountains, plus a fitness center and indoor pool. WiFi and hot breakfast are included with your stay.

name: Hampton Inn Sedona
description: We’re in Sedona, home to Native American ruins and Tlaquepaque Arts & Shopping Village. Broken Arrow Trail and Cathedral Rock are within six miles. Red Rock State Park is 15 minutes away for scenic biking, hiking, swimming, and unique adventures. Devil’s Bridge and Verde Canyon Railroad are within 30 minutes. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Tru by Hilton Gilbert
description: Convenience is easy when you're adjacent to San Tan Village shops and restaurants, seven miles from Mesa's airport, and a 10-minute drive to downtown Gilbert. Start your day off with free build-your-own breakfast before visiting Cactus Yards (replicas of pro baseball fields) or the Hale Centre Theatre. WiFi is on the house during your stay.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Phoenix - Gilbert
description: Our hotel by the Santan Freeway is across the street from Topgolf and Main Event Gilbert. We're half a mile from shopping, dining, and entertainment at SanTan Village. Our free shuttle runs to Phoenix-Mesa Gateway Airport five miles away. Enjoy our two pools, fitness center, bar, and restaurant.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Gilbert
description: We’ve got the Mercy Gilbert Medical Center on our doorstep, golf courses less than 20 minutes away, and a free shuttle to the Heritage District and SanTan Village. Relax in a spacious suite complete with full kitchen, living area, and free WiFi. Our combined fitness and laundry facilities make us a great choice for extended stays. We also provide a free hot breakfast, served daily.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Phoenix/Gilbert
description: We're next to Loop 202, about a mile from Mercy Gilbert Medical Center and 30 miles from downtown Phoenix. Visit Arizona State University Polytechnic Campus five miles away, or take our free shuttle to SanTan Village for shopping and dining. It's a seven-mile drive to Phoenix-Mesa Gateway Airport. Enjoy our heated outdoor pool and whirlpool, free hot breakfast, and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Phoenix East Mesa
description: Off US 60, we're 15 minutes from Phoenix-Mesa Gateway Airport and 25 minutes from Sky Harbor Airport. Banner Gateway Medical Center is across the street, and Sloan Park spring training facilities and downtown Mesa are 15 minutes away. Perks include our free five-mile shuttle, outdoor pool, fitness center, and free WiFi and hot breakfast.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Phoenix Mesa
description: Find us off US 60, 12 miles from Sky Harbor Airport and 10 minutes from Arizona State University. There's a golf course next door, and we're three miles from baseball spring training facilities. Enjoy a warm chocolate chip cookie at check-in. We have 262 rooms and suites, 20,495 sq. ft. of event space, on-site dining, and more.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Phoenix Tempe
description: Our suites are less than 10 minutes from Arizona State University and Phoenix Sky Harbor Airport. Tempe Marketplace, OdySea Aquarium, and Chase field are within 15 minutes. Enjoy our free made-to-order breakfast and complimentary evening reception.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Phoenix/Tempe ASU Area
description: Arizona State University and Casino Arizona are within three miles from our hotel next to Tempe Marketplace. Chicago Cubs spring training at Sloan Park is five minutes away. The Phoenix Zoo and Sky Harbor International Airport are both within six miles. Breakfast, lunch, and dinner are served in our Great American Grill. Enjoy our outdoor pool.

name: Homewood Suites By Hilton Phoenix Tempe ASU Area
description: Home is near 101 Freeway, just 15 minutes from Phoenix Sky Harbor International Airport – hop on our free airport shuttle. We're five minutes from Arizona State University and one mile from Sloan Park, where you can catch the Chicago Cubs' spring training. Enjoy an in-suite kitchen and a complimentary evening social, Tuesday – Thursday. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Canopy by Hilton Tempe Downtown
description: Our new hotel is steps from Mill Avenue dining, shops, and nightlife – grab a complimentary Canopy Bike and check out the neighborhood. The light rail and Loop 202 are close by for exploring Phoenix, and spring training is 10 minutes away. Head for our rooftop to cool off in the pool or sip cocktails in the lounge. Rest comes easy on our exclusive Canopy beds.

name: Hampton Inn Kayenta
description: We're in the heart of the Navajo Nation, off Highway 160. You'll find the Navajo Code Talkers Exhibition in the Burger King next door and even more dining in the neighborhood. Or try our Reuben Heflin Restaurant. Free hot breakfast is fuel for Monument Valley tours, half an hour away. Enjoy free WiFi and our outdoor pool.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Kingman
description: Located off I-40, we’re one mile from the iconic Route 66 and a day trip away from the Grand Canyon, Hoover Dam, and Lake Havasu. Your stay includes a spacious suite with kitchen, free WiFi, and business services. Start the day with a free hot breakfast and end it with a refreshing dip in the outdoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Kingman
description: We're just off I-40, four miles from the historic center of Kingman, where you'll find tour guides offering day trips to the Grand Canyon and Hoover Dam. Enjoy our indoor pool with whirlpool, fitness center, and 24-hour convenience store. WiFi and hot breakfast are free.

name: Hampton Inn Lake Havasu City
description: We're right along US-95, a mile from beach relaxation and watersports at Lake Havasu State Park. Hit the greens at Lake Havasu Golf Club four miles away, and discover plenty of restaurants and bars within a mile of the hotel. Kick back in our hotel bar or take a swim in our outdoor pool. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Parker
description: We're around the corner from highway 95, two miles from games of luck and skill at BlueWater Casino. It's a five-minute drive to Parker Indian Health Center or La Paz Regional Hospital. You'll find access to the Colorado River close to the Colorado River Bridge a mile away. Relax in our outdoor pool and whirlpool. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Phoenix Tempe
description: Find us off Loop 202, five minutes from downtown Tempe. Local dining and nightlife are within three miles of the hotel, along with Arizona State University and Old Town Scottsdale. Phoenix Sky Harbor International Airport can be reached in under 10 minutes. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our outdoor pool.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Phoenix Tempe
description: We're off I-10, two miles from Arizona State University, Tempe campus. Catch the LA Angels during spring training at Diablo Stadium, and explore Mill Avenue shopping district, both within 10 minutes. Every stay starts with a warm DoubleTree cookie, and we have a 24-hour airport shuttle, heated outdoor pool, and 24-hour fitness center.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Scottsdale Old Town
description: We're one mile from Scottsdale Fashion Square and spring training at Scottsdale Stadium, and 10 minutes from the Desert Botanical Garden. Visit the Phoenix Zoo or try your luck at Casino Arizona, both within six miles. Phoenix Sky Harbor Airport can be reached in just 20 minutes. Enjoy all-day dining, evening room service, and our 24-hour convenience shop.

name: Canopy by Hilton Scottsdale Old Town
description: Spring training and dozens of premier shops, dining, and nightlife options – they're all within a 15-minute walk. Our restaurant's rooted in Southwest cuisine, and our rooftop pool is a sunny perch for viewing Camelback Mountain. Join us for complimentary evening tastings of regional beer, wine, and spirits. Rest comes easy on Canopy-exclusive beds.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Tempe/Phoenix Airport
description: Just off I-10 in Tempe, we're four miles from Phoenix Sky Harbor International Airport – catch our free shuttle. State Farm and DriveTime offices are five minutes away. Stroll the Mill Avenue District, shop at Arizona Mills, or visit Arizona State University, all within 10 minutes. Spring training at Tempe Diablo Stadium is 2 miles' drive. Breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Scottsdale Resort
description: Our resort is less than a mile from Old Town Scottsdale, home to the Arts District, Entertainment District, the waterfront, and Fashion Square. We’re five minutes from Scottsdale Stadium and downtown Phoenix is 12 miles away. Enjoy our restaurant, two heated outdoor pools, and fitness center. Free made-to-order breakfast and our complimentary evening reception are served daily.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Page - Lake Powell
description: Find us off Highway 89 – our parking lot has room for boats, buses, and RVs. We’re near outdoor attractions, like Horseshoe Bend and Lake Powell, both three miles away. Antelope Canyon is seven miles away. Take a dip in our indoor pool. Enjoy the view of the Vermillion Cliffs from the patio or room balcony. Hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Phoenix Airport
description: Our suites are a four-mile ride from Phoenix Sky Harbor International Airport via free shuttle. The Celebrity Theater and Phoenix Art Museum are 10 minutes away. As one of the original Embassy Suites, we're proud to serve a free cooked-to-order breakfast and evening reception daily. Enjoy our outdoor pool, whirlpool, and 24-hour fitness center.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Phoenix Airport North
description: Off Loop 202 and Route 143, we're two miles from Phoenix Sky Harbor Airport via free shuttle. Phoenix Zoo is three miles away, and we're six miles from Arizona State University. The light rail station, with direct links to downtown Phoenix, is in walking distance. We also have a free local shuttle, restaurant, and outdoor pool.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Phoenix Airport
description: Off I-10, we're four miles from Phoenix Sky Harbor Airport, downtown Tempe, and Arizona State University. Across the street is a 24-hour waffle house, and we've got a restaurant, evening room service, and 24-hour snack shop. Other perks include our free five-mile shuttle, outdoor pool, and fitness center.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Phoenix-Biltmore
description: Home is 15 minutes from downtown Phoenix. For local color, jump aboard our free shuttle, covering a five-mile radius. Explore neighborhood nature at Phoenix Mountains Preserve and Piestewa Peak Park, or practice your swing at numerous golf courses. Enjoy our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday, and WiFi and breakfast on us. Get creative in your in-suite kitchen.

name: Hampton Inn Phoenix-Biltmore
description: We're off AZ 51, a half-mile from the Biltmore Fashion Park, home to shopping, bars, and dining. Hiking at Camelback Mountain is five miles away, and Downtown Phoenix and Phoenix Zoo are 15 minutes from our door. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast and WiFi on us. We have an outdoor pool and fitness center.

name: DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Phoenix
description: Our hotel is five minutes from Phoenix Sky Harbor International Airport via free 24-hour shuttle. We're less than a mile from the local light rail station, linking to downtown Phoenix, and Desert Botanical Garden is 10 minutes away. Enjoy our fitness center, resort-style outdoor pool, and a warm DoubleTree cookie on arrival.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Phoenix Airport North
description: Off Loop 202 and Highway 143, we're five minutes from Sky Harbor Airport via our free shuttle. Arizona State University is an easy five miles away, and it's 15 minutes to downtown Phoenix for restaurants, museums, pro sports, and nightlife. Unwind in our outdoor pool or on the patio. Every day, hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Phoenix-Airport North
description: We’re off Route 143, three miles from Phoenix Sky Harbor Airport – our free 24-hour shuttle will take you there. The Phoenix Zoo, Desert Botanical Gardens, and Mills Avenue shopping in downtown Tempe are within 10 minutes. Arizona State University campus and the Sun Devil Football Stadium are six miles away. Enjoy daily hot breakfast and WiFi on us.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Phoenix Biltmore
description: Find us minutes from Arizona Biltmore Golf Club, and the Biltmore Fashion Park. We’re also just a 10-minute drive from Arizona Sky Harbor International Airport. Enjoy our inviting outdoor pool and seating area, and join us for our complimentary evening reception. A free cooked-to-order breakfast is served daily.

name: Hilton Phoenix Airport
description: We’re off SR-143, less than 10 minutes from Phoenix Sky Harbor International Airport via our free 24-hour shuttle. Phoenix Zoo is a five mile drive and we’re 15 minutes from downtown Phoenix. Enjoy our outdoor pool, fitness center, and free parking. We have Hertz car rental, two on-site restaurants, and a grab-and-go café available.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Phoenix Airport South
description: We're just off I-10, three miles from Phoenix Sky Harbor International Airport, and a mile from Tempe Diablo Stadium. Big Surf water park, Phoenix Zoo, and Desert Botanical Garden are all within a 15-minute drive and Celebrity Theater is six miles from us. We have an outdoor pool, convenience store, and serve a free hot breakfast daily.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Phoenix Airport South
description: Enjoy views of Camelback Mountain just five minutes from Phoenix Sky Harbor Airport. Our suites are walking distance from Cotton Center Business Park and Desert Willow Conference Center – we'll take you there in our free shuttle. Unwind with free WiFi and our evening social, Monday – Wednesday. Breakfast’s on us, or do it your way in your fully equipped kitchen.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Prescott Downtown
description: Located in historic downtown Prescott, our hotel is within walking distance to tons of local restaurants, unique shops, and downtown events. Stroll along the nearby hiking trails or cool off at Watson Lake, just 10 minutes away. Prescott Regional Airport is less than 10 miles away. Our hotel features 5,400 sq. ft. of event space, an on-site restaurant, and pool.
