description: We’re off State Route 4 in Pittsburg. Delta View Golf Course is 10 minutes away. Black Diamond Mines Regional Preserve is five miles’ drive. California Grand Casino, and the slides of Waterworld Parkway, are less than 20 minutes from our door. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Livermore
description: Tucked away in California wine country, our pet-friendly suites are your launch pad into San Francisco. We're 15 minutes from Wente and Concannon Vineyards and Shadow Cliffs Regional Recreation Area is down the road. Grab free breakfast before practicing your swing at Poppy Ridge and Dublin Ranch Golf Courses – and if you’re here on business, we’re close to Tri Valley corporate offices.

name: Hampton Inn Livermore
description: We're just off I-580, less than 10 minutes from San Francisco Premium Outlets, the Las Positas Golf Course, and Lawrence Livermore National Laboratory, the "smartest square mile on Earth." Taste the best of California wine country at Concannon and Wente vineyards, both within a 15-minute drive. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Livermore
description: Our hotel is just off I-580, within 15 minutes of the San Francisco Premium Outlets and Livermore's wineries. The municipal airport is a mile away, and it's a 40-minute drive to San Francisco. Enjoy our heated indoor pool and fitness center. Breakfast, dinner, and room service are available from our Garden Grille & Bar. Free perks include parking and WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Tracy
description: Just steps from the West Valley Mall, Cinemark Movie Theater and close to Grand Theatre Center for the Arts – if you can’t find the right show here, it ain’t worth seeing. Take advantage of free WiFi and breakfast: the perfect start for day trips to San Jose, Sacramento and San Francisco. Dell’Osso Family Farm, with its pumpkin maze and mud run, is ideal for kids.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Livermore
description: We're off I-580, steps from the San Francisco Premium Outlets and five minutes from a golf course. Kaiser Permanente offices are three miles away, and Sandia National Laboratories are 20 minutes from our door. Start the day with free hot breakfast and join us for our complimentary evening social on weeknights. An indoor pool and 24-hour fitness center await.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Tracy
description: Just off Highway 205, our new Home2 is just five minutes from West Valley Mall, Legacy Fields Sports Complex, several restaurants and Stars Casino. We have meeting space for up to 60 guests plus a spacious outdoor patio with BBQ grills and heated pool.

name: Hilton Stockton
description: Find us off I-5, blocks from the Calaveras River, local shopping, and dining. The University of the Pacific campus is five minutes away, and we're within five miles of the Haggin Museum and central Stockton, home to Stockton Arena conventions. Enjoy free access to our fitness center and outdoor pool with whirlpool.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Pleasanton at the Club
description: Our hotel is by the I-580/I-680 intersection, directly connected to Bay Club Pleasanton fitness center. Stoneridge Shopping Center is across the highway. We offer a free shuttle to the local BART and ACE stations for easy access to San Francisco and Oakland. Enjoy our outdoor pool and whirlpool.

name: Hampton Inn San Francisco-Daly City
description: We're next to I-280 with free parking, two miles south of San Francisco State University and Stonestown Galleria and five miles from the city zoo. It's a scenic five-mile drive to Cow Palace Arena & Event Center. Head two miles to hiking and Pacific views at Thornton State Beach, or seven miles to downtown San Francisco. Enjoy free hot breakfast and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Buellton/Santa Ynez Valley
description: We’re off Highway 101 in Buellton in the Santa Ynez Valley, within a mile of many restaurants and bars. The Danish village of Solvang is four miles from the hotel. Buscador Winery & Tasting Room is four minutes away, and Vandenberg Air Force Base is a 24-mile drive. Enjoy free daily hot breakfast, WiFi, and our pool.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Santa Barbara/Goleta
description: We’re in Goleta, a short walk from shopping and dining. The University of California Santa Barbara and Santa Barbara Airport are within three miles. Goleta Beach Park is 10 minutes away and we’re 11 miles from downtown Santa Barbara. We have an on-site restaurant, fitness center, and outdoor pool. Enjoy mountain views from our rooftop bar and WiFi on us.

name: Hampton Inn Santa Barbara/Goleta
description: Located between Highways 101 and 217 in Goleta, we’re eight miles from downtown Santa Barbara, with a range of restaurants within walking distance. The University of California Santa Barbara, Santa Barbara Airport, and Goleta Beach Park are five minutes away. Enjoy free daily hot breakfast, WiFi, and our fitness center.

name: Hilton Santa Barbara Beachfront Resort
description: We’re across the street from East Beach, one mile from the Funk Zone district – home to art galleries and wine trails. Santa Barbara Downtown is 10 minutes away and our concierge team can arrange activities such as kayaking, coastal cruises, and golfing. Enjoy our tree-lined pool and tennis courts. We have a spa and bike rental is available.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Los Angeles - Norwalk
description: Our hotel is off I-5, within five minutes of Paddison Square mall and the local AMC Theater. We're within 12 miles of Disneyland Park and Knott's Berry Farm, with Los Angeles International Airport half an hour away. Perks include free parking, a 24-hour fitness center, outdoor pool, and a warm DoubleTree cookie upon arrival.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Seal Beach
description: We're less than a mile from I-405, two miles from Seal Beach, Alamitos Bay, and the Pacific Ocean. Rockwell International and Boeing Co. are less than a mile from our hotel. Long Beach is 20 minutes west, and Disneyland® is 20 minutes east. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us, and we have an outdoor pool and whirlpool.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles Burbank Airport
description: We're right off I-5, across the street from Woodbury University. Bob Hope Airport is five minutes away via our free shuttle, which also covers downtown Burbank and the Empire Center. Our hotel is 15 minutes from Universal City, home to Universal Studios and CityWalk. Enjoy our free hot breakfast, free WiFi, fitness center, and 24-hour Suite Shop.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Los Angeles Glendale
description: Our hotel in Glendale is three miles from Griffith Park, home to the LA Zoo, The Greek Theater, and Griffith Observatory. Universal Studios and the Hollywood Bowl are less than 15 minutes away. Enjoy our nightly evening reception and a free cooked-to-order breakfast, as well as the 24-hour fitness center, pool, and whirlpool.

name: Hilton Los Angeles North/Glendale & Executive Meeting Ctr
description: With views of the Los Angeles’ mountain range and city from our lounge, our hotel is within 10 miles of downtown LA, Pasadena, and Burbank. We’re within a 15-minute walk of Griffith Park and Observatory, Universal Studios Hollywood, and the Hollywood Bowl. Our hotel is home to an outdoor pool and fitness center with a sauna.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles - Glendale
description: We're across the street from hundreds of retail stores at the Glendale Galleria and premium shopping and dining at The Americana at Brand. Many corporate offices are within a mile, including Nestle, Wells Fargo, and Avery Dennison. Enjoy panoramic views of LA from our 2nd story outdoor pool, and relax at our evening Manager's Reception. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Camarillo
description: Whether you’re visiting Camarillo Premium Outlets, Ventura County beaches, or Malibu, this is your ideal base. We’re just over two miles from Camarillo Airport and close to Point Mugu Naval Base, making it easy to visit stationed family members. Enjoy free WiFi and daily hot breakfast.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Oxnard/Camarillo
description: We're off Highway 101, within 15 minutes of both Oxnard and Camarillo city centers and airports. Local shopping and dining are in a mile, and we're 10 miles from Point Mugu Naval Air Station, Channel Islands Harbor, and Oxnard State Beach. Santa Barbara is a 40-minute drive from us. Enjoy our fitness center and heated outdoor pool.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Oxnard/Camarillo
description: Enjoy sandy days at Mandalay and McGrath state beaches, and day trips to Santa Barbara and Channel Islands National Park. Grab free breakfast before teeing off at Spanish Hills Country Club. We’re minutes from Camarillo dining choices, or do dinner your way with your in-suite kitchen. Kick back at our free evening social, Monday – Thursday, and WiFi on us.

name: Hampton Inn Channel Islands Harbor
description: Take in marina views from our harborside hotel. We're ideal for trips to Santa Rosa Island and Channel Islands National Park, with Hollywood Beach five minutes from the door. Ventura County and Port Hueneme naval bases are three miles away. Enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi, and relax by our heated outdoor pool and fire pit.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Valencia Six Flags
description: Six Flags Magic Mountain and Hurricane Harbor are moments from our hotel on I-5. You'll find shopping and dining 10 minutes east at Westfield Valencia Town Center. College of the Canyons, California Institute of the Arts, and Valencia Gateway industrial park are within three miles. Enjoy breakfast and dinner in our Garden Grille & Bar.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Santa Clarita
description: We're off I-5, three miles from Six Flags Magic Mountain and Hurricane Harbor Los Angeles. Hockey tournaments and public skates at Ice Station Valencia are five minutes away. Fill up on free breakfast, and prep what you're craving in your suite with full kitchen. We offer an indoor pool, 24-hour fitness center, and sunlit meeting room. Pets are welcome, too.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Campbell - Pruneyard Plaza
description: Nestled in Silicon Valley, our hotel is next to Pruneyard Shopping Center, 10 minutes from Santana Row nightlife. Explore the Municipal Rose Garden or check out downtown San Jose, both less than five miles from the door. Each stay begins with a complimentary DoubleTree cookie, and perks include our outdoor pool and 24-hour fitness center.

name: Hilton San Jose
description: We’re in downtown San Jose, directly connected to the San Jose McEnery Convention Center. Light rail links and The Tech Interactive are a short walk from our door. San Jose International Airport is four miles away and we’re 13 minutes from Levi’s Stadium, home to the San Francisco 49ers. We have an Enterprise Rent-a-car, outdoor pool, and a fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites San Jose
description: We're just off Route 87, close to I-280, and three miles from downtown's San Jose McEnery Convention Center. San Jose International Airport is 12 minutes' drive from our door. Westfield Oakridge and Santana Row offer shopping less than eight miles away.  We have a fitness center and outdoor pool. Enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Cupertino
description: Our rooms are in the heart of Silicon Valley, five minutes from Apple Park and campus and the Steve Jobs Theater. Explore neighborhood shopping and dining, a short walk from the door. We're within 10 miles of downtown San Jose, Rancho San Antonio Preserve, and San Jose International Airport. Enjoy our fitness center and outdoor pool.

name: Juniper Hotel Cupertino, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: Our tech-inspired hotel is two miles from Apple Park with views of the Santa Cruz Mountains. Rooftop beehives celebrate Silicon Valley history and BeeKind bath amenities support honeybee research at UC - Davis. We're less than 20 minutes from Levi's Stadium and San Jose Airport, with a free shuttle to destinations within five miles. Our fitness center features Peloton bikes with on-demand classes.

name: Hilton Garden Inn San Jose Airport
description: We are off I-880 less than a mile from the San Jose International Airport. Enjoy our on-site restaurant and bar with local beer, wine and small plates. Silicon Valley, The Intel Museum, and Levi’s Stadium are within five miles. Digital Key access and free WiFi.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel San Jose
description: Between Highway 101 and Route 87, our hotel is less than five minutes from San Jose International Airport via free shuttle. Discover downtown San Jose delights, the Municipal Rose Garden, and Santana Row shopping and dining — all within five miles. Enjoy a warm DoubleTree cookie on arrival and access to our fitness center and outdoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites San Jose Airport
description: You’ll be one mile from San Jose Airport. Less travel means more time to take the kids to California’s Great America amusement park, catch football at Levi’s Stadium or do business in Silicon Valley, all ten minutes away. Downtown San Jose’s nightlife and dining are less than five miles from your door. Wake up to free hot breakfast, and enjoy WiFi on us.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton San Jose Airport-Silicon Valley
description: We’re off Highway 101, three miles from San Jose International Airport, with a free, five-mile shuttle for local transportation. California’s Great America and Levi’s Stadium can be reached in 10 minutes, and the SAP Center and Children’s Discovery Museum are only five miles away. Enjoy our basketball court, pool, free hot breakfast, and in-suite kitchen.

name: Hayes Mansion San Jose, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: We are located on the edge of the Edenvale Gardens Regional Park in San Jose, CA. The Ranch and Boulder Ridge Golf Clubs as well as Silver Creek Valley Country Club are within a five-mile radius. Our guests can enjoy having over 30,000 sq. ft. of event space to utilize including unique outdoor meeting areas.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Santa Clara Silicon Valley
description: Our Silicon Valley suites are less than two miles from Levi's Stadium. We're just off the Bayshore Freeway, 10 minutes from the Santa Clara Convention Center and California’s Great America. Palo Alto and downtown San Jose are a 15-minute drive away. Join us for free made-to-order breakfast and our complimentary evening reception.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Sunnyvale
description: We're less than three miles from Silicon Valley. Tech giants such as Apple, Google, Facebook, and Linkedin are within a 20-minute drive. Check out Stanford University, Levi's Stadium, and California's Great America theme park, all less than 10 miles from us. Perks include our restaurant and bar, a fitness center, and 3,000 sq. ft. of meeting space.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Mountain View
description: We’re off Route 85 in Mountain View, within four miles of Yahoo, Microsoft Corp., and Google Building GWC1. Facebook is a 20-minute drive, and Mountain View Station - Caltrain Platform is five minutes away. Stanford University and Palo Alto are six miles’ drive. Enjoy free daily hot breakfast, WiFi, and our fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn Encinitas Cardiff Beach Area
description: We're off I-5, within three miles of San Diego Botanic Garden, Fletcher Cove Park, and Moonlight Beach State Park. Del Mar Fairgrounds and Cardiff Beach can be reached in 10 minutes, and LEGOLAND California is only 10 miles from our door. Enjoy our outdoor pool, whirlpool, and 24-hour fitness center. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Hilton San Diego/Del Mar
description: Resting off I-5, our hotel is within a half-mile of Del Mar Racing, Del Mar Fairgrounds, and local shopping and dining. Discover oceanfront fun at Solana and Del Mar North beaches, both less than two miles away, and get around with our free shuttle covering five miles. Perks include our resort-style outdoor pool and double whirlpools.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel San Diego - Del Mar
description: Find us next to the Route 56/I-5 intersection, at the center of San Diego's Sorrento Valley high-tech corridor. We're within five miles of Torrey Pines State Beach and Del Mar Racing, with downtown San Diego 20 minutes away. Hop aboard our free shuttle, covering six miles, and enjoy a warm DoubleTree welcome cookie and oasis-style pool.

name: Hampton Inn San Diego/Del Mar
description: We're just off I-5, 17 miles from downtown San Diego. It's a two-mile drive over to Torrey Pines State Beach, and five miles south to University of California San Diego. Many large company offices are within five minutes, including FICO, XIFIN, and AMN Healthcare. Del Mar Racetrack is five miles away. Start your day with free hot breakfast, and enjoy WiFi on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Carlsbad
description: Home comforts are standard in our apartment-style suites, where pets are always welcome and WiFi is always free. Expect to cook in fully fitted kitchens and work out in the fitness center. LEGOLAND and Carlsbad beach are nearby, as is Vista Business Park.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Carlsbad-North San Diego County
description: We're just across the road from McClellan-Palomar Airport, seven minutes from LEGOLAND®, and just over 30 minutes from SeaWorld®. Join our complimentary evening social, Monday to Thursday and unwind in your suite with fully-equipped kitchen. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Carlsbad-North San Diego County
description: We're close to I-5, and less than a mile from McClellan-Palomar Airport. Check out acres of colors at the Flower Fields, or shop the Carlsbad Premium Outlets, both three miles away. Carlsbad State Beach and LEGOLAND are within 15 minutes. Enjoy our fitness center and outdoor pool. Every stay with us includes free WiFi and free hot breakfast.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Carlsbad Beach
description: We’re off Highway 101, overlooking South Carlsbad Beach and four miles from shopping, dining, and entertainment at Carlsbad Village. LEGOLAND California and Carlsbad Premium Outlets are within 10 minutes. San Diego Zoo, SeaWorld, and Downtown San Diego are a half-hour away. Enjoy all-day dining at our restaurant and bar, our outdoor pool, and free WiFi.

name: Hilton Grand Vacations at MarBrisa
description: Adjacent to The Crossings at Carlsbad golf course, our 43-acre hotel is steps from LEGOLAND® – beat the queues with our private entrance. North Ponto Beach and Carlsbad Premium Outlets are under three miles away. Hop on our free shuttle to explore the resort, and enjoy access to three outdoor pools, four hot tubs, and a relaxing fire pit area.

name: Hilton Garden Inn San Diego Del Mar
description: We're off I-5, about a mile from the junction with I-805. Del Mar, Black’s Beach, Torrey Pines State Reserve, La Jolla Playhouse, and UCSD are all within five miles. La Jolla Cove and tide pools are less than 30 minutes away. Our NY Garden Deli and Cafe is open for lunch, and our Bistro 39 restaurant serves breakfast and dinner.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton San Diego-Del Mar
description: We're just off I-5, with easy access to Del Mar's beaches, shops, restaurants, and famous racetrack only 4.8 miles north. Downtown San Diego and the world-renowned zoo are just 16 miles south. During your stay with us, enjoy daily free hot breakfast and a full kitchen to cook your own meals. Relax at our complimentary evening socials, Monday – Thursday.

name: Hampton Inn San Marcos
description: Located off Route 78 in San Marcos, we’re three minutes from California State University San Marcos, and Kaiser Permanente San Marcos Medical Offices. A range of restaurants are within a half mile of the hotel. California Center for the Arts is 12 minutes’ drive. Enjoy free daily hot breakfast, WiFi, and our pool.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Carson
description: Our hotel is 12 miles south of Los Angeles International Airport, just off I-405. We're adjacent to the Carson Civic Center, and two miles from Dignity Health Sports Park – formerly the StubHub Center. Disneyland Park is a 25-minute drive away. Our outdoor area includes a pool with cabanas and firepits. We also have a restaurant and sports bar.

name: Hampton Inn Los Angeles/Carson/Torrance
description: Find us off I-91, just 20 minutes from Los Angeles International Airport and Long Beach Airport. We're a mile from California State University Dominguez Hills, and Hermosa and Manhattan beaches are 20 minutes away. Enjoy our fitness center and outdoor pool. WiFi, parking, and hot breakfast are free.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Torrance - South Bay
description: Off Route 107, our hotel is around the corner from shopping and dining at Del Amo Fashion Center. Redondo Beach is three miles away, and LAX is 10 miles from our door. We have free parking, an outdoor pool deck complete with a fire pit, and a fitness center. Every stay begins with a warm DoubleTree cookie.

name: Hilton Long Beach
description: Our hotel is across the river from I-710, under a mile from Long Beach Convention & Entertainment Center and the Aquarium of the Pacific. Dozens of unique eateries in the downtown area are within three blocks. The California sunshine and cool Pacific breeze meet at our elevated outdoor pool and whirlpool.

name: Hotel Maya - a DoubleTree by Hilton
description: Our waterfront property is set within 14 acres of tropical gardens, and is a five-minute walk from water taxi terminals and the Queensway Bridge linking us to downtown Long Beach. Aquarium of the Pacific is five minutes away, and Long Beach Convention Center and the Port of Long Beach are within three miles. Enjoy our open-air patio restaurant, and the pool deck with fire pits and cabanas.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Los Angeles Redondo Beach
description: Whether you're Mars-bound on SpaceX or need more space during your travels, our suites have what you need. We're right off the 405, five miles from LAX and 15 minutes from the Los Angeles Air Force Base. Unwind after a day at Redondo Beach at our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday. Enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Los Angeles/Redondo Beach
description: Off I-405, we’re five miles from LAX airport and within four miles of Redondo, Manhattan, and Hermosa beaches. The Green Line metro station to the airport is steps away, and the Northrop Grumman campus is a half-mile from our hotel. Our hotel has electric vehicle chargers, an outdoor pool, fitness center, restaurant, and free WiFi.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Long Beach Airport
description: We’re less than a mile from LGB Airport and an 18-minute drive from central Long Beach. Head to the waterfront for Aquarium of the Pacific, Long Beach Museum of Art, and fine dining on board the Queen Mary. Closer to home, browse the shops at Los Cerritos Center. Hot breakfast and WiFi are free, as is our Monday – Thursday evening social.

name: Hampton Inn Long Beach Airport
description: Getting to Disneyland®, the convention center, and city attractions is easy from our location. Make the most of our outdoor grilling area and free WiFi – breakfast is on us, too. Double-check your dates: you might be able to catch the Long Beach Marathon, Pride Festival, or the Toyota Grand Prix. Our free airport shuttle also serves the local area.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Hermosa Beach
description: Find us off Pacific Coast Highway, less than a mile from Hermosa Beach pier. Each morning begins with free hot breakfast, an ideal start for days by the pier or exploring the coast along the Strand. You'll have access to our fitness center and fourth-floor sundeck, and WiFi's on us. We're 10 minutes from Los Angeles International Airport.

name: Hampton Inn Los Angeles Int'l Airport/Hawthorne
description: We're off I-105, near I-405, five miles from Los Angeles International Airport by free shuttle. You'll find restaurants in the neighborhood, while our 24-hour Suite Shop offers a variety of snacks. Los Angeles is 15 miles from the door. Wake up to free hot breakfast, and enjoy our free WiFi, fitness center, and heated indoor pool.

name: Hilton Garden Inn LAX/El Segundo
description: We’re just 10 minutes from Manhattan Beach, two miles from LAX, and the Mariposa Metro station is right outside. The Garden Grille & Bar serves breakfast and dinner, and drinks are available at the Pavilion Lounge. Enjoy our outdoor heated pool and whirlpool. WiFi is included in your stay as well as our shuttle service (based on availability).

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel LAX - El Segundo
description: Off the Pacific Coast Highway, our hotel is two miles from Los Angeles International Airport via free 24-hour shuttle. We're surrounded by Fortune 500 companies, such as Chevron and Mattel, and two blocks from Mariposa rail station, linking to downtown LA. Enjoy a 24-hour fitness center, outdoor pool, and a warm DoubleTree cookie on arrival.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites LAX El Segundo
description: We’re located off I-105, a mile from LAX, and our 24-hour airport shuttle will take you both ways. Manhattan Beach is under four miles away and downtown Los Angeles, Santa Monica Pier, and The Getty Center can all be reached in around 20 minutes. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and access to our indoor pool. Our on-site Flight Deck Lounge serves small plates and drinks daily.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Los Angeles International Airport South
description: Our suites are less than two miles from Los Angeles International Airport, and we offer a free shuttle both ways. We have an indoor pool and Manhattan Beach is a 10-minute drive away. A free made-to-order breakfast and complimentary evening reception are available daily.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Los Angeles International Airport North
description: Find us a half-mile from Los Angeles International Airport via free 24-hour shuttle. We’re beside car rental drop-off points, and within a mile of I-405 and I-105. Enjoy perks such as our indoor pool, fitness center, and a 24-hour convenience market. Your stay includes free made-to-order breakfast and our complimentary evening reception.

name: H Hotel Los Angeles, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: Unwind in contemporary style at H Hotel, less than five minutes from LAX via our free scheduled 24-hour shuttle. Linked with our sister Homewood Suites property, we're 15 minutes from Venice Beach and Manhattan Beach Pier. Our rooftop deck affords views of the planes and the Pacific Ocean, and we have a 24-hour fitness center and outdoor pool.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Los Angeles International Airport
description: We're only five minutes from the terminals at LAX, so you can spend more time relaxing and less time in "airline travel mode." Whether you're in LA on business or just visiting, start off each day with a free hot breakfast and kick back at our complimentary evening socials Monday – Thursday. Use our grocery shopping service to stock up your full in-suite kitchen.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Palm Springs/Rancho Mirage
description: Off Highway 111, we're steps from The River Mall and plenty of restaurants. Eisenhower Medical Center, El Paseo shopping, and Palm Desert are all within a 10-minute drive. Palm Springs Airport is 15 minutes away, and the Palm Springs Aerial Tramway is a half-hour from the hotel. Enjoy our outdoor pool, fitness center, and restaurant.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Palm Desert
description: You’ll find us just off I-10, with a choice of shops and restaurants a few steps away. We’re nine miles from the hiking trails of the Santa Rosa and San Jacinto Mountains National Park. Take the kids to the Living Desert Zoo and Gardens, seven miles from our hotel. Unwind in our outdoor pool. Hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Palm Desert
description: We're half a mile from I-10, 15 minutes from the airport, and 20 minutes from Palm Springs. Go wild at The Living Desert Zoo and practice on our putting green before teeing off at any of 120 golf courses within 15 minutes' drive. Enjoy your fully equipped kitchen and our complimentary evening social, Monday to Thursday. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Palm Desert
description: Our hotel in Palm Desert is a mile from Indian Wells, and a 25-minute drive from Palm Springs. We're surrounded by world-class golf courses, and have six hardcourt tennis courts, and a fully landscaped resort-sized outdoor pool. We host a complimentary evening reception and serve cooked-to-order breakfast daily.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton La Quinta
description: We're surrounded by world-class golf courses and right down the street from the Indian Wells Tennis Garden. Downtown Palm Springs and the airport are only 20 miles away. You'll find numerous dining and shopping options within a mile's drive. During your stay enjoy daily free hot breakfast, and a full in-suite kitchen. Evening socials, Monday – Thursday, are on us.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Chico
description: We are located off Golden State Highway less than a mile from the North Valley Plaza shopping center. California State University Chico is about two miles away. Visit Bidwell Park, the largest municipal park in the US, for public hiking and biking trails as well as a golf course. We are a LEED certified hotel and have 10 electric car charging stations.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Ontario Airport
description: Find us off I-10, adjacent to the convention center and within five minutes of Ontario International Airport via free shuttle. Our shuttle also covers Toyota Arena and Ontario Mills — one of the largest shopping malls in the state. Expect a warm DoubleTree cookie on arrival, and enjoy our heated outdoor pool and 24-hour fitness center.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Ontario Airport
description: We're a half mile from Ontario International Airport and our free shuttle will take you both ways. Ontario Convention Center and Ontario Mills Mall are both two miles away and downtown can be reached in 15 minutes. We host a complimentary evening reception in our atrium and have a heated indoor pool and whirlpool. Free cooked-to-order breakfast is served daily.

name: Hampton Inn Norco-Corona-Eastvale
description: We're on Corona's Main Street, just off I-15 and 25 miles from Disneyland®. With parks and lakes all over the area, it's a great spot for hiking, or try horse riding, at SilverLakes Equestrian Sports and Park three miles away. Drive 10 minutes to play golf at Eagle Glen, or 15 minutes for a dip in the Glen Ivy Hot Springs. Our daily hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Ontario
description: We’re off I-15 and I-10, five minutes from Ontario Airport, the Convention Center and the Citizens Business Bank Arena. We're surrounded by shops and dining, including dozens of options at Ontario Mills Mall just across the street. Relax in our heated outdoor pool and enjoy free daily hot breakfast and WiFi.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Ontario-Rancho Cucamonga
description: With Ontario International Airport four miles away, you’ll be here before you know it. A short walk brings you to Citizens Business Bank Arena and Empire Lakes Golf Course, a PGA-certified green. If you like things faster, check out Auto Club Speedway. Unwind at our free evening social, Monday – Thursday, or with some in-suite cooking. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Ontario/Rancho Cucamonga
description: Off I-15 and I-10, we’re in walking distance of Ontario Mills Mall, Toyota Arena, and a variety of restaurants. Ontario Airport and Victoria Gardens are three miles away, and we’re five miles from Auto Club Speedway. The Claremont Colleges are 14 miles away. Perks include our indoor pool, fitness center, restaurant, and room service.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Imperial Beach San Diego
description: We are off State Highway 75 less than a mile from San Diego Bay and about a mile from Imperial Beach Pier. Visit Silver Strand State beach less than five miles away. The North Island Naval Air Station is less than 10 miles away. We are only a 12-minute drive from Las Americas Premium Outlets near the US/Mexico border. Enjoy our heated indoor pool.

name: Hilton San Diego Gaslamp Quarter
description: Find us directly opposite San Diego Convention Center and three blocks from Petco Park. We're surrounded by the bars, restaurants, and entertainment – including Balboa Theater, the House of Blues, and San Diego Civic Theater – of the historic Gaslamp Quarter. Enjoy our outdoor pool and fitness center, terrace, and restaurant.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton San Diego Bay Downtown
description: Enjoy views of the bay and San Diego skyline from our hotel, less than a mile from San Diego Convention Center, Petco Park, and the USS Midway Museum. The Gaslamp Quarter is a 15-minute walk away. We have an indoor pool, and we offer Stretch U in the fitness center. Wake up to Dunkin' Donuts in the lobby and free made-to-order breakfast.

name: Carte Hotel San Diego Downtown, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: Our hotel is blocks from the Embarcadero waterfront in Little Italy. Find us 10 minutes from San Diego Zoo and 20 minutes from La Jolla. Personalized recommendations from our staff will help you live like a local. We feature a pool, rooftop bar, yoga and spin classes, a fitness center, and sauna.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Chula Vista Eastlake
description: Our hotel puts you in Eastlake Chula Vista near Scripps Coastal Medical Center, Otay Lakes Surgery Center, Eastlake Village Marketplace, Kohl’s, Target, and many chain restaurants and local eateries. Take a walk in Scobee Park to experience the natural beauty of the area. Enjoy a hot full breakfast and evening social with us.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel San Diego Downtown
description: Find us in the downtown area, less than two miles from San Diego Convention Center, USS Midway Museum, and Balboa Park. Our free local shuttle goes to San Diego Airport, which is less than eight minutes away. Enjoy our harbor views, our outdoor pool with whirlpool, and a warm DoubleTree cookie on arrival.

name: Hampton Inn Chula Vista Eastlake
description: Our hotel provides a convenient location near Hwy 125 in the Eastlake area of Chula Vista, CA. We are within a five-mile radius of Scripps Coastal Medical Center, Otay Lakes Surgery Center, Novo Brazil Brewing, Kohl’s, and fast food chains as well as local eateries. Enjoy free WiFi, breakfast, and outdoor seasonal pool and whirlpool.

name: Hampton Inn San Diego-Downtown
description: Near I-5, our rooms are five minutes from San Diego International Airport via free shuttle. We're adjacent to Waterfront Park and County Center trolley stop. Little Italy, downtown, and restaurants are all within walking distance. Wake up to free hot breakfast, and enjoy our free WiFi, fitness center, and rooftop pool and sundeck with bay views.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton San Diego Downtown/Bayside
description: Right on the edge of Little Italy, we're two blocks from San Diego International Airport (SAN) and less than two miles from downtown. A 10-minute drive gets you to the convention center and the Gaslamp Quarter. During your stay, enjoy daily hot breakfast, free WiFi, complimentary evening socials (Monday – Thursday), and an in-suite kitchen.

name: Hilton San Diego Airport/Harbor Island
description: Find us on San Diego Bay, less than two miles from San Diego International Airport. Hotspots like PETCO Park, Little Italy, and San Diego Zoo can be reached in 10 minutes. SeaWold, Seaport Village Shopping Center, and San Diego Convention Center are within six miles. We offer a free local shuttle, bike rental, and an outdoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites San Diego Airport Liberty Station
description: Check out the harbor views from Spanish Landing Park or Liberty Station NCT Park, both short walks from our door. We're adjacent to San Diego Airport and just three miles from downtown. Enjoy family days at SeaWorld San Diego, Fiesta Island Park, and the San Diego Zoo, all within 15 minutes. WiFi, hot breakfast, and airport shuttle rides are on us.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel San Diego - Hotel Circle
description: We're five minutes from Fashion Valley mall and Old Town. Within six miles, reach San Diego International Airport, SeaWorld, and Balboa Park’s zoo and Japanese Friendship Garden. San Diego Convention Center is nine miles away. Enjoy our outdoor pool, patio with fire pit, 24-hour market, and a warm DoubleTree cookie on arrival.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton San Diego Airport-Liberty Station
description: We're only a 15-minute drive to the city center and the zoo, and right next to San Diego International Airport (SAN) with a complimentary shuttle. Eat and shop to your heart's content at nearby Liberty Station. The Marine Corps Recruit Depot and Naval Base Point Loma are conveniently close. Enjoy free WiFi, a full kitchen, and daily free hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn San Diego/Mission Valley
description: Find us off I-8, six miles from downtown San Diego and the airport. The University of San Diego and historic Old Town are five minutes away, with SeaWorld® and San Diego Zoo five miles from us. Your stay includes free hot breakfast and free WiFi. Enjoy our 24-hour Suite Shop, heated outdoor pool, 24-hour fitness center, and patio with fire pit.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton  Fresno Airport/Clovis, CA
description: Located just two minutes from the Fresno airport, our Clovis hotel is a gateway to the best of central California. Visitors to nearby Fresno State and Save Mart Center concertgoers can enjoy our outdoor pool and basketball court, or head east to explore national parks, mountains, and forests.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Clovis-Airport North
description: Welcome to our Hampton Inn & Suites Clovis-Airport North hotel. Nestled in the shadow of the Sierra Nevada, our Clovis, CA hotel is minutes from downtown Fresno and the best attractions in the San Joaquin Valley.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Clovis
description: Find us near Sierra Freeway, five minutes from California State University – Fresno and Save Mart Center. We're steps from local shopping, with Clovis Botanical Garden and Fresno Yosemite International Airport four miles away. The freeway puts us 60 miles from Yosemite National Park. Enjoy our fitness center and outdoor heated pool.

name: Hampton Inn Fresno Airport
description: Located across the street from Fresno Yosemite International Airport, we’re five miles from vibrant downtown Fresno. Fill up on our free hot breakfast each morning, take a dip in our outdoor pool and work out in the 24-hour fitness center. Our modern guest rooms include free WiFi, our clean and fresh Hampton bed®, HDTV and spacious bathroom.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Fresno
description: The basketball court and billiards room at our Fresno hotel give you the comforts of home, but near the Yosemite Freeway, downtown Fresno and Fresno State. Plus, every room at our convenient Fresno hotel is a suite with a full kitchen.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Fresno
description: We’re off Route 41, eight miles from downtown Fresno. A range of restaurants and Kaiser Permanente Fresno Medical Center are within a half mile. Woodward Park, Fashion Fair mall, and California State University, Fresno are all three miles away. Fresno Yosemite International Airport is a 20-minute drive. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, WiFi, fitness center, and outdoor pool.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Fresno Convention Center
description: Our downtown hotel is off Routes 41 and 99, adjacent to Fresno Convention Center. We're 10 minutes from California State University, home to Save Mart Center, with Fresno Yosemite Airport six miles away. Expect a warm DoubleTree cookie at check-in, and enjoy our 24-hour fitness center and heated indoor-outdoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Fresno-Northwest
description: We’re just off Highway 99. You’ll find lots of shopping, dining and entertainment within 20 minutes at the Fashion Fair Mall, Riverpark Shopping Plaza, and downtown Fresno. Yosemite and Sequoia National Parks are about 90 minutes away. Our hotel has an outdoor pool and a fitness center, and free hot breakfast and WiFi.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Los Angeles - Commerce
description: Our hotel next to I-5 is across the parking lot from shopping at Citadel Outlets. Commerce Casino is under five minutes away and it's a seven-mile drive to downtown LA attractions like the STAPLES Center and Walt Disney Concert Hall. We're within 20 miles of Disneyland and Universal Studios. Enjoy our 24-hour fitness center and heated outdoor pool.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Los Angeles Downey
description: Bordered by four freeways within two miles, our hotel sits next to Downey Theatre and is less than a five minute walk from bakeries, restaurants, and bars. Downtown LA is 12 miles away, and Universal Studios just 20 miles. Enjoy made-to-order breakfast, our evening reception, and use of the indoor pool and fitness center.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Los Angeles Downtown
description: We’re three blocks from the 101 between Los Angeles' Little Toyko neighborhood and the Arts District. The STAPLES Center, Dodger Stadium, and Los Angeles Convention Center are within two miles. The University of Southern California is five miles away. Escape the big-city bustle in our rooftop Kyoto Garden.

name: Hilton Checkers Los Angeles
description: Designed in 1927 by Charles F. Whittlesey, our restored hotel in the Financial District is a piece of Los Angeles history with panoramic views of the city from our rooftop deck. Overlooking Pershing Square, we're within a mile of Disney Concert Hall, The Broad, and the Los Angeles Convention Center.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Riverside/Corona East
description: Find us just off Highway 91 in southern California. Our hotel is within two miles of La Sierra University and the Galleria at Tyler, and we're 10 miles from downtown Riverside and the Riverside Convention Center. Wake up to our free hot breakfast, unwind in our pool, and enjoy WiFi on us.

name: Hampton Inn Riverside Downtown
description: We're in the heart of downtown, one block from the Riverside Convention Center, the Fox Performing Arts Center, and the Mission Inn Museum. A five-minute walk will take you past several dining options, and Riverside City College is a mile away. Join us each morning for free hot breakfast, and evening reception Monday – Thursday.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Fontana
description: Find us right across from Palm Court Shopping Center with easy access to the San Bernardino Freeway. Downtown Fontana and the Auto Club Speedway are both within 10 minutes' drive, and we're less than 11 miles from Ontario International Airport. Enjoy meeting space for up 200 people, our outdoor pool, fitness center, and patio area.

name: Hilton Orange County/Costa Mesa
description: Find us at the heart of the I-405/Routes 73/55 intersection, five minutes from John Wayne Airport via free shuttle — also covering South Coast Plaza mall. Our hotel is less than seven miles from the waterfront attractions and dining of Newport Beach Pier. Complete your stay with access to our fitness center and outdoor pool with tiki bar.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Orange County Airport
description: Our lakeside hotel is off Route 55 in Santa Ana. We're five minutes from John Wayne Airport, and our free shuttle will take you there. South Coast Plaza is two miles away, and we have easy access to Disneyland® Resort and the annual Surf City Marathon, both within 12 miles. Enjoy a warm chocolate chip cookie when you arrive.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Santa Ana - Orange County Airport
description: We're five-minutes from John Wayne Airport and shopping at South Coast Plaza via our free three-mile shuttle. Disneyland Resort, Angel Stadium, and Newport Beach can be reached in 20 minutes. Enjoy our outdoor pool with whirlpool, fitness center, and a warm DoubleTree cookie on arrival.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Irvine John Wayne Airport
description: Take our free shuttle to/from the airport and within a three-mile radius, including Irvine Business Complex and a huge range of shops and eateries. Beaches and Disneyland® are 20 minutes away when you're ready to play. Closer to home, cook in your in-suite kitchen or join us for complimentary evening socials, Monday – Thursday. Breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Santa Ana Orange County Airport
description: Our suites are a four-minute drive from John Wayne Airport, and we provide free on-demand airport transportation from 5am-9:30pm daily. We're a 15-minute drive from Disneyland Park and Newport Beach. Enjoy our heated indoor pool and whirlpool and join us for our complimentary evening reception. A free made-to-order breakfast is served daily.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Santa Ana/Orange County Airport
description: Off Route 55, we're four miles from John Wayne Airport. Disneyland® and Newport Beach are within 20 minutes, and a range of restaurants are less than 10 minutes away. We've got a fitness center, outdoor pool, and free WiFi and hot breakfast.

name: Hilton Santa Clara
description: Find our hotel across the road from Santa Clara Convention Center and less than a 10-minute walk from Levi’s Stadium and California’s Great America. Great Mall and Norman Y. Mineta San Jose International Airport are within five miles, and corporate giants like Google and Adobe are within eight miles. Enjoy our pool and award-winning restaurant.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton San Jose North
description: Treat the kids to Raging Waters, the Santa Clara PAL BMX track, or San Francisco day trips. The lower Guadalupe River Trail, Ulistac Natural Area, and Santa Clara Golf & Tennis Club are minutes from the door. Working guests are near Dell, Intel and NASA Ames Research Center. WiFi, breakfast and our Monday – Thursday evening social are free. Enjoy an in-suite kitchen.

name: Hilton Garden Inn San Jose/Milpitas
description: We’re off I-880, five minutes’ walk from McCarthy Ranch Marketplace, and two miles from the Great Mall. California’s Great America, Levi’s Stadium, and Intel Museum are 10 minutes away. Silicon Valley is 10 miles from our door. Enjoy breakfast and dinner in our restaurant. We have an outdoor pool, fitness room, and meeting space available. WiFi’s on us.

name: Hampton Inn Milpitas
description: We're five minutes from San Jose International Airport in the Silicon Valley. We're surrounded by restaurants, blocks from firms like Cisco Systems and KLA Corporation. Catch a 49ers game at Levi's Stadium, four miles away, and head 45 miles north to San Francisco for a day of sightseeing. Enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites San Clemente
description: We’re off I-5, a short walk from San Clemente beach, and under two miles to shops, dining, and entertainment by the Avenida Del Mar. Catch the waves at Trestles Beach, two miles away. It’s 10 minutes to Camp Pendleton Marine Corps base. Relax in our outdoor pool with a view of the golf course. Hot breakfast and WiFi are free

name: Hilton Garden Inn Davis Downtown
description: Our downtown hotel is a half-mile from the University of California – Davis. We're two blocks from the local Amtrak station, with a free bicycle rental service to get around. Aggie Stadium events and UC Davis Arboretum are two miles from the door. Seasons Kitchen & Bar serves casual cuisine and offers event catering.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Woodland-Sacramento Area
description: You’ll find us off I-5, 18 miles from downtown and eight from Sacramento International Airport. Travel is a breeze with our free airport shuttle. Shop at the Woodland Gateway Shopping Center, on the other side of the highway or check out the Heidrick Ag History Museum, just half a mile away. The Satiety Winery is five miles from our hotel. Hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites West Sacramento
description: We're just off I-80, about five minutes' drive from homeware stores, dining, and the IKEA at Riverpoint Marketplace. Catch a baseball game at Raley Field, or spend time in downtown Sacramento, both around 10 minutes' drive from our door. Wake up to free hot breakfast, and unwind in our outdoor pool. WiFi and parking are on us, too.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Sacramento Riverfront Promenade
description: Our hotel overlooks the Sacramento River, next to the iconic Tower Bridge. We're within a 10-minute walk of the Old Sacramento Waterfront District and events at the Golden 1 Center.  Local art throughout the hotel depicts Sacramento history and life along the river. Enjoy free made-to-order breakfast and our complimentary evening reception.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Sacramento/South Natomas
description: We’re off I-5, nine miles from Sacramento International Airport via our free scheduled shuttle. Discovery Park is a short drive away for rivers and trails, and we’re less than 10 minutes from Golden 1 Center, Downtown Sacramento, and Sacramento Convention Center. Enjoy our fitness center, restaurant, 24-hour snack shop, and year-round heated outdoor pool.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Sacramento Airport Natomas
description: Off I-5, our rooms are 10 minutes from Sacramento International Airport via free 24-hour shuttle. We're ideal for Sacramento draws – Golden 1 Center events, Sacramento Convention Center, and California State Capitol are less than seven miles from our door. Local dining is within a half-mile, and we have a restaurant, bar, and outdoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Sacramento-Airport-Natomas
description: You'll find us right off I-5, six miles from Sacramento International Airport and downtown shops and dining. Take advantage of our airport shuttle. While you're here, unwind with a stroll in Discovery Park, or dine at one of our city's farm-to-fork restaurants. Powerhouse Science Center, 15 minutes' drive away, is full of interactive family fun. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Sacramento Airport-Natomas
description: Uncover downtown Sacramento history, near Powerhouse Science Center and basketball at Golden 1 Center. For fresh air, check out North Natomas Regional Park and Sacramento River water sports. Working guests are in Natomas’ business district. Wind down at our free evening social, Monday – Thursday, or with some in-suite cooking. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Sacramento-Elk Grove Laguna I-5
description: Surrounded by lush greenery, it’s hard to tell that downtown Sacramento is just 12 miles away. We’re close to the corporate offices of Apple and Cardinal Health, making us a great base for business. Whatever brings you to town, you’ll always enjoy free WiFi, free hot breakfast, comfy rooms, and our outdoor pool.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton San Diego La Jolla
description: We're across from the Westfield UTC mall and a mile from the University of California, San Diego. Beaches at La Jolla and Torrey Pines and downtown San Diego attractions like Petco Park are within 20 minutes of our hotel. We have an indoor pool, whirlpool, and sauna. Enjoy free made-to-order breakfast and our complimentary evening reception.

name: Hotel La Jolla, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: Nestled among the palms and illuminated by torches, our hotel exudes the easygoing vibe of Southern California. The beach and La Jolla Village are in walking distance — or explore the neighborhood with our free-to-borrow bikes. We have rooms with ocean-view balconies, an award-winning restaurant, and an outdoor poolside bar.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton San Diego Central
description: San Diego's culture and the historic downtown Gaslamp Quarter are just 20 minutes away. Family days are easy with SeaWorld, San Diego Zoo, and baseball games at Petco Park nearby, while LEGOLAND® California is a short drive away. Whip up a meal in your in-suite kitchen, or stop by our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hampton Inn San Diego-Kearny Mesa
description: We're just off highway 163, two miles from Asian cuisine and offices including Raytheon, Northrop Grumman, and AIS. Marine Corps Air Station Miramar, historic Old Town, and the San Diego Zoo are all eight miles away. It's a nine-mile drive to San Diego State University. Cool off in our outdoor pool, and enjoy free hot breakfast. WiFi's on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn San Diego Mission Valley Stadium
description: We’re off I-15, three miles from SDCCU Stadium and I-8. San Diego State University, the San Diego Zoo, and downtown are all within 10 miles, and our hotel is 20 minutes from Mission Beach. Verde Kitchen & Bar serves breakfast and dinner, and snacks and ready-to-cook meals are available at the 24-hour Pavilion Pantry.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites San Diego-Poway
description: Find us six miles from I-15 a few hundred yards from the Poway Business Park, home to nearly 500 businesses. We're a half-hour drive from downtown San Diego, San Diego State University, and the Zoo. Relax in our outdoor pool and whirlpool. Hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Hilton San Diego Mission Valley
description: Find us within two miles of Fashion Valley Mall and Riverwalk Golf Course. Reach San Diego Airport, SeaWorld, and Mission Bay beaches in six minutes. USS Midway Museum, the University of San Diego, and Downtown are six miles from our door. We have an outdoor pool, terrace, and Latin-inspired restaurant.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel San Diego - Mission Valley
description: We're next to Highway 163, less than a mile from Fashion Valley Mall and Westfield Mission Valley Mall. The San Diego Trolley stops down the street at Hazard Center Station for easy access to San Diego State University, Old Town, and Petco Park downtown. Our hotel has indoor and outdoor pools, and every stay starts with a warm chocolate chip cookie.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton San Diego Mission Valley/Zoo
description: We're right next to two highways that can get you to downtown San Diego (including the world-famous zoo) in 10 minutes and Ocean Beach in 15. Want to stay out of the city? Our quiet hillside location is near plenty of great dining and shopping options, or use your full kitchen. Enjoy hot breakfast, free WiFi, and complimentary evening socials Monday – Thursday.

name: Hampton Inn El Centro
description: Reach us from I-8, 10 minutes from El Centro. We’re just 15 minutes from El Centro Naval Air Facility, half an hour’s drive from day trips to Mexicali, over the Mexican border. You’ll be steps from dining and Imperial Valley Mall shopping. Fill up on free hot breakfast before teeing off at Lakeview Golf Course, 10 minutes from the door. Enjoy WiFi on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Sacramento Elk Grove
description: We’re off Highway 99, within half a mile of shops, restaurants, and the Laguna Gateway shopping center. Underwood Park is less than two miles away and we're 20 minutes from downtown Sacramento. Our Garden Grille Restaurant serves breakfast and dinner, and our Pavilion Pantry is open 24 hours for drinks and snacks.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Sacramento at CSUS
description: We’re at the US-50 and 65th Street interchange, adjacent to Sacramento State University and public transport links. The American River Parkway is within walking distance and we’re 25 minutes from Sacramento Airport (SMF). Enjoy our outdoor pool, fitness center, and free WiFi and hot breakfast.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Sacramento
description: We're by the Capital City Freeway, across the street from shopping and dining at Arden Fair mall. Take our free shuttle anywhere within three miles, including Cal Expo Race Track, Raging Waters Sacramento water park, and the California State Fairgrounds. Our hotel features an outdoor pool, a fitness center, and free WiFi.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Rancho Cordova Sacramento
description: With quick access to Lincoln Highway, our new hotel is within minutes of tons of shops, restaurants, and natural areas. Just down the road are the Sacramento Children's Museum and Parkwest Casino Cordova. Our all-suite hotel offers meeting space, a heated outdoor pool, and gas grills, plus free breakfast and evening socials.

name: Hampton Inn Sacramento/Rancho Cordova
description: While we’re just a short drive from downtown, Lake Tahoe, Apple Hill and Amador Wine Country, we can’t help you choose which to explore first. We’re closer still to major corporations, Sacramento Speedway, the oldtown – where you can pan for gold – and the American River, with its bounty of hiking, cycling and water sports. Keep your gold: WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Sacramento-Cal Expo
description: Take in Sacramento from our hotel off Business 80, seven minutes from Cal Expo and the State Fair. Head into the city for the California State Capitol and State Railroad Museums or Golden 1 Center events, all 15 minutes from your room. We're 10 minutes from Sacramento McClellan Airport. Start each day with free hot breakfast, cool off in the pool, and enjoy WiFi on us.

name: DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Sacramento - Rancho Cordova
description: Our hotel is 10 minutes from downtown Folsom, just off Interstate 50. Select suites feature private patios, and we have a two-story loft suite. The Folsom Premium Outlets are five miles away, and Sacramento attractions are 20 minutes east. We have a fitness center and outdoor pool and whirlpool. Every stay starts with a warm chocolate chip cookie.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Folsom
description: Our hotel is off Highway 50, adjacent to Folsom Premium Outlets and two miles from Intel Corp. Lake Natoma is behind the hotel, with trails for running and cycling. Enjoy breakfast, dinner, and drinks in the Garden Grille & Bar. We also have free WiFi, an outdoor pool, 24-hour business center, and meeting facilities.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Folsom
description: We're just off US Highway 50, and our free shuttle will take you to attractions within a five-mile radius. Shop and dine at Palladio, or bag a bargain at Folsom Premium Outlets, nine minutes' drive away. Major tech firms like Intel, Micron and Aerojet are within 10 minutes of our door. Unwind in our fitness center, and enjoy daily hot breakfast and WiFi on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Roseville
description: We're off I-80, surrounded by dining and five minutes from Westfield Galleria and Roseville Shopping Center. Fuel up with free hot breakfast for the Miner's Ravine Trail, five minutes away, next to Golfland Sunsplash amusement park. Sacramento is 20 minutes south. Enjoy free WiFi and access to our outdoor seasonal pool.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Roseville
description: Our hotel is on the way to Reno and Lake Tahoe, down the street from local restaurants and a waterpark. Sacramento, Folsom Lake, and wineries on the Placer Wine Trail are a 20-minute drive. Enjoy our outdoor pool, whirlpool and fitness center. Breakfast and dinner are served at Garden Grille, drinks are available in the Pavilion Lounge.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Sacramento-Roseville
description: We’re off I-80, a short walk from Westfield Galleria shopping and dining, and three minutes from Roseville Golfland Sunsplash. Sacramento International Airport is 30 minutes away and we’re eight miles from Folsom Lake. Enjoy free breakfast, your in-suite kitchen, and our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday. WiFi’s on us and pets are welcome.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Roseville Sacramento
description: Our hotel is off Highway 65, next to TopGolf and within a mile of FBI Sacramento. It’s 10 minutes to central Roseville, Westfield Galleria, Golfland Sunsplash, and Thunder Valley Casino. Folsom Lake is nine miles away and Sacramento is 23 miles from our door. Every room is a suite and we offer free breakfast every morning.

name: Hampton Inn Visalia
description: Find us off Highway 198, within a mile of a dozen restaurants. We're four miles from downtown Visalia, which you can reach by free trolley. Visit the Visalia Convention Center, Visalia Fox Theatre, and Visalia Mall, all within 10 minutes of the hotel. Sequoia National Park is just 45 minutes away. Free daily hot breakfast, WiFi, and pool.

name: Hampton Inn Turlock
description: Located off Highway 99, we’re five minutes from downtown Turlock, and 20 minutes from Modesto. Visit the collections at Carnegie Arts Center, 1.5 miles away. Or enjoy the entertainment, shows, and rides at Stanislaus County Fair, 10 minutes’ drive. California State University Stanislaus is less than four miles from our door. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Turlock
description: We're just off Highway 99, five minutes from downtown shops, dining, and the Carnegie Arts Center. Cal State Stanislaus is four miles away, and Modesto is 20 minutes from us. Cool off in our outdoor pool, or curl up on the patio by our fire pit. Our combined fitness/laundry area keeps routines going away from home. Breakfast is free, and our market is always open.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Tulare
description: We're in the heart of the San Joaquin Valley, just off Highway 99. Relax on a cozy Hampton bed after a day of shopping at the Tulare Outlets, half a mile away. Nature's a short drive away – plan a day trip to Sequoia National Park, Kings Canyon, or Kaweah Lake. Enjoy free WiFi at the hotel and our signature hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Modesto-Salida
description: We're by Highway 99 in northwest Modesto. Find shopping at Vintage Fair Mall, family fun at FUNWORKS!, and baseball at John Thurman Field within 15 minutes of our door. 45 minutes takes you to the Stanislaus River for rafting, or to the San Joaquin River National Wildlife Refuge. Enjoy our outdoor pool with patio, free WiFi, and free hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn Patterson
description: We're located near the Flying J Travel Center, Amazon Fulfillment Center, and a seasonal corn maze and pumpkin patch. Our hotel also provides free hot breakfast daily as well as free WiFi. Eat at a local restaurant in Patterson or grab a bite from one of the fast food options off I-5.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Manteca
description: Find us just off Highway 120, steps from shopping and dining at Promenade Shops at Orchard Valley and five minutes from the ball fields at Big League Dreams Sports Park. Wine tours and tastings are eight miles away at Delicato Family Vineyards. Wake up to our free hot breakfast and work out in our fitness center. WiFi and parking are on us.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Newark - Fremont
description: Our hotel is between Oakland and San Jose in Silicon Valley, half a mile from NewPark Mall. Some rooms feature a balcony or patio with city or garden views, and every stay starts with a warm chocolate chip cookie.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Newark-Fremont
description: We’re just 20 minutes from San Jose and Oakland International Airports. Day trips to Oakland and central San Francisco, 40 minutes away, are easy with our proximity to I-880 and the BART. Try some local dining or get down to a little home cooking in your in-suite kitchen. Finish the day at our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Fremont
description: Located near I-880 and just north of Santa Clara and Silicon Valley, our Fremont hotel puts you near many businesses in the Fremont and San Jose area, along with the corporate hub in Silicon Valley. We are easily accessible to California’s Great America and located less than eight miles from the Niles Essanay Silent Film Museum. Our indoor pool is available throughout the year, along with free WiFi and fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn Union City
description: We're just off I-880, in the heart of the Bay Area, less than 25 minutes' drive from San Francisco Airport, Oakland, and San Jose. Enjoy shops, dining, and entertainment at the Union Landing Shopping Center, seven minutes' walk, or head for thrill rides at California's Great America theme park, 20 miles away. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Milpitas Silicon Valley
description: Our suites are off I-680, 11 miles from Silicon Valley and San Jose. We’re 10 minutes from the Great Mall and 20 minutes from Levi’s Stadium. Our hotel has an indoor pool, fitness center, and views of the Milpitas foothills. Enjoy free made-to-order breakfast and our complimentary evening reception.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Gilroy
description: Off Highway 101, we’re five minutes from Gilroy Premium Outlets, downtown Gilroy, and Christmas Hill Park – home of the annual Gilroy Garlic Festival. Morgan Hill and Gilroy Gardens Family Theme Park are 15 minutes away, and San Jose Airport is a 35-minute drive. We’ve got a restaurant and outdoor pool, and there’s a café next door.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Gilroy
description: Just off Highway 101 on Travel Park Circle, we’re three miles from Premium Outlets and four miles from wineries and golf courses. Gilroy Gardens theme park is just seven miles from our front door. WiFi and hot breakfast is included in your stay along with access to our fitness center and outdoor heated pool. Each room includes a comfy bed, microwave, mini fridge and coffee maker.

name: Hampton Inn Morgan Hill
description: You'll find us off Highway 101, just south of Silicon Valley and five minutes' drive from local restaurants. Start out with our free hot breakfast, then grab your clubs and head to Coyote Creek Golf Course. Or pop into Guglielmo Winery for a tasting, two miles from our hotel. San Jose is just 25 minutes away. WiFi and parking are on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Watsonville
description: We’re off Scenic Route 1, two miles from central Watsonville. The Agricultural History Project Center & Museum is 15 minutes away, and we're within six miles of Palm Beach State Park and Sunset Beach State. Santa Cruz is a 20-minute drive. Enjoy daily breakfast and WiFi on us. We have a fitness center and heated indoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Salinas
description: We’re off Highway 101 in Salinas, within a mile of a range of restaurants. The National Steinbeck Center and Oldtown Salinas are five minutes away. Monterey and Pebble Beach are a 20-mile drive. Enjoy free daily hot breakfast, WiFi, along with our pool. We also have a fitness center and 24-hour convenience store.

name: Hampton Inn Santa Cruz
description: Find us a mile from the heart of Santa Cruz, off state routes 1 and 17. Grab free hot breakfast before exploring Santa Cruz Beach Boardwalk attractions or soaking up the sun at Natural Bridges State Beach, both within 10 minutes. The University of California Santa Cruz is just as close. Enjoy WiFi on us and access to our heated indoor pool.

name: Hilton Santa Cruz/Scotts Valley
description: We’re nestled among the foothills of the Santa Cruz Mountains, 10 minutes from Henry Cowell Redwoods State Park. Santa Cruz Beach Boardwalk, Capitola, and a variety of local wineries are within 15 minutes. San Jose International Airport is 28 miles away and Silicon Valley is a half-hour drive. Enjoy our fitness center and tree-lined outdoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn Santa Cruz West
description: We are off State hwy 1 in Santa Cruz. Mitchell Cove, Natural Bridges, and Lighthouse Field State beaches are all within a two-mile radius.  The Santa Cruz Beach Boardwalk is a ten-minute drive away. Visit the Surfing Museum and Surfers Memorial two miles away. Enjoy the sun on our outdoor patio.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Monterey Bay Seaside
description: Our hotel sits two blocks from Seaside State Beach, 10 minutes from Monterey Bay Aquarium and local shops and restaurants at Cannery Row. We serve made-to-order breakfast every morning. Enjoy our indoor pool and have a drink at our complimentary evening reception.

name: Hampton Inn Monterey
description: We're off Route 1, less than a mile from Del Monte Beach, and five minutes' drive from Monterey Bay Peninsula Airport. Monterey Bay Aquarium, shopping and dining at Cannery Row, and Old Fisherman's Wharf on the Monterey Peninsula are all less than 10 minutes away. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our fitness center.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Temecula Valley Wine Country
description: Over a dozen wineries are within 15 minutes' drive from our hotel. We're next to I-15 with easy access to local restaurants in Old Town and the shops of Promenade Temecula. Enjoy free cooked-to-order breakfast each morning, and have a drink at our complimentary Evening Reception.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Temecula
description: Off I-15, we’re within 20 minutes of 40 wineries. Pechanga Casino is a 10-minute drive away, and we’re within walking distance of restaurants, breweries, and Old Town Temecula. We’ve got a fitness center and a palm-lined outdoor pool. WiFi and daily hot breakfast are included with every stay.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Temecula
description: Nestled between Temecula Wine Country and the historic Old Town, our pet-friendly suites are at the juncture of seven championship golf courses and more than 30 world-class wineries. We’re just off I-15, less than an hour from San Diego International Airport, and close to countless local restaurants. Enjoy free WiFi and breakfast on us, or cook in your in-suite kitchen.

name: The Waterfront Beach Resort, a Hilton Hotel
description: Our seafront hotel is less than a five-minute walk from the sands and world-class surfing of Huntington Beach. Within half a mile, reach the International Surfing Museum and Pacific City’s shops and restaurants. Our on-site beach club offers cabana rentals, beach bonfires, and bicycle rental. We also have a spa and rooftop lounge.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Indio
description: Located off I-10 at the Monroe Street exit, we’re within 20 miles of approximately 100 golf courses and 19 miles from Palm Springs International Airport. Fill up on our free hot breakfast each morning. WiFi is also included in your stay as well as access to our heated outdoor pool and whirlpool, 24-hour fitness center and large meeting room.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Lancaster
description: We’re in the Antelope Valley, just off Highway 15 and about half an hour from Edwards Air Force Base. Enjoy historical attractions like the Blackbird Airpark Museum, 11 miles away. Stroll through the Antelope Valley Poppy Reserve, about 15 miles from our hotel. Relax in our indoor pool and whirlpool. Daily  hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Lancaster
description: A spacious suite with full kitchen is ready for you one mile from Overlook Park and five minutes from Park City Center mall. Downtown Lancaster is five miles away, where you can explore the central market and art museum, and sample the fare at Springhouse and Lancaster breweries. We'll provide free WiFi and daily hot breakfast.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Palmdale
description: We're off Highway 14, next to a movie theater and a few steps from the Antelope Valley Mall. Within a mile you'll find many more shops and dining options. Downtown Palmdale is four miles away. Our Great American Grill serves breakfast and dinner, and our 24-hour Pavilion Pantry offers drinks, snacks, and ready-to-cook meals.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Palmdale
description: Located in Antelope Valley, we're just 13 minutes from USAF Plant 42, home to Lockheed and Boeing. Head to Rancho Vista Golf Club, five miles from us, or head to Antelope Valley Mall for some retail therapy. Los Angeles is just over an hour away. Unwind in our pool and enjoy WiFi and hot breakfast on us.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Palmdale
description: Just off I-14 and 60 miles from Los Angeles, our hotel is within 15 minutes of the Big 8 Softball Complex and the Lancaster National Soccer Center, and a mile from Antelope Valley Mall. We have a fitness center and an indoor pool. Enjoy free made-to-order breakfast and our complimentary evening reception.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Palmdale
description: Just off the CA-14 freeway in Antelope Valley, our customizable suites are close to Plant 42 and aerospace companies like Lockheed Martin, Boeing, and Northrop Grumman. Nearby Antelope Valley Mall has your food and fashion essentials covered – though you can always whip up dinner in your in-suite kitchen. Breakfast and WiFi are free during your stay.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Palmdale
description: We are right off CA-14, just 15 minutes from Palmdale Regional Airport and aerospace offices, including Boeing, Lockheed Martin, and Northrop Grumman. Antelope Valley Mall is just three miles away, and the Big 8 Softball Complex is seven miles away. Play a round of golf at Antelope Valley Country Club, just a few minutes away.

name: Tru by Hilton Lathrop
description: Our Golden State hotel is located just off I-5 and steps away from a variety of dining options. Visit Lathrop attractions like the River Mill wedding venue, Big Dreams Park, Dell’Osso Family Farm and Grey Stone Park, all within 15 minutes. Enjoy our comfy guestrooms with crisp white sheets, lots of outlets, free WiFi, and a build-your-own breakfast for a uniquely Tru stay.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Lathrop
description: Find us just off I-5 near downtown Lathrop, a short walk from a choice of restaurants. Catch a game or play softball at Big League Dreams Manteca, five miles from our door. Heading east to Yosemite National Park? Break up your journey and enjoy daily free hot breakfast, WiFi, and use of our heated indoor pool and fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Lodi
description: We’re off Highway 99 in the heart of Wine Country: there are dozens of wineries within a few minutes of our door. It’s four miles to Lodi Lake Park, for hiking, fishing, and watersports. Or try skydiving at the Skydive Lodi Parachute Center, six miles away. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and use of our outdoor pool.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Monterey
description: We're next to Monterey Peninsula College and less than five minutes from the Naval Postgraduate School. Del Monte Beach, Monterey Regional Airport, and Monterey Bay Aquarium are all within three miles. Enjoy our heated outdoor pool and free WiFi. Breakfast and dinner are served daily in our Pacific Grille. Stop by the lounge for Happy Hour, nightly.

name: Hampton Inn Petaluma
description: Set in the restored 1892 Petaluma Silk Mill, we’re one mile from downtown. Local breweries and Kastania Vineyards are within 10 minutes of the hotel, and we’re an hour’s drive from Oakland International Airport. Your stay includes fitness center use, free WiFi, and free hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Rohnert Park - Sonoma County
description: We're right off US-101, three miles from Seawolves games and events at Sonoma State University. Test your luck at Graton Casino, take the kids to Scandia Family Fun Center, or hit the greens at Foxtail Golf Club – all within two miles. You'll find many shops and restaurants five minutes from our door. Relax in our outdoor pool. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Sonoma County Airport
description: We’re off Highway 101, with free shuttle rides to and from Sonoma County Airport, one mile away. Jackson Family Wines, Alexander Valley Vineyards, Chalk Hill, and other vineyards are within 15 minutes.  Our Garden Grille & Bar serves breakfast, dinner, and evening room service daily. Lunch Monday to Friday. Enjoy our indoor pool, free parking, and WiFi on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Windsor - Sonoma Wine Country
description: Find a comfy base in Windsor to explore Sonoma Wine Country, just off Highway 101. You'll be steps from local shops and easy dining and five minutes from Foothill Regional Park. Healdsburg is 9 minutes north and Santa Rosa is 12 minutes south. Bring the wine country indoors with our Friday night tastings, and enjoy free WiFi, hot breakfast, and our outdoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Red Bluff
description: Find us off I-5, just two minutes from downtown Red Bluff. The Kelly-Griggs Museum and State Theatre are five minutes away. Try your hand at a game of disc golf at Samuel Ayer/Dog Island Park - within walking distance. A six-minute drive will get you to St. Elizabeth Community Hospital. Stay connected with our WiFi - it’s free, just like our hot breakfast.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Redding
description: Find us off I-5, overlooking the Sacramento River. Sundial Bridge, Win River Casino, and Mt Shasta Mall are within five miles. Whiskeytown Lake is 25 minutes away, and we're within an hour of Lassen Volcanic National Park. Our hotel has free WiFi, an indoor pool, and a free shuttle to and from Redding Municipal Airport five miles away.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Redding
description: You'll find us off I-5 and Highway 44. We're at the top of the Sacramento Valley, a great spot for outdoor activities. For swimming, boating, and kayaking, head to Whiskeytown Lake, 10 miles away, or Shasta Lake, 13 miles. Closer to home, Turtle Bay Exploration Park and WaterWorks Park are both within three miles. Our daily hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Ridgecrest
description: We're just two miles from Naval Air Weapons Station China Lake and within walking distance to Ridgecrest Regional Hospital. Learn about the Upper Mojave Desert's culture and history, including world-famous ancient Coso petroglyphs, at the Maturango Museum just down the road. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our heated indoor pool.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton San Diego Hotel Circle/SeaWorld Area
description: The aquatic excitement of SeaWorld®, the historic sights of Old Town, and the San Diego Zoo are all 10 minutes away. For unique dining and shopping, downtown and the Gaslamp Quarter are within easy reach. At the end of your trip, getting to the airport is an easy 15-minute drive. Daily hot breakfast and evening socials (Monday – Thursday) are free.

name: Hilton Garden Inn San Diego Old Town/SeaWorld Area
description: We’re on the edge of Presidio Park and the Old Town district. Our hotel is close to I-5, offering easy access to San Diego attractions like SeaWorld and the San Diego Zoo, both within five miles. Verde Kitchen & Bar serves breakfast and dinner, whilst snacks and ready-to-cook meals are available at the 24-hour Pavilion Pantry.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Tahoe-Truckee
description: Find us off Route 267 in the Tahoe National Forest. A variety of local eateries, Truckee River Winery, and Truckee Railroad Museum are within two miles. Donner Memorial State Park is six miles from our door, and Lake Tahoe is only 15 miles away. We’ve got a pool and fitness center. Enjoy WiFi and hot breakfast on us.

name: Hampton Inn Ukiah
description: Our Ukiah hotel is the heart of Mendocino wine country, within an easy drive of over 40 wineries, and under 10 minutes from Ukiah Speedway. Ukiah Municipal Airport is a half-mile away, and there are shops and restaurants in walking distance. We have an outdoor pool, koi pond, and mountain views. Free hot breakfast is served daily, and the WiFi's on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Yuba City
description: We’re in the Sutter Buttes mountain range, about 40 miles from Sacramento.
