description: Set among shops and restaurants in Lakeside Village, with easy access to Polk Parkway and I-4, we’re 10 minutes from downtown Lakeland. Catch a game at Joker Marchant Stadium or events at The RP Funding Center, both within 15 minutes of our door. Fill up on daily free hot breakfast before exploring LEGOLAND® Florida Resort, 20 miles east. Enjoy an in-suite kitchen and free WiFi.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Lakeland
description: We're off Route 570 next to Lakeland Linder Regional Airport, three miles from Lakeside Florida. The Florida Air Museum and Common Ground Park are within six miles, and Hollis Garden and Circle B Bar Reserve can be reached in about 15 minutes. Enjoy our restaurant, outdoor pool, evening room service, and 24-hour convenience shop.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Lake Wales
description: We're next to US-27, seven miles from Legoland amusement park and minutes from shops and restaurants. It's nine miles to nature walks at Bok Tower Gardens, and three minutes to Florida's Natural Grove House. State Farm Operations Center is four miles away. Take a relaxing dip in our outdoor pool, and start each day with free breakfast. WiFi's on us.

name: Hampton Inn Lakeland
description: You’ll find us just off I-4, about half an hour from Tampa and 45 minutes from Orlando. Shop a mix of boutiques and big brands at the Lakeland Square Mall, three miles away. We're five miles from Frank Lloyd Wright-designed buildings on the Florida Southern College campus. Enjoy our outdoor pool and fitness center, plus free hot breakfast and WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Plant City
description: We’re off I-4, within a half mile of a variety of shops and restaurants. Parkside Farm Market is a five minute drive away, and both Dinosaur World and Keel Farms & Winery are three miles from our door. Florida Rustic Barn Weddings is 11 miles away and Florida Strawberry Festival is held at the nearby city fairgrounds.

name: Hampton Inn Orlando-Maingate South
description: We're just off I-4, 12 miles from Walt Disney World® and the ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex. Ritchie Bros. auctions and Posner Park Mall are about a mile away, and the ChampionsGate area is just a short drive. Family-friendly restaurants are within minutes of the hotel. We offer free hot breakfast, WiFi, and parking. Enjoy fresh baked cookies nightly.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Tampa East (Casino Area)
description: We're off I-4, just five miles from Seminole Hard Rock Casino & Hotel Tampa. A 25-minute drive will take you to Adventure Island, Hillsborough River State Park, and MIDFLORIDA Credit Union Amphitheatre. Relax by our pool or stay active in our fitness center. Every stay includes free WiFi and free hot breakfast.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Brandon Tampa
description: Find the buzz of downtown Tampa and Ybor City just 15 minutes from your door. Walk to Topgolf for a little family fun, or take a trip to the Florida State Fairgrounds, Busch Gardens theme park, or the Florida Aquarium. Grab free breakfast before exploring, or do breakfast at your own speed in your in-suite kitchen. WiFi’s on us and pets are welcome.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Tampa Brandon
description: We're at the intersection of I-75 and Highway 60, five minutes from the shops and restaurants at Westfield Brandon. Downtown Tampa attractions like The Florida Aquarium and the convention center are 10 miles away. Enjoy free made-to-order breakfast and drinks at our complimentary Evening Reception.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Tampa-Brandon
description: We're next to I-75, with easy access to Westfield Brandon Mall. Many dining options are close by on highway 60, but you can enjoy free breakfast and complimentary evening socials here. Casino Tampa and the Florida State Fairgrounds are about 20 minutes away. You can reach downtown Tampa and The Florida Aquarium in nine miles. The WiFi is on us, and we're pet friendly!

name: Hilton Garden Inn Tampa East/Brandon
description: We're just off I-75, walking distance from Cognizant Technology. The Florida State Fairgrounds, Tampa Bay Sportsplex, and Westfield Brandon Mall are all within four miles – our free shuttle can take you there. Our meeting and event space fits up to 180 guests. Breakfast, lunch, and dinner are served daily in our Garden Grille & Bar. WiFi's on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Tampa Riverview Brandon
description: A brand new hotel, opened in April 2020. Find us off I-75, just east of metro Tampa in the Brandon area. Topgolf and Westfield Brandon shops are a mile away, and downtown's Riverwalk and the Port Tampa Bay cruise terminals are a 15-minute drive. Fuel up on free hot breakfast before a day at Busch Gardens, 20 minutes from the hotel, or check out our outdoor pool when it's time to unwind. WiFi's on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Tampa/Riverview/Brandon
description: Off I-75 and the Selmon Expressway, we're five miles from JC Handley Sports Complex and the Florida State Fairgrounds. Seminole Hard Rock Casino, Port Tampa Bay, and downtown Tampa are all within 15 minutes. We're within 20 miles of Busch Gardens and Tampa Airport. Enjoy our free five-mile shuttle, restaurant, outdoor pool, and fitness center.

name: Waterstone Resort & Marina Boca Raton, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: Discover a resort on the edge of Lake Boca Raton. Our rooms are walking distance from the beachfront and less than 10 minutes from the shopping and entertainment of Mizner Park and Royal Palm Place. We have a free shuttle covering the local area, daily champagne receptions, and a heated outdoor pool with waterfront views.

name: Hampton Inn Boca Raton-Deerfield Beach
description: The blue waters and white sands of Deerfield Beach are three miles away from our hotel along I-95. Several offices are within a mile, including JM&A Group, World Omni, and ShipMonk. It's a five-mile drive up to Florida Atlantic University, and four miles to youth league ballgames at Sugar Sand Park. Start your morning with free hot breakfast. WiFi's on us.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Boca Raton
description: Find us nestled in the palm trees, within a 12-minute drive of Highland Beach and Mizer Park’s dining and shops. Spanish Waterpark and Sugar Sand Park are less than six miles away. Our outdoor pool, free made-to-order breakfast, and complimentary evening reception complete your stay.

name: Hampton Inn Boca Raton
description: Just off Route 794 with easy access to I-95, we’re three miles from Florida Atlantic University and an FAU Official Hotel Partner. Red Reef Park beaches, and shops and dining at Boca Raton’s Town Center, are a 10 minute-drive away. WiFi and breakfast are on us as well as access to Lifetime Atlantic Club, next door to our hotel.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Boca Raton
description: Off I-95, we're 10 minutes from downtown Boca Raton. The interstate puts you within 15 minutes of Delray Beach, Boca Raton Beach, and Atlantic Avenue shopping and dining, and there's plenty of golfing in a four-mile radius. Our Garden Grille & Bar serves breakfast and dinner, with evening room service, and our store is open 24 hours.

name: Hilton Boca Raton Suites
description: We’re off the Florida Turnpike, 10 minutes from upscale shopping at Town Center. Mizner Park, Gumbo Limbo Nature Center, pristine beaches, and South Beach Park are within 20 minutes. We have an outdoor pool, fitness center, and room service. Enjoy daily breakfast, WiFi, parking, and a nightly drinks reception all on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Coconut Creek
description: We’re off the Sawgrass Expressway, between Fort Lauderdale/Hollywood International and Palm Beach airports. The Seminole Casino is two miles away, and Coral Springs and Boca Raton are both within 10 miles. Enjoy our outdoor pool, putting green, and fitness center. Free WiFi and daily hot breakfast complete your stay.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Bonita Springs, FL
description: We’re just three miles from the warm sand of Gulf of Mexico beaches. Fill up on free breakfast before exploring the historic Everglade Wonder Gardens or teeing off at Spanish Wells, Highland Woods, or Bonita Bay Golf & Country Clubs. When the sun sets, stop by our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday, or cook up a taste of home in your in-suite kitchen. WiFi’s on us.

name: Hampton Inn Bonita Springs/Naples-North
description: We give you free WiFi, free breakfast, free parking and you still run away and leave us for the Bonita, Ft. Myers and Barefoot beaches (minutes away, accessible by beach trolley) or to tee-off at local golf courses, spot dolphins at Lovers Key State Park, explore Everglades Wonder Gardens and tour the Edison and Ford Winter Estates. Well, we’ll always have breakfast…

name: DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Naples
description: Our suites are off Tamiami Trail, beside the Cocohatchee River. Delnor-Wiggins Pass State Park, Vanderbilt Beach, and Mercato shopping can be reached in under 10 minutes. Naples Botanical Garden and Corkscrew Swamp Sanctuary are a half-hour away. Enjoy our riverfront pool and a warm DoubleTree Cookie on arrival.

name: Hampton Inn Naples-I-75
description: We're right off I-75, within walking distance of restaurants, and 15 minutes' drive from the Gulf Coast beach at Delnor-Wiggins Pass State Park. ArrowHead Golf Club is three miles from our door, and Coastland Center mall is 11 miles away. Wake up to daily hot breakfast, cool off in our outdoor pool, and enjoy WiFi on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Fort Myers-Estero/FGCU
description: We’re just off I-75, three miles from Florida Gulf Coast University and nine miles from Southwest Florida International Airport. The Miromar Outlets mall is just across the road, and you'll find a good choice of shops and restaurants close to our hotel. We’re about a mile from the Hertz Arena, which hosts a wide range of events. Our daily hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Fort Myers Estero
description: Our spacious suites are five minutes from Miromar Outlets and less than three miles from Hertz Arena and Florida Gulf Coast University. We provide a free five-mile and airport shuttle service to Southwest Florida International Airport. A free made-to-order breakfast and evening reception are available daily.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Naples I-75 Pine Ridge Road
description: With quick access to I-75, several destination golf courses, and beautiful Gulf Coast beaches, our new all-suite Naples hotel is the perfect place for a family getaway or business trip. Downtown Naples and shopping on 5th Avenue South is just 15 minutes away. Enjoy free breakfast and WiFi, plus in-suite kitchens and plenty of space to relax.

name: Hilton Naples
description: Blending modern design with neoclassical style, our hotel sits in palm-lined grounds just five miles from the historic district of Old Naples. Our free shuttle connects you to the white sands of Clam Pass Beach in less than 10 minutes. The Country Club of Naples is two miles away. Enjoy our outdoor pool with a waterfall and free bicycle rental.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Fort Myers Airport/FGCU
description: Find us just off I-75, 10 minutes from Southwest Florida International Airport – hop on our free shuttle. We’re three miles from Florida Gulf Coast University. Enjoy dining on your doorstep, or at Miromar Mall, 10 minutes away. For a quieter night, join our complimentary evening social, Monday – Wednesday, or do a little in-suite cooking. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Fort Myers Airport/FGCU
description: Our hotel is less than a mile from Gulf Coast Town Center Mall, two miles from Florida Gulf Coast University, and under a 10-minute drive to Southwest Florida International Airport. We have an outdoor pool, whirlpool, and fitness center. Breakfast and dinner are served in the Garden Grille & Bar. Free perks include WiFi and a five-mile 24-hour shuttle.

name: Hampton Inn Naples-Central
description: Find us off I-75. We’re five minutes from the beaches on Florida’s Paradise Coast, and shopping at The Village Shops on Venetian Bay and Coastland Center. The Baker Museum and von Liebig Art Center are both just three miles away. Take a dip in our pool or work out in our fitness center. We’ve got hot breakfast and WiFi covered.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Fort Myers Beach/Sanibel Gateway
description: Fort Myers Beach is 10 minutes from our hotel and easy to reach from Route 865 or a one-minute walk to the local trolley. We have a heated outdoor pool, and Sanibel Island is a 10-mile ride on Route 867. Southwest Florida International Airport is a 20-minute drive away. Hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Boynton Beach
description: We’re in Boynton Beach, walking distance from a range of restaurants and shops. JFK Medical Center and Bethesda Hospital East are within five miles of the hotel, and Boynton Beach Station and Boynton Beach Mall are also close by. Palm Beach International Airport is a 15-minute drive away. Enjoy free daily hot breakfast, WiFi, and our outdoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn West Palm Beach-Lake Worth-Turnpike
description: Discover the southeast coast from our Lake Worth hotel just off the Florida Turnpike. Grab free hot breakfast before exploring John Prince Park or swinging by one of many golf greens within 15 minutes. We're half an hour from lazy days at Juno Beach, passing through West Palm Beach’s Clematis Street Entertainment District on the way. WiFi’s on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton West Palm Beach Airport
description: Feel refreshed at our Palm Beach International Airport hotel. Sleep in your suite, or cool off in the outdoor pool. Breakfast is free every morning, and our free shuttle takes you directly to the airport. Drive Shack Golf Entertainment Center is right next door, and CityPlace and Palm Beach Outlets are nearby.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton West Palm Beach Central
description: Our hotel is a three-minute shuttle ride from Palm Beach International Airport, and two miles from downtown attractions like the Norton Museum of Art and Rosemary Square. Manatee Lagoon, Coral Sky Amphitheatre, and Rapids Waterpark are within eight miles. Enjoy free made-to-order breakfast and our complimentary evening reception.

name: Hampton Inn West Palm Beach Central Airport
description: We’re off I-95, three miles from Palm Beach and our free shuttle gets you to the airport in three minutes. Coral Sky Amphitheatre and Palm Beach Ballpark are each a 14-minute drive from our door. Rosemary Square is five minutes away on the shuttle where you’ll find conventions, concerts, dining, and shopping. Enjoy daily hot breakfast and WiFi on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn West Palm Beach Airport
description: We’re off I-95, with a free shuttle to and from Palm Beach International Airport. Downtown is two miles away, home to Rosemary Square, the Kravis Center, and Worth Avenue. The Ballpark of the Palm Beaches is an 11-minute drive. Our Garden Grille restaurant and bar serves breakfast and dinner, and our Pavilion Pantry is open 24 hours for drinks and snacks.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel West Palm Beach Airport
description: Find us off I-96, five minutes from Palm Beach International Airport via free shuttle. We're less than two miles from downtown West Palm Beach and CityPlace shopping and dining. Each stay begins with a warm DoubleTree cookie on arrival, and perks include our outdoor pool, landscaped tropical courtyard, and 24-hour fitness center.

name: Canopy by Hilton West Palm Beach Downtown
description: Rest comes easy in rooms and suites with Canopy-exclusive beds and local furnishings. Head for our lobby, Canopy Central, for artisanal breakfast and complimentary evening tastings of regional beer, wine, and spirits. We'll welcome you with a local gift, and our Enthusiasts can point you to popular spots and hidden gems.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Wellington
description: We're off US Highway 441, within walking distance of local dining at The Mall at Wellington Green. Palm Beach International Equestrian Center, for horse shows, is four miles away. Wake up to our free hot breakfast, then tee off at Park Ridge Golf Course, six miles, or drive 30 minutes to the waterfront and vibrant shops of West Palm Beach. WiFi is on us.

name: Hampton Inn West Palm Beach Florida Turnpike
description: We're one block from Florida's Turnpike and 15 minutes from Palm Beach International Airport and Coral Sky Amphitheatre. Palm Beach and downtown are a 20-minute drive away, and restaurants are in walking distance. Enjoy our heated outdoor pool, fitness center, free WiFi, and free hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Bradenton Downtown Historic District
description: We're just off US Highway 41, within easy walking distance of the Riverwalk. The beaches of Anna Maria Island are a 20-minute drive away, and Sarasota-Brandenton International Airport is eight miles from our door. Cool off in our outdoor pool and enjoy daily hot breakfast, WiFi, and parking on us.

name: Hampton Inn Ellenton/Bradenton
description: Find us off I-75, nestled in a quaint area with plenty to do. Ellenton Premium Outlets is a short walk away as are a variety of restaurants. We're less than 17 miles from both Bradenton and Holmes beaches, and Sarasota is a half hour south. Enjoy free WiFi, our outdoor pool, and fitness center. Be sure to make time for breakfast – it's on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Sarasota-Bradenton Airport
description: We’re off Highway 41, minutes from Sarasota-Bradenton Airport with a free shuttle both ways. The Ringling Museum of Art and the Powel Crosley Estate are within a mile, and downtown is six miles away. The Garden Grille serves breakfast and dinner, and our 24-hour Pavilion Pantry offers drinks and snacks. Enjoy free WiFi and relax in our outdoor pool.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Sarasota Bradenton Airport
description: We’re less than two miles from Sarasota Bradenton Airport and offer a free shuttle for your convenience. Start your day with a free hot breakfast before catching the waves at Siesta Key Beach or doing some shopping downtown. Bring your pets and enjoy a spacious suite, equipped with a kitchen and living area, and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Sarasota/Bradenton-Airport
description: If you're flying in or out of SRQ Airport, our free shuttle will get you where you need to be. We’re minutes from award-winning beaches and close to attractions such as the Asolo Theater and Sarasota Jungle Gardens. Our meeting space features a boardroom and a meeting room for up to 100. While you're here, benefit from free WiFi and breakfast, along with our fitness center and outdoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Sarasota/Lakewood Ranch
description: Just off I-75, we’re a short walk from shopping and dining at the Shoppes at University Center and four miles from Lakewood Ranch. The Mall at University Town Center is across the street and we’re 15 minutes from Sarasota-Bradenton International Airport. Relax by our outdoor heated pool and whirlpool, and enjoy daily free hot breakfast. WiFi’s on us.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Sarasota Lakewood Ranch
description: We're off I-75, next door to Nathan Benderson Park, favored by rowing teams, paddlers, and cyclists – ask us about rentals. The Mall at University Town Center is steps away offering a variety of shopping and dining options. Unwind at our free evening social, Monday – Wednesday, and enjoy daily free hot breakfast, our outdoor pool, and WiFi on us.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Sarasota
description: Our hotel is within walking distance of restaurants and the Sarasota Convention Center. Lido Beach, The John and Mable Ringling Museum of Art, and Sarasota-Bradenton International Airport are within a 10-minute drive. Free cooked-to-order breakfast, evening reception, and a local shuttle are included in your stay.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Sarasota
description: We're five minutes from downtown Sarasota, close to I-75 and 15 minutes from Sarasota–Bradenton International Airport. Discover world-class beaches, or take in a baseball game at the Ed Smith Stadium. Prepare your meals in your suite's fully equipped kitchen. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Sarasota - I-75 Bee Ridge
description: Our Sarasota hotel is off I-75, a short walk to several eateries. Head to The Mall at University Town Center to shop, or take in the views at Myakka River State Park, both within 10 miles. A 25-minute drive will take you to Siesta Beach. Relax in our outdoor pool and whirlpool, and enjoy free hot breakfast and free WiFi.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Sarasota I-75 Bee Ridge
description: Located just off I-75, we are 9 miles from Sarasota’s center and Siesta Key Beach. Visit Bayfront Gardens and the historic Ca’ d’Zan Mansion at The Ringling, a 20 minute drive away. For local shopping and dining, Bee Ridge Square can be found just 2.5km from the hotel. Enjoy free WiFi, complimentary breakfast and our outdoor pool.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Tampa Ybor Historic District
description: We're off I-4, walking distance to Centro Ybor and Ybor City, and two miles from downtown Tampa and The Florida Aquarium. Tampa Museum of Art can be reached in five minutes, and Busch Gardens is only nine miles from our door. Enjoy our outdoor pool and whirlpool, all-day dining in our Garden Grille & Bar, and room service from 5pm – 9pm.

name: Hampton Inn Tampa Downtown Channel District
description: Downtown Tampa is yours to explore. Hop aboard our free shuttle to check out the Florida Aquarium, events at the Tampa Convention Center, and big-name concerts and sports at Amalie Arena. We're 20 minutes from Tampa International Airport, and for cruise travelers we are the closest hotel to the Port Tampa Bay terminals. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Tampa Downtown Channel District
description: We're just 15 minutes from Tampa International Airport and mere steps from Tampa Business Center and the likes of TECO, Bank of America, and E&Y. Complimentary shuttles will whisk you anywhere within a two-mile radius, and cruise travelers will be staying at one of the closest hotels to Port Tampa Bay terminals. Fill your plate with free breakfast, grab an on-site Starbucks, and see Tampa anew from our rooftop pool.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Tampa Downtown Convention Center
description: Our waterside hotel is connected by skybridge to Tampa Convention Center. Amalie Arena is a five-minute walk away, and we're less than a mile from the Florida Aquarium and Port Tampa Bay. The TECO Line stops outside our door for downtown and Ybor City sightseeing. Enjoy free made-to-order breakfast and our complimentary evening reception.

name: Hilton Tampa Downtown
description: Find us in downtown Tampa, two blocks from the Riverwalk and half a mile from Amalie Arena and the Tampa Convention Center. The University of Tampa campus is also just half a mile away. Our rooftop pool boasts views of the surrounding area, a sundeck, and whirlpool, and we also have a 24-hour fitness center, restaurant, bar, and on-site Starbucks.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Tampa Busch Gardens Area
description: We’re next to Busch Gardens Tampa Bay and Adventure Island with discounted tickets available. Local dining is within a mile and we’re 10 minutes from The University of South Florida. Central Tampa is 8 miles away. Our shuttle runs to Busch Gardens, Moffitt Cancer Center, James A. Haley Veterans' Hospital, and USF. Enjoy hot breakfast and WiFi on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Tampa North
description: Our hotel is one minute from I-75, next to a nature preserve. As a Busch Gardens® Preferred Partner, we provide a free shuttle ride to the park and anywhere else within five miles – including Adventure Island, the University of South Florida, and nearby corporate offices. Breakfast and dinner are served daily in our Garden Grille & Bar.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Tampa USF Near Busch Gardens
description: Keep the kids happy at Adventure Island - a mile away, with Lowry Park Zoo nearby. Eat out at local restaurants or take advantage of a fully equipped in-room kitchen, complete with free WiFi and workspace. Enjoy some free breakfast before teeing off at a local golf course. Pets welcome, just remember to check out Lower Hillsborough Wilderness Preserve – they’ll love it.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Tampa USF Near Busch Gardens
description: A Busch Gardens Preferred Partner, offering free shuttle service to the amusement park five minutes away. Located on the University of South Florida campus and the USF Research Park,. Start your morning right with the free made-to-order breakfast, and later enjoy drinks and snacks at our complimentary Evening Reception.

name: Hampton Inn Dade City - Zephyrhills
description: Find us off Highway 98, walking distance from restaurants and a mile from Dade City antiques shopping. We're 20 minutes from history at Pioneer Florida Museum & Village, family fun at Giraffe Ranch, and Skydive City in Zephyrhills. You'll be 45 minutes from Tampa and Lakeland. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Port Richey
description: We're just off US-19, two miles from shops and eateries at Gulf View Square Mall. Hike, bike, or ride an airboat through Jay B. Starkey Wilderness Park, nine miles away, or enjoy a day trip to the sugar sand beaches of Clearwater. Return to relax in our pool and fitness center. Daily hot breakfast, WiFi, and parking are on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Tampa-Wesley Chapel
description: We're off I-75 in Wesley Chapel, next door to AdventHealth Center Ice skating and circled by local restaurants. Tampa Premium Outlets is less than 10 minutes from the door, and central Tampa is a 20-mile drive. We're 30 miles from Tampa International Airport. Enjoy our free hot breakfast, free WiFi, fitness center, and outdoor pool.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Tampa-Port Richey
description: Downtown Port Richey is 10 minutes away, as are the ocean vistas of the Gulf of Mexico, Beacon Woods Golf Club, and the waterways of Werner-Boyce Salt Springs State Park. Tampa is also less than an hour's drive. Start the day with free hot breakfast and join us for our free evening social Monday – Thursday.

name: Hampton Inn Crystal River, FL
description: You'll find us off Highway 19, close to several restaurants and two miles from downtown. Enjoy hiking and watersports at the Crystal River Preserve and Homosassa Springs Wildlife State Parks, and at Fort Island Gulf Beach, all within 10 miles. Or relax in our fitness center and outdoor pool. WiFi and daily hot breakfast are free.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Tampa-Wesley Chapel
description: Find us off I-75, within a couple miles of the Tampa Premium Outlets and Shops at Wiregrass. We're 25 minutes to the MIDFLORIDA Credit Union Amphitheatre and downtown Tampa. Our Garden Grille restaurant and bar serves breakfast and dinner, with room service every evening. Head for the Pavilion Pantry, open 24 hours, for drinks and snacks.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Tampa Suncoast Parkway
description: Off Suncoast Parkway, our hotel is 10 minutes from TPC Tampa Bay golf course. We're steps from dining, within 13 miles of Tampa Premium Outlets shopping and Starkey Wilderness Park and Lake Park. The highway puts us 25 miles north of downtown Tampa. Enjoy our outdoor pool, lounge deck area, and fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn Odessa Trinity
description: Our hotel is right off Florida State Road 54, near the West Pasco Industrial Park. Take some time out to enjoy Heart Pine Pond Overlook, Trinity Memorial Gardens, and the surrounding wetlands environment. Wake up to Hampton’s free hot breakfast. Free WiFi is offered throughout our hotel.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Lady Lake/The Villages
description: We’re a couple of miles from Highway 301. It’s three miles to Lake Sumter Landing’s shops, restaurants, park, and children’s playground. The historic Spanish Springs Town Square is four miles away, and you’ll find several golf courses within a few minutes too. Relax in our outdoor pool. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Cape Canaveral-Cocoa Beach
description: Port Canaveral's cruise ships are a mile away, and the Kennedy Space Center is less than 20 minutes from our door. Boeing, SpaceX, NASA, and United Launch Service are nearby. See the sunrise from one of our beaches. We offer a Tiki Bar, free WiFi, a full kitchen, free hot breakfast, and complimentary evening socials (Monday – Thursday).

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Cape Canaveral Cruise Port
description: Our Cape Canaveral hotel is under a mile from Port Canaveral Cruise Terminal, Exploration Tower, and the Florida Beer Company. Westgate Cocoa Beach Pier is a five-minute drive away and Kennedy Space Center can be reached in under 30 minutes. Enjoy free breakfast, pool and fitness center access, and our outdoor Tiki bar.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Cape Canaveral Cruise Port
description: We're located off Hwy A1A and Astronaut Boulevard, just five minutes from Port Canaveral’s cruise ships. Boeing, Lockheed Martin, SpaceX, NASA, and Kennedy Space Center are all just a 20-minute drive away and Cocoa Beach is less than five miles from our front door. Check out our free hot breakfast and poolside Tiki Bar. WiFi is on us.

name: Hampton Inn Cocoa Beach/Cape Canaveral
description: Our Cocoa Beach hotel is adjacent to the Atlantic Ocean and enjoys direct access to the beach. Ron Jon Surf Shop and several restaurants are five minutes away, and we’re under five miles from the cruise lines at Port Canaveral. Kennedy Space Center is a half-hour drive from our door. Relax in our outdoor heated mineral pool, and enjoy daily hot breakfast and WiFi on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Melbourne Viera
description: We’re off I-95, five minutes from The Avenue Viera mall for shopping, dining, and entertainment. The USSA Space Coast Stadium and Duran Golf Club are within two miles. Cocoa Village is a 20-minute drive, home to boutique shopping and weekend markets. Enjoy your in-suite kitchen, our eco-friendly saltwater pool, and free hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn Melbourne-Viera
description: Located off I-95 in Melbourne, we’re four miles from Viera, near Florida’s Space Coast. Brevard Zoo and a wide range of restaurants are within walking distance. The Shoppes at Lake Andrew are one mile away. Orlando Melbourne International Airport is a 25-minute drive. Enjoy free daily hot breakfast, WiFi. fitness center, and our outdoor pool.

name: Hilton Melbourne Beach Oceanfront
description: Find us on Florida’s Space Coast, overlooking the Atlantic Ocean with direct access to Melbourne Beach. Brevard Zoo and downtown Melbourne are both within 15 minutes, and the Kennedy Space Center is 45 minutes away. Perks include our outdoor pool, ocean-view balconies, beach chair and watersport rentals, and free three-mile shuttle.

name: Hampton Inn Titusville/I-95 Kennedy Space Center
description: We're directly off the I-95 exit ramp, 12 miles from NASA history and rocket launches at Kennedy Space Center. The American Police Hall of Fame & Museum and the Valiant Air Command Warbird Museum are 15 minutes away, and we're 24 miles from the cruise terminals at Port Canaveral. Cool off in our outdoor pool, and enjoy free hot breakfast and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites - Cape Coral/Fort Myers Area, FL
description: We're less than a mile from central Cape Coral via the parkway, passing by a variety of restaurants on the way. You'll be five minutes from Southwest Florida Military Museum and 15 minutes from Four Mile Cove Ecological Preserve. Fort Myers is 20 minutes away. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our outdoor pool.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Fort Myers Colonial Blvd
description: We're four miles from the River District and within 15 minutes of Red Sox and Twins spring training. Fort Myers beaches are just 15 miles away. Join us for free breakfast, and prep snacks in your in-suite kitchen with full-size appliances. BBQ grills and a heated outdoor pool make free time fun. WiFi's on us, and pets are our guests too.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Fort Myers-Colonial Blvd.
description: We’re five miles from the River District and 30 minutes from sunny beaches. Edison Mall and Luxe 8 Flix Cinemas are two miles away. Eastwood Golf Course is nine minutes from the hotel, and Southwest Florida International Airport is a 20-minute drive. Enjoy free daily hot breakfast and WiFi, along with our fitness center, business center, and outdoor pool.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Fort Myers
description: A short drive will bring you to Sun Splash Family Waterpark and Fort Myers Beach. Find us nestled amongst the upscale Bell Tower Shops, surrounded by restaurants. If you prefer to eat in, whip something up in your in-suite kitchen. Fill up on free breakfast daily. WiFi and evening socials, Monday – Thursday, are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Ft. Myers-Airport I-75
description: You'll find us off I-75, six miles from Southwest Florida Airport and 10 miles from central Fort Myers. The Waterfront area offers both beaches and boats to the nearby islands. We're about three miles from Boston Red Sox and Minnesota Twins spring training facilities. Cool off and relax in our outdoor pool. WiFi and daily hot breakfast are free.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Clearwater Beach
description: We’d say that sunset is the best time of the day here, with Clearwater Beach Marina’s dinner cruises and dolphin-watching, Sand Key Park and Sunsets at Pier 60 so close by, but with free breakfast… The sunrise isn’t too shabby either. We’re just ten-minutes’ drive from downtown area, Clearwater Aquarium and the Cleveland Street District. WiFi is on us, too.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Largo
description: Find us off Highway 19, one mile from Largo Medical Center and Central Park Performing Arts Center. For a small fee, bring your furry friends to stay with us. Take a 10-minute drive to sit on the beach or visit Florida Botanical Gardens. Relax in the pool, stay connected with our free WiFi, and enjoy a hot breakfast on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Largo
description: Near US-ALT 19 and FL-688, our hotel is about 15 minutes from St. Pete-Clearwater International Airport and the beach. Tampa International Airport, Clearwater Marine Aquarium, and downtown St. Petersburg are within 30 minutes. After a busy day, unwind with plenty of space, an in-suite kitchen, free WiFi, and breakfast at our hotel.

name: Hampton Inn Dunedin
description: Find us off US-19, within a five-minute drive of Honeymoon Island State Park. Reach local restaurants and microbreweries such as The Dunedin Brewery in less than 10 minutes. Westfield Countryside mall, Clearwater Beach and the Marine Aquarium are within nine miles. Enjoy a free hot breakfast and our outdoor saline pool.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Clearwater/St. Petersburg-Ulmerton Road, FL
description: We’re located in the Tampa Bay Area’s Pinellas County, five minutes from St. Pete–Clearwater International Airport. The gulf coastal beaches of Clearwater are 25 minutes away, or journey 15 minutes south to explore downtown St. Petersburg’s waterfront parks, museums, and theaters. Back at base, enjoy daily free hot breakfast, WiFi, and access to our outdoor pool and fitness center.

name: Hilton St. Petersburg Carillon Park
description: Find us in Tampa Bay, five minutes drive from Howard Frankland Bridge, and within three miles of St. Pete–Clearwater International Airport. Downtown St. Petersburg with The Dali Museum and Tropicana Field is within 10 miles of our door. Ben T Davis Beach is 15 minutes away. Enjoy our infinity pool, spa, and waterfront restaurant.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Tampa Northwest/Oldsmar
description: We keep things simple: when you’re with us, you’ll be 12 miles from Tampa Intl. Airport and St. Pete/Clearwater Airport and just two miles from the city center. Family days out are easy with Florida Aquarium, Clearwater Beach, Lowry Park Zoo and Bright House Networks Field close by. Breakfast, parking and WiFi are on us; save the cash for the Tampa Downs racetrack.

name: DoubleTree Beach Resort by Hilton Hotel Tampa Bay - North Redington Beach
description: Overlooking the Gulf of Mexico, our hotel sits on the shore of North Redington Beach between Clearwater Beach and St. Pete Beach. John's Pass Village is under 10 minutes away and St. Pete-Clearwater International airport is 15 miles from our door. Enjoy cabanas and water sports on our semi-private beach and relax at our outdoor pool and Tiki bar.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Tarpon Springs
description: Find us off Highway 19 near the shore of Lake Tarpon. We're three miles from the Sponge Docks—explore the shops and restaurants or learn about the industry at the Sponge Factory. It's five miles to Palm Harbor for golf, historic spots, and entertainment. Relax in our outdoor pool. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Clermont
description: Discover scenic lakes, sandy beaches, an award-winning winery, and Orlando attractions close to our Clermont hotel. Your eco-friendly suite is designed with you in mind: equipped with a kitchen, living area, and free WiFi. There’s room for your pets, plus we provide a free hot breakfast.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Orlando Flamingo Crossings
description: Just 10 minutes from Walt Disney World, our hotel is away from the hustle, along SR-429 and Western Way. Several golf courses and restaurants are within 10 minutes of us. Downtown Orlando and Orlando International Airport are about 27 miles away. Enjoy free parking, free WiFi, and plenty of space for everyone—including pets!—in our suites.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Orlando Flamingo Crossings
description: Just off SR-429, our hotel is only 10 minutes from the Walt Disney World west entrance. There are many restaurants and golf courses within a few minutes. Orlando International Airport and downtown attractions are about 27 miles away. Unwind after a busy day at our outdoor pool, or relax in your comfy, spacious suite with free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Leesburg/Tavares
description: We're right off US-441, across the highway from Lake Sumter State College and a mile from Lake Square Mall. Tavares businesses like AdventHealth Waterman are five miles east, while the Leesburg Regional Medical Center is six miles west. Take a swim in our outdoor pool, and get work done with free WiFi. Enjoy free hot breakfast every day.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Orlando Intl Dr N
description: We’re minutes from I-4, two miles from Universal Studios and Orange County Convention Center. SeaWorld is a 15-minute drive away, and I-Drive’s restaurants, shopping, and attractions are within walking distance. We’ve got an outdoor pool, fitness center, and free WiFi and daily hot breakfast.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Orlando International Drive I Drive 360
description: Find our Orlando Theme Park Partner hotel adjacent to the ICON Park entertainment complex, steps from International Drive. Orlando International Airport is 20 minutes away, and we’re a free shuttle ride from Walt Disney World Resort, SeaWorld, and Universal Orlando Resort. Enjoy our outdoor pool and join us for the complimentary evening reception.

name: Hampton Inn closest to Universal Orlando
description: Universal Studios® is around the corner from our hotel, and Orlando attractions are easy to reach from our location near the Florida Turnpike and I-4. Walt Disney World® and SeaWorld® are less than 15 minutes away, and our free scheduled shuttle will take you to the parks. Enjoy our outdoor pool and free hot breakfast and WiFi.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel at the Entrance to Universal Orlando
description: We’re a Universal Orlando Partner Hotel, a short walk from Universal Orlando Resort, Universal Studios Florida, The Wizarding World of Harry Potter, and Universal’s Island of Adventure. Universal’s Volcano Bay, the Orlando International Premium Outlets, and the Mall at Millenia are within two miles.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Orlando Near Universal
description: Located off I-4, minutes from shopping, dining, and entertainment on International Drive, we’re one mile from Universal Orlando™ and 20 minutes from Orlando International Airport. Fill up on daily free hot breakfast before riding our free scheduled shuttle to Universal Orlando Resort™. Enjoy free WiFi, an in-suite kitchen, and our outdoor saline pool. Pets are welcome.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Orlando International Drive North
description: We're off I-4, two miles from Universal Orlando Resort via their scheduled free shuttle. Orlando International Premium Outlets is eight minutes away. Orange County Convention Center and various corporate offices are within four miles. Enjoy our outdoor pool, whirlpool, Tiki bar, and fire pit. The Garden Grille & Bar serves breakfast, dinner, and drinks.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Orlando International Drive Convention Center
description: We're on International Drive, within 10 minutes of Universal Orlando® Resort and SeaWorld® Orlando via shuttle (fee). Orange County Convention Center is one mile away, and Disney theme park tickets are available for purchase in the lobby. Join us for complimentary evening reception, and enjoy made-to-order breakfast and our indoor and outdoor pools.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Orlando-International Drive/Convention Center
description: We're less than a mile from the Orange County Convention Center, with easy access to numerous restaurants. Walt Disney World®, SeaWorld®, and Universal Studios™ are all within 10 miles. Orlando International Airport (MCO) is just 13 miles away. Enjoy a daily free hot breakfast, complimentary evening socials (Monday – Thursday), and two-room suites with full kitchens.

name: Hampton Inn Orlando Near Universal Blv/International Dr
description: We’re off Highway 435, near I-4, and two miles from Universal Orlando Resort™. As an Official Universal Partner Hotel, we provide free scheduled shuttle service to the park and back. SeaWorld and Arnold Palmer's Bay Hill Club are within six miles. Relax in our outdoor pool, and enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi.

name: Parc Soleil by Hilton Grand Vacations
description: Off Palm Parkway, we’re within three miles of Walt Disney World, SeaWorld, and Aquatica Orlando. Universal Orlando is seven miles away. Our resort features two outdoor pools, a water slide, a kids’ activity center, tennis, basketball, and more. We have a parking garage, a grab-and-go market, and balconies with Disney firework views.

name: Hampton Inn Clewiston
description: Located on Hwy 27, we’re just two miles from Lake Okeechobee, Florida’s largest freshwater lake and the best spot to catch largemouth bass and speckled perch. Bait a hook and try your luck or explore the Lake Okeechobee Scenic Trail. Enjoy our free hot breakfast or relax on the patio by the pool. Your stay also includes WiFi, parking, a fitness center and 700 sq. ft. of meeting space.

name: Hampton Inn Okeechobee - Lake Okeechobee
description: We're next to US-70, only five miles from an entry point to Lake Okeechobee and the scenic trail around its perimeter — a prime location for boating,  freshwater fishing, hiking, and biking. Take a 30-minute drive to place your bets at the Seminole Brighton Casino. Enjoy free daily hot breakfast and stay connected with free WiFi.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Port St. Lucie-Tradition
description: We’re off I-95, under a mile from the shops and restaurants of Tradition Square. PGA Golf Club and First Data Field are 15 minutes away. Port St. Lucie Botanical Gardens is within 10 miles. Enjoy dinner in your in-suite kitchen and complimentary evening social – Monday to Friday. WiFi and free daily hot breakfast are on us.

name: Hilton Melbourne, FL
description: Find us along Florida's sunny Space Coast, 10 minutes from Melbourne Beach. Stay less than a mile from Orlando Melbourne Airport before setting sail from the Port Canaveral cruise port — it's easy to reach from our location near US Route 1. Our hotel features a basketball court, tennis court, fitness center, and outdoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn Melbourne
description: We're just off I-95, nine miles from the beach and under four miles from companies like Harris Corporation and Nuance. It's 15 minutes to the Florida Institute of Technology and Orlando Melbourne International Airport. Take the team to Rodes Park five miles away. Escape the heat in our outdoor pool, and enjoy free hot breakfast and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Ft. Lauderdale-Cypress Creek
description: Sun, sea and over seven miles of coastline are yours, alongside boating, wind-surfing and diving to explore shipwrecks and beautiful reefs. Enjoy free WiFi and breakfast, but don’t miss the beach promenade, bursting with shops and restaurants and fringed by the award-winning ‘wave wall’. Just a mile from FXE Airport, your vacation can begin the moment you land.

name: Hampton Inn Fort Lauderdale Pompano Beach
description: We’re in Pompano Beach, just off Highway 1. Cypress Creek Business District and I-95 are four miles away. Catch a show at the Amphitheater, a mile away, or walk on the beach, 10 minutes from us. Learn scuba at the South Florida Diving Headquarters. It's 20 minutes to Fort Lauderdale. Unwind in our heated outdoor pool. Hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Hampton Inn Ft. Lauderdale-Commercial Blvd.
description: Find us off the Florida Turnpike, steps from Sunshine Plaza restaurants and retailers. Riverwalk Fort Lauderdale shops and Fort Lauderdale Beach are within half an hour of our hotel. We're 40 minutes from Miami International Airport. Our fitness center, outdoor pool, and free hot breakfast and WiFi complete your stay.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Ft. Lauderdale West-Sawgrass/Tamarac, FL
description: Located off Sawgrass Expressway in Tamarac, we're 30 minutes from downtown Fort Lauderdale, beach areas, and Fort Lauderdale-Hollywood Airport. BB&T Center and Sawgrass Mills mall are five miles away. The Florida Panthers IceDen and Seminole Casino Coconut Creek are 15 minutes' drive. Enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi, along with our fitness center and pool.

name: The Gabriel Miami, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: Find us by I-395/Highway 1, overlooking Biscayne Bay and Maurice A. Ferré Park. We're within a half-mile of AmericanAirlines Arena and 10 minutes from downtown Miami. Relax with a spa and sauna, 24-hour fitness center, and weekend yoga classes. We boast courtyard and rooftop pools, and our library-style lounge features an eclectic mix of books.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Miami/Brickell-Downtown
description: Off I-95, we're in walking distance of restaurants. The free metromover for exploring downtown and Brickell is a half-block away. Miami International Airport, Port of Miami, and the beach are within a 15-minute drive. We’ve got a parking garage, rooftop pool, and fitness center. Free WiFi and daily hot breakfast complete your stay.

name: Conrad Miami
description: We’re located on Brickell Avenue, off I-95 and a mile from Downtown Miami. We’re a short walk from local bars and restaurants and the Port of Miami is 15 minutes away. South Beach and the Miami Beach Convention Center are within 10 miles, and Miami International Airport is 25 minutes from our door. Enjoy our outdoor pool and fitness center.

name: Hilton Miami Downtown
description: Looking out over Biscayne Bay, we're a mile from the AmericanAirlines Arena and Bayside Marketplace. South Beach and the Port of Miami are within a 10-minute drive. Explore all of downtown with the free Metromover, which stops around the corner. Every room features floor-to-ceiling windows, and the rooftop pool and bar boast sunset and skyline views.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Miami Downtown/Brickell
description: We're near downtown Miami, with easy access to Mary Brickell Village's unique restaurants and attractions. Ride the free Metromover to Bayside MarketPlace and to American Airlines Arena for a concert or Miami Heat game. The beautiful shores and exciting nightlife of Miami Beach are just eight miles east. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast and evening socials, Monday – Thursday.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Miami Brickell South
description: Discover downtown Miami and Brickell financial district by hopping on a free city trolley, just steps from our door. With US 1 highway close by, we're within eight miles of South Beach and Key Biscayne and less than a 15-minute drive from Port of Miami cruise terminals. We have a 24-hour fitness center and an outdoor pool and patio area.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Miami Midtown
description: Find us on Biscayne Boulevard, near I-95 and I-195. We’re in the Design District, a mile from the street art at Wynwood Walls, and three miles from downtown. Within six miles you'll find the cruise port terminal, the airport, Miami Beach, and the convention center. Relax in our outdoor pool. Hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Hampton Inn Miami-Coconut Grove/Coral Gables
description: We're one block from US-1 and the Coconut Grove Metrorail station, giving you easy access to the University of Miami, the Shops at Merrick Park, and downtown, all within four miles. Tour Vizcaya Museum & Gardens two miles away, or discover authentic Cuban culture in Little Havana, three miles north. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our outdoor pool.

name: Hilton Grand Vacations at McAlpin-Ocean Plaza
description: On Ocean Drive, across from Lummus Park Beach, our Art Deco hotel is a registered historic site. South Beach and Lincoln Road Mall are in walking distance, and we're a mile from the Miami Beach Convention Center. Miami International Airport is 10 miles away. Our hotel has a rooftop deck and whirlpool, suites with full kitchens, and a fitness center.

name: Gale South Beach, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: Just a block from the beach and Lincoln Road, our 1941 building fuses Art Deco nostalgia and contemporary design. Our hotel features a rooftop pool deck, award-winning dining, and a plush cocktail bar. Enjoy complimentary access to the beach club at our sister property, the Shelborne Hotel.

name: Hampton Inn Miami South Beach - 17th Street
description: On the corner of the A1A/17th Street, we're one block from beachfront relaxation. Our neighborhood offers plenty of dining, and the Miami Beach Convention Center and Lincoln Road Mall are within a half-mile. Enjoy our 1700 Bar & Lounge, rooftop pool, and 24-hour Suite Shop. Your stay also includes hot breakfast and WiFi on us.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Miami International Airport
description: Our suites are three miles from Miami International Airport via free 24-hour shuttle. PortMiami and downtown are within 20 minutes. We have shuttle options to the cruise port, local attractions, Dolphin Mall, and more. Enjoy our outdoor pool and deck, free made-to-order breakfast, and complimentary evening reception.

name: The Gates Hotel South Beach - a DoubleTree by Hilton
description: We’re on Collins Avenue, blocks from the beach via free shuttle. Lincoln Road shopping, Ocean Drive, and the free South Beach trolley are in walking distance. Enjoy our outdoor pool, spa services, fitness center, and a warm DoubleTree cookie at check-in. The cruise port is six miles away, and we’re 12 miles from Miami Airport.

name: Hampton Inn Miami Airport East
description: We're just off Route 953, three miles from Miami International Airport, where you can take our free shuttle. The University of Miami, American Airlines Arena and the shops and sidewalk cafés of Coconut Grove are all around a 20-minute drive from us. Miami Beach is 10 miles away. Refresh in our outdoor pool and enjoy daily hot breakfast and WiFi on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Miami South Beach
description: The beach and the boardwalk are one block from our hotel in the Collins Waterfront Historic District. A short walk will take you to numerous restaurants and bars. Miami Beach Convention Center, Lincoln Road Mall, and a wide selection of clubs are within a mile. Sleep well in our soundproofed rooms.

name: Hampton Inn Miami Beach - Mid Beach
description: We're only one block from the relaxing surf and soft sand of Miami Beach. Spend your days relaxing in the sun, shopping, and dining nearby and at our own Piola Restaurant. Experience South Beach's famous nightlife, only a three-mile trip away. It's just 10 miles to Miami International Airport (MIA). Enjoy free hot breakfast daily and WiFi.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Miami-Airport/Blue Lagoon
description: We're surrounded by the serene waters of the Blue Lagoon, right next to Miami International Airport (MIA) and just 8.9 miles to the Port of Miami. Take advantage of our free shuttle to anywhere within two miles (including the airport). Many dining and shopping options are within five miles. During your stay, enjoy daily free hot breakfast and free WiFi.
streetAddress: 5500 Blue Lagoon Drive Waterford Office Park

name: Hampton Inn Crestview South  I-10
description: Find us off I-10, half an hour from Florida's Gulf Coast beaches. Twin Hills Park and Peaden Brothers Distillery are seven minutes away, and a 15-minute drive will take you to the Emerald Coast Zoo. Start the day with free hot breakfast and enjoy a variety of restaurants within a mile of our hotel. Unwind by our outdoor pool and stay connected with free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Niceville-Eglin Air Force Base
description: You’ll find us just three miles from Niceville, next to the Rocky Bayou. It’s a great spot for swimming, fishing, boating and hiking. We’re about 20 minutes from Northwest Florida Regional Airport, and 15 from Eglin Air Force Base. You can learn about the base’s history at the adjacent Air Force Armament Museum. Our WiFi and hot breakfast are free.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Mary Esther-Fort Walton Beach
description: Find us a half-mile off Highway 98, 10 minutes from Fort Walton Beach. We're  steps from Santa Rosa Mall and less than 10 minutes from Hurlburt Field Air Force Base. Free hot breakfast is an ideal start for Navarre Beach days on Santa Rosa Island, 20 minutes away. Enjoy free WiFi, an outdoor pool, and our 24-hour fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn Ft. Walton Beach
description: We're right on the beach, and every room has a private patio or a balcony. Several restaurants are within walking distance, offering fresh seafood, and the Emerald Coast Convention Center is two minutes away. Dolphins at Gulfarium Marine Adventure Park are half a mile east. Relax any season in our heated outdoor pool. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Ft. Walton Beach
description: Explore Okaloosa Island from our beachfront hotel, 10 minutes from central Fort Walton Beach. We're across the road from Emerald Coast Convention Center, next door to Gulfarium Marine Adventure Park, and a half-mile from Okaloosa Island Pier. We have meeting space with Gulf views for up to 500 guests, an outdoor lazy river, and a tiki bar.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Destin
description: Relax at nearby public beaches or seek adventure at The Track, boasting go-karts, thrill rides and bumper boats. Kids love Big Kahuna’s Water & Adventure Park, while parents can indulge in local Gulf-inspired cuisine. Or, if you feel like a cozy night, cook in your own in-suite kitchen. WiFi and breakfast are on us, and pets are welcome.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Destin
description: We're on US-98, a five-minute walk from the beach. Family fun at Big Kahuna's Water & Adventure Park is 10 minutes west, and dozens of restaurants line the highway in both directions. The shops at Destin Commons are three miles away. Relax in our zero-entry outdoor saltwater pool and enjoy our fitness center. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Destin-Sandestin Area
description: We're right off US-98, five minutes from the white sands of Miramar Beach and walking distance from restaurants. Shopping at Silver Sands Premium Outlets is right across the highway. Take the family to Big Kahuna's Water & Adventure Park eight miles west. Relax and cool off in our outdoor pool, and enjoy free hot breakfast and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Navarre
description: Find us on the Emerald Coast, halfway between Fort Walton Beach and Pensacola. Gulf Coast seafood and Florida fun are easy to reach from our Highway 98 location, and Navarre Beach is four miles from our door. Santa Rosa Island and the Gulf Breeze Zoo are within 11 miles. Cool off in our outdoor pool, and enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Ocala - Belleview
description: We're just off I-75, moments from several restaurants and a mile from the Don Garlits Museum of Drag Racing. Go for a ride at the Florida Horse Park and Gypsy Gold Horse Farm, both eight minutes away. Putt around at Royal Oaks Golf Club, 15 minutes away, or stay active in our fitness center. We've got WiFi and hot breakfast covered.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Ocala at Heath Brook
description: Central Ocala and Historic Downtown Square are just over five miles away. With Ocala International Airport 10 minutes away, and Market Street shopping on the doorstep, we’re ideal for extended stays. West Marion Community Hospital is across the highway. WiFi, breakfast and evening socials, Monday – Thursday, are free. Make the most of your in-suite kitchen while you’re here.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Ocala
description: Find us off I-75, two miles from the College of Central Florida and Paddock Mall. A 10-minute drive will take you to shopping and dining in Ocala Downtown Square. Sholom Park and Appleton Museum of Art are within nine miles. Start your day with our hot breakfast – it's free, just like our WiFi.

name: Hilton Ocala
description: Find our hotel in the heart of Florida’s horse country. Set on six acres of land, guests are invited to meet our resident Clydesdale Buddy before hanging out by the resort-style outdoor pool. We grow our own ingredients for Market Kitchen & Bar in the Chef’s Garden and offer yoga classes at The Reserve.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Ocala Downtown
description: We are located on the way to Ocala National Forest, right off Hwy 40. Enjoy the many restaurants that Historic Downtown Ocala and nearby Tuscawilla Historic District have to offer. The Ocala Civic Center is a great place to catch a local show. Relax in our two levels of outdoor terrace space. We also have an outdoor and indoor bar to grab a drink or bite to eat.

name: Hampton Inn Ft. Lauderdale Airport North Cruise Port
description: We're off Highway 84, near I-95, six miles from Fort Lauderdale International Airport and Port Everglades cruise terminal – ride our shuttle for ease. Southland Shopping Center and nearby bites are in walking distance, and the convention center is 10 minutes away. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our fitness center and indoor pool.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Fort Lauderdale 17th Street
description: Our Fort Lauderdale suites are blocks from the Broward County Convention Center and two miles from the beach. The Sun Trolley, with routes across the whole neighborhood, stops right outside our hotel. We have an outdoor pool, patio, and discounted shuttles to and from Fort Lauderdale-Hollywood Airport and the cruise port. A free cooked-to-order breakfast is served daily.

name: Bahia Mar Fort Lauderdale Beach - a DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel
description: We're next to the Fort Lauderdale beach, half a mile south of East Las Olas Boulevard. It's a four-mile drive to the cruise terminals at Port Everglades. We offer several aquatic adventures including sightseeing cruises, deep sea fishing, and scuba diving. Explore the Jungle Queen steamboat and lounge by our rooftop pool.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Orlando-South Lake Buena Vista
description: Find us off I-4 in Kissimmee. A Disney Good Neighbor hotel, we offer scheduled shuttle service to Walt Disney World® Resort, just three miles away. Two premium outlet malls are within five miles of our hotel, and Discovery Cove and SeaWorld are a half hour away. Enjoy free WiFi and hot breakfast, and our outdoor pool and whirlpool.

name: DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Orlando - Disney Springs™ Area
description: We're an official Walt Disney World® hotel located just one mile away from shopping, dining, and entertainment at Disney Springs®. We offer advanced tee times and discounts at four nearby PGA golf courses. Enjoy our pool, whirlpool, splash pad, tennis court, and fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn Kissimmee North
description: Just off US-441, we are within two miles of several restaurants and shops at The Crosslands and Loop West. Gatorland Amusement Park is just five minutes away. Orlando International Airport, Walt Disney World, and Universal Studios are all within 16 miles of our hotel. We have a fitness center, outdoor pool, meeting space, and on-site dining at First Watch Café.

name: Hilton Grand Vacations at Tuscany Village
description: Find us between Walt Disney World, Disney Springs, Universal Orlando, SeaWorld Orlando, and Aquatica. We have a shuttle to the parks, and the I-Ride Trolley stops just outside our door. Orlando Vineland Premium Outlets is next door, connected by a private gate. Enjoy our two pools, poolside movies, sports courts, kids’ activity center, and lakeside trails.

name: Hampton Inn Orlando/Lake Buena Vista
description: Find us off I-4, in the Lake Buena Vista area. We're less than two miles from Walt Disney World® – purchase tickets in our lobby and schedule our free shuttle, also covering Universal Orlando™. Orlando Premium Outlets, SeaWorld®, and Discovery Cove are within three miles. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our outdoor pool.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Orlando / International Drive South
description: Explore International Drive from your Home2 base. Enjoy great access to Walt Disney World Resort, Universal Orlando, SeaWorld, plus our free Disney shuttle bus. Ten miles away, you’ll find Gatorland to the east and the Holy Land Experience to the north. Start the day with free breakfast and finish it with some in-suite cooking. The WiFi's free and your pets are welcome.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Lake Buena Vista/Orlando
description: Walt Disney World® and SeaWorld® are both within four miles, and it's seven miles to Universal Orlando – our free shuttle will take you there. Head 15 minutes to Orange County Convention Center, and reach the airport in 14 miles. Breakfast and dinner are served daily in our Great American Grill. Enjoy our large outdoor pool and free WiFi.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Lake Buena Vista - Orlando
description: Our quiet location is an easy 10-minute drive to both Walt Disney World® and SeaWorld®. Find great bargains right across the highway at the Orlando Vineland Premium Outlets. Plenty of family-friendly restaurant options are close by. Enjoy free daily hot breakfast, free WiFi, and a full in-suite kitchen.

name: Hampton Inn Daytona Beach/Beachfront
description: We're on the Daytona Beachfront, a mile from the Boardwalk and Ocean Walk Shoppes. The Ocean Center and Main Street are five minutes from our door. Our outdoor pool has views of the Atlantic, grab a bite or enjoy a drink at our poolside Tiki Bar. WiFi, daily hot breakfast, and parking are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Daytona Speedway-Airport
description: Find us off I-95. We’re a mile from Daytona Beach International Airport and within walking distance of Daytona International Speedway. Volusia Mall and the University of Central Florida are within six minutes. Spend a day at the beach, just four miles from our doorstep. Start your day with our hot breakfast – it’s free, just like our WiFi.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Daytona Beach Speedway-Airport
description: We’re adjacent to racing action and one mile from Daytona Beach International Airport. Walk to Volusia Mall, NASCAR Headquarters, and One Daytona—an epicenter for shops, restaurants, and entertainment. Dine in using the kitchen in your suite. We offer free evening socials, Monday – Thursday. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Daytona Beach Oceanfront
description: The white sands and surf of Daytona Beach are just beyond our back door. You'll find stores and restaurants across the road at Bellair Plaza. The boardwalk, Daytona Lagoon, and conventions at the Ocean Center are all three miles away. Cooked-to-order breakfast, lunch, and dinner are served daily at our Garden Grille & Bar. WiFi's on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Daytona Beach Speedway
description: Off I-95, we’re across the street from Daytona International Speedway and a mile from NASCAR HQ. Embry-Riddle Aeronautical University and Daytona State College are both five minutes away, and Daytona Beach International Airport is two miles from our door. Enjoy an in-suite kitchen, daily free hot breakfast, and our outdoor pool. WiFi's on us and pets are welcome.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Ormond Beach Oceanfront
description: Our all-suite beachfront hotel is in the Ormond Beach area along State Road A1A. Enjoy shopping at Beach Village Gift Shop and Ellinor Village Shopping Center, both five minutes' walk away. A variety of local eateries and fast food restaurants are located within a half-mile. Our outdoor pool deck features a heated saline pool, whirlpool spa, and a fire pit area.

name: Hampton Inn Daytona Shores-Oceanfront
description: We're just off State Road A1A, right on the beach, within walking distance of restaurants. The Ocean Center and Daytona Beach Golf Club are both around five miles away. For racing thrills, Daytona International Speedway is less than 20 minutes from our door. Relax on our oceanfront pool deck, and enjoy daily hot breakfast and WiFi on us.

name: Hampton Inn Daytona/Ormond Beach
description: We're just off I-95, eight miles from Daytona Beach International Airport, the International Speedway, and the LPGA International golf course. Oceanside fun at Ormond Beach is six miles east, and you'll find several places to eat across the highway. AdventHealth Daytona Beach is five minutes away. Start your morning off right with free hot breakfast. WiFi is on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Deland
description: We're right where US-17 and US-92 meet, six minutes north of Stetson University and downtown DeLand. It's four miles to guided tours at Stetson Mansion, the home of the designer of the famous hat. Take the team to DeLand Little League Fields, Spec Martin Stadium, or Melching Field, three miles away. Start morning right with free hot breakfast. WiFi is on us.

name: Hampton Inn Debary/Deltona
description: Reach us off I-4, 20 minutes from Stetson University. Free hot breakfast is fuel for sandy days at Daytona Beach, half an hour from our door. We’re the closest hotel to Debary Sunrail Station, just five minutes away, where you can catch a train and be in Orlando in less than an hour. Ask us about our Orlando Airport shuttle. WiFi’s on us, and pets are welcome.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Destin Miramar Beach
description: Our hotel offers access to a private beach, and is within three miles of Silver Sands Premium Outlet and world-class golf courses such as The Links. Baytowne Wharf, Big Kahuna’s Water Park, and The Track are less than a 20-minute drive away. Our made-to-order breakfast, outdoor pool, and evening reception complete your stay.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Destin Miramar Beach
description: Located off Highway 98, our hotel offers direct access to Miramar Beach and the clear waters of the Gulf of Mexico. Enjoy world class golf, parasailing, and fishing all within a short distance. Explore some unmissable discounts at Silver Sands Premium Outlets, less than 5 minutes away. Relax with complimentary WiFi and our outdoor pool.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Miami Doral West Airport
description: Find us just eight miles from MIA Airport – easily accessible with our free shuttle. Dolphin Mall and Miami International Mall can be reached in six minutes by car. Downtown and CityPlace Doral are both within a 10-minute drive. We’re only 1.5 miles to Jackson Memorial. Enjoy free WiFi and a heated outdoor pool at our pet-friendly hotel. Breakfast's on us.

name: Hampton Inn Miami-Airport West
description: We're in the Doral area, five miles from Miami International Airport with a daily free airport shuttle (5:00 AM - 1:00 AM). Three malls are within 15 minutes, and Miami Beach and the cruise port are a half-hour away. We've got free parking, an outdoor pool, and fitness center. Free WiFi and daily hot breakfast are included with every stay.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Miami-Doral/Dolphin Mall
description: Located off Ronald Reagan Turnpike in Doral, we’re walking distance from Miami Dade College – West Campus and two miles from Dolphin Mall. Miami International Airport and the University of Miami are less than 20 minutes away, and downtown Miami is a 16-mile drive. Enjoy free daily hot breakfast and free WiFi.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Miami Dolphin Mall
description: We're next to Dolphin Mall, four miles from the International Conference Center and Florida International University. Miami International Airport and downtown are within 14 miles. Our restaurant, Bar Flamenco, serves tapas and craft cocktails every evening. Our Pavilion Pantry is open 24 hours for drinks and snacks.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Miami Dolphin Mall
description: The excitement of downtown Miami is just 20 minutes away. Closer to home, you'll have Dolphin Mall steps away and Miami International Mall within a mile. Fill up on free breakfast before teeing off at Costa Del Sol Golf Club, and finish the day at our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday. Make the most of free WiFi and your in-suite kitchen.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Miami Airport West
description: Flights at Miami International Airport are a 15-minute drive away, and we offer free parking. We're 12 miles from cruise ships at Port Miami. Florida International University, Hialeah Park Racing & Casino, and Miami International Mall are all within seven miles. Breakfast, lunch, and dinner are served daily in our Great American Grill.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Miami - Airport West
description: We're minutes away from Miami International Airport. Located near Palmetto Expressway and NW 36th Street, we're a convenient base for exploring the city. Enjoy access to our outdoor pool and basketball court, or join us for an evening social (Monday – Thursday). Your stay includes free WiFi, daily hot breakfast, and your own kitchen.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Miami-Airport South-Blue Lagoon
description: Our hotel is 10 minutes from Miami Airport via free shuttle – also covering Waterford Business Park at Blue Lagoon. Local bites are in walking distance, and we're within 12 miles of the city center, Port of Miami, and Miami Beach. Wake up to free hot breakfast and enjoy our free WiFi, fitness center, and outdoor pool and whirlpool.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Tampa Rocky Point Waterfront
description: Connected by the causeway, our location puts Clearwater Beach and downtown Tampa in easy reach. We're a 10-minute shuttle ride from Tampa International Airport. Watch bayside sunsets from your room, and enjoy the view from our waterfront grill. Every stay starts with our signature warm chocolate chip cookie.

name: Hampton Inn Tampa/Rocky Point-Airport
description: Find us off Highway 60, four miles from the Tampa International Airport, which you can reach with our free shuttle. International Plaza and Bay Street, and Westshore business district, are less than four miles away. Tampa Convention Center is a 13-minute drive. Enjoy free daily hot breakfast and WiFi, along with our outdoor pool.

name: Hilton St. Petersburg Bayfront
description: Find us at the heart of St. Petersburg Waterfront District, across from the Salvador Dali Museum and Al Lang Stadium. The downtown trolley passes by our door, providing links to Tropicana Field stadium. Our palm-lined courtyard is home to a heated pool, and we boast a 24-hour fitness center. Cure cravings at our Starbucks® and 24-hour snack store.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites St. Petersburg/Downtown
description: Find us between I-175 and I-375, one block from the Tampa Bay and a five-minute walk from Al Lang Stadium and Sundial St. Pete. See a show at Mahaffey Theater and Jannus Live, or visit the Dali Museum—all under a mile away. St. Pete Beach is nine miles from our door. Enjoy our outdoor pool and fitness center. We've got hot breakfast and WiFi covered.

name: Tru by Hilton St. Petersburg Downtown Central Ave
description: Our hotel is off I-275 and U.S. Route 19 Alternate on the corner of the Grand Central and Edge Districts of St. Petersburg, Florida. Visit Museums such as the Chihuly Collection and the Dali. Visit the gulf beaches located seven miles from the hotel. Enjoy the craft beer scene – Along St.Pete’s Central Avenue visit independent breweries crafting artisanal beers unavailable anywhere else.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Amelia Island-Historic Harbor Front
description: We’re in downtown Amelia Island, overlooking the Fernandina Beach Marina. Amelia River cruises and carriage tours are a short walk away and we’re a half-mile from shops, bars, and restaurants. The Amelia Island Lighthouse is under 10 minutes from our door. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our outdoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn Amelia Island at Fernandina Beach
description: We're less than 15 miles from I-95 and in walking distance from the beach and seafood restaurants. Fort Clinch State Park is a five-minute drive away, and historic Fernandina Beach—known for its pirating past and Victorian architecture—is 10 minutes from the hotel. Daily hot breakfast, WiFi, and use of our outdoor pool are free.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Fernandina Beach Amelia Island
description: We're in historic Fernandina Beach, a quick walk from local restaurants and a 10-minute stroll to the Atlantic coast. Check out downtown, a five-minute drive from us, home to museums, an art gallery, distillery, and riverfront dining. Jacksonville Airport is 35 minutes away. Free breakfast awaits at our hotel, plus an outdoor saline pool.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Jacksonville Airport
description: We're two miles from Jacksonville International Airport, and offer a free shuttle both ways. The River City Marketplace mall is a mile from our hotel. Downtown Jacksonville is 15 minutes away along I-95. Relax in our outdoor pool. Our restaurant serves breakfast and dinner, and 24-hour Pavilion Pantry offers drinks, snacks, and ready-to-cook meals.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Jacksonville Airport
description: With quick access to I-95 and Loop 295, our all-suite hotel is less than three miles from Jacksonville International Airport. An array of eateries and shops are just across the highway at River City Marketplace. Our spacious suites are pet-friendly and always include free WiFi and free breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Jacksonville-Airport
description: Find us off I-95, six minutes from Jacksonville International Airport on our free shuttle. The Jacksonville Zoo & Gardens and Jaguars games and events at TIAA Bank Field are within 20 minutes, and the beach is just a half-hour drive away. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our outdoor pool.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Jacksonville Airport
description: As the closest hotel to Jacksonville Airport, we're walking distance from departures and offer a 24-hour shuttle both ways. Our rooms are within 10 minutes of River City Marketplace and nine miles from Jacksonville Zoo and Gardens. A warm DoubleTree cookie welcomes you to the hotel, and perks include our outdoor saltwater pool and 24-hour fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn Jacksonville East Regency Square
description: We’re located off I-295, just over five minutes from retail therapy at Regency Square Mall. Jacksonville University and the University of North Florida are seven miles away. Get to Naval Station Mayport, Jacksonville International Airport, and Atlantic Beach, all within about 25 minutes of our hotel. WiFi and hot breakfast are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Jacksonville Beach/Oceanfront
description: Jacksonville Beach is just beyond our back door, and we've got a heated lagoon-style pool with four waterfalls and a whirlpool grotto. Dine here at Tides Beach Bar and Grille and Waterfalls Lounge, or discover many restaurants within a mile. Mayport Naval Station and the University of North Florida are within 10 miles. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Jacksonville Riverfront
description: We're a short stroll from the Southbank Riverwalk, Friendship Fountain, and the ‘Blue Bridge’ to downtown. TIAA Bank Field, two miles away, is easily reached by water taxis that pick-up moments from our door. Perks include our riverside pool, sundeck, two restaurants, and a warm DoubleTree cookie on arrival.

name: Hampton Inn Jacksonville-Downtown-I-95
description: We're right off I-95, moments from offices, restaurants, hospitals, and the MOSH museum in Jacksonville's Southbank. It's a quick car, train, or water taxi ride to Jaguars football, concerts at VyStar Veterans Memorial Arena, and the Osborne Convention Center downtown. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our outdoor pool.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Jacksonville Downtown Southbank
description: Access Southbank and downtown Jacksonville with a short covered walk to the Kings Avenue Skyway Station – the train stops near Prudential, EverBank, BB&T, and Times Union Center. Jaguars pro football games at TIAA Bank Field are four miles away. Breakfast and dinner are served daily in our Garden Grille & Bar. Enjoy a drink in our on-site lounge, Bar 1201.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Jacksonville Downtown-Southbank
description: Discover downtown Jacksonville delights, minutes from the door. We're near Metropolitan Park, football at TIAA Bank Field, and shows at the Florida Theatre. Kick off the day with free breakfast and a stroll along the Southbank Riverwalk. Finish it at our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday, or with a home-cooked meal in your suite. WiFi's on us.

name: Tru by Hilton Florida City
description: Our new Tru is the perfect base to explore nearby Everglades National Park and Biscayne National Park. Check out the Coral Castle, local fruit stands and Homestead-Miami Speedway. Enjoy a big, bright bathroom, great bed, large HDTV with premium channels, free WiFi and free breakfast.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Florida City, FL
description: With Biscayne Bay to the east and Everglades National Park to the west, we're your perfect home base for Florida fun. Our suites offer plenty of space to spread out, with a kitchen and separate areas for work and sleep. Be sure to take advantage of our saline pool, fitness center, and 24-hour market. Breakfast and WiFi are free, and pets are welcome.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Miami-South/Homestead
description: We're right off Highway 1 and easy to reach by the Florida Turnpike. Homestead attractions like the Homestead-Miami Speedway, Coral Castle Museum, and Florida Keys Outlet are within four miles of our door – and Biscayne Bay is 15 minutes away. Enjoy our fitness center and outdoor pool. We’ve got hot breakfast and WiFi covered.

name: Hilton Miami Dadeland
