description: Our hotel is off Route 94, next door to the Baptist Hospital campus. We're within 10 minutes of Dadeland Mall and Dadeland South Metro Station, providing easy links to central Miami. Stay active with lakeside trails and a fitness center. Our wellness center features yoga, Pilates, and massages, and we have an outdoor heated pool.

name: Hampton Inn Miami Dadeland
description: We're two blocks from US Highway 1, two miles from the University of Miami, and our free shuttle will take you to Baptist Hospital, Saks Fifth Avenue, and Macy's. Explore Coconut Grove, or swim at Matheson Hammock Park, both 15 minutes' drive away. Miami Beach is 17 miles from us. Unwind in our pool, and enjoy daily hot breakfast and WiFi on us.

name: Hampton Inn Key Largo, FL
description: Off the Overseas Highway, we've got a private beach, outdoor pool, and Tiki bar. John Pennekamp Coral Reef State Park, home to America's only living coral reef, is a half-mile away, and Everglades National Park is a 45-minute drive. WiFi, daily hot breakfast, parking, and fitness center access are included with your stay.

name: Hampton Inn Ft. Lauderdale/Downtown Las Olas Area
description: We’re off I-95, a half mile from the shops and restaurants of Las Olas Boulevard, and 15 minutes from Fort Lauderdale/Hollywood International Airport and Port Everglades. Enjoy our fitness center, bar and restaurant, and outdoor pool. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Tru by Hilton Fort Lauderdale Downtown-Flagler Village
description: Our vibrant new hotel is centered in downtown Fort Lauderdale, just off Broward Boulevard. We're within a mile of the performing arts center, several museums, and a ton of restaurants, and just four miles from the beach. Hang out at the 5th floor Pool Bar or host a meeting for up to 75 people. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Fort Lauderdale Downtown Flagler Village
description: Stay close to Flagler Village Arts District, downtown shops, and restaurants at our new all-suite hotel in Ft. Lauderdale. We are just four minutes from the beach and surrounded by museums, attractions, and corporate offices. Chill out with great views of the city at our 5th floor Pool Bar. Pets are always welcome, and breakfast and WiFi are included.

name: GALLERYone - a DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel
description: Our hotel is on the intracoastal waterway, less than a five-minute walk from Galleria Fort Lauderdale. The beach is a half-mile east and it's a five-mile drive to conventions and cruises at Port Everglades. The water taxi stops at our hotel, giving you easy access to hotspots like Las Olas Boulevard. Relax in our waterfront outdoor pool.

name: Conrad Fort Lauderdale Beach
description: Between Sunrise and Las Olas boulevards, our suites are steps from North Beach. Your stay includes two beach chairs and an umbrella, beach staff service, morning yoga, and free-to-borrow bikes. Experience our five dining options, pool with private cabanas, Conrad spa, and fitness center with professional trainers.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Ft. Pierce
description: We’re just five miles from downtown Fort Pierce and the city marina. Enjoy easy access to the Atlantic coast, I-95, and the Florida Turnpike. Beaches and attractions like the Manatee Observation & Education Center and Navy SEAL Museum are within 15 minutes of our door. Enjoy our outdoor pool, fitness center, and free WiFi and hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Port St. Lucie, West
description: We're off I-95, less than two miles from PGA Village. Enjoy our free hot breakfast before a lesson at the PGA Learning Center, then tee off on one of the courses. The hotel is steps from restaurants and a farmers market, and Town Center shops are across the street. Check out spring training at First Data Field or head 35 minutes to Vero Beach to surf and kayak. WiFi is on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn at PGA Village/Port St. Lucie
description: Our Port St. Lucie hotel is easy to reach via I-95 – for swinging clubs at nearby PGA Village, and swinging bats at the New York Mets' spring training home two miles away. We have an outdoor pool, and Treasure Coast beaches are within a half-hour drive. Sam Snead's Oak Grill & Tavern serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Vero Beach Downtown
description: Find us off Highway 1, less than three miles from area beaches and a short walk from Miracle Mile Plaza. Head to Vero Beach Fashion Outlets and Indian River Mall for bargains – both within nine miles. Vero Beach Regional Airport is a 10-minute drive away. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our outdoor pool and fitness center.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Stuart
description: Make your next stay in Stuart, Florida a great one by staying with us. We are right off Hwy 1 in the North River Shores area. We are also a great option when visiting Jensen Beach Park. Enjoy canoeing or paddling at the nearby St. Lucie River. Explore a variety of dining and entertainment options in Downtown Stuart, across the river.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Stuart-North
description: We're just off US 1 in North Stuart, five minutes from Treasure Coast Square shopping and Riverwalk dining by the St. Lucie River. We're 15 minutes from Jensen and Stuart beaches, home to the Florida Oceanographic Coastal Center. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our outdoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn Vero Beach
description: We are adjacent to the Vero Beach Outlets, right off I-95. Vero Beach attractions – including the McKee Botanical Garden, Vista Plantation Golf Club, and Historic Dodgertown – are within 15 minutes of our hotel. Cool off in our outdoor pool, or head to the beach – it's just 20 minutes away. Enjoy free WiFi and our free hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Gainesville-Downtown
description: We're 10 minutes from Gator games and events at the University of Florida, and four miles from the Florida Museum of Natural History and the Harn Museum of Art. Local restaurants and bars are an easy walk away, including Harry's Seafood Bar & Grille across the street. Relax in our outdoor saltwater pool and whirlpool. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Gainesville
description: You’ll be just two miles from the University of Florida campus and five minutes from UF Health Shands Hospital, Malcom Randall VA Medical Center and UF Veterinary Hospital. Take a 10-minute drive to Butler Plaza, or explore downtown Gainesville, just three miles away. WiFi and breakfast are on us, or make your own snack in your in-suite kitchen.

name: Hilton University of Florida Conference Center Gainesville
description: We’re on campus at the University of Florida and home to the Hilton UF Conference Center. Ben Griffin Stadium is two miles from us and we’re 10 minutes from UF Health Shands Cancer Hospital. Florida Museum of Natural History and Curtis M. Phillips Center for the Performing Arts are a half-mile away. Enjoy our outdoor pool and fitness center.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Gainesville
description: Off the I-75/Route 24 intersection, our hotel is two miles from the University of Florida campus. We're ideal for Gainesville attractions: Kanapaha Botanical Gardens, the Florida Museum of Natural History, and the wildlife trails of Sweetwater Wetlands Park are all within 15 minutes. Enjoy our outdoor pool and 24-hour fitness center.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Gainesville
description: Our hotel is next to I-75 in Gainesville's retail district, in easy reach of dining and shopping options. The University of Florida is two miles away – we have plenty of UF spirit with corn hole and a custom Gator ping pong table in the courtyard. Enjoy our resort-style outdoor pool and whirlpool.

name: Hampton Inn Gainesville
description: Located off I-75 in Gainesville, we’re five miles from downtown, with restaurants less than 15 minutes' walk. The University of Florida, Kanapaha Botanical Gardens, Florida Museum of Natural History - Exhibits, and Split Rock Conservation Area are within three miles of the hotel. Enjoy our daily free hot breakfast and WiFi, along with our fitness center and outdoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Middleburg
description: We’re between the First Coast Expressway and State Road 21. The Vincent’s Medical Center, Oakleaf Plantation, Cecil Commerce Center and Walmart are also in proximity. We offer free hot breakfast and free WiFi for all our guests. Enjoy the local eateries and fast food options nearby.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Gulf Breeze Pensacola Area
description: We’re off US-98 near Publix grocery store and Gulf Breeze Hospital, just three miles from public beaches. Downtown Pensacola is seven miles away, and Pensacola International Airport is 10 miles away. Our pet-friendly hotel offers free WiFi and free breakfast. Our friendly staff are happy to suggest where to eat and must-see attractions.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Pensacola/Gulf Breeze
description: We're off Highway 98, between Pensacola City and Pensacola Beach attractions, 10 minutes from both. You'll be within a mile of local quick eats and five minutes from the Andrews Institute for Orthopaedics. Each day starts with free hot breakfast, and there's free WiFi too. Enjoy access to our 24-hour fitness center and heated outdoor pool.

name: Hilton Pensacola Beach
description: Overlooking the Gulf of Mexico, our beachfront hotel offers a variety of watersports to try out, as well as two waterfront outdoor pools. We also have a hot tub, sushi bar, and poolside dining. Historic downtown Pensacola is a 20-minute drive away, and the Naval Aviation Museum is 35 minutes away.

name: Hampton Inn Pensacola Beach
description: Our hotel is right on the beach along the Pensacola Beach Trail, easy to reach by Highway 98. Take in views of the Gulf of Mexico from your room and walk to nearby restaurants. Downtown Pensacola and Admiral Fetterman Field are 20 minutes from our door. Stay refreshed in our pool and enjoy free WiFi and hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn Pensacola-Airport (Cordova Mall Area)
description: Our business district rooms are just steps from Pensacola International Airport, Cordova Mall, and Pensacola State College. Hop aboard our free shuttle for ease. Enjoy free hot breakfast before hitting Pensacola Beach, 20 minutes away. Free WiFi and access to the outdoor pool and 24-hour fitness center are yours.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Pensacola-Arpt (Cordova Mall Area)
description: Relax just minutes from Pensacola center, Pensacola International Airport, and Cordova Mall. Our free shuttle covers the airport and local areas. Take a short drive out to Gulf Islands National Seashore and Pensacola Beach. If you feel like a night in, try our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday, or a little in-suite cooking. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Pensacola Airport - Medical Center
description: Our hotel is five minutes from Pensacola International Airport. Our free shuttle will take you there and to destinations within  two miles – including Sacred Heart Hospital, Cordova Mall, and Pensacola State College. We're near I-110, putting us 10 minutes from downtown and 20 minutes from Pensacola Beach. Enjoy our fitness center and outdoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Pensacola I-10 North at University Town Plaza
description: We’re conveniently located off I-10, near the University of West Florida and Pensacola Christian College. Your stay includes free WiFi and hot breakfast, an outdoor pool, and fitness center. Find attractions like Pensacola Beach and shopping nearby.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Pensacola I-10 at North Davis Hwy
description: Located off I-10, we’re 10 minutes from the University of West Florida and less than five miles from Pensacola International Airport. Take the short drive to the Pensacola Bay area, or experience the laid-back atmosphere of historic downtown. Return to your suite with kitchen before joining our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Pensacola/I-10 Pine Forest Road
description: We're right off I-10, walking distance from family-friendly restaurants. Five Flags Speedway is just down the street, and the Escambia County Equestrian Center is 10 minutes away. Fuel up on our free hot breakfast, then spend a day on the white sands of Pensacola Beach, a half-hour drive away. WiFi and parking are on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Pensacola I-10 Pine Forest Road
description: Off I-10, we're less than 20 minutes from Pensacola International Airport and we're just 10 minutes from Pensacola Interstate Fairgrounds and Five Flags Speedway. Enjoy our free hot breakfast, outdoor saltwater pool, and 24-hour fitness center. Pets are welcome, too.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Ft. Lauderdale/Miramar
description: Find our Miramar rooms off the Ronald Reagan Turnpike, 25 minutes from Fort Lauderdale. You'll be a short walk from neighborhood dining, and each day starts with free hot breakfast. We're 15 minutes from Hard Rock Stadium football and half an hour north of downtown Miami. Enjoy our fitness center and lakeside heated outdoor pool. WiFi's on us.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Jacksonville Deerwood Park
description: Nestled in a tree-lined residential area, with downtown Jacksonville eight miles away – it's the best of both worlds. Lazy days at Jacksonville Beach are 20 minutes away, or watch the Jaguars play at TIAA Bank Field. Make the most of free WiFi, breakfast, and our evening social, Monday – Thursday. Try some local restaurants or enjoy your own in-suite kitchen.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Jacksonville Deerwood Park
description: We’re off Highway 115, close to I-295 and I-95. You’ll find many dining options within steps of our hotel, and a choice of shops in the St Johns Town Center mall, three miles away. Downtown Jacksonville and Jaguars games at TIAA Bank Field are 15 minutes away. Relax in our outdoor pool and by the fire pit. Hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Jacksonville JTB/Deerwood Park
description: We're close to Highway 202 and I-295, half a mile from Merrill Lynch and Fidelity Investments. Within two miles you'll find shops, restaurants, and the St. Johns Town Center mall. Downtown is 15 minutes away. Relax in our outdoor pool. Our restaurant serves breakfast; the 24-hour Pavilion Pantry has drinks and snacks.

name: Tru By Hilton Jacksonville St Johns Town Center
description: With St. Johns Town Center steps away, we're ideally placed for taking the family to Jacksonville Beach or the zoo. While you're here, unwind with free WiFi, take advantage of our 24/7 market, and kick off the day with free build-your-own breakfast. We're close to Alhambra Dinner Theatre and the University of North Florida. Try and catch a game at TIAA Bank Field.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Jacksonville-South/St. Johns Ctr.
description: We’re a short walk from the premier outlets and restaurants at Town Center mall. The University of North Florida is six minutes away and we’re eight miles from the Mayo Clinic. Downtown Jacksonville is 13 miles from our door. Enjoy your in-room kitchen, daily free hot breakfast, and our complimentary evening socials, Monday – Thursday. WiFi’s on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Jacksonville South St Johns Town Ctr
description: Free breakfast and WiFi are yours, as is a pet-friendly suite with its own kitchen – located just steps from an upscale open-air mall and 10 minutes from University of Florida and Mayo Clinic. Corporate guests can enjoy close proximity to Aetna, Johnson & Johnson and Allstate, and use our 24-hour business center.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Jacksonville Baymeadows
description: Off I-95, we’re three miles from The Avenues mall. Within 15 minutes, reach the University of North Florida, Everbank Field, Baseball Grounds of Jacksonville, and Florida Theatre. The beach is a 20-minute drive away. Your stay includes breakfast and our complimentary evening reception. The indoor pool and fitness center are free to enjoy.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Jacksonville/Orange Park
description: Our Orange Park home is just off Highway 17, near I-295 – ideal for downtown Jacksonville trips, 20 minutes away. It’s a 10-minute drive to both Jacksonville Naval Complex and Naval Air Station. we're convenient for local government offices and corporations, and there’s plenty of great eating within walking distance. Enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Jacksonville Orange Park
description: The Jacksonville Naval Complex and Orange Park Mall are both three miles from our hotel, just off I-295. We're a half-mile north of bestbet Orange Park casino, and seven miles from Adventure Landing. Downtown Jacksonville is 20 minutes away. Cooked-to-order breakfast, lunch, and dinner are served daily in our Garden Grille & Bar. WiFi's on us.

name: Tru by Hilton Jacksonville South Mandarin
description: Located off Loop 295, we are close to lots of shops, eateries, and more. The Avenues mall is just six miles away and the Naval Air Station Jacksonville is nine miles away. The University of North Florida, Downtown Jacksonville, and Jacksonville Beach are each within 25 minutes. Rest up with free WiFi, free breakfast, and premium channels in your room.

name: Hampton Inn Jacksonville/Ponte Vedra Beach-Mayo Clinic Area
description: Off Highway 202, we're within a half-mile of shopping and dining, with a free shuttle to the Mayo Clinic. Jacksonville Beach Boardwalk is 10 minutes north, while central Jacksonville is 20 miles away. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and manager's reception, Monday – Thursday. Our fitness center and outdoor pool are yours.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Jacksonville - Beach Boulevard/Mayo Clinic Area
description: We’re off Beach Boulevard (Highway 90), with a great choice of shops and restaurants just a few steps away. Our hotel is 10 minutes from the Mayo Clinic, 15 minutes from the Atlantic coast, and 20 minutes from downtown Jacksonville. Unwind in our indoor pool. Each day, hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Jacksonville/Ponte Vedra
description: TPC Sawgrass is one mile from our hotel, and we're steps from shops and restaurants. Ponte Vedra Beach, Mickler's Landing, and Ponte Vedra Concert Hall are within 15 minutes, and Jacksonville is a half-hour away. Perks include free WiFi, our outdoor pool, fitness center, restaurant, and 24-hour snack shop.

name: Hampton Inn Jacksonville-I-295 East/Baymeadows
description: We're just off I-295, a 15 minute drive from local restaurants and bars. The University of North Florida and St. Johns Town Center shops are four miles from our door. We’re 20 minutes from TPC Sawgrass and Jacksonville Beach. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast and free WiFi, or relax in our outdoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Jacksonville South - Bartram Park
description: We're just off I-95, 17 miles from downtown Jacksonville and moments from many restaurants. Baptist Medical Center South and Ally Financial are just across the highway. Take the team 10 minutes north to the ballfields at Greenland Park. You'll find shopping at The Avenues mall five miles away. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our outdoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn Jupiter/Juno Beach
description: Turn off Route 1 and explore the shore, a short walk from our Juno Beach hotel. You'll be within a half-mile of local dining and Loggerhead Marinelife Center. Catch Palm Beach Cardinals' spring training at Roger Dean Chevrolet Stadium, 10 minutes away. Enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi, and relax in our outdoor pool and whirlpool.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Palm Beach Gardens
description: Home is walking distance from restaurants and close to ballgames at Roger Dean Chevrolet Stadium, numerous golf clubs, and beaches. Hop aboard our free shuttle, running in a five-mile radius and covering local corporations. WiFi and breakfast are on us, as is our evening social, Monday – Thursday. If you feel like a night in, whip something up in your in-suite kitchen.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Palm Beach Gardens
description: Discover our waterside hotel by Lake Victoria, walking distance from the Gardens Mall and Downtown at the Gardens. We're within five miles of downtown Palm Beach Gardens, numerous local golf courses, and relaxing days at John D. MacArthur Beach State Park. Take a dip in the lakefront pool and whirlpool, and enjoy our fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn Palm Beach Gardens
description: Comfy, spacious rooms in the heart of Palm Beach Gardens, close to Interstate-95, and minutes from lush golf courses in the home of PGA. We’re close to upscale shopping and dining, and a ten-minute drive from Juno Beach. Every stay includes free WiFi, parking and hot breakfast.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel and Executive Meeting Center Palm Beach Gardens
description: Set amid tropical gardens, our meeting center hotel is off the intersection of I-95 and PGA Boulevard. We're next to local shopping and dining, with a shuttle covering a three-mile radius. Both downtown West Palm Beach and Palm Beach Airport are within 25 minutes. Enjoy a resort-style pool and whirlpool and a warm DoubleTree cookie on arrival.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Palm Beach Gardens PGA Boulevard
description: We’re off I-95 located at PGA Boulevard, one mile from Gardens Mall. Roger Dean Stadium, Rapids Water Park and FITTEAM Ballpark of the Palm Beaches are less than a six-mile drive. PGA golf courses and West Florida beaches are under 10 miles away. We have a heated outdoor pool, complimentary evening reception and a free cooked-to-order breakfast served daily.

name: Hilton Singer Island Oceanfront/Palm Beaches Resort
description: Our Singer Island resort stretches across four miles of private beach. Worth Avenue shopping, Palm Beach, and Jupiter are within 20 minutes. Palm Beach International Airport is 11 miles away. We’ll provide beach chairs and umbrellas, rental bikes, and water activities. Enjoy seasonal weekend entertainment, our outdoor pool, and kid’s activities.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton West Palm Beach
description: We're just off I-95, two miles from Ballpark of the Palm Beaches, and 10 minutes from the Palm Beach Outlets and Rosemary Square. Palm Beach and PBI Airport are within eight miles, and the Henry Morrison Flagler Museum can be reached in 15 minutes. Enjoy an in-suite kitchen, free breakfast daily, and our complimentary evening social Monday – Thursday.

name: Hilton Garden Inn West Palm Beach I95 Outlets
description: We’re just off I-95, opposite the Palm Beach Outlets and 10 minutes from Palm Beach International Airport. Ann Norton Sculpture Gardens and South Florida Science Center and Aquarium are less than 15 minutes away. Enjoy breakfast and dinner in our Garden Grille® and 24-hour drinks and snacks from our Pavilion Pantry®. We have free WiFi and an outdoor pool.

name: DoubleTree Resort by Hilton Hotel Grand Key - Key West
description: Our tropical resort rests five minutes from Key West International Airport via free shuttle — also covering the Old Town area. We're two miles from sandy strolls at Smathers Beach, and The Ernest Hemingway Home and Museum and Duval Street nightlife are four miles away. Enjoy our zero-entry pool, waterside bar, and a warm DoubleTree cookie at check-in.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Key West / The Keys Collection
description: We're off Highway 1, three miles from Duval Street and Smathers Beach, and walking distance from restaurants. The Ernest Hemingway House and Old Town can be reached in about 10 minutes, and Mallory Square is only four miles from our door. Enjoy our restaurant, outdoor pool bar, available downtown shuttle service, and 24-hour convenience shop.

name: Hampton Inn Key West
description: We're moments from Key West International Airport and Smathers Beach. Take our free shuttle four miles to downtown attractions like Fort Zachary Taylor, Mallory Square, and the Southernmost Point of the Continental US. You'll find plenty of dining options along Duval Street. Relax at Cheekie Hut, our poolside bar and grill. Enjoy free hot breakfast and free WiFi.

name: Hilton Grand Vacations at SeaWorld
description: As an official SeaWorld hotel, we offer free shuttles, discounts, and priority park entry. Splash and play in waterfalls, pools, and whirlpools — kids have their own wading pools and activity center to enjoy. Enjoy tennis, shuffleboard, and loops around the walking track. I-Drive and the Orange County Convention Center are 10 minutes from the resort.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Orlando at SeaWorld
description: Off I-Drive, our SeaWorld partner hotel is in one mile of SeaWorld and Aquatica⁠—with a free shuttle to both. From the hotel, pick up free SeaWorld Quick Queue passes and buy theme park tickets. We're 10 minutes from Orange County Convention Center, and Orlando Airport is 20 minutes away. We've got an outdoor pool, fitness center, and free WiFi and hot breakfast.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Orlando Theme Parks
description: We're only a 10-minute drive from both SeaWorld® and the Orange County Convention Center. Disney World® and Universal Studios™ are only 15 minutes away, so you can easily make a day trip out of any park! Prepare your own meals in your full in-suite kitchen. Enjoy free daily hot breakfast and stay connected with free WiFi.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Orlando at SeaWorld
description: Our official on-site SeaWorld Orlando hotel offers exclusive park benefits for Universal Studios and SeaWorld. The restaurants and entertainment of International Drive are all nearby, and Orange County Convention Center is two miles away. Enjoy our outdoor pool, fitness center, free WiFi, and full-service restaurant.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Orlando at SeaWorld
description: As the world's largest DoubleTree, we're set amid 28 tropical acres off International Drive, five minutes from Orange County Convention Center. Walt Disney World is 10 minutes away, and our free shuttle covers SeaWorld, Aquatica, and Universal Studios – tickets are available for purchase. Enjoy two pools, a fitness center, and a warm welcome cookie.

name: Tru by Hilton Orlando Convention Center Area
description: We're off I-4, a mile from SeaWorld® Orlando, the Orange County Convention Center, and Aquatica Orlando. Walt Disney World® and Universal Orlando™ are within 10 minutes of the hotel. Find your fun with board games in our lobby or an afternoon swim in our outdoor pool. We have sunlit meeting space for up to 100 guests and a 24-hour fitness center.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Lake City
description: We're off I-75 and close to I-10, central to Gainesville, Jacksonville, and Tallahassee. Wander the streets of historic downtown Lake City, treat yourself at the local malls, and discover Ichetucknee Springs State Park, all nearby. Local restaurants are aplenty – but breakfast is on us, and your suite has its very own kitchen.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Lake City
description: We're off I-75 in Lake City, with a range of restaurants nearby. Lake City Medical Center and Lake City Mall are within two miles of the hotel. Osceola National Forest is 20 minutes away, and Olustee Battlefield Historic State Park is a 20-mile drive. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, WiFi, our fitness center, and outdoor pool.

name: Tru by Hilton Lake City
description: Our hotel is off the main exit of I-10 and I-75, across the highway from Lake City Medical Center. Lake City, Columbia County Historic Museum, and Osceola National Forest are within four miles. Lake City Gateway Airport is a 15-minute drive away. Enjoy free breakfast and our lobby area with complimentary hot drinks.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Orlando East-UCF Area
description: Our hotel is off University Boulevard, next to Lake Ebby and a half-mile from the University of Central Florida. The boulevard is filled with local restaurants and Waterford Lakes Town Center shopping is 10 minutes away. Our outdoor pool is the largest in the area. Enjoy our fitness center, Starbucks, and a warm welcome cookie on arrival.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Orlando-UCF Area
description: We’re one mile from University of Central Florida and Central Florida Research Park. Concerts at Addition Arena, and UCF football at Spectrum Stadium are within three miles. Shops and restaurants at Waterford Lakes Town Center are a 10-minute drive. Enjoy our BBQ grills, fire pit, and sport court. WiFi and hot breakfast are on us, and we have an outdoor pool.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Orlando East/UCF Area
description: The University of Central Florida and the shops and restaurants around Waterford Lakes Town Center are two miles away. Orlando corporations including Fidelity, Alight Solutions, and Lockheed Martin are within four miles and downtown is 12 miles west. Cooked-to-order breakfast and lunch are served daily in our Garden Grille & Bar. WiFi's on us.

name: Tru by Hilton Sebring
description: So much to do, so little time. Our lakefront location gives you access to Central Florida shops and restaurants, with Highlands Hammock State Park, Sebring International Raceway, Sugar Sand Distillery, Highlands Ridge Golf Course, and historic downtown Sebring all within 15 minutes. As if that wasn't enough, WiFi and build-your-own breakfast are free.

name: Hampton Inn Tampa-Veterans Expwy (Airport North)
description: We're moments from Veterans Expressway, four miles north of Tampa International Airport — with a free shuttle. It's under 10 miles to ZooTampa and Busch Gardens Tampa Bay amusement park, and you can reach cruise terminals at Port Tampa Bay in 12 miles. Business parks are minutes away. Take a swim in our outdoor pool. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hilton Tampa Airport Westshore
description: Find us three miles from Tampa International Airport and less than two miles from Buccaneers games at Raymond James Stadium. For shopping, there’s International Plaza and Bay Street half a mile away, and WestShore Plaza two miles away. We have a heated outdoor pool, fitness center, tennis court, bar, restaurant, and convenience store on site.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Tampa Airport - Westshore
description: We're four minutes from the airport, two miles from Westshore Business District, and our free shuttle takes you to both. Visit Florida Aquarium, then hit the beach, five minutes' drive from us. Cook a meal in your suite's fully equipped kitchen or join our complimentary evening social, Monday to Thursday. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Tampa Airport Avion Park Westshore
description: Being minutes from the airport, we’re the ideal base for all trips. Corporate travelers can enjoy our proximity to the business district, St. Joseph’s Hospital and the Laser Spine Center. Family vacations can kick off with a game at Raymond James Stadium (two miles away), or a day at Adventure Island, Busch Gardens or Big Cat Rescue. Plus, WiFi and breakfast are free.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Tampa Airport Westshore
description: Find us off I-275, two miles from Tampa International Airport with a free airport shuttle. Our hotel is minutes from International Plaza and Bay Street. St. Joseph’s Hospital and Tampa Theatre can be reached in 10 minutes, and the University of South Florida is 17 miles from our door. Dine in our restaurant and enjoy evening room service.

name: Hampton Inn Jacksonville I-10 West
description: Just off I-10 on the west side of the city, enjoy access to the best of Jacksonville within 20 minutes – from the Anheuser-Busch Brewery, to events at the Equestrian & Aquatic Center, to the Jacksonville Zoo. Work out in our fitness center and relax in our outdoor pool. Each day, hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Hampton Inn Marathon - Florida Keys
description: Hope you’ve packed your swimming gear because we’re water-squirting distance from the Dolphin Research Center, Sombrero Reef Marine Sanctuary and Turtle Hospital – where you can swim with the dolphins yourself. When you’re high and dry, make the most of free WiFi and breakfast. Don’t miss out on the Seven Mile Bridge, Marathon Garden and Key Colony Beach Golf Course.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites West Melbourne-Palm Bay Road
description: Just east of I-95 near Palm Bay Road, we're within 10 minutes of Melbourne tech companies and the Florida Institute of Technology. Stroll the sands of Melbourne Beach and the streets of downtown, just six miles away. Take a dip in the hotel's outdoor pool and enjoy daily hot breakfast and WiFi on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Palm Bay I 95
description: We are conveniently located off I-95 in Palm Bay. Shop at nearby Bass Pro Shop, Marshalls, Kohls, or other retail opportunities we have available in our area. Eat at the nearby Longhorn Steakhouse or catch a game at Buffalo Wild Wings. Enjoy our flexible stylish suites and eco-friendly facilities.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Ft. Lauderdale SW/Miramar
description: We're nestled just off I-75 and feature free WiFi, a sparkling outdoor pool, basketball courts, and a fitness center. Our restaurant serves breakfast, lunch and dinner, with evening room service. Find excitement at Everglades National Park, seven miles away, and the Hard Rock Stadium, eight miles away. Fort Lauderdale Airport and Miami Airport are both within 30 minutes.

name: Hampton Inn Ft. Lauderdale-West/Pembroke Pines
description: Our hotel is just off I-75, close to shops and dining. Start the day with our free hot breakfast, then hit the Shops at Pembroke Gardens, or cool off at Paradise Cove Water Park. Both are 10 minutes' drive from our door. Unwind in our fitness center and outdoor pool. Our free WiFi keeps you connected.

name: Hampton Inn Ft. Lauderdale/Plantation
description: We're a short drive from Fort Lauderdale, I-595, and I-95. Experience a variety of dining and shopping, with Westfield Broward Mall and Sawgrass Mills Mall minutes away. Hop aboard our complimentary shuttle to Fort Lauderdale-Hollywood International Airport and for a small fee, Port Everglades Cruise Port. Free hot breakfast and WiFi are us.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Sunrise - Sawgrass Mills
description: Our hotel is across from Sawgrass Mills, Florida's largest shopping mall. We're a mile from the BB&T Center— and our location off I-595 offers easy access to Fort Lauderdale attractions and beaches 20 minutes away. Ride our free shuttle anywhere within three miles, and relax in our outdoor pool. Every stay starts with a warm chocolate chip cookie.

name: Hampton Inn New Smyrna Beach
description: We’re on historic Flagler Avenue, a few hundred yards from the boardwalk and the beach. You’ll find many galleries, shops and restaurants within a short walk too. It’s five minutes to Highway 1, and about 20 minutes to I-95, and half an hour to Daytona Beach. Enjoy a dip in our outdoor saltwater pool. Hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Nokomis Sarasota Casey Key
description: We’re just a mile from the beautiful Nokomis Beach, with fishing at North Jetty Park nearby. A little further out, you’ll find the sprawling Historic Spanish Point environmental museum and Oscar Scherer State Park, a great spot to walk the dog. Free hot breakfast in the Inspired Table™ is fuel for a day of golfing. Enjoy your in-suite kitchen and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Venice Bayside South Sarasota
description: Off I-75 or Route 41, we’re a five-minute drive from Nokomis Beach and downtown Venice. The 12-mile Legacy Trail to Sarasota is right next to our hotel, and we’re 40 minutes from Sarasota/Bradenton International Airport. We’ve got a fitness center, outdoor pool, and free WiFi and daily hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites North Port
description: We're off US 41 amid major retailers and local dining. Braves spring training at CoolToday Park is 15 minutes away. Ask us about Warm Mineral Springs, a historic gem in North Port. We have comforts covered with a lobby bar, heated outdoor pool, and 24-hour fitness center. Host events in our sunlit meeting room or on the patio. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Port Charlotte
description: Take in views of southwest Florida on a serene private lake just off I-75. We're seven miles from the historic homes and restaurants of Punta Gorda's entertainment district. Rent a boat and relax in Port Charlotte Harbor, 15 minutes away, or unwind by our outdoor pool. Enjoy free hot breakfast daily and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Tampa-International Airport/Westshore
description: Off I-275, we’re three miles from Tampa International Airport and six miles from Port Tampa Bay Cruise Terminal. Get to the airport, mall, and more with our free shuttle. Daily hot breakfast is free, and we’ve got plenty of restaurants within walking distance. Perks include our free WiFi, outdoor pool, and fitness center.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Tampa Airport Westshore
description: We're next to I-275, four miles from Tampa International Airport – catch your flight with our free shuttle. Shopping and restaurants are within walking distance at Westshore Plaza. Start your morning right with a free made-to-order breakfast, and enjoy drinks at our complimentary Evening Reception.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Tampa Airport - Westshore
description: We're four miles from Tampa International Airport via our free 24-hour shuttle. The Raymond James Stadium, George M. Steinbrenner Field, and Tampa Convention Center are all within 10 minutes. We have a heated outdoor pool with a whirlpool and sundeck, and every stay begins with a warm DoubleTree cookie.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Orlando Airport
description: Our hotel is three miles from the airport via our free shuttle. We’re 10 minutes from corporate offices such as Oracle and Simcom Aviation Training Center. Universal Orlando Resort™ and SeaWorld are under 20 miles away. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi and access to our 24-hour business center. We have an on-site fitness center and parking’s on us.

name: Hampton Inn Orlando-International Airport
description: Whether you're traveling for work or visiting a certain famous mouse, our hotel's airport location and 24-hour shuttle make us an easy Orlando launchpad. Accessible transportation is available. Find family fun less than 30 minutes away at Disney World, Sea World, and Universal Studios attractions, or enjoy the Florida sun on one of the area's many golf courses.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Orlando Airport
description: Just two miles from Orlando International Airport, we're ideal for exploring the area's famous parks. SeaWorld® is 12 miles away, and Universal Studios and Walt Disney World are both within a half-hour drive. Enjoy our complimentary evening social Monday – Thursday, and cook up a treat in your suite's fully-equipped kitchen. WiFi and daily hot breakfast are free.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Orlando Airport @ Gateway Village
description: Our cozy hotel is seven minutes from Orlando International Airport. Disney World, Universal Studios, and SeaWorld are within 16 miles – all easy to reach via the local Beachline shuttle bus. Downtown Orlando, Orange County Convention Center, and USTA National Campus are 20 minutes away. Enjoy our lobby bar, daily free hot breakfast, and WiFi on us.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Orlando Airport
description: Our hotel is less than 10 minutes from the Orlando International Airport terminal, close to corporate offices and a variety of dining options. Catch your flight with our free 24-hour airport shuttle. Enjoy free made-to-order breakfast every morning and drinks and light bites at our complimentary Evening Reception.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Orlando Airport
description: Our hotel is just a mile from Orlando International Airport and we offer a free airport shuttle service. SeaWorld, Universal Studios, and the Orlando Premium Outlets are within 30 minutes of our door. Enjoy our heated outdoor pool, outdoor seating areas, and fitness center. Our Garden Grille & Bar is open for breakfast and dinner, and the WiFi’s on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Orlando-John Young Pkwy/S. Park
description: Just off the parkway, we're close to dozens of restaurants and 10 minutes from the Orange County Convention Center. Universal Studios Florida, SeaWorld Orlando, and Walt Disney World® are within 10 miles of the hotel. Orlando International Airport is 11 miles away, and downtown's a 20-minute drive. Cool off in our outdoor pool. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Orlando South Park
description: Orlando’s biggest attractions are nearby (think Universal Studios and SeaWorld) and we’re just 15 minutes from Orlando International Airport. Business travelers can enjoy close proximity to the likes of Houghton Mifflin Harcourt, Expedia, and Darden. Local restaurants are aplenty, though your suite has its own kitchen and breakfast is free – just like the WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Palatka
description: Located downtown, in the heart of the business district, we have stunning St John’s River views and riverfront walks on our doorstep. Lose yourself in the trees, trails, and boardwalks of The Rice Creek Conservation Area, less than 15 minutes away. Or soak up the sizzling Florida sun poolside back at the hotel. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn St. Augustine - I-95
description: Find us just south of Jacksonville, off I-95. You'll be less than a mile from Premium Outlets shopping, and our trolley pick-up service covers the historic district. Head toward the coast and check out St. Augustine Lighthouse & Maritime Museum, next to St. Augustine Alligator Farm, all 20 minutes away. Enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton St. Augustine I-95
description: We’re of I-95, a short drive from St. Augustine’s Indoor Mall and numerous dining options. Premium Outlets and Vilano Beach are 15 minutes away. St. Augustine town center is seven miles from our door, home to famous historic attractions. We have an outdoor pool, car charging stations, and a fire pit. WiFi and hot breakfast are on us and pets are welcome.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel St. Augustine Historic District
description: Our hotel is centrally located, less than a mile from the Historic District, Castillo de San Marcos, and Ponce de Leon's Fountain of Youth Archaeological Park. Lightner Museum and San Sebastian Winery are within two miles. We have an outdoor pool and a restaurant. Enjoy a warm DoubleTree cookie on arrival.

name: Hampton Inn St. Augustine-Historic District
description: We're off Route 1, in St. Augustine's historic district. You'll be walking distance from the Old Jail historic site and Ponce de Leon's Fountain of Youth Archaeological Park, and within a half-mile of city dining. Vilano Beach is five minutes from our door. Wake up to free hot breakfast, and enjoy our free WiFi, fitness center, and outdoor pool.

name: Hilton Garden Inn St. Augustine Beach
description: Find us one block from the beach, steps from plenty of restaurants. St. Augustine historic district,  Flagler College, and the 17th-century Castillo de San Marcos fort are 10 minutes away, and we're 20 minutes from Marineland Dolphin Adventure. Our hotel has an outdoor pool, fitness center, free WiFi, and 24-hour snack shop.

name: Hampton Inn St. Augustine Beach
description: We're off the A1A right next to St. Augustine Beach, with several restaurants a short walk from our hotel. The Historic District is 10 minutes away: explore the shops, bars, restaurants, and attractions on foot or on a trolley tour. Relax in our outdoor pool and enjoy beach access via private walkway. Hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton St Augustine Beach Oceanfront Resort
description: Our oceanfront hotel is steps from the sand, with balcony views of St. Augustine Beach. Downtown attractions like Castillo de San Marcos are 10 minutes away. We offer water sports and family-friendly activities, plus cabanas and a bar for poolside sipping. Start your morning with Starbucks in the lobby and our free made-to-order breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites St. Augustine-Vilano Beach
description: Nestled in a quiet, residential area but close to the historical district of St. Augustine, it's the best of both worlds here. Enjoy free WiFi and free breakfast before exploring the nation's 'oldest city.' We recommend the Colonial Spanish Quarter and Ponce de Leon's Fountain of Youth Park, but kids love St. Augustine Beach and the Alligator Farm Zoological Park.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Palm Coast Town Center
description: We're near I-95, 15 minutes from Palm Coast city center. Flagler County Airport and Palm Coast Landing shopping are within two miles, and Flagler Beach is five miles east. Graham Swamp Conservation Area, boasting more than 3,000 acres of hikes and exploration, is 10 minutes away. We have a 24-hour fitness center and heated outdoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Palm Coast
description: You’ll find us right off I-95, three miles from Flagler Beach. Daytona Beach and the International Speedway are half an hour away. Palm Coast has many places for outdoor activities like biking, hiking, horse riding, golf, and kayaking. Relax in our outdoor pool, and enjoy free daily hot breakfast and WiFi.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Panama City Beach
description: Where US 98 and Florida 30 meet, we're just 2.5 miles from Emerald Coast beaches. Pier Park shopping and downtown Panama City are both 15 minutes away. Cool off in our outdoor saline pool or curl up at night by our fire pit. Free hot breakfast awaits, and our Spin2 Cycle facility lets you work out while getting laundry done. Pets are welcome.

name: Hampton Inn Panama City Beach
description: We're five minutes from seafood restaurants and beachside fun in Panama City. Charter boat tours and deep sea fishing are half a mile away, and The Naval Surface Warfare Center and the Coast Guard are two miles north. ZooWorld and Shipwreck Island Waterpark are less than 15 minutes from our door. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our outdoor pool and whirlpool.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Panama City
description: Our business district rooms are off Highway 231, next to Panama City Mall. We're within 12 miles of St. Andrews State Park and Panama City Beach, which has easy access to Gulf World Marine Park and Shipwreck Island Water Park. Tyndall Air Force Base is a 25-minute drive. Enjoy our outdoor pool and whirlpool, fitness center, and patio area.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Panama City Beach-Pier Park Area
description: We're right off US Highway 98, two miles from shopping and dining at Pier Park and aquatic fun at Gulf World. Panama City Beach and Laguna Beach are 10 minutes from our door. Wake up to our free hot breakfast and refresh in our outdoor pool. WiFi and parking are on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Panama City Beach-Beachfront
description: Our Panama City Beach hotel is a quick flip-flop shuffle from the beachfront. Adjacent to Gulf World Marine Park, we're in walking distance of local bites and less than a mile from Pier Park shopping. Kick your day off with free hot breakfast, and enjoy WiFi on us. We also have poolside views of the Gulf and a fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn Perry
description: Our Perry hotel is directly off Highway 98, five minutes' drive from Perry-Foley Airport. Highway access puts you half an hour from Keaton Beach days or Florida nature at Econfina River State Park. Explore neighborhood dining, or stop by our free manager's reception any evening. Wake up to free hot breakfast, and enjoy WiFi on us.

name: Hampton Inn Quincy
description: We're just off I-10, 30 minutes' drive from the state capital of Tallahassee, so you can enjoy what's on offer, then head back to chill out in our fitness center. Take in a musical show at the Leaf Theater, five miles from us, board WWII battleship the USS Salem, or explore Adams National Historical Park. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Tallahassee Capitol - University
description: We're in downtown Tallahassee, less than a mile from Florida State University and Florida A&M University. It's a quick walk to lots of local dining and the Donald L. Tucker Civic Center. Capitol Hill is a mile away, and we're a 15-minute drive from Tallahassee International Airport. Enjoy free daily hot breakfast, WiFi, and our outdoor pool.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Tallahassee
description: Set on a park-lined street, our downtown Tallahassee hotel is two blocks from the Florida State Capitol. Florida State University is one mile from us, and Tallahassee Regional Airport is 15 minutes away via free shuttle. Every stay starts with a warm DoubleTree cookie, and perks include our outdoor pool, 24-hour fitness center, and rooftop bar.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Tallahassee
description: We’re off I-10, 15 minutes from Downtown Tallahassee. Florida State University and Florida A&M are seven miles away. Alfred B. Maclay Gardens State Park and Lake Hallboth are two miles from our door. Enjoy breakfast, dinner and evening room service in our Garden Grille restaurant and bar. We have an outdoor pool, fitness center, and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Tallahassee I-10-Thomasville Rd
description: Our hotel is off I-10, within 15 minutes of everything you need in Tallahassee – from Florida State University and Florida A&M University, to downtown and the State Capitol. Tallahassee Regional Airport is 20 minutes away. We've got an outdoor pool and fitness center. Free WiFi and hot breakfast complete your stay.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Tallahassee State Capitol
description: We’re steps from the state capitol complex, FSU and FAMU, along with the Regional Movie Theater and downtown's abundance of shops and eateries. Once you've sampled the local fare, make use of your in-suite kitchen and the free WiFi. Feel free to bring pets, and don’t forget to join us for free breakfast.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Tallahassee Central
description: Located off Highway 27, we're within two miles of Governor’s Square Mall and Cascades Park, and about 10 minutes from Florida State University and Florida A&M. Downtown and the Museum of Florida History can be reached in minutes, and Tallahassee Museum is seven miles from our door. Enjoy our pool, restaurant, and evening room service.

name: Tru by Hilton Tallahassee Central
description: Close to the airport, free breakfast, free WiFi, and kid-friendly – check everything off your travel needs at our centrally located hotel in Tallahassee. Complete your itinerary and visit nearby attractions like St. Marks National Wildlife Refuge, Tallahassee Museum and Florida State University.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Tallahassee
description: Our suites are close to what you need in Tallahassee: the State Capitol, Florida State University, and Florida A&M University are all within three miles. Golf at SouthWood or hike the trails at nearby Tom Brown Park. Enjoy our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday, and take advantage of your in-suite kitchen. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Tallahassee-Central
description: Explore Tallahassee from our eco-friendly hotel off Highway 27. Local shopping and dining is within a half-mile of your room. Downtown is 10 minutes away, home to the Florida State University campus, football at Doak Campbell Stadium, and the Florida State Capitol. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our outdoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn Orlando International Drive/Convention Center
description: Next to International Drive and near I-4, we're a mile from Orange County Convention Center and ICON Park™. SeaWorld® and Universal Orlando are within four miles, while Walt Disney World Resort is nine miles away—schedule our free shuttle to all three. Some rooms feature a kitchenette and sleeper sofa. Hot breakfast and WiFi are free, and our 24-hour fitness center and outdoor pool are yours.

name: Hampton Inn Acworth
description: Our Acworth hotel is off Route 92, near I-75 – ideal for Cobb County International Airport, 15 minutes away. It’s only 10 minutes to Chattahoochee Technical College campus. Grab free hot breakfast before heading through Red Top Mountain State Park to get to Paradise Rental Boats, 20 minutes away, and explore Allatoona Lake in style. WiFi’s on us during your stay.

name: Hampton Inn Emerson LakePoint
description: We're off I-75, walking distance from LakePoint sports complex, Terminus Wake Park, and neighborhood dining. You'll be five minutes from the sprawling Red Top Mountain State Park. Kick the day off with free hot breakfast, and finish it in our heated indoor pool or fitness center. Enjoy free WiFi and access to the 24-hour Suite Shop.

name: Hampton Inn Atlanta Kennesaw
description: We're just off I-75, close to I-575, and two minutes' drive from Kennesaw State University. Swift-Cantrell Park, five miles, is perfect for unwinding after your journey. You're also spoilt for dining choices, with over 40 restaurants less than 10 minutes' walk away. Town Center at Cobb is ideal for shopping. Enjoy daily hot breakfast, WiFi and parking on us.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Atlanta Kennesaw Town Center
description: We're just off I-75 and I-575, less than a mile from Kennesaw State University and Fifth Third Bank Stadium. We offer a free local shuttle to Town Center at Cobb shopping mall and other attractions within five miles. Enjoy daily free cooked-to-order breakfast, our complimentary evening reception, and indoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn Atlanta-Town Center/Kennesaw
description: We're just off I-75, 20 minutes' drive from downtown Atlanta, two miles from Kennesaw State University, and nine miles from Dobbins Air Reserve Base. For shops and restaurants, head to Town Center at Cobb Mall, a short walk from us, or hike at Kennesaw Mountain National Battlefield Park, five minutes' drive away. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Atlanta NW-Kennesaw Town Ctr
description: We’re moments from restaurants and retailers, just six minutes from Cobb County Airport, and two miles from Kennesaw State University. Fill up with free hot breakfast before heading to work or downtown Atlanta. At the end of the day, enjoy the comfort of a spacious suite with full kitchen. WiFi and shuttle service are free, as is our evening social Monday – Thursday.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Atlanta NW/Kennesaw Town Center
description: Off I-75, we’re a five-minute drive from Town Center mall. Kennesaw State University, Kennesaw Mountain Battlefield, and Cobb County Airport are within 10 minutes. SunTrust baseball park and Kennesaw Mountain Business Park are within a 15-minute drive. Our indoor-outdoor pool, free WiFi, and restaurant complete your stay.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Atlanta NW Kennesaw
description: Across from Town Center at Cobb mall, our new pet friendly hotel is within two miles of Kennesaw State University – Kennesaw campus, Mountasia, several eateries, and other attractions. Ideal for extended stays, suites include plenty of storage space, sofa bed and an in-suite kitchen, plus free WiFi and free breakfast.

name: Tru by Hilton Atlanta NW Kennesaw
description: Our new Tru is a fun hub in Kennesaw, just across from Town Center at Cobb mall. We are two miles from Kennesaw State University – Kennesaw Campus, Mountasia and lots of attractions and eateries. Each stay includes free WiFi, free build-your-own breakfast, a pool, fitness center, and shuttle service.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Cartersville
description: The historic heart of Cartersville is nearby – walk its culture-filled streets to find antiques, boutiques, museums and dining on the square. Back in your suite, cook in your kitchen, make the most of free WiFi, and enjoy breakfast on us each day of your stay.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Cartersville
description: Off I-75, we’re walking distance from downtown Cartersville, Booth Western Art Museum, and restaurant chains. Tellus Science Museum is within 15 minutes, and we’re a half-hour from Barnsley Gardens. We’ve got event space for 250 guests, an outdoor saltwater pool, restaurant, room service, and fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Adairsville-Calhoun Area
description: Find us off I-75, five minutes from downtown Adairsville. With Rock Garden Calhoun’s exhibition of miniature world-famous structures 15 minutes away, we give new meaning to ‘small-town charm’. You’ll be half an hour from Red Top Mountain State Park and an hour's drive from Atlanta City. Enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi on us. Ask us about our shuttle.

name: Hampton Inn Cartersville
description: Our Cartersville hotel is off I-75, five minutes from Cartersville Medical Center. An 11-minute drive will take you to see the Tellus Science Museum, Booth Western Art Museum, and Pine Mountain Trail. Visit the historical Etowah Indian Mounds, just 17 minutes away. Start your day with our hot breakfast – it's free, just like our WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Rome
description: Find us off Highway 27, surrounded by restaurants in the heart of Rome. We're less than five minutes from Rome Area History Museum, Oak Hill, and The Martha Berry Museum. Visit Berry College or tee off at Callier Springs Golf Course, both within four miles. Stay active in our pool and fitness center. We’ve got breakfast and WiFi covered.

name: Hampton Inn Atlanta/Woodstock
description: Just off I-575, we’re only six minutes from the shops and restaurants of historic downtown. Visit the Civil War battleground of Kennesaw Mountain National Battlefield Park, nine miles away. Or throw yourself into Six Flags® White Water Park fun, less than 15 minutes’ drive. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Adel
description: We’re just off I-75, right next to Cook County Airport. Moody Air Force Base is about 30 miles away, and Reed Bigham State park is less than eight miles. We’re pet-friendly, with a large enclosed dog park. Relax by our outdoor pool and enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Moultrie
description: Just off Highway 319, our hotel is easy to reach from Valdosta, Tipton, and Tallahassee. We're steps from the Moultrie Stadium Cinema, and Moultrie's historic Main Street is just five minutes away. Watch world-class diving at Moss Farms, three miles away, and make a splash in our outdoor pool. Enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Valdosta
description: We’re off I-75, walking distance from shops, restaurants, and the Valdosta Mall. Our hotel is five miles from the Valdosta Airport, and Wild Adventures theme park is about 20 minutes away. Our Garden Grill restaurant serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, with evening room service. The 24-hour Pavilion Pantry offers drinks and snacks.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Tifton
description: We're off I-75, within 10 minutes of major offices in Tifton. Check out the Tifton Mall or pick up treats at Adcock Pecans, both a mile away. Take the kids to Georgia Museum of Agriculture & Historic Village, five minutes from our hotel. Our restaurant serves breakfast and dinner, plus evening room service, and our 24-hour Pavilion Pantry offers drinks and snacks.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Tifton
description: Find us off US highways 82 and 319, a block from I-75. Downtown Tifton is a mile away, while Georgia Museum of Agriculture and Historic Village and Tifton Mall are less than five minutes from our door. Abraham Baldwin Agricultural College is four miles north. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our outdoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Valdosta/Conference Center
description: We’re off I-75, adjacent to the James H. Rainwater Conference Center. Wild Adventures theme park is a 15-minute drive away, and restaurant chains are within walking distance. We’ve got a complimentary manager's reception Monday—Thursday and daily free hot breakfast. Enjoy our free WiFi, outdoor pool, and fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn Valdosta/Lake Park Area
description: Find us off I-75, four minutes from retail therapy at Lake Park Outlet and 11 minutes from Wild Adventures Theme Park. A 15-minute drive will get you to Valdosta Regional Airport, Dillard’s Distribution Center, and Lowe’s Distribution Center. Valdosta State University is 20 minutes away. Enjoy our free WiFi and free hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn Thomasville
description: We're off Highway 19 in Thomasville, a city famous for the roses which line its streets and gardens. We’re just five minutes from the shops, restaurants, and live music of downtown. Or walk the bird watching trails and butterfly gardens of the Birdsong Nature Center, less than 20 miles away. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Douglas
description: Uncover the delights of downtown Douglas, five minutes' drive from your door. Browse the downtown antique stores, take in a little history at Heritage Station Museum, or head out to Douglas Golf and Country Club. Make a day of it at General John Coffee State Park, boasting Heritage Farm living history museum, eight miles away. WiFi and hot breakfast are on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Albany
description: We're at the heart of the city – Albany Civic Center, Albany State University, and Flint RiverQuarium are all a short walk away. Riverfront Park is directly across the street, home to the Ray Charles Plaza, and Southwest Georgia Regional Airport is four miles away. We have event space for up to 300 guests, an indoor pool, and Starbucks.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Albany At Albany Mall
description: It's a five-minute walk to a shopping spree at Albany Mall. Albany State University West Campus is three miles south, and the main campus downtown is six miles away. Nearby US-82 can get you to the MillerCoors Albany Brewery or the Procter & Gamble plant in 15 minutes. Relax with a swim in our outdoor pool. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Americus
description: Find us off Highway 280, five minutes from Georgia Southwestern University. Mix business with leisure at Griffin Bell Golf Course & Conference Center, 10 minutes from your door. Trips to historic Plains, GA, hometown of President Jimmy Carter, are 15 minutes away. We're 10 minutes from Jimmy Carter Regional Airport. Enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Cordele
description: Our Cordele hotel is off I-75, five minutes from the city center. In town, hop aboard the historic SAM Shortline Excursion Train, running to iconic locations such as Lake Blackshear at Georgia Veterans State Park. Or speed things up at Crisp Motorsports Park, 10 minutes away. Enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi on us. Our 24-hour Suite Shop is yours.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Atlanta - Alpharetta
description: We're a mile from US-19 with easy access to Alpharetta corporate offices and dining options, made even easier with our free weekday shuttle. North Point Mall and the Ameris Bank Amphitheatre are both within four miles. Keep up your exercise routine in our free fitness center and take a dip in our pool. Every stay starts with a warm chocolate chip cookie.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Alpharetta
description: Located off GA 400, we're two minutes from Avalon and the Windward Business District. Ameris Bank Amphitheatre and Wills Park are less than three miles away. Stretch out in a suite with a working wall and fully equipped kitchen. Breakfast and WiFi are on us, and your pets are welcome too. Relax on our patio next to the fire pit or take a dip in the pool.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Atlanta Alpharetta
description: Our hotel is just off US-400, less than a mile from North Point Mall and five minutes from Ameris Bank Amphitheatre. We offer a free shuttle to destinations within five miles, including HP and UPS. Downtown Atlanta is 25 miles away. Enjoy free made-to-order breakfast and our complimentary evening reception.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Atlanta Northpoint
description: We're off US-19, half a mile from North Point Mall and 10 minutes from downtown Alpharetta. Outdoor concerts at Ameris Bank Amphitheatre are two miles away. Ask about our free shuttle service to explore the area. Our Garden Grille & Bar offers breakfast, dinner, and evening room service, and our 24-hour snack shop has cravings covered.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Alpharetta
description: Discover comfort in Windward Business District, five minutes from Alpharetta. Hop aboard our free weekday shuttle to local restaurants and businesses. You’ll be within 15 minutes of Avalon shopping district, Wills Park and Equestrian Center, and Ameris Bank Amphitheatre shows. Enjoy free hot breakfast, 24-hour Pavilion Pantry® access, and WiFi on us.

name: Hilton Alpharetta Atlanta
description: Located off US-19, our hotel is surrounded by corporate offices, including AT&T, Bath & Body Works, and many more. We are within 10 minutes of Ameris Bank Amphitheatre, fine dining, and high-end shops at Avalon mall. Stretch your legs along Big Creek Greenway, just over a mile from our hotel. We are less than 30 miles from downtown Atlanta.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Atlanta-Alpharetta
description: Corporate travelers will appreciate our free WiFi and proximity to Wendy’s, Honda, and Microsoft offices. North Point Mall and concerts at Ameris Bank Amphitheatre are seven minutes away, and it’s just 15 minutes to the Chattahoochee Nature Center. Enjoy free breakfast before a day at Six Flags White Water or cook your favorite meal in your fully equipped kitchen.

name: Hampton Inn Alpharetta/Roswell
description: We’re just off Georgia State Highway 400, with shops and dining a mile away. The offices of General Motors, Ernst & Young, Sanctuary Park, and LG Electronics are all within five miles. Big Creek Park is a mile from our door: join an eight-mile section of the Big Creek Greenway trail on foot or by bike. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Roswell, GA
description: Our all-suite hotel near historic Roswell and Chattahoochee River attractions is less than two miles from North Point Mall, Top Golf, and Main Event. Alpharetta is under 10 minutes away and Atlanta is 25 minutes south. Your stay includes hot breakfast each morning, WiFi, and a pet-friendly suite with kitchen, sofa, and workspace.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Atlanta North/Alpharetta
description: We’re in Windward Business Center with a free three-mile shuttle. Downtown Alpharetta is four miles away and we’re 10 minutes from Avalon Boulevard and Ameris Bank Amphitheatre. We have free parking, an indoor pool, a patio with a fire pit, and a lobby lounge. Enjoy breakfast, dinner, and room service from The Garden Grill restaurant. WiFi’s on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Athens Downtown
description: Our hotel is in the heart of downtown Athens, within walking distance of the University of Georgia campus and adjacent to the Classic Center. The Garden Grille & Bar serves breakfast and dinner, and snacks are available all day in the Pavilion Pantry. WiFi is free, and we have a 24-hour business center and fitness center.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Athens
description: The parks and attractions of Athens center are minutes away. Cheer on the Bulldogs at Sanford Stadium, stop and smell the roses at the State Botanical Garden or Sandy Creek Nature Center, or catch a gig at the Georgia Theatre. WiFi, breakfast and our evening social (Monday – Thursday) are free. Restaurants are nearby, and you’ll also have your own in-suite kitchen.

name: Hampton Inn Athens
description: If you enjoy a show, you’re in luck. Classic Center Theater, the historic Morton Theater and University of George Performing Arts Center are all nearby. Not to be dramatic, but we’re also in the medical district, close to many hospitals. Enjoy free WiFi and breakfast before visiting the Botanical Gardens, Sandy Creek Nature Center or teeing off at a local golf course.

name: Hampton Inn Commerce
description: We're just off I-85, one mile from the Tanger Outlets. Take the kids to the Funopolis Family Fun Center right down the road, experience max horsepower at the Atlanta Dragway just across the highway, or head into downtown Commerce four miles south. Enjoy free hot breakfast daily and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Braselton
description: Find us off I-85 on the grounds of the Chateau Elan estate, Georgia’s largest winery. Ride our free shuttle to explore the resort, which includes a spa, several dining options, and a championship golf course. Your stay with us includes daily free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and access to our fitness center and outdoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn Madison
description: Find us off I-20, we're less than an hour from The University of Georgia. Visit the antique shops of Madison Markets, or see a show at Madison Morgan Cultural Center, just seven minutes from us. Explore Georgia’s Antebellum Trail or enjoy the great outdoors at Hard Labor Creek State Park, 21 minutes away. Start your day with our free hot breakfast.

name: Tru by Hilton Greensboro Lake Oconee
description: Located off I-20, our vibrant hotel is minutes from Lake Oconee, close to downtown Greensboro and Durhamtown Off Road Resort. Get work done in the business center, or find your fun in the social lobby, fitness center, and outdoor pool. Free hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Covington
description: Our pet-friendly hotel is off I-20. We are within seven minutes of Bridgestone Golf, General Mills, and Chimney Park. Oxford College of Emory University and Georgia State University Newton Campus are nine minutes away. Grab a drink at nearby Fox Vineyards & Winery. Atlanta is a half hour drive. Every stay with us includes free WiFi and free hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn Hartwell
description: You’ll find us off Highway 29, nestled 10 minutes from Georgia scenery at Hartwell Dam. Fill up on free hot breakfast before adventuring through the Dam’s Big Oaks Recreation Area or hiking Hart State Park, three miles from your door. You’ll be just 10 minutes from both Hartwell and Cateechee Golf Clubs, with ample dining in walking distance. WiFi’s on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Atlanta Downtown
description: We’re five minutes from the World of Coca-Cola and Georgia Aquarium, with Georgia World Congress Center less than a mile away. You’re equally close to events at State Farm Arena and Mercedes-Benz Stadium. Dining is on your doorstep, or do some in-suite cooking. Grab free breakfast before strolling around Centennial Olympic Park with the dog. WiFi’s on us.

name: The Candler Hotel Atlanta, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: Built by Coca-Cola magnate Asa Griggs Candler in 1906, the Candler Building is on the National Register of Historic Places. Classic style and art deco glamour infuse our hotel, located minutes from downtown Atlanta sights like the Georgia Aquarium, State Farm Arena, and Mercedes-Benz Stadium.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta-Downtown
description: We're less than a mile from I-85, and on the trolley line for easy access to downtown. World of Coca-Cola, CNN studio tours, and Centennial Olympic Park are all within 10 minutes' walk of our door. State Farm Arena and Georgia State University are also nearby. Wake up to free hot breakfast, and unwind in our fitness center. WiFi is on us.

name: The American Hotel Atlanta Downtown - a DoubleTree by Hilton
description: Step into the '60s at our downtown hotel, steeped in mid-century style and Atlanta history. We're a five-minute walk from the Georgia Aquarium, Centennial Park, and Mercedes-Benz Stadium. Adorned with pop-art photos and retro décor, rooms offer views of city sights like the SkyView Ferris wheel. Every stay starts with a warm chocolate chip cookie.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Atlanta at Centennial Olympic Park
description: Settled on the edge of downtown Atlanta's Centennial Olympic Park, our hotel offers a leisurely city escape. We're steps from Georgia World Congress Center, Georgia Aquarium, and Atlanta Falcons NFL games at the Mercedes-Benz Stadium. Enjoy made-to-order breakfast, complimentary evening receptions, and an on-site Starbucks.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Atlanta Downtown
description: Our hotel is in the heart of Centennial Olympic Park, a block from the Georgia Aquarium, World of Coca-Cola, and a short walk to State Farm Arena, the College Football Hall of Fame, and Georgia World Congress Center. Peachtree Center and Georgia State University are also nearby. Enjoy the view from our seventh-floor outdoor rooftop pool. The WiFi’s on us.

name: Hampton Inn Atlanta-Georgia Tech-Downtown
description: We're a mile from I-75/85, footsteps from Georgia Tech's football stadium and Coca-Cola's corporate office. Take our free shuttle anywhere within two miles — including family fun at Georgia Aquarium and World of Coca-Cola, games and events at Mercedes-Benz Stadium and State Farm Arena, and downtown restaurants. Enjoy free hot breakfast and free WiFi.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Atlanta Midtown
description: We're in the arts district, a five-minute walk from the midtown MARTA station, with a direct line to the airport. Fox Theatre, High Museum of Art, Atlanta Symphony Orchestra, and the Alliance Theatre are all within a mile of our door. Fill up on daily free hot breakfast before exploring Atlanta Botanical Garden and Piedmont Park, both five minutes away. Enjoy an in-suite kitchen and free WiFi.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Atlanta Midtown, GA
description: We're across I-85 from Georgia Tech and a short walk to local restaurants and Midtown businesses. Coca-Cola's corporate office is less than two miles away. Downtown, Mercedes-Benz Stadium, and State Farm Arena are all within 10 minutes. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and a full kitchen. Evening socials, Monday – Thursday, are on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Atlanta Midtown
description: Find us in midtown Atlanta, two blocks from Georgia Tech's campus. We're walking distance from the Midtown MARTA station, providing downtown access, and less than two miles from Piedmont Park and the Georgia Aquarium. Our restaurant offers breakfast, dinner, and evening room service, and our 24-hour store is packed with snacks.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta Midtown
description: Our Midtown rooms are steps from the Arts Center Transit Station, linking to downtown Atlanta and Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport. We have easy I-85 and I-75 access, and we're steps from Alliance Theatre. The Georgia Institute of Technology and Piedmont Park, home to the Atlanta Botanical Garden, are a mile away. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our rooftop lounge.

name: Canopy by Hilton Atlanta Midtown
description: At the heart of Atlanta's Arts District, we provide free Canopy Bikes to discover the neighborhood's High Museum of Art, Alliance Theatre, and Atlanta Symphony Orchestra. Our rooms are within two miles of Piedmont Park and midtown area attractions. We're a dog-friendly hotel, with a 24-hour fitness center and all-day restaurant.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta  Decatur/Emory
description: Check out downtown Decatur dining and nightlife mere steps from your door. You'll be five minutes from Emory University in one direction and Agnes Scott College in the other. We're just seven miles from downtown Atlanta, where you'll enjoy family days at World of Coca-Cola, the Georgia Aquarium, and Zoo Atlanta. WiFi's on us, and free hot breakfast is yours.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Atlanta Airport North
description: Close to I-80, we’re two miles from Hartsfield International Airport via our free shuttle. Downtown Atlanta is less than 15 minutes away. Cook up a meal in your suite with fully equipped kitchen or join our complimentary evening social, Monday to Thursday. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us too.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Atlanta Airport
description: Our hotel is next to I-85, five minutes from Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport (ATL) – we offer a free shuttle to the domestic terminal. Delta Airlines headquarters and the Georgia International Convention Center are within three miles. We have a fitness center and indoor pool, and every stay starts with a warm chocolate chip cookie.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Atlanta Airport North
description: Our hotel is right off I-85, a mile from Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport, three miles from Georgia International Convention Center, and eight miles to central Atlanta. We offer a free domestic terminal airport shuttle, an indoor and outdoor pool, whirlpool, and fitness facility. Our Garden Grille & Bar serves breakfast and dinner.

name: Hilton Atlanta Airport
description: Our hotel is off Interstate 85, within two miles of Hartsfield – Jackson Atlanta International Airport and the Georgia International Conference Center. We offer shuttle service to the airport and the MARTA Gold Line, putting downtown sights in easy reach. Cool off in indoor and outdoor pools, and wind down at the Finish Line, our NASCAR®-themed bar.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta Airport North I85
description: Off I-85, we're two miles from Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport via free shuttle. Quick bites are in walking distance, and Georgia International Convention Center is 10 minutes away. We're within 11 miles of downtown, the Atlanta Botanical Garden, and the Georgia Aquarium. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our outdoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn Atlanta-North Druid Hills
description: We're just off I-85, within half a mile of plentiful dining options. We're three miles north of Emory University and campus hospitals, and eight miles from downtown Atlanta attractions like the Georgia Aquarium. Premium shopping and dining are at Lenox Square two miles away. Relax in our outdoor pool, and enjoy free hot breakfast and free WiFi.

name: The Partridge Inn Augusta, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: Our hotel first opened over a century ago, treating heads of state, business magnates, and celebrities. The original 1836 house, carefully restored, remains within the building. We're perched on a hilltop in a peaceful neighborhood, with a quarter mile of verandas and balconies connecting rooms to the P.I. Bar and Grill.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Augusta
description: Find us just off I-20, a sanctuary in the suburbs for those after a slower pace. Cook in fully equipped kitchens, enjoy free WiFi, and shop for groceries with our free delivery service. Augusta National and Goshen Plantation golf clubs are nearby, as are the Riverwalk and Morris Museum of Art  Hot breakfast is on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Augusta
description: Find us off I-20, 10 minutes from downtown Augusta's Riverwalk, Augusta Museum of History, and the Boyhood Home of President Woodrow Wilson. We're surrounded by local dining and two miles from the Masters Tournament in April. The Garden Grille offers breakfast, dinner, and evening room service, and our 24-hour shop covers snacks.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites by Hilton Augusta-Washington Rd
description: We’re off I-20 by Washington Road, two miles from Augusta National Golf Club, home of the Masters Tournament. The Augusta Riverwalk and downtown Augusta are less than 15 minutes away. All the family will love our outdoor area with sun loungers, a pool, putting green, and giant chess set. Enjoy free WiFi.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Augusta Gordon Highway
