description: Find downtown Augusta’s Riverwalk and commerce just 20 minutes away. We’re 10 minutes from Fort Gordon, home of the Cyber Center of Excellence, and within 10 miles of shows at Jessye Norman Amphitheater, James Brown Arena, and the Bell Auditorium. Relax at our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday, or with some in-suite cooking. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Augusta/Gordon Highway
description: Find us off Gordon Highway, near I-520. You’ll be 10 minutes from Fort Gordon, and just as close to Augusta University downtown. Check out the Augusta Museum of History, 20 minutes away. We’re 15 minutes from Augusta Regional Airport, with easy access to the Masters golf tournament in April. Free hot breakfast and WiFi are yours.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Augusta
description: Our hotel is just 13 miles from Augusta Regional Airport – ask about our free airport shuttle. Augusta National Golf Club, historic downtown Augusta, and the picturesque Riverwalk are all within a 20-minute drive. Enjoy our indoor pool, whirlpool, fitness center, and restaurant. Begin each stay with a warm DoubleTree welcome cookie.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Augusta West
description: Reach us from I-20, just 10 minutes from Fort Gordon. A 20-minute drive will bring you to central Augusta, home of Augusta University – Summerville Campus, or to Augusta Riverwalk, next to the South Carolina border. Enjoy easy access to the Masters golf tournament in April. Start each day with free hot breakfast, and kick back with WiFi on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Grovetown Augusta Area
description: Welcome home, sports enthusiasts. We’re near the Augusta National Golf Club (home of the Masters), with easy access to the Ironman Triathlon and Nike Peach Jam Basketball Tournament. Patriots Park and the Grovetown Trails at Euchee Park are minutes away, ideal spots for walking the dog. WiFi and breakfast are on us, or whip up something tasty in your in-suite kitchen.

name: Hampton Inn Bainbridge
description: Reach us from Highway 27, five minutes from downtown historic Bainbridge. We’re surrounded by Georgia nature: Earle May Boat Basin Park, Silver Lake Wildlife Management Area, and Lake Seminole are all within half an hour of our door. The highway puts you 50 minutes from Tallahassee. Start each day with free hot breakfast, and enjoy WiFi on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Buford Mall of Georgia
description: Shopping, dining and entertainment are just across the road from our new, all-suite hotel at the Mall of Georgia. Nature-lovers can explore the Mill Creek Nature Center and push their limits at Treetop Quest Gwinnett. Refuel with a great rest, free WiFi, free breakfast and in-suite kitchen.

name: Hampton Inn Atlanta-Mall Of Georgia
description: We're under a mile from the I-85/I-985 split and a short walk from shopping and dining at the Mall of Georgia. Cardinal Health, Global Industrial, and Displayit are within five miles. Georgia Gwinnet College is a 15-minute drive and we’re nine miles from Infinite Energy Center. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our seasonal outdoor pool (open April - September).

name: Hampton Inn Lawrenceville
description: We’re off I-85 five minutes from Georgia Gwinnett College. Historic downtown Lawrenceville is within four miles, home to shopping, dining, and the Aurora Theatre. The Infinite Energy Center is 10 minutes away for sports and concerts, and we’re 10 miles from the Mall of Georgia. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, our outdoor seasonal pool, and WiFi on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Snellville Atlanta NE
description: Hop off Highway 124 and you're with us, 1.5 miles from The Shoppes at Webb Gin and 20 minutes from Stone Mountain Park and its hikes, museums, and golf club. Enjoy free hot breakfast before exploring the Gwinnett Historic Courthouse museum in Lawrenceville, a 15-minute drive away. WiFi is on us.

name: Hampton Inn Bremen-I-20 (Carrollton Area)
description: We're just off I-20, 10 miles from downtown Carrollton and three minutes from Honda Lock of America. Play a game of mini-golf or sit on the beach at John Tanner Park, just 15 minutes away. Take a 10-minute drive to visit Haralson County Courthouse. Enjoy a free hot breakfast served daily. Your stay includes free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Carrollton
description: Find us just five minutes from downtown Carrollton and eight minutes from the University of West Georgia. For swimming, boating, and fishing adventures, you’ll find John Tanner State Park and Beach just nine miles away. Barbecue facilities, a fitness center, and free parking are yours. Free WiFi and daily hot breakfast on us too.

name: Hampton Inn Atlanta/Douglasville
description: We're just off I-20, adjacent to Arbor Place Mall. Enjoy free hot breakfast before a day at Six Flags Over Georgia or tee time at West Pines Golf Club, less than 15 minutes from our doorstep. Downtown Atlanta and attractions like World of Coca-Cola and the Georgia Aquarium are just 20 minutes away. WiFi is on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites ATL-Six Flags
description: We're off I-20, just four miles from Six Flags Over Georgia. The Six Flags Industrial Park is just down the street, with dozens of other major offices within 10 minutes. Hit the trails at Sweetwater Creek State Park, or head 14 miles into downtown Atlanta. Hartsfield-Jackson Airport is 30 minutes away. Enjoy our pool, free WiFi, and free hot breakfast.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Atlanta West/Lithia Springs
description: We're off I-20, four miles from Six Flags Over Georgia and Sweetwater Creek State Park, near a variety of restaurants. Downtown Atlanta and Hartsfield-Jackson International Airport are both within 15 miles. Relax in our pool and enjoy a snack from our 24-hour Pavilion Pantry. Our restaurant serves breakfast, dinner, and evening room service.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Atlanta West Lithia Springs
description: As an eco-friendly hotel, we take responsibility seriously: pets are welcome and WiFi is free, as is your daily breakfast, and we incorporate sustainable features throughout. Eat well at nearby restaurants or in your own in-room kitchen. We’re minutes from family-favourite Six Flags Over Georgia and a short drive from Centennial Olympic Park.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Atlanta Newnan
description: Pet-friendly suites just 30 minutes from Atlanta Hartsfield Jackson International Airport are yours for the taking. Fill your plate with free breakfast – perfect fuel for hiking nearby Chattahoochee Bend Park or perusing Ashley Park Mall. While you're with us, WiFi is free.

name: Hampton Inn Atlanta/Newnan
description: Reach our Newnan hotel off I-85, just 10 minutes from downtown’s vibrant shopping scene, dining, and historic institutions. Catch a show at Charles Wadsworth Auditorium, or visit McRitchie-Hollis Museum. Free hot breakfast is fuel for exploring Chattahoochee Bend State Park, half an hour away, or downtown Atlanta day trips, 40 minutes’ drive. WiFi’s on us.

name: Hampton Inn Atlanta-Fairburn
description: We're 20 miles from downtown Atlanta, just off I-85. Explore sites like Old Campbell Country Courthouse, or have a picnic at Old National Park, just 16 minutes away. Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport is 13 miles from us. Take a half hour drive to visit Six Flags™ Over Georgia and Atlanta Underground. Enjoy our free hot breakfast.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Atlanta/Peachtree City
description: We're off GA-54, a mile from central Peachtree City shops, dining, and businesses. Play outdoors with walking trails at Line Creek Nature Area and concerts at Frederick Brown Jr. Amphitheater – both 10 minutes from us. Downtown Atlanta is 40 minutes away. Enjoy breakfast and dinner in our restaurant, or order up evening room service.

name: Hampton Inn Atlanta/Peachtree City
description: Set in the suburb of Peachtree City, we're 34 minutes' drive from Atlanta and 16 minutes' drive from I-85. Lake Peachtree, for sailing and swimming, is less than two miles away. Golf clubs, including the championship course at Planterra Ridge, are within 10 minutes' drive, and we're also close to local restaurants. Enjoy free WiFi, parking, and hot breakfast daily.

name: Peachtree City Atlanta Hotel & Conference Center
description: Our lakeside hotel is three minutes from shops and dining in Peachtree City. Hartsfield-Jackson International Atlanta Airport is 23 miles away and we’re a 40-minute drive from Atlanta. We have a lagoon-style outdoor pool, a large fitness center and indoor pool, and extensive event space. Enjoy drinks by our fire pits and all-day dining at our restaurants.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Brunswick
description: Our hotel is right off I-95, next to Glynn Place Mall and seven minutes from the Federal Law Enforcement Training Center. We're a half hour from the Georgia coast and Golden Isles destinations like St. Simons, Sea Island, and Jekyll Island. We have an outdoor pool and serve made-to-order breakfast and a complimentary evening reception daily.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Brunswick
description: We’re just off I-95, a short walk from several dining options, and eight miles from downtown. Relax on the beaches and golf courses of St. Simons and Jekyll islands, both around 20 miles from our hotel. Take a dip in our heated indoor pool and whirlpool, and enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Brunswick
description: Nestled just off I-95, our Brunswick hotel is less than 10 miles from Brunswick Golden Isles Airport, College of Coastal Georgia, and historic downtown Brunswick. Our outdoor pool is the perfect place to cool off, and delicious on-site dining is available along with free WiFi and fitness center.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Brunswick
description: Our pet-friendly hotel is just off I-95 in Brunswick, Georgia. We are within 10 miles of historic downtown Brunswick, College of Coastal Georgia, and Brunswick Golden Isles Airport. Each spacious suite includes a kitchen, free WiFi, and plenty of storage, ideal for extended stays and family trips.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton  St. Simons Island
description: We’re just minutes from shopping at Redfern Village, sunbathing at King and Prince beach, Brunswick business parks and the community pier. Grab free breakfast before teeing off at Retreat Golf Course, or walking the dog at Massengale Park, both within ten minutes of your room. For nights in, take advantage of your in-suite kitchen and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn St. Simons Island
description: Beachside relaxation on Saint Simons Island is less than 10 minutes from our door. Our hotel is central to everything: Red Fern Village, Pier Village, and the St. Simons Lighthouse Museum are all within two miles. Cool off in our outdoor pool and whirlpool, and enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Jekyll Island
description: Located off Route 520, we're set in Jekyll Island Beach Village, in walking distance of the beach and the Jekyll Island Convention Center. Summer Waves Waterpark can be reached in five minutes, and the Georgia Sea Turtle Center and Jekyll Island Historic District are two miles from our door. Enjoy an in-suite kitchen, free breakfast, and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Darien-I-95
description: We're just off I-95, three miles from renowned seafood at the Darien Waterfront and 1700s history at Fort King George State Historic Site. The College of Coastal Georgia, downtown Brunswick, and St. Simons Island Lighthouse Museum are all within 25 miles. Start your day off right with free hot breakfast, and stay connected with free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Kingsland
description: We're off I-95, with dining options a few steps away. It's less than half an hour to the Atlantic Coast and Kings Bay Naval Submarine Base. We're just 10 miles from the ferry that takes you to Cumberland Island for hiking or biking in the wilderness. Each day, our hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Hampton Inn Cumming
description: We're off Highway 19, within a mile of dining and retailers. Retail therapy’s 18 minutes away in downtown Alpharetta or the North Georgia Premium Outlets. Sawnee Mountain Preserve and Poole's Mill Bridge Park are within a half-hour. Catch a show at School Street Playhouse, seven minutes away. Every stay with us includes free WiFi and free hot breakfast.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Lawrenceville Atlanta Sugarloaf
description: Located in Gwinnett County near Duluth, we are five minutes from Infinite Energy Center and just one mile from shopping at Sugarloaf Mills. Dine out or cook in the comfort of your in-suite kitchen. Perks include our complimentary shuttle (M-F 7am-7pm), outdoor patio with firepit, and outdoor pool. Free WiFi and breakfast are yours every day. Pets are always welcome, too!

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Lawrenceville Duluth
description: North of Atlanta just off I-85, we're conveniently close to Amazon, Cisco, and Technicolor. When work is over, kick back at our free evening social, Monday – Thursday. Catch big events at Infinite Energy Center, across the road. Or do dinner with a bit of old-timey flair at Medieval Times. For quieter nights, try your own in-suite kitchen. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Atlanta North/Johns Creek
description: Corporate offices for BeyondTrust, Alcon, and Nordson, are minutes from our Johns Creek hotel. Shopping, dining, and Emory Johns Creek Hospital are all within a mile. Halcyon and The Collection at Forsyth malls and Infinite Energy Center are less than 10 miles away. Breakfast and dinner are served daily in our Garden Grille & Bar. Evening room service is also available.

name: Hampton Inn and Suites Johns Creek
description: Our hotel is a short walk to State Farm offices and across the highway from Johns Creek Town Center shops. Several golf courses are close by, and it's a 20-minute drive to Alpharetta and the Mall of Georgia. We're in easy reach of I-85 for trips into downtown Atlanta, 40 minutes away. Enjoy our outdoor pool and patio, fitness room, free WiFi, and free hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn Lawrenceville Duluth
description: We're just off I-85, moments from Sugarloaf Mills mall. It's a five-minute drive to the Primerica corporate office and concerts and events at Infinite Energy Center. Downtown Lawrenceville and Georgia Gwinnett College are seven miles away, and downtown Atlanta is 27 miles southwest. Enjoy our outdoor saltwater pool. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Cumming Atlanta
description: Located near The Collection at Forsyth shopping center off US-19, we are less than a mile from Forsyth Conference Center and Lanier Technical College. We are within a few minutes of many restaurants, businesses, and entertainment venues. Lake Lanier is just 15 minutes away, with beach access, parks, and water recreation.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Atlanta NE Gwinnett Sugarloaf
description: Find us off I-85, next to the Infinite Energy Center and within walking distance of various restaurants. Attractions such as Sugarloaf Mills, Malibu Norcross, and Atlanta IceForum are less than 10 minutes away. Made-to-order breakfast, complimentary evening reception, and access to our indoor pool are included in your stay.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Atlanta NE/Gwinnett Sugarloaf
description: Off I-85, we're half a mile from the Infinite Energy Center. The Sugarloaf Mills mall is within walking distance, and we offer a free five-mile shuttle. Our Great American Grill restaurant serves breakfast and dinner, with evening room service from there and from Carrabba's Italian Grill next door. The 24-hour Pavilion Pantry offers drinks and snacks.

name: Tru by Hilton  Lawrenceville Atlanta I-85 Sugarloaf
description: Staying here means having all the action of downtown Atlanta at your disposal. Infinite Energy Center, Stone Mountain Park, and Lake Lanier are a short drive away, with Sugarloaf Mills shopping steps from our door. Enjoy free WiFi and build-your-own breakfast daily while you're here. Our 24/7 market can cater to all those midnight cravings. We won't tell anyone.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta/Duluth/Gwinnett County
description: We're a minute from I-85 and the Kaiser Permanente Medical Center, and 20 miles from downtown Atlanta. It's a four-mile drive to shopping at Sugarloaf Mills mall, and five minutes to companies like WestRock and Konica Minolta. Take the team to games at Shorty Howell Park three miles away. Enjoy our outdoor pool. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Atlanta-Canton
description: We’re off I-75, two miles from Canton. You’ll find over a dozen restaurants just a few steps away from our hotel. Enjoy hiking in The North Georgia Mountains, 30 miles away. For fishing, boating, or swimming, the Red Top Mountain State Park is 25 miles from our hotel. Or, enjoy the views from our outdoor pool. Hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Atlanta Airport
description: Our hotel is less than 10 minutes from Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport, with a free shuttle to and from the domestic terminal. Mercedes-Benz Stadium, the Georgia Aquarium, and other downtown attractions are 12 miles away. Take a dip in the indoor pool, and enjoy free made-to-order breakfast and our complimentary evening reception.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Atlanta Airport/Millenium Center
description: We're by I-85/285, two miles from Atlanta International Airport (with a free shuttle to the domestic terminal) and Georgia International Convention Center. Downtown Atlanta attractions like the World of Coca-Cola, Georgia World Congress Center, and Georgia Aquarium are all 12 miles away. Enjoy our restaurant, free WiFi, and an indoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta Airport West/Camp Creek Pkwy
description: We’re off I-285, five miles from Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport. Call us to book our free shuttle service. Camp Creek Marketplace is across the street, and you'll find plenty of dining options in the neighborhood. Downtown Atlanta is a half-hour away. Unwind in our heated outdoor pool. Hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Atlanta Airport West
description: Our new all-suite hotel is less than seven miles from Hartfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport, Georgia International Convention Center, and the Delta Flight Museum. Stays always include free breakfast, free WiFi, and a pet-friendly suite with kitchen, sofa, and plenty of storage space.

name: Hampton Inn Atlanta-Southlake
description: We’re off I-75 in Morrow, across the street from Southlake Mall's stores and restaurants. Jonesboro’s historic attractions are 10 minutes away. Head to International Park, five miles away, for walking, fishing, swimming, and waterslides–or relax in our outdoor pool. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Columbus
description: Minutes from Columbus Metropolitan Airport and the Columbus Convention Center our spacious suites offer fully equipped kitchen, living, and dining areas perfect for a short or extended stay. Nearby attractions include Fort Benning, the Coca-Cola Space Science Center, the National Infantry Museum, and Callaway Gardens. Breakfast and WiFi are free and our complimentary evening socials are offered Monday – Thursday.

name: Hampton Inn Columbus-North
description: Find us off Highway 27, eight minutes from Columbus Airport. Shop and dine at Columbus Park Crossings, just six minutes away. Catch a performance at Springer Opera House, or visit the National Civil War Naval Museum – both within nine miles. Fort Benning is 25 minutes from our doorstep. Satisfy your taste buds with our free hot breakfast.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Columbus
description: Our hotel is off Interstate 185 in Columbus. We're right across from Columbus Airport, with a free shuttle both ways. Downtown Columbus, the Riverwalk, and Fort Benning are within 25 minutes. Join us at Houlihan's and enjoy more dining options at the Landing, steps from our door. Every stay starts with a warm chocolate chip cookie.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Columbus, GA
description: Staying with us places you within easy reach of downtown Columbus and 10 minutes from Columbus Metro Airport. Fort Benning infantry base is just 20 minutes away. Enjoy free hot breakfast before exploring the Chattahoochee RiverWalk or perfecting your swing at Bull Creek Golf Course. Pets are welcome.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Columbus
description: Set in the Brookstone Centre Office Park, we're close to Aflac and TSYS headquarters and five miles from Columbus Metropolitan Airport and the Chattahoochee River Walk. Visit Columbus State University and see the Coca-Cola Space Science Center, 15 minutes away. Fort Benning is only 16 miles from us. Enjoy breakfast, dinner, and evening room service from our restaurant.

name: Hampton Inn Columbus/South-Fort Benning
description: Located off Route 280, we’re three minutes from US Army Fort Benning. Downtown is less than 15 minutes, and Columbus is 7 miles away. The National Infantry Museum and Oxbow Creek Golf Course are within a mile of the hotel. Chattahoochee RiverWalk is a 10-mile drive. Enjoy free daily hot breakfast and WiFi, along with our outdoor pool and fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn Cornelia
description: Our hotel in Cornelia is three miles away from two historical landmarks: the Cornelia Railroad Depot Museum and the famous "Big Red Apple" monument. Clarksville's restaurants and shops are 10 minutes away. Relax in our fitness center. The WiFi and hot breakfast are free.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Lavonia
description: Find us off I-85, just 10 minutes from Broad River Air Park, and 15 minutes from Georgia scenery at Tugaloo State Park. Enjoy access to Lake Hartwell, a half-hour drive away. We’re walking distance from Lavonia Antique Market and local dining. Start the day with free hot breakfast. WiFi’s on us.

name: Hampton Inn Conyers
description: Five miles from the equestrian entertainment of the Georgia International Horse Park and 25 minutes from Atlanta, we combine small-town charm and big-city convenience in Conyers. Stroll the historic streets of Olde Towne Conyers, five minutes away, or head west on I-20 to downtown Atlanta. Enjoy our free hot breakfast and WiFi.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Atlanta East/Stonecrest
description: Find us off I-20, steps from Mall at Stonecrest shops and dining. Lithonia businesses are within 10 minutes, and the Georgia International Horse Park is 20 minutes away. Check out Stone Mountain Park or reach downtown Atlanta in a half-hour. Our restaurant has cooked-to-order breakfast and dinner covered, and our Pavilion Pantry is always open for snacks.

name: Hampton Inn Atlanta/Stone Mountain
description: Located off Highway 78, we’re less than a mile from dining options. Visit Stone Mountain Park where you can ride The Scenic Railroad and Summit Skyride, just 10 minutes away. Shop at Northlake Mall or drop by Emory University - both within nine miles.  Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our seasonal outdoor pool and fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn Atlanta-Stockbridge
description: We’re near the junction of I-75 and I-675, about 20 minutes from downtown Atlanta and 15 from the airport. Several golf courses, including Wolf Creek and East Lake, are just half an hour away. So are Atlanta Motor Speedway, the World of Coca-Cola, Georgia Aquarium, and Stone Mountain. Enjoy free WiFi and hot breakfast.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Atlanta - Northlake
description: Our hotel is next to I-285 in Northlake's retail district, minutes from a wide range of shopping and dining options. It's a 13-mile drive to downtown Atlanta attractions like the Georgia Aquarium and World of Coca-Cola. Keep up your exercise in our free fitness center and cool off in the outdoor pool.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Atlanta South/McDonough
description: We're 15 minutes from Ecolab, Ford Motor Company, and other offices – and we're ideal for culture and fun, too. Watch some NASCAR at Atlanta Motor Speedway or brush up on local history at the Henry County Courthouse, Heritage Park, and Veterans Museum. WiFi and breakfast are free, and pets are welcome. Enjoy an in-suite kitchen.

name: Hampton Inn Atlanta-Northlake
description: Find us just off I-285, 20 minutes from Atlanta. We're walking distance from Northlake Mall shopping and plenty of local quick bites. Mercer University Atlanta and Emory University are within 15 minutes of the door, as is Stone Mountain Park. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our fitness center and outdoor pool.

name: Tru by Hilton Atlanta Northlake Parkway
description: Across the road from Northlake Mall, our new Tru is less than five miles from Mercer University. Stone Mountain Park and Emory University are less than 12 miles away. Each stay includes free WiFi, a free hot breakfast bar, and a Tru-ly different room with everything you need and nothing you don't.

name: Hampton Inn Helen
description: We're next to the Chattahoochee River in Helen's Alpine Bavarian Village, tucked moments away from main street attractions. Many Bavarian-themed restaurants, the Alpine Wedding Chapel, and Helen Oktoberfest are all within a mile. Have a splash with the family at Helen Tubing & Waterpark 1.5 miles away. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our outdoor pool.

name: Tru by Hilton McDonough
description: Our stylish and affordable hotel, located off I-75, is minutes from the historic McDonough city center, shopping, and dining. No-frills travel never felt so good thanks to our recreational lobby hangout, fitness center, and free breakfast buffet and WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Atlanta McDonough
description: We're just off I-75, steps from South Point Shopping Center and six minutes from historic McDonough Square. Enjoy our free hot breakfast before a day at Cotton Fields Golf Course, two miles away. Race thrills are just 10 miles away at Atlanta Motor Speedway, and the sights of downtown Atlanta are a half-hour's drive. Our guest reception is available Monday through Thursday. WiFi's on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Atlanta South-McDonough
description: Find us off I-75, steps from South Point shops and dining. We're in the 'geranium capital of the world,' with the yearly Geranium Festival in historic McDonough Square, three miles from our hotel. Nestle and QuikTrip offices are 10 minutes away, and downtown Atlanta and the airport are a half-hour from us. Enjoy our restaurant, lobby bar, and indoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn Locust Grove
description: Hit the Tanger Outlet stores or curb vacation cravings at local restaurants—all on our doorstep. We're a short drive from the action of Atlanta Motor Speedway, family days at Sky Zone trampoline park, and the immaculate greens of Cotton Fields Golf Club. Animal lovers are minutes from Noah's Ark Sanctuary. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Dalton
description: We’re off I-75, less than a mile from Market Street Shoppes. Dalton State College, Dalton Convention Center, and Dalton Little Theatre are within 10 minutes. Experience Cherokee Nation history at the New Echota State Historic Site, just 17 minutes away. Work up a sweat in our fitness center. We’ve got WiFi and hot breakfast covered.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Dalton
description: We're off I-75, half a mile from Dalton Convention Center and numerous dining options. Dalton State College is a mile up the road. It's three miles east to downtown, home to Dalton Distillery and companies like Mohawk, Shaw, and Americhem. Cooked-to-order breakfast, lunch, and dinner are served daily in our Garden Grille & Bar. WiFi is on us.

name: Tru by Hilton Ringgold
description: We are located off I-75 and Hwy 151. We are also conveniently near route 41. Enjoy convenient access to dine in restaurants as well as fast food chains. Experience the beauty of nearby Ringgold Nature trail or travel to Chickamauga National Military Park. Our hotel features an indoor heated pool and 24-hour fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn Ringgold-Ft. Oglethorpe
description: Located off I-75, we're three minutes from Georgia Winery. A 14-minute drive will take you to Hamilton Place Mall and Lake Winnie Amusement Park. Visit the Chickamauga & Chattanooga National Military Park, just eight miles away. We're less than 20 minutes from Chattanooga. Take a dip in our heated pool and whirlpool. Your stay includes free WiFi and free hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn Hinesville
description: Find the best of Southern living at our hotel in the northeast of Hinesville, just a mile from Fort Stewart. About a half-hour away you'll find the architecture, history, and parks of Savannah. Enjoy free WiFi and free hot breakfast, and work out in our fitness center and outdoor pool.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Atlanta North Druid Hills - Emory Area
description: We're just off I-85, four miles from Emory University. Midtown, Buckhead, and Lenox Park shopping are 12 minutes from our hotel. Our free shuttle covers destinations within three miles, including the Lindbergh MARTA station. Downtown Atlanta attractions like the Georgia Aquarium are seven miles away. Enjoy a warm DoubleTree cookie on arrival.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Atlanta Buckhead
description: Our hotel is in the Buckhead fashion district between Lenox Mall, Phipps Plaza, and The Shoppes at Buckhead. We’re blocks from MARTA rail links to the airport and downtown, and LEGOLAND Discovery Center is a mile away. Enjoy free made-to-order breakfast, our complimentary evening reception, CycleBar spin discounts, and a free local shuttle.

name: Hampton Inn Waycross
description: We're at the intersection of US 23 and US 82, with easy access to Waycross restaurants and shops – several in walking range. Experience South Georgia's outdoor beauty at Laura S. Walker State Park nine miles south, where you can hike, fish, or golf the day away. Enjoy free hot breakfast each morning, and stay connected with free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Atlanta NW Cumberland
description: We're just off I-285, close to I-75, and four miles from Dobbins Air Reserve Base. Cumberland Mall is within walking distance, and our weekday shuttle runs around the local area. Catch a baseball game at SunTrust Park, six minutes' drive away, or visit downtown Atlanta, 13 miles from our door. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us. Enjoy our seasonal outdoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta-Galleria
description: Located off I-285, we’re less than a mile from Cumberland Mall and Cobb Galleria Centre. Catch a Braves game at nearby SunTrust Park. Visit Martin Luther King, Jr. National Historical Park and Six Flags Over Georgia, both within 14 miles. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, free WiFi, our heated indoor pool and fitness center.

name: DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Atlanta - Galleria
description: Truist Park, the Battery, and Coca-Cola Roxy are a five-minute walk from our hotel in northwest Atlanta's Cobb Galleria. We're near the junction of interstates 285 and 78, for easy access to area headquarters including Home Depot — and downtown is less than 20 minutes away. Enjoy our indoor pool, fitness center, and a warm cookie when you arrive.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Atlanta - Marietta
description: Just off I-75 at Windy Hill, our hotel is close to family-friendly restaurants and a block from Windy Hill Hospital. Truist Park is a seven-minute drive away, and we'll take you to Braves games and The Battery in our free shuttle. Cool off in indoor and outdoor pools and savor Southern fare at Sauced in Marietta for breakfast, lunch, and dinner.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Atlanta-Galleria/Cumberland
description: Conveniently located off the I-75 and I-285, our suites are your launch pad into Atlanta and provide easy access to the likes of Lockheed Martin, Georgia Aquarium,  SunTrust Park and Cobb Galleria Center. Cook at your leisure in a fully equipped kitchen, or join us for our evening social from Monday to Thursday. Breakfast, like WiFi, is free.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Atlanta Galleria
description: Our hotel is across from Cobb Energy Center in northwest Atlanta. We offer a free shuttle to destinations three miles including the Galleria, SunTrust Park, and the Cumberland Mall. The Atlanta Botanical Garden, LEGOLAND, and downtown attractions are a 20-minute drive away. Enjoy free made-to-order breakfast and our complimentary evening reception.

name: Hampton Inn and Suites Atlanta/Marietta
description: We're just off I-75, 15 miles from Atlanta and moments from Dobbins Air Reserve Base and Lockheed Martin. It's a three-mile trip to Kennesaw State University, and you can reach Six Flags White Water in 10 minutes. Discover local eateries in Marietta Square five miles away. Relax on our rooftop terrace or in our indoor pool. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Atlanta Marietta
description: Our hotel is off I-75, less than two miles from Dobbins Air Reserve Base. We're within 10 minutes of Atlanta Braves baseball at SunTrust Park, Sope Creek Trail, and Six Flags White Water, with downtown Atlanta 15 miles away. Pets are welcome, and we have free hot breakfast, in-suite kitchens, and a choice of indoor and outdoor pools.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Dublin
description: Our Dublin hotel is just off Route 16, 10 minutes from Southern Pines Regional Park and the Dublin-Laurens Museum. We have a variety of restaurants in walking distance, and every day starts with our free hot breakfast. Work up a sweat in our fitness center and stay connected with free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Vidalia
description: We're next to US 280, less than a mile from restaurants and retailers. Check out the Vidalia Onion Museum just four minutes away. We're four miles from historic downtown Vidalia and its charming shops and restaurants. The town of Lyons and its Blue Marquee theater are two miles east. Enjoy free hot breakfast each morning and free WiFi.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Atlanta Norcross
description: Dive into downtown Norcross attractions like the Georgia Aquarium or catch the big events at Infinite Energy Center. Our free shuttle can run you to local businesses, shops and theaters. Hone your culinary skills in your in-suite kitchen, or embrace the vacation and try some fantastic neighborhood restaurants. WiFi and breakfast are on us, and pets are welcome.

name: Hampton Inn Peachtree Corners Norcross
description: We're located in Technology Park, close to local firms and restaurants, and three miles from I-85 and I-285. Downtown Atlanta is 20 miles away. Start your day with our free hot breakfast, then take time out to hike, swim, or fish in Jones Bridge Park, or shop at The Forum on Peachtree Parkway, both around 10 minutes' drive. Relax in our pool, and enjoy WiFi on us.

name: Hilton Atlanta Northeast
description: We’re between Peachtree Corners and Norcross, a short drive from local shopping, dining, and entertainment. Historic Norcross is five minutes away and we’re four miles from The Forum on Peachtree Parkway mall – our free shuttle will take you there, and to MARTA rail station. Downtown Atlanta is a 30-minute drive. Enjoy our onsite bar and restaurant.

name: Hampton Inn Norcross
description: Find us just off I-85, adjacent to the popular Pappadeaux Seafood Kitchen and the Global Mall. We're less than a mile from Waffle House's headquarters, and Atlanta attractions are 20 miles down the road. Start the day with free hot breakfast and enjoy our indoor pool and fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn Atlanta/Fayetteville
description: We're next to US-54, under five miles from Pinewood Atlanta Studios and Piedmont Fayette Hospital. McCurry Park sports complex is seven minutes away, and we're four miles from the Prime Community Park Secret Garden. Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport is 17 miles north. Take a relaxing dip in our outdoor pool. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Forsyth
description: We're right off I-75, one mile from downtown Forsythe and the Monroe County Museum. It's a 14-mile drive to Boral Material Technologies and the Scherer power plant, and just six minutes to the Public Safety Training Center. Hit the greens at Forsyth Golf Course three miles away. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our outdoor pool.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Macon-North
description: You’ll be 10 miles from Macon, the home of Otis Redding, Little Richard, and the Allman Brothers. Tour the Museum of Arts & Science, the Tubman Museum, and Cannonball House, all within 15 minutes. Free breakfast is fuel for exploring Ocmulgee Mounds National Historical Park. Enjoy complimentary evening socials, Monday – Thursday, and an in-suite kitchen. WiFi’s on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Macon I-75 North
description: Our Macon hotel is next to I-75, 10 minutes from Mercer University. The Shoppes at River Crossing, nature at Ocmulgee Mounds National Historical Park, and music history at the Allman Brothers Band Museum are all within 15 minutes. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our fitness center and indoor pool.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Macon I-75 North
description: We're just off I-75 in north Macon. Whether you're visiting for a convention at the Centreplex or a culture fix, we're 15 minutes away from the action. Downtown Macon's got it all: shops, galleries, and museums by day; dinner and live music at night. Our suites are pet-friendly, with free WiFi and free hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Macon I-475
description: We’re just off I-475 in Macon, one mile from Middle Georgia State University. Mercer University and Wesleyan College are also within 15 minutes, and you’ll be just as close to downtown. Fuel up with free hot breakfast before taking in Ocmulgee Mounds National Historical Park or the Georgia Sports Hall of Fame, 20 minutes away. Enjoy free WiFi and our seasonal outdoor pool.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Macon / Mercer University
description: Our hotel is right off I-75 and a short walk from Mercer University, including Five Star Stadium and Claude Smith Field for football and baseball games. Downtown Macon is a 10-minute drive away. We have an outdoor pool, fitness center, and a cooked-to-order breakfast is available in the Garden Grille & Bar. The WiFi’s on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Warner Robins
description: Getting around is easy – Robins Air Force Base, the I-75 and US-41 are nearby and we’re less than 10 minutes from the Museum of Aviation and Lane Southern Orchards. Enjoy complimentary breakfast or whip up your own in your in-suite kitchen. Pets are welcome, WiFi is free.

name: Hampton Inn Warner Robins
description: Touch down within 20 minutes of Robins Air Force Base and the Museum of Aviation. Close to I-75, reach Macon city in just 25 minutes, where you can tour the Georgia Music and Sports Hall of Fame. You’ll be a short walk from nearby eateries and Houston County Galleria. Wake up to free hot breakfast, and enjoy our free WiFi and fitness center.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Warner Robins
description: We're near Highway 41, within a mile of shops, dining, and the Houston County Galleria. The Wellston Trail starts three miles from our hotel, and Robins Air Force Base and the Museum of Aviation are eight miles away. Our Garden Grille & Bar serves breakfast, and the Pavilion Pantry is open 24 hours for drinks and snacks.

name: Hampton Inn Milledgeville
description: We’re just off US-441, five minutes from Georgia State College & University and Central Georgia Tech College. Dip your toes in the water at Lake Sinclair, 10 minutes from your door. You’ll be steps from dining, shopping and fun at Milledgeville Mall and AMC Theater. Enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Richmond Hill Savannah I 95
description: Our quiet location is just off I-95, only 25 minutes from historic downtown Savannah and Fort Stewart's front gate. Many restaurants are nearby on US 17. Savannah/Hilton Head International Airport (SAV) is an easy 20-mile drive north. While you're with us, enjoy daily free hot breakfast and free WiFi. Plus, we're pet-friendly.

name: Hampton Inn Savannah-I-95/Richmond Hill
description: We’re off I-95 in Richmond Hill, less than 10 minutes from J.F. Gregory City Park and Richmond Hill Historical Society & Museum. Check out the variety of dining options within walking distance. Savannah Mall and Mighty Eight Air Force Museum are both within 20 minutes' drive. Start your day with our hot breakfast – it’s free, just like our WiFi and outdoor pool access.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Savannah - I-95 South - Gateway
description: We're just off I-95, within walking distance of half a dozen restaurants. Georgia Southern University Armstrong Campus is eight miles east, while the Tanger Outlets and Savannah/Hilton Head International Airport are 11 miles north. It's a 15-mile drive to the Historic District downtown. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our indoor pool.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Savannah Airport
description: Relax at our Home2 Suites, just five minutes away from the Savannah Hilton Head International airport. Check out the spots locals love using our free shuttle. We also offer a free mix-and-match breakfast, free WiFi and comfy suites. Downtown Savannah is just 30 minutes away; where you can discover its 280 year history, go on a spooky ghost tour, or try a fun pub crawl.

name: Tru by Hilton Savannah Airport
description: We are along I-95 across the highway from the Tanger Outlets Savannah. The Savannah/Hilton Head International Airport is two miles from our location. A visit to Georgia Tech Savannah campus is less than 10 minutes away. The Georgia Air National Guard is about four miles away. Our property provides lakeside views as well as outdoor and indoor social areas.

name: Hampton Inn and Suites Savannah-Airport
description: Our airport hotel is right off I-95, overlooking a scenic golf course and lake. Our free shuttle will take you anywhere within 1.5 miles, including dozens of nearby restaurants and Tanger Outlet Mall. Downtown Savannah is just 20 minutes away. Enjoy free daily breakfast, free WiFi, and our outdoor pool.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Savannah Airport
description: Our suites are just off I-95, five minutes from Savannah/Hilton Head Airport on our free shuttle. We're less than a mile from restaurants and shopping at Tanger Outlets, and 20 minutes from downtown Savannah attractions like River Street and Savannah Market. Enjoy free made-to-order breakfast and our complimentary evening reception.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Savannah Airport
description: We're within five miles of the airport, Tanger Outlets, and the Mighty Eighth Air Force Museum – our free shuttle runs to all of them. It's 12 miles to downtown Savannah and the convention center, the Historic District, and Riverfront Plaza. We serve breakfast and dinner daily in our Garden Grille & Bar. Enjoy our outdoor pool.

name: Homewood Suites  by Hilton Savannah Airport
description: We're just over three miles from Savannah International Airport, and 15 minutes from the city's historic district. Fill up on free breakfast before adventuring to Tybee Island, Hilton Head Island, or Savannah National Wildlife Refuge. Wind down at our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday, or do a little in-suite cooking. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Lagrange near Callaway Gardens
description: Reach us off I-85, a 10-minute drive from LaGrange College, historic Bellevue Mansion, and Hills & Dales Estate. Start the day with free hot breakfast before taking in Georgia scenery at West Point Lake or enjoying the attractions of Callaway Gardens®, all within 20 minutes of your door. The interstate puts you an hour’s drive from Atlanta. WiFi’s on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton LaGrange
description: We’re the perfect place for culture lovers, with a wealth of classical music, ballet, museums, and performing arts nearby. If you’re here in the winter, don’t miss LaGrange Christmas Parade. WiFi and breakfast are free – take advantage of your in-suite kitchen. Nearby you’ll have the city center, downtown and LaGrange Industrial Park. Pets are welcome.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Atlanta Perimeter Dunwoody
description: We're next to I-285, less than 10 minutes from Perimeter Mall, Oglethorpe University, and UPS World Headquarters. Take our free shuttle anywhere within five miles — including the Dunwoody MARTA station, for access to downtown Atlanta. SunTrust Park is 15 minutes from our hotel. Every stay starts with a signature warm chocolate chip cookie.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites by Hilton Atlanta Perimeter Dunwoody
description: We’re off I-285 and offer quick, easy rides to Perimeter Mall on our free shuttle. There are several corporate firms within 10 minutes and we’re nine miles from baseball at SunTrust Park. Georgia Aquarium, Piedmont Park, and the Atlanta Botanical Garden are 20 minutes away in Downtown Atlanta. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, our indoor pool, and WiFi on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Atlanta Perimeter Center
description: Our hotel is less than a mile from Perimeter Mall, an easy walk from Dunwoody MARTA station, and within easy reach of a range of Fortune 500 companies. We offer a 24-hour business center, free WiFi, parking, and an area shuttle. The Garden Grille & Bar serves breakfast and dinner, and Branch Water offers small bites and craft beers.

name: Hilton Atlanta Perimeter Suites
description: Next to the Highway 19/I-285 intersection, our stylish suites are at the heart of Perimeter Center business district. We're less than a mile from Dunwoody Metro Station, linking to downtown Atlanta, and Perimeter Mall is 10 minutes away via free shuttle – covering a three-mile radius. Enjoy our fitness center and outdoor pool.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Atlanta Perimeter Center
description: Our Perimeter Center hotel is near the hustle and bustle of Perimeter Mall and close to several Fortune 500 companies. Want to see more of Atlanta? Walk to the nearby MARTA station for a 20-minute ride to downtown. With free WiFi and in-suite kitchens, you'll find comfort, convenience, and a perfect base for extended stays.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Atlanta - Roswell
description: We're moments from Turner McDonald Parkway with easy access to corporate offices, dining options, and historic downtown Roswell. Our free shuttle runs anywhere within five miles including Vickery Creek Falls Roswell Mill, North Point Mall, and Ameris Bank Amphitheatre. Atlanta is 22 miles away. Enjoy our outdoor pool, fitness center, and warm cookie on arrival.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Savannah Airport
description: We're five minutes from Savannah/Hilton Head International Airport, with a free shuttle both ways. Our location near I-95 puts historic Savannah sights like Chippewa Square just a 20-minute drive away. Our fitness center is open 24 hours, and we have a heated indoor pool. Every stay starts with a warm chocolate chip cookie.

name: Hampton Inn Savannah - I-95 North
description: Our hotel is just off I-95, halfway between Miami and Virginia Beach and 20 minutes from Savannah International Airport. Downtown and the Savannah Historic District are 15 minutes away. Perks include free WiFi, daily free hot breakfast, and the use of our fitness center and outdoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Savannah/Midtown
description: Southern charm with a modern twist: our midtown Savannah hotel is close to centuries-old history and new culture. Just three miles away, head downtown for views of the river. Stroll along photogenic River Street, lined with boutiques, breweries, restaurants and galleries housed in converted cotton warehouses.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Savannah
description: In the heart of midtown, relax in an apartment-style suite with a fully equipped kitchen, separate living room, and free WiFi. Start the day with a free hot breakfast before exploring the historic district just four miles away, or unpack your hiking boots and discover why Savannah is one of the top 10 walking cities in the country.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Savannah Midtown
description: Savannah Technical College and Hunter Army Airfield are moments from our Midtown hotel. The Oglethorpe Mall and the Medical Arts district are both within two miles. Savannah State University is 15 minutes east, and it's a five-mile drive north to downtown. We serve breakfast and dinner daily in our Garden Grille & Bar. WiFi's on us, and we have an outdoor pool.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Savannah Midtown
description: We're nestled in midtown within a mile of supermarkets, plentiful dining, and Savannah Technical College. Hunter Army Airfield, Forsyth Park, and Savannah's must-see historic district are all within 10 minutes of the hotel. Enjoy our indoor saline pool, and multi-task your laundry and fitness routine in our Spin2 Cycle area. Breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Savannah Historic District
description: Find us in downtown Savannah, between iconic River Street and City Market. We're less than a mile from Telfair Museums, Forsyth Park, and Savannah Historic District. Juliette Gordon Low Birthplace Museum is six minutes away and Wormsloe Historic Site is 20 minutes. Enjoy our outdoor pool, fitness center, and a warm DoubleTree cookie on arrival.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Savannah
description: We're in the heart of Savannah's historic district, walking distance from the Georgia State Railroad Museum. The Rousakis Riverfront Plaza and ferry to the Savannah Convention Center are a mile away. Enjoy free cooked-to-order breakfast and drinks at our complimentary Evening Reception.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Savannah Historic District
description: Boutique Savannah restaurants and bars fill the neighboring blocks. Entertainment along the riverfront is one block over, as well as the ferry to the convention center. The Georgia State Railroad Museum and Davenport House Museum are both within a mile. Breakfast and dinner are served daily in our Garden Grille & Bar. Enjoy our heated outdoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Savannah Historic District
description: On the edge of Savannah’s historic district, our hotel is half a mile from the Savannah River and City Market. The Old Town Trolley tour leaves two blocks from our hotel. We're close to I-16 and I-516, and 15 minutes from Savannah/Hilton Head Airport. Relax in our outdoor pool and enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Savannah-Historic District
description: Savannah history is footsteps away – the Owens Thomas House, Davenport House Museum, and Georgia State Railroad Museum are all within a mile. Local eateries and shops line the nearby streets, and the riverfront is one block away with a ferry to the convention center. Get a great view of the city from our rooftop pool. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Savannah Historic District/Riverfront
description: Our riverside location offers great views from our rooftop pool and bar. Enjoy easy access to the convention center via the Savannah Belles Ferry, just a two-minute walk away. Boutique shops and restaurants line the streets of the historic district. Enjoy free hot breakfast each morning and complimentary evening socials Tuesday – Thursday.

name: Tru By Hilton Savannah Midtown
description: You've spent the day walking cobblestone streets—now relax on clean white sheets. Unwind with free WiFi, or grab a late-night wine or beer from our 24/7 market. When you're ready to get up and go again, our free breakfast is the perfect fuel for a day of historic sightseeing. Parking is free, too.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Atlanta/Perimeter Center
description: Find us off Route 400, a half-mile from Sandy Springs MARTA station – which has direct rail connections to Hartsfield-Jackson International Airport. Perimeter Mall is five minutes away, and downtown Atlanta is 15 miles south of us. Enjoy our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday, an in-suite kitchen, and free daily breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn Atlanta-Perimeter Center
description: Located along I-285 in Perimeter Center, we're eight minutes from North Springs Transit Station.  Northside Hospital Atlanta and Emory Saint Joseph's Hospital are 10 minutes' drive. Downtown is 14 miles away. Enjoy free daily hot breakfast, WiFi, and our outdoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn Statesboro
description: Off SR 67, with a range of restaurants nearby, we're five minutes from downtown Statesboro. East Georgia Regional Medical Center, Georgia Southern University, and the campus' Botanic Garden are within a mile of the hotel. Visit the Georgia Southern Museum, or hit the slides at Splash in The Boro Waterpark, within five miles. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Statesboro
description: Georgia Southern University is within walking distance, while East Georgia Regional Medical Center, Ogeechee Technical College and Paulson Stadium are all nearby. Fill up on free breakfast, take advantage of the free WiFi and feel free to bring your pet.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Atlanta - Buckhead
description: We’re in the business district, minutes from the Atlanta Financial Center. We offer a free three-mile shuttle. Lenox Square is half a mile away, and downtown is seven miles. It’s 30 minutes to the airport, by car or from Buckhead MARTA station, a few steps from our hotel. Our Green Leaf restaurant serves breakfast, and Slightly South is open for dinner.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta Buckhead Place
description: We're five minutes from premium shopping at Lenox Square, and there's dozens of restaurants within a mile. Visit the Atlanta History Center a mile away and tour the Swan House mansion. It's 10 miles to the World of Coca-Cola, State Farm Arena, and Mercedes-Benz Stadium downtown. Take a relaxing swim in our outdoor pool. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Thomson
description: We're less than a mile from I-20, 30 minutes from Augusta and its renowned golf course, home of the Masters. Head south to Main Street for downtown shopping and dining, just a mile from your room. Start each day with free hot breakfast, and work out in our fitness center. WiFi is free.

name: Hampton Inn Waynesboro
description: We’re right off Highway 25, just 30 miles north of Augusta National Golf Club, home of the PGA Masters Golf Tournament. Fuel up with our daily free hot breakfast before heading down to Augusta. Relax in our outdoor pool and get some work done in our business center – or in your room, with free WiFi.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Alana - Waikiki Beach
description: Find us on the edge of Waikiki, within a mile of Waikiki Beach, Duke Kahanamoku Lagoon, and the Ala Moana Center. Waikiki Aquarium, Royal Hawaiian Center, and downtown Honolulu are within three miles. Daniel K. Inouye International Airport is 15 minutes away. Enjoy our pool with decking, ocean views, and a DoubleTree cookie on arrival.

name: The Grand Islander by Hilton Grand Vacations
description: We’re located in the Hilton Hawaiian Village with access to multiple dining outlets, water sport activities, and pools. Kahanamoku Beach is a short walk away and we’re a five-minute drive from Hawai’i Convention Center. Downtown Honolulu and Diamond Head Crater are within four miles. We have a pool, spa, and fitness center onsite.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Waikiki Beach Walk
description: Our all-suite hotel is one block from swimming and sunbathing on Waikiki Beach and less than half a mile from the International Marketplace. Hawai'i Convention Center, the Honolulu Zoo, and the Waikiki Aquarium are all within 10 minutes. Enjoy free made-to-order breakfast and our complimentary evening social on the Grand Lanai.

name: Hokulani Waikiki by Hilton Grand Vacations
description: We’re surrounded by local shopping and dining, a short walk from Waikiki Beach. The Hawai’i Convention Center is less than a mile away and we’re a short drive from Ala Wai Golf Course. Downtown Honolulu and the summit of Diamond Head – the island’s volcanic crater – are within 10 minutes. Our ocean-view rooftop has a plunge pool, whirlpool, and bar.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Waikiki Beach
description: Our hotel is just two blocks from the warm sand of Waikiki Beach. We're walking distance from the International Market Place and surrounded by city dining, with Honolulu Zoo five minutes away. Daniel K. Inouye International Airport is 11 miles from the door. Kick back in our rooftop pool with sundeck and enjoy our fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Oahu/Kapolei
description: We're in Ka Makana Ali'i shopping center, 10 minutes from the University of Hawaii – West Oahu. Local dining, shopping, and a movie theater are steps from the door, and Varona Village Station is a mile away. We're 15 minutes from Ko Olina Lagoons and Beach Park. Wake up to free hot breakfast, and enjoy our free WiFi, fitness center, and outdoor pool.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Oahu Kapolei
description: Find us a mile from Wet ‘n’ Wild Hawaii, and 20 minutes from Pearl Harbor. We offer a free shuttle to White Plains Beach and other area beaches. Soak up the sun by our outdoor pool, complete with waterfall and whirlpool. We have two restaurants, and serve a complimentary reception and free cooked-to-order breakfast daily.

name: Kohala Suites by Hilton Grand Vacations
description: We're a mile from Hilton Waikoloa Village via free shuttle, and access to their amenities and restaurants comes with your stay. The Waikoloa Kings' and Waikoloa Beach golf courses are within one mile. We have a putting course, suites with kitchens, an outdoor pool and bar, free-to-use barbecues, and a grocery delivery service. Kona Airport is 25 minutes away.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Boise Downtown
description: Walk to it all – the Boise Centre, Basque Block, and dozens of shops, breweries, and local restaurants are within a mile of the hotel. We're pet-friendly and just five minutes from the Boise River Greenbelt and Military Reserve trails. Catch the sunrise on our park-like patio and head down the slide in the indoor pool. A sunlit boardroom has meetings covered.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Boise-Downtown
description: We're in the heart of downtown Boise, within half a mile of the Boise Centre, CenturyLink Arena, and dozens of restaurants and shops. It's one mile to Boise State University, with a free shuttle to the stadium during football season. We also run a free shuttle to the airport. Enjoy our indoor saltwater pool and whirlpool. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Boise Downtown
description: Discover downtown Boise – CenturyLink Arena events, Boise River Greenbelt, and Boise State University campus are all within a mile. We're three miles from Idaho Botanical Garden next to the Old Idaho Penitentiary. Our free shuttle covers a one-mile radius, and the Garden Grille & Bar offers breakfast, dinner, and evening room service.

name: Hampton Inn Boise - Airport
description: We're off I-84, within a half mile of restaurants. Take our free shuttle to Boise Airport, one mile away. Zoo Boise, Boise Art Museum, and Boise Factory Outlet are within five miles of the hotel. Boise State University is seven minutes away. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, WiFi, and our indoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Boise/Spectrum
description: Just off I-84 in western Boise, we're seven miles from downtown and Boise State University. Boise Spectrum Center, a range of restaurants, and an IMAX theater are in walking distance. Take our free 24-hour shuttle to/from Boise Airport, eight minutes away. Enjoy free daily hot breakfast and WiFi along with our indoor pool, whirlpool, and 24-hour fitness center.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Boise Spectrum
description: Find us in one of Boise City's largest entertainment districts. We're adjacent to Boise Spectrum Center, steps from shopping, dining, and an IMAX theater and two miles from the Aquarium of Boise. Boise Airport is 10 minutes away via free 24-hour shuttle. We have a restaurant and bar, with evening room service, and a 24-hour shop.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Boise
description: Our location takes convenience to a new level: Zoo Boise, Boise State University, downtown, the State Capitol, and Boise International Airport are all 15 minutes or less from our hotel. We're just off I-84, steps from shopping, dining and movies at the Boise Spectrum. Choose a one- or two-bedroom, or a studio – each suite has a fully equipped kitchen.

name: Tru by Hilton Meridian Boise West
description: If you’re keen for some local flavor, you’re in luck. We’re ideal for the Boise Brews Cruise. How about something corny, like Idaho’s original corn maze at the Farmstead? There’s always the Roaring Springs Water Park and Boise River Greenbelt to the East. No, sorry, the West… We’ll get back to you once we’re out of this maze. Enjoy free WiFi and breakfast in the meantime.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Boise-Meridian
description: We're off I-84 in Meridian, nine miles from downtown Boise, with a range of restaurants nearby. Lamb Weston, Fiberpipe, and Micron Semiconductor Products are all within 15 minutes of the hotel. Boise State University is 10 miles' drive. A free shuttle to Boise Airport is available Monday to Friday, 8:00 am to 8:00 pm. Enjoy free hot breakfast, WiFi, and our pool and hot tub.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Boise/Eagle
description: Our hotel is next to the Boise River, with a variety of dining in walking distance. The Village At Meridian mall and movie theater are five miles away. It’s easy to get to Boise and the airport, both within 15 miles. We offer a free shuttle. Eat breakfast and dinner in our Garden Grille restaurant; grab a drink or snack at the 24 hour Pavilion Pantry.

name: Hampton Inn Burley
description: We're off Highway 30, on the Snake River shoreline, one mile from Cassia County Fair & Rodeo. Storybook Park and Cassia Historical Society Museum can be reached in five minutes, and Minidoka County Historical Society Museum is 11 miles away. Enjoy our indoor heated pool, whirlpool, free WiFi, and free hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Coeur d' Alene
description: We're by the Spokane River, near I-90. You'll be a short walk from Village at Riverstone shopping, quick bites, and Regal Cinemas, with the North Idaho Centennial Trail passing by our door. Kick the day off with free hot breakfast before exploring Lake Coeur d'Alene, 25 minutes away. Enjoy our free WiFi, indoor pool, and fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Boise/Nampa at the Idaho Center
description: We’re just off I-84, 20 miles west of Boise and steps from the Ford Idaho Center. Explore World War II history at the Warhawk Air Museum, five minutes away, and tee off at one of Nampa's local courses, less than a mile from our front door. Work out in our fitness center, and enjoy free WiFi and hot breakfast.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Nampa
description: Whether it’s business, leisure or a combination of both, our pet-friendly suites are your home away from home. Cook in your very own kitchen or head out to explore the Ford Idaho Center, Horse Park, and downtown Boise – all minutes away. Join us for breakfast and take advantage of the WiFi, both free.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Idaho Falls
description: Our rooms are next to the Snake River, with easy access to the riverside Greenbelt Trail. We're less than a mile from local dining, shopping, and downtown Idaho Falls, home to the Museum of Idaho. Our free 24-hour shuttle covers three miles, including Idaho Falls Regional Airport. Enjoy our indoor pool and seasonal outdoor bar and patio.

name: Hampton Inn Idaho Falls/Airport
description: Find us in the center of Idaho Falls, just off I-15. We're three miles from the airport and we even offer a free shuttle, making your travel a breeze. It's just a few steps to the Greenbelt Trail – perfect for a stroll along the Snake River. The Ice Arena, is two miles away: watch a hockey game or a figure skating competition, or get on skates yourself. Our daily hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Tru by Hilton Idaho Falls
description: Find us off I-15, by the Snake Riverwalk which connects you to the Idaho Falls River Walk trail. Within a mile you'll reach the center of town, the Japanese Friendship Garden, and the Museum of Idaho. Idaho Falls Regional Airport is less than six minutes from our door. Enjoy a free hot breakfast, and complimentary hot drinks in the lobby.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Idaho Falls
description: When you land, grab our free shuttle bus. Once you’re here, you’ll be close to the city center, Museum of Idaho, and dog walks in Tautphaus Park. Speaking of walks, grab some free breakfast before you take on Idaho Falls River Walk. Local restaurants can satisfy vacation cravings, but you’ll have an in-suite kitchen if home cooking’s your style. WiFi’s on us.

name: Hampton Inn Idaho Falls At the Mall
description: Find us off Highway 26, just three minutes from Grand Teton Mall and Edwards Grand Teton 14. Tee off at Sand Creek Golf Course or visit the Tautphaus Park Zoo—both under 10 minutes. The Museum of Idaho is three miles away. Breakfast and WiFi are on us. We also offer free passes to Apple Athletic Club down the street.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Rexburg
description: We're on the southern edge of Rexburg, less than two miles from Brigham Young University's Idaho campus. Drive through Yellowstone Bearworld, nine miles away, and hit the slopes at Kelly Canyon Ski Resort, half an hour south of our hotel. Wake up to free hot breakfast and stay connected with free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Lewiston
description: Our hotel offers impressive views of the Clearwater and Snake Rivers at the edge of Hells Canyon. The canyon is a great spot for a hike or a guided tour. Relax on our patio and enjoy the scenery, or swim in our heated indoor pool. The WiFi and hot breakfast are free, as is the shuttle to and from the airport, three miles away.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Mountain Home
description: You’ll be 10 minutes from St. Luke’s Elmore Medical Center, with access to Mountain Home Air Force Base, half an hour’s drive away. It’s just 15 minutes to and from Mountain Home Municipal Airport – find us off I-84. We’re half an hour from Bruneau Dunes State Park, the site of North America’s highest sand dune. Enjoy dining steps away, and WiFi and hot breakfast on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Pocatello
description: We’re just off I-15, near the junction with I-86 in the Pocatello Valley. Idaho State University is a mile away – catch a game at the Holt Arena. We're 10 minutes from Ross Park, where you can explore the Fort Hall replica or have family fun at the Aquatic Complex. And the Lava Hot Springs are just 35 miles away. WiFi and hot breakfast are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Twin Falls
description: Just off US 93, we're four minutes from Perrine Bridge, and eight miles from the site of Evil Knievel's Snake River Canyon jump. Walk the Canyon Rim and enjoy climbing, hiking, and picnics, or tee off at Canyon Springs Golf Course, two miles away. Stroll to Magic Valley Mall, and local restaurants, or relax in our large pool. WiFi and parking are on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Twin Falls
description: We're off US-93, about five minutes from the College of Southern Idaho, Magic Valley Mall, and the Perrine Memorial Bridge spanning the Snake River. Experience natural beauty at Shoshone Falls Park, seven miles away. Relax in our indoor pool and whirlpool. Cooked-to-order breakfast and dinner are served daily in our Garden Grille & Bar.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Eagle Boise
description: None

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Addison
description: We're just south of the junction of I-290 and I-355, 20 minutes from Chicago O'Hare International Airport and 25 miles from downtown Chicago. Grab your clubs and head to Maple Meadows Golf Club, 10 minutes' drive away, or hit the shops at Stratford Square Mall, six miles from us. Unwind in our pool and enjoy daily hot breakfast and WiFi on us.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Chicago Wood Dale - Elk Grove
description: Our hotel is next to Elk Grove's business district, offering a free shuttle to local destinations during commute hours. O'Hare International Airport, Allstate Arena, and the Fashion Outlets of Chicago are all within 10 miles. Enjoy our complimentary Manager's Reception on Tuesdays from 5:30pm – 6:30pm.

name: Hilton Chicago/Oak Brook Suites
description: We’re in Oak Brook, a short walk from Drury Lane Theatre & Events and 10 minutes from Oakbrook Center mall. Brookfield Zoo is eight miles away and we’re a half-hour from downtown Chicago. We have a free local shuttle, indoor pool, and fitness center. Enjoy our patio with a fire pit and all-day dining at our on-site restaurant. WiFi’s on us.

name: Hilton Chicago O'Hare Airport
description: We’re in the grounds of Chicago O’Hare International Airport, with a covered walkway to domestic terminals and a shuttle to international terminals. Downtown Chicago is a 50-minute train ride on the Blue-line. We have a fitness center, an indoor pool, and a sauna. Enjoy room service, all-day dining at our restaurants, and a grab n’ go market.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Chicago/Oakbrook Terrace
description: We're steps from Drury Lane Theatre & Events center, less than two miles from central Oakbrook Terrace and Oakbrook Center shopping. Explore within a five-mile radius with our free weekday shuttle. O'Hare International Airport is 15 miles away, and we're 20 miles west of Chicago. Enjoy our indoor pool, fitness center, and Terrace Grille & Bar.

name: Hampton Inn Chicago-O'Hare International Airport
description: We're off I-294, four miles from O'Hare International Airport—our free 24-hour shuttle will take you there. Donald E. Stephens Convention Center, and designer deals at Fashion Outlets of Chicago, are less than 10 minutes' drive from our door. Downtown Chicago is 20 miles away. Enjoy daily hot breakfast, WiFi, and parking on us.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Chicago - Oak Brook
description: Our hotel is across from Oakbrook Center Mall, the second-largest shopping center in the region. We're close to interstates 88 and 294 — within half an hour of downtown Chicago, Midway, and O'Hare. We offer shuttle service to area offices and attractions in a five-mile radius, and we have more than 35,000 square feet of meeting space.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Chicago Lombard Oak Brook
description: We're off I-88 in Lombard, a 10-minute walk from Yorktown Center's shops and restaurants, and within three miles of the Oakbrook Center mall. We have an indoor pool, 24-hour fitness center, and a stylish and modern atrium where free cooked-to-order breakfast and a complimentary evening reception are served daily.

name: Hampton Inn Chicago-Carol Stream
description: Our Carol Stream hotel is off North Avenue, 10 minutes from both Wheaton College and Central DuPage Hospital. You’ll find four golf courses within five miles too. Spend a leisurely afternoon at Lynfred Winery or viewing the Civil War memorabilia at the Cantigny Park estate – both less than 10 miles away. Our pet-friendly hotel has a heated indoor pool, and WiFi and hot breakfast are free.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Chicago O'Hare Airport - Rosemont
description: Our hotel is adjacent to Donald E. Stephens Convention Center, with easy access to I-294 and I-190. We're five minutes from O'Hare International Airport via free 24-hour shuttle, and the Rosemont entertainment district is a half-mile away. Enjoy our fitness center, heated indoor pool, and a warm DoubleTree cookie when you arrive.

name: DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel & Conference Center Chicago-Downers Grove
description: Stretch out in a suite in Downers Grove: our hotel is just off Interstate 355 in the southwest Chicago suburbs. We offer a free shuttle to the Esplanade Center, Morton Arboretum, and anywhere else in five miles. The Esplanade at DoubleTree boasts more than 20,000 square feet of IACC-approved event space, including a ballroom with panoramic lake views.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Rosemont Chicago O'Hare
description: We’re less than 10 minutes from O'Hare International Airport (ORD) via our free shuttle service. Donald E. Stephens Convention Center, Rivers Casino Des Plaines, and a variety of restaurants are within a mile. Rosemont rail station is a five-minute drive away. We’ve got an indoor pool, fitness center, bar, and patio with fire pit. Enjoy free WiFi and daily free hot breakfast.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Chicago OHare Airport
description: Our airport shuttle goes back and forth between O'Hare and our hotel, three miles away. Rivers Casino is within walking distance, and it's two miles to the Stephens Convention Center, Fashion Outlets of Chicago, and Allstate Arena. Breakfast, lunch, and dinner are served daily at our Garden Grille & Bar. Enjoy our indoor pool and free WiFi.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Chicago - Alsip
description: Off I-294, our hotel is 20 minutes from Chicago Midway International Airport via free shuttle. We're within 10 miles of Lake Katherine Nature Center and SeatGeek Stadium, home of the Chicago Fire soccer club. Downtown Chicago is 22 miles away. Perks include free parking, an indoor pool, and a warm DoubleTree cookie on arrival.

name: Hilton Chicago/Oak Lawn
description: Our hotel sits at the intersection of Route 50/Highway 20, adjacent to Advocate Christ Medical Center and Coral Plaza Shopping Center. We're one mile from Oak Lawn Metro station, linking directly to Chicago, with Chicago Midway Airport 15 minutes away via free shuttle. Perks include our fitness center, indoor pool, and free parking.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Chicago Midway Airport
description: We're two miles south of Chicago Midway International Airport — go between us and the airport with our free shuttle. Several dining options are within half a mile and we offer free overnight parking. It's 13 miles to downtown Chicago. Take a relaxing swim in our heated indoor pool, featuring an oversized deck and a foosball table. WiFi's on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Chicago/Midway Airport
description: We're two miles from The Orange Line train to downtown, located at the Chicago Midway International Airport, both can be accessed via our free airport shuttle. Enjoy plenty of restaurants within walking distance. McCormick Place and the United Center are within 20 minutes. We've got park-and-fly packages, an indoor pool, 24-hour shop and our restaurant is open for breakfast and dinner.

name: Hampton Inn Chicago-Midway Airport
description: We're right off I-55 and I-90, less than two miles from Chicago Midway International Airport via our free shuttle service. Shopping and dining at Ford City Mall is five minutes away, while iconic Chicago attractions like The Magnificent Mile and Millennium Park are less than 15 miles from our door. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast and free WiFi.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Orland Park
description: The neighborhood is packed with golf courses, including Cog Hill Country Club. If you'd rather hit the stores, check out Orland Square Shopping Mall, two miles away. Grab the train from 153rd Street and be in downtown Chicago within the hour. For a quiet night, make the most of your in-suite kitchen. WiFi, breakfast, and our evening social, Monday – Thursday, are free.

name: Hampton Inn Chicago/Tinley Park
description: Located off I-80, we are seven minutes from Vogt Visual Arts Center, Hollywood Casino Amphitheatre, and Tinley Park Convention Center. A nine-minute drive will take you to the track at Accelerate Indoor Speedway. Tee off at the Odyssey Golf Foundation, just seven miles away. Parking is free, and we’ve got WiFi and hot breakfast covered.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Chicago/Tinley Park
description: Our hotel is off I-80 and US-45, within five miles of Hollywood Casino Amphitheatre and White Water Canyon Water Park. The shops at Orland Square mall are 15 minutes north, and we're 31 miles from downtown Chicago. Restaurants are within walking distance, and we serve breakfast and dinner in our Garden Grille & Bar. WiFi's on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Chicago Southland-Matteson
description: Located in Matteson off I-57, we’re surrounded by village charm and just 30 miles from the city lights of downtown Chicago. We’re a great base for business travelers with IBM, Alco Spring, and Ford Motor Company nearby. Tee off at Deer Creek or catch some live music at The Hollywood Casino Amphitheater. Make the most of your stay with free WiFi, and free hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Chicago-Burr Ridge
description: Find us off I-55, five minutes from Burr Ridge Village Center shops and dining and 20 minutes from the Brookfield Zoo. Grab free hot breakfast before exploring inner Chicago: Millennium Park, the Art Institute of Chicago, and Wrigley Field ballgames are all within half an hour. We're 20 minutes from Chicago Midway Airport, and WiFi's on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites St. Louis/Alton
description: Our hotel is in Alton’s business district, just over half an hour from St Louis. Alton attractions including the National Great Rivers Museum, Alton Antique District, and Liberty Bank Amphitheater – are within five miles of our hotel. Enjoy free WiFi and hot breakfast, and swim in our heated indoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites St. Louis-Edwardsville
description: Find us off I-270, just seven minutes from Southern Illinois University Edwardsville. For some history, visit the Cohokia Mounds State Historic Site and Stephenson House, both within 13 minutes. Take a 20-minute drive to see the St. Louis Gateway Arch. Stay active in our fitness center and indoor pool. Start your day with our free hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn Collinsville
description: Find our Collinsville hotel off Highway 157, just 15 minutes from downtown St. Louis and Southern Illinois University Edwardsville. You’ll be steps from Gateway Convention Center and Fun Park, with plenty of shopping and dining in the neighborhood. St. Louis Downtown Airport is 20 minutes away. Wake up to free hot breakfast, and enjoy WiFi on us.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Collinsville - St. Louis
description: We're off I-55 near the I-255 interchange, a short walk from from Gateway Convention Center. Downtown St. Louis, World Wide Technology Raceway, and Cahokia Mounds State Historic Site are all within 12 miles. Keep up your exercise routine in our fitness center and take a dip in our heated pool. Enjoy a warm welcome cookie on arrival.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Chicago/Mt. Prospect
description: Meet the neighbors: Randhurst Village shopping, restaurants, and an AMC cinema are all steps from our door. You'll be 20 minutes from Allstate Arena events, Donald E. Stephens Convention Center, and Rivers Casino. Daily free hot breakfast is an ideal start for trips to Chicago, 35 minutes away. Enjoy our free WiFi, indoor pool, and fitness center.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Chicago Schaumburg Woodfield
description: Our hotel is a half-mile from Schaumburg Convention Center, near I-90 and I-290. We're surrounded by dining and shopping options, and Woodfield Mall is two miles south. Enjoy our free made-to-order breakfast and complimentary evening Reception. O'Hare Airport is 13 miles away.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Chicago Schaumburg
