description: Find us off I-290, in the heart of the business district. We’re less than a mile from Woodfield Mall and nearby dining options. Pepsico and Experian are within four minutes, while Capital One, IBM, and Schaumburg Convention Center are two miles away. Our free hot breakfast will get your day started on the right foot. Enjoy our indoor heated pool and free WiFi.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Chicago Schaumburg
description: Set in the heart of Schaumburg’s business district, near the LEGOLAND Center and Woodfield Mall, our extended-stay Home2 Suites can be your home away from home, for either work or fun. Enjoy a free breakfast with hundreds of combos to choose from, and free WiFi. Check out our outdoor firepit and BBQ grills, or take a dip in the heated indoor saline pool. Pets are more than welcome.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Chicago - Schaumburg
description: Find us off I-290, close to various restaurants, and within two miles of IBM, Capital One, and AT&T. Attractions like Legoland, Medieval Times Dinner & Tournament, and Woodfield Mall can be reached in six minutes. O'Hare International Airport is 14 miles from our door. Our free shuttle will take you anywhere within five miles.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Schaumburg
description: We’re less than a mile from Woodfield Mall and the Streets of Woodfield, and within 5-miles of LEGOLAND Discovery Center Chicago, Medieval Times, Paylocity, Zurich, Verizon, and IBM offices. Arlington Park is just 15 minutes away. Enjoy breakfast and dinner, including evening room service, from our Garden Bar & Grille, along with snacks from our 24-hour Pavilion Pantry.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Chicago - Schaumburg
description: Take in Arlington International Racecourse, catch a ballgame at Boomers Stadium, or explore Chicago Botanic Garden. We're just 10 minutes from Schaumburg Convention Center, IBM, and Motorola, and 30 minutes from downtown Chicago. Get creative in your in-suite kitchen or stop by our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hilton Chicago/Northbrook
description: Situated on the banks of the Des Plaines River, we’re 15 minutes from Chicago O’Hare International Airport. Surrounded by tranquil woods, we have walking and running trails right outside our door as well as an indoor pool, whirlpool, and sauna. Our award-winning restaurant Allgauer’s on the Riverfront boasts water views and an enticing menu.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Chicago Deer Park
description: We’re off US-12, a half-mile from Deer Park Town Center. Cook County, Deer Grove, and Cuba Marsh Forest Preserves are 10 minutes away. Arlington International Racecourse is seven miles from our door and we’re under an hour from Central Chicago. We have an indoor pool and fitness center. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Chicago/Lincolnshire
description: We're off Highway 45, across from the Ryerson Conservation Area and its riverside trails. Our hotel is next to several restaurants and City Park Corporate Center. You'll also find large corporations within a few miles, including Siemens and W.W. Grainger. It's easy to unwind with a free pass to Lifetime Fitness throughout your stay. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us, too.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Chicago North Shore Deerfield
description: Our hotel is in Chicago's North Shore suburbs, less than a mile from Baxter and Walgreens headquarters. We offer a free shuttle to the Metra and other destinations within five miles. The Chicago Botanic Garden, Great Lakes Naval Base, and Ravinia are 20 minutes away. Enjoy made-to-order breakfast and our complimentary evening reception.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Chicago/Aurora
description: Our hotel offers easy access to I-88, and is just a 10-minute drive to the Chicago Premium Outlets. We're next door to the Aurora West Forest Preserve, a protected marsh and woodland, six minutes from Blackberry Farm, and less than 20 minutes from Raging Waves Waterpark. We have an indoor pool and kiddie pool. Free hot breakfast is served daily, and WiFi's on us.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Aurora Naperville
description: Tucked in a corporate park yet less than 10 minutes from central Naperville, we’re ideal for both business travelers and those out for the fun of it. Chicago is just 40 minutes away, and golfers can drive just 15 minutes to Aurora Country Club. Enjoy free breakfast, WiFi and Monday – Thursday evening socials during your stay.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Naperville/Warrenville
description: We're located off I-88, a short walk from of a variety of popular shops and restaurants. St. James Farm Forest Preserve and strolls along the DuPage River are under 10 minutes away. Downtown Chicago and O’Hare International Airport can be reached in 30 minutes. Enjoy our fitness center and on-site convenience store.

name: Hampton Inn Yorkville
description: Find us at the Highway 34/47 intersection, two miles from downtown Yorkville. Dive into family fun at Raging Waves Waterpark, just three miles away, or head out to Silver Springs State Park for a little Illinois nature, seven miles from the door. Free hot breakfast is great fuel for Chicago day trips, an hour’s drive. Enjoy WiFi on us.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Chicago Naperville
description: Find us off I-88 in Naperville, two miles from DuPage Children’s Museum and less than five minutes from area restaurants and several corporate offices. Downtown Chicago and O'Hare International Airport are both within a half hour drive away. Enjoy daily free cooked-to-order breakfast, a nightly evening reception, our indoor pool, and fitness center access.

name: Hampton Inn Chicago/Naperville
description: Historic downtown Naperville, the Riverwalk and idyllic DuPath river brick walks are three miles away. From paddleboat rides to a plant-filled arboretum, cultural centers to children’s museums – there’s something for everyone. But first, fill up on our free hot breakfast.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Lisle Naperville
description: Off the I-88 Corporate Corridor, We're within 10 minutes of historic Naperville, Morton Arboretum, and The DuPage Children’s Museum. Chicago Premium Outlet Mall is less than 15 minutes away. Our hotel features a 24-hour lobby market, indoor pool, and sundeck. Your stay begins with a warm DoubleTree welcome cookie.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Chicago/St. Charles
description: We're in the St. Charles suburb, about 40 miles from downtown Chicago. Enjoy live music at the Arcada Theatre, two miles from our hotel. In five minutes you're strolling or biking along the trails by the Fox River, or seeing the horses at the Lamplight Equestrian Center. Take a dip in our indoor saltwater pool. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Hilton Garden Inn St. Charles
description: The Pheasant Run Resort is opposite our hotel. The Fox River and downtown are both within 10 minutes: catch a show at the Arcada Theatre. Geneva’s shopping is five miles away. Our Great American Grill serves breakfast and dinner, with room service every evening. The 24-hour Pavilion Pantry offers drinks and snacks.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Bolingbrook
description: We're right off I-55, near the corporate headquarters of over two dozen companies, and 40 minutes from downtown Chicago. Explore over 1,000 acres of nearby recreational space at Bolingbrook Park District, or head south to try your luck at Joliet's casinos. Your stay includes free WiFi, daily hot breakfast, and access to our heated indoor pool.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Bolingbrook I-55
description: Find us off I-55, walking distance from neighborhood dining and shopping. We're 10 minutes from the Promenade Bolingbrook, Illinois scenery at Hidden Oaks Conservation Area and DuPage River Park, and family fun at Cypress Cove Aquatic Park. Try our restaurant for breakfast, dinner, and evening room service, and the 24-hour store for snacks.

name: Hampton Inn Joliet - I-55
description: We're next to I-55, one minute from the Louis Joliet Mall. Both Lewis University and Joliet Junior College are within seven miles, and downtown attractions including the University of St. Francis and the Old Joliet Prison are 30 minutes away. Take a dip in our indoor pool, and start each day with free hot breakfast. WiFi's on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Joliet Plainfield
description: Located off I-55, we're steps from Louis Joliet Mall and near restaurants and grocery stores. The University of St. Francis, Diageo, and ExxonMobil are a short drive away, as are the Rialto Square Theatre and Chicagoland. Your suite is equipped with a kitchen, making home cooking easy. WiFi is free and hot breakfast is also included.

name: Hampton Inn Chicago McCormick Place
description: We are connected to McCormick Place and located across from Wintrust Arena. The Art Institute of Chicago, Millennium Park, and the Field Museum are under 10 minutes’ drive from our door. Within walking distance, Soldier Field and Michigan Avenue are under a mile away. Our hotel has a fitness center and indoor pool. WiFi and daily hot breakfast are on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Chicago McCormick Place
description: The best of South Loop is on our doorstep: We're next to Wintrust Arena, with a skybridge to the McCormick Place convention center and easy access to Chicago's top attractions. Your stay includes an in-suite kitchen, free WiFi, and free daily breakfast. While you're here, admire sweeping views of Lake Michigan from the 22nd floor rooftop bar, or take a swim in our indoor pool.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Chicago McCormick Place
description: We are connected to McCormick Place Convention Center via sky-bridge. The nearby subway train brings guests to Millennium Park and downtown attractions. Wintrust Arena and Soldier Field are within a mile. Guests can enjoy a view of Chicago and Lake Michigan at our VU Skyward rooftop bar. We also have a Starbucks onsite in our lobby.

name: Hampton Inn Chicago Downtown West Loop
description: We’re off I-90, a short walk from Union Station, downtown Chicago highlights, and local dining spots. United Center is a five-minute drive and we’re 16 miles from O’Hare International Airport. Sample local craft beer at our self-pour bar, Fulton Tap. Enjoy our outdoor terrace, fitness center, and indoor saltwater pool. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Chicago Downtown West Loop
description: We’re a short walk from downtown Chicago’s major attractions and a variety of local dining spots. Ogilvie Transportation Center is one block away and we’re a half-mile from Union Station for links to O’Hare and Midway airport. Our self-pour bar, Fulton Tap, allows you to sample local craft beer by the ounce. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast and WiFi on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Chicago Downtown South Loop
description: Find a comfy room in downtown Chicago's South Loop area, two blocks from Grant Park. We're a short walk from Roosevelt Metro station, surrounded by restaurants, and one mile from the Art Institute of Chicago next to Millennium Park. We have all-day dining at our Garden Grille & Bar, a 24-hour shop, and rooms with views of Lake Michigan.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Chicago Downtown South Loop
description: Home is in downtown Chicago, one mile from Block 37 shopping, with dining on our doorstep. Shedd Aquarium and Skydeck Chicago are both within 10 minutes of your room. Grab free breakfast before exploring Millennium and Grant Parks, five minutes away. Enjoy in-suite cooking, or stop by our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday. WiFi's on us.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Bloomington
description: The warm welcome at our hotel in Bloomington starts with the signature DoubleTree chocolate chip cookie at check-in. We’re a 10-minute drive to both Miller Park Zoo, and Eastland Mall. We have an indoor pool, sauna, and hot tub, as well as a video gaming room. Enjoy a drink at Brickyard Bar, or stop by TGI Friday’s for a menu full of familiar favorites.

name: Hampton Inn Bloomington West
description: We're off I-55, within four miles of Illinois Wesleyan and Illinois State universities. The Illinois Shakespeare Festival hosts family-friendly open-air theater productions every summer, and the historic David Davis Mansion is less than five miles away. Enjoy free WiFi and free hot breakfast, and our fitness center and indoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Bloomington-Normal
description: Find our Bloomington home next to the Shoppes at College Hills, 10 minutes from Illinois State University. Enjoy free hot breakfast before visiting Miller Park Zoo, 15 minutes from the door. WiFi's on us, and you'll have access to our indoor pool and whirlpool. Central Illinois Regional Airport is 10 minutes away.

name: Hampton Inn Lincoln
description: Find us off I-55, just 10 minutes from central Lincoln – the only town named by Abraham Lincoln himself. Explore Lincoln Heritage Museum for more Honest Abe history. We’re 10 minutes from Lincoln College and Lincoln Christian University, and equally close to Logan County Airport. Dining is steps away, and free hot breakfast and WiFi are yours.

name: Hampton Inn Pontiac
description: We're right along I-55, with a Walmart and a handful of restaurants right next door. Historic US Route 66 passes through Pontiac, and you'll find the highway's Hall of Fame & Museum just three miles away in the town's center, along with local shops. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Peoria-East At The River Boat Crossing
description: Find us off Highway 150, next to the Par-A-Dice Riverboat Casino and less than a mile from dining options. Peoria Civic Center, Northwoods Mall, and Forest Park Nature Center are within 15 minutes. Work out in our fitness center or take a dip in the pool. Every stay with us includes free WiFi and daily free hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn Bourbonnais Kankakee
description: We're right off I-57, next to the Northfield Square Mall, with more restaurants and stores less than a quarter mile away. We offer a free shuttle service to a number of local businesses, and Olivet Nazarene University is a two-mile drive away. While you're with us, enjoy daily hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our indoor pool.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Kankakee
description: We're just off I-57, within a mile of companies including Shoup, BASF, and KB Cores. Downtown Kankakee entertainment and dining options are three miles north. It's 15 minutes to Olivet Nazarene University and CSL Behring. Cooked-to-order breakfast and dinner are served daily in our Garden Grille & Bar. Enjoy our indoor pool, 24-hour fitness center, and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Joliet - I-80
description: We’re off I-80, just 10 minutes from downtown, where you can take in a show at the historic Rialto Square Theatre. We're less than 15 minutes from the Chicagoland Speedway, and two riverboat casinos. Or find the fairways at Heritage Bluffs Public Golf Club, 10 minutes away. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Minooka
description: Find us just off I-80, with easy access to Canal Heritage Corridor, Starved Rock State Park, and Dollinger's Family Farm. We're close to business too, with Grainger, Electrolux, and BMW less than two miles away. Free hot breakfast starts your day right and you can connect with free WiFi. Make time to use our fitness center, modern meeting rooms, and indoor swimming pool with whirlpool.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Carbondale
description: In the heart of the downtown area, you’ll be close to Southern Illinois University, and the events and restaurants of Carbondale’s Main Street. If you feel like eating in, give your in-suite kitchen a shot; WiFi and breakfast are on us, too. Explore Shawnee National Forest or brave the waters of Cedar Lake.

name: Hampton Inn Carbondale
description: We're on the east side of the city on Illinois Route 13, just 10 minutes from South Illinois University. Enjoy our free hot breakfast before hitting the greens at Crab Orchard Golf Course, five miles away. The popular Shawnee Hills Wine Trail is a 40-minute drive. Relax on our sundeck and enjoy free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Champaign/Urbana
description: You’ll find us in downtown Urbana across the street from the University of Illinois. Students, alumni, parents, and Illini sports fans enjoy the perks of college town life in our convenient location. We're surrounded by restaurants, parks, and attractions, including the Cinema Gallery and historic Main Street.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Champaign-Urbana
description: We’re two blocks from the University of Illinois: games at Memorial Stadium and State Farm Center are within walking distance. Venture off campus for a visit to the Orpheum Children’s Science Museum and William M. Staerkel Planetarium. Wind down at Alto Vineyards or our evening social, Monday – Thursday. Enjoy an in-suite kitchen, and free WiFi and breakfast.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Champaign/ Urbana
description: We’re walking distance from The University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign. Head to campus to watch a game at Memorial Stadium and the State Farm Center, and visit Krannert Art Museum. Downtown dining and shopping can be reached in just two miles. Enjoy breakfast and dinner at our restaurant, and snacks from our 24-hour Pavilion Pantry.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Champaign / Urbana
description: Located one block from Hwy 45, we’re within two miles of County Market, Historic Virginia Theatre and Krannert Art Museum. Staerkel Planetarium is just five miles from our hotel. Parking, WiFi, breakfast and in-suite kitchen are included in your stay. Pets are welcome too. Our free airport shuttle is available daily, 7:30 am to 10:30 pm.

name: Hampton Inn Champaign Southwest
description: We’re just off I-57, within easy access of I-72, and just six miles from Willard Airport. It’s a 10-minute drive to the University of Illinois campus and sports, and the same to Parkland College. Downtown Champaign is just 15 minutes away, where you’ll find great dining, theater, and Orpheum Children’s Science Museum. Enjoy WiFi and breakfast on us. Pets are welcome.

name: Hampton Inn Majestic Chicago Theatre District
description: We're surrounded by Broadway shows, under the same roof as the CIBC Theatre and within half a mile of the Nederlander Theater, Cadillac Palace, and Auditorium Theatre. Millennium Park, The Art Institute of Chicago, and Willis Tower are all within a 10-minute walk. Blue and Red Line train stations are one minute away. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Chicago Downtown/N Loop/Michigan Ave
description: Find us off Michigan Avenue in the North Loop. We're within a half-mile of Millennium Park and the State and Lake L station – an easy gateway to downtown Chicago. Navy Pier is five minutes away. Stop by Jack's Place Bar in our Art Deco lobby, and enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our fitness center.

name: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: Once the iconic London Guarantee & Accident headquarters, our 1923 building was renowned as one of the "Big Four" skyscrapers around the former Michigan Avenue Bridge. Today, our rooms span an adjoining 22-story glass structure, walking distance from Millennium Park and Magnificent Mile shopping, with Chicago's only three-level rooftop bar.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Chicago-Downtown
description: Popular attractions are under a mile away, including the theater district, Magnificent Mile, Millennium Park, and Navy Pier. A Ruth's Chris Steak House is right in our hotel, and dozens of restaurants are in every direction. Take the Red Line nearby to Shedd Aquarium, the Field Museum, and McCormick Place. Enjoy our terrace and indoor pool. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Chicago-Downtown
description: We're surrounded by countless restaurants and entertainment options in every direction. Discover premium shopping along the Magnificent Mile one block east, and see a show in the arts district half a mile south. Take the nearby "L" directly to O'Hare International Airport (ORD). Enjoy free daily hot breakfast, a full kitchen, and free WiFi.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Chicago Downtown/Magnificent Mile
description: We're in River North, blocks from the Magnificent Mile and dozens of restaurants. Merchandise Mart is a half-mile from our hotel, and Navy Pier and "The Bean" are a mile away. Rail links to Wrigley Field, ORD airport, and MDW airport are across the street. We have an indoor pool, fitness center, free WiFi, and Weber Grill Restaurant.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Chicago Downtown
description: Find us right in the heart of downtown Chicago, within an eight-minute walk of Chicago Riverwalk and Navy Pier. The Chicago Loop with Millennium Park, The Art Institute of Chicago, and Chicago Theatre is less than a mile away. The Willis Tower is two miles away. A free made-to-order breakfast completes your stay.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Chicago Downtown Magnificent Mile
description: Our suites feature views of downtown Chicago and Lake Michigan, just two blocks from the Magnificent Mile. We're a 15-minute walk from Navy Pier and Millennium Park. The Grand CTA station is half a mile away, for access to more Chicago landmarks along the Red Line. Enjoy free made-to-order breakfast and our complimentary evening social.

name: Conrad Chicago
description: Our tech-enabled rooms, designed by Pierre-Yves Rochon, are steps from the buzz of Magnificent Mile. Navy Pier and Millennium Park are within a mile, and our concierge is on-hand to help you uncover hidden local gems. The fitness center, seasonal Japanese rooftop hangout, and our bourbon-centric restaurant complete your stay.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Chicago - Magnificent Mile
description: Tucked between Magnificent Mile shopping and Navy Pier attractions, our location makes exploring Chicago easy. We're a 10-minute walk from 360 CHICAGO, Millennium Park, and the CTA Red Line. Relax with a cocktail after a rooftop swim — the pool and bar are open all summer. The Mile offers condo-style stays with city views on the top five floors.

name: Hampton Inn St. Louis/Fairview Heights
description: Free WiFi, free breakfast, local 50s style dining: things have improved since the days of ancient civilization – see for yourself at nearby Cahokia Mounds’ display. We’re 12 miles from downtown, close to Mississippi River paddle boat cruises, St. Louis Art Museum exhibitions and the famous Gateway Arch, centerpiece of the Jefferson Expansion Memorial Monument.

name: Hampton Inn O'Fallon
description: Have the convenience of being connected with the Regency Conference Center and easy access to I-64 when you stay with us. We are also a great option for your next O’Fallon Family Sports Park event. Try a variety of eating options, from steakhouse to Italian dining, near our hotel.

name: Hampton Inn St. Louis-Columbia
description: We're next to I-255, half a mile from Falls Reception and Conference. It's a 14-mile drive to St. Louis's famous Gateway Arch, Rams football at The Dome at America's Center, and Cardinals baseball at Busch Stadium. Tour the Anheiser-Busch Brewery, home of Budweiser, only 17 miles away. Relax in our heated indoor pool. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Danville
description: Situated near the border of Illinois and Indiana with easy access to I-74, we are nine minutes from downtown. Pepsico and Genpact are within five miles. Discover local attractions like Vermilion County Museum, or catch a show at the Kathryn Randolph Theater, both within 12 minutes. Every stay with us includes free WiFi and free hot breakfast.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Dekalb
description: We’re north of I-88, less than 10 minutes from Northern Illinois University. Ellwood House Museum and Egyptian Theatre are a five-minute drive away. Whiskey Acres Distilling Co. is under seven miles from our door. Take a dip in our indoor heated saline pool. Each of our suites features an in-room kitchen, free breakfast, and WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn - DeKalb (Near the University)
description: Located off I-88, we're three minutes from Northern Illinois University. Visit local attractions like Glidden Historical Center, Ellwood House Museum, downtown DeKalb, and Egyptian Theatre – all within five minutes. NIU Convention Center and Nestle USA are a short distance away. Wake up to free hot breakfast. We’ve got your WiFi covered.

name: Hampton Inn Chicago Elgin / I-90
description: We’re at the junction of Route 31 North and I-90, just a mile from Judson University and 40 miles from downtown Chicago. Visit Elgin cultural attractions like the Gail Borden Public Library, and try your luck at the Grand Victoria Casino, just 10 minutes away. Enjoy free WiFi, hot breakfast, and tea and coffee in the lobby.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Rockford
description: Off I-90 and Highway 20, we're two miles north of Six Flags Magic Waters. Highway access puts us within 15 minutes of downtown Rockford, Anderson Japanese Gardens, and Discovery Center Museum, with Chicago Rockford International Airport 12 miles away. Enjoy our activity pool, with a zero-depth area for the little ones, and fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn Rockford
description: Find us off I-90, 12 miles from Chicago Rockford International Airport. The Burpee Museum of Natural History, the Rock River Rec Path, and Anderson Japanese Gardens are 15 minutes away, and stores and restaurants are walking distance from the hotel. Your stay includes free WiFi, hot breakfast, and access to our pool and fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn Decatur Mt. Zion
description: Just two miles from Decatur Airport, less than five minutes from Mount Zion Convention Center, you’ve got Decatur on your doorstep. Take our regular free shuttle to attractions within five miles of our door, including Scovill Zoo and the Children’s Museum of Illinois. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Decatur/Forsyth
description: Our Decatur/Forsyth hotel is just off I-72 in Central Illinois, between Springfield, Indianapolis, and Chicago. We’re near Hickory Point Mall, Millikin University and Lake Decatur. You’ll get free hot breakfast, a comfy bed, and free WiFi.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Libertyville - Mundelein
description: We're off US-45, two miles from Vernon Hills and direct trains to Union Station. It’s less than 10 minutes to Hawthorn Mall, and Six Flags Great America is 20 minutes away. Our hotel has landscaped gardens, a weekday local shuttle, and a large indoor pool. Every stay begins with a warm DoubleTree cookie at check-in.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Chicago-Lincolnshire
description: Pack the clubs: we're just 10 minutes from some of Chicagoland's premier golf courses. Grab free breakfast before touring Captain Daniel Wright Woods Forest Preserve. Six Flags Great America is a 20-minute drive away. Rustle up a home-cooked meal in your suite, or stop by our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Chicago-Libertyville
description: Find us just off US 45, a mile from the Lake County Fairgrounds. Medline Industries is a 15-minute drive, it's nine miles to Great Lakes Naval Base, and less than an hour to downtown Chicago. Tee off at Pine Meadow Golf Club two miles from the hotel, or hunt for bargains at the Gurnee Mills outlets, 16 minutes away. Enjoy daily hot breakfast, WiFi, and parking on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Lake Forest Mettawa
description: Right off I-94, we're steps from Conway Park and 10 minutes from the Lake Forest Metra Station, Wildlife Discovery Center and Market Square. The Great Lakes Naval Station can be reached in 20 minutes and O'Hare Airport is only 20 miles away.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Chicago-North Shore/Skokie
description: We're off I-94, two minutes' drive from shops and dining at Westfield Old Orchard. Northwestern University and Lake Michigan beaches in nearby Evanston are five miles away. Wake up to our free hot breakfast, and relax in our indoor pool and fitness center. Chicago is 17 miles from our door. WiFi and parking are on us.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Chicago - North Shore Conference Center
description: Our hotel is right next to the North Shore Center for the Performing Arts. Westfield Old Orchard Mall and Skokie Hospital are across the street. Our IACC-certified Conference Center features the rooftop Monaco Ballroom with panoramic views of the Chicago skyline. Enjoy our indoor and seasonal outdoor pools.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Chicago North Shore/Evanston
description: Our hotel is walking distance from Northwestern University and the shops and restaurants of downtown Evanston. Enjoy our indoor pool and fitness center, grab a hot breakfast in the Garden Grille & Bar, or stock up on snacks in the Pavilion Pantry. Make use of our expansive meeting space, 24-hour business center, free WiFi, and free area shuttle.

name: Hilton Orrington/Evanston
description: We’re in downtown Evanston, a five-minute walk from Davis subway stop with connections to Wrigley Field and downtown Chicago. Northwestern University and Clark Street Beach on the shore of Lake Michigan are within a mile. Enjoy room service and all-day dining at our restaurant with an outdoor terrace. Pets are welcome.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton East Peoria Riverfront Hotel & Conference Center
description: Attached to the largest hotel conference center in Peoria, our waterside hotel overlooks the Illinois River. We're next to East Peoria River Front Park and five minutes from the downtown area's historic sites and museums. Enjoy made-to-order breakfast, complimentary evening receptions, a tropical swimming pool, and our free area shuttle.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Pekin Peoria Area
description: Relax in a hotel that is conveniently located off Illinois State Route 9 and near the Avantis Dome in Pekin, Illinois. We are near the Courtside Shopping Center and East Court Village for retail needs as well as grocery and supply stores. Dine at the Applebee’s, Avanti’s or one of our local eateries. Enjoy our heated indoor pool and whirlpool.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Peoria at Grand Prairie, IL
description: Located off Route 91, we're a half-mile from The Shoppes at Grand Prairie and a short walk to a choice of popular restaurants. WeaverRidge Golf Club and Kellogg Golf Course are 10 minutes from our door, while Peoria Civic Center and Dozer Park are 11 miles away. Start your morning right with our free hot breakfast and WiFi’s on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Effingham
description: Our hotel has easy access to I-57 and I-70, six minutes from downtown Effingham. Thelma Keller Convention Center, Effingham Performance Center, and several local restaurants are within walking distance. We have an indoor pool, fitness center, and whirlpool. A free hot breakfast is served daily, and WiFi's on us.

name: Hampton Inn Mattoon
description: We’re off I-57, within 20 minutes of both Eastern Illinois University and Lakeland College. Explore all 65 acres of Douglas-Hart Nature Center, five minutes away, or Lake Mattoon, 20 minutes from the door. You’ll be steps from neighborhood dining and shopping, and just five minutes from Coles County Memorial Airport. Enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi on us.

name: Hampton Inn Chicago North-Loyola Station
description: In the Rogers Park district, we’re one block from Loyola University Chicago, and half a mile from Loyola Beach by Lake Michigan. Nearby public transport links take you to Northwestern University and Wrigley Field in about 20 minutes. Enjoy the views from our rooftop terrace. Hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Hilton Chicago/Magnificent Mile Suites
description: Just off Magnificent Mile, our suites are adjacent to the John Hancock Center. Within two blocks, reach Water Tower Place, the Lakefront Trail, and American Girl. Navy Pier and 'The Bean' at Millennium Park are just over a mile away. Enjoy our top-floor pool and fitness center with views of Lake Michigan.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Chicago Downtown/Magnificent Mile
description: We're across the street from Northwestern Memorial Hospital and Lurie Children's Hospital, and close to the Museum of Contemporary Art and The Signature Room. Our hotel is a three minute walk from Starbucks Roastery Reserve, and steps from Chicago's best shopping, dining, and attractions along the Magnificent Mile. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and a full in-suite kitchen.

name: Hampton Inn Chicago Downtown/Magnificent Mile
description: Just around the corner from The Magnificent Mile shopping and dining district, our hotel is one block from the new Starbucks Roastery Reserve. Enjoy the sights of the city and Lake Michigan from our 40th-floor fitness center and rooftop pool. We're just a short walk to The Signature Room, and the family-friendly theater district and Navy Pier are both within a mile. Enjoy free hot breakfast and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Freeport
description: We’re off US 20 East in Freeport, Illinois, half a mile from Lincoln-Douglas Debate Square. Within three miles you'll find Little Cubs Field (a scaled-down replica of Wrigley Field), and Krape Park. Or you can hike on the Jane Addams Trail or take a ride on the Stephenson County antique engine train. Enjoy our heated indoor swimming pool. The hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Hampton Inn Chicago/Gurnee
description: We’re off I-94, near the junction with Grand Avenue (Highway 132). You’ll find a choice of dining options close by, and Six Flags and the Gurnee Mills shopping and outlet mall are within two miles. It's 15 minutes to Lake Michigan, and the Naval Station Great Lakes is 10 miles away. Relax in our outdoor pool. Hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Chicago/Waukegan
description: Our Waukegan rooms are just off Route 120, near I-94 – handy for O’Hare Airport, 30 minutes away. You'll be a 15-minute drive from the Great Lakes Naval Base and five minutes from Cardinal Health buildings. It's only three miles to Six Flags Great America. Explore dining just down the street, and enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi. Pets are welcome.

name: Hampton Inn McHenry
description: Comfort is 10 minutes from McHenry's great outdoors: meander through Moraine Hills State Park, where you'll find Lake Defiance, and stroll the historic Riverwalk alongside Fox River. We're just over 10 minutes from Crystal Lake. Each day begins with a free hot breakfast. Free WiFi and fitness center access are yours.

name: Hampton Inn Jacksonville
description: We’re right off Route 67, just one mile from Illinois College and the city center. Lake Jacksonville is less than seven miles away, perfect for boating, fishing, and other water activities. Free WiFi and free hot breakfast keeps you content and connected. Walk to several restaurants within 10 minutes of our door.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Springfield-Southwest
description: Just off I-72, we're a mile from Knight's Action Park. Shop at White Oaks Mall or visit the University of Illinois Springfield, both 10 minutes away. Only five miles from downtown Springfield, home to the Abraham Lincoln Presidential Library and Museum, Old State Capitol, and Lincoln Home National Historic Site. Enjoy our pool, free WiFi, and free hot breakfast.

name: President Abraham Lincoln Springfield - a DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel
description: Find us in downtown Springfield, a short walk from Bank of Springfield Center and Abraham Lincoln Presidential Museum and Library. Illinois State Museum, Knights Action Park, and Abraham Lincoln Capital Airport are less than 15 minutes' drive away. We have a free local shuttle, a pool, and a 24-hour business center. Enjoy a warm DoubleTree cookie on arrival.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Springfield, IL
description: Turn off I-55, and find us next to Capital City Shopping Center. We're ideal for downtown Springfield history and events: the Abraham Lincoln Presidential Library and Museum, Lincoln Home National Site, and Bank of Springfield Center conventions are all within five miles. Enjoy access to our fitness center and indoor pool and whirlpool.

name: Hampton Inn Litchfield
description: Just off I-55, our pet-friendly hotel is six miles from central Litchfield and equally close to Litchfield Municipal Airport. In town, find culture at Litchfield Museum and Route 66 Welcome Center, and head 12 minutes down the highway to Lake Lou Yaeger. But first, make the most of free WiFi and hot breakfast.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Loves Park Rockford
description: We’re located one block from I-90 just one mile from Javon Bea Hospital - Riverside and Swedish American Regional Cancer Center. Our pet-friendly suites feature a working wall, fully-equipped kitchen and spacious bathroom. Breakfast and WiFi are included in your stay as well as access to our fitness center and indoor heated pool.

name: Hampton Inn Macomb
description: Reach us from Highway 136, and be 10 minutes from Macomb center. In town, you’ll find Western Illinois University campus and Art Gallery, and Western Illinois Museum. Wake up to free hot breakfast, fuel for exploring Argyle Lake State Park, 25 minutes from the door. You’ll be steps from local dining. Enjoy our indoor pool, fitness center, and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Moline-Quad City Int'l Aprt
description: Find us next to the Quad City Airport, just off I-280. Visit the home of the John Deere Headquarters, located six miles from us. Meet some furry friends at Niabi Zoo or do some shopping at Moline Centre, only 10 minutes away. A five-mile drive will take you to Ben Butterworth Parkway. Start your day with our free hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn Mt. Vernon
description: Located off I-57, we’re less than 10 minutes from downtown, and 15 minutes from Mount Vernon Airport. Explore the collections at Cedarhurst Center for the Arts, or hit the slides and pools of Aquatic Zoo Water Park, both within three miles of our door. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Mt. Vernon
description: Our hotel is near I-64 and I-57, surrounded by restaurants and shopping in Mt. Vernon. We're within three miles of Aquatic Zoo waterpark and Cedarhurst Center for the Arts. Our atrium features natural light and a 30-foot water feature, with plenty of space to work and relax. Every stay starts with our signature warm chocolate chip cookie.

name: Hampton Inn Ottawa (Starved Rock Area)
description: Just off I-80, we're less than 15 miles from the epic rock formations and waterfalls of Starved Rock State Park, where you can hike, boat, or horseback ride. Stroll the tree-lined avenues, fountains, and antique shops of downtown's Washington Square Park, less than 10 minutes away. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Peru
description: We're surrounded by nature just off I-80 in the Illinois Valley. Grab free hot breakfast before exploring Starved Rock, Matthiessen, and Buffalo Rock state parks, all less than a half-hour away. We’re walking distance from local dining and shopping at Peru Mall. Enjoy our indoor pool and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Valparaiso
description: Find us near Routes 30 and 49, right next to Valparaiso University. See a performance at the Memorial Opera House or a movie at the vintage 49er Drive-In, both within 15 minutes. Enjoy our free hot breakfast before a day of sightseeing at Lake Michigan and the Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore, just a half-hour's drive away. WiFi is free.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Chesterton
description: We're next to I-80/90 and Highway 49, walking distance from several restaurants and down the road from Urschel Laboratories. It's an easy 10-minute drive to Porter Regional Hospital, and Indiana Dunes State Park and Valparaiso University are under 10 miles away. Cooked-to-order breakfast, lunch, and dinner are served daily in our Garden Grille & Bar.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Merrillville
description: We're just off I-65, a short walk to Merrillville Plaza shops and dining, and a mile from Southlake Mall. Avalon Manor Banquet Center is two miles away, and Deep River Waterpark is a 10-minute drive. Breakfast and dinner are available in our Garden Grille & Bar. We have an indoor pool and the WiFi's on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Merrillville
description: Business travelers, enjoy proximity to ConAgra Foods, IBM, and Rubbermaid offices. When your work here is done, Lake County and downtown Chicago make for perfect day trips – while kids can delve into the Albanese Candy Factory. WiFi and breakfast are both on us.

name: Hampton Inn Merrillville
description: Hit the rides at the Deep River Water Park or try your luck at a casino. Our hotel is near US Steel, NiSource, and BP, plus we’re a 45-minute drive to Chicago. Enjoy a free hot breakfast before seeing what the town has to offer. WiFi is included in your stay, as is access to the pool and fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn Portage
description: You'll find us close to I-80 and I-94. Bike and hike at the Lake Michigan beach and Dunes State Park, five miles away. Or in the forests around our hotel. It's about 17 miles to Lighthouse Place Premium Outlets, with over 120 stores. The hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Schererville
description: We're just off Route 41 in Schererville, a short walk from a choice of popular dining options. Fuel up on our free hot breakfast, before heading two miles to Jak's Warehouse for indoor family fun. Popular wedding and events venue, Meyers's Castle, is five minutes from our door. Unwind in our pool or on the outdoor patio. WiFi is on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Michigan City
description: We're just off I-94 and US-421, five miles from downtown attractions like Blue Chip Casino, shopping at Lighthouse Place Premium Outlets, and scenic Washington Park Beach. It's five minutes to youth league games at Patriot Park, and you'll find plenty of stores and restaurants within two miles. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our indoor pool and whirlpool.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Hammond
description: We’re off I-94 in Hammond, beside the Little Calumet River and its walking trails. A range of restaurants are nearby, and Purdue University Northwest – Hammond is three minutes away. Chicago, and Chicago Midway International Airport, are 30 miles’ drive. Enjoy free daily hot breakfast, WiFi, and our pool.

name: Hampton Inn and Suites Munster
description: We're right off I-94, across the street from Community Hospital and 10 minutes from Purdue University Northwest. Catch a performance at the Center for Visual & Performing Arts, or walk to Munster Community Park, just five minutes away. Take advantage of our free parking. We’ve got hot breakfast and WiFi covered.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Munster
description: Located off I-80, businesses such as Pepsi, Ford, Cargill, and the medical facility the Community and Franciscan Alliance Hospitals are all within 30 minutes’ drive from our hotel. Casinos, Centennial Park, and The Center for Visual and Performing Arts are a short drive away, and we're just 25 miles from Chicago. Our spacious suites feature full kitchens. Breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Hampton Inn LaPorte
description: Located just off the Indiana Toll Road, beach days at Indiana Dunes and Washington Park Beach are only a 15-minute drive away. And so are the Blue Chip and Four Winds casinos. We're just three minutes from the Briar Leaf championship golf course. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Indianapolis NW/Zionsville, IN
description: We’re right by I-465 and I-865, just west of Zionsville. Downtown Indianapolis attractions including the Circle Center Mall and Children’s Museum of Indianapolis, are 20 minutes away – and so is the famed Indianapolis Motor Speedway. Enjoy our fitness center and indoor pool. WiFi and hot breakfast are on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Indianapolis/Brownsburg
description: We're just off I-74 in Brownsburg, a quiet and relaxing town 16 miles from downtown Indianapolis. You'll find two golf courses within five miles, and motorsports at Lucas Oil Raceway and Indianapolis Motor Speedway, both within 15 minutes. Or spend a family day at the Indianapolis Zoo, Eagle Creek Park, or The Children's Museum of Indianapolis. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Crawfordsville
description: Our cozy hotel is off I-74, four minutes from Crawfordsville, IN Amtrak station. A six-minute drive will take you to Lane Place Antebellum Museum and Rotary Jail Museum. Feeling brave? Test your skills at Indiana Zipline Tours-20 minutes away. Your furry friends are welcome here. Stay active in our fitness center or take a relaxing dip in the pool.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Indianapolis Northwest
description: Find us off I-465, next to Intech Park offices and within four miles of local businesses such as Corteva Agiscience and ConAgra. We're five minutes from Eagle Creek Park and within 12 miles of Butler University, downtown Indianapolis, and the Indianapolis Motor Speedway. Enjoy our 24-hour fitness center, business center, and indoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn Indianapolis Northwest - Park 100
description: Find us across from Park 100 businesses, just off I-465. Catch a show at the Pikes Performing Arts Center, a mile from our hotel. We're two miles from Eagle Creek Park's golf course, hiking trails, and wildlife centers. It's 25 minutes to both downtown Indianapolis' business district and the airport. Relax in our indoor pool. Hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Avon Indianapolis
description: Find us off US 36, 10 miles directly west of Indianapolis. We're surrounded by dining and major retailers, and the 4-H Fairgrounds are 10 minutes away. Lucas Oil Raceway, Indianapolis Motor Speedway, and the airport are all within 15 minutes. Convenience is covered with our 24-hour fitness center, indoor saline pool, and 50-person conference room.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Indianapolis Northwest
description: We’re 25 minutes from central Indianapolis, where you’ll find Indianapolis Motor Speedway and basketball at Bankers Life Fieldhouse. Free breakfast is fuel for hikes round Eagle Creek Park, eight miles away. We’re steps from local dining, or try a little in-suite cooking. Wind down at our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday, and enjoy WiFi on us.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Indianapolis North
description: Our hotel is close to I-465, with easy access to restaurants and corporate offices. St. Vincent Indianapolis Hospital is a mile away, and we're within a half-hour of downtown attractions like Lucas Oil Stadium and the Children's Museum of Indianapolis. Enjoy free made-to-order breakfast and our complimentary evening reception.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Indianapolis Northwest
description: Indianapolis is waiting. We’re just 15 minutes from the downtown area, Convention Center and Indianapolis Airport, with easy access to local restaurants. For excitement, check out Indianapolis Motor Speedway or The Center of Performing Arts. If you feel like a night in, take advantage of your in-suite kitchen. WiFi and breakfast are on us. We love to meet your pets.

name: Hampton Inn Indianapolis-SW/Plainfield
description: We’re off I-70, 15 minutes from the airport and less than 30 from downtown Indianapolis and the famous Motor Speedway. It’s a 10-minute walk to the Chateau Thomas Winery; for families, the Splash Island Waterpark is a 15-minute drive. Enjoy free WiFi and hot breakfast, and take a dip in our indoor pool.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Indianapolis-Airport/Plainfield
description: From touching down at the Indianapolis Airport to touchdowns at Lucas Oil Stadium, our suites put you close to the Indy action. We're less than four miles from the airport in Plainfield, just off I-70 and only 15 minutes from downtown. Enjoy free hot breakfast daily and our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Plainfield Indianapolis Airport
description: We’re off I-70, 10 minutes from Indianapolis International Airport – our courtesy shuttle will take you both ways. Indianapolis’ Mile Square is 15 miles away and The Children's Museum of Indianapolis, the world’s largest children’s museum, is less than a half hour from our door. Enjoy daily free cooked-to-order breakfast and our nightly evening reception.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Indianapolis-Airport
description: Find us next to I-70, 10 minutes from Indianapolis International Airport via free 24-hour shuttle. We're 20 minutes from downtown Indianapolis, Indianapolis Motor Speedway, and Lucas Oil Stadium football games. Start each day with free hot breakfast, and kick back with free WiFi and access to our indoor pool and whirlpool.

name: Hampton Inn Warsaw
description: Just off Highway 30, we're 10 minutes from Warsaw Municipal Airport. DePuy Synthes and ICONACY Orthopedic Implants are within six minutes. Tee off at Stonehenge Golf Club or visit downtown, both less than 10 minutes from our hotel. A 30-minute drive will take you to Amish Acres and Tippecanoe Lake. WiFi is free, as is our hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn Wabash
description: Find us off Highway 24, one block from Wabash Village Shopping Center and half a mile from Parkview Wabash Medical Plaza. Paradise Spring Park is only two miles away, or take a 10-minute drive to Salamonie and Mississinewa Reservoirs. Hot breakfast and WiFi are included in your stay. Enjoy our heated indoor pool, fitness center, and boardroom.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites West Lafayette
description: We're off I-65, half a mile from Purdue University and two miles from Ross-Ade Stadium and the Mackey Arena Complex. Purdue Research Park is within 15 minutes, and cafés, restaurants, and bars are just over the bridge in downtown Lafayette. Enjoy our indoor pool, fitness center, and free WiFi and hot breakfast.

name: Hilton Garden Inn West Lafayette Wabash Landing
description: We’re next to Tapawingo Park; downtown is just across the Wabash River. There you’ll find shops, bars, restaurants, many museums, and the Long Center for the Performing Arts. Purdue University is a mile from our hotel. We offer free parking throughout your stay. Our 24-hour Pavilion Pantry offers drinks, snacks, and ready-to-cook meals.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Lafayette
description: We're just off I-65, five miles from Purdue University. Our pet-friendly suites feature fully equipped kitchens and room to relax for college visits or gameday weekends. 10 minutes away, Columbian Park is home to acres of trails, a water park, playgrounds, and a zoo. Start the day with free hot breakfast and unwind at our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday.

name: Hampton Inn Lafayette
description: Located near US 90, we’re 12 minutes from Purdue University. Learn about Native American culture on 900 acres of prairie at Prophetstown State Park, just over 10 miles away. Visit the exotic animals at Columbian Park Zoo, or the major collection of Indiana paintings at Haan Museum of Indiana Art. Breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Lafayette
description: Minutes from Purdue University, our suites are ideal for campus visits and sporting events – just close enough to college life. Sample local dining options near campus, or cook dinner in your suite's kitchen. We're three miles from Wabash National headquarters, the Arconic plant, and other Lafayette businesses.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Lafayette East
description: Our hotel is off I-65 in Lafayette. Purdue University and Ross-Ade Stadium are just across the Wabash River, a five-mile drive away. We're within 20 minutes of downtown and historic sites Fort Ouiatenon and Samara House. Enjoy our fitness center and heated indoor pool — and a warm DoubleTree cookie when you arrive.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Muncie
description: We’re just off State Road 332, two miles from Ball State University and 10 minutes from Horizon Convention Center. Experience the prairie woodlands and wildlife of Minnetrista Nature Area, only three miles away. Or immerse yourself in the collections at the David Owsley Museum of Art, six minutes from our door. Back home, daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Anderson
description: You’ll find our Anderson hotel just off I-69, about six miles from Anderson Municipal airport. We’re within five miles of businesses like Nestle and Precision Strip. In Anderson, two miles away, you can watch harness racing at the Hoosier Park Racing and Casino, or catch a concert or play at Anderson’s Paramount Theatre Centre & Ballroom. Our WiFi and hot breakfast are free.

name: Hampton Inn Goshen
description: You’ll be 10 minutes from central Goshen and the city’s iconic Old Bag Factory shopping complex. We’re just as far from the Maple City Greenway biking trail and golfing at Black Squirrel Golf Club. The University of Notre Dame is 50 minutes from your door. Grab free hot breakfast before heading out. Enjoy our free WiFi and fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn Ft. Wayne/Dupont Road
description: We're just off I-69, close to all the excitement Indiana's second largest city has to offer. Fort Wayne Children's Zoo is only eight miles away and the interactive History Center, 20 minutes' drive, is always a hit. At the end of a busy day, unwind in our pool and fitness center. Enjoy free WiFi, parking, and daily hot breakfast while you're with us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Fort Wayne North
description: Enjoy easy access to I-69, Parkview Regional Medical Center, and the Greystone Health and Rehabilitation Center from our hotel. There are great food options nearby, along State Hwy 1. Walk or play at nearby Parkview North Family Park. Grab a bite to eat at our restaurant and bar, or relax in our heated indoor pool.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Fort Wayne North
description: We're off I-69, a mile from Parkview's corporate office and north medical campus. Local dining and bars are five minutes away, and TinCaps baseball is 15 minutes from us. See a concert at the Coliseum, or head 20 minutes north to check out the Auburn Cord Duesenberg Automobile Museum. Patio fire pits and our indoor pool mean fun year-round.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Ft. Wayne-North
description: Find us off I-69, with restaurants and retailers up and down the street. We're within three miles of Glenbrook Square and the Fort Wayne Children's Zoo. An 11-minute drive will take you downtown and to the Grand Wayne Conference Center. Purdue University Fort Wayne is four miles away. Start your day on the right foot with our hot breakfast – it's free, just like our WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Middlebury
description: Welcome to the heart of Amish country, just off Highway 20. Sample authentic Amish cuisine at the world-famous Das Dutchman Essenhaus, less than five minutes away. Lose yourself in the beautiful flowers, plants, and pathways of Krider World’s Fair Garden, just two miles' drive. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Tru by Hilton Fort Wayne
description: If you’re traveling for work, you’ll find a number of major companies in the neighborhood. Take advantage of free WiFi, parking and printing, on-site. If it’s a leisure trip, check out Fort Wayne Children’s Zoo and Allen County War Memorial Coliseum. Build-your-own breakfast is on us, a perfect set up for exploring the Foellinger-Freimann Botanical Conservatory.

name: Hilton Fort Wayne at the Grand Wayne Convention Center
description: We're in downtown Fort Wayne, with direct access to the Grand Wayne Convention Center. The Embassy Theatre, Parkview Field, and Foellinger-Freimann Botanical Conservatory are within a mile. We offer a free shuttle that connects you to the airport and the surrounding area. Enjoy our indoor pool and fitness center. WiFi's on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Fort Wayne Downtown
description: Find us in downtown Fort Wayne, next to Parkview Field and the Grand Wayne Convention Center. Our rooftop bar, Conner’s Rooftop, offers a one-of-a kind view of TinCaps baseball – and the walk-up Burger Bar serves burgers and shakes just off the outfield concourse. Each day starts with our free hot breakfast, and WiFi is free throughout the hotel.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Noblesville Indianapolis Conference Center
description: Find us just off I-69 in Noblesville, steps from Hamilton Town Center and a mile from Rouff Home Mortgage Music Center. Our conference center hotel offers more than 29,000 sq. ft. of event space. Enjoy free cooked-to-order breakfast and our complimentary evening reception daily.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Kokomo
description: Find us along Reed Road, less than a mile from Chrysler and Delphi E&S. We're also five minutes from local restaurants and three miles from downtown. Take a tour of Kokomo Opalescent Glass, tee off at Chippendale Golf Course, and cheer daredevil drivers at Kokomo Speedway – all within 10 minutes' drive. Daily hot breakfast, WiFi, and parking are on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Indianapolis-Fishers
description: We're next to I-69, 17 miles from downtown Indianapolis. Forum Conference & Events Center is five minutes away, and corporations like Navient and Freedom Mortgage are within three miles. Drive 10 minutes to pioneer history at Conner Prairie. Enjoy free drinks and snacks at our hospitality reception, Monday – Thursday evenings. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Westfield Indianapolis
description: We're off US-31, a quick walk to restaurants and two miles from the Grand Park Sports Campus. Join the Monon Trail where it passes our hotel just a few yards away. Or explore the shops at Clay Terrace mall, four miles away. Relax in our indoor pool, or by the fire pit on our large patio. Our daily hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Indianapolis Northeast/Fishers
description: We’re off I-69, with dining on site. We are located just a few miles from the Ruoff Home Mortgage Music Center, Nickel Plate District and Conner Prairie. Downtown Indianapolis, Indianapolis Motor Speedway and Lucas Oil Stadium are within a half-hour drive. Enjoy our pool, hot tub, fitness center and complimentary WiFi.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Fishers Indianapolis Northeast
description: We're off I-69 amid dining and major retailers. The Nickel Plate District and Conner Prairie are 10 minutes' drive, and Ruoff Music Center is 20 minutes away. Enjoy free breakfast each day, or prep meals in your in-suite kitchen. We have an indoor saline pool, and our combined fitness/laundry facility makes multi-tasking easy. Pets are at home here, too.

name: Hampton Inn Indianapolis-Ne/Castleton
description: Just off Interstate 69 and Interstate 465 in Castleton, we’re conveniently placed for Indianapolis exploration and a short drive to downtown. Kick off a day at Indiana State Fairgrounds and Castleton State Mall with our hot breakfast – it's free, just like the WiFi.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Carmel Indianapolis
description: We're off Indiana State Highway 31, less than a mile from Carmel's Arts & Design District. Downtown and its attractions like the Museum of Miniature Houses and Other Collections, Peace Winery, and Carmel City Center mall are within two miles. Walk the Design District on Monon Trail. We provide a heated pool and 24-hour fitness center.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Indianapolis/Carmel
description: Off Route 31, we're within a mile of St. Vincent Carmel Hospital and a variety of restaurants. The boutiques and galleries of Carmel Arts & Design District are five minutes away, and we're a half-hour from Indianapolis Motor Speedway – home of the Indy 500. Our hotel has an indoor saltwater pool, fitness center, and patio with fire pit.

name: Hampton Inn Indianapolis/Carmel
description: Our Carmel rooms are off Highway 31, a short walk from local dining and businesses. We're five minutes from the Center for the Performing Arts and 10 minutes from the Monon Trail and the Waterpark at Monon Community Center. Downtown Indianapolis is half an hour from our door. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our indoor pool.

name: Hampton  Inn & Suites Indianapolis-Keystone
description: Find us off I-465, less than a mile from The Fashion Mall at Keystone and nearby eateries. The State Farm corporate office is one minute from our door. See a show at Coxhall Gardens or visit Indianapolis Art Center - both within nine miles.  Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our indoor pool and fitness center.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Indianapolis Carmel
description: Find us off US-31, close to I-465 and five minutes from IU Health North Hospital. We're close to corporations like IBM, Allegion, and Liberty Mutual, and central Indianapolis is a 30-minute drive from the door. While you’re here, enjoy free WiFi, breakfast, and our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday. Get creative in your own in-suite kitchen.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Indianapolis-Keystone Crossing
description: Find us in a surburban neighbourhood just 30 minutes from downtown Indianapolis, and less than a mile from Keystone at the Crossing Shopping Mall. Butler University and Marian University are both 15 minutes away. Head into the city to explore Indianapolis Zoo, see a show at the Old National Center, or watch Indianapolis Colts play at Lucas Oil Stadium. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Vincennes
description: We’re less than a mile from Route 41. History buffs can explore the Indiana Military Museum, and Grousland, the William Henry Harrison Mansion and Museum – both within 10 minutes' drive. George Rogers Clark National Park is less than three miles away. Fill up on a daily free hot breakfast and enjoy our indoor pool and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Corydon
description: We're located a half-mile from downtown Corydon, named a National Historic District, thanks to the number of historic buildings still standing. We're also just a three-minute walk from Golf Shores Fun Center, with 18 holes of miniature golf. Marengo Cave National Landmark is only a 30-minute drive from us. Be sure to fuel up on free hot breakfast before heading out for the day.

name: Hampton Inn Ft. Wayne-Southwest
description: Located off I-69 and US-24, 15 minutes from Fort Wayne International Airport. Experience nature at nearby Fox Island County Park before browsing the stores, museums, and entertainment options in downtown Fort Wayne. Here on business? Grand Wayne Convention Center is a short drive away. Each stay includes a daily free hot breakfast, WiFi, and access to our indoor pool and business center.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Fort Wayne
description: Between I-69 and Highway 24, we're 15 minutes from Fort Wayne International Airport via free shuttle – schedule 24 hours in advance. Our free corporate shuttle covers three miles, including Lutheran Hospital and General Motors. Downtown Fort Wayne is 15 minutes down the street from us. We have an onsite restaurant, free parking, and an indoor pool.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Fort Wayne
description: Find us off I-69 near the GM plant, hospitals, and downtown Fort Wayne businesses. There's plenty of city parks, too, so bring your pets along. Free hot breakfast will set you up for a day at the Children's Zoo or Foellinger-Freimann Botanical Conservatory. Stop by our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday. Hop on our airport shuttle when it's time to go.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Indianapolis Airport
description: The best of all worlds: We’re at the center of Ameriplex Business Park, minutes from Downtown, and close to the airport, with Plainfield Industrial Park down the road. Free WiFi and more than 400 combinations of free breakfast await. Or whip something up in your in-suite kitchen – fuel for your fitness-center workout.

name: Hampton Inn Greenfield
description: Find us off I-70, only 10 minutes from historic Greenfield center, site of the James Whitcomb Riley Home Museum. Interstate access puts you just 15 minutes from Indianapolis Regional Airport and half an hour from central Indianapolis. You’ll be walking distance from local dining and shopping. Free hot breakfast, WiFi, and an indoor pool are yours.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Indianapolis Downtown
description: We're in the heart of downtown, walking distance from Monument Circle and the Soldiers and Sailors Monument. Dine your way around a huge choice of nearby restaurants or prepare meals in your in-suite kitchen. Make the most of daily free hot breakfast and WiFi, before exploring nearby Indianapolis Zoo and White River Gardens.

name: Hampton Inn Shelbyville
description: Find us off I-74, just four minutes from downtown Shelbyville and a half hour from Indianapolis. Tee off at River’s Edge Golf Course or visit the Grover Museum, both less than two miles away. Catch a movie at nearby Studio 10 Cinemas or place your bets at Indiana Grand Racing & Casino. Every stay with us includes free hot breakfast and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Greensburg
description: We're halfway between Indianapolis and Cincinnati, minutes from downtown Greensburg. Check out local antique shops and the Farmers Market, or settle in and take advantage of our free WiFi. Start your day with our free hot breakfast. Our cozy, fresh beds will help you feel right at home.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Franklin Indianapolis
description: Find us off exit 90 along I-65, five minutes from Franklin College and the historical downtown square. Johnson County National Guard, Garment Factory Events, and the future home of Energizer are less than 10 minutes away. Downtown Indianapolis and Indianapolis International Airport can be reached in 30 minutes. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and flexible meeting space.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Indianapolis South/Greenwood
description: Off I-65, we're across from Greenwood Springs Shopping Center and surrounding quick bites. The interstate puts us within 12 miles of downtown Indianapolis, Lucas Oil Stadium events, and Monument Circle shopping and theaters. Indianapolis International Airport is 20 miles away. Enjoy our fitness center, heated indoor pool, and whirlpool.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Indianapolis South Greenwood
description: Downtown Indianapolis is 20 minutes away, near family days at the Indianapolis Zoo, football at Lucas Oil Stadium and the Indianapolis Motor Speedway. Free breakfast is great fuel for a day at Valle Vista Golf Club. Working guests will be near Wurth Service Supply, Nestle Waters, and ULTA Beauty offices. WiFi is free, pets are welcome, and you’ll have an in-suite kitchen.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Columbus/Edinburgh
description: We're next to the Edinburgh Premium Outlets on I-65. The Exit 76 Antique Mall is also a short walk, as are several restaurants. Columbus is 10 miles from us. Eat breakfast and dinner in our Garden Grille restaurant. Room service is available every evening. Grab a drink, snack, or ready-to-cook meal in the 24-hour Pavilion Pantry.

name: Hampton Inn Columbus/Taylorsville/Edinburgh
description: We’re off Highway 31, three minutes from Taylorsville, seven from Edinburgh, and 12 from Columbus. Eat and shop at Edinburgh Premium Outlet Mall, just one minute from our door. Explore the trails and lakes of Mill Race Park, an eight-mile drive. Or tee off at Timbergate Golf Course, co-designed by Indiana’s Fuzzy Zoeller. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Lawrenceburg
description: Overlooking the Ohio River, our downtown hotel is connected to the Lawrenceburg Event Center. We're five minutes from Hollywood Casino via free shuttle and less than eight miles from the Creation Museum and Perfect North Slopes ski area. Every stay begins with a warm DoubleTree cookie and perks include free parking and a 24-hour fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Scottsburg
description: Just off I-65, we’re less than five minutes from the shops and restaurants of downtown. Discover the birds and animals of the wetlands, forests, and grasslands of the Muscatatuck National Wildlife Refuge, 30 minutes away. Or visit the world-famous Muhammad Ali Center in Louisville. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Seymour
description: We're right off I-65, minutes from the natural scenery of Muscatatuck National Wildlife Refuge and large businesses like Aisin, PSP, and the Walmart Distribution Center. Start each day with free hot breakfast and connect with free WiFi. After a long day, take a refreshing swim in our heated indoor pool.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Clarksville Louisville North
description: Just off I-65, our spacious suites are within minutes of downtown Louisville’s culinary and cultural delights. Business travelers, we're close to the likes of Amazon and Autoneum. Cook at leisure in your in-suite kitchen and make use of the free WiFi. And remember, breakfast is on us.

name: Hampton Inn Louisville-North/Clarksville
description: We're located off I-65, minutes from shopping and dining at Green Tree Mall and 10 minutes north of downtown Louisville. Louisville International Airport, Churchill Downs, and the University of Louisville are all 15 minutes from our door. Start your morning with our hot breakfast – it’s free, just like our WiFi

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Bloomington
description: Whether you're visiting with a future freshman or returning for homecoming, our suites near Indiana University are all for you. As one of Bloomington's only all-suite hotels, we have room for the whole family – with a fully equipped kitchen to help you feel at home. Enjoy free hot breakfast each morning, and our complimentary evening social Monday – Thursday.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Bloomington
description: Academic guests can tour nearby Indiana University, before hitting Bloomington Craft Beer Festival or winding down the evening at Oliver Winery. Business guests will be near Monroe Convention Center and many local corporations. Kick the morning off with breakfast on us or in your own in-suite kitchen. WiFi is free too, and pets are welcome.

name: Hampton Inn Bloomington
description: Located off I-69, we're within walking distance of Memorial Stadium at Indiana University Bloomington. Visit Kirkland Avenue, and Bloomington Entertainment and Arts District, both within two miles. Sip wine at nearby Oliver Winery. The Golf Club at Eagle Pointe is 21 minutes from our door. We’ve got your breakfast and WiFi covered.

name: Hampton Inn Indianapolis-South
description: We're just off I-65, 10 miles south of Colts and Pacers pro games and the Indiana Convention Center downtown. Indianapolis Motor Speedway is 15 miles away. Visit the University of Indianapolis 10 minutes away, or reach Franciscan Health in two miles. There's also several restaurants in walking distance. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our indoor pool.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Columbus, IN
description: Our hotel is located at the junction of SR-146 and I-65, just five minutes from downtown Columbus. Indiana Premium Outlets are 10 minutes away. Our friendly staff are happy to give recommendations on local eateries, coffee shops, and things to do. Count on free breakfast and free WiFi, too!

name: Tru by Hilton Indianapolis Downtown
description: We're off I-70, a block from Lucas Oil Stadium and 0.5 mile from Eli Lilly. The Indiana Convention Center, Bankers Life Fieldhouse, and Circle Centre shops are all a 10-minute walk. Fill up on free breakfast or pick up snacks from our 24/7 market. Our lobby has semi-private alcoves for work, plus plenty of board games. Torch calories in the 24-hour fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn Indianapolis Downtown Across from Circle Centre
description: Our historic hotel is just a short walk to dining and entertainment, Bankers Life Fieldhouse, and the Indiana Convention Center. Lucas Oil Stadium is less than a mile from our door.  Enjoy our local area shuttle, free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and fitness center access.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Indianapolis Downtown
description: Our hotel is next to Monument Circle, surrounded by city dining, shopping, and nightlife. Discover downtown Indianapolis: the Indiana Convention Center, Bankers Life Fieldhouse events, Lucas Oil Stadium, and White River State Park are all within a mile of our door. We have a heated indoor pool, fitness center, and restaurant and bar.

name: Conrad Indianapolis
description: Our crown jewel is The Collection, a group of luxury suites devoted to art genres featuring authentic works by Dali, Picasso, Warhol, and others. Our skywalk connects you to Circle Centre Mall and the Indiana Convention Center. Indulge in our spa and salon treatments.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Indianapolis Downtown
description: Stay in the heart of downtown Indianapolis, a short walk from Indiana Convention Center via skywalk. We’re directly connected to Circle Center Mall and a 10-minute walk to Colts games at Lucas Oil Stadium. Enjoy our indoor pool and fitness center, stop by our nightly evening reception, and refuel every morning with free cooked-to-order breakfast.

name: Hilton Indianapolis Hotel & Suites
description: We’re in downtown Indianapolis, a short walk from Hilbert Circle Theatre, Indiana Convention Center, and the Circle Centre Mall. Banker’s Life Fieldhouse, the Lucas Oil Stadium, and the Indianapolis Canal Walk are a five-minute drive. We have an indoor heated pool, a spa, and a barber shop.  Enjoy room service and all-day dining at our restaurants.

name: Hampton Inn Princeton
description: We’re right off the 65 and 41 interchange, just six minutes from historic downtown Princeton. Fuel up with our free hot breakfast before having some outdoor fun at the nearby Gibson Lakes & Wildlife Habitat Area, 11 miles away. WiFi's on us as is access to our indoor pool and fitness center.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Terre Haute
description: Conveniently located off I-70, we’re your base whether you’re on business, taking a college visit, or out for exploration. Rose Hulman, Indiana State and Saint Mary of the Woods are nearby – enjoy breakfast on us before setting out. Or cook for yourself in your suite’s kitchen. WiFi is free and pets are welcome.

name: Hampton Inn Terre Haute
description: Find us just off I-70, and US Highway 150, four miles from Indiana State University and IU School of Medicine. Shop and dine at Riverside Plaza Shopping Center and Honey Creek Mall, both an easy walk from us. Chill in our pool after a day on the greens at Rea Park Golf Course, five minutes away. Enjoy free daily hot breakfast and WiFi.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Terre Haute
description: We're next to Indiana State University in downtown Terre Haute. The Terre Haute Children's Museum is across the street, and Union Hospital is five minutes north. It's five miles to the Rose-Hulman Institute of Technology. Breakfast, lunch, and dinner are served daily in our Garden Grille & Bar. Enjoy our indoor pool, whirlpool, and fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Richmond
description: We're off I-70, four minutes from Richmond Square Mall. A 10-minute drive will take you to Indiana University East, Reid Health, and Richmond Civic Center. Visit the Model T Ford Museum, under 15 minutes from us. Take a dip in our pool or stay active in our fitness center. Your stay includes free WiFi and free hot breakfast.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Richmond
description: Five minutes from Richmond Mall, our hotel is just off I-70 and US-40. Downtown, the Indiana Football Hall of Fame, and Indiana University East are 10 minutes away. Dayton International Airport is about 30 minutes away. Our extra-roomy suites are pet-friendly, and we offer a fitness/laundry center, indoor pool, free WiFi, and free breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn Evansville
description: We’re just off I-69 on the shores of Eagle Lake. In 15 minutes you’re in downtown Evansville: major venues include the The Old National Events Plaza, Victory Theater, and Ford Center. You’ll find Mesker Park Zoo and the Wesselman Woods Nature Preserve within 10 miles. Enjoy our fitness center and heated indoor pool, and free hot breakfast and WiFi.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Evansville
description: Located off I-69 next to Eagle Lake, we're three miles from Eastland Mall and four miles down the street from the University of Evansville. Visit the Ford Center and downtown Evansville, both within seven miles, or head to the University of Southern Indiana, only 20 minutes away. Our Garden Grille & Bar offers breakfast, dinner, and evening room service.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Evansville
description: Keep the kids happy at the Children’s Museum of Evansville or Mesker Park Zoo. If you feel like something more grown up, try your luck at Tropicana Casino, or catch a concert at Ford Center. History enthusiasts love the USS LST Ship Memorial. Cook dinner your way in your in-suite kitchen, and wake up to free breakfast. WiFi’s on us, pets are welcome.

name: Hampton Inn Evansville/Airport
description: We're just three miles from the airport, and our free shuttle will take you there. Corporations like Accuride and Berry Plastics and attractions like the Mesker Park Zoo and Angel Mounds State Historic Site are within 15 minutes of our hotel. Start your day with free hot breakfast, and enjoy free WiFi and our indoor pool.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Evansville
description: Our hotel is in central Evansville, connected to the Ford Center and Old National Events Plaza via skybridge. We're two blocks from the Children's Museum of Evansville and less than 10 minutes from the USS LST Ship Memorial. Perks include our free local shuttle, an outdoor pool and sundeck, 24-hour fitness center, and a warm cookie when you arrive.

name: Hampton Inn New Albany Louisville West
description: Located off I-64, we're walking distance from Carnegie Center for Art & History, and six miles from downtown Louisville and KFC Yum! Center. Churchill Downs can be reached in 20 minutes and Louisville International Airport is 14 miles from our door. Enjoy our outdoor pool, 24-hour fitness center, free hot breakfast, and free WiFi.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel South Bend
description: Our downtown hotel is connected to the Century Center, beside the Joseph River. The Studebaker Museum and Memorial Hospital are less than a mile away, and we’re three miles from The University of Notre Dame. We feature an indoor pool and free airport shuttle, and every stay begins with a warm DoubleTree cookie.
streetAddress: 123 N. Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. Blvd

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Mishawaka South Bend
description: We’re eight miles from South Bend International Airport, with the best of the South Bend area at your fingertips. Bring the whole family along for a campus visit to the University of Notre Dame, 10 minutes away. Our suites are pet-friendly, with kitchens and room to get comfortable. Check out the Studebaker Museum or catch a South Bend Cubs game.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton South Bend at Notre Dame
description: We're a five-minute walk from the University of Notre Dame's football stadium. It's two miles to downtown South Bend attractions like the Morris Performing Arts Center and the Century Center. Enjoy our indoor pool, free cooked-to-order breakfast, and drinks at our complimentary Evening Special.

name: Hilton Garden Inn South Bend
