Blue Bayou Water Park, Louisiana State University, and Tiger Stadium are within a 13-minute drive. Take a dip in our indoor pool, and enjoy free breakfast every morning.

name: Hampton Inn Baton Rouge-I-10 & College Dr.
description: Discover us off I-10, five minutes from central Baton Rouge, where you’ll find Louisiana’s Old State Capitol, the USS Kidd Museum, and Shaw Center for the Arts. You’ll be just as close to Louisiana State University and LSU Tiger Stadium football games. Start each day with free hot breakfast, enjoy WiFi on us, and unwind in our fitness center.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Baton Rouge
description: While you’re with us, enjoy free WiFi and breakfast, the ideal kick-off for a day at Blue Bayou Waterpark & Dixie Landin’. Check out the Baton Rouge River Center and indulge in some great local restaurants, or use your in-suite kitchen to rustle up a home-cooked meal instead. As we’re in the home city of the LSU Tigers, it’s only fair that we allow pets to stay here, too.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Baton Rouge - I-10 East
description: You’ll find us off I-10, about 20 minutes away from both Southern University and LSU. Experience the unforgettable atmosphere at one of their sports events. Downtown Baton Rouge is just 15 minutes away: check out the local music styles, such as cajun, zydeco and jazz, at one of its many clubs. Our WiFi and daily hot breakfast are free.

name: Hilton Baton Rouge Capitol Center
description: Our hotel in downtown Baton Rouge is recognized by Historic Hotels of America. We’re on the banks of the Mississippi River, two blocks from Louisiana’s Old State Capital and a mile from USS KIDD Veterans Museum. Enjoy our fitness center, outdoor pool with a deck overlooking the river, and free parking. Our complimentary shuttle covers the city and the airport.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Baton Rouge Downtown
description: Feel at home in Baton Rouge’s business district, one mile from the downtown area's Louisiana’s Old State Capitol and Raising Canes River Center Arena events. We’re within 15 minutes of Southern University, A&M College, and Louisiana State University, home of Tiger Stadium football. Wake up to free hot breakfast, and enjoy WiFi on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Baton Rouge Airport
description: Off I-110, we're one mile from Baton Rouge Metropolitan Airport via free shuttle. Southern University is a 10-minute drive away, and we're 15 minutes from downtown Baton Rouge. Our restaurant serves breakfast and dinner, and there are more dining options nearby. We've got an outdoor pool, free WiFi, 24-hour shop, and fitness center.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Shreveport / Bossier City, LA
description: Located off I-20, we're within two miles of six casinos, Louisiana Boardwalk, 30 restaurants, and downtown Shreveport. Wake up refreshed to a free hot breakfast daily and cook on your own time in your spacious suite featuring fully equipped kitchen, living, and dining areas. WiFi is free and evening socials run Monday through Thursday.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Shreveport Bossier City
description: We're within three miles of Louisiana Boardwalk and downtown Bossier City, home to casinos, Shreveport Aquarium, and Shreveport Convention Center. Barksdale Air Force Base and Shreveport Downtown Airport are 10 minutes away via free shuttle, also covering a five-mile radius. Explore local bites, and enjoy all-day dining in our Garden Grille.

name: Hampton Inn Shreveport/Bossier City
description: Pull off I-20 and you’ll find our Bossier city hotel. We’re 10 minutes from Shreveport attractions including, Sci-Port Discovery Center, Shreveport Convention Center, and the theater district. Barksdale Air Force Base and Louisiana State University Shreveport are within 20 minutes of your room. Enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi on us.

name: Hilton Shreveport
description: Find us adjacent to the Shreveport Convention Center, two blocks from the banks of the Red River, and just over a mile from the Louisiana Boardwalk. The offices for Capital One, Shaw Industries, and Chesapeake Energy are all nearby. Our rooftop pool offers panoramic views, and we also have a whirlpool, 24-hour fitness center, and three restaurants.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Shreveport/Bossier City at Airline Drive
description: We're right next to I-220, a five-mile drive from downtown Shreveport and across the Red River from Bossier City. Barksdale Air Force Base is less than seven miles away, and you'll find many dining and shopping options within minutes of the hotel. Enjoy daily hot breakfast and WiFi on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Shreveport
description: We're in Shreveport's southern retail district, near numerous dining options. Louisiana State University Shreveport and shows at CenturyLink Center are less than 15 minutes away, and Barksdale Air Force Base and the Louisiana Boardwalk downtown are within seven miles. Relax in our outdoor saltwater pool, and enjoy free breakfast each morning. WiFi's on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Shreveport/South
description: We’re off Highway 526, just five minutes from Louisiana State University–Shreveport. We're 10 miles from shopping at the Louisiana Boardwalk and the hundreds of hands-on exhibits at the Sci-Port Discovery Center. A movie theater and a choice of restaurants are a few steps away from our hotel. Enjoy our fitness center and indoor pool, and free WiFi and hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn Shreveport Airport
description: We're off I-20, adjacent to Shreveport Regional Airport, covered by our free 24-hour shuttle. You’ll be just 15 minutes from downtown Shreveport, home of the Convention Center and Louisiana Boardwalk shopping and dining. Catch a show at CenturyLink Center, or visit Barksdale Air Force Base, both within 20 minutes. Free hot breakfast and WiFi are yours.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Shreveport
description: We’re just off I-20, 15 minutes from Bossier City casinos and the Louisiana Boardwalk. Our location four miles from the Shreveport Regional Airport is convenient to corporations including Schlumberger and BASF with free shuttle service. Stop by our free evening social, Monday – Thursday, and get creative in your in-suite kitchen. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Shreveport
description: Just off I-20 in the Financial Plaza district, our hotel is eight minutes from Shreveport Regional Airport. We offer shuttle service to and from the airport as well as restaurants within five miles of the hotel. Our Garden Grille serves breakfast and dinner, and our 24-hour Pavilion Pantry is always stocked with snacks and drinks.

name: Hampton Inn Broussard-Lafayette Area
description: We're next to US-90 close to Broussard's industrial zone, about seven miles from Lafayette Regional Airport. The University of Louisiana at Lafayette and the Cajundome are nine miles north, with plenty of stops along the way for Cajun and Creole cooking. Enjoy free daily hot breakfast, and stay connected with free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Lafayette
description: Games and events at the University of Lousiana at Lafayette are just two miles away, and we're just as close to Lafayette Regional Airport and Lafayette General Medical Center. Drive under 10 minutes to experience 18th-century Acadian life at Vermilionville Historic Village. Enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi and take a swim in our outdoor pool.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Lafayette-Airport, LA
description: We're walking distance from shops and dining and three miles from Lafayette Regional Airport. Explore the University of Louisiana at Lafayette campus, just two miles away, or be downtown in 15 minutes for galleries, museums, and authentic Cajun cooking. Your stay includes a spacious suite with full kitchen, WiFi, breakfast, and an airport shuttle.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Parc Lafayette
description: With numerous restaurants nearby, you can test our town's tasty food reputation yourself. If you prefer something home-cooked, try your in-suite kitchen. We're just three miles from the center of Lafayette, providing easy access to Heymann Performing Arts Center, Zoosiana, and the scenery of River Ranch Development. WiFi and breakfast are free. Pets are welcome.

name: Tru by Hilton Lafayette River Ranch
description: If you aren't a history fanatic already, you will be when you leave. We're nestled between the Acadian and Vermilionville historic villages, with St. John's Cathedral 11 minutes away. Don't worry, we still have free WiFi and a 24/7 market for all your needs. We'll even start your day with free build-your-own breakfast, ideal for a day at the Cypress Island Preserve.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Lafayette
description: Our hotel is on the bank of the Vermilion River, three miles from downtown. University of Louisiana at Lafayette, Vermilionville Historic Village, and Lafayette General Medical Center are all within 10 minutes' drive. We offer a free 24-hour shuttle to nearby Lafayette Regional Airport.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Lafayette/Cajundome
description: We’re off Highway 90/I-10, across the street from the Cajundome arena and convention center. The University of Louisiana at Lafayette, Cajun Field, and downtown Lafayette are within two miles. Vermilionville is five miles away and we’re a half-hour from Lake Martin. Enjoy all-day dining at our restaurant, our indoor pool, and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites New Iberia Avery Island
description: We're minutes from US-90 and less than four miles from the Port of Iberia. Scenic Avery Island and tours at the famous Tabasco factory are just 6.5 miles southwest. Shadows-on-the-Teche, a 19th-century plantation, is only three miles away in downtown New Iberia. Enjoy free daily hot breakfast and stay connected with free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Opelousas
description: Just off I-49, we’re five minutes from Opelousas, one of Louisiana’s oldest historic cities – try authentic Southern cuisine, or explore Opelousas Museum. You’ll be steps from events at Opelousas Civic Center, and it’s only a 15-minute drive to St. Landry Parish Airport. Start each day with free hot breakfast, and enjoy WiFi on us.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Covington
description: Located off I-12 and Highway 190 in Covington, LA, we’re a great home base for exploring. In a 20-minute drive, you can be at Pontchartrain Vineyards and state parks, or take the Pontchartrain causeway across the lake into New Orleans. A stay with us includes a spacious suite with fully equipped kitchen plus free WiFi and daily hot breakfast.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Covington/Mandeville
description: Our business district rooms are in the North Shore area, four miles from central Covington. Movie Tavern Covington is next door, and Mandeville's Fontainebleau State Park is 10 miles from us. We're five miles from the Lake Pontchartrain Causeway, putting New Orleans a 45-minute drive away. Enjoy our fitness center and outdoor pool.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Slidell, LA
description: Located off I-12 in Slidell, our spacious suites are your home away from home on the Northshore. Unwind after a day treasure-hunting in Slidell’s antique district at our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday. The sights, sounds, and flavors of New Orleans are on the other side of Lake Pontchartrain, just 30 minutes away.

name: Hampton Inn Hammond
description: We're just off I-55 and US-90 in Hammond's commercial district, just three miles from games and events at Southeastern Louisiana University. Big local businesses like C&S and Dean Foods are five minutes away, and it's only a six-mile drive to Hammond Northshore Regional Airport. Enjoy free hot breakfast, and stay connected with free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Slidell
description: We're just off I-10, two miles from Olde Towne's antique shops and cafes and just four miles from Oak Harbor Golf Club. Head to Honey Island Swamp Tours, 13 minutes' drive from us, to spot alligators and bald eagles. Vibrant New Orleans is only 35 minutes' drive away. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our outdoor pool.

name: Hilton Garden Inn New Orleans Airport
description: We're next to the Pontchartrain Convention Center, and a 10-minute walk from the Treasure Chest Casino. It's five miles to Louis Armstrong International Airport, and we offer a free shuttle both ways. The French Quarter is just 25 minutes from us. Enjoy our Garden Grille & Bar for cooked-to-order breakfast and dinner, plus our 24-hour snack shop.

name: Hampton Inn Metairie
description: Find us off I-10 in Metairie's central business district. Take one of our complimentary shuttles to stops at restaurants, businesses, and attractions within three miles. Other shuttles will take you to Louis Armstrong New Orleans International Airport or New Orleans, both within 10 miles of the hotel. Enjoy free daily hot breakfast, WiFi, and our pool.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Metairie New Orleans
description: Close to the airport, and just a short drive from the city’s downtown and central areas, we’re housed in the midst of New Orleans’ business district. Audobon Zoo and Zephyr Field are nearby, ideal for family days out. Enjoy free WiFi in your apartment-style room, with fully-equipped kitchen.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel New Orleans Airport
description: We're 10 minutes from Louis Armstrong New Orleans International Airport, with a free 24-hour shuttle both ways. Easy I-10 access puts New Orleans sights, sounds, and famous flavors in reach — from the French Quarter to Lake Pontchartrain. Every stay starts with a warm chocolate chip cookie, and our restaurant serves Creole-American dishes all day.

name: Hampton Inn Laplace
description: We're just off I-10 with easy access to New Orleans. The famous French Quarter is only 28 miles away, with Saints football and Pelicans basketball games close by. Visit Cajun Pride Swamp Tours right up the road to get an intimate look at the bayou's wildlife, culture, and history. Enjoy free hot breakfast daily and our outdoor pool.

name: Hilton New Orleans Airport
description: We’re on Airline Drive, five minutes from I-35. Louis Armstrong International Airport is three miles away via our free 24-hour shuttle. Lakeside Shopping is nine miles away and we’re 20 minutes from the French Quarter. Our two onsite restaurants feature local New Orleans cuisines, and we have a 24-hour shop. Enjoy our outdoor pool and fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn Baton Rouge - Denham Springs
description: We're right off I-12, an easy 15-mile drive from downtown Baton Rouge and LSU. Southern University and A&M College are also just 16 miles away. Historic downtown Denham Springs is a hub of unique antique shops and boutiques, only three miles north. Enjoy free hot breakfast each morning, and stay connected with free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Baton Rouge/Port Allen
description: Head just off I-10 and you're with us, in pet-friendly rooms seven minutes from Port Allen and a 10-minute drive over the Mississippi River to Baton Rouge. There, explore the USS Kidd naval ship and Capitol Park Museum and in the evening, try your luck at Hollywood Casino. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Gonzales
description: If you’re traveling in May, you might catch the Jambalaya Festival or Cajun Country Jam – both near our eco-friendly hotel. Enjoy free WiFi, and fill up on free breakfast before taking in local history at Houmas House. If you feel like a night in, try your in-suite kitchen. Remember, pets are welcome.

name: Hampton Inn Gonzales
description: Find us off I-10, just 10 minutes from Louisiana Regional Airport between Baton Rouge and New Orleans. We’re 15 minutes from Houmas House events and dining by the Mississippi River, and steps from local shops and the outlet mall. Enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi on us.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton West Bank Gretna
description: Find us on the west bank of the Mississippi River, within 15 minutes of downtown New Orleans and the French Quarter. We're a half-mile from Oakwood Center shopping, just across Highway 90, and three miles from the National WWII Museum. Join us for complimentary evening socials, Monday – Thursday, and enjoy an in-suite kitchen and free breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Harvey/New Orleans West Bank
description: We're just off US Highway 90, less than a mile from the Mississippi River. Ernest N. Morial Convention Center is seven miles away. Wake up to our free hot breakfast and refresh in our indoor pool. The music, nightlife, and world-famous cuisine of New Orleans' French Quarter are a 20-minute drive from our door. WiFi and parking are on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites New Orleans-Convention Center
description: Our Warehouse District hotel is across the street from Ernest N. Morial Convention Center and within two miles of downtown attractions including Harrah's, the Riverwalk, and the Superdome. The closest hotel to the ports, we offer a free shuttle and special cruise packages. Enjoy our free hot breakfast and an array of dining options close by.

name: Hilton Garden Inn New Orleans Convention Center
description: Find us steps from New Orleans Ernest N. Morial Convention Center. We’re less than one mile from the historic French Quarter, Port of New Orleans, and The National WWII Museum. Jackson Square, the Garden District, and the buzz of Bourbon Street are within two miles. Perks include our rooftop pool, courtyard seating, fitness center, and restaurant.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Harvey
description: Downtown New Orleans is a short drive away: we’re your launchpad into the Big Easy, minutes from the French Quarter, Riverwalk, Mercedes Benz-Superdome, and the Smoothie King Center. Expect a customizable, pet-friendly suite complete with free WiFi and kitchen. Don’t forget your complimentary breakfast.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton New Orleans
description: We’re a five-minute walk from New Orleans Convention Center, and within 10 minutes of the Julia Street Cruise Terminal, and National World War II Museum. The Mercedes-Benz Superdome, Smoothie King Center, and the French Quarter are all a mile away. Enjoy our outdoor pool, and complimentary evening reception. A free cooked-to-order breakfast is served daily.

name: Hampton Inn New Orleans-St. Charles Ave./Garden District
description: Nestled in the Garden District, we’re a streetcar ride from the French Quarter and less than three miles from Audubon Park and zoo. Walk to lively Magazine Street for shopping, restaurants, and bars. Tulane and Loyola universities are two miles away. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our outdoor pool.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel New Orleans
description: Our Canal Street location puts the best of downtown New Orleans in reach, from the French Quarter to the Superdome. We're next to Harrah's Casino and a five-minute walk from the Riverwalk and the Aquarium of the Americas. Enjoy city or Mississippi River views, and PJ's Coffee on the first floor. Every stay starts with a warm chocolate chip cookie.

name: Hilton New Orleans/St. Charles Avenue
description: Built in 1926 as the Louisiana Masonic Temple, today our building is a member of Historic Hotels of America. We're within walking distance of the Arts District, French Quarter, and the buzz of Bourbon Street. Our CBD hotel is right on the annual Mardi Gras parade route and less than a mile from Morial Convention Center.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New Orleans
description: Mercedes-Benz Superdome and Smoothie King Center are only four blocks from our front door. Take a six-minute drive to the French Quarter, home to world-famous dining, shopping, and entertainment. Harrah's Casino is also just 0.5 mile away. Enjoy free hot breakfast daily, a full in-suite kitchen, and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites New Orleans Downtown (French Quarter Area)
description: We’re in the heart of downtown New Orleans, two blocks from Bourbon Street and the French Quarter. The Mercedes-Benz Superdome, Smoothie King Center, and Riverwalk are within a mile. We’re on the St. Charles streetcar line – hop on to admire the historic architecture of the Warehouse Arts District and uptown. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn New Orleans French Quarter/CBD
description: We’re in New Orleans' Central Business District, two blocks from the French Quarter's famous Bourbon Street. Countless bars, restaurants, and shops are within a 10-minute walk. The Mercedez-Benz Superdome and Smoothie King Center are under a mile away. Enjoy our rooftop pool, 11th floor Hop lounge, and Great American Grill. WiFi's on us.

name: The Roosevelt New Orleans, A Waldorf Astoria Hotel
description: Operating as a hotel since 1893, our building was once home to Louisiana's legendary governor Huey P. Long. Today, we feature historic New Orleans memorabilia, a luxury spa, and a rooftop pool. Canal and Bourbon streets are around the corner, and we're within a mile of the French Quarter. Discover authentic local experiences with the help of our concierge.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New Orleans French Quarter
description: We're three blocks from Bourbon Street and all the restaurants, shops, history, and entertainment to be found in the French Quarter. Mercedes-Benz Superdome, Smoothie King Center, and the Central Business District are a mile away. Relax at our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday. WiFi and daily free hot breakfast are on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites New Orleans-Elmwood/Clearview Parkway Area
description: We’re right off Clearview Parkway in Harahan. Elmwood Shopping Center is a block away, and you'll find plenty of restaurants nearby. The Saints' training facility and Baby Cakes games at the Shrine on Airline are three miles away, and the French Quarter is a 10-mile trip down I-90 and I-10. Enjoy free daily hot breakfast, WiFi, and our outdoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn Houma
description: We're 10 minutes from central Houma, home of Louisiana history at Bayou Terrebonne Waterlife Museum and events at Houma-Terrebonne Civic Center. It's a 15-minute drive to Terrebonne Medical Center, and just as far to nature at Mandalay National Wildlife Refuge or Annie Miller's swamp tours. Enjoy neighborhood dining, free hot breakfast, and WiFi on us.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Houma
description: Explore the Bayou Country, with Annie Miller’s Son’s Swamp and Marsh Tours just seven miles away. We’re within 15 minutes of Halliburton, Hercules Offshore Inc. and more. Start the day with free breakfast before teeing off at Southern Oaks Golf Club, and finish it at our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday. Make the most of your in-suite kitchen and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Thibodaux
description: Off Highway 20, we’re just over a mile from the galleries, shops, and Cajun cuisine of downtown. Steep yourself in Cajun culture through the fascinating exhibits, boat tours, and live music at Wetlands Acadian Cultural Center, less than 10 miles away. Or sample a range of specialty beers at Mudbug Brewery. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Morgan City
description: Uncover the Cajun Coast in central Morgan. We’re just off Highway 90, five minutes from both South Central Louisiana Technical College and the Cajun Coast Convention Bureau. Grab free hot breakfast before exploring the scenery of Lake End Park, five minutes away, or Bronwell Memorial Park, 10 minutes away, both on the banks of Lake Palourde. WiFi’s on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Jennings
description: We're just south of I-10, within walking distance of several restaurants. Get a close-up look at Lousiana's famous alligators at the Gator Chateau across the highway. Start each day with our free hot breakfast. Take a dip in our outdoor pool, and stay connected with free WiFi.
streetAddress: 310 W Fred Ruth Zigler Memorial Dr.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Lake Charles
description: If you feel like raising the stakes, the Golden Nugget and L’Auberge casinos are waiting. If you’re looking for a sure thing for family fun, check out Millennium Park, Adventure Cove Park or the Lake Charles Children’s Museum. Breakfast’s on us, fuel for a day at Contraband Bayou Golf Club. Make the most of free WiFi and an in-suite kitchen. Pets are welcome.

name: Tru by Hilton Lake Charles
description: We’re a sure thing for Lake Charles convenience. We’re just seven miles from Lake Charles Regional Airport. If you’re feeling lucky, pay a visit to Golden Nugget Casino, L’Auberge Casino Resort or Isle of Capri Casino nearby. WiFi, parking and breakfast are on the house. Corporate guests can enjoy close proximity to Port of Lake Charles.

name: Hampton Inn Sulphur/Lake Charles Area
description: Our hotel is off I-10, a 25-minute drive from both Lake Charles Regional and Chennault International Airports. Free hot breakfast is fuel for the famous Creole Nature Trail – join it at Adventure Point, a half-mile away. The interstate puts you 15 minutes from central Lake Charles and McNeese State University. Explore neighborhood dining, and enjoy WiFi on us.

name: Hampton Inn Leesville/Ft. Polk
description: We're on US-171, 2.4 miles from the city center and only five miles from Fort Polk Army Installation. Head north toward town to discover restaurants, shops, and Leesville Municipal Golf Course, or head over to Anacoco Lake for a relaxing day of fishing. While you're staying with us, enjoy daily free hot breakfast and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Monroe
description: Enjoy easy access to Ouachita Parish's industrial parks just off I-20. We're right across the street from Pecanland Mall, and 10 minutes from Monroe Regional Airport. Five miles west, browse the RiverMarket and downtown Monroe's galleries and restaurants. Start your day with free hot breakfast, and swim in our indoor saltwater pool.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton West Monroe
description: We're across the street from the Ike Hamilton Expo Center, with easy access to the University of Louisiana at Monroe and local companies including CenturyLink, IBM, and Chase. Visit nearby Antique Alley and Duck Commander and fish the famed Ouachita River, just minutes away. Our eco-friendly suites are equipped with kitchens and free WiFi. Hot breakfast is also included in your stay.

name: Hampton Inn West Monroe
description: We’re just off I-20 and a few minutes from Monroe Regional Airport. A 10-minute drive takes you to the Pecanland Mall’s stores, dining and entertainment. D’Arbonne National Wildlife Refuge is 15 miles away, and Jimmie Davis State Park is 30 miles away. Our hot breakfast, WiFi, and fitness center are all free.

name: Hilton Garden Inn West Monroe
description: We're off I-20, across the street from Ike Hamilton Expo Center. The Duck Commander museum and Glenwood Regional Medical Center are under 10 minutes away. Head nine miles east to the University of Louisiana Monroe, Pecanland Mall, and Monroe Regional Airport. Cooked-to-order breakfast and dinner are served daily in our Garden Grille & Bar. WiFi's on us.

name: Hampton Inn Ruston
description: Find us off I-20, moments from North Park Mall shops and restaurants. We're just 1.5 miles from Louisiana Tech University and six miles from Grambling State University. Check out Lincoln Parish Museum on your way to other local flavors in downtown Ruston. Enjoy free daily hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our outdoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn Natchitoches
description: We're right next to I-49, only four miles from Northwestern State University and five miles from historic downtown Natchitoches. Several restaurants are within walking distance – or head into town for more local dining and shopping. Alliance Compressors is seven miles away. Enjoy free hot breakfast and free WiFi.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Auburn Riverwatch
description: We're next to the Androscoggin River, and some rooms have views of the Great Falls. Take a stroll along the Auburn Riverwalk. Downtown is a quick walk over the North Bridge, and Bates College is a five-minute drive. Our Garden Grille & Bar serves breakfast and dinner, and the Pavilion Pantry is open 24 hours for drinks and snacks.

name: Hampton Inn Lewiston-Auburn
description: We're off Highway 202, in the heart of downtown Lewiston-Auburn. Within a mile you'll find several shops, restaurants, and businesses, two regional hospitals, and Bates College. Explore the town on foot, or hire a canoe and take to the canals. Relax in our heated indoor pool. Each day, our hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Hampton Inn Oxford
description: Located off Route 26, we’re within walking distance of Oxford Casino and three miles from Oxford Plains Speedway. Enjoy views of Mount Washington and the White Mountains from your room. Take a dip in our indoor saltwater pool, and stay active in our fitness center. WiFi and our daily hot breakfast are free.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Freeport Downtown
description: We're two blocks from downtown Freeport's shopping off Main Street, including L.L. Bean outlets. The local railway stop is in walking distance – reach Portland in half an hour by train. Maine scenery is 10 minutes from us at Wolfe's Neck Woods State Park and Bradbury Mountain State Park. Enjoy our fitness center and indoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn Freeport/Brunswick
description: Find us off I-295, two minutes from the L.L. Bean corporate office. Shop the outlets at Freeport Village Station, just five minutes from our door. Winslow Memorial Park and Bradbury Mountain State Park are within six miles. A half-hour drive will take you to Portland International Jetport. Every stay with us includes free WiFi and free hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn Bath (Brunswick Area), ME
description: We’re off US 1 in downtown Bath. Stroll the banks of the Kennebec River at Linwood E. Temple Waterfront Park, walking distance from the hotel. Shopping, dining, and attractions like the Maine Maritime Museum are less than 10 minutes away. Enjoy free hot breakfast daily, free WiFi, and our indoor pool and whirlpool.

name: Hampton Inn Augusta
description: We’re five minutes from central Augusta, home to Maine State Museum and Capitol, adjacent to Capitol Park. Right off I-95, you’ll be 10 minutes from the University of Maine at Augusta, near Augusta Civic Center, and tree-lined nature at Viles Arboretum. Kick off your day with free hot breakfast, and enjoy free WiFi and fitness center access.

name: Hampton Inn Waterville
description: Our Waterville hotel is off I-95, five minutes from Colby College, home to the Museum of Art. Wake up to free hot breakfast and explore Maine's scenery in the Belgrade Lakes area, 25 minutes away. Or check out some capital sights in Augusta: Maine State Museum, Capitol Park, and the State Capitol are all 20 minutes from us. Free WiFi is yours.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Rockland
description: Find us off Route 1, two miles from Penobscot Bay. Rockland is home to the largest windjammer fleet in the country, fresh-caught seafood restaurants, and the Maine Lighthouse Museum—all within 10 minutes of our hotel. We offer an indoor pool, fitness center, and free hot breakfast and WiFi.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Bangor
description: We're just off I-95 in Bangor's retail district, five minutes from shopping at Bangor Mall. It's five miles to the airport and attractions near downtown like Hollywood Casino and Cross Insurance Center. University of Maine is seven miles away. Breakfast and dinner are served daily at our Claddagh Irish Pub. Enjoy our indoor pool and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Bangor
description: We're right off I-95, six miles from Bangor International Airport – we'll pick you up in our free shuttle. We're surrounded by restaurants, and the Bangor Mall is just a mile away. Husson University and the University of Maine are within 15 minutes of our door. Wake up to our free hot breakfast and enjoy WiFi and parking on us.

name: Hampton Inn Ellsworth/Bar Harbor
description: Our Ellsworth rooms are by the Route 1/3 intersection. We're adjacent to Maine Coast Mall and a short walk from quick bites in the neighborhood. Grab free hot breakfast before exploring Acadia National Park, 25 minutes away, and Bar Harbor, 35 minutes from the door. Enjoy free WiFi and our indoor pool, whirlpool, and fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn Bar Harbor
description: Open May to October, our seasonal hotel is less than a mile from Acadia National Park. Downtown and the waterfront are two miles away. Enjoy the view of the mountains and Bar Harbor from our rooms, and unwind in our pools and whirlpool. Daily hot breakfast, WiFi, and parking are free.

name: Hampton Inn Portland Downtown - Waterfront
description: We’re steps from the waterfront and the Eastern Promenade Trail. Our restaurant, Sebago Brewing Company, serves pub favorites – and there are dozens of dining options nearby. Portland International Jetport is 15 minutes away, and we'll pick you up in our free shuttle. Enjoy free WiFi, daily hot breakfast, and our fitness center and indoor pool.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Portland Downtown Waterfront
description: In the historic Old Port district of downtown Portland, we enjoy views of Casco Bay. We’re next to the ferry terminal and just a few steps from restaurants, bars, and boutiques. Our daily airport shuttle is complimentary. Port65 restaurant serves breakfast and dinner, with room service every evening. Grab a snack at the 24-hour Pavilion Pantry.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Portland West
description: We're next to I-95, within five miles of Portland International Jetport, the University of Southern Maine, and The Maine Mall. Allagash and Bissell Brothers brewing companies are both about three miles away. Head 15 minutes east to reach downtown Portland and numerous local restaurants. Relax in our pool, and enjoy free hot breakfast. WiFi's on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Portland Airport
description: Off I-95, we're a half-mile from Portland International Airport. Maine Mall is two miles away, and Old Port District restaurants and boutiques are five miles from our hotel. Portland Head, the oldest lighthouse in Maine, is 25 minutes away. We have a free 24-hour shuttle to the airport and local attractions, free WiFi, and park-and-fly deals.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Portland, ME
description: Next to I-95, our hotel is adjacent to The Maine Mall, the largest shopping center in New England. We're 15 minutes from downtown Portland, home to the historic Old Port area, and our free shuttle covers the airport and a one-mile radius. Enjoy our fitness center, heated indoor pool, and a warm DoubleTree cookie at check in.

name: Tru by Hilton Portland Airport Area
description: Find us two miles from the airport – our 24-hour shuttle has you covered. We're close to some of the finest coastlines the East Coast has to offer, with beautiful lighthouses and scenery on our doorstep. Don't miss out on local dining and craft breweries nearby. While you're here, enjoy free WiFi, build-your-own breakfast, and parking. Pets are welcome, too.

name: Hampton Inn Portland-Airport
description: We’re off I-95/I-295, a short walk from The Maine Mall and close to a variety of local restaurants. Our free shuttle covers Portland International Jetport and a two-mile radius. Portland is 12 minutes away and we’re six miles from Old Port, the Portland Museum of Art, and Willard Beach. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast and WiFi on us.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Portland
description: Right where I-95 and I-295 meet, our suites are 10 minutes from Portland International Jetport and six miles from downtown Portland. We're across the street from the Maine Mall, and Sebago Brewing Company is steps away. We serve free hot breakfast daily, plus drinks and light bites at our complimentary Monday – Thursday evening social.

name: Hampton Inn Kennebunk Kennebunkport
description: We're just off I-95, 25 minutes from Portland International Jetport. Visit the Brick Store Museum six minutes away, or drive seven miles over to Gooch's Beach for an afternoon by the ocean. It's a 13-mile drive to Funtown Splashtown USA amusement park. Take a relaxing swim in our heated indoor pool, and start your morning right with free hot breakfast. WiFi's on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Wells-Ogunquit
description: Off Route 1, near I-95, we're 10 minutes from downtown Ogunquit. You'll find Wells Shopping Plaza and local dining within a half-mile. Grab free hot breakfast before relaxing at Wells Beach or exploring the Rachel Carson National Wildlife Refuge, 10 minutes away. WiFi's on us, and our indoor pool, whirlpool, and fitness center are yours.

name: Hampton Inn Saco/Biddeford
description: Our hotel is between I-95 and I-195 in Saco, three miles from Funtown Splashtown USA and Aquaboggan. Old Orchard Beach, Ferry Beach State Park, and the University of New England are all within 15 minutes. Portland is a 20-minute drive away. Enjoy our free WiFi and free hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Kittery
description: We're off I-95, near the banks of Spruce Creek and steps from the Kittery Outlets and Kittery Trading Post. A short drive brings you lazy days at Wallis Sands State Beach and Sawyers Beach, or strolls through Strawbery Banke Museum's 10 acres of history. Start the day with free breakfast and finish it with a bite to eat in downtown Portsmouth. WiFi's on us.

name: Hampton Inn Presque Isle
description: We're just off US-1, with easy access to Presque Isle shops and restaurants. Northern Maine Community College is two miles away, next to the Presque Isle International Airport and the fairgrounds. It's under 10 minutes to The University of Maine at Presque Isle and Northern Light AR Gould Hospital. Enjoy our indoor pool. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Aberdeen
description: Just off I-95 in Aberdeen, our hotel is five minutes from Ripken Stadium. Aberdeen Proving Ground and Phillips Army Airfield are less than 10 miles away, and we're easy to reach from both BWI and PHL airports. Cooked-to-order breakfast and dinner are served daily in the Garden Grille & Bar, and we have a 24-hour fitness center.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Baltimore / Aberdeen, MD
description: Business travelers are close to Safenet, SAIC, and Wal-Mart Supercenter – and can wind down at Ripken Stadium and Susquehanna State Park, both nearby. Expect home comforts like free breakfast and fully fitted kitchens – stock the fridge at our 24-hour store.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Baltimore/Aberdeen
description: We’re at the heart of the I-95 corridor, five minutes from Ripken baseball stadium, home of the Aberdeen IronBirds. You’ll be within 20 minutes of Susquehanna State Park and Aberdeen Proving Ground army facility. Jump on the interstate for visits to central Baltimore, 40 minutes away. Start your day with free hot breakfast, and enjoy WiFi on us.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Bel Air
description: Staying with us places you at the center of Harfod Country on the shores of Chesapeake Bay, with the sights of both Baltimore and Washington DC on your doorstep. Free hot breakfast fuels a day’s exploration – Havre de Grace, Ripken Stadium and Bulle Roack Golf Course are all nearby – or make use of your in-studio kitchen. WiFi is free, as are our evening socials, Monday – Thursday.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Edgewood/Aberdeen-South
description: We're off I-95 in Edgewood, 15 minutes from Aberdeen. A range of restaurants are within two miles of the hotel. Aberdeen Proving Ground, Northrop Grumman, and Lockheed Martin offices are 15 miles' drive. Aberdeen IronBirds ballpark is 13 minutes away. Enjoy free daily hot breakfast, WiFi, and our indoor pool.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Baltimore/White Marsh, MD
description: Located just off Exit 67A of I-95, we’re minutes from the shopping, dining, and events at The AVENUE at White Marsh and White Marsh Mall. Downtown Baltimore is a short drive away, where you’ll find a lively business and entertainment hub, a thriving theater district, and big-name events at Royal Farms Arena. Start each morning with a free hot breakfast, or prepare meals in your in-suite kitchen.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Baltimore/White Marsh
description: Our hotel is just off I-95, a 15-minute drive from Martin State Airport and just minutes away from White Marsh Mall. We’re 12 miles from downtown Baltimore attractions like Oriole Park, Royal Farms Arena, and the Baltimore Convention Center. Breakfast is available from our Garden Grille & Bar. Enjoy our indoor pool, and whirlpool. Free perks include WiFi and parking.

name: Hampton Inn Baltimore/White Marsh
description: We're off I-95, a short walk from White Marsh Mall and local eats. Get around White Marsh on our free area shuttle. Fill up on free hot breakfast before exploring Gunpowder Falls State Park, 15 minutes away. You'll be half an hour from Baltimore Inner Harbor. Enjoy our free WiFi, seasonal outdoor pool, and fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn Elkton
description: Find us off I-95, just 10 minutes from the University of Delaware. Play a round of golf at Patriots Glen National Gold Club - six minutes away. Visit local attractions like C&D Canal Museum, Cecil County Dragway, and Cooch’s Bridge Battlefield, all within 20 minutes. Start your day on the right foot with a plate of our free hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn Baltimore Bayview Campus
description: Off I-95, we’re four miles from Baltimore’s trendy Inner Harbor, where you can shop, eat, and enjoy the vibrant nightlife. Orioles Park is seven miles from our door and we’re 10 minutes from Fort McHenry National Monument, the coastal fort which inspired the Star-Spangled Banner. Enjoy our heated pool, free hot breakfast, and WiFi on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Annapolis Downtown
description: We’re in the Art District of Annapolis, less than a mile from the U.S Naval Academy. Maryland State House, William Paca House & Garden, and the Navy Marine Corps Memorial Stadium are within a mile. Quiet Water Park is four miles from our door for hiking trails and boat rentals. We serve breakfast, dinner, and drinks at our restaurant, Kitchen on West St.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Annapolis
description: We’re off US-50 with a free shuttle to anywhere within five miles, including shops at Westfield Annapolis, the restaurants around Annapolis Towne Centre, and the US Naval Academy. Enjoy free parking, our Olympic-sized pool, and dining at our award-winning restaurant, Ports of Call. We’ll welcome you with a freshly baked chocolate chip cookie.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Annapolis
description: Visiting a soldier in Annapolis? Our hotel is ten minutes away from the US Naval Academy – with suites available, your family will have plenty of space. Pets are welcome, too. We're close to historic downtown Annapolis sites including the Maryland State House, and Washington DC is an hour away.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Annapolis
description: Located off Highway 50 near Westfield Annapolis Mall, we’re within walking distance of eatery options, and six miles from the U.S. Naval Academy. Historic downtown Annapolis is a 15-minute drive, and Baltimore/Washington International Airport is only a half hour away. Enjoy breakfast, dinner, and evening room service from our Garden Bar & Grille.

name: Hampton Inn Bowie
description: Find us off US-50, five minutes from Bowie Town Center shopping and dining, and steps from a cinema. Start the day with free hot breakfast before heading to Six Flags America or catching pro football at FedExField, both 15 minutes away. The highway puts you half an hour from Washington D.C. Enjoy free WiFi and our outdoor pool.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Kent Island
description: Off Route 50, our waterside hotel is steps from dock bars and seafood restaurants. Cross Island Trail is less than 10 minutes away, and the Annapolis US Naval Academy is a 25-minute drive. We have rooms with balconies overlooking the water, an indoor pool, 24-hour shop, and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Baltimore/Glen Burnie
description: Close to I-97 and I-695, our neighborhood is packed with shopping and dining. Hitch a ride on our free shuttle to businesses within five miles, including BWI Airport, 15 minutes away. Start the day with free hot breakfast before exploring Baltimore's Inner Harbor and National Aquarium, 20 minutes from the door. WiFi's on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Arundel Mills BWI Airport
description: Right off Route 100, our free shuttle stops at BWI Airport, Marc Train and Amtrak stations, Arundel Mills Mall, Maryland Live! Casino, and a variety of restaurants. Downtown Baltimore is a half hour away where you can find the Walters Art Museum, National Aquarium, and Fells Point. Enjoy your in-suite kitchen, free daily hot breakfast, and WiFi on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Arundel Mills/Baltimore
description: We offer free shuttle service to Arundel Mills Mall (adjacent to Live! Casino) and Baltimore/Washington International Airport. Our hotel is 13 miles from downtown attractions like the National Aquarium, NFL Ravens and MLB Orioles games, and the Baltimore Convention Center. Take a relaxing swim in our outdoor pool. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hilton Baltimore BWI Airport
description: We’re two miles from MD-295 and BWI Airport is 10 minutes away via our free shuttle, covering a three-mile radius. Arundel Mills mall is 6 miles away, and downtown Baltimore and Oriole Park are a 20-minute drive. We have an indoor pool and a seasonal sundeck. Enjoy all-day-dining at our Acqua Restaurant with room service available.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Baltimore - BWI Airport
description: We're 10 minutes from Baltimore/Washington International Airport, with a free 24-hour shuttle both ways. Our location near I-195 offers easy access to downtown: Camden Yards, M&T Bank Stadium, and the Inner Harbor are eight miles away. Enjoy our outdoor pool and sport courts, and a warm chocolate chip cookie when you arrive.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Baltimore Inner Harbor
description: Our historic hotel is a short walk from Baltimore's Inner Harbor, home of the National Aquarium and waterfront dining. We're within a mile of Baltimore Convention Center and Oriole Park at Camden Yards, with Charles Center Metro station minutes away. Wake up to free hot breakfast, and enjoy our free WiFi, fitness center, and indoor pool.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Baltimore Downtown, MD
description: The culture-rich streets of downtown await, just 12 miles from the airport. We’re in the Mt. Vernon neighborhood, steps from famed food hubs like Lexington Market and cultural must-sees including The Walters Art Museum and Baltimore Symphony Orchestra. Mercy Medical Center visitors can also expect complimentary shuttles seven days a week. WiFi and breakfast are free, and pets are welcome.

name: Pier 5 Hotel Baltimore, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: At the heart of Baltimore's Inner Harbor, our hotel is steps from the National Aquarium and Pier Six Pavilion. We provide a free shuttle to Fells Point and Johns Hopkins Hospital. Join us for our 'Crabby Hour' evening reception, and enjoy fresh seafood with a view at McCormick & Schmick's. We offer courtesy passes to Maryland Athletic Club.

name: Hampton Inn Baltimore-Downtown-Convention Center
description: Find us off I-395, across the street from Oriole Park at Camden Yards. We're a short walk from the Baltimore Convention Center and the Inner Harbor. The University of Maryland Medical Center is three minutes' drive away, and it's the same to M&T Bank Stadium for pro football. Fuel up on free hot breakfast, and unwind in our indoor pool and fitness center. WiFi is on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Baltimore Inner Harbor
description: We're close to the water in the Inner Harbor, within a mile of the National Aquarium, the Baltimore Convention Center, and Johns Hopkins Hospital. Ravens football at M&T Bank Stadium and Orioles baseball at Camden Yards are under two miles away. Enjoy the view from our rooftop garden. Breakfast, lunch, and dinner are served daily in our Garden Grille & Bar.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Baltimore
description: We're a block away from the harbor, just a 10-minute walk to the National Aquarium, and a mile to the Baltimore Convention Center. The University of Maryland Medical Center, Baltimore VA Medical Center, and Johns Hopkins are all within 1.5 miles. While you're here, enjoy daily free hot breakfast and evening socials, Monday – Thursday.

name: Tru by Hilton Baltimore Harbor East
description: In the heart of downtown, near Baltimore Harbor, Harbor East, Little Italy, and Fells Point. The Convention Center and Oriole Park are just five minutes away, and there’s great dining right outside our doors. If you need suggestions on local favorites and must-see spots while you’re here, just ask our friendly staff.

name: Inn at The Colonnade Baltimore - a DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel
description: We’re across the street from Johns Hopkins University and Blue Jays games at Homewood Field. Baltimore Museum of Art is less than a mile away, and Fell’s Point and the Inner Harbor are within five miles. Our lobby features marble floors and handpainted domed ceilings, and every stay begins with a warm cookie at check-in.

name: Hilton Garden Inn BWI Airport
description: We're off MD-295, with a free shuttle to Baltimore/Washington International Airport (BWI) and the AMTRAK for Washington DC and NYC. Local dining options, Downtown Baltimore, and the Guinness Brewery are within 15 minutes. We’re 10 miles from Aquarium Baltimore and Baltimore Harbor. Parking and WiFi are on us, and we have a 24-hour business center.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Baltimore-BWI Airport
description: Downtown Baltimore is eight miles away, boasting baseball at Oriole Park, football at M&T Bank Stadium, and the vibrant nightlife of Inner Harbor. Start the day with free breakfast and scenic strolls by the Patapsco River. Finish the night at our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday, or with a quiet meal in your suite's kitchen. WiFi’s on us.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Baltimore at BWI Airport
description: Find us off I-195, 15 minutes from downtown Baltimore. We provide a free area shuttle covering the airport, and nearby light rail, AMTRAK, and MARC train stations. Washington DC is a 40-minute drive away. We have an indoor pool and fitness room, and serve a free cooked-to-order breakfast and evening reception daily.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Baltimore North/Timonium
description: Off I-83, we’re 15 minutes from Towson University and Goucher College. Baltimore Inner Harbor is 25 minutes away and we’re a 40-minute drive from Baltimore/Washington Airport. The light rail service, one mile away, connects directly to the airport. Enjoy our indoor saline pool, fitness center, and free WiFi and hot breakfast.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Baltimore Hunt Valley
description: Our hotel in Hunt Valley is just off I-83, less than two miles from Oregon Ridge Park, and Oregon Ridge Dinner Theater. Baltimore’s Inner Harbor, home to Maryland Science Center and the National Aquarium, is 25 minutes away. Enjoy daily free cooked-to-order breakfast, our complimentary evening reception, and access to our indoor pool.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Washington DC/Bethesda
description: We're one block from the Bethesda Metro Station, which takes you to downtown Washington, DC in 20 minutes. Two large medical centers and a huge variety of shops and restaurants are within two miles. Washington Reagan National Airport is 10 miles away. Enjoy breakfast and dinner in the Garden Grille & Bar, with room service in the evenings.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Silver Spring
description: At the center of pedestrian-friendly Silver Spring, we’re ideal for those looking for downtown buzz set to a slower pace. Enjoy close proximity to The Fillmore for theater, the National Museum of Health and Medicine, and Sligo Creek Golf Course. A hot breakfast, WiFi and weeknight evening social are included in your stay.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Washington DC - Silver Spring
description: Restaurants, shopping, and shows at the Fillmore are a five-minute walk from our downtown Silver Spring hotel. We're half a mile from Silver Spring station, for easy DC access on the Metro Red Line. Enjoy a warm DoubleTree cookie when you arrive, and stop by Sergio's for handmade pastas and fine wines.

name: Canopy by Hilton Washington DC Bethesda North
description: Our urban retreat is at the heart of Pike & Rose's premier shopping block, steps from nightlife and entertainment. We're 10 minutes from Strathmore and 14 miles from downtown Washington D.C. Expect a complimentary welcome gift with a local theme, free Canopy Bikes and pedicabs for local exploring, and a full-service salon and spa.

name: Hilton Washington DC/Rockville Hotel & Executive Meeting Ctr
description: Find us opposite Twinbrook Metro Station, from where it takes 30 minutes to reach the heart of Washington DC. Also nearby are offices for the FDA, Lockheed Martin, IBM, and iHeartRadio. Our conference center boasts 35,000 sq. ft. of flexible space including 14 conference rooms and a ballroom. We also have a restaurant, bar, café, and fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Glenarden/Washington DC
description: You'll find us right off I-495, and our free shuttle to local Metrorail stations makes access to Washington DC easy. We're close to major firms like Lockheed Martin, four miles away, and it's 12 miles to the University of Maryland. Walk to Woodmore Towne Center. Unwind in our pool, and enjoy daily hot breakfast, and WiFi on us.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Largo Washington DC
description: You'll be 30 minutes from Washington DC and six miles from Capitol Heights and Mitchellville towns. Ballgames at FedEx Field are six minutes away. Grab our free shuttle bus to local attractions in a four-mile radius, from 6:00 am – 9:00 pm. Enjoy free WiFi and breakfast, and your own in-suite kitchen. Wind down at complimentary evening socials, Monday – Thursday.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Washington DC/Greenbelt
description: We're off I-495, across from Greenbelt National Park. College Park, the Greenbelt metro station, and NASA Goddard Visitor Center are within five miles. FedEx Field is 15 minutes away and Washington, DC is within 15 miles. Enjoy our free five-mile shuttle, indoor pool, restaurant, and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn College Park
description: We're off US Highway 1, close to I-495 and two miles from the University of Maryland. Shopping at IKEA and The Mall at Prince George's, and sightseeing at NASA Goddard Space Flight Center is less than 15 minutes away. Washington DC is 16 miles from our door. Enjoy daily hot breakfast, WiFi and parking on us.

name: Hampton Inn Laurel (Fort Meade Area)
description: Located off US 1, we're just 20 minutes from the headquarters of the National Security Agency. Explore the science of international codebreaking at the NSA’s National Cryptologic Museum, less than 10 miles away. The University of Maryland is just 20 minutes’ drive from our hotel. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Camp Springs/Andrews AFB
description: Our Camp Springs rooms are off I-495, a mile from Branch Avenue Metro Station. You'll be 10 minutes from Andrews Air Force Base. Football at FedExField and National Harbor's dining and attractions are all 15 minutes away. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, our fitness center, and indoor pool.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Laurel
description: We're moments from I-95 and Laurel businesses. We offer a free shuttle to any destination within five miles, including Laurel Park racetrack and the shops and restaurants of Towne Centre at Laurel. It's 11 miles to Bowie State University. Enjoy free WiFi, a fitness center, and a warm welcome cookie on arrival.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites National Harbor/Alexandria Area
description: We’re moments from the Gaylord National Convention Center, Potomac River, and National Harbor. Tanger Outlets is two miles away, and there are plenty of restaurants in walking distance. We’re eight miles from Ronald Reagan National Airport and 25 miles from Dulles International Airport. Enjoy our indoor pool, fitness center, daily free hot breakfast and WiFi.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Silver Spring
description: From electric car charging to solar energy sources, we care for the environment as much as we do our guests. Our pet-friendly suites are easily accessible from the Capital Beltway and we’re close to the FDA, the University of Maryland, National Archives at College Park, and Downtown Silver Spring. Build-your-own breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Silver Spring North
description: Our Silver Spring hotel is eight miles from major attractions including the AFI Docs film festival and Silver Spring Jazz Festival. Arlington National Cemetery and the Smithsonian Institution are 30 minutes away. The Garden Grille serves cooked-to-order breakfast, lunch, and dinner daily – and room service is available from 5 – 9 pm.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Columbia
description: Our hotel is just off Interstate 29, within three miles of Merriweather Post Pavilion and The Mall in Columbia. We're 20 minutes from Inner Harbor and Baltimore-Washington International Airport. A free shuttle service is available, and we have a heated indoor pool and whirlpool. Every stay starts with our signature warm chocolate chip cookie.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Columbia/South
description: We're a mile from the Highway 32/I-95 intersection, within 10 minutes of the University of Phoenix and companies like FEi Systems and Agnik. Discover shopping at The Mall in Columbia 10 minutes north, or take the team to indoor games at Soccer Stop two minutes away. It's a 15-mile drive to Baltimore/Washington Airport. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Columbia
description: We're off Route 100, near a variety of restaurants and offices at Columbia Business Park. You'll find plenty of shopping options nearby, including The Mall in Columbia, Arundel Mills Mall, and Ellicott City's historic district. A half-hour drive will take you to downtown Baltimore. Enjoy free hot breakfast and free WiFi.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Columbia
description: Located off Route 100, we're five miles from downtown Columbia and The Mall in Columbia, and within walking distance of dining options. Lake Kittamaqundi and Lake Elkhorn Park are 15 minutes away, and Baltimore/Washington International Airport is only 11 miles from our door. Dine at our Great American Grill and enjoy cocktails in our Pavilion Lounge.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Columbia/Laurel
description: Find us 45 minutes from Ronald Reagan International Airport. We're a base for business travelers visiting Johns Hopkins Applied Physics Laboratory or the Kossiakoff Center. We're also a short drive from Baltimore's Inner Harbor, Maryland Live! Casino, and the T. Howard Duckett Watershed. Expect free breakfast and WiFi, plus a complimentary evening social Monday – Thursday.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Columbia
description: Discover nearby Elkridge and historic Ellicott City before catching an outdoor show at the Merriweather Post Pavilion. Nestled in Columbia’s business district, we’re near Motorola and Boeing offices, and walking distance from local dining. WiFi, breakfast, and our evening social, Monday – Thursday, are free. Enjoy an in-suite kitchen. Pets are welcome.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Baltimore/Woodlawn
description: Located off I-695, we’re 12 miles from downtown Baltimore. Our free shuttle will take you around the local area. Medicare & Medicaid Services and the FBI – Baltimore Field Office are within two miles. Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport is 13 miles away. Enjoy free hot breakfast, WiFi, and our indoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn Cumberland
description: We're right off I-68, perched on a hill with great views of Cumberland and the surrounding area. Allegany College and the regional medical center are five minutes away. Go back in time on the Scenic Railroad, 1.5 miles west, or roll the dice 10 minutes away at Rocky Gap Casino. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our heated indoor saline pool.

name: Hampton Inn Frostburg
description: We're half a mile from I-68, and it's about a six-minute drive over to Frostburg State University. Head over to nearby Cumberland and catch a ride on the Western Maryland Scenic Railroad. Access to the Great Allegheny Passage, a bike trail connecting DC to Pittsburgh, is two miles away. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our indoor pool.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Solomons
description: Off Route 4, we’re in walking distance from Annmarie Gardens. The Patuxent River waterfront is five minutes away, and Calvert Cliffs State Park and NAVAIR are within a 15-minute drive. Ruddy Duck Brewery & Grill is next door. We’ve got indoor and outdoor pools, an all-day restaurant, and a 24-hour shop.

name: Hampton Inn Lexington Park
description: While you're visiting Naval Air Station Patuxent River (or NAS Pax River) half a mile away, check out the Navy's aviation museum right across the street. Drive 10 miles south to time travel back to the 17th century at Historic St. Mary's City, or stop in at St. Mary's College of Maryland next door. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our outdoor pool.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Lexington Park Patuxent River NAS, MD
description: If you’re traveling for work, good news: business is booming. We’re adjacent to Patuxent River Naval Station, with Lockheed Martin, Boeing, and more nearby. We’re close to a number of restaurants, but if you feel like something comfier, take advantage of your in-suite kitchen. WiFi and breakfast are on us, great fuel for a day with the dog at St. Mary’s River State Park.

name: Hampton Inn Waldorf
description: We’re off US 301, a mile from the shops of St. Charles Towne Center Mall. Visit Cedarville State Forest and the College of Southern Maryland, within 10 miles of the hotel. Naval Surface Warfare Center Indian Head and Naval Support Facility are less than 25 minutes away in Indian Head. Breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Waldorf
description: Off Highway 301, we're next to the St. Charles Towne Center mall and two miles from the Shops at Waldorf Center. Joint Base Andrews is 18 miles away, and it's about 30 minutes to Alexandria and Washington DC. Our Garden Grille restaurant and bar serves breakfast and dinner, and the Pavilion Pantry is open 24 hours for drinks and snacks.

name: Hampton Inn Easton
description: We’re close to Route 50, and less than a mile from historic downtown Easton's shops, museums, galleries, and restaurants overlooking the Chesapeake Bay. Hog Neck Golf Course is just three miles from our hotel. Enjoy our free hot breakfast and WiFi, and our fitness center and heated indoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn Salisbury
description: We're just off US Highway 13, 13 minutes' drive from Salisbury Regional Airport and Salisbury University. The Centre at Salisbury, for shops and dining, is a mile from our door. Visit Salisbury Zoo or US 13 Dragway and Speedway, both five miles away. Unwind in our swimming pool or at our pool tables, and enjoy daily hot breakfast and WiFi on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Salisbury/Fruitland
description: Salisbury University is five minutes from our hotel along business highway 13, and it's four miles to Salisbury Zoological Park. You'll find a number of restaurants within walking distance. You can reach Perdue Farms in eight miles, or take your youth league team to a game at Fruitland Recreational Park five minutes away. Enjoy free hot breakfast and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Frederick-Fort Detrick
description: We're just off US-15, five minutes from Fort Detrick and Frederick Community College. Our hotel is three miles from downtown Frederick destinations like the fairgrounds and Hood College. Wells Fargo, U.S. Silica, and the National Laboratory for Cancer Research are within four miles. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our indoor pool and whirlpool.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Frederick
description: We're in Frederick's corporate center, within half a mile of Re/Max and Spirent. Francis Scott Key Mall is across the highway. Downtown Frederick and the fairgrounds are four miles north, and it's seven miles to Fort Detrick. Cooked-to-order breakfast, lunch, and dinner are served daily at our Garden Grille & Bar. Enjoy our heated indoor pool and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Frederick
description: We’re located off I-270, under a mile from many local restaurants and ten minutes from Monocacy National Battlefield and Weinberg Center for the Arts. Ft Detrick is six miles away, and Catoctin Mountain is a half-hour from our door. We've got an outdoor pool and fitness center, and every stay includes free WiFi and daily free hot breakfast.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Frederick
description: Satisfy retail cravings at Westview Promenade, walking-distance from your room. We’re 15 minutes from downtown Frederick, where you’ll find tours of historical city locations. Fill up on free breakfast before taking the family to Adventure Park USA. Kick back at our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday, and make the most of your in-suite kitchen. WiFi’s on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Frederick
description: Stay at our comfy all-suite hotel while you discover Frederick. Tour the battlefields or head to historic downtown Frederick with great shops and dining options. Kids love a day at Adventure Park USA. Located off I-270, we're just an hour away from Washington DC and Baltimore. Kick back at our hotel, with free breakfast, free WiFi, and an indoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Washington DC North/Gaithersburg
description: Make yourself at home in Montgomery County's tech corridor, 30 miles outside of Washington DC. We offer free breakfast and WiFi, plus a great fitness center and indoor pool. Reserve a seat on our free shuttle to anywhere within a five-mile radius, or hop on a train at the Metro station to DC, the zoo, and great shopping.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Gaithersburg/ Washington, DC North
description: Located 20 miles northwest of D.C., in Gaithersburg’s business district, near Asbury, Hughes, NIST and others, we’re ideally positioned for both business and leisure guests. Take advantage of free WiFi, breakfast and our evening social, Monday – Thursday. Enjoy easy access to I-270’s ‘technology center’, with its shops and restaurants. Or, rustle up a meal in your in-suite kitchen instead.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Hagerstown
description: We're just off I-80, adjacent to Valley Park Commons, and under half a mile from dining and entertainment options at Valley Mall. Downtown Hagerstown is three miles away. We have an indoor pool, outdoor patio with gas grills and firepits, and a fitness and laundry facility. Other perks include free WiFi and a free hot breakfast.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Hagerstown
description: We're just five minutes from the crossroads of I-70 and I-80, and 10 minutes from central Hagerstown. You'll be steps from Valley Mall, with Chesapeake & Ohio National Historical Park 10 minutes from the door. Wind down at our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday, or dabble in a little in-suite cooking. WiFi and breakfast are on us. Pets are welcome.

name: Hampton Inn Hagerstown-I-81
description: We're off I-81, 10 minutes from central Hagerstown. In the city, you'll find Discovery Station museum and Washington County of Fine Arts. Maryland nature is 20 minutes away at the Chesapeake & Ohio Canal National Historical Park. Enjoy free hot breakfast, WiFi on us, and an indoor pool. Hagerstown Regional Airport is 10 minutes north.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Ocean City West
description: Our hotel is on US-50, across the highway from the shops at Outlets Ocean City. We're under two miles from Ocean City's sandy beaches and boardwalk entertainment. It's a five-mile drive to Ocean Downs Casino and nine miles to Assateague State Park. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our indoor pool.

name: Tru by Hilton Ocean City Bayside
description: We’re on MD-528, in the heart of Ocean City. Local shopping, dining, and the Jolly Rogers Amusement Park are under a mile from our door. Ocean City Beach and Ocean City Boardwalk are 10 minutes away. Enjoy our indoor heated pool and games room. WiFi and daily hot breakfast are on us. Pets are welcome.

name: Hilton Ocean City Oceanfront Suites
description: Admire Atlantic Ocean views from our beachfront hotel in Ocean City. Just a few blocks from the Boardwalk, we’re less than a mile from the Roland E. Powell Convention Center and Jolly Roger Amusement Park. We have two outdoor pools overlooking the ocean, including a kid’s pool with waterslides, and a heated indoor pool.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Ocean City Oceanfront
description: Beachfront balconies boast Atlantic views at our Ocean City hotel. We're a 10-minute walk from Jolly Roger Amusement Park and waterfront fun at the Ocean City Boardwalk. Swim in indoor and outdoor pools and relax in our fitness center. Dine in our two restaurants and enjoy more options a short walk away.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Ocean City/Bayfront-Convention Center
description: Off the Coastal Highway, we’re a 10-minute walk from the Roland E. Powell Convention Center. The beach and restaurants are across the street, and Ocean City Boardwalk is a few blocks away. We’ve got an indoor and outdoor pool, deck with bar and fire pit, and fitness center. Free WiFi and daily hot breakfast complete your stay.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Ocean City Bayside
description: We’re in the heart of Ocean City, between the Boardwalk and Northside Park, with award-winning beaches within walking distance.  Eat at fantastic local restaurants, or cook in your in-suite kitchen. We’re near Jolly Roger Amusement Park and 67th Street Town Center. WiFi and breakfast are on us. Pets are welcome.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Rockville-Gaithersburg
description: Off I-270, we’re a half-mile from Shady Grove Medical Center and Fallsgrove Village Center shopping. Metro links to Washington DC are three miles away, and historic Gaithersburg is four miles from the hotel. We have a fitness center, indoor pool and whirlpool, restaurant, and 24-hour snack shop. Free perks include WiFi, parking, and our three-mile shuttle.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Rockville-Gaithersburg
description: In the heart of Rockville's business district, adjacent to the I-270 Technology Corridor, we offer easy access to DC's Metrorail and Reagan, Baltimore, and Dulles Airports. For trips into DC, the Shady Grove Metro station is a free shuttle ride away. WiFi, breakfast and our evening social, Monday – Thursday, are free. Get creative in your in-suite kitchen.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Baltimore North - Pikesville
description: Our hotel is off I-695, in the Northwest Baltimore business district. We're 14 miles from downtown Baltimore, home to the Inner Harbor entertainment district and Camden Yards. We provide access to the attached Coppermine Racquet & Fitness Club, and guests can enjoy our outdoor pool and a warm DoubleTree cookie on arrival.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Baltimore/Owings Mills
description: We're just south of I-795, five minutes from CareFirst and Bankers Life corporate offices and across the street from dining options. Stevenson University is two miles away. It's 21 miles to Baltimore's Inner Harbor and Baltimore/Washington International Airport. Our Garden Grille & Bar serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner daily – room service available from 5pm–10pm.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Owings Mills
description: Shopping, business, and recreation are close to our new all-suite hotel in Owings Mills, Maryland. We are just one mile from Metro Centre at Owings Mills and shops, restaurants, and special events at Foundry Row. Our pet-friendly hotel features an indoor heated pool, meeting space, and in-suite kitchens, as well as free breakfast and WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Baltimore/Owings Mills
description: Close to I-795, we're within five minutes of Stevenson University and a variety of local dining. Our hotel is 25 minutes from Baltimore's National Aquarium, Inner Harbor attractions and nightlife, and Fort McHenry National Monument. Wake up to daily free hot breakfast, and enjoy our indoor heated pool and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Amesbury
description: Off I-95/I-495, our Amesbury rooms are 15 minutes from Salisbury Beach. A variety of restaurants are within walking distance, and Cinemagic is a half-mile from the door. Lake Gardner, Maudslay State Park, and Newburyport are all within four miles. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, our fitness center, and heated indoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn Haverhill
description: Downtown Boston, Coastal Maine, Canobie Lake Park, Kenoza Lake, Winnekenni Castle, Pentucket Arts Center, Valley Forum Indoor Ice Skating Rink – with such a mix of attractions, pleasing the family is easy. While you’re here, enjoy free WiFi and breakfast. Corporate guests can enjoy proximity to Ward Hill Business Park. Don’t miss the Salisbury and Hampton beaches.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Boston / Andover
description: Nestled in the quiet, wooded Merrimack Valley, we're just 27 miles from downtown Boston. Easy access to I-93 and the Massachusetts Turnpike make our suites an easy base for experiencing New England, from Red Sox games at Fenway Park to colonial history in Salem. Each suite features a fully equipped kitchen and separate living area.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Boston-Andover
description: We're off I-93, minutes from Andover corporate offices. Canobie Lake Park and shops at The Mall at Rockingham Park are both within nine miles. Enjoy a walk along the Merrimack River on the Andover Trail, and relax in our heated indoor pool and whirlpool. We'll have a warm DoubleTree cookie for you on arrival.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Boston North Shore
description: We're moments from the I-95/US-1 interchange in Boston's North Shore. Atlantis Sports Club and Spa is located on-site, offering access to their full gym, indoor pool, and spa facilities. The indoor CoCo Key Water Park is also connected to the hotel. Historic Salem is nine miles away and Burlington, MA is 20 miles away.

name: Hampton Inn Boston Woburn
description: Off I-95, we're within a 20-minute drive of Harvard, Legoland, and Boston Logan International Airport. Downtown Boston attractions like the Freedom Trail and New England Aquarium are less than nine miles away. Our hotel shares space with Homewood Suites, offering extra perks for our guests.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Boston Woburn
description: Off I-95, we're steps from restaurants and within a 20-minute drive of Harvard, LEGOLAND, and Boston Logan International Airport. Downtown Boston is less than nine miles away. Our suites feature full kitchens, and free hot breakfast is served daily. We share space with Hampton Inn, offering extra perks for our guests.

name: Hilton Boston/Woburn
description: Off I-93, our hotel is in the Cummings Park Business Center, next to local shopping and quick bites. We're 10 minutes from Woburn Anderson Transportation Center, which provides a rail link to downtown Boston — reach the station via free shuttle, covering five miles. Enjoy free parking, our indoor pool, and fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn Boston Bedford Burlington
description: Right off US-3, we’re a free shuttle ride from a variety of corporate offices, shops, and restaurants. Lexington and Concord are both under 10 miles away, and we’re 30 minutes from downtown Boston where you can catch a Red Sox game at Fenway Park. Enjoy our fitness center, seasonal outdoor pool, and business center. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Boston - Bedford Glen
description: Set on 24 acres of wooded grounds, our hotel in Bedford Glen is just 18 miles from Boston. Burlington Mall is under a 10-minute drive and Concord and Lexington are both under 20 minutes away. Enjoy our indoor pool, indoor and outdoor tennis courts, sand volleyball, basketball, and bocce courts. Our firepits are the perfect place to unwind after a long day.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Boston-Billerica/Bedford/Burlington
description: Rest up in Boston’s high-tech corridor. Grab our free shuttle to reach central Burlington and local companies in a five-mile radius. Explore the Lexington/Bedford historical area, within six miles, or uncover Burlington Mall’s shops and dining. For a quiet night, cook in-suite or stop by our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Boston/Peabody
description: Located just off the interstate, we're within easy reach of popular attractions like the Salem Witch Museum and whale-watching off the coast in Gloucester. Walk to nearby restaurants and malls, or step inside the hotel to enjoy a daily free hot breakfast, WiFi, heated indoor pool, and fitness center.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Boston-Peabody
description: Our pet-friendly suites are just off Highway 1, 15 minutes from Peabody and a 24-minute drive to Boston. Browse the shops of North Shore Mall, four miles away, or head 18 minutes east for historic Salem and its witch and wax museums. Stop by our free evening social, Monday – Thursday. WiFi and hot breakfast are also free.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Boston/Cambridge-Arlington, MA
description: Harvard University and Tufts University are both about two miles from our hotel off US-3. Corporate parks are 10 minutes away, next to the Alewife T station – catch the red line to reach MIT, Massachusetts General Hospital, and downtown Boston. We serve free hot breakfast each morning, and we have complimentary evening socials Monday – Thursday.

name: DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Boston - Cambridge
description: Our hotel overlooks the Charles River half a mile south of Harvard Business School. We offer a free scheduled shuttle to downtown Boston and Harvard Square, and we're about two miles from MIT. Live entertainment can be found on the 2nd floor at the world-renowned Scullers Jazz Club.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Boston-Burlington
description: We're right off I-95, across the highway from Burlington Mall and a mile from Microsoft Boston, Samsung Pay, and Oracle. Cultural attractions and pro sports are in easy reach via our free shuttle to the Amtrak station, putting you 14 miles from downtown Boston. We have an indoor pool and fitness center, and our Garden Grille serves breakfast and dinner. WiFi's on us.

name: Hampton Inn Boston/Cambridge
description: We're on Route 28, less than two miles from the campuses of Harvard and MIT. The Lechmere T station is across the street: in five minutes you're downtown or at TD Garden for Bruins and Celtics games. Fenway Park is three miles away. Work out in our fitness room and enjoy hot breakfast and WiFi on us.

name: Hampton Inn and Suites Boston/Waltham
description: We're right off I-95, minutes from many Fortune 500 corporations and three miles from Bentley University. Moody Street, famous for its restaurants serving cuisines from around the world, is 10 minutes' drive from our door. Boston is 20 miles away. Wake up to our free hot breakfast, and unwind in our indoor pool. WiFi and parking are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Boston Logan Airport Chelsea
