description: We are off U.S. Route 1 and Massachusetts State Hwy 16. Take our airport shuttle to Boston Logan International Airport, less than three miles from our hotel. We’re across the street from Mystic Mall and just three miles from Bunker Hill Monument.

name: Hilton Boston Back Bay
description: We’re in the waterfront neighborhood of Back Bay, around the corner from the Prudential Center and three blocks from Fenway Park – home of the Boston Red Sox. The Charles River,  Boston Commons, and the start of The Freedom Trail are a mile away. Our hotel features an indoor pool, fitness center, and a souvenir and snack shop.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Boston Logan Airport Chelsea
description: We're in the heart of Chelsea, four miles from the airport and downtown Boston. Explore the USS Constitution, have a picnic in Mary O'Malley State Park , or ride on a gondola before unwinding in our gym or indoor pool. Cook dinner in your suite's fully equipped kitchen before joining our complimentary evening social, on select days. WiFi and a daily hot breakfast are free.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Boston Brookline-Longwood Medical
description: From our front door it's just minutes to many world-class hospitals including Brigham and Women's, Beth Israel Deaconess Medical Center, and Boston Children's. The attractions of downtown are under five miles away, passing by Fenway Park (home of the Red Sox) on the way. During your stay, enjoy daily free hot breakfast and a full in-suite kitchen.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Boston Brookline
description: We are about a mile from Fenway Park outside of the Medical Center Area. There are seven bus stops and four light rail stations within a half mile of our hotel. Beth Israel Deaconess and Jamaica Plain VA Medical Centers are within a mile. Take a tour of Harvard University less than 10 minutes away. We provide a shuttle to the Longwood Medical Area.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Boston - Downtown
description: Our hotel in the heart of historic downtown Boston was once the prestigious Don Bosco High School. We're adjacent to Tufts Medical Center, surrounded by the entertainment and dining options of the Theater District, and walking distance to Boston Public Gardens and Massachusetts State House. There’s a Starbucks on site, as well as a restaurant and bar.

name: Hilton Boston Downtown/Faneuil Hall
description: Our AAA Four Diamond-rated hotel is inside a 1920's Art Deco skyscraper in the heart of Boston's Financial District. We're a five-minute walk from the New England Aquarium, the Faneuil Hall Marketplace, and a huge range of restaurants and bars. It's half a mile to the Boston Tea Party Ships and Museum.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Boston at Logan Airport
description: We’re eight minutes from Boston Logan International Airport, and offer a free shuttle both ways. The MBTA Blue Line Subway is a seven-minute walk away, and gets you to downtown Boston attractions like Faneuil Hall Marketplace in 10 minutes. Fuel up with free breakfast each morning, and wind down at our complimentary reception at the end of every day.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Worcester
description: Welcome to downtown Worcester: we're moments from Shrewsbury Street and the culinary cornucopia of Restaurant Row. Those after culture can find it on the walls of Worcester Art Museum and at shows at Hanover Theatre. Start each day with hot breakfast, it's free—as is the WiFi and Monday – Thursday evening socials.

name: Hampton Inn Sturbridge
description: You'll find us just off I-84, two miles from a choice of local dining. Sturbridge Flea Market and the 19th century living museum of Old Sturbridge Village, are both five minutes' drive away. Wells State Park is five miles from our door. Return to unwind in our pool. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi on us.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Boston - Westborough
description: We're moments from I-495, walking distance from several Westborough corporate offices. Natick Mall, Framingham State University, and downtown Worchester are within 13 miles. Get in your exercise in our free fitness center and cool off in our indoor pool. We'll have your fresh cookie waiting.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Boston Marlborough
description: We’re less than a mile from I-495, and just 15 minutes from Marlborough center. Fill up on free breakfast before swinging by Solomond Pond Golf Center, a half-mile away. Taste local flavor at Nashoba Valley Winery, or tour the Tower Hill Botanic Garden. Relax with some in-suite cooking, or at our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday. WiFi’s on us.

name: Hampton Inn Boston/Marlborough
description: We’re located off Route 20 and I-495, a short walk from area restaurants and family fun at Apex Entertainment. New England Sports Center, North America’s largest indoor ice skating facility, is 10 minutes away, and we’re a short drive from several corporate offices. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, free WiFi, our large indoor pool, and fitness center access.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Boston/Marlborough
description: Off I-495, we're in Forest Hills business park, adjacent to GE Healthcare and Quest Diagnostics. Our hotel is within four miles of central Marlborough, Apex Center entertainment and dining, and New England Sports Center. Ask about our free area shuttle, and enjoy our indoor pool, patio and firepit area, and fitness center.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Boston Marlborough
description: We’re located off Route 20 and I-495, a half mile from area restaurants and family fun at Apex Entertainment. New England Sports Center, North America’s largest indoor ice skating facility, and Solomon Pond Mall are both 10 minutes away. Enjoy daily free cooked-to-order breakfast and our nightly evening reception, both hosted in our inviting atrium.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Westford-Chelmsford
description: We're in Westford Technology Park, just off I-495. You'll find dozens of businesses just a few steps away, plus a good choice of shops and a mix of chain and independent restaurants. It's three minutes to the Nashoba Valley Ski Area. In summer, take the kids to Kimball Farm, three miles away. Our daily hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Devens Common
description: Fort Devens US military installation is across the street from our hotel. Many large companies are within two miles, including Bristol-Myers Squibb, Johnson Matthey, and SMC. It's less than 12 miles to the Nashoba Valley Ski Area. Cooked-to-order breakfast, lunch, and dinner are served daily at our Great American Grill, with evening room service. WiFi's on us.

name: Hampton Inn Boston Seaport
description: Our hotel near the waterfront is five minutes' walk from Flynn Cruise Terminal. The BCEC, wharf parks, Rockland Trust Bank Pavilion, and local dining are all within a mile. We have comforts covered with breakfast, WiFi, a business center, and 24-hour fitness center – all free. Enjoy our indoor pool, and host a meeting in a sunlit ballroom with harbor views.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Boston Crosstown Center
description: We're close to I-93, offering a free shuttle to Boston attractions within four miles – that includes Red Sox baseball at Fenway Park, Northeastern University tours, and trips to the New England Aquarium. The shuttle also goes to the convention center, the airport, and Boston Medical Center. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our heated indoor pool.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Boston South Bay
description: We are about two miles from the Boston Convention and Exhibition Center, Medical Center, and Seaport District. Shop at the South Bay Center shopping center or visit Carson Beach and Joe Moakley Park, all less than a mile away. University of Massachusetts Boston is seven minutes away. Enjoy our pet friendly hotel.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Boston Bayside
description: We’re a five-minute walk from JFK/UMass Station, and the Harborwalk and Carson Beach are a half-mile away. Head one mile east to reach the JFK Library and the University of Massachusetts Boston. Enjoy our Starbucks café, a warm cookie at check-in, and free shuttle to Logan Airport and various downtown Boston locations.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Boston Logan Airport
description: We're five minutes from Logan International Airport via free 24-hour shuttle. Orient Heights MBTA Station is a half-mile away, providing easy access to downtown, Boston Commons, and the diverse cuisine of Faneuil Hall Marketplace. Enjoy our indoor pool, 24-hour fitness center, and Constitution Beach, a short walk away.

name: Hampton Inn Boston-Logan Airport
description: Off Lee Burbank Highway, we're 4.5 miles from Logan Airport, with a free shuttle for ease—also covering Wood Island T subway station. Downtown Boston is eight miles from the door. Grab a bite in-house at Two Doors Down Bar and Restaurant, and enjoy our fitness center and indoor heated pool. Hot breakfast is free, and WiFi's on us.

name: Hampton Inn Boston/Braintree
description: Find us off I-94, five minutes from South Shore shopping plaza and dining. Our free shuttle covers a four-mile radius, including Quincy Adams Station, 10 minutes away, providing access to downtown Boston. Kick the day off with free hot breakfast, and enjoy WiFi on us. Our indoor pool, whirlpool, and fitness center are yours.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Boston/Stoughton
description: We're off the Fall River Expressway, with many shops, restaurants, and Stoughton offices within a couple miles. It's seven minutes to the Blue Hills Reservation and 20 minutes to Patriots games at Gillette Stadium. Boston Logan Airport and downtown Boston's historic sites are 20 miles north. Relax in our heated indoor pool. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Boston/Canton, MA
description: Route 128 train station is nearby for trips to Boston. We’re a short drive from Gillette Stadium and the stores at Legacy Place. For hiking and skiing, check out Blue Hills less than a mile away. Finish the day at our free evening social, Monday – Wednesday, or with a quiet meal in your own in-suite kitchen. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Boston - Rockland
description: Our hotel is off Route 3 on the route to Cape Cod. We're within five minutes of Rockland businesses and dining, with Hanover Mall four miles away. Downtown Boston is 20 miles from our door. Enjoy a warm DoubleTree welcome cookie, an outdoor pool, and 24-hour access to our fitness center.

name: Hilton Boston/Dedham
description: Off I-95, we’re tucked against the edge of Dedham’s tranquil wetlands. Within walking distance, reach Legacy Place mall and rail links to South Station. Gillette Stadium and downtown Boston are a half-hour drive away. Perks include our indoor pool, fitness center with classes, and Starbucks coffee in the café.

name: Hampton Inn Boston-Norwood
description: We’re close to I-95, next door to Norwood Country Club & Driving Range. Gillette Stadium is 15 minutes away and we’re 20 miles from Fenway Park. Downtown Boston is a half-hour drive, and you can ride the commuter rail to explore one of America’s oldest cities. We offer a free shuttle to and from the railway station.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Needham Boston
description: You’ll be steps from Cutler Park Reservation and tee-time at Charles River Country Club. Take a short drive to Boston center, where you’ll find ballgames at Fenway Park, and family days at New England Aquarium. Grab a bite at the Shops at Chestnut Hill, or cook for yourself in your suite. Breakfast, WiFi, and evening socials, Monday – Thursday, are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Cape Cod Canal
description: Our hotel is off Highway 6, steps from Ryan Family Amusements Buzzards Bay. The National Marine Life Center and Water Wizz are within three miles, and Aptucxet Trading Post Museum can be reached in 12 minutes. Relax in our indoor heated pool and stay active in our fitness center. We've got WiFi and hot breakfast covered.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Plymouth
description: We’re just off Highway 3, under three miles from Plymouth Rock and Plimoth Plantation. Shopping and restaurants are within 10 minutes, and we're two miles from Beth Israel Deaconess Hospital. Breakfast is served daily in our Garden Grille & Bar, and evening room service is provided by 99 Restaurant.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Plymouth
description: Find us five minutes off Highway 44, one mile from Colony Place shopping and surrounding restaurants. We're 10 minutes from downtown Plymouth via free shuttle, home to Pilgrim Memorial State Park and National Monument to the Forefathers. You'll have free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and access to our fitness center and indoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn New Bedford/Fairhaven
description: Find us just south of the I-195 and Route 240 intersection in Bedford, walking distance from shops and restaurants. Fort Phoenix State Reservation is two miles away in Fairhaven, offering a half-mile of beachfront, basketball, tennis, and a playground. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our seasonal outdoor pool.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Cape Cod - Hyannis
description: We’re a mile south of Barnstable Municipal Airport, a short drive from Cape Cod Mall and US-6. Hyannis is five minutes away, home to the John F. Kennedy Hyannis Museum and concerts at Melody Tent. Bayberry Hills Golf Course is less than five miles from our door. Enjoy our seasonal outdoor pool and a freshly baked cookie on arrival.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Cape Cod-West Yarmouth
description: We’re on Yarmouth's Main Street, a mile from Colonial Acres Beach. Barnstable Municipal Airport is ten minutes away, and the port for ferries to Nantucket and Martha’s Vineyard is just over a mile away. Relax in our indoor or outdoor pools and enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Raynham Taunton
description: Our all-suite hotel is on Route 44, 30 minutes from Boston. Find great shopping just three miles away at Silver City Gallery Mall or browse for bargains down the street at Raynham Flea Market. Enjoy our fitness center and heated indoor pool as well as free WiFi and breakfast. Our pet-friendly suites include kitchens and ample workspace.

name: Hampton Inn Raynham-Taunton
description: Find us off Highway 44 in Raynham's corporate district, less than three miles from Taunton. Bridgewater State University is 13 minutes away and our free shuttle will take you anywhere within a five-mile radius. Stay active in our fitness center and pool or relax in our hot tub. Daily free hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Fall River/Westport
description: Find us off I-195, three miles from the center of Fall River and its historic attractions. It's 12 miles to Horseneck Beach, and 20 miles to Newport. Roger Williams University and UMass Dartmouth are both within 20 minutes. Relax in our indoor pool and whirlpool. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Walpole Foxboro
description: Sports fans will love our proximity to Gillette Stadium, but there's plenty to cheer about inside our hotel, too – like free WiFi and breakfast. Make yourself at home in your spacious suite with fully equipped kitchen, or grab a snack from our 24-hour market. Our heated indoor pool is a great place to unwind between business meetings or shopping trips.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Foxborough Patriot Place
description: Patriots pro football, concerts, and events at Gillette Stadium are across the parking lot from our hotel. You'll find a variety of restaurants, shops, and entertainment next door at Patriot Place, and we're four miles from downtown Foxborough and Schneider Electric. Breakfast, lunch, and dinner are served daily at our Garden Grille & Bar.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Foxborough/Mansfield
description: Find us off I-95, We’re within four miles of Xfinity Center and Mansfield Crossing. Plainridge Casino, Wrentham Village Premium Outlets, and Gillette Stadium are within 15 minutes. Wind down in our indoor saltwater pool and work out in our fitness center. Every stay includes free WiFi and free hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn Chicopee/Springfield
description: We're just off I-90 in Chicopee, close to Interstates 91, 291, and 391. Westover Air Force Base is three miles away, while Mount Holyoke College is a 15-minute drive. Fuel up on our free hot breakfast before a stroll through Chicopee Memorial State Park, four miles away. Or spend the day at Six Flags New England, 20 minutes from our door. Enjoy free WiFi, parking, and our indoor pool.

name: Tru by Hilton Chicopee Springfield
description: Albany to the left of us, Boston to the right, we’re stuck in the middle with Springfield center just minutes away. Enjoy free WiFi and build-your-own breakfast before touring the Naismith Basketball Hall of Fame, tasting the high life at MGM Springfield, and taking the kids to Six Flags New England or Eastern States Exposition Fair Grounds.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Holyoke-Springfield/North
description: We’re off I-90, a short drive from Holyoke Mall and seven miles from The Big E. Springfield is 15 minutes away and we’re 10 miles from Six Flags New England. Mount Holyoke, Amherst, Elms, Smith, and other colleges are within 30 minutes. Enjoy your in-suite kitchen and our complimentary evening social, Monday – Wednesday. Pets are welcome.

name: Hampton Inn West Springfield
description: Located off Route 5, we're three miles from downtown, with several restaurants and a movie theater within walking distance. The Amazing World of Dr. Seuss Museum, Eastern States Exposition, MGM Springfield, and MassMutual Center are all five miles away. Enjoy free daily hot breakfast, WiFi, and our outdoor pool.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Springfield, MA
description: We're off I-91 on the Basketball Hall of Fame grounds, next to the Connecticut Riverwalk. It's a 10-minute walk to downtown – check out museums, parks, and the Dr. Seuss Sculpture Garden. Our Garden Grille is open for breakfast, and the attached Uno Pizzeria & Grill serves lunch and dinner, plus evening room service. Visit our 24-hour shop for drinks and snacks.

name: Hampton Inn Westfield
description: Our hotel is just off the Massachusetts Turnpike in Westfield. We're four miles from Westfield State University, and Springfield attractions including MGM Springfield Casino and the Eastern States Exposition Center are a 20-minute drive away. Enjoy free hot breakfast and a variety of restaurants nearby. WiFi is free, and we have an indoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn Hadley-Amherst Area
description: Off I-91, we're within 20 minutes of UMass Amherst, Amherst, Hampshire, Smith, and Mount Holyoke colleges. The Norwottuck Rail Trail and Skinner State Park are both a short drive away for scenic hiking and biking. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, our indoor pool, and fitness center access. WiFi's on us.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Hadley Amherst
description: We’re ideally placed for visitors to Massachusetts’ Five College Consortium. After class, check out the Eric Carle Museum, or explore Mount Toby State Forest and Mount Sugarloaf State Reservation, both just ten miles away. Kick back at our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday, and enjoy free WiFi and breakfast, with an in-suite kitchen.

name: Hampton Inn Salem Boston
description: We’re within walking distance of downtown attractions such as the Salem Witch Museum, Peabody Essex Museum, and House of Seven Gables. Salem’s downtown eclectic shops and restaurants are just minutes away and we’re only two miles from Winter Island/Waikiki Beach & Salem Willows. A hot breakfast with juices and smoothies is on us.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Leominster
description: We're off Route 2, within five minutes of Doyle Conservation Area and Walter Tower Plaza shopping. Leominster State Forest, boasting over 4,200 acres of trails and tranquil ponds, is seven miles from the door. Our Grand Ballroom is ideal for receptions of up to 500 guests, and guests enjoy our heated indoor pool and a warm cookie on arrival.

name: Hampton Inn Boston/Natick
description: We’re across the street from Natick Mall and less than a mile from I-90. The Center for Arts in Natick and Cochituate State Park are within three miles. Downtown Boston and Boston Logan International Airport are 25 minutes away. Hotel highlights include a free hot breakfast every morning and a business center area.

name: Hampton Inn Seekonk
description: We’re off I-195 in Seekonk. Enjoy NASCAR thrills at Seekonk Speedway, five minutes away. Head to Downtown Providence, 10 minutes away, where you’ll find Providence Place Mall, and Rhode Island Convention Center. Brown University, Johnson & Wales University, and Rhode Island School of Design are a five-mile drive away. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Franklin/Milford
description: We're right off I-495, nine miles from Patriots games at Gillette Stadium. Corporations like Dell and EMC are across the highway and Dean College is a six-minute drive. Head to Plainridge Park Casino six miles down the road, and stop at Wrentham Village Premium Outlets on the way. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our outdoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn North Attleboro
description: Our hotel is off I-295 and US-1, just 20 minutes north of Providence, Rhode Island. Emerald Square Mall is across the highway, and Capron Park Zoo is 10 minutes away. Brown University and the Rhode Island Convention Center are 20 minutes away. Our friendly staff can help you find local eateries, outdoor activities, and more.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Boston - Milford
description: We’re off I-495 in Milford’s retail and business district, a short walk from local shops and restaurants. Upper Charles hiking and biking trail passes by the hotel and we’re a short drive from Milford Pond. Gillette Stadium, Framingham State University, and Natick Mall are within 15 miles. Enjoy our indoor pool, free parking, and WiFi on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Greenfield
description: We're off I-91 in Greenfield, next to Mohawk Trail, one of Massachusetts' most scenic drives. You'll find Mohawk Mall and quick eats in the neighborhood. Free hot breakfast is fuel for Highland Pond hikes and visits to historic Poet's Seat Tower in Rocky Mountain Park, both 10 minutes away. Enjoy our heated indoor pool and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Berkshires-Lenox
description: We're just off US Highway 20, in the heart of Berkshire Theatre Group territory. Shows at Barrington Stage Co. and Shakespeare & Co. are four miles from our door. Stroll in nearby Pleasant Valley Wildlife Sanctuary, or treat yourself at Lee Premium Outlets, 16 minutes' drive away. WiFi and free hot breakfast are on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Lenox Pittsfield
description: We're off US-20, a mile from Bousquet Ski Area. Downtown Pittsfield, Lenox, Boston University Tanglewood Institute, and Hancock Shaker Village are all within five miles. We're minutes from numerous restaurants, and we serve breakfast, lunch, and dinner daily in Jae's. Enjoy an indoor pool, fitness center, and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Adrian
description: Find us in the heart of Adrian, three miles from Siena Heights University. We're within a 20-minute drive of Ervin Technologies, Brazeway, and Adrian Steel. The county fairgrounds are three miles away, and Irish Hills Towers and Hidden Lake Gardens are within 18 miles of our door. Enjoy our heated pool, fitness center, and free hot breakfast. WiFi is included.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Dundee
description: We're off Highway 23, within walking distance of restaurants, and one mile from Dundee Antiques and Art and the Old Mill Museum. Wolverine Park can be reached in five minutes, and River Raisin Canoe Livery is six miles from our door. We've got a 24-hour fitness center and indoor heated pool. Enjoy hot breakfast and WiFi on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Ann Arbor
description: Our hotel is a five-minute walk from Briarwood Mall, with easy access to Ann Arbor attractions. The University of Michigan campus, games at the “Big House,” and Main Street shopping and dining are within three miles of our door. Enjoy breakfast, dinner, and evening room service from our Garden Bar & Grille.

name: Hampton Inn Ann Arbor-South
description: We're off I-94, around two miles from the University of Michigan main campus and Michigan Stadium. Briarwood Mall is a five-minute drive away, and Main Street shopping and dining is three miles from our door. You'll be within 15 minutes of Concordia University Ann Arbor and Eastern Michigan University. Enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi, and relax in our heated indoor pool.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Jackson
description: Michigan culture is within your grasp. The museum and planetarium of Ella Sharp Park, Jackson Historic Prison Tours and the Michigan Shakespeare Festival are all nearby. Fuel up with free breakfast before checking out The Cascades or Michigan International Speedway. Enjoy quiet nights with free WiFi and an in-suite kitchen. Pets are welcome.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Allen Park
description: Find us just off I-94 in Allen Park, 10 minutes from the Ford Motor Company’s World HQ and Henry Ford Museum. Downtown Detroit is 12 miles from our door. While you're with us, enjoy daily free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and indoor pool and fitness center access.

name: Hampton Inn Detroit/Southgate
description: We're right off I-75, 14 miles from downtown Detroit and the NHL Red Wings, NFL Lions, and MLB Tigers. It's nine miles to Ford World Headquarters and the Henry Ford Museum, and 10 minutes to Taylor Sportsplex. Free shuttle rides to the airport are available upon request. Relax in our indoor pool and whirlpool, and enjoy free hot breakfast and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn by Hilton Detroit Dearborn
description: Find us just off US Highway 12. Our free shuttle will take you to the Henry Ford Museum and other Dearborn destinations within five miles, including companies like Ford Motor Company and Carhartt. Detroit Metropolitan Wayne County Airport is a 15-minute drive away. Unwind in our pool and fitness center, and enjoy free daily hot breakfast and WiFi.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Taylor Detroit
description: We're footsteps from the Southland Center mall, a mile from I-75 and US-24. Detroit Metropolitan Wayne County Airport (DTW) is 15 minutes away. Ford Headquarters, The Henry Ford Museum, and the University of Michigan - Dearborn are within 11 miles. Start your morning with free hot breakfast, and enjoy our indoor pool. WiFi's on us. We're pet-friendly.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Detroit - Dearborn
description: Find us off the Route 153/39 intersection, five minutes from Fairlane Town Center. We're less than four miles from the Henry Ford Museum and Greenfield Village, with central Detroit 12 miles away. We have a local shuttle covering Detroit Metropolitan Airport, and perks include a fitness center, indoor and outdoor pools, and a warm welcome cookie.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Detroit Metro Airport
description: Our suites are a mile from Detroit Metropolitan Wayne County Airport and we provide a free 24-hour airport shuttle. We're just off I-94 — downtown Detroit, the Henry Ford Museum, and Ann Arbor are all within a half-hour's drive. Enjoy our indoor and outdoor pools, and join us for our free made-to-order breakfast and complimentary evening reception.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Detroit/Airport-Romulus
description: We're just off I-94, close to I-275, and our free shuttle will take you to Detroit Metropolitan Wayne County Airport, four minutes away. Wake up to our free hot breakfast and tee off at Woodside Meadows Golf Club, nine miles from our door. Detroit, Ann Arbor, and the University of Michigan are all within 30 minutes' drive. WiFi is on us.

name: DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Detroit Downtown - Fort Shelby
description: Downtown's restored Fort Shelby building is our historic home, blocks from the TCF Center and Detroit Tigers games at Comerica Park. Walk to neighborhood shopping and museums or take the People Mover — the station is right next door. We're the city's only IACC-certified conference space, with free WiFi throughout the hotel.

name: Hampton Inn Livonia Detroit
description: Our Livonia hotel is just off I-96, steps from dining and retailers. You're within 15 minutes of Laurel Park Place shopping and Greenmead Historical Village. Or head into central Detroit for the Institute of Arts and ballgames at Comerica Park, all 20 minutes away. Start your day with free hot breakfast, and enjoy WiFi on us. Our indoor pool and 24-hour snack shop are yours.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Ann Arbor West
description: Off I-94, we’re about two miles from Main Street. We offer a free shuttle service between the hotel and attractions within five miles. The University of Michigan, the Ann Arbor Hands on Museum, and Michigan Stadium are all three miles from our hotel. Relax in our heated indoor pool. Hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Hampton Inn Ann Arbor-North
description: We're off Highway 23, less than a mile from the University of Michigan's North Campus. Our free weekday shuttle covers five miles, including central Ann Arbor destinations like UM's main campus. On autumn Saturdays, games at Michigan Stadium are a 20-minute drive away. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our indoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn Detroit/Belleville-Airport Area
description: Located off I-94, we're 11 minutes from Detroit Metro Airport. Travel is a breeze with our free airport shuttle. Visit The Henry Ford Museum or drop by The University of Michigan - less than 30 minutes from our hotel. A 34-minute drive will take you to Comerica Park, Joe Louis Arena and Ford Field. Enjoy our free hot breakfast.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Novi Detroit
description: Find us in downtown Novi, just half an hour from Detroit city center. Grab free breakfast before exploring Lakeshore Park or catching the big event at Suburban Collection Showplace convention center, both 10 minutes away. Enjoy Twelve Oaks Mall’s dining or give your in-suite kitchen a whirl. WiFi, breakfast and evening socials, Monday – Thursday, are free.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Detroit - Novi
description: Find our hotel off I-96, within half-a-mile of restaurants and shops in Novi. Twelve Oaks Mall and events at Suburban Collection Showplace are within two miles. Downtown Detroit can be reached in 30 minutes. We have an indoor pool, 24-business center, and a free local shuttle service. Enjoy a warm DoubleTree cookie on arrival.

name: Hampton Inn Detroit/Auburn Hills South
description: We're just off I-75, three miles from downtown Auburn Hills and six miles from Oakland University. Fiat Chrysler Automobiles HQ is two miles away. Kids will love LEGOLAND® Discovery Center Michigan, less than 10 minutes from our door. Unwind in our indoor pool and fitness center. Daily hot breakfast, parking, and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Detroit/Auburn Hills-North (Great Lakes Crossing Area)
description: We're off I-75 in Auburn Hills, right next to the Great Lakes Crossing Outlets and SEA LIFE Michigan Aquarium. Our free shuttle has trips covered within seven miles of the hotel, Monday – Friday. DTE Energy Music Theatre is 10 minutes away, and downtown Detroit is a 35-minute drive. Enjoy free hot breakfast, WiFi, and our indoor pool.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Bloomfield Hills Detroit
description: We're a five-minute drive from downtown Birmingham and 22 miles north of Detroit. Cranbrook House & Gardens, and the Cranbrook Academy of Art are five minutes away, and the Frank Lloyd Wright Affleck House is just over a mile from our door. We have an indoor saltwater pool, a modern fitness center, and multiple dining options to explore.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Detroit Troy
description: We're next to I-75, within five minutes of corporate parks, restaurants, and the Somerset Collection mall. The Cranbrook Institute of Science and Detroit Zoo are both within eight miles, and downtown Detroit is 25 miles away. Our Garden Grille & Bar serves breakfast and dinner daily. Enjoy our heated indoor pool and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Detroit/Troy
description: We’re off I-75, with a choice of restaurants a few steps away. Take the kids to the Troy Family Aquatic Center, just the other side of the interstate, or to Detroit Zoo, 15 minutes away. Explore the luxury stores at the Somerset Collection mall. Relax in our indoor pool and whirlpool. Hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Detroit-Troy
description: We’re 30 minutes from downtown Detroit, close to Chrysler Freeway, and just a mile from Oakland County Troy Airport. Palace of Auburn Hills concerts are 20 minutes away. Our suites are in a corporate neighborhood, walking distance from dining. Or, cook your own way, in-suite. Enjoy our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday, and WiFi and breakfast on us.

name: Hampton Inn Detroit/Utica-Shelby Township
description: You'll find us just off Route 53 in Shelby Township, a short walk from shops, dining, and major business offices. Fuel up on our free hot breakfast, before heading three miles Shelby Creek for a variety of restaurants and retail. Downtown Detroit is 30 miles away. Enjoy free WiFi, parking, and access to our indoor pool and fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn Detroit/Madison Heights/South Troy
description: Just off Interstate 75, our Motor City hotel is near shops and dining. Downtown Detroit is only 15 minutes away, putting you in easy reach of Vegas-style casinos, must-see museums, and urban parks. Take a short drive along the freeway to watch the Detroit Lions play at Ford Field or catch the baseball at Comerica Park. Enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Southfield/West Bloomfield
description: We're three miles from I-696 in West Bloomfield's commercial district, three minutes from Beaumont Urgent Care. It's four miles to corporate offices at the Galleria Officentre in Southfield. Discover unusual games at Marvin's Marvelous Mechanical Museum half a mile south. Relax in our heated indoor pool, and enjoy free hot breakfast and free WiFi.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton West Bloomfield Detroit
description: Find us off I-696, across from The GateWay Center, and within a mile of Beaumont Urgent Care. West Bloomfield Township, Marvin's Marvelous Mechanical Museum, and corporations at Galleria Officentre are less than a 10-minute drive away. Central Detroit is 20 miles south. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and spacious suites.

name: Tru by Hilton Sterling Heights Detroit
description: Relax in a quiet base, just half an hour from local attractions, close to Sterling Heights riverfront and downtown areas. While you’re here, WiFi is on us and breakfast is free, an ideal start for a day exploring Comerica Park or the Henry Ford Museum. It’s always worth checking the listings at DTE Energy Music Theatre, or chancing your luck at Greektown Casino.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Detroit/Sterling Heights
description: Our hotel is a mile from Crossroads Plaza, and there's a movie theater a five-minute drive away. FCA Sterling Heights Assembly Plant and General Motors Heritage Center are both within a seven-minute drive of us, and we're a 30-minute drive north of downtown Detroit. We have an indoor pool and fitness room, and a free hot breakfast is served daily. WiFi's on us.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Warren Detroit
description: Home is 1.6 miles from Warren center. Detroit is half an hour away, where you can catch events at Little Caesars Arena and ballgames at Comerica Park. We’re five minutes from Warren Technical Center and a short drive from Chrysler HQ. After work, join our complimentary evening socials, Monday – Thursday, or do some in-suite cooking. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Detroit/Warren
description: We’re on Van Dyke Avenue, 20 miles from Detroit. Discover over 2,000 exotic animals at Detroit Zoo, 15 minutes away. Detroit Metropolitan Wayne County Airport is 45 minutes away. Enjoy a dip in the pool back at the hotel. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Battle Creek
description: We are located near I-94 and State Highway 66 less than 10 minutes away from the entertainment of The Firekeepers Casino and Binder Park Zoo. Minges Brook and Lakeview Square malls are less than a mile away. Experience the beauty around Battle Creek at Willard Park or Goguac Lake. Breakfast is on us.

name: Hampton Inn Battle Creek
description: We're off I-94, walking distance from Lakeview Square Mall and a variety of restaurants. Binder Park Zoo is three miles away and downtown Battle Creek is 10 minutes north. Kalamazoo/Battle Creek International Airport is 20 miles from our door. Enjoy our fitness center, indoor pool, daily free hot breakfast, and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Marshall
description: We're off I-94, 20 minutes from Kellogg's and a 30-minute drive from Kalamazoo/Battle Creek Airport. Five minutes away is downtown Marshall, a National Historic Landmark District. Parks surround us—Kalamazoo River Valley Trail, Ketchum Park's 25 acres, and Stuart's Landing are all nearby. Enjoy our indoor pool, fitness center, and free breakfast and WiFi.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Kalamazoo Downtown
description: Our hotel is located in downtown Kalamazoo, less than 10 minutes from Western Michigan University. We’re less than a mile from lots of local shops, great restaurants, parks, and entertainment. Arcadia Commons and Arcadia Creek Festival Place are within walking distance. Rest and relax after a busy day in a sophisticated guest room with free WiFi.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Kalamazoo-Portage
description: Centrally located with easy access to I-94, our pet-friendly suites offer convenience and home-like amenities for your trip to the Kalamazoo area. We're 15 minutes from Western Michigan University, Bell's Brewing, and the Alamo Drafthouse Cinema. Visiting Stryker headquarters? We're just up the road – and close to the airport, too.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Kalamazoo-Oshtemo
description: Located near I-94, we’re just four minutes from Oshtemo, and 14 from Kalamazoo. See 4,000 works of art at Kalamazoo Institute of Arts downtown. Explore the exhibits, trails, and wildlife of Kalamazoo Nature Center, 20 minutes away. Or indulge in a little wine tasting at Lawton Ridge winery, three miles drive. Breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Coldwater
description: We’re right off I-69, about two miles from downtown Coldwater. Fuel up with our free hot breakfast before heading six miles to the Coldwater Chain of Lakes for fishing and hunting. Head downtown and take a ride on the Little River Railroad steam train or watch a show at the historic Tibbits Opera House.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Lansing West
description: Find us right off I-96, within two miles of restaurants, shops, and the movie theatre at Lansing Mall. Michigan State University, downtown Lansing, and the Michigan History Center are less than a 12-minute drive away. Enjoy breakfast and dinner at the Garden Grille, along with our patio, fire pit, and indoor swimming pool.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Lansing West
description: We're two minutes from I-69/I-96 with quick access to Michigan State University 11 miles east, passing by downtown Lansing attractions like Potter Park Zoo and Impression 5 Science Center along the way. Large companies including GM, Ryder, and Meijer are three miles south. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our heated indoor saltwater pool, and whirlpool.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Bay City - Riverfront
description: Overlooking the Saginaw River, our hotel is a five-minute walk from downtown Bay City sights including the State Theatre and Delta College Planetarium. Rooms feature waterfront and downtown views, and we have an indoor pool and whirlpool. We're right off I-75, with free shuttle service to and from MBS International Airport.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Bay City
description: We're right off I-75, less than 20 miles north of Saginaw.  Bay City State Park is 10 minutes away, and we're just five miles from the stars at the Delta College Planetarium. Local favorites like Lucky's Steak House are steps from the hotel. Relax in our indoor heated pool, and enjoy free WiFi and our daily hot breakfast.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Saginaw
description: We’re close to I-675, under a mile from Fashion Square Mall. Saginaw Valley State University is five minutes away and we’re six miles from Castle Museum of Saginaw County History and Saginaw Children’s Zoo. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and an in-suite kitchen with full-size appliances. We offer Spin2Cycle and pets are welcome.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Saginaw
description: We’re off I-675 in Saginaw, three miles from Saginaw Valley State University. Shop at Fashion Square Mall just across the street. Take in a show at Dow Event Center, five miles away. Or enjoy the Bavarian history, culture, and entertainment of Frankenmuth, 24 minutes’ drive. MBS International Airport is 12 miles from our door. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, WiFi, and our indoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn Midland
description: We're off US-10, across from Midland Mall and 10 minutes from downtown, Dow, and IBM. Stroll through Dow Gardens and Whiting Forest or catch an exhibit at Midland Center for the Arts. MBS International Airport is less than 20 minutes from our door. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our indoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn Birch Run/Frankenmuth
description: You'll find us right off I-75, across from dining and designer deals at the Birch Run Premium Outlets and a mile from Frankenmuth Credit Union Event Center. Wake up to our free hot breakfast before festivals and events in Frankenmuth, Michigan's "Little Bavaria," eight miles away. Unwind in our pool and fitness center, and enjoy WiFi and parking on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Detroit-Canton
description: We’re off I-275 in Canton, 28 miles north of Detroit. Canton Sports Center and Arctic Edge ice arena are just over 10 minutes away. The Department of Climate and Space Sciences and Engineering is 15 miles’ drive. Take our free airport shuttle to Detroit Metropolitan Wayne County Airport, 16 minutes away. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Benton Harbor / St. Joseph
description: We're off I-94, a mile from Orchards Mall shops and dining. Golf courses and local breweries dot the area, and Silver Beach on Lake Michigan's shoreline is 15 minutes away. The DC Cook nuclear plant, Whirlpool headquarters, and Bosch offices are all within 20 minutes. Enjoy breakfast and dinner in our Garden Grille & Bar, with room service in the evenings.

name: Tru by Hilton Saint Joseph
description: We’re off I-94, only a short distance from local shops and restaurants. Lake Michigan Beaches, Wineries, and Breweries are all within a 20-minute drive. Visit St Joseph North Pier Lighthouse, located 7 mi (12 km) from our hotel. Enjoy complimentary hot breakfast, our heated indoor pool, and a 24-hour fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn St. Joseph I-94
description: We’re by the shore of Lake Michigan, a few miles from the center of St. Joseph and right off I-94. Charter a boat and spend a peaceful day sailing or fishing on the lake. In summer, you can also swim from the beaches in St Joseph. Enjoy searching the shops for antiques and collectibles. Or relax in our heated indoor pool. WiFi and a daily hot breakfast are free.

name: Hampton Inn South Haven
description: Reach us off I-196, five minutes from South Haven. In town, brush up on local history at Michigan Maritime Museum and tour local wineries, or tee off at Beeches Golf Club, five minutes away. Fill up on free hot breakfast, and grab your towel for sandy days at North and South Beaches, on the banks of Lake Michigan, 10 minutes away. WiFi’s on us.

name: Hampton Inn Niles
description: We are off State Highway 51 in Niles, Michigan. The Modineer Company plant is less than a mile from our hotel and the Riverfront, Saint Joseph River, and Niles Dam & Fish Ladder parks are within two miles.  Experience local history at Fort St. Joseph and the Ring Lardner House. Our heated indoor pool is a great place for a soak.

name: Hampton Inn Big Rapids
description: Five minutes from Ferris State University, just off Highway 131, be at home in our Big Rapids hotel. Catch a show at Williams Auditorium, or tour the Jim Crow Museum, both on the university campus. Grab free hot breakfast, and take in some Michigan nature along Hemlock Park’s Riverwalk, 10 minutes away. Fitness center access and free WiFi are yours.

name: Hampton Inn and Suites Flint/Grand Blanc
description: We're off US 23, with several restaurants nearby. Bishop International Airport is seven minutes away – take our free shuttle. Both the McLaren and Genesys Regional Medical Centers are around 15 minutes from the hotel, and the Flint Institute of Arts and University of Michigan-Flint are eight miles away. Enjoy our indoor pool, and free breakfast and WiFi on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Detroit-Southfield, MI.
description: Our hotel is by I-696, five minutes from shopping, dining, and Park West Gallery. We're within 20 miles of downtown Detroit, boasting the riverfront, Detroit Institute of Arts, and Comerica Park baseball. We have event space for up to 300 people, a fitness center, and indoor pool, and our free local corporate shuttle runs during weekdays.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Brighton
description: Just minutes from Brighton city center, we’re delicately balanced between peace and convenience. Cut some fresh powder at Mt. Brighton Ski Area or tee off at the Golf Club at Mt. Brighton, both just five minutes away. Brighten up your night at our free evening social, Monday – Thursday, or with a home-cooked meal in your in-suite kitchen. Breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Hampton Inn Brighton
description: Find us just off I-96 about a mile from downtown Brighton, with a choice of restaurants nearby. Mount Brighton Ski Lodge is just a mile away, as is the championship course at the Jackal Golf Club. Work out in our fitness center and go for a swim in the heated indoor pool. WiFi and daily hot breakfast are on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Howell
description: Our rooms are one mile from Cleary University campus and surrounding shopping and dining. We're off I-96, within six miles of Brighton Recreation Area and Mt. Brighton Ski Area, with Tanger Outlets Howell 10 minutes from the door. Start each day with free hot breakfast, and enjoy our free WiFi, heated indoor pool, and fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Wixom
description: We're right off I-96 in Wixom's manufacturing center, within a mile of Total Sports Complex and large area businesses like Hexagon and Presidio. Shopping at Twelve Oaks Mall is just 10 minutes away, and you can drive 32 miles to catch a Lions game at Ford Field or a concert at the Fillmore in downtown Detroit. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Commerce Novi
description: Find us off 14 Mile Road in Commerce Township, just eight minutes from Twelve Oaks Shopping Mall. Shenandoah Country Club and Robert H. Long Nature Park are nine minutes away. Suburban Collection Showplace is eight miles from our doorstep. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our indoor pool and fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn Detroit/Northville
description: A home in the heart of Metro Detroit, you’ll find us just off the I-275 and equidistant drives from downtown and Ann Arbor, MI. Northville Downs horse racing, downtown’s buzzy nightlife and the Marquis Theatre are nearby, while Detroit Zoo is just a few miles away. WiFi and breakfast are on us – expect fresh hot waffles.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Detroit Livonia Novi
description: We're located off I-275 in southeast Michigan, within 25-minutes of both Detroit Metropolitan Airport and downtown Ann Arbor. Downtown Detroit is 26 miles away. We have an indoor pool, hot tub, and over 6,000 sq. ft. of event space. Join us for a free cooked-to-order breakfast, and our complimentary evening reception served in the inviting lobby.

name: Hampton Inn Cadillac
description: We're five minutes from US-131 and Munson Healthcare Cadillac Hospital. Practice your swing at Evergreen Golf Course and kick back at Clam Lake Beer Company, both minutes from our hotel. Local businesses like Cadillac Casting, Wedin, and Fiamm Technologies are less than 10 minutes away. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our heated indoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Detroit/Chesterfield Township
description: We're just off I-94, and an easy walk from restaurants. Enjoy our free hot breakfast, then shoot the fairways of Sycamore Hills Golf Club, or hike, bike and sunbathe at Lake St. Clair Metropark and beach – all within 15 minutes of the hotel. Shop at The Mall at Partridge Creek, then chill in our pool. Downtown Detroit is a half-hour drive. WiFi is on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Detroit Utica
description: Located in Clinton Township, we are just off M-59. Our hotel is within two miles of Lakeside Mall, The Mall at Partridge Creek, and University Center. We are 10 minutes from Michigan Lottery Amphitheatre at Freedom Hill, and 40 minutes from downtown Detroit. We have over 1,300 sq. ft. of event space, plus an on-site restaurant, free WiFi, and fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn Detroit/Roseville
description: We're just off I-94, within walking distance of restaurants and blocks from Lake St. Clair. Stroll the trails and beach along the lake – or through the shops at Macomb Mall, just five minutes away. Downtown Detroit is a 20-minute drive. Start your day with free hot breakfast, then return for a dip in our pool. WiFi and parking are on us.

name: Tru by Hilton Jackson
description: With our indoor pool, foosball table, and lively lobby, we've got something fun for everyone. Fill up on our free hot breakfast before exploring Jackson's nearby parks and museums. For bigger thrills, Michigan International Speedway is just 35 minutes away (or less, if you're a NASCAR driver). But we won't blame you if you'd rather just kick back and enjoy our free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Monroe
description: Home is off I-75, just 10 minutes from central Monroe. Check out River Basin Battlefield and Monroe County Museum to brush up on Michigan’s part in the Civil War. You’ll be only five minutes from William C. Sterling State Park, on the banks of Lake Erie, and 15 minutes from Custer Airport. Wake up to free hot breakfast, and enjoy WiFi on us.

name: Hampton Inn East Lansing
description: Less than 10 minutes from Michigan State University, we’re close to the Michigan State Capitol, Old Town Lansing, and 15 minutes from Capital Region International Airport. Here on business? Lansing Convention Center is close by and we have business facilities on site. Start every morning with a free hot breakfast or grab a Hampton On the Run® Breakfast Bag if you're short on time.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Lansing Eastwood
description: Minutes from Michigan State at the juncture of Lansing and East Lansing, we're perfect for campus visits and Spartan sports. Our location inside Eastwood Towne Center puts shopping, movies, and dining options at your fingertips. Each suite features a fully equipped kitchen – we'll help you stock it with our grocery shopping service. Breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites East Lansing/Okemos
description: We're off I-96, within a 10-minute drive of Michigan State University, University Corporate Research Park, and the Wharton Center for Performing Arts. Several restaurants and coffee shops are in walking distance, and downtown East Lansing is five miles away. We have an indoor pool and 24-hour fitness center, and free hot breakfast is served daily. WiFi's on us.

name: Hampton Inn Gaylord
description: We’re off I-75, a few steps away from sightseeing and shopping at the Alpine Village. We're surrounded by golf courses in the "Gaylord Golf Mecca" and just 30 minutes from hiking trails and fishing streams at Pigeon River State Forest. Relax in our heated indoor pool and enjoy free daily hot breakfast and WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Petoskey
description: We're off US Highway 131, just two miles from the boutiques, galleries, and restaurants of Petoskey's historic gaslight district and the Crooked Tree Arts Center. In winter, drive out to Nub's Nob Ski Area, 20 minutes away. Relax in our pool, and enjoy daily hot breakfast and WiFi on us.

name: Amway Grand Plaza, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: Recognized by Historic Hotels of America, our hotel preserves its 1916 details, including original ironwork and our 29-story glass tower. We're next to DeVos Place Convention Center and connected to Van Andel Arena by a network of skywalks. Enjoy our spa, heated indoor pool, and views of Grand Rapids from the sundeck.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Grand Rapids Downtown
description: We're off I-196 along the Medical Mile. Helen Devos Children's Hospital, Spectrum Health, and downtown dining and arts are less than a mile away. It's three minutes' drive to meetings at DeVos Place convention center, and weddings at the Revel Center are two miles from our door. Wake up to our free hot breakfast, and unwind in our indoor pool. WiFi is on us.

name: Hampton Inn Grand Rapids-North
description: Located near the US 131 and 96 expressways, we’re minutes from a choice of restaurants, shopping, and entertainment. Attend a Griffins hockey game at Van Andel Arena, just 10 minutes away, or visit the flower art displays at Frederik Meijer Gardens or the sandy beaches of Lake Michigan. A free hot breakfast is served daily.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Grand Rapids North
description: A short drive from Gerald R. Ford International Airport, we're close to an array of local restaurants, shops, and entertainment. Enjoy free WiFi and build-your-own breakfast – perfect fuel for a day spent exploring Grand Rapids – or stock your suite's fridge at our 24-hour store and cook at your leisure. Pets are welcome.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Grand Rapids
description: Downtown Grand Rapids is just 20 minutes away, where you’ll find the Gerald R. Ford Presidential Museum, Grand Rapids Art Museum, and events at Van Andel Arena. Make sure to check out the Frederik Meijer Gardens & Sculpture Park. WiFi, breakfast, and our evening social, Monday – Thursday, are free. Cook your way with an in-suite kitchen. Pets are welcome.

name: Hampton Inn Grand Rapids-South
description: Find us off US 131, steps from shopping and dining. Grand Rapids is in your grasp—Gerald R. Ford Presidential Museum, Van Andel Arena events, and Grand Rapids Public Museum are 15 minutes north. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our indoor pool and fitness center. Gerald R. Ford International Airport is 15 minutes away.

name: Tru by Hilton Grand Rapids Airport
description: When you land, you're just six minutes away. Hop on our free shuttle and you'll be enjoying free WiFi in no time. Free breakfast is yours too, a great start for a day at nearby golf courses, Cascade Township Park, or Sky Zone Trampoline Park—give that last one an hour after breakfast, though. We're close to Woodland Mall, Dave & Buster's, and local restaurants.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Grand Rapids Airport
description: Our hotel is close to I-96, three miles north of Gerald Ford International Airport – catch your flight by using our free shuttle. We're 10 minutes from Woodland Mall and downtown Grand Rapids is nine miles away. Keep up your exercise in our free 24-hour fitness center and take a dip in our heated indoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Grandville Grand Rapids South
description: You’ll be 15 minutes from downtown Grand Rapids. While you’re there, head to the Van Andel Arena for some hockey, catch a concert at the DeVos Performance Hall, or take the kids to John Ball Zoo. Closer to home, satisfy those vacation cravings at Rivertown Crossings Mall, across the street. Grab free breakfast before exploring Millennium Park. WiFi’s on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Grand Rapids-Airport 28th St
description: We're off I-96, 10 minutes from Gerald R. Ford International Airport via free shuttle. Shops and quick bites are a short walk away. Enjoy free hot breakfast before exploring Grand Rapids – Gerald R. Ford Presidential Museum, Van Andel Arena, and Frederik Meijer Gardens are within 20 minutes. Free WiFi and an indoor pool are yours.

name: Hampton Inn Holland
description: Find us off Highway 31, 10 minutes from central Holland, MI. You'll be within five minutes of the Shops at Westshore and local dining—or try our in-house Sharkee's Bar & Grill. Kick the day off with a stroll through Holland State Park and beach, 15 minutes away, after free hot breakfast. Enjoy our free WiFi, indoor pool, and hot tub.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Holland
description: Nature is on your doorstep: we’re minutes from Lake Michigan and Holland State Park. Enjoy close proximity to the award-winning downtown area’s waterfront dining or cook up a feast in your in-suite kitchen. WiFi and breakfast are free, a good start for a day taking in some Netherlands history and touring the only authentic Dutch windmill in the nation.

name: Hampton Inn Marquette/Waterfront
description: Find us on the shore of Lake Superior, just off Highway 41. We’re within four minutes of Marquette Maritime Museum, Upper Peninsula Children’s Museum, and shopping and dining in Downtown Marquette. A 13-minute drive will take you to Presque Isle Park and Northern Michigan University. Start your day with our hot breakfast – it’s free, just like our WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Mt. Pleasant
description: We’re next to Highway 127, five minutes from Mt. Pleasant and Central Michigan University. You’ll be just as close to Mt. Pleasant Discovery Museum and Soaring Eagle Casino. Grab free hot breakfast before hiking Deerfield Nature Park or teeing off at one of many golf courses within 15 minutes. Enjoy free WiFi, our 24-hour fitness center, and indoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn Muskegon
description: We're just off Highway 31, three miles from Muskegon County Airport, and close to restaurants and shops at The Lakes Mall, two miles away. Hit Lake Michigan's beautiful beaches, seven miles from us, or fuel up on our hot breakfast before riding the rollercoasters at Michigan's Adventure theme park, 17 minutes away. WiFi is on us.

name: Hampton Inn Port Huron
description: Located off I-94, we’re just two miles from Fort Gratiot Lighthouse, Michigan's oldest. Indulge in some retail therapy at the Birchwood Mall Shopping Center. Take in a hockey game at McMorran Place Sports & Entertainment Center, just six minutes’ drive from our hotel, or discover top-class golf at Black River Golf Club nearby. Breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Port Huron
description: Find us beside the St. Clair River boardwalk, with views of the Blue Water Bridge. We’re next door to the Blue Water Convention Center, and Fort Gratiot Lighthouse is a mile away. Our hotel features a gift shop, an indoor pool, and Freighters Eatery & Taproom. Every stay begins with a warm DoubleTree cookie.

name: Hampton Inn Sault Ste Marie
description: Located off I-75 in the business district, we’re within walking distance of several restaurants. Lake Superior State University and Kewadin Casino are less than 10 minutes from us. The U.S. Army Corps of Engineers is a nine-minute drive, while Chippewa County International Airport is only 23 minutes away. WiFi and hot breakfast are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Traverse City
description: We're on US-31, across the highway from M.C. Beach and the Grand Traverse Bay. Cherry Capital Airport's a five-minute drive away. You'll find several restaurants nearby, or head four miles into downtown Traverse City for local fare like 7 Monks Taproom and Grand Traverse Pie Company. Start your morning off right with free hot breakfast. WiFi's on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Bemidji
description: We’re on the shores of Lake Bemidji, with boating and kayaking available on our 700 feet of sandy beach, and within walking distance of great restaurants. Bemidji State University, Sanford Center, and Headwaters Science Center are within five miles of our door. Take our free shuttle to Bemidji Regional Airport, 15 minutes away. Enjoy free daily hot breakfast, WiFi, and our indoor pool.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Minneapolis Bloomington
description: Explore Fort Snelling State Park, Minnesota Valley National Wildlife Refuge, and Woodlake Nature Center, all within a 15-minute drive. We’re 20 minutes from Minneapolis center and just 10 minutes from the Mall of America. A short drive brings you to restaurants and city nightlife, or have a night at home, with your in-suite kitchen. WiFi and breakfast are free.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Bloomington/Minneapolis
description: Our suites are 10 minutes from Mall of America and 20 minutes from Valleyfair Amusement Park, Minneapolis−Saint Paul Airport, and downtown Minneapolis. Enjoy our indoor pool, fitness center, and free local shuttle. Free made-to-order breakfast and our complimentary evening reception complete your stay.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Minneapolis/Bloomington
description: We're off I-494, with several retailers and dining options within a mile. The Mall of America is 10 minutes away, and Minneapolis–Saint Paul Airport is nine miles from us—ask about our free shuttle service. Downtown Minneapolis is 20 minutes away. Enjoy breakfast and dinner in our Garden Grille & Bar, or grab drinks and snacks in our 24-hour Pavilion Pantry.

name: Hampton Inn Minneapolis Bloomington West
description: We're off I-494, 12 miles from downtown Minneapolis. You'll find quick bites within a half-mile and Mall of America 10 minutes away. We're 11 miles from Minneapolis-Saint Paul International Airport—our free shuttle can get you there and to local businesses. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our 24-hour fitness center and indoor pool.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Minneapolis Airport Mall of America
description: We’re off I-494 and Highway 77, under a mile from Mall of America and four miles from Minneapolis–Saint Paul International Airport via our free shuttle. Central Minneapolis is 20 minutes from our door. Enjoy breakfast and dinner in our Garden Grille & Bar, with room service every evening. We have an indoor pool, fitness center, and WiFi’s on us.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Bloomington - Minneapolis South
description: Our hotel is off I-494 in Bloomington, a 10-minute shuttle ride from the Mall of America and and Minneapolis – St. Paul International Airport. Downtown Minneapolis attractions like the Target Center and US Bank Stadium are 15 minutes away. Enjoy our pool and whirlpool, fitness center, and our signature warm chocolate chip cookie.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Minneapolis-Mall Of America
description: We're right across the street from the world-famous Mall of America, with easy access to the terminals at Minneapolis–Saint Paul International Airport (MSP) only 5.6 miles away. Reach downtown Minneapolis, including the U.S. Bank Stadium — home to the NFL's Minnesota Vikings — in a 10-mile drive. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Suites Minneapolis St Paul Arpt-Mall of America
description: Shop until you drop, then take a free shuttle back to your hotel for a relaxing evening with free WiFi, a comfy bed, and complimentary breakfast in the morning. When it's time to head home, the shuttle to the airport is free, too.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Minneapolis Airport
description: Our hotel is within five minutes of the Mall of America and Minneapolis-St. Paul International Airport via our free shuttle. Discover downtown Minneapolis draws such as Target Field, Orchestra Hall, and US Bank Stadium by catching the light rail just yards from our door. Enjoy free made-to-order breakfast and our complimentary evening reception.

name: Hilton Minneapolis-St. Paul Airport
description: Off I-494, our hotel is less than three miles from Minneapolis-Saint Paul Airport via free shuttle. Explore neighboring Minnesota Valley National Wildlife Refuge and Mall of America, five minutes away. We're a half-mile from rail links to the Twin Cities. Enjoy our 24-hour fitness center and glass-enclosed atrium area, featuring a heated pool.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Minneapolis Eagan
description: Off I-35E, we're three miles from the Twin Cities Premium Outlet Mall, six miles from the Mall of America, and 10 miles from MSP Airport. Our free shuttle covers all of them. Take the kids to Minnesota Zoo, 10 minutes away. Our Garden Grille restaurant serves breakfast and dinner, with evening room service. The 24-hour Pavilion Pantry offers drinks and snacks.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Brooklyn Park Minneapolis
description: Corporate and leisure travelers have equal place here: our pet-friendly suites provide easy access to the likes of Minneapolis and St Paul via state highway 610, while Target’s northern campus is one mile south. Stock your in-suite kitchen at our 24-hour store, but don’t forget to join us for breakfast. It’s free, as is the WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Brooklyn Park
description: Our Brooklyn Park home is just off Highway 610 and 15 minutes from Crystal Airport. Fill up on free hot breakfast before hiking Rush Creek Regional Trail, less than three miles from the door. It’s just a 20-minute drive to central Minneapolis, where you’ll find ballgames at Target Field, Boom Island Park, by the Mississippi River, and a wealth of dining. WiFi’s on us.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Minneapolis-New Brighton
description: We’re 20 minutes north of Minneapolis and St. Paul, and moments from Blaine, Shoreview and Roseville. From our location near I-35, the National Sports Center, Land O’Lakes, and Medtronic are easy to reach. Finish the day at our free evening social, Monday – Thursday, or with a meal in your in-suite kitchen. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Minneapolis Downtown
description: We’re in the former Plymouth Building, within one mile of Target Center, Target Field, and US Bank Stadium. We’re connected to the Skyway System for easy access to Central Minneapolis. Enjoy our complimentary evening reception and made-to-order breakfast on us. We have a fitness center, heated indoor pool, and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Minneapolis-Roseville
description: Located off I-35W, we're seven miles from downtown Minneapolis, and 12 miles from St. Paul. Shop and dine at the Rosedale Center, two miles away. The University of Minnesota and University of Northwestern-St. Paul are within 10 minutes of the hotel, and the airport is 25 minutes' drive. Relax with our indoor pool, free hot breakfast, and free WiFi.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Minneapolis Downtown
description: A former bank building, our all-suite hotel connects to the Skyway and is three blocks from Nicollet Mall and riverfront parks. First Avenue concerts and Twins and Vikings games are all within a mile. Join us for free breakfast, or cook meals in your in-suite kitchen with full-size appliances. Our combined fitness/laundry facility makes multi-tasking easy.

name: Tru by Hilton Minneapolis Downtown
description: A bank building reimagined, our hotel is connected to the Skyway and just three blocks from Nicollet Mall and riverfront parks. Vikings and Twins games are within a mile. Kick back in efficient rooms with free WiFi, a large HDTV, and big bright bathroom. Along with free breakfast and a 24/7 market, we offer games in the lobby and a fitness center.

name: The Marquette Hotel, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: At the heart of downtown Minneapolis, our hotel is linked to the IDS Center skyscraper and Crystal Court. We're connected to local nightlife and shopping by the Minneapolis Skyway, spanning Nicollet Mall, and steps from the theater district. Perks include bike rentals and access to our 24-hour fitness center.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Minneapolis / Maple Grove
description: We're right off I-494, 15 miles north west of central Minneapolis, and a short drive to The Shoppes at Arbor Lakes, with a wide variety of shops and restaurants in the area. The National Sports Center is a 25-minute drive away in Blaine. Perks include free WiFi and an indoor pool. The Garden Grille & Bar serves breakfast and dinner.

name: DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Minneapolis
description: Our suites are a two-minute walk from the light rail. Target Field, the Minneapolis Convention Center, Nicollet Mall, and other downtown draws are blocks away. We're a five-minute drive from the Minneapolis Institute of Art, and a half-hour from the Mall of America. Grab a latté from Starbucks and enjoy a warm DoubleTree cookie when you arrive.

name: Hampton Inn Minneapolis NW Maple Grove
description: Where I-94 and I-494 meet, our hotel is a few minutes' walk from retail and dining at the Shoppes at Arbor Lakes. It's a 15-minute drive to Rush Creek Golf Club or to hiking in Elm Creek Park Reserve. Albertville Premium Outlets are up the road 16 miles, and downtown Minneapolis is 25 minutes south. Enjoy daily hot breakfast and WiFi on us.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Minneapolis- St. Louis Park at West End
description: Explore downtown Minneapolis, just 10 minutes away. Nearby, you’ll find Eloise Butler Wildflower Garden, and Theodore Wirth Regional Park and Golf Course. The Shops at West End are steps from the door, close to many restaurants. Or, for a night in, try your in-suite kitchen. End the day at our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Minneapolis - Park Place
description: We're in Saint Louis Park, across from The Shops at West End. Central Minneapolis is five miles away, where you'll find the Minneapolis Convention Center and Target Center. Mall of America is less than a half-hour drive from our door. Enjoy our free five-mile weekday shuttle, saltwater pool, 24-hour shop, and a warm DoubleTree cookie on arrival.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Minneapolis West/ Minnetonka
description: We’re in the Minnetonka suburb, just off I-394, 15 minutes from downtown Minneapolis and even closer to the offices of big businesses like Siemens and Honeywell. Explore the shops at the Ridgedale Shopping Center, about one mile away, or The Shops at West End, four miles from our hotel. Our WiFi and hot breakfast are free.

name: Hampton Inn Minneapolis/Burnsville
description: We’ve got all seasons covered. Free concerts and outdoor movies are nearby at Nicollet Commons Park, while Buck Hill, a short drive away, boasts over 15 ski runs. Valleyfair theme park has plenty of attractions for the kids, and Burnsville Performing Arts Center, half a mile away, is ideal for culture vultures. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Minneapolis/Eagan
description: We're off I-35, within 15 minutes of Minneapolis-Saint Paul International Airport and Mall of America via free shuttle. You'll be steps from restaurants, and each day starts with free hot breakfast. The interstate puts you 15 minutes from St. Paul and 25 minutes from Minneapolis. Enjoy our free WiFi, fitness center, and indoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn Duluth Canal Park
description: We're just off I-35, on the banks of Lake Superior and adjacent to Lakewalk. The convention center, Aerial Lift Bridge, boat tours, and Bentleyville’s holiday lights at Bayfront Festival Park are just steps away. The indoor pool, whirlpool, and fitness center are yours to enjoy, and we've got free WiFi and free hot breakfast.

name: Tru By Hilton Duluth Mall Area
description: Our hotel is off Highway 194, five minutes from Miller Hill Mall. We're 15 minutes from downtown Duluth and waterfront attractions along Lake Superior, including Enger Park and the Great Lakes Aquarium. Recharge and unwind with board games, coffee, and comfy chairs in our lobby. WiFi and hot breakfast are free.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Duluth North / Mall Area
description: We’re off Highway 53, less than a mile from eateries and shopping at Miller Hill Mall. Visit local attractions like Lake Superior Railroad and Enger Tower, just 10 minutes away. A 10-minute drive will take you to Great Lakes Aquarium and Duluth International Airport. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our indoor pool and whirlpool.

name: Hampton Inn Eden Prairie Minneapolis
description: We're off Highway 212 and I-494. Our proximity to the Eden Prairie Center enables you to shop, eat, and find entertainment in one place. We're surrounded by several diverse eating options ranging from local steakhouses to Indian restaurants. Enjoy a free hot breakfast every morning when you stay with us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Minneapolis-Eden Prairie
description: A quick drive will bring you to family days at Valleyfair amusement park or high stakes at Mystic Lake Casino. Perfect your swing at Bent Creek Golf Club, accessible with our shuttle bus, which covers a three-mile radius. Make the most of free WiFi, and wake up to breakfast on us. If you prefer to sleep in, whip up breakfast in your in-suite kitchen.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Minneapolis/Eden Prairie
description: We're in a business district near I-494, about 20 minutes from the University of Minnesota, Prospect Park, and downtown. Lake Minnetonka and the Mall of America are both less than 15 miles from our hotel. Our Great American Grill restaurant serves breakfast and dinner, with evening room service. The 24-hour Pavilion Pantry offers drinks and snacks.

name: Hampton Inn Minneapolis/Shakopee
description: We’re off US-169, with a free weekday shuttle covering a seven-mile radius. Shakopee, Valleyfair amusement park, and Canterbury Park are within 10 minutes. Mystic Lake Casino is four miles from our door and we’re a short drive from The Wilds Golf Club. Minneapolis-Saint Paul International Airport is 22 miles away. Enjoy daily hot breakfast and WiFi on us.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Edina Minneapolis
description: We're 10 miles from downtown Minneapolis and Minneapolis-Saint Paul International Airport. Nearby shopping is available at Southdale Center shopping mall, just a five minute walk away, or you can take a short drive to the shopping mecca of the Mall of America. While you're here, kick back in your stylish suite with fully equipped kitchen and WiFi, and wake up to free hot breakfast each morning.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Minneapolis Downtown
description: We’re off I-35W, one block from the Minneapolis Convention Center and less than a mile from Government Plaza Station for the Blue Line light rail. US Bank Stadium is a mile from our door, home to the Minnesota Vikings. Enjoy a hot breakfast buffet and evening dining at our restaurant and bar. Our hotel has a fitness center, indoor pool, and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Fairmont
description: You’ll find us off I-90, 10 minutes from central Fairmont shopping and dining. We’re nestled in Minnesota nature, within 15 minutes of five local lakes and numerous waterside parks – ideal for walking the dog. Free hot breakfast is fuel for a round at Interlaken Golf Club or putting a spin on things at Cedar Creek Disc Golf Course, both 15 minutes away. WiFi’s on us.

name: Hampton Inn Hibbing
description: We're next to US-169, 3.5 miles from Hibbing Community College and the Fairview Range Medical Center. It's only a 20-minute drive north to the Hibbing Taconic Mining Company, and six miles to the Range Regional Airport. Enjoy free hot breakfast each morning, and stay connected with free WiFi. Relax in our indoor swimming pool and hot tub.

name: Hampton Inn Lakeville Minneapolis
description: Find us off I-35, on the route to Minneapolis, 25 miles away. We're in reach of local dining and shopping, five minutes from Lakeville Area Arts Center and Casperson Park & Boat Launch on the bank of Lake Marion. Wake up to free hot breakfast, and enjoy our free WiFi, fitness center, heated indoor pool, and 24-hour snack and sundry store.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Minneapolis St. Paul-Shoreview
description: Find us off I-694, 20 minutes from St. Paul and Minneapolis. We're ideal for Twin Cities attractions: The Science Museum of Minnesota, Minnehaha Regional Park, and Target Field are within 16 miles. Take in some Shoreview scenery at Island Lake Country Park, five minutes away, and enjoy our fitness center and indoor heated pool.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Mankato Downtown
description: We're in the heart of downtown, connected by skyway to the Mankato Civic Center, home of the Minnesota State Mavericks. Our rooms are walking distance from shopping, dining, Carnegie Art Center, and the Minnesota River Trail. Minnesota State University is one mile away. Enjoy our indoor pool, fitness center, and all-day restaurant.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Minneapolis - University Area
description: We're on the University of Minnesota campus, across from the Health Clinics and Surgery Center. Stadium Village light rail station – with links to Minneapolis−Saint Paul Airport – is two blocks away, and we're four miles from Minneapolis Convention Center. Our free WiFi, indoor pool, and warm DoubleTree cookie at check-in complete your stay.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Minneapolis University Area
description: We're three miles from central Minneapolis and a half-mile from LRT Prospect Park Station. The University of Minnesota campus, Medical Center, and TCF Stadium are all within five minutes. Minneapolis St. Paul International Airport is seven miles away. Free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our fitness center and heated indoor pool are yours.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites St. Paul Oakdale/Woodbury
description: Near I-94 and I-494, we’re about 20 minutes from downtown Minneapolis and the airport. Xcel Energy Center and 3M are both 15 minutes away. We have a choice of shops and restaurants within a mile, plus free hot breakfast at the hotel. Enjoy free WiFi and our fitness center.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel St Paul Downtown
description: Our hotel sits in St. Paul's business district, connected by skyway to local offices. We're a half-mile from Xcel Energy Center, and two blocks from the light rail station. We offer a free local shuttle, and our hotel features a fitness center and heated indoor pool. Enjoy a warm DoubleTree cookie on arrival.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Rochester Downtown
description: Feel at home in downtown Rochester, within a mile of local Mayo Clinic campuses. We're walking distance from the Shops at University Square via pedestrian skyway and surrounded by dining. Grand Rounds Brewing Company, next door, offers delivery. We have a free town car service throughout downtown, an indoor pool, and fitness center.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Rochester - Mayo Clinic Area
description: At the heart of downtown, our hotel is two blocks from Rochester's Mayo Clinic and Methodist Hospital. We're next to the Shops at University Square and five minutes from the Mayo Civic Center. Enjoy a free shuttle to local and hospital locations, an award-winning restaurant, Blu H2O Salon, and a warm DoubleTree cookie at check-in.

name: Hilton Rochester Mayo Clinic Area
