description: We're across the street from the convention center, and a short walk to the Monorail station providing easy access to the Las Vegas Strip. UNLV is a mile away and T-Mobile Arena four miles, hosting NHL games and concerts. Enjoy free hot breakfast as well as free WiFi. Count on us for friendly service. That’s 100% Hampton.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Convention Center Las Vegas
description: We're within 10 minutes of Las Vegas Convention Center, The Strip-adjacent monorail, and Fashion Show mall — reach all three on our free scheduled shuttle. Our non-gaming hotel has an indoor pool, outdoor hot tub, and sundeck. Enjoy free made-to-order breakfast and our complimentary evening reception. McCarran International Airport is three miles away.

name: Elara by Hilton Grand Vacations – Center Strip
description: Our 52-story hotel offers views of the Las Vegas Strip, one block from the iconic boulevard. We're connected to shopping, dining, and entertainment at Miracle Mile mall, with access to Planet Hollywood Resort & Casino. The Eiffel Tower Experience and Madame Tussauds Las Vegas are within a mile. Enjoy our fitness center and seasonal outdoor pool.

name: Hilton Grand Vacations at the Flamingo
description: Find us within The Strip’s 15-acre Flamingo resort with direct access to its lively GO Pool complex. Within a 10-minute walk, reach Bally’s, Caesars Palace, and The Forum Shops. Our grounds feature a courtyard, lush gardens, and an outdoor pool area. Inside, we have a fitness center, dry sauna, and a whirlpool.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Las Vegas City Center
description: We're just half a mile from the Las Vegas Strip, directly across I-15 from the Aria Resort and Casino. All of the city's convention centers are within 3.5 miles, and McCarran International Airport (LAS) is just four miles south. During your stay, enjoy free hot breakfast and relax nightly at our complimentary evening social (Monday – Thursday).

name: Hilton Garden Inn Las Vegas City Center
description: Find us off I-15, five minutes from the Las Vegas Strip and the Fountains of Ballagio. McCarran International Airport is three miles away and we’re 15 minutes from the Fremont Street Experience in downtown Las Vegas. Meals are served daily at our Great American Grill Restaurant & Bar. Enjoy our outdoor pool, 24-hour fitness center, and free WiFi.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Las Vegas City Center
description: Located just off I-15, we’re within walking distance of the Las Vegas Strip and T-Mobile Arena. Our spacious suites feature kitchens and living areas. Arriving by car? The parking is free, just like our WiFi. Join us each morning for a free hot breakfast before taking our free shuttle to the Las Vegas Strip.

name: Hampton Inn Tropicana
description: Off I-15, we're 15 minutes from downtown Las Vegas. Quick bites are within a half-mile and our event center is next door. Explore the Las Vegas Strip, just five minutes away. McCarran International Airport is 10 minutes from the hotel. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our fitness center and outdoor pool.

name: Las Vegas Hilton at Resorts World
description: We're on the Strip's north end, across from the convention center and a 10-minute walk to Fashion Show shops. It's all here – a gaming floor, sports book, nightclubs, a wellness spa, and seven outdoor pools. Diverse dining includes a street food hall and award-winning steakhouse. Host events in our 5,000-capacity theater or Grand Ballroom with outdoor balcony.

name: Conrad Las Vegas at Resorts World
description: Rising above the Las Vegas Strip, our 1,496 rooms and suites feature smart, luxurious amenities in a great location. The Las Vegas Convention Center is just across the road, and McCarran International Airport is four miles away. Explore our 220,000 sq. ft. pool complex and several dining options ranging from market-style food stalls to award-winning steaks and wine.

name: Hilton Grand Vacations on Paradise (Convention Center)
description: Our suites are less than a mile from the Las Vegas Convention Center and moments from Westgate monorail links to The Strip. We're a half-hour from Red Rock Canyon, and Hoover Dam is within an hour. We have an outdoor pool with barbecue grills, a family-friendly game room, and a convenience store. Our concierge is on hand to help plan activities.

name: Hampton Inn Las Vegas/North Speedway
description: We're right off I-15 in the city's business center, seven miles from Las Vegas Motor Speedway. Nellis Air Force Base is 15 minutes away, and it's a nine-mile drive to world-famous casinos, entertainment, and conventions downtown. You can reach McCarran International Airport in 14 miles. Relax in our heated outdoor pool. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Las Vegas/Summerlin
description: In Summerlin, we offer a quieter side of Las Vegas 15 minutes from the famous Strip. McCarran International Airport and Nellis Air Force Base are 20 minutes from our hotel, and City National Arena and the Las Vegas Ballpark are less than a half-hour away. Relax in our outdoor pool, and enjoy free daily hot breakfast and WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Manchester-Bedford
description: We're off the I-293/Everett Turnpike split, five miles from SNHU Arena in downtown Manchester. It's 10 minutes to the Mall of New Hampshire and six miles to Saint Anselm College. We offer a free 24-hour shuttle to Manchester-Boston Regional Airport. Relax at our Manager's Reception, Monday – Thursday. Enjoy our pool, free hot breakfast, and free WiFi.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Manchester/Airport
description: Grab our 24-hour shuttle, running to/from Manchester-Boston Regional Airport. Uncover Manchester with ballgames at Northeast Delta Dental Stadium, shows at the Palace Theatre, or family days at SEE Science Center. When the day is over, stop by our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday, or whip up a snack in your in-suite kitchen. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Manchester Downtown
description: We’re off I-293, next to Northeast Delta Dental Stadium, and one mile from Palace Theatre, with a free shuttle to attractions within 5 miles. Elm Street, Currier Museum of Art, and Livingston Park are two miles away, and Manchester Airport can be reached in 15 minutes. Enjoy our restaurant, evening room service, and 24-hour convenience shop.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Manchester Downtown
description: Find us among the shops and restaurants of Elm Street in downtown Manchester. We're a five-minute walk from SNHU Arena, and Manchester-Boston Airport is a five-mile ride on our complimentary shuttle. Enjoy city views from high floors, and a fitness center and indoor pool. Our full-service spa offers a variety of beauty and wellness services.

name: Tru by Hilton Manchester Downtown
description: In the heart of downtown Manchester, we are surrounded by great restaurants, arts, and entertainment. We’re 10 minutes from Saint Anselm College, The Mall of New Hampshire, and Manchester-Boston Regional Airport. Our pet-friendly hotel features free WiFi and breakfast.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Nashua
description: We're near Everett Turnpike, 10 minutes from Nashua Historic District. Discover New England scenery with a stroll by our duck pond and along the Merrimack Wildlife Trail, five miles away. Our hotel features a full-service spa, heated indoor pool, and fitness center. Every stay starts with our signature warm chocolate chip cookie.

name: Hampton Inn Nashua
description: Find us next to Somerset Plaza stores and plenty of places to grab a quick bite. We're 10 minutes from the characteristic shops of downtown Nashua and the city's scenic Riverwalk. New Hampshire nature is just as close at Mine Falls Park. Enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi, and relax in our heated indoor pool and whirlpool.

name: Hampton Inn Concord/Bow
description: We’re off I-89/I-93 in Bow, a short drive from Concord and the Merrimack River Greenway Trail. Concord is home to a variety of restaurants, the New Hampshire State House, and the Capitol Center for the Arts. The McAuliffe-Shephard Discovery Center and the airport are within five miles. Enjoy free hot breakfast, our indoor pool, and WiFi on us.

name: Tru by Hilton Concord
description: We’re in Concord, off I-93 and near I-89. New Hampshire State House and New Hampshire Historical Society are within 10 minutes, and McAuliffe-Shepard Discovery Center is less than four miles from our door. New Hampshire Motor Speedway is only 20 minutes away. Enjoy our 24-hour fitness center, daily hot breakfast, and WiFi on us.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Gateway Hills Nashua
description: Enjoy the comforts of home in a spacious suite with full kitchen. We're nestled in Gateway Hills, a mile from the Massachusetts border, five minutes from Royal Ridge Center shops and restaurants, and just 10 minutes from Green Meadow Golf Club. Your stay includes WiFi, hotel bike access, daily hot breakfast, and an evening social Monday – Thursday.

name: Hampton Inn Portsmouth Central
description: We're along US-4 near I-95. Hop on our free shuttle to places within five miles, including the airport, Kittery Premium Outlets, downtown attractions like the USS Albacore Museum, and Lonza and Sig Sauer offices. It's 10 miles to the University of New Hampshire. Take a refreshing dip in our indoor pool. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Portsmouth
description: Make the most of New Hampshire leisure, with York and Hampton beaches a short drive away and downtown Portsmouth close by. History enthusiasts are walking distance from the USS Albacore Museum and near all 10 acres of the Strawbery Banke Museum. Rustle up a meal in your kitchen, or stop by our free evening social, Monday – Thursday. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Portsmouth Downtown
description: We're less than a mile from I-95. Downtown shops and dining, and waterfront views of the New Hampshire Seacoast, are 10 minutes' walk from our door. The University of New Hampshire is a 20-minute drive. Wake up to free hot breakfast and unwind in our fitness center and indoor saltwater pool. WiFi is on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Portsmouth Downtown
description: We’re a block from the Old Harbour on the Piscataqua River. Museums and historical attractions are within half a mile, including several restored 18th century homes. The University of New Hampshire is 13 miles away. We serve breakfast and dinner in our restaurant and bar. Grab a drink or snack at the 24-hour Pavilion Pantry.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Exeter
description: Bask in the charm of downtown Exeter, a New England seacoast village, rich in history and culture and just a short walk from our hotel. Find shops, restaurants, and the American Independence Museum along the banks of the winding Squamscott River. Take advantage of free breakfast and WiFi, and access to the fitness center and pool.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Hanover Lebanon
description: We’re off I-89, within four miles of Dartmouth College and Dartmouth-Hitchcock Medical Center. Our hotel is five minutes from the Lebanon Opera House and other downtown attractions. We're 10 minutes from Lebanon Airport and Upper Valley is four minutes away. The Garden Grille Restaurant & Bar serves breakfast and dinner daily.

name: Hampton Inn Littleton
description: We're a minute from I-93, with easy access to nearby stores. Head 10 minutes into town to find local establishments like the Littleton Diner, Schilling Beer Company, or Lahout's — America's oldest ski shop. It's under 20 miles to Cannon Mountain and Bretton Woods ski resorts. Enjoy our indoor saltwater pool and whirlpool. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites North Conway
description: We're along US-302, under five minutes from a variety of restaurants and tax-free shopping at Settlers Green Outlet Village. Winter skiing is within 10 miles at Cranmore Mountain or Attitash Mountain. Drive 10 minutes to scenic cascades and pools at Diana's Baths. Enjoy our indoor waterpark, free hot breakfast, and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Atlantic City/Absecon
description: We're next to US-30, nine miles from Atlantic City's world-famous casinos, boardwalk, and convention center. It's six miles to Atlantic City International Airport or Stockton University. Take the family to Storybook Land amusement park 15 minutes away, or head nine miles to Hamilton Mall. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our heated indoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn Egg Harbor Township Atlantic City
description: Located off Highway 40, we're in walking distance of restaurants and less than three miles from Lenox Factory Outlet and Storybook Land. Atlantic City International Airport can be reached in 10 minutes, and Atlantic City Boardwalk and beach are seven miles from our door. Stay active in our pool and fitness center, and enjoy free WiFi, and free hot breakfast.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Atlantic City/Egg Harbor Township, NJ
description: Reach us off Highway 40, just 10 minutes from Atlantic City International Airport. You’ll be 20 minutes from Atlantic City’s iconic casinos and boardwalk attractions. Start the day with free hot breakfast and finish it at our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday. For a quieter night, try your in-suite kitchen. WiFi’s on us, and pets are welcome.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Vineland
description: Our Vineland hotel is off Route 55, two miles from Vineland Industrial Park. Grab a drink at Cedar Rose Vineyards or retail therapy at Cumberland Mall, both within six miles. Get to local attractions like Glasstown Arts District and Wheaton Arts and Cultural Center, in around 10 minutes. WiFi and hot breakfast are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Turnersville (Philadelphia Area)
description: Turn off Route 42 and find our Turnersville home, neighbored by dining and shopping. Take a stroll round Washington Lake Park, 10 minutes away, or head into Philadelphia: the Liberty Bell Center, Philadelphia Museum of Art, and Citizens Bank Park ballgames are 25 minutes away. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our indoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn Philadelphia/Voorhees
description: Find us on Route 73, less than a mile from Virtua Vorhees Hospital. Family fun at Diggerland and retail therapy at the Promenade at Sagemore are within 10 minutes of our door, and Philadelphia is 20 miles away. Enjoy our free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and indoor pool.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Berkeley Heights
description: Find us off I-78, one mile from the trails of Wachtung Reservation. We're 15 minutes from the Mall at Short Hills via free shuttle – also covering a seven-mile radius. Join us for made-to-order breakfast and a complimentary evening reception. We have ballroom space accommodating up to 500 guests, Starbucks, and outdoor patio area.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Springfield, NJ
description: We're off Highway 22, within two miles of parks, golf courses, and the Watchung Reservation. The Mall at Short Hills is six miles away, and Newark Liberty Airport and Elizabeth, NJ are both within 12 miles. Our Garden Grille & Bar restaurant serves breakfast and dinner, and our Pavilion Pantry is open 24 hours for drinks, snacks, and ready-to-cook meals.

name: Hilton Short Hills
description: Our hotel is across from The Mall at Short Hills and 15 minutes from Morristown. We’re a short drive from Parsippany and I-78, and Newark Airport and NYC are under 25 miles away. Sit by the fire in our rooftop bar or plan your perfect event in one of our many events spaces.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Newark-Cranford
description: Find us eight miles from Newark International Airport and close to train stations linking to New York City. We're off Garden State Parkway, near Galloping Hills Golf Course, The Westwood venue, Weeks Marine, L'Oreal, and Merck Pharmaceutical. End the day with in-suite cooking, or free evening socials, Monday – Thursday. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hampton Inn South Plainfield-Piscataway
description: We’re off I-287/I-95 in South Plainfield, a half-mile from Hadley Center and 10 minutes from Piscataway. Rutgers University – New Brunswick is six miles away and we’re close to a variety of corporate offices. The New Jersey Convention and Exposition Center is nine miles away and we’re 30 minutes from Newark Airport. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Edison
description: We’re just off I-287 in Edison, walking distance from shops and restaurants. The New Jersey Convention and Exposition Center, Rutgers University, and Thomas Edison Center at Menlo Park are all within 15 minutes of our door. Newark Liberty International Airport is a half-hour drive. Fill up on daily free hot breakfast or prepare meals in your in-suite kitchen. WiFi is free and pets are welcome.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Rahway, NJ
description: Jersey Shore to the south, New York to the east: we're tucked between the two, just 20 minutes from Newark Liberty Airport. Enjoy free breakfast ahead of an afternoon's practice at Hyatt Hill Golf Complex or retail therapy at Menlo Park Mall. Make a day of it at Sandy Hook Beach. Or stay in, cook in your suite's kitchen, and make the most of free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Linden
description: At the intersection of Routes 1 and 9, we’re 10 miles from Newark Airport and five miles from Staten Island. Shops and restaurants are in walking distance, and we have a free scheduled shuttle to the airport, Linden train station, and local businesses. Enjoy the seasonal outdoor pool, fitness center, and free WiFi and hot breakfast.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Piscataway Somerset
description: Our hotel is just off Route 287, with easy access to Route 78 and the New Jersey Turnpike. We're within 10 minutes of Rutgers University and the Garden State Exhibition Center, and we provide a free five-mile shuttle to local corporate offices like Johnson & Johnson. Enjoy free made-to-order breakfast and our complimentary evening reception.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Bridgewater
description: We're off I-287, located in the Promenade Mall and one mile from TD Bank Ballpark and Bridgewater train station. Explore downtown Somerville and Bridgewater Commons Mall, both within five miles. Duke Island Park can be reached in 15 minutes. Enjoy our restaurant, indoor heated pool, fitness center, and 24-hour convenience shop.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Bridgewater
description: We’re off I-287, with several dining options just a few steps away. Take our free shuttle to the Bridgewater Commons Mall and other destinations within three miles of our hotel. Rutgers University-New Brunswick is 10 miles away. Unwind in our indoor saltwater pool and enjoy a drink in our lobby bar. Hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Somerset Hotel and Conference Center
description: We’re off I-287, six miles from Rutgers University-New Brunswick and New Brunswick Train Station’s direct services to NYC. Bridgewater Commons mall is within 20 minutes. Our hotel has indoor and outdoor pools, basketball and tennis courts, a Starbucks, and a free three-mile shuttle. Every stay begins with a warm DoubleTree cookie.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Somerset
description: Home is just off Route 287, nestled in Somerset’s business center. Rutgers University campus is 15 minutes from the door. Explore Colonial Park Gardens, 10 minutes away, or tee-off at Spooky Brook golf course right next to the park. Finish the day at our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday, or with a little in-suite cooking. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Edison/Raritan Center
description: Our hotel is just off I-95, less than two miles from The New Jersey Convention and Exposition Center, and a 30-minute drive from Rutgers University. Our Garden Grille & Bar is open for breakfast, dinner, and drinks, and snacks are available in the 24-hour Pavilion Pantry. Enjoy our heated indoor pool, whirlpool, and fitness center. The WiFi’s on us.

name: Hampton Inn Woodbridge
description: Reach us from the Garden State Parkway/NJ Turnpike intersection. We're steps from dining, with a LongHorn Steakhouse in the building. Newark International Airport is 20 minutes away via free weekday shuttle, while New York City is 45 minutes north. Free hot breakfast and WiFi are yours, as are our indoor pool and fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Deptford
description: We are in Deptford Township New Jersey between State Highway 42 and 55. The Deptford Mall and stores like Target are within a mile. View the Delaware River flow through Almonesson Lake, Timber Creek Park, and Blackwood Terrace all less than two miles away. Our Ava meeting room holds up to 30 people.

name: Hampton Inn Philadelphia/Mt. Laurel
description: Uncover Mount Laurel—the Promenade at Sagemore, family-friendly fun at Garden State Discovery Museum, and Diggerland amusement park are all within 15 minutes. We're close to I-295 and the New Jersey Turnpike, putting you half an hour from Philadelphia. Start the day with free hot breakfast, and enjoy free WiFi and an outdoor pool.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Mt. Laurel
description: Just off I-295, we’re minutes from Cherry Hill Mall and dining options. Sahara Sam's and Adventure Aquarium are within 12 minutes, and historic Philadelphia is only 25 minutes from our door. Enjoy breakfast, dinner, and evening room service from our Garden Grille & Bar.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Camden Waterfront
description: Ideally located near Camden Waterfront, you’ll find Adventure Aquarium and Camden Children's Garden only a 10-minute walk. Cross the river to Philadelphia and visit Penn’s Landing, Liberty Bell, Museum of the American Revolution, and more. The Garden Grille restaurant offers breakfast, dinner, and room service. We have a fitness center and a 24-hour Pavilion Pantry.

name: DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Mt. Laurel
description: Our suites are Just off the New Jersey Turnpike and I-295, two miles from Moorestown Mall. We’re 15 minutes from Cherry Hill and a half-hour from Philadelphia. Our hotel features an indoor pool, a fitness center, and landscaped gardens complete with waterfalls and koi pond. Every stay starts with a warm chocolate chip cookie.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Philadelphia/Mt. Laurel
description: Find us in Mount Laurel, 15 minutes from downtown Philadelphia and convenient to local corporations, including Computer Sciences Corp. and Lockheed Martin. Shop at nearby Moorestown Mall, or hop in the car for Philly sightseeing. Stop by our free evening social, Monday – Thursday, or do some in-suite cooking. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Bordentown
description: Off the New Jersey Turnpike between Philadelphia and New York City, we’re ideally located for outdoor pursuits on Mercer Lake or exploring historic Bordentown Trenton and Six Flags Great Adventure. Each pet-friendly suite comes with its own kitchen – though local restaurants are aplenty. Breakfast, like WiFi, is on us.

name: Hampton Inn Bordentown
description: We’re off I-95, close to I-295 and two miles from the center of Bordentown. Both Fort Dix and McGuire Air Force Base are a 10-mile drive away. Explore Bordentown’s shops and art galleries, or take the family to the Six Flags Great Adventure Theme Park, 20 minutes from our hotel. Our daily hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Hamilton
description: We’re across the street from Hamilton Marketplace mall. I-195 and I-95 are close by. Princeton University, Jackson Premium Outlets, and Six Flags Great Adventure are all within 15 miles. Our meeting space features a ballroom, and our restaurant serves breakfast, dinner, and evening room service. The Pavilion Pantry is open 24 hours for drinks and snacks.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Hamilton, NJ
description: Our hotel is by the Highway 130/I-195 intersection, 10 minutes from Hamilton Township center. We're next to business parks,including KNF Neuberger, and Six Flags Great Adventure is 14 miles away. We have a complimentary evening social Monday – Thursday, a putting green, and basketball court. Enjoy free breakfast and an in-suite kitchen.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Robbinsville
description: We're where the New Jersey Turnpike and I-195 meet, next to Robbinsville Field House. Six Flags Great Adventure is 15 minutes away, and Hamilton Marketplace is a four-mile drive. The Hamilton Train Station is eight miles from the hotel for easy trips into Trenton and New York City. Enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi, along with our indoor pool and private sundeck.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Mount Holly/Westampton
description: We're by the NJ Turnpike (I-95) off Exit 5, next to Recovery Sports Grill. Local dining and the Burlington County Prison Museum can be found in downtown Mount Holly 10 minutes away. Parx Casino and The Funplex are both within 12 miles, and Fort Dix is 25 minutes from us. Cooked-to-order breakfast is served daily in our Garden Grille & Bar. Enjoy our indoor pool.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Princeton Lawrenceville
description: We're five miles south of Princeton University on the Princeton Pike. We offer free bicycles for rides on the nearby trail and easy commutes to corporations like Bristol-Myers Squibb. It's three miles to Rider University and Quaker Bridge Mall. Breakfast, lunch, and dinner are served daily at our Great American Grill. Relax by our outdoor fire pit.

name: Hampton Inn East Windsor
description: Find us right off the New Jersey Turnpike, just minutes from everything in the township of East Windsor. Enjoy our free hot breakfast before a day at Six Flags Great Adventure, or shopping at Jackson Premium Outlets, both 12 miles away. Unwind after a day on the fairways at Cranbury Golf Club, 11 minutes away, with a swim in our pool. WiFi is on us.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Bridgewater/Branchburg
description: Take care of business with our free weekday shuttle to nearby corporate offices. For shopping and nightlife, downtown Somerville is just an 8-minute drive away. Your suite offers plenty of space to spread out, with a full kitchen for cooking meals just how you like them. Enjoy free WiFi and breakfast, and check out our evening social every Monday – Thursday.

name: Hampton Inn Flemington
description: We're just off US-202, five minutes from the 16-acre miniature train exhibit at Northlandz and shopping at Flemington Mall. Hunterdon Medical Center and large local companies like 3M and Johanna Foods are within three miles. It's an eight-minute drive to baseball and softball training at Diamond Nation. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our indoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn North Brunswick/New Brunswick
description: We’re five miles from New Brunswick, and three from Rutgers University. The area has many outdoor attractions, like Farrington Lake, ten minutes away, or Raritan Bay, half an hour from us. Enjoy a night of theater at the George Street Playhouse, less than 10 minutes from our hotel. Our business center is open 24 hours, or you can relax in our indoor pool. WiFi and daily hot breakfast are on us.

name: Hilton East Brunswick Hotel & Executive Meeting Center
description: Our modern hotel is just six miles east of New Brunswick, NJ – the home of Rutgers University. We’re straight off the New Jersey Turnpike, which connects you to New York within an hour. Enjoy our heated indoor pool, whirlpool, and fitness center. We also serve Starbucks® coffee in our lobby cafe.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton East Rutherford - Meadowlands, NJ
description: Home is minutes from football at MetLife Stadium and lucky chances at Meadowlands Racetrack, with Liberty Commons steps away. Take a short drive into Midtown Manhattan, or take our free shuttle to Penn Station. If you prefer dinner at home, try your in-suite kitchen or stop by our free evening social, Monday – Thursday. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Carlstadt-At The Meadowlands
description: Located off I-95, we’re minutes from Meadowlands Racetrack and MetLife Stadium – our free shuttle will take you there and anywhere within a five-mile radius. Get to New York City in 15 minutes from the nearby NJ Transit. Meadowlands Exposition Center is four miles away while Newark Airport is 20 minutes from our door. Enjoy free WiFi and free hot breakfast.

name: Home2 Suites By Hilton Hasbrouck Heights
description: We’re just 16 miles from the buzz and bustle of New York City, with easy access to Ellis Island and the Statue of Liberty. We’re minutes from family competition at Bowler City, the history of the Aviation Hall of Fame & Museum, and close to eco-tours of Meadowlands. Make the most of free WiFi and breakfast, and an in-suite kitchen. Pets are welcome.

name: Hilton Meadowlands
description: We’re off I-95 and Route 3, five minutes from MetLife Stadium – home to the NFL’s New York Giants and New York Jets. American Dream shopping and entertainment is less than three miles away. Our free shuttle goes to Frank R. Lautenberg train station, with connections to Newark Airport and Manhattan. Enjoy Starbucks coffee and all-day dining at our restaurant.

name: Hilton Hasbrouck Heights/Meadowlands
description: Just five minutes from Teterboro Airport and a 15-minute drive from Meadowlands Sports Complex, our hotel offers easy access to I-80 Express, Hackensack University Medical Center, and Newark Liberty International Airport. We have 23,000 sq. ft. of IAAC-approved event space as well as a bistro, pool, and fitness room.

name: Hampton Inn Ridgefield Park
description: Find us off the NJ Turnpike/I-95, 10 minutes from the George Washington Bridge. You'll be just as close to football at MetLife Stadium, or take in Ellis Island, the Statue of Liberty, and Midtown Manhattan, all within half an hour. We're 25 minutes from Manhattan Cruise Terminal. Enjoy free hot breakfast, WiFi, and our indoor pool and fitness center.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Ridgefield Park
description: Off I-95, We're 13 miles from Manhattan Cruise Port, and buses to NYC stop right outside our hotel. Overpeck County Park and a movie theater are in walking distance, and Newark Airport is a 20-minute drive away. We have an indoor pool, fitness center, and a free two-mile shuttle to local offices for contracted corporate guests.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Secaucus Meadowlands
description: We're next to Meadowlands Exposition Center and walking distance from the shops at Harmon Meadow Plaza, with quick access to I-95 and MetLife Stadium. We serve cooked-to-order breakfast daily and our evening reception features free drinks and snacks. Enjoy our heated indoor pool and fitness center.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Secaucus/Meadowlands
description: We're one mile from the NJ Transit, offering easy access to New York City, and just 15 minutes from Hamilton Park. Check out the Meadowlands Sports Complex or Intrepid Sea, Air & Space Museum, both six miles away. Newark International Airport is 20 minutes from our door. Enjoy breakfast and dinner in our restaurant, plus evening room service. WiFi is free.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Teaneck Glenpointe
description: We're located off I-95, three miles from the George Washington Bridge and five miles from Teterboro Airport. American Dream mall and MetLife Stadium are 15 minutes away while Midtown Manhattan is 13 miles from our door. Enjoy free daily hot breakfast and WiFi and relax in our indoor pool.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Teaneck Glenpointe
description: Just off I-95, 10 minutes from the George Washington Bridge, we’re ideal for New York City travel. Yankee Stadium baseball is 15 minutes away, and Overpeck Golf Course is just over a mile from our door. Shop and dine at American Dream, opening October 2019, 15 minutes from us. Join our complimentary evening socials, Monday – Thursday, and enjoy your in-suite kitchen. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Edgewater-NYC Area
description: From our location on the Jersey side of the Hudson River, you can easily get over to Manhattan with our complimentary shuttle to the NJ Lightrail or the NY Waterway Ferry. You'll find many local restaurants and businesses nearby. Enjoy free hot breakfast, and relax after a busy day at our evening social (Monday – Thursday).

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Fort Lee - George Washington Bridge
description: We're next to I-95, one mile west of George Washington Bridge, giving you easy access to Washington Heights and The Bronx. It's four miles to Yankee Stadium and MetLife Stadium is nine miles away. We have a shuttle that runs to and from Midtown Manhattan eight times a day. Relax in our heated indoor pool and visit our fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Newark-Harrison-Riverwalk
description: We're just off I-280, and our free shuttle will take you to Newark Penn Station, a mile away. The Prudential Center and local businesses are nearby, and it's five miles to the airport. MetLife Stadium is less than 15 minutes' drive from us, and New York City is 12 miles away. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Princeton
description: Right off Route 1, our hotel offers easy access to Princeton restaurants and shopping. We're a mile from Delaware and Raritan Canal State Park and five miles from Princeton University, with a free shuttle service around the area. Every stay starts with a warm chocolate chip cookie, and we have a fitness center and indoor pool.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Princeton
description: We’re just three miles from central Princeton, where you’ll find shops, restaurants, and Princeton University. Start the day with free breakfast before trekking the D&R Canal Park Trail, five minutes away. Hop on our free shuttle to Princeton Junction Station – great access to NYC. Enjoy free WiFi, breakfast, and our evening social, Monday – Thursday. An in-suite kitchen is yours.

name: Hampton Inn Cranbury
description: We're off I-95, a mile from Cranbury's parks and dining. Grab free hot breakfast before a day at Six Flags Great Adventure, half an hour away. While you're there, check out the Colliers Mills Wildlife Area. Nearer to home, tee off at The Meadows at Middlesex Golf Course, hike through Plainsboro Preserve, or visit Crystal Springs Family Waterpark. WiFi's on us.

name: Hampton Inn Newark-Airport
description: We're right off US Highway 9, three miles from Newark Liberty International Airport. Our free shuttle will take you there and to local restaurants. The Mills at Jersey Gardens, Kean University, and the Ritz Theatre & Performing Arts Center are a 10-minute drive away. Daily hot breakfast, WiFi and parking are on us.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Newark Airport
description: We're off I-95, a half mile from The Mills at Jersey Gardens. Newark Liberty International Airport is less than five miles away and Cape Liberty Cruise Port can be reached in 20 minutes – our courtesy shuttle service will take you both ways. Enjoy free made-to-order breakfast, our nightly evening reception, and access to our indoor pool and whirlpool.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Newark Airport
description: Just off US Route 1/9 and right by the airport, our suites are primely placed no matter the length of your stay. The Ironbound district is around the corner and we're 15 miles from New York City. Local dining options are aplenty, but cook in your in-suite kitchen if you’d prefer. Breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Newark Airport
description: Our hotel is next to Newark Liberty International Airport, with a free shuttle every 15 minutes. We're seven miles from Cape Liberty Cruise Port and 10 miles from New York City. Every stay starts with a chocolate chip cookie, and Starbucks coffee and grab-and-go items are available in the lobby. Enjoy our fitness center and indoor pool.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Newark Penn Station
description: Our hotel is connected to Newark Penn Station by an indoor walkway, 20 minutes from midtown Manhattan. We're a 10-minute walk from the New Jersey Performing Arts Center and the Prudential Center. Our free shuttle will take you to Newark International Airport, five miles away. Every stay starts with our signature warm chocolate chip cookie.

name: Hampton Inn Denville/Rockaway/Parsippany
description: You’ll find us right by I-80 in Denville. The towns of  Dover, Rockaway, Parsippany, and Morristown are all within 15 minutes' drive. Sample craft beer at the Fort Nonsense Brewing Company, five miles away. Or enjoy creative family fun at the Uptown Art Studio, two miles from our door. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Parsippany/North
description: Find us off Route 46, 12 minutes from Rockaway Townsquare and Grace Lord Park. A 20-minute drive will take you to Mennen Sports Arena, Willowbrook Mall, and Lake Hopatcong. Newark Liberty International Airport is 35 minutes away. Start your day with our breakfast–it's free and hot. Our free WiFi will keep you connected during your stay.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Parsippany
description: Our hotel is just minutes from Parsippany businesses including Nielsen, Sun Chemical, and Bayer Parsippany. We're a 35-minute drive from Newark International Airport. Enjoy our indoor pool, whirlpool, and fitness center or join us for our complimentary evening reception in the atrium. A free cooked-to-order breakfast is served daily.

name: Hilton Parsippany
description: In the Mack-Cali Business Campus, we’re surrounded by Fortune 500 companies. Morristown is within a 15-minute drive and Meadowlands Convention Center is just over a half-hour away. We have an indoor pool, seasonal outdoor pool, spa, and a Ruth's Chris Steak House. Our free neighborhood shuttle covers the local train station, which links to NYC.

name: Hampton Inn Parsippany
description: We’re a mile from I-287, with shuttle service (upon availability) to area corporations. Ruth’s Chris Steak House is onsite and open for dinner. Newark Liberty International Airport is 30 minutes away and Manhattan Penn Station is easily accessible. Enjoy our outdoor and indoor pools, as well as free breakfast and WiFi.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Rockaway
description: Off I-80, we're next to Rockaway Townsquare mall shopping, dining, and AMC movie theater, with central Rockaway two miles away. Farney State Park offers some New Jersey scenery, 11 miles from the door, and the interstate puts us an hour's drive from New York City. We have an indoor pool, fitness center, and restaurant and bar.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Dover - Rockaway
description: Uncover Dover and Rockaway town centers, just 2.5 miles away. We’re 10 minutes from Parsippany, and eight miles from Mt. Arlington nature. You’ll be near Casio, Siemens and the International Trade Center, 15 minutes from the door. While you’re here, enjoy an in-suite kitchen and relax at our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Fairfield
description: Find us just off Highway 46, within 25 minutes of popular Fairfield wedding venues. You'll be 10 minutes from Willowbrook Mall shopping and dining. Have a night in at our Calandra's Mediterranean Grill and lobby bar. Free hot breakfast and WiFi are yours, as is access to our indoor pool and whirlpool.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Fairfield Hotel & Suites
description: We're close to Interstate 80 in Fairfield, less than a mile from Willowbrook Mall. Meadowlands Sports Complex and Meadowlands Exposition Center are a 20-minute drive from our hotel. Enjoy our indoor saline pool, 24-hour fitness center, and on-site restaurant, Nectar. Every stay begins with our signature warm chocolate chip cookie.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Tinton Falls - Eatontown
description: Our hotel is off the Garden State Parkway, 10 minutes from Monmouth Mall. We're six miles from Jersey Shore Premium Outlets, with both Asbury Park Beach and Long Branch Beach boardwalks within eight miles. Perks include our fitness center and seasonal outdoor pool, and a warm DoubleTree cookie at check-in.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Eatontown
description: Jersey Shore beaches and business, retail therapy and Monmouth Park Racetrack: we’re a short drive from it all, and you’ll start each day with free hot breakfast. We’re also 10 minutes from Hollywood Golf Club and the Asbury Park Boardwalk. Join us Monday – Thursday for our complimentary evening social.

name: Hampton Inn Neptune/Wall
description: Located off Garden State Parkway, we’re a mile from the Jersey Shore Premium Outlets, and five minutes from Jersey Shore Arena. Visit Asbury Park and Allaire Village, just 12 minutes away. Enjoy shopping at Ocean Avenue Boardwalk, or get a tan at Belmar Beach, only six miles from our door. Enjoy our free WiFi and free hot breakfast.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Lakewood
description: We’re off Garden State Parkway, a short walk from a choice of shops and restaurants. Baseball games at FirstEnergy Park are 10 minutes away, and the beach and boardwalk at Point Pleasant are less than eight miles from our door. Breakfast and dinner is served in our Garden Grille restaurant. Enjoy our indoor pool, fitness center, and free WiFi.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Wayne
description: Next to Willowbrook Mall shopping, dining, and entertainment, our hotel offers quick access to I-80, US-46, and NJ-23. We are less than three miles from Essex County Airport, Great Piece Meadows, and multiple golf clubs. Several manufacturers and offices are also convenient to our hotel, and our spacious suites make business trips better.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Wayne
description: We're on the edge of Laurelwood Arboretum, less than two miles from restaurants, shops, and the Ice Vault Arena. William Paterson University and St Joseph’s Hospital are under ten minutes from our door. We have an on-site restaurant and bar, and our 24-hour Pavilion Pantry® offers drinks and snacks. Enjoy our indoor pool, fitness center, and WiFi.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel & Suites Jersey City
description: Find our suites within a half-mile of Grove Street, Newport Centre Mall, and PATH trains to NYC. We're less than 10 minutes from Liberty State Park and the Holland Tunnel to Manhattan. Many suites offer Manhattan skyline views, and every stay starts with a warm DoubleTree cookie.

name: Hampton Inn Paramus
description: We're off Route 17 and Garden State Parkway, 30 minutes from Newark Liberty Airport. Paramus Park mall, restaurants, and Mack-Cali offices are in walking distance, and New York City is a half-hour drive away. We've got a pool and fitness center, and our local shuttle, WiFi, and daily hot breakfast are free.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Mahwah
description: We're just off Route 17, close to I-287 and 3 minutes' drive from Ramapo College. Our free shuttle will take you to places within three miles of our door, including local restaurants. Explore Paramus Park just 11 miles away or drive 30 miles to see the bright lights of NYC. Unwind in our indoor pool and enjoy daily hot breakfast and WiFi on us.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Mahwah
description: Our hotel is a mile from I-287 near Mahwah tech and auto corporations. Our free shuttle runs Monday – Friday to destinations within two miles like Ramapo College of New Jersey, and we have Enterprise car rental on-site. Our heated indoor pool features a retractable roof. We offer a fitness center and free WiFi.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Mahwah
description: New Jersey scenery awaits in Mahwah. Grab our free shuttle, running in a five-mile radius, to Darlington Golf Course and Campgaw Ski Mountain Area. Nearby, you’ll find Woodbury Common Premium Outlets and Westfield Garden State Plaza. Make the most of our free WiFi, breakfast, and evening social, Tuesday – Thursday. For a night in, dabble in some in-suite cooking.

name: Hilton Woodcliff Lake
description: Our hotel sits amid 21 acres of landscaped grounds, next door to Tice's Corner Marketplace. Garden State Parkway puts us on the route to New York City, 45 minutes away. We feature a seasonal outdoor pool, sports courts, and a fitness center. Discover relaxation at Infinina Spa, home to a sauna, indoor pool, and whirlpool.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Mount Laurel/Moorestown
description: We’re right off I-295, about 30 minutes away from Philadelphia International Airport. Fuel up with our free hot breakfast before exploring The Funplex amusement and water park, less than a mile away or drive 40 minutes to get to Six Flags Great Adventure. Bishops Gate Corporate Center & Laurel Corporate Park are right next door. WiFi's on us.

name: Hampton Inn Pennsville
description: Our Pennsville hotel is off I-295, just 15 minutes from Wilmington. Take in Fort Mott State Park, ballgames at Blue Rock Stadium, and the Cowtown Rodeo, all within 20 minutes of the door. You’ll be 45 minutes’ drive from Philadelphia day trips, and 10 minutes from New Castle Airport. Enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi, and 24-hour fitness center access.

name: Hampton Inn Swedesboro Philadelphia
description: We’re located off I-295, adjacent to Pureland Industrial Complex and within a half mile of a variety of restaurants. Subaru Park is eight miles away, and Bridgeport Speedway and Gloucester County DREAM Park are both a 10-minute drive. Philadelphia’s Center City, Wilmington DE, Glassboro NJ, and Deptford NJ are all within 30 minutes of our door. Breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Alamogordo
description: We're five minutes from downtown, and eight miles from Holloman Air Force Base. Visit New Mexico Museum of Space History, five miles away, or marvel at the white gypsum sand dunes at White Sands National Monument, 17 minutes from us. Stroll down to Desert Lakes Golf Course, take a dip or work out in our fitness center. Enjoy hot breakfast and WiFi on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Ruidoso Downs
description: Our Ruidoso rooms are off Highway 70, five minutes from Ruidoso Downs Race Track, and Billy the Kid Casino. Grab free hot breakfast before teeing off at the Links at Sierra Blanca, 10 minutes away, or exploring our New Mexico scenery. A 30-minute drive will bring you Ski Apache day trips or to Sierra Blanca Regional Airport. There's dining nearby and WiFi is on us.

name: Hotel Andaluz Albuquerque, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: Once Albuquerque's tallest building, our hotel was the fourth by Conrad Hilton, built in 1939 with decor inspired by Spain's Andalusian region. We're in the heart of the city, one block from the convention center – and we have 7,000 square feet of meeting and event space. Relax at our rooftop bar and lounge.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Albuquerque
description: Find us blocks from the downtown area, connected to Albuquerque Convention Center by an underground concourse. We're less than two miles from the Old Town and ABQ BioPark, with Albuquerque International Sunport 10 minutes away via free shuttle. Enjoy our warm DoubleTree welcome cookie, seasonal outdoor pool, and coffeehouse.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Albuquerque/Downtown-University
description: With downtown Albuquerque just five minutes away and the University of New Mexico within walking distance, we're the perfect base whether you’re here for one day or one month. Fill up on free breakfast and wander the historic Old Town, see the area from new heights at Sandia Peak Tramway, or get your culture fix at nearby Petroglyph National Monument. WiFi is free and pets are welcome.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Albuquerque Airport
description: Getting here from the airport is a breeze on our free shuttle. Once you're here, enjoy easy access to University of New Mexico, Isotopes Park, Sandia National Labs, and Kirtland Airforce Base. Your suite includes a full kitchen, so you can enjoy the comforts of home away from home. Check out our evening social every Monday to Thursday – it's free, just like breakfast and WiFi.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Albuquerque Airport
description: Catch a flight at Albuquerque International Sunport with a half-mile ride on our free shuttle. The University of New Mexico's athletics complex and main campus are within 10 minutes, and Kirtland Air Force Base's front gate is four miles east. Cooked-to-order breakfast and dinner are served daily in our Garden Grille & Bar. Relax in our heated indoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Albuquerque Airport
description: We're off I-25, five minutes from Albuquerque International Sunport – our free shuttle covers the airport and rental car plaza. You'll be 10 minutes from the University of New Mexico, just east of downtown, and five minutes from the University Championship Golf Club. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our indoor pool and whirlpool.

name: Hampton Inn Albuquerque-University/Midtown
description: Find us off I-40, six minutes from The University of New Mexico and next door to tasty food at Green Jeans Farmery. Visit the New Mexico Museum of Natural History & Science, and historic Old Town, both just five miles away. Kirtland Air Force Base is 12 minutes from us. Take a dip in our outdoor pool. We’ve got WiFi and hot breakfast covered.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Albuquerque-Coors Road
description: Find us between I-40 and Coors Blvd., with a range of restaurants nearby. We're four miles from Old Town and downtown Albuquerque, and the University of New Mexico is 15 minutes away. The airport, Intel Corporation, and Lockheed Martin are a 20-minute drive, and Kirtland Air Force Base is 20 miles from our door. Enjoy free daily hot breakfast, WiFi, and our pool.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Albuquerque Uptown
description: Just off I-40, we’re walking distance from ABQ Uptown, Winrock Town Center, and Coronado Center. The University of New Mexico and Historic Old Town are within seven miles, and Albuquerque International Airport is only 15 minutes from our door. Our restaurant serves breakfast and dinner, and room service from 5 – 9 pm. Enjoy our indoor pool and waterslide.

name: Tru by Hilton Albuquerque North I-25
description: Just off I-25, we are near several business parks, @25 Shopping Center, and Cliff’s Amusement Park. Downtown is just 6 miles away, and the airport is less than 10 miles from us. Explore the natural beauty of New Mexico at Petroglyph National Monument or Sandia Crest, each within an hour’s drive.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Albuquerque Uptown
description: ABQ Uptown and Coronado shopping are walking distance, or take it easy with our free shuttle covering a three-mile radius. Old Town Albuquerque and ABQ BioPark are a short drive and Albuquerque Downs Racetrack is 10 minutes away. WiFi, breakfast, and our evening social, Monday – Thursday, are free. An in-suite kitchen is yours.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Albuquerque North/I-25
description: We're located off I-25 in north Albuquerque's business district, within walking distance of restaurants and Cliff’s Amusement Park. The University of New Mexico, Old Town Albuquerque, and the Indian Pueblo Cultural Center are six miles away. Try your luck at The Albuquerque Downs Racetrack & Casino, a 15-minute drive from our hotel. Breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Albuquerque-Journal Center
description: We’re just off the I-25, close to @25 and Fiesta del Norte Shopping Centers, restaurants, and Cliff’s Amusement Park. Old Town Albequerque is 15 minutes away and boasts the finest shopping and food in all of New Mexico, and it’s 20 minutes to the Petroglyph National Monument. Your stay includes a spacious suite with fully equipped kitchen, free WiFi, and daily free hot breakfast.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Albuquerque/Journal Center
description: We're off I-25, a mile from Journal Center business park. Take the kids to Cliff's Amusement Park, 10 minutes away. Downtown, the Old Town, and Rio Rancho are all within 20 minutes. Our Garden Grille restaurant and bar serves breakfast and dinner, with evening room service. The Pavilion Pantry is open 24 hours for drinks and snacks.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Artesia
description: We’re off Highway 82, just four minutes from downtown. Explore Native American artifacts just two miles away at the Historical Museum and Art Center. We’re less than 15 minutes from three major oil companies - Mack Energy Corporation, Halliburton, and EOG Resources. Start your day with our free hot breakfast, and stay connected with our free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Carlsbad
description: We’re near the middle of Carlsbad, with a choice of restaurants just a walk away. Roam the caves in Carlsbad Caverns National Park, a 20-minute drive away. The Pecos River is less than half a mile from the hotel, and Lake Carlsbad is 15 minutes away. Enjoy hot breakfast and WiFi on us.

name: Hampton Inn Deming, NM
description: We're just off I-10, 30 minutes from the Mexico border. Explore Deming Luna Mimbres Museum, only 2.5 miles away. New Mexico’s largest winery, St. Clair Winery & Vineyard, is a five-minute drive. Start your day with our free hot breakfast before exploring City of Rocks State Park, a half-hour away.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Farmington
description: Easy access to restaurants, outdoor activities, and world-class fly fishing on the San Juan River. Find natural beauty all around, including the spectacular San Juan Mountains. All rooms feature large enclosed closets, work areas, and a Hampton Cloud Nine Bed. Our indoor pool, spa, and fitness center are perfect for relaxation. Free WiFi and daily hot breakfast are included with your stay.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Farmington/ Bloomfield
description: We’re in the heart of the Farmington area with easy access to main arteries leading to businesses, shopping outlets, and restaurants. Of course, you can always show a little culinary flair of your own, with your fully equipped in-suite kitchen. WiFi and breakfast are on us – and pets are welcome.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Gallup
description: We're just off iconic Route 66, with easy access to I-40, and five minutes' drive from downtown. Shop and eat locally, or head to Fox Run Golf Course, 10 minutes away. Explore the natural wonders of the Ice Caves and Bandera Volcano, less than 90 minutes' drive. Afterwards, relax in our pool and fitness center and enjoy WiFi and hot breakfast on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Gallup
description: We're next to I-40, walking distance from stores, restaurants, and the Rio West Mall. Gallup Sports Complex, Veterans Park, and Ford Canyon Park are all within four miles. Play games at Fire Rock Navajo Casino nine miles east. Our meeting space is ideal for training seminars. Breakfast and dinner are served daily at our Garden Grille, with evening room service. WiFi's on us.

name: Hampton Inn Gallup-West
description: Located off I-40 on historic Route 66, we're five miles from downtown Gallup. Climb the wall at Mentmore Rock Climbing Area, or head downtown to see the Veterans’ Memorial and Downtown Mural Project. Visit El Moro National Monument and Petrified Forest National Park. Your stay includes a free hot breakfast, access to our fitness center, and free WiFi.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Hobbs
description: We’re one mile from New Mexico Junior College, the Western Heritage Museum, and the Lea Country Event Center, with eateries in walking distance. Zia Park Casino and the University of the Southwest are both within two miles. Enjoy our dining, evening room service, and 24-hour convenience shop.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Hobbs
description: Our Hobbs home is nestled in the business district, directly off N Lovington Highway. You’ll be steps from neighborhood dining, with New Mexico Junior College, Lea County Event Center, and Zia Park Casino adjacent. The University of the Southwest is just a mile from the door, and Halliburton Energy is even closer. Wake up to free hot breakfast, and enjoy WiFi on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Las Cruces I-10
description: We're just off I-10, two miles from the historic town of Old Mesilla, for leather and jewelry shops. New Mexico State University, the Zuhl Museum, and Dripping Springs Natural Area's hiking trails are less than 15 minutes from our door. Wake up to our free hot breakfast, and enjoy free WiFi and our indoor pool.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Las Cruces
description: We’re at the center of the action, just two miles from downtown Las Cruces and 25 minutes from the airport. Enjoy a free, hot breakfast before teeing off at Sonoma Ranch Golf Course, just four miles away, or hiking through Dripping Springs Natural Area. With outdoor gas grills and your own in-suite kitchen, dinner is easy. WiFi is free and we love pets.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Las Cruces I-25
description: We're just off I-25, three miles from New Mexico State University. Shop and eat at Mesilla Valley Mall, play a round of golf at local courses, or take a day trip to El Paso, 45 minutes away. Unwind in our fitness center and pool and stay connected with free WiFi. Daily hot breakfast is on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Las Cruces
description: We're off I-25, two miles from New Mexico State University, Mesilla Valley Mall, and the New Mexico Farm and Ranch Heritage Museum. Visit the shops and restaurants of Old Mesilla village, and explore Dripping Springs Natural Area, both within 20 minutes. Our Great American Grill serves breakfast, lunch, dinner, and evening room service.

name: Hampton Inn Lordsburg
description: In the middle of the Sonoran Desert, off I-10, we're close to historical sights and sites. Fuel up with our free hot breakfast before checking out Shakespeare Ghost Town. It’s less than three miles away where you can walk the Butterfield Trail and tour historic buildings. Up for a hike? Head 30 miles south to the Peloncillo Mountains.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Albuquerque North/Rio Rancho
description: Find us two miles from Cottonwood Mall and six miles from Balloon Fiesta Park – home of the annual hot air balloon festival. Sandia Peak Tramway and historic Old Town are 20 minutes from our hotel, and Albuquerque International Airport is within a half-hour. We have an outdoor pool, fitness center, 24-hour snack shop, and free WiFi.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Roswell, NM
description: Located off North Main Street, our new pet-friendly hotel is less than a mile from the New Mexico Military Institute, International UFO Museum and Research Center, and the Roswell Convention and Civic Center. Our spacious suites feature in-suite kitchens, and guests can enjoy our heated indoor pool and meeting space for up to 55 people.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Roswell
description: Our hotel is near Roswell’s famous International UFO Museum and Research Center. The Roswell Museum and Art Center, the New Mexico Military Institute, and the Bitter Lake National Wildlife Refuge are all less than 10 miles away, and we're 20 miles from Bottomless Lakes State Park. WiFi and hot breakfast are free.

name: Hilton Santa Fe Historic Plaza
description: Find us just over 300 yards from Santa Fe Plaza, the Georgia O’Keefe Museum, and the New Mexico Museum of Art. Housed in a 300-year-old hacienda, our historic hotel is also just half a mile from the Sweeney Convention Center. Featuring traditional Southwest décor and details throughout, there’s even a kiva fireplace next to our outdoor pool and hot tub.

name: Hampton Inn Santa Fe South
description: We are off State Highway 14 in Santa Fe, with Santa Fe Place Mall and Meow Wolf less than a mile away. Located between the airport and downtown plaza—both within six miles—our hotel is surrounded by local restaurants, shopping, and attractions. Stay in and get cozy by our fireplace. Free WiFi and breakfast are always included.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Santa Fe
description: Our hotel is on Cerrillos Road near I-25, five minutes from the Meow Wolf art experience. We're 15 minutes from downtown attractions including the Santa Fe Plaza and Georgia O'Keefe Museum. Relax on the adobe patio by the indoor-outdoor pool, and enjoy classic Southwestern cuisine at our restaurant and bar.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Santa Fe-North
description: Wake up to Jemez Mountain views in the front yard, and Towa Golf Course and Buffalo Thunder Resort steps away. Make the most of easy access to Nambé Falls and historic Santa Fe Plaza while you’re here. Kick the day off with free breakfast and finish it at our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday. Have a cozy meal in your in-suite kitchen. WiFi’s on us.

name: Hampton Inn Santa Rosa
description: We're right next to I-40 and Historic Route 66, within walking distance from American motor history at the Route 66 Auto Museum. Drive two miles to dive into in the famous Santa Rosa Blue Hole, a deep natural swimming hole with clear waters (or take a dip in our indoor pool). Enjoy free breakfast each morning, and stay connected with free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Taos
description: We're off US 68, down the street from the Taos Civic Plaza. Check out the latest collections at Harwood Museum of Art, or dive into frontier history at the Kit Carson Home and Museum, all three miles away. Or take a narrated tour of Taos – the shuttle picks up at our hotel. In season, you can catch a shuttle to Taos Ski Valley, too. Breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Watertown/Thousand Islands
description: We're across I-81 from the Salmon Run Mall. Watertown International Airport is six miles away, and it’s nine miles to Sackets Harbor on the shore of Lake Ontario. Our Great American Grill restaurant serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, with room service every evening. The Pavilion Pantry is open 24 hours for drinks and snacks.

name: Hampton Inn Watertown
description: Reach us from I-81, 10 minutes from Watertown International Airport. Hit the stores at Salmon Run Mall, a mile away, or check out Thompson Park Zoo’s wildlife, 15 minutes away. Fort Drum military post is 25 minutes from us. Grab free hot breakfast before exploring the Thousand Islands region at Alexandria Bay, half an hour away. WiFi’s on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Oswego
description: Located near the University of Oswego, we're close to shops, dining, and attractions. Soak up the sights at Lake Ontario or visit Oswego Speedway. Foodies can stock up on produce from Ontario Orchards then prepare a meal with the in-suite kitchen. Our combined fitness and laundry facility helps you multitask and you can fuel up for a busy day with a free hot breakfast each morning.

name: Millennium Times Square New York
description: Our hotel sits 16 stories above iconic Manhattan in the heart of Times Square. We're next to Broadway's Hudson Theatre, with a dedicated theatre desk for your ticket-buying needs. The Empire State Building is a 10-minute walk away, and we're within a block of several subway lines for NYC exploring. Every stay starts with a signature warm chocolate chip cookie.

name: Hilton Garden Inn New York/Times Square Central
description: We're three blocks from the Theater District and Times Square: some rooms have views of the ball drop on New Year’s. It’s a few steps to three subway stations, making it easy to get around. Our restaurant, Paul's on Times Square, serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, with evening room service. The 24-hour Pavilion Pantry offers drinks and snacks.

name: Hilton Times Square
description: Set in the heart of Times Square, our 44 stories soar above Manhattan’s skyline with panoramic views from our rooms and Zagat-rated restaurant. Step outside and you’ll be at the Empire State Building in 15 minutes. Broadway shows, Fifth Avenue shops, and Madison Square Garden are close by, and the 42nd Street station connects us to the rest of the city.

name: Hampton Inn Manhattan/Times Square Central
description: We're in Times Square, a 15-minute walk from Broadway musicals and 5th Avenue shopping. The Empire State Building and Rockefeller Center are under a mile away. Walk 10 minutes to Penn Station and Madison Square Garden, or take a nearby subway station to get around Manhattan. Enjoy Midtown views from our rooftop deck. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Times Square
description: Our hotel is minutes from Times Square, and within easy reach of Central Park, Broadway, the Rockefeller Center, and the Museum of Modern Art. The 50th Street subway station is less than a block away. Grab-and-go breakfast is available daily, and we have a fitness center, business center, and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Manhattan-Times Square North
description: We're a 10-minute walk to Times Square, Broadway, Rockefeller Center, Carnegie Hall, and Central Park. The subway a block away can take you to Penn Station, Madison Square Garden, and the World Trade Center. Restaurants line the blocks of Hell's Kitchen directly west. Enjoy our full-service concierge, free hot breakfast, and free WiFi.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel New York Times Square West
description: Views of the Hudson River await just 10 minutes from Times Square. Our hotel is a 15-minute walk from the Empire State Building, Javits Center, and Broadway shows. We're next to the Port Authority terminal and steps from multiple subway lines. Enjoy live music with clear city views at our rooftop bar. Every stay starts with our signature chocolate chip cookie.

name: Hampton Inn Manhattan/Times Square South
description: Discover Times Square's world-famous shopping and dining on our doorstep. The Port Authority bus terminal and Penn Station are within a half-mile. The Javits Center, Madison Square Garden, and Central Park are less than two miles away. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and access to our fitness and business centers.

name: The Residences by Hilton Club
description: In the heart of Manhattan, our studios and suites are on floors 44 – 46 of New York Hilton Midtown. Within a half-mile, reach Central Park, Times Square, and Carnegie Hall. We offer park views, in-room spa services, a fitness center, and an owners’ lounge. Perks include private check-in on the 44th floor and charge privileges.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton New York Manhattan Times Square
description: Our 39-story hotel is surrounded by New York shops and sights, with stunning skyline views. Times Square, Broadway musicals, Madison Square Garden, and the Empire State Building are a 10-minute walk away. We're half a mile from Grand Central Terminal and Penn Station. Enjoy our SkyLawn terrace lounge and bar (seasonal) and join us for our complimentary evening reception.

name: Conrad New York Midtown
description: Our luxury hotel is blocks from Central Park, Times Square, and Carnegie Hall. We feature a loved-by-locals gourmet restaurant, a world-class art collection, penthouse suites with Central Park views, and a fitness center. Our dedicated concierge team will help you discover the city’s top attractions and hidden local gems.

name: Hilton Garden Inn New York/Central Park South-Midtown West
description: Our Midtown hotel is a 10 minute walk from Times Square, Central Park, Carnegie Hall, and musicals on Broadway. Rockefeller Center and 5th Avenue shopping are a half-mile away, and we’re three blocks from the 57th Street Subway Station. Breakfast, lunch, and dinner are served daily at our Empire Steak House. We have a fitness center available and WiFi's on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn New York Times Square South
description: In Midtown Manhattan, we’re two blocks from the Jacob K. Javits Convention Center and the Lincoln Tunnel. Penn Station and the Empire State Building are four blocks away. We're a mile from Times Square and the Theater District, and less than 10 miles from La Guardia Airport. Our Doylers restaurant serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner.

name: Hilton Garden Inn New York/West 35th Street
description: We’re in Midtown Manhattan, under a mile from Herald Square, the Empire State Building, and Times Square. Madison Square Garden and Macy’s are five minutes from our door, and we’re two miles from Hudson Yards and the Javits Center. Enjoy Grab-and-Go or sit-down breakfast, our lobby bar, and 24/7 fitness center. WiFi’s on us.

name: Hampton Inn Manhattan-35th St/Empire State Bldg
description: We’re moments from the Empire State Building, Times Square, Broadway, Macy’s, and Penn Station. Explore the rest of Manhattan from Herald Square subway station, just steps from the hotel. LaGuardia Airport is a 20-minute drive and JFK Airport is a half-hour away. We’ve got free WiFi, daily hot breakfast, and a fitness center.

name: West 57th Street by Hilton Club
description: Find us next door to Carnegie Hall, blocks from 5th Avenue, Central Park, and dozens of restaurants. Broadway, Times Square, Lincoln Center, and Columbus Circle are within one mile. Our hotel has a fitness center, concierge services to tailor your NYC experience, and suites with floor-to-ceiling windows. We're 17 miles from JFK Airport.

name: Hampton Inn Corning/Painted Post
description: Just off I-99, we’re only three miles from the unique shops, live music, and restaurants of the Gaffer District. Explore the extensive American art collection at Rockwell Museum of Western Art, less than 10 minutes away. Or catch a movie at the Palace Theater. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Corning Downtown
description: Our hotel is adjacent to Corning Museum of Glass and walking distance from downtown via Chemung River footbridge. Downtown's Gaffer District boasts Market Street dining and shopping, and historic sites such as the Corning Clock Tower and the Rockwell Museum. Enjoy our heated indoor pool, fitness center, restaurant, and bar.

name: Hampton Inn Elmira/Horseheads
description: Find us off I-86 in the scenic Finger Lakes region. We're a quick walk from movies and shopping at Arnot Mall and seven minutes from Elmira/Corning Regional Airport. A 12-minute drive will take you to the National Soaring Museum and Mark Twain Golf Course. Relax in our indoor pool and whirlpool. Every stay includes WiFi and daily hot breakfast.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Elmira/Corning
description: Off I-86, we're across the street from Arnot Mall and five minutes from Elmira/Corning Regional Airport. Elmira and the Corning Museum of Glass are both 15 minutes away, and we're 25 minutes from Watkins Glen State Park. Reach Finger Lakes wineries within an hour. We have an indoor pool, event space for 150 guests, and free WiFi.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Binghamton
description: Every stay at our hotel in downtown Binghamton starts with one of our signature warm chocolate chip cookies. We provide a free five-mile shuttle covering Binghamton University, and Animal Adventure Park is a 20-minute drive. Take advantage of our 5,000 sq. ft. Riverwalk Athletic Club with full-sized saltwater indoor pool, and a whirlpool.

name: Hampton Inn Binghamton/Johnson City
description: With Binghamton Zoo, Oakdale Mall, and craft breweries nearby, there's something for everyone around here. A short drive will take you to the Binghamton University campus, Cider Mill Playhouse, or the En-Joie Golf Club. Breakfast and WiFi are free, as is our heated indoor pool – ideal for relaxing after visiting the largest Herschell carousel in the world.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Binghamton/Vestal
description: We're five minutes from Binghamton University and its nature preserve. Take the scenic route into Vestal center via the Vestal Trail, five minutes away, or head into Binghamton for Phelps Mansion Museum and Otsiningo Park, 10 minutes away. Our free shuttle runs to Greater Binghamton Airport and within a three-mile radius. Free hot breakfast and WiFi are yours.

name: Tru by Hilton Vestal
description: Find us off NY 434, a mile from Binghamton University and Vestal's choice of restaurants. Downtown Binghamton, Roberson Museum and Science Center, and Recreation Park are a 10-minute drive. Great Binghamton Airport is 12 miles away. Enjoy free daily breakfast and our 24-hour fitness center. Parking and WiFi are on us.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Binghamton/Vestal, NY
description: Just off Route 17, our hotel is only a half mile from the Binghamton University campus. Downtown Binghamton offers a wealth of shops and restaurants, and the Roberson Science Center, Binghamton Zoo, and Cider Mill Playhouse are all nearby. During your stay you can enjoy spacious suites featuring fully equipped kitchens, living, and dining areas. Breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Hampton Inn Oneonta
description: We're off I-88, a half-hour from the National Baseball Hall of Fame, Cooperstown, and SUNY Delhi. SUNY Oneonta and Hartwick College are a 10-minute drive away, and Main Street's restaurants and shops are within five minutes. We've got free WiFi, daily hot breakfast, an indoor pool, and fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn Nanuet
description: We're off I-87, moments from Route 59 restaurants and shops. Ten minutes away, find Palisades Center mall, or head 22 miles to the Woodbury Commons outlets. New York City is half an hour's drive from our hotel. We've got a fitness center and heated indoor pool, and WiFi and daily hot breakfast are free.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Nanuet
description: Off I-87 and I-287, we’re walking distance from restaurants and under a mile from The Shops at Nanuet. The Palisades Center - one of America’s largest malls - is four miles east. Bear Mountain State Park and Woodbury Commons Premium Outlets are a half-hour away, and NYC is just as close. We have an indoor pool, fitness center, and restaurant.

name: Hilton Pearl River
description: Our award-winning Rockland County hotel sits on 17 picturesque acres overlooking the Blue Hill Golf Course. Relax in the whirlpool and sauna, and enjoy Hudson River Valley views and local art in your room. Our location off the Palisades Parkway is easy to reach from New Jersey and Connecticut, with New York City 30 miles away.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Williamsville Buffalo Airport
description: Hitch a ride on our free 24-hour airport shuttle and you’ll be with us in no time. Jump in the car for a day at Niagara Falls and journeys across the Canadian border. Leave the car behind and tour some esteemed New York wineries. WiFi and breakfast are on us, or create your own sleep-eyed morning masterpiece in your in-suite kitchen. Pets are welcome.

name: Hampton Inn Lockport - Buffalo
description: We're located off I-90, six minutes from Lockport Industrial Park. Take a cruise through Lockport Locks and Erie Canal, or tour Lockport Cave, both within nine minutes. A short distance away you can test flavors at The Niagara Wine Trail. Niagara Falls is 30 minutes away. Enjoy a hot breakfast with us before you head out - it’s free.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Buffalo Airport
description: We're across the street from Buffalo Niagara International Airport, and our free shuttle will take you anywhere in a five-mile radius. The Buffalo Zoo and the University of Buffalo are less than eight miles away. We can host up to 300 guests in our event space. Enjoy breakfast and dinner in the Garden Grille & Bar, room service, and access to our large pool and 24-hour fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn Buffalo-Williamsville
description: Looking for a peaceful hotel? You’ve found the right place. The historic village of Williamsville hosts a variety of shops and restaurants within walking distance. Enjoy our central location to Buffalo Airport, Amherst, and downtown Buffalo. Fuel up each morning with a free hot breakfast or unwind in the indoor pool, whirlpool, and fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Buffalo Airport
description: Buffalo Niagara International Airport is across the street, a free shuttle ride away. It's 23 miles to Niagara Falls and 10 miles to downtown Buffalo attractions like the KeyBank Center. Visit the Buffalo Zoo seven miles east, and shop 'til you drop at Walden Galleria, 10 minutes away. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our indoor heated saltwater pool.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Buffalo-Airport
description: We're off I-90, two miles from Walden Galleria Mall and Buffalo Niagara International Airport – ask for our free airport shuttle. Downtown Buffalo businesses, Erie County Medical Center, and KeyBank Center are within 20 minutes. Enjoy your in-suite kitchen and our complimentary evening social, Monday – Wednesday. Daily breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Buffalo Airport/Galleria Mall
description: We’re off I-90, less than a mile from Walden Galleria mall. Our 24-hour shuttle covers a 1.5-mile radius, including the airport and Depew Train Station. Downtown Buffalo is 15 minutes away and we’re 25 miles from Niagara Falls. Enjoy our relaxing outdoor patios and your in-suite kitchen. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us. Pets are welcome.

name: Hampton Inn Buffalo-Airport/Galleria Mall
description: Located off I-90, we offer a free shuttle to the Walden Galleria Mall across the street, Buffalo Niagara International Airport, and nearby restaurants. Downtown Buffalo is less than 10 miles away and it's a half-hour drive to Niagara Falls. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our indoor heated saltwater pool.

name: Hampton Inn Batavia
description: Our hotel is just off I-90, four minutes from United Memorial Medical Center. Tee off at Terry Hills, 10 minutes away. Start your day with our free hot breakfast before a day at Darien Lake State Park or experiencing Jell-O history at the Jell-O Gallery, less than a half-hour from our door. Enjoy free WiFi and our heated indoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn Buffalo - Amherst
description: We're located east of the I-290 and I-990 intersection at the Northtown Center Amherst. The University at Buffalo North campus is within walking distance. Audobon Town Park, Ellicott Creek Trailways, and Amherst Audobon Golf Course are within two miles. Take a one-mile trip to Lake La Salle. Our hotel holds a isUD certification and features two outdoor patios and a fire pit.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Buffalo - Amherst
description: Our hotel is off I-290, less than a mile from the State University of New York at Buffalo campus. We're within 20 miles of downtown Buffalo and the Niagara Falls, and the airport is a 20-minute shuttle ride away. Enjoy a warm DoubleTree cookie  when you arrive, and our evening reception every Tuesday and Wednesday.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Buffalo-Amherst
description: Off I-290, the University of Buffalo is one mile away and we’re two miles from Boulevard Mall. Northtown Center is a four-minute drive for year-round sporting events. Walden Galleria is seven miles south and we’re 20 minutes from The Fashion Outlets of Niagara Falls. Enjoy our complimentary evening social, Monday – Wednesday. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Amherst Buffalo
description: We're next to I-290 at the edge of Amherst's retail district, one mile north of the Boulevard Mall. It's less than a 10-minute drive to University at Buffalo campus. You can reach Buffalo Niagara International Airport in nine miles and it's an 18-mile trip to Niagara Falls. Enjoy free breakfast. We're pet-friendly!

name: Hampton Inn Buffalo South/I-90
description: We’re off I-90, about six miles from downtown. Explore the Our Lady of Victory Basilica, just two miles away, and the Buffalo Botanical Gardens next to it. Watch the Buffalo Bills play at New Era Field, 10 minutes away. The business parks of Orchard Park are also 10 minutes away. Relax in our heated indoor pool and whirlpool.
