Hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Hilton Albany
description: Our hotel is in the Capital District of downtown Albany, a five-minute walk from Times Union Square. Take in views of the Hudson River and New York State Capitol from your room, and enjoy our indoor pool and whirlpool. Our free shuttle will take you anywhere in a three-mile radius, including Albany Airport and the Amtrak station.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Albany-Downtown
description: We're off I-787, steps from the Palace Theatre. It's 10 minutes' walk to The Egg theater and Times Union Center. The SUNY Albany campus, Empire State Plaza, and the State Capitol are less than a mile from our door, and Lark Street boutiques are three minutes' drive away. Enjoy meals at our two restaurants. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Albany Medical Center
description: We're connected to Albany Medical Center. Sage College of Albany is a half-mile from us, and downtown Albany and Jennings Landing along the Hudson River are two miles away. Book our free shuttle to/from the airport, Amtrak, or bus station. Our Garden Grille & Bar serves cooked-to-order breakfast, and Recovery Sports Grill has lunch and dinner covered.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Albany-East Greenbush
description: We're just off I-90, six miles from New York State Capitol and New York State Museum, and 12 minutes' drive from the University of Albany. Grafton Lakes State Park, 32 minutes' drive, is great for hikes, bikes and fishing, or head to the Colonie Center for shops and dining. Unwind in our pool and enjoy daily hot breakfast, and WiFi on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Albany/SUNY Area
description: Off I-90, along Washington Ave., we're steps from the State University of New York – Albany campus. Harriman State Office complex is less than two miles away. We're within six miles of downtown Albany's State Capitol, events at the Egg, and Albany International Airport. Enjoy our fitness center and heated indoor pool and whirlpool.

name: Hampton Inn Albany-Western Ave/University Area
description: Find us off I-87, less than a mile from Stuyvesant Plaza and the University at Albany, SUNY. Shop at Crossgates Mall or visit SUNY Polytechnic Institute – both within two miles. An 11-minute drive will take you to Albany International Airport. Relax in our indoor pool and work out in our fitness center. We’ve got hot breakfast and WiFi covered.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Albany Airport/Wolf Rd
description: We're five minutes from Albany International Airport and a short walk from the stores of Colonie Center and Wolf Road Shopping Park. Dine your way around local restaurants or head to The Times Union Center, a 17-minute drive away, and Saratoga Performing Arts Center, a 32-minute drive away. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Albany-Wolf Road (Airport)
description: Our leafy location is just one-and-a-half miles from the airport. Free hot breakfast, WiFi, and seven-day airport shuttle make your stay hassle-free. When it’s time to explore, we’re one mile from Colonie Center Mall and six miles from historic downtown and the New York State Capitol.

name: Tru by Hilton Albany Crossgates Mall
description: Find us steps from premium shopping, entertainment, and more than 20 dining options at Crossgates. Enjoy exclusive discounts and our Shop & Drop delivery service – we'll bring your shopping bags right to the hotel. The country's first dual-branded Tru and Homewood Suites, our hotel features a pool and fitness center, and free breakfast and WiFi.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Albany Crossgates Mall
description: Steps from Crossgates, our hotel puts premium shopping, entertainment, and more than 20 dining options at your fingertips – with exclusive discounts for our guests. Spacious suites have ample space for shopping bags, and our Shop & Drop delivery service will bring them right to you. Join us for free hot breakfast and our Monday – Thursday evening social.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Albany
description: Take a short drive to downtown Albany, great for family days at Huck Finn’s Playland and basketball at Times Union Center. Hop on our free shuttle for shopping and dining at Stuyvesant Plaza, Crossgates Mall, and Colonie Center. Enjoy quiet nights with your in-suite kitchen or at our evening social, Monday – Thursday. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Tru by Hilton Albany Airport
description: We're a mile west of the airport – our 24-hour shuttle has your rides covered. I-87 is nearby for easy trips to Colonie Center shops and the University at Albany. Downtown is 20 minutes from us, home to parks, state government offices, the USS Slater, and entertainment along the Hudson River. Keep the fun going with our foosball table and indoor pool. Breakfast's on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Albany Airport
description: We're next to Albany International Airport and offer a free shuttle both ways. A 20-minute drive takes you to Albany or Troy, for parks, restaurants, and cultural attractions. Our Garden Grille & Bar serves breakfast and dinner, with room service every evening. The Pavilion Pantry is open 24 hours for drinks and snacks.

name: Hampton Inn Brockport
description: Our hotel in Brockport is a few steps from Main Street. Stroll along the Erie Canal and check out shops and restaurants, or visit the SUNY Brockport campus. It's less than half an hour to hiking, boating, and fishing at Hamlin Beach State Park on the shore of Lake Ontario. Greater Rochester Airport is 20 minutes away. Fuel up for the day with free hot breakfast. WiFi's on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Rochester Greece
description: Find us off I-390, within six miles of Rochester attractions like The Strong Museum, shopping at Stoneridge Plaza, and Rochester International Airport. Rochester Institute of Technology and the headquarters of Xerox and Paychex are less than 15 minutes away. Each suite features a kitchen, and free hot breakfast is served daily.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Rochester/Greece, NY
description: Our suites are seven miles from Greater Rochester International Airport and near corporate offices including IBM, Kodak and Carestream. For some fun, check the listings for RBTL’s Auditorium Theatre or catch feeding time at Seneca Park Zoo. Stop by our free evening social, Monday – Thursday, and make the most of your in-suite kitchen. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Rochester-Greece
description: History is our story: we’re near Rochester Museum and Science Center, National Museum of Play, the Strong Museum, Strasenburgh Planetarium and more. WiFi is on us; fill up on free breakfast before touring the Finger Lakes’ vineyards. Practice your swing at Lakeshore and Braemar Country Clubs or Buttonwood Golf Course – maybe do that before the vineyards, though…

name: Hilton Garden Inn Rochester/University & Medical Center
description: Find us in College Town, less than a mile from the University of Rochester and next to Strong Memorial Hospital. Greater Rochester International airport is 10 minutes away via free shuttle – also covering the university and medical center. Our restaurant offers all-day dining, and we have an indoor pool and fitness center.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Rochester/Henrietta
description: Wind down in one of our spacious suites featuring a fully equipped kitchen including a full-sized fridge, dishwasher, and coffee maker. WiFi and a hot breakfast are included in your stay. The surrounding area boasts fun activities from horseback riding to sampling wines at Casa Larga vineyards. Try your hand at snow skiing or visit Seabreeze Amusement Park for some roller coaster action.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Rochester/Henrietta
description: We're off I-390, with restaurants and Marketplace Mall just down the street. The University of Rochester and the Rochester Institute of Technology are both within three miles. It's 10 minutes to Greater Rochester Airport – we offer a free shuttle both ways. Downtown Rochester is six miles away. Relax in our indoor pool. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Hampton Inn East Aurora
description: We're right off Route 16 close to US Highway 20A, just a block from the boutiques and restaurants of Main Street. Hockey games at the Keybank Center and other Buffalo attractions are 20 minutes away. Wake up to our free hot breakfast, and unwind in our pool and fitness center. WiFi is on us.

name: Hampton Inn Owego
description: Near the banks of the Susquehanna River, we're a five-minute drive from historic downtown Owego and less than a mile from Hickories Park. Board vintage trains for a ride through the Newark Valley on the Tioga Scenic Railroad, just two miles away. Fill up on free hot breakfast daily and enjoy our indoor pool and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Ithaca
description: Whether you’re traveling through the area, visiting the kids at college, or here on a business trip, we're the smart choice for your stay in Ithaca. Your stay includes free WiFi and a daily breakfast, plus access to the pool, gym, and business center. In your free time, explore everything the local area has to offer including Finger Lakes, Buttermilk Falls, shops, and entertainment facilities.

name: Hampton Inn Geneseo
description: Discover a quiet place among the Finger Lakes, five minutes from the State University of New York Geneseo. Neighborhood shopping and dining is within five minutes of the door, or strike out into Letchworth State Park, half an hour away via I-390. Enjoy free WiFi, free hot breakfast, fitness center access, and an indoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Plattsburgh
description: Find us off State Route 3, near the shores of Lake Champlain in the shadow of the Adirondack Mountains. Shopping and dining at Champlaign Centre are five minutes from our front door, and SUNY Plattsburg is two miles away. Enjoy free daily hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our fitness center and indoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn Syracuse Clay
description: We’re off Highway 31, about seven miles from the center of Liverpool and 12 miles from Syracuse. Hit the shops at the six-story Destiny USA mall, less than 20 minutes away, and get some fresh air in Onondaga Lake Park. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our indoor pool.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Syracuse - Carrier Circle
description: We’re just off NSU Thruway I-90, 10 miles from Syracuse Hancock International Airport. You’ll be 15 minutes from Syracuse University, games at Carrier Dome, and Destiny USA entertainment. Tour local restaurants with our free shuttle, or cook for yourself in your in-suite kitchen. Unwind at our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Syracuse
description: We're in Pioneer Office Park, off I-90. Syracuse Hancock International Airport, Syracuse University, the Destiny USA mall, and downtown are all about 15 minutes away. Relax in our pool with whirlpool. Our Garden Grille restaurant is open for breakfast; the Wild Goose Pub serves lunch, dinner, and evening room service. The 24-hour Pavilion Pantry offers drinks and snacks.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Syracuse
description: Reach us from I-90, 15 minutes from Syracuse Hancock International Airport. Our rooms are less than seven miles from downtown Syracuse attractions, such as Erie Canal Museum, and we're a half-hour drive from the Finger Lakes region. Enjoy made-to-order breakfast, complimentary evening receptions, and fitness center access.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Syracuse/Carrier Circle
description: We're just off I-90, minutes from I-690 and I-481, 10 minutes' drive from Syracuse University. Destiny USA for shopping and baseball games at Carrier Dome, are both 13 minutes from our door. Hancock International Airport is seven miles. Wake up to our free hot breakfast, and relax in our indoor saltwater pool. WiFi and parking on us.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Syracuse
description: Just off I-90 in east Syracuse, we're within 15 minutes of Destiny USA shopping, Syracuse University, and the famous Dinosaur Bar-B-Que. We'll pick you up from Syracuse Hancock International Airport in our free shuttle — it's a six-mile ride from our hotel. Relax by the heated indoor pool and on your room's private balcony.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Syracuse North Airport Area
description: Find us off I-90, six minutes from Destiny USA Mall and four miles from shopping and dining at Armory Square. Our free shuttle will handle your transportation to Syracuse Hancock International Airport – just eight minutes away. Syracuse University is five miles from our door. Every stay with us includes free WiFi and free hot breakfast.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Syracuse/Liverpool
description: Find us just off I-81 and NYS Thruway/I-90, four miles from downtown Syracuse. You’ll be five miles from Syracuse Hancock International Airport, near Lockheed Martin and local business. Hop aboard our free shuttle, covering the airport and a general three-mile radius. WiFi, breakfast and our evening social, Monday – Thursday, are on us. Enjoy your in-suite kitchen.

name: Tru by Hilton Syracuse North Airport Area
description: Just minutes from the downtown area, and near the airport, we’re ideally positioned for exploring the attractions of Syracuse. See who’s headlining at the Lakeview Amphitheater, explore Destiny USA Entertainment Complex or take a stroll through Onondaga Lake Park. Relax, WiFi and build-your-own breakfast are on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Syracuse Dewitt
description: Find us off I-690, with many shops and restaurants a short walk away. We’re a mile from Le Moyne College and three miles from Syracuse University. It’s 10 minutes to shopping and dining at Armory Square. Green Lakes State Park is seven miles away, ideal for a morning stroll after our free hot breakfast. Enjoy free WiFi and our indoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn Verona
description: We’re just off Route 365, next to Turning Stone Casino. Our 24-hour complimentary shuttle will take you there and back. There’s a wide choice of restaurants within half a mile. Griffiss Business & Technology Park is a 20-minute drive. We have a heated indoor pool and fitness center. WiFi and buffet breakfast are on us.

name: Tru by Hilton Syracuse-Camillus
description: Live it up at Tru by Hilton Syracuse-Camillus, set amid restaurants, shops and fun at Township 5. Our hotel is within 10 miles of the NYS Fairgrounds, Lakeview Amphitheater, Syracuse University, Carrier Dome and SRC Arena. Say ‘yay’ to mornings with our free ‘Top It’ breakfast bar and play around in our unique indoor sport court.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Poughkeepsie
description: Nestled in the Hudson Valley, home is six miles from Walkway Over the Hudson State Historic Park. We're 10 miles from the Franklin D. Roosevelt Library and a short drive from Miller House and Blue Collar Breweries. After drinking in the culture, stop by our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday, or do some in-suite cooking. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Poughkeepsie
description: We're right off US Highway 9, five minutes from the offices of IBM, and two miles from Galleria Mall. The Culinary Institute of America and the Walkway Over the Hudson State Historic Park are within 15 minutes' drive. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, free WiFi and parking, and our indoor pool and fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn Kingston
description: Our hotel is near I-87, two miles from the Hudson River. The Hudson Valley Mall is across Route 9W, with shops and dining within walking distance. Downtown is four miles away. Spend some family time at the Dutchess County Fairgrounds, seven miles away. Unwind in our indoor saltwater pool. Hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Hampton Inn by Hilton New Paltz
description: Off I-87, we're five minutes from State University of New York – New Paltz. You'll be within a half-mile of local quick bites and shopping. Central New Paltz is five minutes away, where you can join the Wallkill Valley Rail Trail for scenic hikes. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, our 24-hour fitness center and heated indoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn Fishkill
description: You'll find us just off I-84, within walking distance of local restaurants. Wake up to our free hot breakfast, then stroll to shops at Hudson Valley Towne Center. The Franklin D. Roosevelt Presidential Library and Museum, and Benmarl Winery, are within 30 minutes' drive. Return to relax in our indoor pool and fitness center, and enjoy WiFi and parking on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Poughkeepsie/Fishkill
description: We're just off I-84, 12 miles south of Vassar College, 6 miles to Beacon train station, and within walking distance of restaurants and a movie theater. Make use of our free WiFi, heated indoor pool, whirlpool, and fitness center. Our Garden Grille & Bar serves breakfast and dinner, and the Pavilion Pantry is open 24/7.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Newburgh Stewart Airport
description: We’re off I-87, close to I-84 with several restaurants nearby. Stewart International Airport is four miles away, and our free shuttle will pick you up. West Point Military Academy is half an hour away. Relax on our patio and take a dip in our heated indoor pool. Hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Newburgh-Stewart Airport
description: We're less than a mile from New York Stewart International Airport. Explore nature at Stewart State Forest, Schunnemunk Mountain and Storm King state parks, all minutes away. Pay a visit to Brotherhood Winery (America’s oldest) before joining our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday. WiFi and breakfast are on us, or start the day your way in your in-suite kitchen.

name: Hotel Henry Buffalo, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: We are within three miles of Delaware Park, the Buffalo Zoo, and Frank Lloyd Wright’s Martin House. Downtown Buffalo, the convention center, and a variety of dining options are within 10 minutes. Buffalo Niagara International Airport and Niagara Falls are about 20 minutes away. Our hotel features unique architecture, ample meeting space, and elegant rooms.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Buffalo Downtown
description: Just off I-90, our Buffalo hotel is in the heart of the action. We have five restaurants onsite and we’re two blocks from a free downtown train, the NFTA metro. The historic Shea’s Buffalo Theatre is a short walk away and we’re eight minutes from KeyBank Center and Canalside for sports and entertainment. Enjoy daily hot breakfast and WiFi on us.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Buffalo
description: Part of the iconic Avant Building, our downtown hotel is walking distance from Buffalo's waterfront. We're three blocks from the complimentary light rail, offering easy city exploration, and Niagara Falls is a half-hour drive away. We have a scheduled shuttle covering the airport, free made-to-order breakfast, and a complimentary evening reception.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Buffalo Downtown
description: The Niagara Convention Center, City Hall, and a variety of dining options are within half a mile. We offer free shuttles to the airport and destinations within three miles, including Shea's Buffalo Theatre, the KeyBank Center, and the medical district. Breakfast, lunch, and dinner are served daily in our Garden Grille & Bar. Enjoy our indoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn Buffalo-Hamburg
description: Located off I-90, we're seven minutes from downtown Hamburg and 20 minutes from Buffalo. Stroll the sands of Woodlawn Beach State Park on the shores of Lake Erie, four miles away. Enjoy events at Hamburg Fairgrounds or see a Buffalo Bills game at New Era Field, both a 10-minute drive. WiFi and daily hot breakfast are free.

name: Hilton Long Island/Huntington
description: Off Route 110, we're five minutes south of the Long Island Expressway route between New York City and the Hamptons. The neighborhood offers local bites, and our free weekday shuttle covers offices within a five-mile radius. Relax with our 24-hour fitness center, a heated indoor pool, and an outdoor pool bordered by trees and sports courts.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Melville
description: We're off I-495 in Plainview, two miles from downtown Melville. Ride our free shuttle to corporations within a five mile radius. Farmingdale State College, Adventureland, and golfing at Bethpage State Park are 10 minutes from our door. Enjoy breakfast and dinner in our Great American Grill. We have an indoor pool and WiFi’s on us.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Long Island-Melville
description: Reach us from I-495/Long Island Expressway, five minutes from Melville center. We're within four miles of White Post Farms, Adventureland, and Bethpage State Park and Golf Course, with Republic Airport six miles away. Stop by our evening social, Monday – Thursday, and enjoy free breakfast, an in-suite kitchen, and our indoor pool.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Westbury
description: We’re next to Eisenhower Park, about three miles from Nassau University Medical Center. Westbury LIRR train station is under a mile away, then it’s 35 minutes to JFK Airport and 45 minutes to Penn Station. Our restaurant serves breakfast and dinner, with evening room service. We have an indoor pool and fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn Garden City Long Island
description: We're off Meadowbrook State Parkway, adjacent to Roosevelt Field Mall. Carle Place Long Island Rail Station is five minutes away, running to Penn Station in Midtown Manhattan. Our hotel is within 15 minutes of Hofstra and Adelphi Universities and half an hour from Jones Beach Island. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our fitness room.

name: Hampton Inn Long Island/Commack
description: We're off I-495, a short walk from local dining and less than a mile from Commack South Shopping Center. Central Commack is 10 minutes from our door. Our free shuttle covers Deer Park LIRR Stations, 10 minutes away, and Long Island MacArthur Airport, 12 miles from our door. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, our fitness center, and free parking. WiFi’s on us.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Carle Place - Garden City, NY
description: We're located in Carle Place, 10 minutes from Garden City. Enjoy race day at Belmont Park, or events at Nassau Coliseum, both less than 15 minutes away. Arriving by car? The parking’s free, just like our WiFi. Start the day with free hot breakfast and end it at our complimentary evening social, Monday to Thursday.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Rockville Centre
description: We're off Route 27, 10 miles from JFK Airport and less than a mile from the Long Island Rail Road into New York City. Jones Beach State Park is a 20-minute drive, and there's a dozen restaurants within a few blocks of the hotel. Free WiFi, hot breakfast, and fitness center access are all included with your stay.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Roslyn
description: Our hotel is in the Harbor View office park, less than a mile from downtown. We offer a free shuttle service to and from destinations within five miles, including Harbor Links and the New York Institute of Technology. Our restaurant serves cooked-to-order breakfast and dinner daily, and snacks are available 24 hours in the Pavilion Pantry.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Schenectady
description: Minutes from Rivers Casino, shows at Proctor’s Theater, and family trips to VIA Aquarium, Schenectady leisure is yours. Wake up to free breakfast and views of the Mohawk River before day trips to Saratoga Racetrack or Howe Caverns. WiFi and our evening social, Monday – Thursday, are on us. If you feel like a home-cooked meal, try your in-suite kitchen.

name: Hampton Inn Schenectady
description: We’re off I-890 in Schenectady, right next to the historic Proctor's Theatre. Our downtown location offers easy access to local restaurants and coffeeshops, and Union College and Siemens are within one mile of the hotel. Albany International Airport is a 20-minute drive. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our indoor pool.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Schenectady
description: We're at the edge of downtown Schenectady, less than half a mile from Union College. Proctor's Theater and many local cafes and bars are within a 10-minute walk. We're a 5-minute drive from the GE Power complex. Relax in our indoor pool and enjoy our 24-hour fitness center.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Saratoga Malta
description: See if Lady Luck is in town at Saratoga racetrack and the Saratoga Casino Hotel. Fill up on free breakfast before exploring downtown Saratoga or looking to the past at local museums. Wind down with a flick at Malta Drive-In or with a meal at one of many local restaurants. For a quieter night, try your in-suite kitchen. WiFi is free and pets are welcome.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Clifton Park
description: Just off I-87 and only eight miles from Albany International Airport, we're 20 minutes from downtown Saratoga Springs. Our one- and two-bedroom and studio suites are ideal for everyone, from solo travelers on long work assignments, or families who need a little extra space. Enjoy free hot breakfast daily and our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Clifton Park
description: Off I-87, we're part of the Clifton Park Center, which has shops, dining and a movie theater. Take a stroll in the Vischer Ferry Nature & Historic Preserve, seven miles away. It's 12 miles to Albany International Airport. The Diamond Club Grill serves breakfast and dinner. The Pavilion Pantry is open 24 hours for drinks and snacks.

name: Hampton Inn Clifton Park
description: We're just off I-87, 15 minutes from Albany International Airport. Each day starts with free hot breakfast, and we've got a variety of restaurants, shops, and entertainment nearby. Our hotel is 20 minutes from Saratoga Springs and the Saratoga Race Course. Enjoy free WiFi and our fitness center and indoor pool.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Saratoga Springs
description: Our hotel is across from Saratoga Spa State Park and five minutes from downtown attractions, including the Saratoga Race Course and Casino. Our location off I-87 puts New York destinations like Lake George in easy reach. Enjoy meals in your in-suite kitchen and join us for free breakfast and our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Albany-Airport
description: We're right in the British American Airport Park, and our free shuttle will take you to Albany Airport, two miles away. Many major firms are nearby, including Siemens Industry Inc., within walking distance, and GE Global Research, six miles away. Shop and eat at Colonie Center Mall, five miles away, and enjoy daily hot breakfast and WiFi on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Saratoga Springs
description: The Saratoga Performing Arts Center, Saratoga Casino, and Saratoga Race Course are just over one mile from our hotel along US-9. It's two miles to Skidmore College. Many dining options can be found in a half-mile radius, and we serve cooked-to-order breakfast and dinner daily in our Garden Grille & Bar. Enjoy our indoor pool and free WiFi.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Saratoga Springs
description: Find us in the heart of Saratoga Springs, within walking distance of Broadway, Congress Park, and Canfield Casino. The Saratoga Race Course and the National Museum of Dance & Hall of Fame are within a 10-minute drive. A free cooked-to-order breakfast, complimentary evening reception, and an award-winning restaurant complete your stay.

name: The Saratoga Hilton
description: We’re on Broadway in downtown Saratoga Springs, a short walk from shops, restaurants, and the free summer trolley. Saratoga Race Course and Saratoga Spa State Park – a National Historic Landmark – are within two miles. Enjoy our indoor pool, Starbucks café, and tree-lined patio. Our on-site restaurant offers all-day dining and room service.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Saratoga Springs Downtown
description: Find us off I-87, blocks from dining, shopping, and the Saratoga Farmers Market (open Wednesdays and Saturdays). Saratoga Spa State Park is a five-minute drive, and Lake George and Albany International Airport are a half-hour away. Enjoy free WiFi and hot breakfast, and our indoor pool and fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn Rome
description: Find us in Griffiss Business and Technology Park, one mile from Griffiss International Airport. We’re 10 minutes from Rome center, home to Fort Stanwix National Monument and shows at Capitol Theatre. Delta Lake State Park is just as close. You’ll be 20 minutes from Utica and 50 minutes from Syracuse. Wake up to free hot breakfast, and enjoy WiFi on us.

name: Homewood Suites By Hilton New Hartford Utica
description: We're four miles from I-90, with central Utica 15 minutes away. You'll be 10 minutes from both Hamilton and Utica Colleges, and within five minutes of Hartford businesses. Enjoy neighborhood dining or do dinner your way in-suite. Grab free breakfast before hiking the local nature trail, and enjoy our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday. WiFi’s on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites New Hartford
description: Our New Hartford rooms are within 10 minutes of Utica and Hamilton colleges and a range of shopping and dining options. Utica is yours to explore – the Zoo, Munson-Williams-Proctors Art Institute, and Stanley Theatre shows are all 15 minutes away. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our fitness center.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Utica
description: Built in 1912 and favored by Judy Garland, Amelia Earhart, and FDR, our downtown hotel is recognized by Historic Hotels of America®. We're surrounded by dining and within a mile of the Stanley Theatre and Munson-Williams-Proctor Arts Institute. Enjoy our 24-hour fitness center and a warm DoubleTree cookie on arrival.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Utica
description: We are located off I-90 less than one mile from downtown. The Stanley Theater, Adirondack Bank Center, FX Matt Brewery, and upcoming Nexus Center are within 10 minutes or less. A ride on the Adirondack Scenic Railroad is the perfect way to enjoy the beauty of the Mohawk Valley. We are pet-friendly and feature free WiFi and breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn Utica
description: We're just off I-90 in Utica, a short walk from a variety of popular restaurants, and under a mile from downtown Utica, home to the Nexus Center and the new MVHS Hospital. We are minutes away from Cree Inc, Danfoss, and SUNY Polytechnic Institute for stress free commutes. Daily hot breakfast, WiFi, and indoor pool access are included in your stay.

name: Hampton Inn Geneva
description: Raise your glass to Seneca Lake's Wine Trail, boasting 36 wineries and waterside views, right on our doorstep. We're one mile from Geneva's Hobart and William Smith colleges, and five minutes from family fun at Seneca Lake State Park. Start the day with free hot breakfast, and enjoy our free WiFi, heated indoor pool, and whirlpool.

name: Hampton Inn Seneca Falls
description: We're five minutes from downtown Seneca Falls, ideal for the Cayuga Wine Trail. Our free shuttle covers a five-mile radius, including del Lago Casino and Waterloo Premium Outlets. You'll be five minutes from Women's Rights National Historical Park. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our heated indoor pool and fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Rochester/Victor
description: We're off I-490 in Victor, less than a mile from Eastwood Mall and a range of restaurants. Take our free shuttle to attractions within five miles. Fairport is 10 minutes north of us, and we're 15 miles from downtown Rochester. The University of Rochester and Rochester Institute of Technology are 20 minutes away. Enjoy free hot breakfast, WiFi, and our pool and whirlpool.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Rochester - Victor
description: We're in the Finger Lakes, moments from the Canandaigua Wine Trail. Take our free shuttle to and from Rochester International Airport and to local destinations within five miles. Wake up with free hot breakfast before the 30-minute trip to Bristol Mountain or Lake Ontario. Our suites include fully equipped kitchens, with plenty of room to live, work, and relax.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Rochester/Pittsford
description: We're just off I-490, within three miles of Windstream and New York Life corporate offices, as well as Eastview Mall. Pittsford, Nazareth College, and St. John Fisher College are all within five miles. Downtown Rochester is 15 minutes away, and it's 18 miles to the airport. Breakfast and dinner are served daily in our Garden Grille & Bar.

name: Hampton Inn Rochester Penfield
description: You'll find our Penfield hotel off Route 441, steps from Paychex and minutes from Xerox. Wake up to free hot breakfast before strolling through Channing H. Philbrick Park, walking distance from us. We're within 10 minutes of central Rochester, family days at Wickham Farms, and tee time at local golf courses. Enjoy free WiFi, our indoor pool, and 24-hour Suite Shop.

name: Hampton Inn Rochester-Webster
description: Located off Route 104, we're five minutes from North Ponds Park and a short distance from Lake Ontario. A 20-minute drive will take you to the University of Rochester, Memorial Art Gallery, and Rochester General Hospital. Take a dip in our heated indoor pool. Our hot breakfast is free, just like our WiFi.

name: The Strathallan Rochester Hotel & Spa - a DoubleTree by Hilton
description: Our hotel is in Rochester's historical district, with a scenic garden facing East Avenue. Explore George Eastman Museum, Memorial Art Gallery, and Rochester Museum & Science Center, all within blocks of our door. We have a full-service spa, rooftop bar, and a local shuttle — and every stay begins with a warm DoubleTree cookie.

name: Hampton Inn Rochester-Irondequoit
description: Find us off Highway 104, 15 minutes from downtown Rochester. We’re within walking distance of local dining and shopping, with Rochester General Hospital a mile away. Wake up to free hot breakfast, and enjoy free WiFi and a dip in our indoor pool. Kids (big and little) love Seabreeze Amusement Park and Strong Museum of Play, 15 minutes away.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Westchester Dobbs Ferry
description: Off I-87, our Rivertowns Square location is connected to shops, restaurants, and a movie theater. Waterfront Park, Tarrytown Music Hall, Hudson River Museum, and the Ridge Hill Shopping Plaza are within 15 minutes. Manhattan is a 30-minute drive away. We’ve got free covered parking, a local shuttle, free WiFi, and an indoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Yonkers
description: We offer a free shuttle within a three-mile radius, including St. John's Riverside Hospital, Elizabeth Seton Children's Center, Optimum, and Consumer Reports. Visit the Legoland Discovery Center and shopping at Ridge Hill four miles east, or visit Empire City Casino six miles south. Kick back in our lounge Monday – Saturday. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn White Plains/Tarrytown
description: We’re close to the junction of I-297 and I-87, 12 miles from Westchester County Airport. The offices of Hitachi and PepsiCo are less than 10 miles away. Explore Sleepy Hollow, three miles away. We're about 20 minutes from New York City and the bright lights of Broadway. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Yonkers - Westchester
description: We’re off I-87, 20 miles from La Guardia Airport and two miles from Tuckahoe train station. Bronx Zoo and the New York Botanical Gardens are 20 minutes away. We’ve got a free five-mile shuttle, indoor pool, and fitness center. Free WiFi and daily hot breakfast complete your stay.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Tarrytown
description: Enjoy the warm welcome of an open fire and a DoubleTree cookie upon arrival. Our hotel is by the Hudson River, off I-287, and within a 10-minute drive of Crossroads Shopping Center and Legoland. Tarrytown station is a mile away and gets you into New York within the hour. We offer a free local shuttle and a pool with a sauna.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Queensbury Glens Falls
description: In the foothills of the Adirondack Mountains, hiking, skiing, and outdoor excitement are minutes away. You'll find shopping, dining, and plenty to do at Aviation Mall next door. Glens Falls Hospital and major corporations including Gracenote are less than three miles away via I-87. Relax in a pet-friendly suite, complete with kitchen and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Lake George
description: Off I-87, we're five minutes from Lake George Beach and 40 minutes from Gore Mountain. During winter, we've got snow-mobile trails right outside, and our terrace with fire pit is open in the warmer months. Our indoor pool, fitness center, lobby bar, and free WiFi and hot breakfast complete your stay.

name: Hilton New York JFK Airport
description: We’re in Jamaica, NY, within three miles of government buildings and businesses such as DHL and Swissport. Our free shuttle service departs every 30 minutes to destinations including JFK International Airport and Federal Circle station. We have a heated indoor pool, 24-hour fitness center, and Starbucks coffee.

name: Hampton Inn NY-JFK
description: We’re five minutes from JFK International Airport, with a free shuttle between our hotel and Federal Circle. The Jamaica Arts Center and the Resorts World Casino are three miles away, and the Air Train station two miles from our hotel takes you to Manhattan in 20 minutes. Enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Queens/JFK Airport
description: We're next to JFK Airport, and offer a free shuttle both ways. Mets baseball games, the Flushing Meadows tennis center, and the Barclays Center for sports and concerts are all within 10 miles. Our Garden Grille restaurant and bar is open all day, and the 24-hour Pavilion Pantry offers drinks and snacks.

name: Hampton Inn New York - LaGuardia Airport
description: We're less than a mile from LaGuardia Airport, with a free shuttle to the airport and the nearby 7 train station. Queens attractions like Citi Field and The USTA Billie Jean King National Tennis Center are two miles away at Flushing Meadows–Corona Park. Enjoy free WiFi, free hot breakfast, and our fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn Brooklyn/Downtown
description: Get comfy in downtown Brooklyn, off I-278. We're a half-mile from MetroTech Center and the New York City College of Technology. Barclays Center events are a mile away, and Lower Manhattan is two miles north. Wake up to free hot breakfast, and enjoy free WiFi and access to our 24-hour fitness center and 23rd floor Skyline Terrace.

name: Hilton Brooklyn New York
description: Discover downtown Brooklyn from our hotel, one block from the subway and less than a mile from Barclays Center events and Brooklyn Heights Promenade. We're on the corner of Smith Street, renowned for its run of restaurants and shops, and two miles from Brooklyn Museum and the Botanic Garden. Our fitness center is free to enjoy.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Long Island City New York
description: Our Long Island City hotel is one block from Queens Plaza subway station and 10 minutes from Midtown Manhattan. La Guardia Airport is four miles away and we’re 13 miles from JFK International. New York’s top attractions are an easy subway ride away and we’re close to seven subway lines. Enjoy our Garden Grille & Bar and free WiFi.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton New York Long Island City/ Manhattan View, NY
description: The eclectic streets of Long Island and Manhattan are 15 minutes from our pet-friendly hotel. Find New York’s legendary landmarks an equally swift trip away on public transport. Airport-wise, we're less than 20 minutes from JFK International and LaGuardia Airport, and an hour's drive from Long Island Islip MacArthur Airport. Enjoy free breakfast and use free WiFi to plan your must-sees.

name: Hampton Inn Manhattan-Seaport-Financial District
description: We’re in walking distance of the Staten Island Ferry, Battery Park’s Statue of Liberty cruises, the Brooklyn Bridge, Fraunces Tavern restaurant, and Wall Street. LaGuardia Airport is 14 miles away, and JFK and Newark airports are within 25 miles. Many rooms have balconies. We offer free WiFi and daily hot breakfast plus fitness center access.

name: Hilton Garden Inn NYC Financial Center/Manhattan Downtown
description: We’re next to the Staten Island Ferry and Battery Park, where you can catch ferries to Liberty Island and Ellis Island. Wall Street, One World Trade Center, and the 9/11 Memorial are within a mile of our hotel. The Garden Grille & Bar serves breakfast and dinner, and drinks and snacks are available 24 hours in the Pavilion Pantry.

name: Hampton Inn Manhattan/Downtown-Financial District
description: We're in the Financial District, a five-minute walk from Wall Street and Battery Park. Whitehall Street and South Ferry subway stations are a block away, taking you to the World Trade Center, Broadway, Times Square, the Empire State Building, and Central Park. Restaurants and bars line Pearl Street to the east. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton New York Downtown
description: Our hotel is on Stone Street in lower Manhattan's financial district, a five-minute walk from Wall Street, the New York Stock Exchange, and Battery Park. We're a mile from the World Trade Center and 9/11 Memorial — and with three MTA stations two blocks from our hotel, sights and shows are a subway ride away.

name: Hampton Inn Manhattan Grand Central
description: Our Midtown Manhattan rooms are between Grand Central Terminal and the United Nations HQ, a half-mile from both. We're surrounded by city dining and within two miles of Times Square, Javits Convention Center, and 5th Avenue's variety of shops. Wake up to free hot breakfast, and enjoy our free WiFi and fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Lake Placid
description: We’re on the edge of Mirror Lake, next to the public beach and two blocks from Lake Placid’s Main Street. The Olympic Conference Center and a variety of restaurants are within a mile of our door. Relax in our heated indoor pool and take in the view from our patio. Hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Auburn
description: Our Auburn hotel is in the heart of the Finger Lakes region, five miles north of Owasco Lake, and eight miles from Cayuga Lake and Skaneateles.  We’re also walking distance from all of downtown’s bars, restaurants, and museums. Our restaurant, Refinery, serves lunch and dinner, and a hot breakfast is available. Perks include an indoor pool and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Cazenovia
description: We're along US-20, less than a mile from Cazenovia College and 19 miles from Colgate University. Take advantage of our conference center with a ballroom, courtyard, and catering. You'll find Empire Farm Brewery two miles west, and Owera Vineyards five miles north. Relax in our heated indoor pool. We'll have free hot breakfast and free WiFi waiting.

name: Hampton Inn Penn Yan
description: You'll find us just off Route 54, in the Finger Lakes Region. Keuka Lake Wine Trail starts less than a mile from our door, and Seneca Lake Wine Trail is 24 miles away. Wake up to our free hot breakfast. Top of the Lake restaurant, in walking distance, has views of the water. Enjoy our indoor pool and our fire pit on the terrace. WiFi is on us.

name: Hampton Inn Cortland
description: We’re off I-81 in Cortland. Explore the world of the Wickwire family at the 1890 House Museum. Or take in a play at Cortland Repertory Theatre Downtown, both less than five miles from the hotel. Ski the Greek Peak Mountain Resort, 10 miles drive from us. SUNY Cortland is one mile away, and Cornell University a 20-mile drive away. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Ithaca
description: 10 minutes from Cornell University in the heart of the Finger Lakes, our suites are ideal for long assignments and weekend getaways. Explore Cayuga Lake and Buttermilk Falls – fill up on free breakfast before heading out. WiFi is on us, as is our evening social, Monday – Thursday. Dabble in a little home cooking in your own in-suite kitchen.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Ithaca
description: You'll find us downtown, opposite the Ithaca Commons area, and near restaurants, bars, and cultural attractions. Take advantage of free WiFi, an indoor pool, and a 24-hour fitness center. Our Garden Grille restaurant is open for breakfast, and Kilpatrick's Pub offers lunch and dinner. The 24-hour Pavilion Pantry offers drinks and snacks.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Rochester Henrietta, NY
description: We're nine minutes from both the University of Rochester and Rochester Institute of Technology. Stop by the Strong National Museum of Play and the Susan B. Anthony Museum & House, or catch an event at Rochester Main Street Armory. Kids will love Seabreeze Amusement Park. WiFi and breakfast are free, and pets are welcome. Enjoy an in-suite kitchen.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Rochester
description: Off I-390, our hotel is 10 minutes from Greater Rochester International Airport via free shuttle, also covering a five-mile radius. We're within five minutes of the Marketplace Mall, with both Rochester Institute of Technology and University of Rochester four miles away. Enjoy our indoor pool, fitness center, and a warm welcome cookie on arrival.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Islip/MacArthur Airport
description: We're off NY-454, two miles from MacArthur Airport via free Uber for Business transport. We’re a 15 minute ferry ride from Fire Island National Seashore and Robert Moses State Park is within 20 miles. The Hamptons and several name-brand vineyards are within an hour. WiFi’s on us and we have an on-site restaurant. Enjoy our fitness center.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Ronkonkoma
description: With Long Island MacArthur Airport nearby and our free airport shuttle, you'll be here in a New York minute. We're near Lirr Train Station and just off the Long Island Expressway, both taking you to North and South Shore beaches, and the scenery of Fire Island. Make the most of free WiFi, breakfast, and an in-suite kitchen. Finish the day at our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Stony Brook
description: We’re on the campus of Stony Brook University, across the street from the Stony Brook University Hospital and three miles from downtown. Our free shuttle covers a three mile radius and will take you to Port Jefferson Village. Our Garden Grille serves breakfast and dinner daily. Enjoy our indoor pool, business center and 24 hour fitness center.

name: Hilton Garden Inn New York/Manhattan-Midtown East
description: We’re close to everywhere you want to go in Midtown. The Museum of Modern Art is six blocks away. The Chrysler Building, Grand Central Station, and Central Park are within 10 blocks. Eat breakfast, lunch, and dinner in our Garden Grille Restaurant & Bar. Grab a drink or snack at the 24 hour Pavilion Pantry.

name: Hampton Inn Harriman Woodbury
description: Find us off I-87, a mile from Harriman. We are near plenty of restaurants and Woodbury Common Premium Outlets. Bear Mountain State Park and Fort Montgomery are 10 miles away, and the US Military Academy at West Point is 20 minutes from our door.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Middletown
description: Right off I-84, we’re a handy base for guests flying in and out of Stewart International Airport. Within walking distance of the Galleria at Crystal Run Mall and several restaurants, there’s lots to do nearby, whether you’re here a day or a month. Get comfy in your spacious suite with free WiFi and flexible space and kick off your day with free breakfast each morning.

name: Tru by Hilton Middletown
description: We're off I-84, with dining and major retailers within a mile. We're 10 minutes from Highland Lakes State Park and downtown attractions like the historic Paramount Theatre. Log in or chill out in our lobby, a great place to get work done, sip free coffee, or play board games. WiFi and build-your-own breakfast are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Long Island - Brookhaven
description: We're next to I-495, within walking distance of several stores and restaurants. Our free shuttle runs anywhere within five miles, including Zebra Technologies, Cisive, and the IRS. It's eight miles to Long Island MacArthur Airport, and Baseball Heaven is 10 minutes away. Free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our heated indoor pool will be waiting for you.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Long Island Brookhaven
description: We're off the Long Island Expressway in Yaphank, within five miles of the Smith Point County Park, Baseball Heaven, Wertheim National Wildlife Refuge, and 20 miles from the Hamptons. Brookhaven National Labs can be reached in five minutes, and Stony Brook University is 19 miles from our door. Enjoy our heated indoor pool and free hot breakfast.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Riverhead
description: We're across the street from Tanger Outlets, and three miles from Splish Splash Water Park. Plenty of wineries are within a half-hour, and the charm of The Hamptons is just as close. We have vineyard tour packages, a restaurant, and 24-hour snack shop. Our patio with whirlpool and fire pit, indoor pool, and fitness center complete your stay.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Jamestown
description: Find us just off I-86 in Lucille Ball's hometown. We're two miles from the Lucy Desi Museum and downtown shops and restaurants. Our hotel is 15 minutes east of Chautauqua Lake and hunting, fishing, and boating are half an hour away at Allegany State Park. Enjoy hot breakfast and WiFi on us.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Jamestown
description: We're in the heart of Jamestown, a five-minute walk from the Lucille Ball Desi Arnaz Museum, National Comedy Center, and Northwest Arena. Our hotel features an indoor pool, a free fitness center, and a restaurant with a lobby bar. More than a dozen other dining options and bars are within three blocks. Enjoy a DoubleTree welcome cookie on arrival.

name: Hotel Saranac, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: Our renovated 1920’s building features historic charm, original architecture, and Adirondack design. We have a spa and salon, an outdoor terrace with mountain views and a fire pit, and Academy & Main artisan boutique. Explore the local area with our complimentary shuttle and free-to-borrow bikes.

name: Hampton Inn Potsdam
description: We're about a mile from US Highway 11. Clarkston University and SUNY Potsdam are five minutes' drive away, and SUNY Canton is 20 minutes from our door. Wake up to our free hot breakfast, then drive to nearby Raquette River, or to Adirondack State Park, 25 miles away. We're less than an hour from the Canadian Border. Unwind in our pool and enjoy WiFi on us.

name: Hampton Inn Niagara Falls/Blvd
description: Located off I-190, we’re one mile from Fashion Outlets of Niagara Falls, and a variety of dining options. Niagara Falls International Airport is three miles away, while Niagara Falls and Niagara Falls State Park are only six miles from our door. Relax in the pool or work out in our fitness center. Enjoy hot breakfast and WiFi on us.

name: Hampton Inn Niagara Falls
description: We’re a block away from the Seneca Casino and the conference center. See the Niagara Falls up close on the Maid of the Mist tour, which leaves less than a mile from our hotel. Rainbow Bridge and Goat Island are a mile away. Relax in our indoor pool and enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Niagara Falls New York
description: Find us along the Niagara River, within blocks of Niagara Falls State Park and the Seneca Casino. Goat Island and the Rainbow International Bridge are less than a mile from our door. We feature rooms with river views and an indoor pool. Perks include our 24-hour market and a warm DoubleTree cookie at check-in.

name: Hampton Inn Manhattan-Madison Square Garden Area
description: We're in the heart of Midtown Manhattan, one block from Madison Square Garden and Penn Station. You'll find restaurants in every direction, and the Empire State Building is two blocks away. It's a mile to Times Square, Broadway, and the Theater District. Relax in Central Park, two miles from our hotel. Every day, our hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Hilton New York Fashion District
description: Bordering Midtown and Chelsea, we’re across from the Fashion Institute of Technology and blocks from Penn Station and Madison Square Garden. Within a mile, reach The High Line, Chelsea Market, the Empire State Building, and Times Square. Our hotel features a rooftop bar and a 24-hour fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Staten Island
description: Off I-278, we're 20 minutes from Newark Airport and the Staten Island Ferry to Manhattan. Reserve our free shuttle to the airport, ferry, and the Empire Outlets. The Staten Island Zoo is 15 minutes away, as are shopping and dining at Staten Island Mall. Free WiFi, daily hot breakfast, and fitness center use complete your stay.

name: Hilton Garden Inn New York/Staten Island
description: Off I-278, we're less than nine miles from the Staten Island Ferry terminal and Newark Airport. We offer a free shuttle to and from both, based on availability and reservations. The William T Davis Wildlife Refuge is one of the many nearby parks. Enjoy evening room service, our 24-hour Pavilion Pantry, and all-day dining at our restaurant, Lorenzo’s.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Southern Pines-Pinehurst
description: We're off US-501 in Aberdeen's commercial district, minutes from dozens of championship golf courses between Southern Pines and Pinehurst – including the legendary Pinehurst No. 2, five miles away. We have an in-house golf coordinator to help you get on the best greens. Relax in our heated indoor pool, and enjoy free hot breakfast daily and free WiFi.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Olmsted Village (near Pinehurst)
description: Overlooking a 50-acre forest, we’re the perfect place to relax after a day out. We’re walking distance from shops, restaurants, and supermarkets and a 6-minute drive from legendary Pinehurst golf courses. Unwind in your spacious suite with full kitchen, or come to our complimentary evening social Monday – Thursday. Breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Spring Lake Fayetteville
description: We're within 15 minutes of Fort Bragg, Pope Army Airfield, and Womack Army Medical Center. You'll find a number of restaurants just down the street, or head 11 miles into downtown Fayetteville for more local options (passing by Fayetteville State University on the way). Enjoy daily free hot breakfast and free WiFi.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Fayetteville Fort Bragg
description: Find us just off the All American Freeway, one mile from from Cross Creek Mall. Downtown Fayetteville, Fort Bragg military base, and The Crown Coliseum are all less than 20 minutes away. We have an indoor pool and fitness center, and there’s a movie theater across the street. Enjoy daily made-to-order breakfast and our complimentary evening reception.

name: Hampton Inn Laurinburg
description: Located near the Scottish Heritage Center off I-74, we are one mile from St. Andrews College. Enjoy the sounds of nationally acclaimed St. Andrews’ bagpipe band. Visit the John Blue House and Heritage Center, just five minutes away. Stop by Cypress Bend Vineyards, 12.5 miles away. Your stay includes free WiFi and free hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn Fayetteville Fort Bragg
description: We're four miles from Fort Bragg and 10 miles from Pope Air Force Base, while Cross Creek Mall is across the street. Fayetteville State University and downtown attractions like the Airborne & Special Operations Museum and Cape Fear Botanical Garden are within eight miles. Take a refreshing swim in our outdoor pool. WiFi and daily hot breakfast are free.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Fayetteville/Fort Bragg
description: Reach us from the All American Freeway, seven miles from Fort Bragg. We're one mile from Cross Creek Mall and surrounded by local restaurants. Downtown Fayetteville is less than six miles away, providing easy access to Cape Fear Botanical Garden and the Airborne & Special Operations Museum. Enjoy our heated indoor pool and fitness center.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Fayetteville, NC
description: Stay near Fort Bragg and get to know Cumberland County's rich history. With in-suite kitchens, laundry and fitness facilities, and space for work and relaxation, we have what you need to feel at home while you're away from home.

name: Hampton Inn Sanford
description: We're three miles away from Sanford's largest businesses – including Coty US, Core-Mark, Dorman, and Magneti. It's one mile to Central Carolina Community College, while Temple Theatre and other downtown attractions are two miles away. Enjoy free hot breakfast daily and our seasonal outdoor pool. WiFi is on the house.

name: Hampton Inn High Point
description: Located off  I-85 at Exit 111 in Archdale, we’re five miles from High Point. Discover why the area is famous for furniture at High Point Market Authority or Furnitureland South, both 10 minutes away. High Point University is a 10 mile drive and Piedmont Triad International Airport is 25 minutes from our door. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, WiFi, and our outdoor pool.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Greensboro Wendover
description: We're just off I-40 amid Wendover Avenue dining and major retail. The Coliseum Complex, Emerald Pointe water park, and GSO Airport are all within 15 minutes' drive. Settle into a suite with a full kitchen, and join us for complimentary evening socials. A fitness center and indoor saline pool have exercise covered. Pets are our guests, too.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Greensboro
description: Off I-73 and I-40, we’re 15 minutes from Piedmont Triad International Airport via free shuttle. Greensboro Science Center is also 15 minutes away. We’re less than 10 minutes from Greensboro Coliseum and Guilford College, and shops and dining options are in walking distance. Our restaurant, indoor pool, and fitness center complete your stay.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Greensboro Airport
description: We’re 10 minutes from Piedmont Triad International Airport, with a free shuttle both ways. Honda Aircraft Company, Volvo Trucks, and other corporations are within five miles of our hotel. Our Garden Grille restaurant serves breakfast and dinner, and Pavilion Pantry is open 24 hours for drinks and snacks.
streetAddress: 238 NC Highway 68 South Airport at PAI Park

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Greensboro
description: Find us within three miles of Greensboro Coliseum Complex, The University of North Carolina, and Wet’n Wild Emerald Pointe Water Park. Downtown Greensboro and Piedmont Triad International Airport are around 10 minutes from our door. Enjoy spacious rooms and a warm DoubleTree cookie on arrival.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Greensboro/Coliseum Area
description: Find us off I-40, five minutes from Greensboro Coliseum and the University of North Carolina. We're a half-mile from the Joseph S. Koury Convention Center and Four Seasons Town Centre, with downtown Greensboro less than five miles away. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, plus our indoor pool and 24-hour fitness center.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Greensboro Airport, NC
description: Nestled in a neighborhood just 12 miles from downtown, you'll have the best of both worlds. Family days are easy with Wet'n Wild Emerald Pointe Water Park nearby and big events at Greensboro Coliseum Complex. We're just off I-40 and close to local business parks. Enjoy free WiFi and breakfast, and an in-suite kitchen. Pets are welcome.

name: Hampton Inn Greensboro-Airport
description: We're just off I-40, 12 miles from downtown and University of North Carolina Greensboro. Take a free shuttle to or from Piedmont Triad International Airport (GSO), seven miles away. Large companies like Volvo, TE Connectivity, and Qorvo are within a mile, and you'll find a number of restaurants nearby. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast and free WiFi.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Greensboro
description: Just off I-40 near the Piedmont Airport, we're a convenient choice for both weekend visits and extended stays. Suites include full kitchens and free WiFi, and we provide breakfast and a complimentary evening social. With our fitness and business center, work and workouts are covered – so you can feel at home when you're away from home.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Greensboro Airport
description: Our suites are just off I-40, 10 minutes from Piedmont Triad International Airport via free shuttle. We’re within 25 minutes of the High Point Furniture Market and downtown Greensboro. Our hotel has an indoor pool, fitness center, and basketball court. Enjoy our made-to-order breakfast and complimentary evening reception.

name: Hampton Inn Kernersville
description: We're located off I-40, one mile from Highland Industries. Be at Triad Park, Caterpillar, and Körner's Folly, within 10 minutes of our hotel. We're a handy base halfway between Winston Salem and Greensboro, under 20 minutes from Piedmont Triad International Airport. Every stay includes free hot breakfast and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Asheboro
description: Find us off Highway 64, just 15 minutes from the North Carolina Zoo. We're 50 minutes from Piedmont Triad Airport, and along the route to Myrtle Beach. Restaurant chains are in walking distance, and we've got an indoor pool, whirlpool, and fitness center. WiFi and daily hot breakfast are free.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Winston-Salem Downtown
description: Uncover a little Winston Salem culture at the Old Salem Museum & Gardens, browse new exhibitions at Sawtooth Visual Art School or catch the big event at the LVJM Coliseum. Start the day with free hot breakfast before teeing off at Maple Chase Golf and Country Club. Top the evening off with a bite to eat at one of many restaurants on our doorstep. WiFi’s on us.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Winston Salem
description: In the heart of downtown Winston-Salem, our hotel is connected to the Benton Convention Center. Winston-Salem State and Wake Forest universities are within a 10-minute drive. We have an indoor pool and a fitness center. Enjoy made-to-order breakfast and our complimentary evening reception.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Asheville Airport
description: We are off I-26 and State Hwy 280, one mile from Asheville Regional Airport and we provide a free airport shuttle. Southridge Shopping Center is less than a mile away and we're 20 minutes from Asheville. Sierra Nevada Brewery Co. and Blue Ghost Brewing Company are within five miles. Enjoy our heated indoor pool, free daily hot breakfast, and WiFi on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Asheville-I-26
description: We're right off I-26 with a free shuttle to nearby Asheville Regional Airport. Sierra Nevada Brewing Co. tours are 10 minutes away. Businesses like Meritor and UPM are within five miles. It's nine miles to the Biltmore mansion and gardens, or 15 miles to downtown Asheville. Enjoy our heated outdoor pool and whirlpool, free hot breakfast, and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Asheville Biltmore Village
description: We're off I-40, a half-mile from Biltmore Village and Biltmore Estate. Downtown Asheville is 10 minutes away via our sister DoubleTree hotel's shuttle. Enjoy our terrace, taproom and bar, and our indoor pool and fitness center. Hot breakfast is free and WiFi's on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Asheville Biltmore Area
description: We're off I-26, near I-40 and I-240, directly across from the Asheville Outlets. Downtown Asheville, the Biltmore Estate, and the Blue Ridge Parkway are less than 15 minutes' drive away. Relax by our outdoor fire pit or grab a drink at our lobby craft and wine bar. Explore the area in our free local shuttle. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Asheville South
description: We’re off I-26, five minutes from restaurants and shopping at Asheville Outlets. Blue Ridge Parkway and Asheville are within 15 minutes. Biltmore Estate, the largest home in America, is six miles away, and Asheville Regional Airport is 20 minutes from our door. Enjoy our restaurant, bar, and free shuttle service around the local area.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Asheville - Biltmore
description: We're minutes from the shops and restaurants of Biltmore Village and the historic Biltmore Estate, with easy access to the Blue Ridge Parkway. We offer a daily scheduled shuttle to downtown Asheville, and our hotel serves as a pickup spot for Asheville Rooftop Bar Tours. We have an indoor heated pool and whirlpool with a retractable skylight roof.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Asheville Biltmore Village
description: We're between I-40 and I-240, set in the historic Biltmore Village, half a mile from the Biltmore Estate. Downtown Asheville and the River Arts District can be reached in 10 minutes, and Grovewood Village is only five miles from our door. Enjoy an in-suite kitchen, heated outdoor pool, free hot breakfast, and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Asheville-Tunnel Rd.
description: We're right off I-240, two miles from downtown. Our free shuttle will take you to shops, restaurants, and breweries within five miles of our door. Asheville Mall is 10 minutes' walk from us, and it's four miles to the River Arts District. Biltmore Estate Winery, 20 minutes away, is popular for tours. Enjoy daily hot breakfast and WiFi on us.

name: Tru by Hilton Asheville East
description: We are located off State Highway 70 outside of Asheville, NC. The Western North Carolina Nature Center is a seven-minute car ride from our front door or take an extra minute to tee off at Ashville Municipal Golf Course. See the beauty of the region with a drive along Blue Ridge Parkway four miles away. Our heated outdoor pool provides a relaxing swim.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Asheville-Tunnel Road
description: We're only 1.4 miles from the local restaurants, shopping, and entertainment of downtown Asheville. If you'd rather stay closer to your suite, we're within walking distance of numerous restaurants and stores. Use nearby I-240 to easily get around the city, and visit the historic Biltmore Estate just five miles south. Enjoy a daily free hot breakfast.

name: The Foundry Hotel Asheville, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: Our hotel was once the foundry that forged the steel for the Biltmore Estate. We sit in a historical enclave known as "The Block", a five-minute walk from downtown Asheville shops, eateries, and entertainment. Our decor blends the building's industrial roots and exposed brick walls with modern design.

name: Hilton Garden Inn  Asheville Downtown
description: Discover downtown Asheville via free shuttle – we're around a mile from historic sites, city dining, and shows at The Orange Peel and Thomas Wolfe Auditorium. The Biltmore Gardens and North Carolina Arboretum are both within 10 miles. Our restaurant, Pillar Kitchen, covers breakfast and lunch, and Pillar Rooftop Bar offers up drinks with views of the city.

name: Hampton Inn Hendersonville
description: We're right by the I-26/US-64 intersection, three miles from downtown Hendersonville spots like the Hands On! Children's Museum and Sanctuary Brewing Company. It's a 15-mile drive to skyline sightseeing at Chimney Rock State Park. Take the team to ballgames at Jackson Park, 10 minutes away. Relax in our indoor saltwater pool. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Black Mountain
description: Find us off I-40, within a mile of restaurants and shops in downtown Black Mountain. Asheville, Biltmore, and Blue Ridge Parkway with its hiking trails, lakes, and outdoor activities can be reached in around 20 minutes. Every stay comes with a free hot breakfast, and some rooms boast views of Mt. Mitchell and the Seven Sisters.

name: Hampton Inn Greensboro-East
description: We're one mile from the I-40/85 intersection, across the highway from the Carolina Corporate Center. The University of North Carolina at Greensboro, events at the Coliseum Complex, and downtown Greensboro attractions like the Children's Museum are all within 12 miles. Start off each morning with free hot breakfast, and stay connected with free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Winston-Salem Hanes Mall
description: We're next to I-40 and across the highway from Hanes Mall. It's a six mile drive to Wake Forest University, and seven miles to Winston-Salem State University. Conventions, entertainment, and downtown restaurants are seven miles away, passing by Wake Forest Baptist Health hospital en route. Start your morning off right with free breakfast. WiFi is on us.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Atlantic Beach Oceanfront
description: Our hotel sits on a tranquil stretch of beach, 10 minutes from Morehead City. We're within three miles of Theodore Roosevelt Natural Area and North Carolina Aquarium at Pine Knoll Shores. We offer direct beach access, with a 300-foot pier and a beachfront bar. Enjoy our indoor and outdoor pools and a warm DoubleTree cookie on arrival.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Atlantic Beach
description: Off Highway 58, we’re across the street from Atlantic Beach, and 10 minutes from Morehead City and Fort Macon State Park. Historic Beaufort is a 20-minute drive from the hotel—with plenty of restaurants along the way. Our outdoor pool, fitness center, and free WiFi and daily hot breakfast will complete your stay.

name: Hampton Inn Morehead City
description: Take in waterfront views from our hotel off Highway 70, five minutes from central Morehead City. You'll find a variety of restaurants in the neighborhood, and each day starts with free hot breakfast. We're within 15 minutes of both Atlantic Beach and the North Carolina Maritime Museum in Beaufort. Enjoy free WiFi and our fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn Havelock
description: Our Havelock hotel is off Highway 70. Try the wines at Lake Road Winery and visit the Battle of Newport Barracks, less than 15 minutes from our doorstep. We are 16 minutes from Marine Corps Air Station Cherry Point and a half-hour from Atlantic Beach. Your stay includes free WiFi and free hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Swansboro Near Camp Lejeune
description: We're five minutes from downtown Swansboro's antique shopping and Hammocks Beach State Park, where you can hop aboard a ferry to Bear Island. Free hot breakfast is a great start for beach days at Emerald Isle, 20 minutes away. Camp Lejeune Marine Corps Base is a half-hour away. Enjoy free WiFi and our fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn New Bern
description: We're just off the US-17/US-70 exit, within a mile of major stores and the New Bern Mall. Discover history downtown at the Governor's Palace and the Firemen's Museum, three miles away. It's a five-minute drive to CarolinaEast Medical Center, and 10 minutes to BSH or Hatteras Yachts. Relax with a swim in our outdoor pool. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Charlotte-Belmont @ Montcross
description: Find us off I-85, less than a mile from Belmont Abbey College. Grab free hot breakfast before braving the US National Whitewater Center or roaming the Daniel Stowe Botanical Gardens, both 20 minutes away. You'll be just as close to both central Charlotte and Charlote Douglas International Airport. Enjoy WiFi on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Gastonia
description: We’re right off I-85, a mile from CaroMont Regional Medical Center, and walking distance to a variety of restaurants. The Schiele Museum of Natural History & Planetarium is a five-minute drive, and downtown Gastonia is three miles away. We have an indoor pool, fitness room, and outdoor seating area. The Garden Grille & Bar serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner. WiFi's on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Charlotte-Airport
description: Find us off I-85, two miles from Charlotte Douglas International Airport, with a free 24-hour shuttle. You'll be six miles from central Charlotte, home to the NASCAR Hall of Fame, BB&T Ballpark, and NFL games at Bank of America Stadium. Each day starts with free hot breakfast, and you'll have access to our fitness center and free WiFi.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Charlotte Airport
description: Your Charlotte home is 15 minutes from downtown, Carolinas Aviation Museum and Bank of America Stadium.  The Robert L. Smith District Park is minutes away and the Orchid Banquet Hall is less than three miles from our front door. Getting here is easy with our airport shuttle. WiFi and breakfast are on us. Make the most of your in-suite kitchen and flexible working wall.

name: Hampton Inn Charlotte-Gastonia
description: Located in the heart of Gastonia’s commercial district, our hotel is just a 15-minute drive from Charlotte-Douglas International Airport. We’re near to Schiele Museum, Daniel Stowe Botanical Gardens, Billy Graham National Library, NASCAR Hall of Fame, and uptown Charlotte. Enjoy free hot breakfast, a comfy bed, and free WiFi.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Charlotte Airport
description: Three miles from the airport, we have spacious suites with full kitchens. You'll be five minutes from Renaissance Park and six miles from Bank of America Stadium. Take advantage of our airport shuttle, fitness center, WiFi, and daily hot breakfast—all free. Downtown Charlotte, the NASCAR Hall of Fame, and Premium Outlets shopping are within 15 minutes.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Charlotte Airport
description: A 10-minute ride to and from the Charlotte Douglas International Airport via our free shuttle service. NOAH’s event venue is within walking distance and a short nine-mile ride gets you to downtown Charlotte and Carowinds amusement park. A few of the amenities at our hotel are the fitness center and outdoor pool. When you arrive, you will be greeted with a friendly smile and a warm chocolate chip cookie.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Charlotte Airport
description: In the Lake Pointe Center business park, we're 10 minutes from Charlotte Douglas International Airport via free shuttle. The Charlotte VA hospital is in walking distance. Uptown Charlotte, the NASCAR Hall of Fame, and SouthPark Mall are all within 15 minutes. We've got a restaurant, outdoor pool, lakeside trails, and a patio with fire pit.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Charlotte Airport Lake Pointe
description: Within six miles of downtown Charlotte, our comfy hotel is minutes from Bank of America Stadium, the NASCAR Hall of Fame, Uptown, and Charlotte Convention Center. Our free shuttle will take you to and from the airport. Chill on the patio or in the pool. Free hot breakfast and WiFi are always included.

name: Tru by Hilton Charlotte Airport Lake Pointe
description: Our new Tru is within six miles of the airport and downtown Charlotte. The Billy Graham Library, Discovery Place Science, and NASCAR Hall of Fame offer something for everyone. We have a free shuttle to Charlotte-Douglas International Airport, plus free top-it breakfast, WiFi, and an outdoor pool.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Charlotte/Ayrsley, NC
description: We’re ideal for a convenient family break. Nearby, you’ll have the U.S. National Whitewater Center and Carowinds Amusement Park. A short drive will bring you to Daniel Stowe Botanical Garden, or the NASCAR Hall of Fame. While you’re with us, make the most of free WiFi, breakfast and our evening social, Monday – Thursday. Feel at home with your own in-suite kitchen.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Charlotte/Ayrsley
description: We’re off I-485, 10 miles from downtown, and Charlotte Douglas International Airport. Shops, a movie theater, and many restaurants are a few steps away. Take the kids to Carowinds Amusement Park, four miles away. Our Garden Grille restaurant serves breakfast and dinner, and our Pavilion Pantry is open 24 hours for drinks and snacks.

name: Tru by Hilton Charlotte Ayrsley
description: Start the day with customizable breakfast before braving the U.S. National Whitewater Center, and treating the kids to a day at Carowinds Amusement Park. When it’s time to treat yourself, stop by Carolina Premium Outlets, nearby. For a little gospel history, check out the Billy Graham Library, or see what’s happening at Bank of America Stadium. WiFi and parking are on us.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Charlotte Ayrsley
description: Our suites are just off I-485, less than a mile from restaurants and a movie theater. We're 15 minutes from Charlotte Douglas International Airport, and Charlotte attractions like Carowinds, Charlotte Premium Outlets, and the Bank of America Stadium are within 20 minutes. Enjoy free made-to-order breakfast and our complimentary evening reception.

name: Hampton Inn Benson
description: Our pet-friendly hotel is located off I-95. The Benson Museum of Local History is one mile away. See a race at GALOT Motorsports Park or taste locally made liquor at Broadslab Distillery, both six minutes away. Take a 12-minute drive to visit General William C. Lee Airborne Museum, and Tucker Lake. Enjoy our free WiFi and free hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn Dunn
description: This is the place to practice your drive: we’re twenty minutes from seven golf courses, including all 36 holes of Keith Hills Country Club. WiFi and breakfast are free – ideal for a day hiking, kayaking, camping or fishing by Cape Fear River at the Erwin River and Raven Rock State Parks. Aversaboro Civil War Battlefield and William C. Lee Airborne Museums are nearby.

name: Hampton Inn Smithfield Selma
description: Just off I-95, we are within five minutes of Johnston Community College and Carolina Premium Outlet mall. Johnston Regional Airport and Downtown Selma, North Carolina are about 10 minutes away. Stretch your legs with a walk along the Smithfield-Neuse Riverwalk, or unwind with a swim in our indoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn Raleigh/Clayton I-40
description: We're right off I-40, with easy access to Raleigh 15 miles north,  Clayton seven miles east. It's a 30-minute drive to a shopping trip at Carolina Premium Outlets, and just 20 minutes to outdoor concerts at Coastal Credit Union Music Park at Walnut Creek. Free hot breakfast and WiFi keep you content and connected. Relax in our outdoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Holly Springs
description: Find some quiet just south of Raleigh, NC at Hampton Inn & Suites Holly Springs. The free hot breakfast and free WiFi will help you prepare for a day at Bass Lake Park or an evening at Holly Springs Cultural Center.

name: Hampton Inn Raleigh/Garner
description: We’re 10 minutes from downtown Raleigh, where you can shop at the City Market, relax in the JC Raulston Arboretum, and choose from a variety of restaurants. Research Triangle Park, home to over 200 businesses, is just 20 miles away. Enjoy hot breakfast and WiFi on us and take a dip in our seasonal outdoor pool.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Raleigh Cary I-40
description: Between downtown Raleigh and Research Triangle Park, our suites offer easy access to the Triangle area and NC State University. Shop, eat, and see a movie at Crossroads Shopping Plaza, steps away. Our spacious suites feature fully equipped kitchens and separate living and dining areas. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our complimentary evening social Monday – Thursday.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Raleigh-Cary
description: Off I-40 and I-440, we’re moments from Crossroads Plaza mall, restaurants, and a movie theater. NC State University, Raleigh Convention Center, and PNC Arena are within 15 minutes.
