Raleigh-Durham Airport is 20 minutes away. We’ve got a free five-mile shuttle, patio with fire pit, and indoor saltwater pool.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Raleigh - Cary
description: Off the Highway 64/I-40 intersection, we're walking distance from Crossroads Plaza shopping and surrounding dining. Downtown Raleigh is 10 miles from the door, passing by Lake Johnson on the way. Speak to us about our free shuttle to local destinations, and enjoy a complimentary welcome cookie, heated indoor pool, and fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn Raleigh/Cary
description: Our Cary hotel is just off Highway 1, next to WakeMed Cary Hospital and close to corporate offices. We're just 10 minutes from North Carolina State University and 15 minutes from downtown Raleigh. Find several restaurants in walking distance at the Waverly Place shopping center. Start each day with free hot breakfast, and stay connected with our free WiFi.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Raleigh/Cary
description: Home is just off Highway 1, 15 minutes from Cary and 21 minutes from Raleigh. The Raleigh Convention Center is 15 minutes away, and we’re less than one mile from Consonus, American Airlines, Caterpillar, Glaxo, IBM, and more. Stop by our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday, and enjoy free WiFi and daily hot breakfast.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Raleigh - Brownstone - University
description: Our hotel is footsteps from North Carolina State University campus and Pullen Park. Downtown Raleigh and the NC State Farmers Public Market are about 10 minutes away. See a game or a concert at PNC Arena four miles west. Our fitness center is open 24 hours a day. Every stay starts with a warm chocolate chip cookie.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Raleigh Downtown
description: In the heart of Raleigh's Glenwood South Entertainment District, restaurants and attractions are steps away. Hop on the free R-Line to downtown destinations like the Red Hat Amphitheater and North Carolina Museum of Natural Science, just a mile from our door. Enjoy our pool and fitness center and free hot breakfast and WiFi.

name: Tru by Hilton Fayetteville I 95
description: We're just 11 minutes from the airport, with free parking. Once you're here, enjoy proximity to Fort Bragg, historic downtown Fayetteville, the Crown Complex, Cape Fear Botanical Garden, and the Airborne & Special Operations Museum. If you're here on business, we're close to major companies, and offer free WiFi and printing services. Breakfast is on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Fayetteville
description: We're right off I-95, five minutes from several dining options. It's six miles to downtown Fayetteville attractions like the Airborne & Special Operations Museum and the Fascinate-U Children's Museum. Fayetteville State University is a 10-minute drive away. Start off your morning right with free hot breakfast, and enjoy a swim in our outdoor pool. WiFi's on us.

name: Hampton Inn Bermuda Run
description: We're off I-40, 14 miles from Winston-Salem. Stroll by the river in Tanglewood Park, two miles away, and enjoy the arboretum and rose garden. Or tour some of the Yadkin Valley wineries, starting in Advance, five miles away. Have fun in our indoor pool with two large waterslides, or relax on the patio next to the fireplace. WiFi and our daily hot breakfast are free.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Winston-Salem/Hanes Mall
description: We're by the I-40/US-421 junction, 10 minutes from shopping and dining at Hanes Mall. Winston-Salem State University, Salem College, and Benton Convention Center are nine miles away near historic downtown, and it's a 15-minute drive to Wake Forest University. Breakfast and dinner are served daily in our Garden Grille & Bar. Relax in our indoor pool.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Winston-Salem Hanes Mall
description: Ten minutes from downtown Winston-Salem, we're in prime position for corporate guests with Forsyth Medical Group, Krispy Kreme, and Lowes Foods nearby. Unwind after a day's work (or a day viewing masterpieces at Reynolda House Museum of American Art) with some in-suite cooking. Breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Winston Salem - University
description: We're near US-52, within four miles of Wake Forest University and Historic Bethabara Park. Kaleideum North science center and many shopping and dining options are five minutes away. Keep up your exercise in our 24-hour fitness center and relax in our outdoor pool next to the fire pit.

name: Hampton Inn and Suites-Winston-Salem/University Area NC
description: Located just four miles from Wake Forest University and eight miles from Winston-Salem State University, our hotel offers great value and comfort. We’re near Old Salem and SciWorks. Take the stress out of travel with a free hot breakfast, WiFi, and access to our fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Boone
description: Find a comfy room less than five minutes from central Boone's Appalachian State University. You'll be within a mile of dining, while our 24-hour Suite Shop covers cravings. Free hot breakfast is fuel for the Greenway Trail, 10 minutes away. Enjoy our free WiFi, fitness center, heated indoor pool, and mountain views from the outdoor terrace.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Lenoir
description: We're in the foothills of the Blue Ridge Mountains, 16 miles from Hickory, and within a 40-minute drive of Blowing Rock and Boone, where you’ll find Appalachian State University. Enjoy our pool, fitness room, and free hot breakfast, and of course the WiFi's on us.

name: Hampton Inn Wilkesboro
description: Explore the great outdoors in the foothills of the Brushy Mountains. We're right off Route 421, with easy access to Blue Ridge Parkway and 10 minutes from W.Kerr Scott Reservoir. We're three miles from downtown Wilkesboro and steps from Wilkes Community College, home of the annual MerleFest. Enjoy free hot breakfast daily and WiFi on us.

name: Hampton Inn Mebane
description: Find us just off the I-85/40, close to restaurants and shopping at Tanger Outlets. Historic downtown Mebane, bustling with boutiques, dining, and entertainment, is three miles away. We offer free WiFi and hot breakfast daily. A mini-fridge and microwave in every room, outdoor pool, and fitness center complete your stay.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Chapel Hill-Carrboro/Downtown
description: We're on Main Street, an easy walk from many highly-rated local restaurants including several on the ground floor of our building. It's a two-mile drive to the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill, Ackland Art Museum, and the hospital complex. Walk across the parking lot to concerts at Cat's Cradle. Enjoy free hot breakfast and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Eden
description: We're less than two miles outside of downtown Eden, located within walking distance of many restaurants and shops. Go back to a bygone era at Eden Drive-In Movies, three miles away, and if you're here in September make sure to catch the Fall Riverfest. We're also close to UNC Rockingham Health Care. Enjoy daily hot breakfast and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Carolina Beach Oceanfront
description: If you’re heading here for the beach, you’re in luck. We’re at the end of Pleasure Island, right next to the Carolina Beach Boardwalk and close to the fishing pier. When you make it indoors, free WiFi and breakfast are yours. If you’re traveling during the summer, make sure to check for local festivals, seaside amusements and firework displays.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Southport
description: Explore the nature of Southport at Dutchman Creek Park, minutes away. Fill up on free breakfast before hitting Long and Caswell beaches on Oak Island, a short drive away. While you’re out there, stop by Founders Club, Members Club or Oak Island Golf Club for a couple of rounds. Try some waterfront restaurants for a bite on the way back. WiFi’s on us.

name: Hampton Inn Wilmington-Medical Park
description: We're a mile from US-117, within five minutes of some of Wilmington's largest medical facilities and four miles from University of North Carolina Wilmington. You can reach Wilmington International Airport in six miles, passing near downtown attractions like Battleship North Carolina along the way. Start your morning with free hot breakfast. WiFi's on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Wilmington/Wrightsville Beach
description: Located off Highway 74, we're two miles from the sandy shores of Wrightsville Beach. Visit Airlie Gardens, one mile away, or grab dinner at Port City Chop House just steps from our hotel. Chandler's Wharf shops and the Cotton Exchange are both within 10 miles. Relax on our patio or by the pool with a drink from our lobby bar. WiFi and hot breakfast are on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Wilmington Mayfaire Town Center
description: Off Highway 17, we're less than half a mile from shops, restaurants, and the Regal IMAX movie theater. It’s 10 minutes to both Wrightsville Beach and downtown Wilmington. Wilmington International Airport is eight miles away. Our Garden Grille restaurant and bar serves breakfast and dinner. The Pavilion Pantry is open 24 hours for drinks and snacks.

name: Hampton Inn Wilmington Downtown
description: We’re in downtown Wilmington, within a half mile of restaurants and museums. Cape Fear Community College, Thalian Hall, Wilmington Convention Center, and Cape Fear Riverfront are within a half mile. Wilmington International Airport is an eight-minute drive. Enjoy free daily hot breakfast, WiFi, and our indoor pool. Every room has a microwave and mini-fridge.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Wilmington/Mayfaire, NC
description: Wrightsville Beach is less than 10 minutes from us, and Mayfaire Town Center is five – head there for shops, dining options, and a movie theater. Airlie Gardens, USS NC Battleship, Screen Gems Studios, and downtown Wilmington are also nearby. Expect free hot breakfast and WiFi. Those in need of a night in can join our complimentary Monday – Thursday evening socials.

name: Hampton Inn Wilmington-University Area/Smith Creek Station
description: The Smith Creek Station area is two miles from the University of North Carolina–Wilmington, and four miles from downtown. Find interesting shops and restaurants a few steps from our hotel. Try a kombucha at the Panacea Brewing Company next door. In 10 minutes you’re at Wrightsville Beach. Relax in our outdoor pool. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Wilmington Riverfront
description: Our hotel overlooks the Cape Fear River and Battleship North Carolina, with direct access to Wilmington Convention Center. The Wilmington Downtown Riverwalk passes by our door, and we're a half-mile from the Historic District. Join us for a drink at our rooftop bar, and enjoy free made-to-order breakfast and complimentary evening receptions.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Chapel Hill/Durham, Area
description: We're off I-40, 20 minutes from Raleigh-Durham International Airport. The University of North Carolina and Duke University are within 15 minutes of our hotel, and NC State is a half-hour away. Enjoy our free WiFi, outdoor pool, fitness center, and free hot breakfast.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Durham Chapel Hill
description: We’re just 10 minutes from Duke University and UNC, surrounded by dining and retail. Raleigh-Durham International Airport is a 20-minute drive away. Enjoy free breakfast and WiFi during your stay, or prepare a mean in your in-suite kitchen. Pets are welcome.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Durham Southpoint
description: Find us near I-40, next to Southpoint Mall and the Streets at Southpoint. We're within 12 miles of Duke University, University of North Carolina – Chapel Hill, and downtown Durham. Raleigh-Durham International Airport is 10 minutes from our door. Enjoy our free area shuttle, indoor pool, fitness center, and Ruth's Chris Steak House.

name: DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Raleigh - Durham
description: Lake views meet suite comfort near I-40 in Durham. We're 10 minutes from the Triangle, with free shuttle service to Raleigh-Durham International Airport and The Streets at Southpoint. Our hotel features a tennis court, sand volleyball, basketball, walking trails and bike paths, plus an indoor and an outdoor pool.

name: Hilton Durham near Duke University
description: We’re 10 minutes from downtown Durham, and 18 miles from Raleigh-Durham Airport. Our free shuttle service goes to Brightleaf Square and Duke University, both three miles away. We have a seasonal outdoor pool, whirlpool, and hypoallergenic rooms. Enjoy room service and all-day dining at our restaurants. Pet’s are welcome.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Durham/University Medical Center
description: Our hotel is less than a mile from Duke University and the medical center, with a free shuttle to local destinations. Downtown Durham and 9th Street shopping, restaurants, and entertainment are within two miles. The Garden Grille serves cooked-to-order breakfast and dinner daily, and our convenience store is open 24 hours.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Durham/North I-85
description: We’re off I-85, a short drive from Downtown Durham’s shopping and dining district. Duke University is two miles away, and our free shuttle will take you to Duke Medical Center and Durham Regional Hospital. Raleigh-Durham International Airport is 22 minutes away. Enjoy our indoor pool, fitness center, and daily free hot breakfast. WiFi’s on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Raleigh-Durham/Research Triangle Park
description: We’re on the edge of Research Triangle Park, three miles from Raleigh-Durham International Airport along I-40. Our free shuttle covers the airport, RTP, and other destinations within three miles. Eat breakfast and dinner in our Great American Grill restaurant; grab a drink or snack at the 24 hour Pavilion Pantry.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Raleigh-Durham AP/Research Triangle
description: Research Triangle Park is North Carolina's innovation hub, and we're in the center of it all. We offer easy highway access for campus tours (and basketball games) at nearby Duke and UNC-Chapel Hill. Free WiFi, business facilities, and shuttle service make working on the road easy.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Raleigh-Durham Airport at Research Triangle Park
description: Find us off I-40, halfway between Raleigh and Durham and three miles from Research Triangle Park. We're 10 minutes from The Streets at Southpoint and Raleigh-Durham International Airport, with a free airport shuttle. Enjoy our seasonal outdoor pool in a tree-filled courtyard, 24-hour fitness center, and a warm DoubleTree welcome cookie.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Raleigh Durham Airport RTP
description: We have easy access to the Research Triangle, local businesses, Duke University and UNC campuses, Durham Performing Arts Center, and more. Free parking, WiFi, breakfast and in-suite kitchen are included. Don’t forget, pets are welcome. Take advantage of our free shuttle, traveling within a five-mile radius.

name: Hampton Inn Raleigh/Durham-Airport
description: We're off I-40, with several dining options half a mile away. We're two miles from Raleigh-Durham International Airport, and four miles from Research Triangle Park, home of over 200 companies. We offer a free shuttle to and from both areas. Relax in our outdoor pool. Each day, our hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Tru by Hilton Raleigh Durham Airport
description: If you’re heading here on business, ride our free shuttle bus, traveling to/from the airport and within five miles of the hotel. We’re ideal for local shops and corporate offices, with PNC Arena just under eight miles away. Make sure to visit Lake Crabtree County Park and Wake Competition Center before you go. While you’re here, WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Raleigh-Durham Airport
description: We're off I-40, five minutes from Raleigh-Durham International Airport. We offer a free shuttle both ways. Research Triangle Park is seven miles away, and within five miles there's a wide variety of businesses from Fidelity to Verizon. Our restaurant serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, and the 24-hour Pavilion Pantry has drinks and snacks.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Raleigh/Cary I-40 (PNC Arena)
description: We’re just off I-40, less than a mile from WakeMed Soccer Park and 10 minutes from PNC Arena and North Carolina State University. Crabtree Valley Mall and Raleigh-Durham International Airport are both under 10 miles away. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, free WiFi, our fitness center and outdoor pool.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Raleigh Durham Research Triangle
description: Between Raleigh and Durham along I-40, we're within 15 minutes of the airport and Research Triangle Park via our free shuttle. The interstate puts our suites less than six miles from PNC Arena events and the North Carolina State Fairgrounds. Enjoy made-to-order breakfast, a complimentary evening reception, and an indoor pool.

name: Hilton Charlotte Center City
description: In the downtown area, our hotel is linked to the Charlotte Convention Center via pedestrian walkway. Discover motoring history at the NASCAR Hall of Fame, three blocks away, and take in big events at Bank of America Stadium, BB&T Ballpark, and Spectrum Center, all less than a mile from us. Perks include free access to the connected YMCA.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Charlotte Uptown
description: Our hotel is one block from the Charlotte Convention Center and the NASCAR Hall of Fame. We're under a mile from NBA games and concerts at Spectrum Center and NFL games at Bank of America Stadium. Many local dining options are within a 10-minute walk, including shops and restaurants at Epicentre.
streetAddress: 401 East Martin Luther King Jr. Blvd.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Charlotte Uptown
description: We're across from NASCAR Hall of Fame, one mile from Charlotte Convention Center and EpiCentre nightlife. Hop on our free three-mile radius shuttle to attractions like Bank of America Stadium, Spectrum Center, and Blumenthal Performing Arts Center. Charlotte International Airport is 15 minutes away. Enjoy all-day dining and our indoor pool.
streetAddress: 508 E Martin Luther King Jr. Blvd

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Charlotte Uptown
description: We're just off I-277, across the street from the NASCAR Hall of Fame. The Spectrum Center and Bank of America Stadium are four blocks away, and Novant Health and Atrium Health medical centers are a five-minute drive. Check out the Billy Graham Library, 15 minutes from us. Enjoy free breakfast and WiFi, and prepare meals in your in-suite kitchen.

name: Hampton Inn Charlotte-Uptown
description: We're off I-277, next to the NASCAR Hall of Fame and two blocks from the convention center. It's half a mile to the Spectrum Center, and a mile to Bank of America Stadium and the offices of Bank of America, BB&T, and Wells Fargo. All are covered by our free shuttle both ways. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us, too.
streetAddress: 530 E. Martin Luther King Jr. Blvd.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Charlotte
description: We’re just outside downtown Charlotte, next to Johnson & Wales University. Bank of America Stadium, BB&T Ballpark, and Charlotte Convention Center are within a mile of our hotel. Our outdoor saline pool is open all summer, and we have a 24-hour fitness center. Every stay starts with a warm chocolate chip cookie.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Charlotte
description: Our suites are 10 minutes from Charlotte Douglas International Airport via free shuttle. We're off I-77, putting us three miles from Charlotte's upscale South End District shopping and dining, with the downtown area six miles away. Enjoy made-to-order breakfast, a complimentary evening reception, and an indoor pool and whirlpool.

name: DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Charlotte - SouthPark
description: Overlooking Symphony Park and adjacent to SouthPark Mall, our hotel is a 20-minute drive from downtown Charlotte. Charlotte Douglas International Airport is 10 miles away. Our outdoor pool area features plentiful seating and a waterfall, and we also have a fitness center for staying in shape. Every stay starts with a warm welcome cookie on arrival.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Charlotte I-77 South, NC
description: Charlotte city is in the palm of your hand. Football at the Bank of America Stadium, basketball at Spectrum Center, and the NASCAR Hall of Fame can be accessed via Lynx Light Rail, just two miles away. Corporate guests are close to business parks and the city center, six miles away. Make the most of your in-suite kitchen, and enjoy WiFi and breakfast on us. Pets are welcome.

name: Hilton Charlotte Executive Park
description: We’re just off I-77, 15 minutes from Charlotte Douglas International Airport via free shuttle. Uptown Charlotte attractions are less than seven miles away. Easy interstate access makes us the ideal stopover on the way to destinations like Greenville, Myrtle Beach, and Florida. Enjoy our seasonal outdoor pool, tranquil courtyard, and fitness center.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Charlotte/SouthPark
description: We're steps from SouthPark and Phillips Place shopping. Check out Carowinds amusement park or catch games at the Spectrum Center and Bank of America Stadium—all a 15-minute drive away. Wind down at our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday, or with some in-suite cooking. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Cherokee
description: We're next to where US-19 meets US-441, three miles from hiking and sightseeing in the Great Smoky Mountains National Park. Learn about local culture and history at the Museum of the Cherokee Indian and Oconaluftee Visitor Center, or throw the dice at Harrah's Cherokee Casino—all within 10 minutes. Relax in our outdoor pool. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Cashiers-Sapphire Valley
description: Our mountain getaway is located off Highway 64, one minute from Sapphire Valley Ski Resort. Get in touch with nature by hiking at Panthertown Valley, or visit Turtleback Falls and Rainbow Falls, all within 18 minutes. Highlands-Cashiers Hospital is 20 minutes away. Enjoy free hot breakfast and unwind by the pool. WiFi’s on us.

name: Hampton Inn Concord/Kannapolis
description: While you’re here, enjoy free WiFi and daily breakfast – you’ll need it for a day at Charlotte Motor Speedway, Concord Motorsports Park or the zMAX Dragway. The Cabarrus Arena & Event Center and Kannapolis Intimidator’s Stadium are always worth a look, as is downtown historic Concord. Corporate guests can enjoy proximity to S&D Coffee, ACN World HQ and Amazon.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Concord Charlotte
description: Motor enthusiasts are close to Charlotte Motor Speedway, Hendrick Motorsports, and car history at Roush Racing Inc. Change gears and catch a show at PNC Music Pavilion, or have a quiet night in at our free evening social, Monday – Thursday. Concord Mills Mall dining is minutes away, or cook for yourself in your in-suite kitchen. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Charlotte/Concord
description: Find us in Concord, two miles from zMAX Dragway and Charlotte Motor Speedway. We're surrounded by dining, with Concord Mills shopping and SEA LIFE Centre Charlotte five minutes from our door. PNC Music Pavilion shows are five miles away, and downtown Charlotte is 15 miles southwest via I-85. Enjoy our indoor pool and fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Concord Charlotte
description: We’re off I-85, a short drive from Concord Mills mall, Charlotte Motor Speedway, and zMAX Dragway. The University of North Carolina at Charlotte, Bank of America Stadium, and Spectrum Center are within 14 miles. Enjoy our evening socials (Monday – Saturday), our outdoor pool, and free shuttle. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hilton Charlotte University Place
description: Our lakeside hotel is off I-85, next to UNC Charlotte and the Shoppes at University Place. PNC Music Pavilion and the Charlotte Motor Speedway are 10 minutes away. Our hotel features a seasonal outdoor pool, patio seating with fire pits, a Starbucks café, and walking trails. We offer a free weekday shuttle to select destinations within five miles.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Charlotte University Research Park
description: Academic guests will be near UNC Charlotte and Carolinas Medical Center. Corporate guests will be close to the offices of Allstate, IBM, and AT&T. When it’s time for fun, catch some action at Charlotte Motor Speedway and zMAX Dragway – or change gears and tour the NASCAR Hall of Fame. WiFi and breakfast are on us, and pets are welcome. An in-suite kitchen is all yours.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Charlotte-North/Univ Research Park
description: Wake up to neighborhood parks, next door to UNC Charlotte. LYNX Blue and Gold lines are nearby, taking you to Charlotte Motor Speedway and the NASCAR Hall of Fame. We’re minutes from UNC Charlotte Botanical Gardens. End the day with a quiet meal in your in-suite kitchen, or at our free evening social, Tuesday – Thursday. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Charlotte-University Place
description: We're next to US-29, five minutes from the University of North Carolina at Charlotte. Atrium Health University City is just up the road, and we're two miles from the Wells Fargo Operations Center. See a concert at PNC Music Pavilion 15 minutes away, or head eight miles to Panthers and Hornets games downtown. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Charlotte North
description: Off I-77, we're steps from restaurants and a mile from Northlake Mall. Uptown Charlotte, Bank of America Stadium, and the NASCAR Hall of Fame are 10 miles away. Within 15 miles, reach the UNC-Charlotte campus and Charlotte Douglas Airport. Perks include our indoor pool, fitness center, free WiFi, and a 24-hour snack shop.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Charlotte Northlake
description: We're next to I-77 opposite the Northlake Mall, close to corporate offices. Our hotel is 15 minutes from the Spectrum Center and Bank of America Stadium downtown. PNC Music Pavilion, Charlotte Motor Speedway, and the University of North Carolina at Charlotte are all within 12 miles. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our indoor pool. We're pet-friendly.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Huntersville
description: Just off I-77, we're 20 minutes from Charlotte/Douglas International Airport. Outdoor adventure is five miles away at Lake Norman, and Birkdale Village's shops, restaurants, and entertainment are three miles from the hotel. Enjoy our outdoor saltwater pool, fitness center, and free WiFi and daily hot breakfast.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Salisbury
description: We're just off I-85, less than three miles from the historic center of Salisbury, home of Hall House Museum, Rowan Museum, Hambley Wallace House, and Livingstone College. We have an outdoor pool, patio area with gas grills, a Spin2Cycle laundry and fitness center, free WiFi, and serve a free hot breakfast daily.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Davidson
description: Look forward to a peaceful stay by Lake Norman, walking distance from Davidson College. We're a short drive from Mooresville and Troutman business parks, with a wealth of corporate headquarters nearby. After work, tee off at River Run Country Club. WiFi and breakfast are free, as is our evening social, Monday – Thursday. Make the most of your own in-suite kitchen.

name: Tru by Hilton Mooresville
description: We are off I-77 and less than a mile from the shores of Lake Norman. The Sun Up Café and Novanta 90 Pizzeria Napoletana are less than a mile away and the All Seasons Marina and Boat Yard is six miles away. We are a great option when visiting family or friends at Lake Norman Regional Medical Center, which is three miles away.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Charlotte Mooresville
description: Homey, comfortable suites minutes from Lake Norman are yours – no matter how long your stay. Local dining, shopping, and seasonal festivities abound in downtown Charlotte, a short drive away, and we're just two blocks from Lake Norman Regional Medical Center. Breakfast and WiFi are on us, and pets are always welcome.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Charlotte/Mooresville
description: Our hotel is off I-77, a mile from Lake Norman Regional Medical Center and Lowes’ corporate office. Downtown Mooresville and the North Carolina Auto Racing Hall of Fame are four miles away, and Lake Norman State Park is 20 minutes from our door. Our restaurant offers all-day dining, and our Pavilion Pantry is stocked with snacks.

name: Hampton Inn Charlotte-North/Lake Norman
description: Located off I-77, we're two miles from Lake Norman and 20 minutes from Charlotte. Visit Davidson College, hit the beach at Ramsey Creek Park, or shop Birkdale Village, all within four miles of the hotel. You'll find a dozen restaurants near us as well. Charlotte Douglas International Airport is 24 miles' drive. Enjoy free breakfast, WiFi, and our saltwater pool.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Mooresville/Lake Norman
description: We're off I-77 in Mooresville, a city that's home to dozens of pro auto-racing teams and businesses. We're half a mile from North Carolina Auto Racing Hall of Fame, and 35 minutes from Charlotte Motor Speedway. Or take it slow at Lake Norman State Park, 10 miles from our hotel. Relax in our outdoor pool. Hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Outer Banks/ Corolla
description: We’re right on Corolla's northern beach, moments from Audubon Pine Island Sanctuary. Currituck Beach Lighthouse, wild horse tours, and Duck’s restaurants are a 10-minute drive away. We’ve got indoor and outdoor pools, a whirlpool, and lazy river. Free WiFi, daily hot breakfast, and fitness center access complete your stay.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Outer Banks/Kitty Hawk
description: Our hotel has beach access and a fishing pier, and balconies in every room. Head 10 minutes south of the hotel for the Wright Brothers Memorial, and we're 35 minutes from The Lost Colony. Currituck Lighthouse and Wild Horse Tours are a half-hour north. Perks include our indoor pool, seasonal outdoor pool, and all-day restaurant.

name: Hampton Inn Elizabeth City
description: Discover a cozy launching pad for exploring downtown and Elizabeth City State University, both within five minutes. We're just as close to the city's waterfront dining and shopping and the Museum of the Albemarle. The U.S. Coast Guard base is 10 minutes from our door. Start each day with free hot breakfast, cool off in the outdoor pool, and enjoy WiFi on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Dobson
description: Find us off I-77, in the heart of Yadkin Valley wine country. Tour Shelton Vineyards, Round Peak Vineyards, and Herrera Vineyards – all within 13 minutes. Cedarbrook Country Club Golf Course and Mitchell River are 16 minutes away. Our fitness center will help you maintain your goals during your stay. We've got hot breakfast and WiFi covered.

name: Hampton Inn Mount Airy
description: We’re off US 601 South in Mount Airy, Andy Griffith's hometown: the real-life "Mayberry." Opie's Candy Counter and other downtown attractions inspired by the classic TV show are one mile away, and several wineries are within 15 minutes. Perks include our fitness center, indoor pool, and free hot breakfast and WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Jonesville/Elkin
description: Located off I-77, we're in the heart of wine country. Try a sip at RagApple Lassie and Raffaldini Vineyards, both 16 minutes away. Downtown Elkin is just two miles from us. Drive a half hour to visit Mount Airy, the home of Andy Griffith and inspiration for TV's Mayberry. Every stay with us includes free WiFi and free hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn Edenton
description: Reach us off Ocean Highway 17, five minutes from central historic Edenton. Discover North Carolina's past at Chowan County Courthouse, St. Paul’s Episcopal Church, Cupola House, and the 1886 Roanoke River Lighthouse Museum. You’ll be 10 minutes from Northeastern Regional Airport. Wake up to free hot breakfast, and enjoy free WiFi and fitness center access.

name: Hampton Inn Williamston
description: We're three miles south of historic downtown Williamston, and only eight minutes from shows at the Bob Martin Agricultural Center. Take the family on a seven-mile drive down to Deadwood, a Western-themed amusement park. The city of Greenville is 27 miles away. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and cool off in our outdoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn Brevard
description: Our rooms are off the Hwy 280/64/276 intersection, on the edge of Pisgah National Forest. Quick bites and shopping are steps away. Free hot breakfast is fuel for exploring Sliding Rock, Slick Rock Falls, and DuPont State Forest, all within 20 minutes. Enjoy our free WiFi, outdoor pool, and fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Forest City
description: We're just two miles from downtown Forest City. Stroll through its historic streets and explore the boutiques, antique shops and restaurants. The Classics Antique Auto Museum and the Tri City Mall are less than a mile from our hotel. We have an outdoor pool and patio with fireplace, a fitness center, and free WiFi and hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Shelby
description: Just off Bypass 74, we’re 10 minutes from Shelby center: catch a show at Don Gibson Theatre and tour the Earl Scruggs Center. You’ll be 45 minutes’ drive from Charlotte City. Cleveland Mall is steps from our front door, or for midnight cravings, stop by our 24-hour Suite Shop. Enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Morganton
description: We’re just off I-40, with easy access to outdoor activities. Pisgah National Forest, Lake James State Park, and South Mountains State Park are within half an hour; Grandfather Mountain and Linville Gorge are about an hour away. Several restaurants are within a few hundred yards. Enjoy our pool and fitness center, and free WiFi and hot breakfast.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Raleigh Midtown
description: Our hotel is near the junction of Loop 440 and US-401, just 10 minutes from downtown Raleigh. There you’ll find attractions like the State Capitol, Duke Energy Center for the Performing Arts, and multiple museums. North Carolina State University and PNC Arena are 15 minutes away. Raleigh-Durham International Airport is 25 minutes away.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Raleigh Midtown
description: Located just five miles from downtown and Raleigh Convention Center, we’re off I-440 surrounded by shops and restaurants. Catch a concert down the street at The Ritz or take a 10-minute drive to Red Hat Amphitheater. Breakfast and WiFi are on us. Relax on the terrace by our heated pool or host a meeting in our boardroom or conference room.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Knightdale Raleigh
description: We're moments from I-540, many restaurants, and stores. The convention center, downtown Raleigh attractions, and Pullen Park are a 20-minute drive away – as is North Carolina State University. Take the kids to Adventure Landing Raleigh seven miles away and relax in our heated indoor pool. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Lincolnton
description: You’ll find us just off Highway 321, close to offices of many major corporations such as Actavis, Apple, and Robert Bosch. The historic Caldwell-Cobb Love House is a mile away. Unwind in our outdoor pool or fitness center. WiFi and daily hot breakfast are free.

name: Hampton Inn Goldsboro
description: Find us just off US Highway 70, three miles from downtown and close to local restaurants. Tee off at the four semi-private and public golf courses near us, including Cutter Creek Golf, two miles away, and Lane Tree Golf Course, five miles. Relax in our pool, and enjoy free hot breakfast, WiFi, and parking.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Goldsboro
description: It doesn’t get more convenient than having shops and restaurants within walking distance, with downtown Goldsboro minutes away. Enjoy free WiFi, breakfast, parking, and your own in-suite kitchen during your stay. We’re close to Lions Water Adventure, Seymour Johnson Air Force Base, and Paramount Theatre. Pets love Neuse State Park.

name: Hampton Inn Wilson Downtown
description: We’re within 10 minutes of Wilson center and Barton College campus. Head downtown to discover why we’re ‘the city of beautiful trees’ and explore the area’s antique shops. Fill up on free hot breakfast before lazing around at Lake Wilson or heading to Rocky Mount, both within half an hour. Wind down the day with a dip in our pool, and enjoy WiFi on us.

name: Hampton Inn Kinston
description: We're on US-70 just minutes from downtown Kinston, where more than two dozen local sites are listed on the National Register of Historic Places. Visit the remains of Civil War-era ship the CSS Neuse, or do some stargazing at Ellis Planetarium. Your stay includes free daily breakfast, WiFi, and access to our pool and fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Wilson I-95
description: Our hotel is right off I-95, offering easy access to downtown Wilson, just 15 minutes from our door. Wilson Corporate Park is a four-minute drive away and there are restaurants within walking distance of the hotel. We have an outdoor pool, fitness center, and meeting rooms. Every day starts with free hot breakfast, and WiFi's on us.

name: Hilton Greenville
description: We’re on the Greenville Convention Center campus, three miles from uptown Greenville. East Carolina University, Pitt-Greenville Airport, and Greenville Mall are within five miles. Enjoy our outdoor pool, onsite restaurant and bar, and our fitness center. We offer free parking and WiFi during your stay.

name: Hampton Inn Washington
description: An afternoon or evening in Washington's waterfront area is a fantastic way to spend a day, only two miles away. Dine at local restaurants like Down On Mainstreet or Grub Brothers, visit the North Carolina Estuarium, or take a scenic walk along the Pamlico River. Start off each day with free hot breakfast, and stay connected with free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Rocky Mount
description: We're a mile from the I-95/US-64 intersection, across the street from the Gateway Convention Centre. Both Nash hospitals are three minutes away. Take the team four miles east to Rocky Mount Sports Complex, or head six miles up to North Carolina Wesleyan College. We've got an outdoor pool for you, plus volleyball and basketball courts. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Rocky Mount
description: Find us off I-95, adjacent to Nash General Hospital. Within 15 minutes, reach the Rocky Mount Sports Complex and North Carolina Wesleyan College. Our hotel features a steakhouse, fitness center, and an outdoor pool. Enjoy our Tuesday-night manager’s reception and a warm DoubleTree cookie at check-in.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Rocky Mount
description: Find us just off US-64, close to I-95. Check out downtown Rocky Mount’s run of antique shops, and explore the Rocky Mount Fire Museum, both 10 minutes from the door. We’re less than a mile from local dining, or cook your own way in your in-suite kitchen. Quiet nights are at hand with our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Jacksonville, NC
description: Experience the outdoors on your doorstep: our pet-friendly suites are moments from the beaches of Topsail Island, Emerald Island, and Surf City, while nearby military bases include Camp Lejeune and New River Air Station. Hammocks Beach State Park is also here to help you unwind after a busy day. WiFi and breakfast are free.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Jacksonville
description: We're 10 minutes from central Jacksonville, NC and steps from shopping and dining. Near Highway 17, we're also 10 minutes from Lejeune Memorial Gardens and within a half hour of Camp Lejeune and New River Air Station Marine Corps bases. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and access to our fitness center and outdoor pool.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Jacksonville
description: We're next to the Jacksonville Parkway, moments from area stores and restaurants. The Jacksonville Commons Recreation Complex is five minutes away, and it's four miles to the mall. Marine Corps Air Station New River is nine miles south. Breakfast, lunch, and dinner are served daily in our Garden Grille & Bar – evening room service is available.

name: Hampton Inn Henderson
description: Just off I-85, we're across the street from Maria Parham Medical Center. Experience the charm of downtown, just nine minutes from our doorstep. The impressive Mistletoe Villa is four miles away. Take the kids to Adventure Island, only two miles away, or drive 14 minutes to visit Kerr Lake State Recreational Area. Enjoy free WiFi and free hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn Raleigh/Town Of Wake Forest
description: We're right off US-1 near highway 98, about half an hour from downtown Raleigh. Youth league baseball, softball, soccer, and hockey games are 10 minutes away at The Factory. Head three miles east to downtown Wake Forest and the Southern Baptist Theological Seminary. Relax in our outdoor saltwater pool. We'll have free hot breakfast and WiFi waiting for you.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Raleigh Triangle Town Center
description: At the intersection of I-540 and Capital Blvd, we're in walking distance of Triangle Town Center Mall and dining. WRAL Soccer Park is three miles away, and downtown Raleigh and Wake Forest are within 10 miles. Raleigh-Durham International Airport is 15 miles from the hotel. Our hotel has an indoor pool, restaurant, and fitness center.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Raleigh North I-540
description: We're near the I-540/Capital Boulevard junction, steps from Triangle Town Center shops. WRAL Soccer Park is three miles away, and Raleigh-Durham Airport is a 20-minute drive. Join us for free breakfast, and enjoy an in-suite kitchen with full-size appliances. We have a heated indoor pool, 24-hour fitness/laundry facility, and sunlit meeting space for 30 people.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Raleigh-Durham Airport-Brier Creek
description: We’re in Brier Creek Corporate Park near the junction of I-540 and Highway 70, while Raleigh-Durham International Airport is a 10-minute free shuttle ride away. There's a variety of restaurants and department stores within a half-mile of our door, and Research Triangle Park is seven miles west. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our indoor pool.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Raleigh Durham Airport Brier Creek
description: Our hotel is right off the US-70/I-540 intersection, less than 10 minutes from Raleigh-Durham International Airport on our free shuttle. We're a mile from the shops at Briar Creek Commons, and Raleigh's famous Angus Barn is a seven-minute drive away. Enjoy free made-to-order breakfast and our complimentary Evening Reception.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Hickory
description: Just off I-40, we’re five minutes from Valley Hills Mall and three miles from Hickory Motor Speedway. Union Square and Hickory Museum of Art are less than four miles away in downtown. L.P Frans Stadium is 15 minutes from our door. Daily meals and evening room service are served from our Garden Grille & Bar. Enjoy our indoor pool and fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn Hickory
description: Discover a comfortable home off I-40 and next door to the Hickory Metro Convention Center. You'll be seven minutes from Lenoir-Rhyne University, and just as close to Catawba Science Center and the Hickory Museum of Art, the second oldest museum in North Carolina. Ballgames at L.P. Frans Stadium are 15 minutes away. Enjoy hot breakfast and WiFi on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Statesville
description: We're near the junction of I-77 and Highway 70. Statesville's shops, dining, parks, and craft breweries are all within two miles. The Fort Dobbs Historic Site and Lake Norman are within 20 minutes' drive. Our Garden Grille restaurant serves breakfast and dinner, and our Pavilion Pantry is open 24 hours for drinks and snacks.

name: Hampton Inn Statesville
description: Find us off I-77, just a mile from Starbucks and places to eat. A four-minute drive will take you to Signal Hill Mall. Davis Regional Medical Center and Statesville Civic Center are within four miles. Stay active in our fitness center or swim laps in our pool. Every stay includes free WiFi and free hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn Sneads Ferry North Topsail Beach
description: We're near Highway 17, just five minutes from the beach. Rent a boat or jet ski and go dolphin watching. It's 10 miles to Surf City, and 15 miles to the southern end of Topsail Beach. The Camp Lejeune Marine Corps Base is just 20 minutes from our hotel. Relax in our outdoor pool, and enjoy daily free hot breakfast and WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Raleigh-Capital Blvd. North
description: Off I-540 in northeast Raleigh, we're a 25-minute drive from Raleigh-Durham Airport. Exploration is easy with downtown, the North Carolina State Capitol, and Raleigh Convention Center within 15 minutes of the hotel. We've got a fitness center and outdoor pool, and every stay includes free WiFi and daily hot breakfast.

name: Hilton Raleigh North Hills
description: We’re less than two miles from North Hills shopping and dining.  Downtown Raleigh, the North Carolina State Capitol, and the North Carolina Museum of Natural Sciences are within 10 minutes. Our free shuttle will take you to and from North Hills and Raleigh-Durham International Airport, 14 miles away. Enjoy our indoor pool, fitness center, and free WiFi.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Raleigh Crabtree Valley
description: Our Raleigh hotel is a quarter-mile from Crabtree Valley Mall. Our free shuttle will take you there — and anywhere else in a three-mile radius. We're 15 minutes from downtown Raleigh, the Raleigh Convention Center, and RDU International Airport. We have a fitness center and an outdoor pool, and every stay starts with a warm DoubleTree cookie.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Raleigh/Crabtree Valley
description: We're at the junction of I-440 and US Highway 70, half a mile from Crabtree Valley Mall. Our free area shuttle will take you there. PNC Arena, and Carter-Finley Stadium, are 10 minutes' drive away. Our spacious business center is great for work, and our meeting rooms hold up to 200 people. Refresh in our pool, and enjoy daily hot breakfast and WiFi on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Raleigh /Crabtree Valley
description: We’re next to the Crabtree Valley Mall, by the intersection of I-440 and Highway 70. North Carolina State University and downtown Raleigh are within six miles, and Raleigh-Durham International Airport is 20 minutes away. Eat breakfast, lunch and dinner in our restaurant & bar. Grab a drink, snack, or ready-to-cook meal at the 24-hour Pavilion Pantry.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Raleigh-Crabtree Valley
description: Off I-440, we're steps from Crabtree Valley Mall and three miles from the North Carolina Museum of Art. Meredith College and NC State University can be reached in 10 minutes, and Raleigh-Durham International Airport is only 10 miles from our door. Enjoy an in-suite kitchen, plus hot breakfast daily and a complimentary evening social Monday – Thursday.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Raleigh Crabtree
description: Find our hotel minutes from Crabtree Valley Mall. Raleigh-Durham International Airport and downtown Raleigh are just 15 minutes away. We provide a free two-mile area shuttle and airport shuttle service, and have an indoor pool and fitness center. We host a complimentary evening reception and serve a free cooked-to-order breakfast daily.

name: Hampton Inn Lumberton
description: Discover a cozy stopover along the I-95 corridor. We're walking distance from neighborhood restaurants and Lumberton Towne Center shopping. Wake up to free hot breakfast before exploring downtown Lumberton or strolling Luther Britt Park, both 10 minutes away. Enjoy our free WiFi, 24-hour fitness center, and indoor heated pool.

name: Hampton Inn Charlotte/Matthews
description: In a quiet location close to the city, we offer the perfect base for your trip to Charlotte. Talk to our staff about arranging a golf package at one of the many nearby courses. Or if watching sport is more your style then why not catch a game of football at the Bank of America Stadium? A cozy bed, complimentary hot breakfast, and free WiFi await you back at the hotel.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Charlotte Waverly
description: We’re a mile from I-485, with shops and dining a short walk away. Downtown Charlotte attractions and Carowinds Amusement Park are within 15 miles of our hotel. Our Garden Grille restaurant serves breakfast, and our Pavilion Pantry is open 24 hours for drinks and snacks. Enjoy an evening cocktail in the bar.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Charlotte/South Park at Phillips Place
description: Located off I-77, we're in the Phillips Place shopping center, within walking distance of SouthPark and eateries. Visit downtown Charlotte attractions like the NASCAR Hall of Fame, Bank of America Stadium, and Independence Park – all within seven miles. We've got an outdoor pool, free WiFi, and free hot breakfast.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Charlotte Piper Glen
description: Find us off I-485, less than a block from Stonecrest shopping center, and within two miles of Ballantyne Corporate Place. Carowinds, Funtasticks, and downtown Charlotte attractions like NASCAR Hall of Fame, Freedom Park, and Bank of America Stadium are less than a 20-minute drive away. Enjoy free hot breakfast, a pool, and suites with kitchens.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Charlotte/SouthPark
description: We're seven miles from downtown Charlotte, a short walk from restaurants and shopping malls. Queens University of Charlotte is four miles away. The Bank of America Stadium and Carowinds Amusement Park are both within 10 miles. Our Garden Grille restaurant serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner. The Pavilion Pantry is open 24 hours for drinks and snacks.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Charlotte/Ballantyne
description: We're along I-485, 14 miles from downtown Charlotte and a quick walk to HRG and Xpient offices. Ballantyne corporate park is five minutes away, home to Liberty Mutual, Honda, and MetLife. Go shopping at Carolina Place or take the kids to Funtasticks, both within five miles. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our outdoor pool.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Charlotte Ballantyne, NC
description: With an abundance of nearby shops, restaurants, and corporate offices, we're your ideal base for business or leisure in Ballantyne. There's plenty of room to relax in your apartment-style suite, complete with a full kitchen. Take advantage of free WiFi and daily hot breakfast while you're here, or unwind at our evening social (every Monday – Thursday).

name: Hampton Inn Roxboro
description: We’re just over 40 miles away from Raleigh-Durham International Airport and 35 miles from North Carolina’s Research Triangle. Discover some history at The Person County Museum of History, a mile away. Nearby Hyco Lake offers boating, fishing, and swimming. Breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Charlotte/Monroe
description: We're just off US-74, four miles from Charlotte-Monroe Executive Airport and surrounding companies, including UTC, Greiner Bio-One, and Circor. Wingate University is a nine-mile drive southeast, passing by downtown Monroe and The Bottle Factory event venue on the way. Relax in our outdoor pool, and enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Charlotte/Pineville
description: Located off I-485, we're next to Carolina Place Mall and less than a mile from a choice of restaurants. Pineville Lake Park and the President James K. Polk Historic Site are within four minutes. A half hour drive will take you to Bank of America Stadium and Charlotte Douglas International Airport. Your stay with us includes free WiFi and free hot breakfast.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Charlotte Pineville
description: Off the I-485, we’re within minutes of downtown Charlotte, Narroway theatre, and Carowinds Amusement Park. The light rail is two miles away, and NASCAR Hall of Fame and Charlotte Airport are within 15 miles. Our Garden Grille restaurant & bar serves breakfast and dinner. Room service is available in the evening.

name: Hampton Inn Murphy
description: We're in historic downtown Murphy, minutes from local restaurants and the scenic Murphy River Walk. Take in views of the Appalachian Mountains and hike or kayak along the Ocoee and Nantahala rivers an hour away. Start your day with free hot breakfast and enjoy our fitness center and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Charlotte-Arrowood Rd.
description: Known as the ‘Queen city’ (after King George III’s wife), Charlotte was the original goldrush town. These days, you have a choice of gold-tier entertainment: Carowinds water and theme park, Regent Park Golf Club, Bank of America Stadium, Spectrum Center and numerous malls. WiFi and breakfast are on us. After all, nobody got rich spending their gold on eggs.

name: Hampton Inn Roanoke Rapids
description: We’re off I-95 in Roanoke Rapids, 25 minutes from Halifax. A range of restaurants are within walking distance, and Halifax Regional Medical Center is just over a mile away. Catch a show at Roanoke Rapids Theatre, just over five minutes from us or fuel up on free hot breakfast before a relaxing day at Roanoke Rapids Lake,13 miles away. WiFi's on us and we have a fitness center and outdoor pool.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Roanoke Rapids
description: We're within 15 minutes of historic Halifax and walking distance of Roanoke Rapids Theatre. The scenery of Lake Gaston and Medoc Mountains State Park are a half-hour away. We have an on-site restaurant serving breakfast and dinner, and a 24-hour snack shop. Our meeting space accommodates up to 100 people. Enjoy our indoor pool and whirlpool, fitness center, and free WiFi.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Charlotte Belmont
description: None

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Bismarck
description: Around the corner from the Missouri River and just off the I-94, we’re minutes from Bismarck State College and an idyllic launch pad for your Dakota discoveries. Dining and shopping options are plentiful in nearby downtown Bismarck. Enjoy free WiFi and complimentary hot breakfast – or stock your suite’s kitchen.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Bismarck Northwest
description: We’re off I-94, just over the Missouri River from Bismarck, ND. We’re 15 minutes from the airport and 10 from downtown's shopping, dining, and entertainment. Bismarck State College and Pinehurst Shopping Center are each less than mile from our door. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our indoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn Bismarck
description: We're just a half mile from I-94. Downtown Bismarck and the North Dakota Heritage Center are under two miles away, and the Dakota Zoo is only a few minutes further. The airport is a quick six-mile drive south, and shopping at the Kirkwood Mall is on the way. Enjoy free hot breakfast and free WiFi. Relax in our indoor pool and spa.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Dickinson
description: We’re right off I-94, just seven miles from Dickinson Theodore Roosevelt Regional Airport. Fuel up with our free hot breakfast before exploring the history of the Great Plains. Discover wildlife at the Theodore Roosevelt National Park or go back in time at the Badlands Dinosaur Museum, just two miles away. Relax in our indoor pool and enjoy free WiFi.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Fargo
description: We’re opposite the FargoDome, walking distance from North Dakota State University, and a six-minute drive from Hector International Airport. Central Fargo is 10 minutes away: check out the Plains Art Museum, thrift stores, and maritime artifacts at the Hjemkonst Center. Stop by our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday, and enjoy free WiFi and daily hot breakfast.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Fargo
description: Our hotel is close to I-29 and I-94, with easy access to downtown Fargo, and Fargo Medical Center. We have 14,000 sq. ft of flexible function space, free WiFi, parking, and a business center. Enjoy our indoor pool and fitness center. The Garden Grille & Bar serves breakfast and dinner, and snacks are available anytime from the Pavilion Pantry.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Fargo, ND
description: Set in the city’s vibrant shopping district, we’re minutes from the West Acres Mall and Cinema, as well as a great selection of restaurants and bars. Here for an event? Fargodome and Scheels Arena are also within easy reach. Start your day right with free hot breakfast and kick back in your suite with free WiFi and a kitchen. Fido’s welcome in Fargo too – our hotel is pet-friendly.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Fargo Medical Center
description: Turn off I-94 and find us just a half-mile from Sanford Medical Center. You’ll be 10 minutes from Minnesota State University Moorhead, Concordia College, and North Dakota State University. Family fun is two minutes away at Red River Zoo, and Hector International Airport is 15 minutes from the door. Wake up to free hot breakfast, and enjoy WiFi on us.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton West Fargo Sanford Medical Center Area
description: We’re off I-94, one mile from Sanford Medical Center. Within 10 minutes, reach West Acres Regional Shopping Center, the North Dakota State University, and Scheels Arena. Our hotel features an indoor pool, patio seating with a fire pit, and a free shuttle to Hector International Airport. Every stay starts with a warm DoubleTree cookie.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton West Fargo Sanford Medical Center Area
description: Our hotel is just off I-94, across from Sanford Medical Center. We offer a free shuttle to the hospital and Hector International Airport, seven miles away. We're within 15 minutes of Scheels Arena, the Plains Art Museum, and West Acres. Join us for free hot breakfast daily and our complimentary evening social Monday – Thursday.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Grand Forks-UND
description: By the I-29/Route 297 intersection, we're one block from the University of North Dakota, connected to UND Aerospace campus by skywalk. Downtown Grand Forks is four miles away, with Ralph Engelstad Arena and River Cities Speedway five minutes from our door Grand Forks International Airport is six miles away. Enjoy our indoor pool and fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Grand Forks
description: We're just off I-29 on the 42nd Street corridor, less than a mile from the Columbia Mall. The University of North Dakota and UND sporting events at the Alerus Center and Ralph Engelstad Arena are less than 10 minutes from our door, and Grand Forks International Airport is a 15-minute drive. Enjoy daily hot breakfast, WiFi, and parking on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Jamestown, ND
description: We're a minute south of I-94, within walking distance of the Buffalo Mall. Discover local eateries and shops downtown, like Jonny B's Brickhouse, and visit the University of Jamestown three miles north. Historical Frontier Village and the National Buffalo Museum are only minutes away. Enjoy free daily hot breakfast and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Minot Airport
description: Located off Highway 83, we're less than a mile from Minot International Airport and Minot State University. In just two miles, discover local attractions like Roosevelt Park Zoo and Scandinavian Heritage Park. Trinity Hospital is four minutes away, while Minot Air Force Base is 22 minutes from us. Start your day with our free hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Williston
description: We’re right off Highway 85, just a one-minute walk from Davidson Park and two miles from Sloulin Field International Airport. Discover Lewis & Clark State Park, only 30 minutes away. Or take the 25-mile drive to the Fort Union Trading Post National Historic Site. Enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Akron
description: We’re off Route 18 and I-76 in Akron’s East End, across the street from Goodyear Theater. The University of Akron and Goodyear Headquarters are five minutes away, and we’re within three miles of Canal Park stadium. Akron-Canton Airport is 15 minutes from our door. Enjoy meals in our Garden Grille & Bar, access to the indoor pool and 24-hour fitness center, and a free five-mile shuttle.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Akron - Fairlawn
description: We're a five-minute walk from Summit Mall, close to I-77 in Fairlawn. Enjoy full-service dining on site and a variety of restaurants nearby. The University of Akron and downtown attractions like the Akron Zoo are seven miles away. We have a fitness center and an indoor pool, and every stay starts with our signature warm chocolate chip cookie.

name: Hilton Akron/Fairlawn
description: Located off Route 18, our stylish retreat is adjacent to Summit Mall shopping and dining and within four miles of Akron's Stan Hywet Hall & Gardens. Relax with a massage or a sauna session, and enjoy meals in our award-winning restaurant. Perks include our indoor and outdoor pools, fitness center, and fire pit area.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Stow Akron
description: Located off Ohio State Route 8, our pet-friendly suites are close to Blossom Music Center and Cuyahoga Valley National Park. Business travelers, we're also near corporate offices like NMG Aerospace and JoAnn Inc. Expect free WiFi and breakfast – fuel for a day’s hiking, working, indulging, or all of the above.

name: Hampton Inn Akron-South
description: We’re off I-77, just 10 minutes from downtown and the University of Akron. Kent State University is 20 minutes from the hotel. Boat, hike, or fish, Portage Lakes State Park, six miles away. Or meet exotic animals from all over the world at Akron Zoo. Back at the hotel, enjoy a dip in the pool. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Stow
description: Located off Route 8, we're four miles from Fox Den Golf Course and 11 minutes from Cuyahoga Valley National Park. Chapel Hill Mall and Akron Art Museum are 13 minutes away. A 20-minute drive will take you to Kent State and the University of Akron. Start your day with our free hot breakfast. Our free WiFi will keep you in the loop.

name: Hampton Inn Akron-Fairlawn
description: Find us 15 minutes from central Akron: catch a ballgame at Canal Park stadium or visit the University of Akron. We’re off I-77, giving you access to Cleveland in one direction and Canton in the other, both half an hour’s drive. You’ll be just 20 minutes from Akron Fulton International Airport. Explore nearby dining, and enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Akron Fairlawn, OH
description: Find us just off I-77, 20 minutes from concerts at Blossom Music Center and within a mile of local dining. Start the day with free breakfast before walking the dog in Cuyahoga Valley National Park, 10 minutes away, and finish the night at our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday. Culinary guests can enjoy an in-suite kitchen. WiFi’s on us.

name: Hampton Inn Kent/Akron Area
description: We’re off I-76, just three miles from Kent, and even closer to Kent State University. The galleries, museums, and shops of Akron are 12 miles away. While you’re there, visit exotic animals from all over the world at Akron Zoo, including tigers. The Pro Football Hall of Fame, showcasing memorabilia from NFL stars, is 25 miles away. Breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Akron-Canton Airport
description: We’re off I-77, a mile from Akron-Canton Airport, and our free shuttle covers a five mile radius. The Pro Football Hall of Fame, business headquarters, and shopping can be reached in 10 minutes. Enjoy breakfast and dinner in The Garden Grille® or 24-hour drinks and snacks in the Pavilion Pantry®. WiFi and parking are on us and we have meeting space available.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Cleveland-Southeast/Streetsboro
description: Find us off I-80, about half an hour from both Cleveland and Akron. You’re just 10 minutes from shopping in Hudson or at the Aurora Farms Premium Outlets. See the valley views from the Cuyahoga Valley Scenic Railroad, or take the family to Geauga Lake's Wild Water Kingdom – both less than half an hour away. Relax in our indoor pool and hot tub. The WiFi and hot breakfast are free.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Akron Canton Airport
description: We're off I-77 in North Canton, five minutes from Akron-Canton Airport, and we provide a free shuttle anywhere in a five mile radius. We have a heated indoor pool and more than 6,000 sq. ft. of event space. Join us for our evening reception in our atrium and take a seat by one of our fire pits. A free cooked-to-order breakfast is served daily.

name: Hampton Inn Richfield
description: We’re on the edge of Cuyahoga Valley National Park, just off I-77 and the Ohio Turnpike. Take a leisurely stroll, picnic by Brandywine Falls, or ride on the vintage Scenic Railroad. Both Cleveland and Akron are half an hour away. Enjoy our business center, indoor pool, and free fitness center, free hot breakfast, and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Medina
description: We’re off I-71, half an hour from Cleveland. Get in the swing of things at Pleasant Valley Country Club, six minutes’ drive from our door. Or enjoy Christmas all year round at Castle Noel, a festive funland, only four miles away. Ohio Station Outlets, featuring vintage English steam trains, is 20 minutes’ drive. Breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Alliance
description: Our Alliance hotel is right off Highway 62. We are five minutes from Carnation City Mall and the University of Mount Union. A 30-minute drive will take you to the Pro Football Hall of Fame. Visit Beech Creek Botanical Garden and Glamorgan Castle, just eight minutes from your room. During your stay, WiFi is free, just like our hot breakfast.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Canton Downtown
description: Welcome to the heart of downtown Canton, the perfect location for exploring unique local restaurants, coffee shops, and museums such as National First Ladies Library. We're five miles from the Pro Football Hall of Fame and Hall of Fame Village powered by Johnson Controls. Our hotel features over 11,000 sq. ft. of meeting space, an indoor pool, fitness center, and full-service restaurant.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Canton
description: Expect easy access to downtown Canton, near Sippo Lake Park – great for dog walking. We’re a short distance from Belden Village Mall, ideal when carrying shopping bags. Make a stop at a local restaurant, or cook to your own tastes in your in-suite kitchen. Grab free breakfast before exploring Hartville Marketplace, and enjoy free WiFi when you get back.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Canton
description: Located off I-77, we're 10 minutes from downtown Canton and 25 minutes from Akron. Shop and dine at Belden Village Mall, one mile from the hotel. Learn about legends at the Pro Football Hall of Fame, or the 25th President at McKinley Presidential Library & Museum, five miles away. Our daily Akron-Canton Airport shuttle, hot breakfast, and WiFi are free.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Youngstown-Canfield
description: We’re off Highway 224, two minutes from Loghurst Western Reserve and six minutes from Mill Creek Golf Course. Visit Lanterman’s Mill, just five miles away. Get your shopping fix at Southern Park Mall or see a race at Quaker City Motorsports Park, both within 12 minutes. Butler Institute of American Art is 15 miles away. Enjoy a hot breakfast on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Youngstown West/Austintown
description: Located just off Interstate 80, our pet-friendly hotel is a launch pad into Ohio and a short drive from downtown Youngstown, Youngstown State University, and a host of golf courses. Fuel each day with free breakfast, or cook at leisure in your in-suite kitchen. WiFi is free, too.

name: Hampton Inn Youngstown-West I-80
description: We're just off I-80 in Youngstown, a short walk from a choice of restaurants, and five minutes' drive from Austintown. Our daily free hot breakfast is fuel for strolling through Mill Creek MetroParks, seven miles away. Or explore the vineyards at the Mastropietro Winery, less than 20 minutes from our door. Enjoy free WiFi and our indoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn Massillon
description: We're in Downtown Massillon, less than a mile from Massillon Museum and eight miles from the Pro Football Hall of Fame. Get back to nature at Sippo Lake Park, or walk the trails at Jackson Bog State Nature Preserve, both 15 minutes away. Unwind in our fitness center, and enjoy WiFi, daily hot breakfast and parking on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Niles/Warren
description: We're off Highway 422 in the Eastwood Mall Complex. Catch a baseball game at Eastwood Field or take the kids to Extreme Air Trampoline Park, both a quick walk from the hotel. Take a 20-minute drive to visit Youngstown Air Reserve Station, The Butler Institute of American Art, and Youngstown State University. Enjoy our free hot breakfast and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Ashland
description: We’re at the crossroads of I-71 and State Route 250, moments from Ashland University and half an hour from Mohican State Park and the Mid-Ohio Sports Car Course. You’ll find grocery stores and several restaurants just a few yards from our hotel. Enjoy our indoor pool, 24-hour fitness center, free WiFi, and hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Mansfield-South @ I-71
description: We're just off I-71, midway between Columbus and Cleveland. Fill up on our hot breakfast, then explore the Shawshank Trail and fun rides at Richland Carrousel Park, both five miles away. Mohican State Park is 30 minutes' drive, for hikes and canoeing. Dine out at a host of restaurants three miles from us, then chill in our pool. WiFi is free.

name: Hampton Inn Mansfield/Ontario
description: The easy part: free breakfast and WiFi are yours. Now the hard part: deciding. We’re minutes from Ohio State Reformatory, filming site of The Shawshank Redemption, a short drive from Mansfield Motorsports Speedway and Little Buckeye Children’s Museum. Kingwood Center’s 47-acre garden is worth a visit, or you could just relax in our indoor pool and fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn Wooster
description: We're in the heart of Wooster's business district, 10 minutes from Wayne Center for the Arts and the College of Wooster. Play golf at Wooster Country Club and LC Boles Golf Course, four miles from us, or work out in our fitness center and pool. WiFi and daily hot breakfast are on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Wooster
description: Our hotel is minutes from the Ohio State University Agricultural Technical Institute campus and offers easy access to US Route 30. Downtown historic Wooster and the College of Wooster are both within a 15-minute drive. Perks include our heated indoor pool, whirlpool, and free WiFi. Breakfast is available in the Garden Grille & Bar.

name: Hampton Inn Lancaster
description: Our hotel is in a historic town, famous for its covered bridges. We're less than 10 minutes from the Lancaster campus of Ohio University. Visit the Ohio Glass Museum or play a round at Pleasant Valley Golf Course, both 10 minutes away. Hike and bike at Buckeye Lake or Hocking Hills State Park. It's only 40 miles to downtown Columbus. WiFi and daily hot breakfast are free.

name: Hampton Inn Ashtabula
description: We're just off I-90, 15 minutes from the shores of Lake Erie. Fuel up with our free hot breakfast before charter fishing or a day on the beach. Bridge Street, 15 minutes' drive, is home to quirky shops, eateries, and a lift bridge, and Hemlock Springs Golf Club is seven miles away. Relax in our pool and enjoy WiFi on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Cleveland-Mentor
description: Our hotel in Mentor is three miles from the shore of Lake Erie. Its beaches, parkland, and trails are perfect for hiking and biking. We’re 30 miles from downtown Cleveland, with its many attractions. Enjoy family fun at the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame, the Great Lakes Science Center, or the Metroparks Zoo and Rainforest. Or, relax in our heated pool. WiFi and daily hot breakfast are free.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Cleveland-Beachwood
description: We’re off I-271, a short walk from dining options. Ride our free five-mile shuttle covering shopping at Pinecrest, Beachwood Place Mall, Legacy Village, and entertainment at JACK Thistledown Racino. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, free WiFi, an in-suite kitchen, and evening social, Monday – Wednesday. Our courtyard features outdoor grills and a fire pit.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Cleveland Beachwood
description: We're close to Legacy Village and Beachwood Place's award-winning restaurants. If you want a little home-cooked goodness, try your own in-suite kitchen. Business guests are near Eaton Corporation and Aleris offices, with downtown Cleveland 20 minutes away. WiFi and breakfast are on us. Stop by the front desk and introduce us to your pets.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Cleveland Beachwood
description: We're off I-271, less than 15 minutes from Beachwood Place mall and Legacy Village. Cleveland-Hopkins International Airport and downtown are within a half hour. Our hotel has an indoor pool, fitness center, and a free weekday shuttle to businesses within five miles. Enjoy free cooked-to-order breakfast and our complimentary evening reception.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Cleveland East Beachwood
description: We're a 30-minute drive from downtown Cleveland and its many attractions including the Rock n Roll Hall of Fame, Progressive Field, and the Great Lakes Science Center. We have an indoor/outdoor pool and whirlpool, a 24-hour fitness center, and every stay begins with a warm welcome cookie on arrival.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Cleveland-Beachwood
description: Just off I-271, we're walking distance from the shops, restaurants, and entertainment at Pinecrest. Downtown Cleveland is 25 minutes away and is home to the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame, ball games at Progressive Field, and a vibrant dining and craft beer scene. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, free WiFi, business center access, and our indoor pool.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Cleveland East/Mayfield Village
description: We’re off I-271, four miles from the North Chagrin Nature Center. The Cleveland Museum of Art, the Severance Hall concert venue, and the shore of Lake Erie are all within 10 miles. Downtown Cleveland is 20 miles. Our restaurant, The Great American Grill, serves breakfast and dinner. The Pavilion Pantry is open 24 hours for drinks and snacks.

name: Hampton Inn Cleveland-Solon
description: We’re on Aurora Road, a short walk from local dining and an AMC theatre. Solon businesses such as Nestle, Superior Beverage, and Kennametal are within 10 minutes. MGM Northfield Park is seven miles away and we’re 20 minutes from Aurora Farms Premium Outlets. Downtown Cleveland is 20 miles away. Enjoy daily hot breakfast, our indoor pool, and WiFi on us.

name: The Tudor Arms Hotel Cleveland - a DoubleTree by Hilton
description: Built in 1933, our hotel combines modern comforts and historic charm in Cleveland's University Circle area. We're next to Cleveland Clinic  and half a mile from Case Western Reserve University. Our free shuttle covers a two-mile radius, including Severance Hall and the Cleveland Museum of Natural History.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Cleveland-Solon
description: Find us in Solon, Ohio’s business district, five minutes off Highway 422. You’ll have easy access to I-271 and I-480, which runs to Cleveland Hopkins International Airport, 25 minutes away. Our free shuttle covers a five-mile radius. Finish the day at our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday, or with some in-suite cooking. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Tru by Hilton Cleveland Midtown
description: Find our hotel off I-90, within two miles of Cleveland Clinic and Case Western Reserve University. Downtown Cleveland attractions like the Rock & Roll Hall Of Fame, Playhouse Square, FirstEnergy Stadium, and Westside Market are can be reached in 10 minutes. Enjoy our outdoor fire pit, 24-hour fitness center, and free hot breakfast.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Dayton Beavercreek
description: Close to I-675, we're steps from shops and dining at the Mall at Fairfield Commons. Our hotel is three miles from Decoy Art Center, and the University of Dayton and downtown are 15 minutes away. Unwind in our heated indoor pool and check out the fire pit on our patio. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Dayton Beavercreek
description: We're off I-675, five minutes from Wright State University and the Nutter Center. The mall and Soin Medical Center are across the road. Take in history at the National Museum of the US Air Force five miles east. It's eight miles to downtown Dayton. Breakfast, lunch, and dinner are served daily in our Garden Grille & Bar – room service is available from 5–9pm.

name: Tru by Hilton Beavercreek Dayton
description: We're located just off I-675, within two miles of Wright State University, Soin Medical Center, and The Mall at Fairfield Commons. Beavercreek, National Museum of the US Air Force, and Wright-Patterson Air Force Base can be reached in 10 minutes. Enjoy free hot breakfast and complimentary hot drinks in the lobby.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Dayton-Fairborn (Wright Patterson)
description: We're next to Wright State University and just a short drive from Wright-Patterson Air Force Base. Nearby, you can explore aviation history at the National Museum of the United States Air Force. We're walking distance from restaurants, though your suite includes a full kitchen if you prefer to cook. WiFi and breakfast are free, as is our evening social (Monday – Thursday).

name: Hampton Inn Dayton/Fairborn
description: Staying here means living in the flight path of Boeing, Lockheed Martin and the Wright Patterson Air Force Base and Museum, site of the Wright brothers’ first figure-eight maneuver. WiFi and breakfast are on us. We’re adjacent to Wright State University and close the Mall at Fairfield Commons, with Dayton’s 687 acres of parkland accessible by our free bus service.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Dayton-Centerville
description: We’re just 15 minutes from downtown Dayton, with The Greene outdoor shopping village nearby. Flirt with Lady Luck at Hollywood Gaming and Raceway. We’re ideal for teeing off at the Golf Club at Yankee Trace and exploring the National Museum of the U.S. Air Force. Enjoy free WiFi, breakfast, and an in-suite kitchen. Pets are welcome.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Xenia Dayton
description: Reach us off US-35, within 20 minutes of Wright State, Central State, Cedarville, and Dayton Universities. Downtown historic Xenia is 10 minutes away, home of Greene County Historical Society Museum. Highway access puts you 25 minutes’ drive from central Dayton and Wright-Patterson Air Force Base.  Wake up to free hot breakfast, and enjoy WiFi on us.

name: Tru by Hilton Huber Heights Dayton
description: Our hotel is next to the Rose Music Center, right off I-70. We have a variety of restaurants close to the hotel, and we're 20 minutes from downtown and the University of Dayton. Dayton International Airport is 10 miles away. Start your day with a free build-your-own hot breakfast. WiFi is on us too.

name: Hampton Inn Dayton/Huber Heights
description: Find us halfway between Columbus and Cincinnati, where I-75 and I-70 meet.
