Our hotel is 10 minutes from the airport, and less than 15 minutes from downtown Dayton and the University of Dayton. Start your day with our free hot breakfast, and work out in our fitness center and pool. WiFi is free.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Dayton Vandalia
description: Spacious, pet-friendly suites are yours to customize. We’re just off US 70 and US 75 near Dayton airport, with easy access to Dayton Convention Center and an eclectic mix of local restaurants. Make the most of the WiFi and fill up your breakfast plate – both are on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Dayton-Vandalia
description: Find us off I-75, seven miles from Dayton International Airport. Start your day with free hot breakfast and choose from a variety of restaurants nearby. The Dayton Art Institute, National Museum of the US Air Force, Wright State University, and the University of Dayton are all within 20 minutes of our door. Enjoy our indoor pool and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Dayton/Dayton Mall
description: We’re off I-75, just three minutes’ walk from Dayton Mall, and 15 minutes from downtown Dayton. The University of Dayton, Kettering College, Dayton Art Institute, and Wright State University, are all less than 20 minutes’ drive away. Hit the nature trails of Cox Arboretum MetroPark, two miles away. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, WiFi, and our indoor pool.

name: DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Dayton - Miamisburg
description: Our suites are near the junction of I-75 and I-675, around the corner from Dayton Mall. The National Museum of the US Air Force, Miamisburg Mound, downtown, and the University of Dayton are within 15 minutes. Perks include our outdoor pool, snack shop, and a warm DoubleTree cookie on arrival.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Dayton-South
description: Find us just off I-75, 20 minutes from central Dayton. Show the little ones the ropes at Hazzards Miniature Golf before teeing off for real at Yankee Trace Golf Club, 10 minutes away. Dayton Mall, next door, can help with any retail cravings. Kick back at complimentary evening socials, Monday – Thursday, or with some in-suite cooking. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Dayton South-Austin Landing
description: We're on the Cincinnati – Dayton Corridor, next to Austin Landing shopping and entertainment, with local corporate offices steps away. Interstate 75 puts us 13 miles from downtown Dayton attractions, passing by Carillon Historical Park and the University of Dayton on the way. We have a heated indoor pool, fitness center, and patio area.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Dayton South
description: We're located off I-75, across the highway from shops and restaurants at Austin Landing. Central Dayton, Boonshoft Museum of Discovery, and the National Museum of the US Air Force are within a 20-minute drive. Dayton International Airport is 25 minutes away. Enjoy free hot breakfast and our indoor saline pool.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Cincinnati Northeast Blue Ash
description: Our hotel is in the heart of Blue Ash and just a 10-minute ride from corporations such as General Electric and IBM, via our complimentary shuttle. Downtown Cincinnati with Great American Ballpark, Washington Park, and Findlay market is within 20 minutes. Unwind at our complimentary evening reception and wake-up to a free breakfast every morning.

name: Hampton Inn Blue Ash/Cincinnati
description: If you’re traveling for work, we’re ideally located in a bustling business neighborhood, close to Blue Ash town center. We know how to have fun, too: check out the Cincinnati Zoo, the Botanical Gardens, or King’s Island Amusement Park – or take in a Friday evening concert in the town square. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Cincinnati / Kenwood
description: Located off I-71, we’re across from Kenwood Towne Center and next to The Cincinnati FBI Headquarters. Walk the trails at French Park or check out the Cincinnati Observatory, both within six miles. A 15-minute drive will take you to Cincinnati Zoo & Botanical Garden. Enjoy our heated indoor pool and fitness center. We’ve got WiFi and hot breakfast covered.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Cincinnati Blue Ash
description: We're 10 minutes from downtown Blue Ash and within a half-mile of local dining. Summit Park, home of the Observation Tower, is two miles away, and Kings Island theme park is 10 miles from the door. Cincinnati is a half-hour away via I-71. Enjoy our restaurant, evening room service, and snacks from the 24-hour Pavilion Pantry.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Blue Ash Cincinnati
description: Whether it’s business or pleasure, this is the place for a great stay. We’re nestled in the heart of the business district, but close to Kings Island Amusement & Waterpark. Check out Summit Park, featuring a wealth of attractions, or tee off at Blue Ash Golf Course –– voted one of the top 75 in the country. Make the most of your in-room kitchen, plus breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Cincinnati - Blue Ash
description: We’re off I-275, close to a variety of Blue Ash and Sharonville businesses. Blue Ash Sports Center, Clete McDaniels Sports Complex, and the Ronnie Grandison Basketball Academy are within five minutes. King’s Island amusement park is nine miles from our door. Enjoy our fitness center, outdoor pool, and on-site dining. WiFi and parking are on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Cincinnati/Sharonville
description: Just off I-75, we're a mile from the Sharonville Convention Center and Splash Cincinnati Water Park, and 15 minutes from Kenwood Towne Centre shops. Visit the Great American Ball Park or Paul Brown Stadium, both within 25 minutes. Our restaurant offers cooked-to-order breakfast and evening room service. Enjoy our fitness center, indoor pool, and 24-hour convenience shop.

name: Tru by Hilton Sharonville Cincinnati
description: Our Tru hotel is located off I-75 a mile from Sharonville Convention Center, near I-275 and I-71. Enjoy free WiFi, free ‘Top It’ breakfast bar and 24/7 market with a variety of snacks and beverages. Unwind in the fitness center or indoor heated pool or snuggle in to your comfortable bed and surf the channels on the large HDTV. Each room also includes a rolling desk and spacious bathroom.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Cincinnati Northeast
description: We're off I-275, three miles from Oasis Golf & Conference Center and Lake Isabella. The Promont House Museum and Loveland Castle Museum are within seven miles, and Loveland Bike Trail is a 10-minute drive. Downtown Cincinnati can be reached in under 25 minutes. Enjoy our pool, restaurant, room service, and 24-hour convenience shop.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Cincinnati-Mason
description: Our Mason rooms are off I-71, 10 minutes from the thrills of Kings Island and The Beach Waterpark. You'll find a variety of shopping and dining options in the neighborhood. Free hot breakfast is the ideal start for trips to Cincinnati, 25 minutes away. Enjoy free WiFi and access to our 24-hour Suite Shop and fitness center.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Cincinnati Mason, OH
description: With more than 90 corporations headquartered in Mason, we're well-situated for business travel. Nearby, you'll find plenty of shopping, dining, and leisure options – including Kings Island amusement park, just 11 minutes away. While you're here, enjoy free WiFi and a spacious suite with a full kitchen. Your stay includes daily hot breakfast and an evening social (Monday – Thursday).

name: Homewood Suites By Hilton Cincinnati Midtown
description: You’ll be walking distance from shopping, with central Cincinnati just eight miles away. We’re a short drive from Kings Island amusement park. Or, take it slower at Eden Park’s Art Museum and Krohn Observatory, 15 minutes away. Finish the day at our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday. Breakfast and WiFi are on us, and culinary guests can enjoy an in-suite kitchen.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Cincinnati/Mason
description: We're near I-71, moments from several restaurants and shops. Kings Island, Soak City water park, and the Lindner Family Tennis Center are five miles up the highway. Several corporate offices are within five minutes, including P&G Mason and Cengage. Breakfast and dinner are served in our Great American Grill, and our event space can host up to 225 guests.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Cincinnati-Union Centre
description: Next to I-75, we're close to the best of West Chester: The Square at Union Centre, Streets of West Chester shopping, and Indiana Wesleyan University Conference Center are our neighbors. You'll be 15 minutes from Miami Valley Gaming Casino and just 25 minutes north of downtown Cincinnati. Start your day with free hot breakfast, and enjoy WiFi on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Cincinnati/West Chester
description: Off I-75, we're close to restaurants and family-friendly entertainment and six miles from Voice of America Metropark. Reds and Bengals games and other downtown Cincinnati draws are less than a half-hour from our hotel. Our Garden Grille restaurant & bar serves breakfast. The Pavilion Pantry is open 24 hours for drinks and snacks.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Cincinnati/West Chester
description: We’re just off I-75, five minutes from the University of Phoenix Cincinnati, and within a mile of local business. Enjoy the thrills of Kings Island amusement park, 20 minutes away, or stroll over to the Streets of West Chester shops and dining. For quiet nights, try your in-suite kitchen or our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Springdale Cincinnati
description: We are just off I-275, within 10 minutes of Tri-County Mall, IKEA, and Topgolf. We’re also within a few miles of several commercial businesses. Enjoy time outdoors strolling the trails along Winton Lake or through Trillium Trails Wildflower Preserve. Cincinnati is just 30 minutes away. Our pet-friendly hotel features free WiFi and breakfast.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Cincinnati Midtown
description: Find us within a mile of Xavier University, Cinta Center events, and Rookwood Commons. We're adjacent to TriHealth Rehab Hospital and next to I-71, putting you within six miles of Cincinnati Zoo and the city center. Our Great American Grille offers breakfast, dinner, and evening room service, and we have a 24-hour Pavilion Pantry for snacks.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Cincinnati-Milford
description: Nestled in a peaceful suburb, we offer a tranquil stay within driving distance of Cincinnati. While you’re here, practice your swing at Stonelick Hills Golf Club If you feel like a quiet night in, stop by our free evening social, Monday – Thursday, before cooking a meal in your in-suite kitchen. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Tru By Hilton Milford Cincinnati
description: Just off I-275, our hotel is across the road from several restaurants. Downtown Milford, local eateries, and commercial offices are within three miles. EastGate Mall is less than 10 minutes away. Downtown Cincinnati, Duke Energy Convention Center, Great American Ballpark, and other attractions are just 25 minutes away.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Toledo Perrysburg
description: Our hotel is in The Town Center at Levis Commons, surrounded by restaurants, shops, and entertainment. Downtown Toledo, Toledo Museum, and Toledo Express Airport are within a 20-minute drive. Cooked-to-order breakfast and dinner are served at Garden Grille, and snacks are available 24 hours in the Pavilion Pantry. Enjoy our pool, whirlpool, and fitness center.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Perrysburg Levis Commons Toledo
description: Our pet-friendly hotel offers all-suite comfort in Levis Commons. Enjoy free WiFi and breakfast, fitness center, and suites with full-size kitchens. When it’s time to kick back, we’ve got an indoor pool, terrace, and seasonal events during summer and fall.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Toledo-Perrysburg
description: No matter why you’re traveling, we’re the perfect mix of corporate and leisure. We’re just eight miles from Seagate Convention Center, with First Solar, Walgreens Distribution Center, Promedica and more nearby. Don’t miss Toledo Zoo, the Museum of Art, S.S. Willis B. Moyer Museum ship, Valentine Theatre and local shopping. Free WiFi and breakfast are yours.

name: Tru by Hilton Perrysburg Toledo
description: We are off the intersection of the Ohio Turnpike and I-90, less than 10 miles from Toledo. The Toledo Executive Airport is about six miles away. Belmont Golf Course is about two miles away or choose from the other four courses within 10 miles of our hotel. We provide complimentary breakfast every morning as well as board games and pool table in the lobby.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Toledo-Maumee
description: Our hotel is easy to reach via I-75, I-475, and the Ohio Turnpike. The University of Toledo, Toledo Zoo & Aquarium, Huntington Center and the Botanical Gardens are all less than fifteen minutes from our door. Fifth Third Field, the Mud Hens’ baseball stadium, is just 11 miles away. Enjoy access to our indoor pool, sports court, and fitness center during your stay.

name: Hampton Inn Toledo-South/Maumee
description: We're a mile from I-80, five minutes from companies like the UPS Customer Center, Therma-Tru, and MaritzCX. Downtown attractions like the Toledo Museum of Art and the Huntingdon Center are 12 miles away, passing by the zoo and aquarium along the way. Reach the University of Toledo in 20 minutes. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our two pools.

name: Home2 Suites By Hilton Maumee Toledo
description: This is the place for nature lovers. Minutes away, you’ll have the Audubon Islands State Nature Preserve, activities on the Maumee River and Side Cut Metropark, great for walking the dog. Toledo Zoo and Aquarium is nearby, passing by Swan Creek Preserve Metropark. Try some local restaurants, or cook for yourself in your suite. WiFi and breakfast are free.

name: Hampton Inn Toledo/Oregon
description: Just off I-280, we're 33 minutes' drive from Toledo Express Airport, and five miles from downtown shops, restaurants, and entertainment. If you're feeling lucky, head for Hollywood Casino, or enjoy Toledo Museum of Art, both 15 minutes' drive from our door. Toledo Zoo, six miles away, is also popular. Daily hot breakfast, WiFi, and parking are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Cleveland Airport-Tiedeman Rd
description: We're five minutes from Cleveland Hopkins International Airport via free shuttle. You'll be walking distance from restaurants and 10 minutes from Metropark Zoo. I-480 puts Cleveland in your hand: the Museum of Art, West Side Market, and Rock and Roll Hall of Fame are 20 minutes away. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Cleveland/Independence
description: Right at the junction of I-77 and I-480, our hotel is within a mile of a good choice of restaurants. Take a stroll along the Towpath Trail by the Cuyahoga River, two miles away. It's 15 minutes to the airport and eight miles to downtown Cleveland, home to museums, the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame, and the Metroparks Zoo and Rainforest. Each day, our hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Cleveland Independence
description: Just off I-77, close to the business district, and 15 minutes from Cleveland Hopkins International Airport: we're a perfect launch pad for business travelers and vacationers alike. Fill up on free hot breakfast before heading 15 minutes to downtown Cleveland, home of the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame and Rocket Mortgage FieldHouse.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Cleveland Airport
description: We're off I-480, about 10 minutes from Cleveland Airport and the International Exposition Center. Baldwin Wallace University and Great Northern Mall are within five miles, and you can reach downtown Cleveland for a Browns game or a Rock & Roll Hall of Fame tour in 20 minutes. Enjoy our restaurant, free WiFi, and our indoor pool.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Cleveland Downtown
description: With Progressive Field one block away, we're ideal for Cleveland Indians baseball. Rocket Mortgage FieldHouse is right behind the ballpark, and we're a half-mile from St. Vincent Charity Medical Center. Our free weekday shuttle covers downtown locations, such as the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame. Enjoy our indoor saltwater pool and fitness center.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Cleveland - Independence
description: We're off I-77, 15 minutes from Cleveland Hopkins International Airport via free shuttle – also covering five miles. Explore Ohio nature in the northern end of Cuyahoga Valley National Park, 10 minutes away, and take in downtown Cleveland, nine miles from our door. Enjoy our indoor/outdoor pool, courtyard, and 24-hour fitness center.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Cleveland Rockside
description: Our Cuyahoga County suites are just 15 minutes from downtown Cleveland attractions like the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame. Cleveland Hopkins International Airport is 15 minutes away. A free made-to-order breakfast and evening reception are served daily.

name: Hampton Inn Cleveland-Downtown
description: Whether you're here for business or leisure, you'll feel at home with free WiFi and a hot breakfast every morning. Nestled in the business district, we're only minutes from the Huntington Convention Center and Rocket Mortgage Fieldhouse. When work is done, watch the Cleveland Indians or Cleveland Browns play ball. Playhouse Square Performance Center is half a mile away.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Cleveland-Airport/Middleburg Heights
description: Located off I-71 in Middleburg Heights, we're four miles from Cleveland Hopkins International Airport via free shuttle. Grab dinner at nearby restaurants within walking distance. A 12-minute drive will take you to The SouthPark Mall and I-X Center. Start your day with our hot breakfast – it’s free, just like our WiFi.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Cleveland Downtown - Lakeside
description: Cleveland's Rock & Roll Hall of Fame, FirstEnergy Stadium, Great Lakes Science Center, and Huntington Convention Center are all about a 10-minute walk from our hotel. Cleveland State University is a mile away. Take a dip in our heated indoor pool and whirlpool.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Middleburg Heights Cleveland
description: Our pet-friendly suites are less than 20 minutes from the bright lights of downtown, plus only four miles from Cleveland Hopkins International Airport and the I-X Center. Start each day with free breakfast, make the most of free WiFi, and whip up dinner in your in-suite kitchen.

name: Hampton Inn Cambridge
description: Our hotel is perched just off I-70, overlooking the hills of southeast Ohio. You'll find neighborhood dining up and down the street, and the Colgate-Palmolive office is two miles south. Check out Salt Fork State Park or Seneca Lake Park, then head back and relax a while in our indoor pool and hot tub. WiFi and daily hot breakfast are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Newcomerstown
description: We’re right off I-77, 20 miles from Amish country and the world's largest cuckoo clock.  Start the day with free hot breakfast before the 20-minute drive to Roscoe Village for sightseeing and antique shopping. Work in our business center or in your room – WiFi’s on us.

name: Hampton Inn Zanesville
description: We're just off I-70, five minutes from the famous Muskingam River Y Bridge. It's a two-mile drive to big area businesses like Conn's and Creative Packaging, or head three miles to Zane State College and Ohio University Zanesville. Get your shopping done at Colony Square Mall, 12 miles north. Enjoy free hot breakfast and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Youngstown/Boardman
description: Reach us from I-680, just 10 minutes from Youngstown: home of Youngstown State University, Covelli Center, and the Butler Institute of American Art. We’re surrounded by parks, with Reserve Run and Mill Creek Golf Courses within 15 minutes. You’ll be steps from neighborhood dining and shopping. Enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi on us.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Youngstown Downtown
description: We're in downtown's historic Stambaugh Building, a five-minute walk from Youngstown State University and the Covelli Centre. Once home to the Youngstown Sheet and Tube Company, our hotel offers modern amenities while honoring the building's 1907 charm. Stop by Bistro 1907 for all-day dining, and enjoy a warm chocolate chip cookie when you arrive.

name: Hampton Inn Youngstown-North
description: Find us off I-80, just 14 minutes from downtown. Visit the exhibits at Butler Institute of American Art and Arms Family Museum of Local History, both within five miles. The National Packard Museum is 17 miles from us, and Youngstown State University is 10 minutes away. Enjoy the convenience of a free hot breakfast served daily.

name: Hampton Inn New Philadelphia
description: We're 30 minutes from Akron-Canton Regional Airport, less than 10 minutes from Allied Machine & Engineering and Dover Chemical Corporation. Experience Amish Country shopping and crafts. Explore Schoenbrunn Village, just five miles away. Visit the Pro Football Hall of Fame, just up Interstate 77 in Canton. Enjoy free hot breakfast and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Springboro/Dayton Area South
description: Find us off I-75, just 20 minutes from Dayton city center, passing by the Wright Brothers Airport museum and Cox Arboretum MetroPark on the way. Visit the University of Dayton, explore Carillon Historical Park, or catch football at the Welcome Stadium. The interstate puts you 40 minutes from Cincinnati. Wake up to free hot breakfast, and enjoy WiFi on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Chillicothe
description: We're minutes from the US-35/US-23 intersection. Learn what life was like here 2,000 years ago at the Hopewell Culture National Historical Park, and travel to the 1800s at Adena Mansions — both within three miles. See a live performance at the Tecumseh! Outdoor Drama theater 15 minutes away. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our heated indoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Cincinnati-Downtown
description: We're in the former Cincinnati Enquirer building, a national landmark. Duke Energy Convention Center is 10 minutes' walk away. The Great American Ball Park, Aronoff Center, and Fountain Square are all within half a mile. Cincinnati/Northern Kentucky International Airport is 15 minutes' drive from us. Enjoy free daily hot breakfast and WiFi.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Cincinnati-Downtown
description: We're right in the heart of Cincinnati's city center, surrounded on all sides by great restaurants and attractions. Duke Energy Convention Center is just a seven-minute walk away, and Aronoff Center for the Arts is one block over. During your stay, enjoy daily free hot breakfast and WiFi. Join us for complimentary evening socials, Monday – Thursday.

name: The Cincinnatian Hotel, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: Our building has been in the heart of downtown Cincinnati since 1882, listed in the Historic Hotels of America. Our interior features a mix of Second Empire architecture, vintage artwork, and modern design. Duke Energy Convention Center, Bengals football, and Reds baseball are all within a mile.

name: Hilton Cincinnati Netherland Plaza
description: A downtown Cincinnati icon since 1931, the Netherland Plaza's authentic French Art Deco character is today recognized as a National Historic Landmark. Overlooking Fountain Square, we're a half-mile from the Ohio River Trail and the Great American Ball Park. Enjoy dining at our on-site restaurants and views of the city from the adjoining Carew Tower.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Cincinnati/Uptown-University Area
description: We're between I-71 and I-75, five miles north of central Cincinnati. You'll be within a half-mile of the University of Cincinnati, U of C College of Medicine and surrounding hospitals, and Cincinnati Zoo & Botanical Garden. Wake up to free hot breakfast, and enjoy our free WiFi, 24-hour fitness center, indoor pool, and 24-hour Suite Shop.

name: Hampton Inn and Suites Columbus Scioto Downs
description: Off I-270, we’re connected to Eldorado Scioto Downs' gaming, live entertainment, race track, and its restaurants, including Brew Brothers. Many guest rooms have horse track views. Grove City and downtown Columbus are both a 15-minute drive away. We’ve got a saltwater pool, fitness center, and free WiFi and daily hot breakfast.

name: Tru by Hilton Grove City Columbus
description: Less than a mile from the Shoppes at Grove City and two miles from Pinnacle Golf Club, our new Tru is just off I-71. Our ‘Top It’ breakfast buffet and WiFi are always free, and our 24/7 Eat. & Sip. Market features local snacks, gourmet treats and single-serve beer and wine for purchase.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Grove City Columbus
description: Just off I-71, our spacious suites are just a mile from Shoppes at Grove City and two miles from Pinnacle Golf Club. Pets are always welcome, plus WiFi and a delicious hot breakfast are free. Our Spin2 Cycle fitness facility is open 24-hours a day so you can work out anytime.

name: Hampton Inn Columbus-South
description: We're just off I-71, and just nine miles from downtown Columbus. Fill up on our hot breakfast, then head to The Big Splash waterpark, or take a short walk to Putt N Play. Relax in the beautiful Gardens at Gantz Farm, or unwind in our pool and fitness center. Stay connected with free WiFi and enjoy a great night's sleep in your comfy bed.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Columbus/Grove City
description: Off I-71, we're in walking distance of restaurants and Parkway Centre shops. Within 10 minutes, reach Downtown Columbus, Eldorado Scioto Downs, and Gantz Park. John Glenn Columbus International Airport is a 20-minute drive away. Our hotel has an indoor pool, fitness center, patio with fire pit, and a 24-hour snack shop.

name: Hampton Inn Columbus I-70E/Hamilton Rd.
description: Find us off I-70. We’re within 18 minutes of John Glenn Columbus International Airport and Ohio State. Greater Columbus Convention Center and COSI are nine miles away. Visit the Brewery District, German Village, and Short North Arts District-all less than 15 minutes from us. Your stay includes free WiFi and free hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn Columbus-East
description: We’re next to I-70, just 15 minutes from downtown Columbus. Take a walk through Blacklick Woods Metro Park, or go bird watching in Pickerington Ponds Metro Park, both within 12 minutes. Explore the Motorcycle Hall of Fame Museum or tee off at Turnberry Golf Course, both a mile from our front door. Your stay includes free WiFi and free hot breakfast.

name: DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Columbus Downtown
description: We're in downtown Columbus, less than a mile from the Greater Columbus Convention Center. Our hotel is attached to the Huntingdon Center by an enclosed walkway and Nationwide Arena, EXPRESS LIVE!, and the North Market are a five-minute walk away. Enjoy city and Scioto River views, and a warm chocolate chip cookie when you arrive.

name: Canopy By Hilton Columbus Downtown Short North
description: Our hotel is in the Arts and Arena District, adjacent to the Greater Columbus Convention Center campus. Explore downtown on foot or on a Canopy bike: we're within walking distance of Nationwide Arena, home of the Columbus Blue Jackets, and less than a mile from the Ohio Statehouse. Enjoy a welcome gift upon arrival and our rooftop fitness center.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Columbus Downtown
description: Eight miles from Port Columbus Airport and with easy access to US-70 and 71, your GPS will thank you for staying with us. We're six miles from The Ohio State University, and only half a mile from the Columbus Museum of Art and the Metropolitan Library downtown. While you're here, enjoy the free breakfast and WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Columbus-Downtown
description: We’re across the street from Greater Columbus Convention Center, steps from North Market. The Nationwide Arena and dozens of restaurants are within a 10-minute walk—or use the free Cbus to explore downtown. Our indoor pool, fitness center, and free WiFi and daily hot breakfast complete your stay.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton® Columbus/OSU, OH
description: Steps from The Ohio State University, 1.5 miles to The Jerome Schottenstein Center, and five miles from downtown Columbus, we're an ideal base for all itineraries. Golfers delight in our closeness to local courses, and gourmands get their fix at the Ohio Expo Center & State Fair, a 10-minute drive away. Expect free hot breakfast, WiFi, and Monday – Thursday evening socials.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Columbus/Airport
description: John Glenn International Airport is less than 10 minutes away – we'll pick you up and drop you off in our free shuttle. Five miles from downtown, our location just off I-670 makes getting around Columbus easy. Enjoy free hot breakfast daily and our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday.

name: Tru by Hilton Columbus Airport
description: Have a relaxing stay in Columbus, Ohio. We're off I-670 about a mile from the airport. Ohio Dominican University is less than five minutes away and there are three golf courses within a five-mile radius. Enjoy a hike along Alum Creek Trail. Your stay includes breakfast and WiFi.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Columbus Airport
description: Our suites are just one mile from Port Columbus International Airport via free shuttle. Downtown Columbus attractions such as the Greater Columbus Convention Center, Express Live, and the COSI Science Center are within six miles. Enjoy our free made-to-order breakfast and complimentary evening reception.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Columbus/University Area
description: We're just off US-315, offering free shuttle service within three miles — including to The Ohio State University and OhioHealth Riverside Methodist Hospital. It's a 10-minute drive to concerts at Express Live! and conventions in downtown Columbus. Pro soccer and the Ohio Expo Center are four miles east. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our indoor pool.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Columbus-University Area
description: We're two miles from The Ohio State University and its medical facilities– our free five-mile shuttle will get you there. The Short North Arts District and Greater Columbus Convention Center are six miles from us, and downtown Columbus is only 15 minutes away. Enjoy breakfast, dinner, and evening room service from our Garden Grille.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Columbus Airport
description: We're a mile from John Glenn Columbus International Airport – our free five-mile shuttle has your ride covered. Columbus State Community College and Easton Town Center are within 15 minutes. Explore the shops of downtown Columbus and German Village, both within nine miles. Our restaurant offers breakfast, dinner, and evening room service.

name: Hampton Inn Columbus-Airport
description: Find us at John Glenn Columbus International Airport – our free shuttle will get you to/from the hotel. We're seven miles from downtown Columbus, and the Ohio State University is 15 minutes away. Town and Country Shopping Center, and the Franklin Park Conservatory and Botanical Gardens are both a 10-minute drive. Enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi, along with our outdoor pool.

name: Hilton Columbus at Easton
description: We’re connected to Easton Town Center, home to more than 200 shops and restaurants. Within 20 minutes, reach Downtown Columbus, the Franklin Park Conservatory, Ohio State University, and the historic German Village. Perks include our indoor pool, fitness center, and free shuttle to John Glenn Airport, four miles away.

name: Home2 Suites By Hilton Columbus West
description: Just off I-70, our new pet-friendly hotel is less than three miles from several restaurants, Spindler Sports Complex, and Spindler Dog Park. Endless attractions in downtown Columbus are just 10 miles away. Our spacious suites include a kitchen, plenty of storage space, free WiFi and free breakfast. Our saline pool and outdoor grills are perfect for a fun evening.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Dayton-Airport
description: We're just off I-70 near I-7. Our free shuttle will get you to and from Dayton International Airport, five minutes from our door. Visit the Aullwood Audubone Center and Farm, just two miles away. Booneshoft Museum of Discovery, Carillion Historical Park, and The National Museum of the USAF, are all within 21 minutes. Enjoy our free hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn Defiance
description: We’re a half-mile away from Highway 24, two miles from downtown Defiance. Explore AuGlaize Village just seven miles away, where you can walk the streets of the Old West. Spend a day on the banks of the Maumee at Independence Dam State Park, just 15 minutes away. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Columbus Dublin
description: Our central Ohio location is minutes from family attractions like the Columbus Zoo & Aquarium and Zoombezi Bay water park. We're also close to the Dublin Irish Festival and PGA Memorial Tournament. History buffs will be at home in Historic Dublin along Bridge and High Streets. Pets will love Indian Run Falls. Enjoy WiFi and breakfast on us, and an in-suite kitchen.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Columbus Dublin
description: Find us off Highway 33, in the Bridge Street District, recognised as the centerpiece of Dublin. We're a half mile from the Indian Falls Trail and five minutes from The Mall at Tuttle Crossing. Downtown Columbus day trips are 18 miles south. Enjoy include made-to-order breakfast, complimentary evening receptions, and an indoor pool.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Columbus/Dublin
description: Off I-270 and Highway 33, we're a mile from historic downtown Dublin and Indian Run Falls. The Columbus Zoo & Aquarium, The Ohio State University, and COSI Columbus are all within a 20-minute drive. John Glenn Columbus International Airport is 25 minutes away. We've got an indoor pool, restaurant, and fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn Columbus/Dublin
description: Minutes from Columbus, our Dublin hotel offers plenty of choices: tee off at Muirfield Village Golf Club, peruse the Columbus Zoo and Aquarium, seek thrills at Zoombezi Bay Water Park – or do it all. Visit in March for Dublin's St Patrick’s Day celebration, or check out the Irish Festival in summer. Hot breakfast is on us, and WiFi is free throughout the hotel.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Columbus-Dublin
description: Located at the corner of Bradenton and Parkcenter Avenue in Dublin, Ohio—we’re less than 10 miles from Ohio State University. Your stay includes a spacious suite with fully equipped kitchen, free breakfast and WiFi, and a complimentary evening social Monday through Thursday. The indoor pool and fitness center make staying in shape a breeze.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Columbus Hilliard
description: We're just off I-270, three miles north of I-70 and less than 15 minutes' drive from Columbus and Dublin. Ohio State University is five miles away. Enjoy free hot breakfast, then grab your clubs and head four miles south to Wilson Road Golf Course, or to shops at The Mall at Tuttle Crossing, seven minutes' drive away. WiFi and parking are on us.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Columbus-Hilliard
description: Settle in at our Hilliard hotel, off I-270 and across the street from the shopping and dining at Mill Run Square. Downtown Columbus, Ohio State University, and Short North Arts District are less than 15 minutes away. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast and cook in your in-suite kitchen. We’ll help you stock it with your favorite ingredients.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Columbus - Worthington
description: Our location off Interstate 270 offers easy access to everything Columbus: we're within 15 minutes of Polaris Fashion Place, downtown, and The Ohio State University. We have a fitness center and an indoor pool and whirlpool. With more than 17,000 sq. feet. of space, we can host up to 1,000-person meetings.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Columbus/Polaris
description: We're across the street from Polaris Fashion Place and in walking distance of dining options. Our free, five-mile shuttle will take you to nearby attractions. Easton Town Center and Tanger Outlets are within 10 miles, and a 20-minute drive will take you to The Ohio State University. Dine at our Garden Grille and enjoy cocktails in our Pavilion Lounge.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Elyria
description: Our Elyria hotel is between I-80 and I-90, four minutes from shopping at Midway Mall and less than a mile from dining options. Visit local attractions like Black River Reservation, The Hickories Museum, and Rowland Nature Preserve – all within four miles. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our indoor pool.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Cleveland/Sheffield
description: Find us just half an hour from central Cleveland, near family favorites like Altitude Trampoline Park, Main Event entertainment complex, and Sprenger Stadium. Free breakfast is fuel for a day at Cedar Point, the roller coaster capital of the world, 40 minutes away. Unwind at complimentary evening socials, Monday – Thursday, or with some in-suite cooking. WiFi’s on us.

name: Hampton Inn Cleveland-Westlake
description: Surroundings so peaceful you wouldn’t think we were just a short drive from the bustle of downtown Cleveland. Yet here we are, minutes from Lake Erie and Huntington beach, and minutes from the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame and Cleveland Museum of Art. Expect inviting guest rooms, free WiFi and free hot breakfast during your stay.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Cleveland - Westlake
description: Find us off I-90, one mile from shopping and dining at Crocker Park. Lake Erie is within 10 minutes, and we’re 20 minutes from Downtown Cleveland, West Side Market, and the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame. Perks include our indoor pool, 24-hour fitness center, and a warm DoubleTree cookie at check-in.

name: Hampton Inn North Olmsted Cleveland Airport
description: Find us off I-480, next to Great Northern Mall and 10 minutes from Cleveland-Hopkins International Airport, via free shuttle. We're just a mile from Rocky River Reservation and surrounding parks, with central Cleveland 20 minutes away. Wake up to free hot breakfast, and enjoy free WiFi and our fitness center.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Troy
description: Find us off I-75, 20 minutes north of Dayton Airport. Restaurants and major retailers surround the hotel, and Hobart Arena concerts and expos are two miles away. Check out the WACO Air Museum while you're here. We offer an indoor saline pool, conference space, and a patio with fire pit. Bring along your pet – several parks and nature preserves are nearby.

name: Hampton Inn Springfield
description: We're just off I-70, three miles from Wittenburg University and downtown shops and restaurants. Fuel up on our free hot breakfast, then head 25 minutes to the National Museum of the US Air Force. If you're after something closer, the Pennsylvania House museum is only four miles away. Return to unwind in our pool, and enjoy WiFi and parking on us.

name: Hampton Inn Cincinnati-Northwest/Fairfield
description: Our Fairfield hotel is off I-275, about half an hour from both Cincinnati and Cincinnati/Northern Kentucky International Airport. We’re less than 10 miles from the waterfall and the historic buildings at Sharon Woods Park, and family fun at Kings Island amusement and water park is just a 20-minute drive away. Our WiFi and hot breakfast are free.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Cincinnati Liberty Township
description: We're just off I-75 and next to Liberty Center’s shops, restaurants, and entertainment. Close by are several companies including GE Aviation and Procter & Gamble. Drive to a Reds game at the Great American Ball Park, Kings Island amusement park, and downtown Cincinnati attractions. WiFi and breakfast are on us. Our suites have room for pets, too.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Cincinnati Liberty Township
description: Find us just off I-75, a short walk from Liberty Center mall and a mile from VOA MetroPark's fishing lake and trails. Kings Island amusement park is 20 minutes away, and we're 30 minutes from Cincinnati and Dayton. Our connected rooms make it easy to travel with family, and hot breakfast's on us. Enjoy free WiFi and our heated indoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn Findlay
description: We're located right off I-75, five minutes from the University of Findlay, three miles from the Hancock Historical Museum in downtown and less than two miles from the Mazza Museum. Fuel up with our free hot breakfast before heading to the roller coaster capital of the world, Cedar Point, just over an hour away. Nature lovers are only eight miles from Van Buren State Park.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Findlay
description: Find us off I-75, less than five minutes from the University of Findlay. We're within a half-mile of a variety of local dining joints and across the road from a movie theater. Central Findlay and Mazza Museum, on the university campus, are within five minutes. Enjoy our 24-hour fitness center, indoor pool, and Garden Grille & Bar.

name: Hampton Inn Tiffin
description: We're just off US Highway 224, five minutes from downtown Tiffin. Heidelberg and Tiffin Universities are two miles away. Our free hot breakfast is perfect fuel for a day of spelunking at the nearby Seneca Caverns. Return to unwind in our pool, and enjoy free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Lima
description: Just off I-75, we're less than two miles from the Allen County Fairgrounds and Veteran's Memorial Civic & Convention Center. Hike or bike the 20 public parks in our northwest Ohio neighborhood, or relax in our indoor swimming pool and whirlpool. Every stay includes free WiFi and free hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Fremont
description: Located off I-80 and I-90, we're nine minutes from downtown. Visit Rutherford B. Hayes Presidential Library & Museums, just 10 minutes away. Enjoy water activities on Sandusky River, get spooked at Haunted Hydro, or check out Freemont Speedway - all within 16 minutes. Every stay with us includes free hot breakfast and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Sandusky-Central
description: Located off I-250, we're within two miles of Sandusky Mall and Kalahari Resorts. A short drive will take you to Sheldon Marsh Nature Preserve and the Maritime Museum of Sandusky. The kiddos will have a blast at Cedar Point amusement park, only eight miles from our door. Start your day with our hot breakfast – it's free, just like our WiFi.

name: Tru by Hilton Sandusky
description: We're about a mile from the Park Place and Crossings of Sandusky shopping centers. There is a bus stop that runs daily about 350 feet from our hotel. The Sports Force Parks/Cedar Point Sports Center is less than 10 minutes away. Check out Cedar Point Amusement Park, about seven miles from us. Our hotel features an outdoor veranda with fire pits.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Sandusky/Milan
description: Find us off I-80 and I-90 in Milan, 20 minutes from Sandusky. Kalahari Resorts and the Thomas Edison Birthplace Museum are less than 10 minutes' drive away, while Cedar Point Amusement Park and Summit Motorsports Park are within 12 miles of our door. Fire up the grill on our outdoor deck or unwind by the pool. Every stay includes free WiFi and daily free hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Toledo-North
description: Find us five minutes off I-75, one mile from Toledo Speedway. Toledo city center is 10 minutes away, offering the Toledo Museum of Art, adjacent to the Glass Pavilion, and events at Huntington Center. The University of Toledo is 15 minutes from the door and Detroit day trips are just a 50-minute drive away. Wake up to free hot breakfast, and enjoy WiFi on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Toledo/Westgate
description: We're just off I-475, close to I-75, and an easy walk to local eateries. The University of Toledo and Franklin Park Mall are two miles from our door. Catch a basketball game at John F. Savage Arena, eight minutes' drive away, or place your bets at Hollywood Casino, nine miles from us. Refresh in our indoor pool and enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Gallipolis
description: Located in Gallipolis, we're just off US Highway 35 and the Ohio River Scenic Byway. Explore shopping, dining, and entertainment downtown, or stroll through City Park and watch the Ohio River roll by. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, free WiFi, our indoor pool and fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn Columbus-West
description: We’re just off I-70, 15 minutes from downtown Columbus, the Nationwide Arena, and the German Village's restored 19th-century buildings. Columbus Zoo and the Center of Science and Industry’s 300 exhibits are both about half an hour away from our hotel. WiFi and hot breakfast are free.

name: Hampton Inn Heath-Newark
description: Find comfort one mile from Newark-Heath Airport and 10 minutes from central Newark. Ohio State University Newark campus is just as close. Wake up to free hot breakfast before spending the day at Buckeye Lake, Ohio’s oldest state park, 15 minutes away. Free WiFi is yours, and our 24-hour Suite Shop can take care of cravings.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Newark Ohio
description: Our hotel is off State Route 16, a block from downtown Newark's historic Court Square. Neighborhood restaurants, the Midland Theatre, and The Works are within a 10-minute walk, and Dawes Arboretum is six miles away. We have a heated indoor pool and a 24-hour fitness center. Every stay starts with our signature warm chocolate chip cookie.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites New Albany Columbus
description: We're off US-62, 20 minutes from John Glenn International Airport. Easton Town Center, restaurants, and the only American Girl store in Ohio are all within 15 minutes. We offer a free five-mile shuttle, fitness center, and indoor pool. Every stay includes free WiFi and daily hot breakfast.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton New Albany Columbus
description: Apartment-style suites with fully fitted kitchens are yours – whether you’re here for a month or a night, and whether you’re here for business, leisure, or a bit of both. Easton Town Center’s entertainment district is a short drive away, local restaurants are aplenty and Ohio State University is a 20-mile drive away. Breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Columbus Airport East Broad
description: Watch the skies or smell the roses at Franklin Park Conservatory and Botanical Garden. A short drive brings you to Hollywood Casino, or try a different drive at the Columbus Country Club. Ask staff about local events like the Arnold Classic and Ohio State Fair. WiFi and breakfast are on us, and pets are welcome. Make the most of your own in-suite kitchen.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Columbus-Easton Area
description: We're just off I-270, across the street from an upscale shopping and dining complex at Easton Town Center. Corporations like Huntington Bank, SafeAuto, L Brands and Abbott, along with The Ohio State University, are within 10 minutes. Get to Columbus International Airport in five miles, and 10 miles gets you to the convention center. Enjoy our heated indoor saltwater pool, free hot breakfast and free WiFi.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Columbus
description: Our suites are just off the Jack Nicklaus Freeway, 15 minutes from Port Columbus International Airport. Downtown attractions such as the Greater Columbus Convention Center, Express Live, and the Columbus Museum of Art can be reached within 20 minutes. Enjoy free made-to-order breakfast and our complimentary evening reception.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Oakwood Village-Cleveland
description: We’re near I-480 and I-271, 20 miles from downtown Cleveland. We're just three miles from the MGM Northfield restaurant, racetrack and casino, and Cuyahoga Valley National Park’s Brandywine Falls are just 10 miles away. Enjoy our fitness room and heated indoor pool. WiFi and hot breakfast are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Washington Court House
description: We're next to I-71, two minutes from several restaurants and the Tanger Outlets Jeffersonville. The city of Washington Court House is a 15-minute drive, where you'll find the Historical Society Museum, Fayette County Fairgrounds, and The Greens golf course. Start the morning with free hot breakfast and plan your day using free WiFi. Relax in our indoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Wilmington
description: We're just off Highway 22, five minutes from Wilmington College and the Shoppes at the Old Mill. Wilmington Air Park and Clinton Memorial Hospital are three miles from us. A 20-minute drive will take you to the Jeffersonville Tanger Outlets and Cowan Lake State Park. Start your day with our free hot breakfast.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Cleveland/Twinsburg
description: We’re off I-480, a short drive from shopping and dining at Twinsburg. Cleveland Hopkins International Airport is a 28-mile drive. Downtown Cleveland is a half-hour away, home to the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame, Cleveland Museum of Art, and Cleveland Museum of Natural History. Enjoy onsite dining, free parking, and extensive, dynamic event space.

name: Tru by Hilton Mason Kings Island
description: Find us off 1-71, within 10 minutes of amusement parks such as Kings Island, The Beach Waterpark, and Soak City. Mason, Loveland Castle Museum, and Miami Valley Gaming Casino can be reached in less than 15 minutes. Cincinnati is 20 miles away. Enjoy free hot breakfast, and our heated pool and fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn Cincinnati-Kings Island
description: We're just off I-71, five minutes from family fun at Kings Island amusement park and Soak City waterpark. It's under 10 minutes to big businesses like Cintas and Luxottica, and 25 miles to Bengals football and Reds baseball in downtown Cincinnati. A number of restaurants are within walking distance. Enjoy our heated indoor pool, free hot breakfast, and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Marietta
description: We're right off I-77 in Marietta's commercial district. Marietta College is 1.5 miles into town, where you'll find historic attractions like Castle Historic House Museum and Buckley House restaurant. Take a scenic ride up the river in the Valley Gem Sternwheeler paddleboat just 10 minutes away. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our indoor pool.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Marysville
description: We're off Highway 33 and Highway 36, within three miles of Aldersgate Park and Union County Historical Society, and minutes from dining options. Sunrise Animal Sanctuary and the Honda Heritage Center can be reached in 15 minutes, and The Ohio State University is a half hour drive. Perks include our in-suite kitchen, free WiFi, and free hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn Marysville
description: We're located just off US 36, a half-hour drive from Columbus and close to several major corporations, including Scott’s, Honda, Nestle, and Veyance. Sumitomo’s office is just blocks away. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our indoor pool and whirlpool.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Cincinnati Eastgate
description: We are located across the highway from 32 East Shopping Center and less than a mile from Eastgate Mall. Our location provides diverse eateries that range from LongHorn Steakhouse to El Rancho Grande – Eastgate. Visit the Cincinnati Nature Center less than 10 minutes away. Our pet friendly hotel also features an indoor heated pool.

name: Hampton Inn Cincinnati-Eastgate
description: We’re off State Route 32, one mile from Eastgate Mall. Riverbend Music Center, next to Coney Island Amusement Park, is 15 minutes from our door. Or visit Cincinnati to discover the Zoo & Botanical Garden and Great American Ball Park, home of the Cincinnati Reds, half an hour away. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us, and pets are welcome.

name: Hampton Inn Oxford/Miami University Area
description: We're off US Highway 27, four blocks from Miami University and less than two miles from Yager Stadium, home of MU RedHawks. Hueston Woods State Park and tastings at Hanover Winery are 15 minutes' drive from our door. Wake up to our free hot breakfast, and refresh in our salt water pool. WiFi, and parking, are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Steubenville
description: Just off Highway 7, we’re walking distance from the Franciscan University of Steubenville. You’ll be five minutes from Steubenville Commercial Historic District – home to Historic Fort Steuben, Grand Theater, and downtown dining. Pittsburgh is 40 minutes east via I-22. WiFi and hot breakfast are free, and our fitness center is yours.

name: Hampton Inn Columbus/Delaware I-71 North
description: We’re off I-71, just 15 minutes from downtown Delaware, home of Ohio Wesleyan University and the Richard M. Ross Art Museum. Explore Ohio nature at Delaware State Park, 25 minutes away, or take a day trip to Columbus, 45 minutes on the interstate. You’ll be steps from dining and five minutes from local shopping. Enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi on us.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton® Columbus/Polaris, OH
description: Wake up less than two miles from Polaris, where you’ll find shops at Polaris Fashion Place and family-friendly entertainment in Magic Mountain Fun Center. Drive 20 minutes south to Columbus – find culture at Columbus Museum of Art, and a fast-growing culinary scene in the Brewery District. Join us for free evening socials, Monday – Thursday, and enjoy free WiFi and daily hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Columbus Polaris
description: Just off I-71, we're walking distance from Quest Conference Center and a five minute drive from Polaris Mall. Ohio Expo Center (home to the annual State Fair), The Ohio State University, and Downtown Columbus can all be reached in around 15 minutes. Enjoy our fitness center, daily free hot breakfast, and large indoor pool. WiFi’s on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Ada
description: We're two miles from US-377 in northern Ada, within walking distance of North Hills shopping center. Downtown and East Central University are about two miles south, and the Ada Gaming Center is just a half mile east. It's about a mile to Chickasaw Nation headquarters. Enjoy free daily hot breakfast. Stay connected with our free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Altus
description: Find us directly off Highway 283, two minutes from Altus/Quartz Mt. Regional Airport. You'll be a half-mile from Western Oklahoma State College and just over four miles from Altus Air Force Base. Central Altus businesses and attractions are a five-minute drive from our doorstep. Explore neighborhood dining, and enjoy WiFi and breakfast on us. Pets are welcome.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Ardmore
description: We’re off I-35, 10 miles north of Lake Murray, Oklahoma's oldest and largest state park. Ardmore’s Southwest History Museum, shows at Heritage Hall, and the Ardmore Convention Center are five minutes away. Finish the day in our heated indoor pool, or with a quick session in the fitness center. Explore nearby dining, and enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Ardmore
description: Our hotel is within two miles of Ardmore Regional Park, Mercy Memorial Health Center, and Michelin. Visit Goddard Center for the Visual and Performing Arts and try your luck at Gold Mountain Casino – both are just 10 minutes away. Our restaurant offers breakfast, dinner, and evening room service. Enjoy our fitness center and 24-hour convenience shop.

name: Hampton Inn Bartlesville
description: We're on US-75, just east of downtown Bartlesville – home of Price Tower, Frank Lloyd Wright's only constructed skyscraper. Oklahoma Wesleyan University is just four miles away. Stream Pioneer Woman episodes on our free WiFi before visiting the Mercantile, 30 minutes away in Pawhuska. Enjoy free hot breakfast and our indoor pool.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Bartlesville
description: We're in Bartlesville's business center, steps from the ConocoPhillips office. Price Tower Arts Center and Bartlesville Community Center are within five blocks. Oklahoma Wesleyan University is five minutes away. Head 26 miles to The Pioneer Woman Mercantile in Pawhuska. Breakfast, lunch, and dinner are served daily in our Garden Grille & Bar. WiFi's on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Tulsa North/Owasso
description: We're located just off US Highway 169, five minutes from downtown Owasso. You'll be only twenty four minutes from Tulsa, where you'll find Philbrook Museum of Art, Tulsa Zoo, and a lively music scene. Lakes Skiatook, Oologah, and Keystone are all within 45 minutes' drive of our door.  Enjoy daily hot breakfast, pool, and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Claremore
description: We’re 20 miles away from Tulsa International Airport, right off Route 66. Enjoy our free hot breakfast before the three-mile drive to the Will Rogers Memorial Museum. Or head out to nearby historic downtown Claremore for specialty stores and antique shops. Come back to one of our comfy rooms—the WiFi’s on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Tulsa-Broken Arrow
description: We're off Highway 51, five minutes from retailers, restaurants, and St. John Broken Arrow Hospital. Companies like Maverick Machinery, Baker Hughes, and State Farm are within four miles. Downtown Tulsa and the airport are 13 miles away. Breakfast, lunch, and dinner are served daily in our Garden Grille & Bar. Enjoy our indoor pool and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Tulsa/Broken Arrow
description: We’re off the Broken Arrow Expressway, just two miles from downtown. Fuel up with our free hot breakfast before heading 15 miles north to the Tulsa Zoo. We’re 13 miles from the iconic Blue Whale in Catoosa and you can find great shopping and dining in the Rose District, just three miles from the hotel.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Tulsa-South
description: Just 11 miles from Tulsa International Airport, we’re ideal for both quick business trips and long-term stays. While you’re with us, take advantage of apartment-style rooms with in-suite kitchens, free WiFi, hot breakfast and Monday – Thursday evening socials. Stock your fridge at the 24-hour convenience store or with our free grocery delivery service.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Tulsa South
description: Tulsa Community College Southeast Campus is walking distance from our hotel near US-64, and the shops at Woodland Hills Mall are 10 minutes away. We're five miles from Oral Roberts University, Cityplex Towers, and River Spirit Casino, and downtown Tulsa is 14 miles away. We serve breakfast, lunch, and dinner daily in our Garden Grill & Bar. WiFi's on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Tulsa-Woodland Hills 71st-Memorial
description: Just off Highway 169, we're less than a mile from Woodland Hills Mall, and Tulsa International Airport is 20 minutes away. Take an 18-minute drive to visit Tulsa Zoo and Oklahoma Aquarium. Enjoy dinner at River Walk Crossing, just 15 minutes away. Your stay with us includes free WiFi and free hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Tulsa South-Bixby
description: Located off Highway 64, we're a two-minute walk from SpiritBank Event Center. Woodland Hills Mall is four miles away and Oklahoma Aquarium can be reached in under 15 minutes. Grab dinner on Riverwalk Jenks, visit the Tulsa Zoo, or explore the Gathering Place – all less than a half hour from our door. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, free WiFi, our fitness center, and indoor pool.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Tulsa - Warren Place
description: Find our hotel in Warren Place, less than four miles from Tulsa Expo Square, Promenade Mall, and LaFortune Park. Downtown Tulsa, Gilcrease Museum, and Tulsa International Airport are around 15 minutes from our door. We offer a free local shuttle, an indoor pool with whirlpool, and a warm DoubleTree cookie on arrival.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Tulsa/Central
description: We’re off the Highway 64 and I-44 intersection, 15 minutes from the University of Tulsa and Oklahoma State University Tulsa campus. The city center is just as close, boasting events at BOK Center and shows at Brady Theater and Woody Guthrie Center. Tulsa International Airport is also 15 minutes from our door. Enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi on us.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Tulsa I-44
description: Find us right off Route 66 in the heart of Tulsa, within walking distance of local restaurants. Tulsa International Airport is a 10-minute drive away and attractions such as the Tulsa Ballet Theater, BOK Center, and Tulsa Expo Center are within eight miles. Enjoy free made-to-order breakfast and our complimentary evening reception.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Tulsa Midtown
description: We're just off I-44, five minutes from OU-Tulsa campus. The Tulsa State Fair and Events Complex, Saint Francis Hospital, and the shops at Woodland Hills Mall are all within five miles. Downtown Tulsa is eight miles away. We have 2,700 square feet of meeting space, and our Garden Grille & Bar serves breakfast and lunch daily. WiFi's on us.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Tulsa Catoosa
description: Sitting on the iconic Route 66, we’re just 20 minutes from downtown Tulsa. Grab our free shuttle to/from Tulsa International Airport and Hard Rock Casino. Grab some free breakfast before exploring Turkey Mountain Park or the River Park East Trail, both in downtown. Join us for complimentary evening socials, Monday – Thursday, and enjoy your in-suite kitchen and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Tulsa/Catoosa
description: Our pet-friendly hotel is off I-44, about 10 miles from the airport – we'll pick you up in our free shuttle. Try your luck at the Hard Rock Casino, just across the street from our hotel, or head 15 miles west to Tulsa for museums, dining, and entertainment. Enjoy our indoor pool and our fitness center. WiFi and hot breakfast are on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Tulsa Airport
description: We're located at Tulsa International Airport—take our free shuttle to the nearby terminal. Tulsa Zoo and the Air and Space Museum & Planetarium are 10 minutes away. Visit the University of Tulsa and the State Fair and Expo Center, both within six miles. Cooked-to-order breakfast, lunch, and dinner are served daily in the Garden Grille & Bar.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Owasso
description: Sports complexes, space museums, and the shops of Smith Farm Market: our suites are minutes from it all, and they come with kitchens and free WiFi. We’re in North Tulsa, close to medical centers, major companies, and Tulsa Raceway Park. Breakfast is free, and pets are welcome.

name: Hampton Inn Chickasha
description: Find us between Oklahoma City and Lawton in Chickasha, home of the University of Science and Arts of Oklahoma. Our location just off I-44 offers easy access to Will Rogers World Airport, just 30 minutes away. Take a dip in our outdoor pool and enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Mustang
description: Find us on Highway 152, just 20 minutes from central OKC and its Bricktown waterside restaurants, Myriad Botanical Gardens, and the Oklahoma City National Memorial & Museum. Enjoy free hot breakfast and head to Wild Horse Park, seven minutes away. WiFi is also on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Norman
description: We’re off I-35, four miles from the University of Oklahoma. The Sooner Mall and the Parkway Shopping Plaza are within two miles, and there are many dining options within a mile. Catch a game at the Memorial Stadium, four miles away. Our Great American Grill restaurant serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Grab a drink or snack at the 24 hour Pavilion Pantry.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Norman Conference Center Area
description: Located across the street from Norman Conference Center, we’re less than half a mile off I-35, one block from shopping centers and a variety of restaurants. The University of Oklahoma is just 15 min. from our front door and Riverwind Casino only three miles away. Breakfast and WiFi are included in your stay as well as access to our fitness center, outdoor pool and business center.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Norman Hotel & Conference Center
description: Just off I-35 in Norman, our hotel features 50,000 square feet of meeting space. We’re less than five miles from the University of Oklahoma and Gaylord Family-Oklahoma Memorial Stadium, plus the Riverwind Casino is a short 10 minute drive. Enjoy our indoor pool, fitness center, free made-to-order breakfast, and complimentary evening reception.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Moore
description: It's easy getting to downtown Oklahoma City, Will Rogers World Airport, and Norman. We're right off I-35, just 12 miles from OU and 10 miles from historic Bricktown, the OKC Dodgers Ballpark, and the Chesapeake Energy Arena. Enjoy free daily hot breakfast, and stay connected with free WiFi. Relax in our heated indoor pool.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Oklahoma City South
description: We're a short drive from Will Rogers Airport and have restaurants and shops nearby. Easy access to Boeing, FAA, Tinker AFB, and GE keeps business guests happy, and for fun, we've also got Chesapeake Arena and historic Bricktown close by. Fill up on our free hot breakfast, stay connected with free WiFi, and prepare home-cooked meals from the comfort of your in-suite kitchen.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Oklahoma City - South
description: Our hotel is in south Oklahoma City, 10 minutes from Will Rogers World Airport. Each day starts with our free hot breakfast, and there are a variety of restaurants moments from our door. Our location near I-240, I-44, and I-35 offers easy access to OKC attractions including the Bricktown district, seven miles away.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Oklahoma City Airport
description: Our hotel is half a mile from the Oklahoma River, five minutes from Will Rogers World Airport on our free shuttle. We're surrounded by dining, and seven miles from downtown Oklahoma City attractions including the Myriad Botanical Gardens and Bricktown entertainment district. Enjoy our fitness center, indoor heated pool, and a warm DoubleTree cookie on arrival.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Oklahoma City Will Rogers Airport
description: Our suites are a five-minute drive from Will Rogers Airport, and nine minutes from OKC Outlets. Chesapeake Energy Arena is a 10-minute drive away. We provide a free airport shuttle service, have a heated indoor pool, and 12,000 sq. ft. of event space. Join us for our complimentary evening reception and refuel with the free cooked-to-order breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Oklahoma City Airport
description: We’re close to I-40 and I-44, and three miles from Will Rogers World Airport. We offer a free shuttle daily between 5am and 11pm. It’s ten minutes to downtown Oklahoma City and the Bricktown entertainment district. Explore the many unique restaurants and shops, or take a water taxi ride along the Bricktown Canal. Our daily hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Oklahoma City Airport
description: We're in proximity of FAA Academy, Dell, UPS, and FedEx – with White Water Bay waterpark just down the road. Dine your way down Meridien Restaurant Row, mere steps from our door, or take a short drive to Bricktown Entertainment District. When you’re not out and about, expect free WiFi and breakfast on us. Pets are welcome.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Oklahoma City Airport
description: Off I-40, we're 10 minutes from Will Rogers World Airport via free shuttle, also covering a three-mile radius. Explore Oklahoma City center – Cox Convention Center, Chesapeake Energy Arena, and Myriad Botanical Gardens are all within five miles of our door. We have an outdoor pool and whirlpool, fitness center, and a restaurant.

name: Tru by Hilton Oklahoma City Airport
description: There’s an abundance of things to do here, so we’ll make things a little easier: WiFi, parking and daily build-your-own breakfast are free (bonus: the airport is just 10 minutes away). Explore the Bricktown area, take the family to Oklahoma State Fair, catch an OKC Thunder basketball game, or brave the White Water Bay water park.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Pryor
description: We’re off Highway 69, just over a mile from Mid-America Industrial Park and Airport. You’ll be 10 minutes from city business and dining in central Pryor. Make the most of easy highway access to Tulsa, a 40-minute drive away, and nature days at Lake Hudson, 25 minutes from the doorstep. While you’re here, enjoy free WiFi and daily free hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Elk City
description: We're right next to I-40, a short walk from restaurants and retailers. Historic Route 66 runs through the center of Elk City, two miles west, where you'll find plenty of local flavor and attractions like the Old Town Museum. Start each day with a free hot breakfast, and take advantage of our free WiFi and indoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn Duncan
description: Wake up minutes from Duncan Towne Square, near Duncan Golf & Tennis Club. While you’re in town, brush up on the history of Chisholm Trail at the Heritage Center, five minutes way, or visit Stephens County Museum. For a little waterside nature, take a short drive to any of the Clear Creek, Duncan, Fuqua or Humphreys Lakes. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Lawton, OK
description: We’re located off I-44, five minutes from Central Mall and Comanche Nation Casino. Great Plains Technology Center is 15 minutes away, and Wichita Mountains Wildlife Refuge is a 35 minutes by car. Check into a spacious suite with a fully equipped kitchen, spacious bedroom, and separate living space. Your stay includes WiFi, a free hot breakfast, and access to our fitness center and pool.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Lawton-Fort Sill
description: We’re in the heart of Lawton’s business district and close to the Fort Sill US Army base. Central Mall is four blocks away. American history, cultural museums, and parks are within five miles. Our free shuttle goes to Lawton-Fort Sill Regional Airport. Eat breakfast and dinner in our Garden Grille Restaurant. Grab a drink or snack at the 24-hour Pavilion Pantry.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Lawton
description: It's a five-minute drive to Fort Sill Army post, and six miles to the US Army Field Artillary Museum. Cameron University and Comanche County Memorial Hospital are only 1.5 miles south. Learn about local Native American history at the Comanche National Museum and Cultural Center eight minutes away. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our heated indoor pool.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Edmond
description: Staying with us places you at Edmond’s heartland, a 20-minute drive from Oklahoma City and historic Guthrie, and seven minutes from University of Oklahoma. Free hot breakfast fuels a day’s exploration – Lake Arcadia, Armstrong Auditorium, and historic downtown Edmond are all nearby – or cook at your own pace in your in-suite kitchen. WiFi is free, pets are welcome.

name: Hampton Inn Oklahoma City/Edmond
description: We're right next to I-35 and historic Route 66, just three miles from the University of Central Oklahoma. The Oklahoma City Zoo is only 11 miles south, while historic Bricktown and the Chesapeake Energy Arena (home to the NBA's Thunder) are only 17 miles away. Enjoy free daily hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our indoor pool.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Edmond / Oklahoma City North
description: We’re off I-35, next to the Edmond Conference Center and close to the ShowBiz multiplex. The University of Central Oklahoma is four miles away, and downtown Oklahoma City is 19 miles. The Garden Grille serves breakfast and dinner, with room service available every evening. Grab a drink, snack or ready-to-cook meal at The Shop, open 24 hours.

name: Hampton Inn Oklahoma City Northeast
description: We're next to I-35, right down the road from Frontier City Theme Park. It's under four miles to Oklahoma Christian University, and just seven miles to the University of Central Oklahoma. Explore the wild west lifestyle at the National Cowboy and Western Heritage Museum 10 minutes away. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our heated indoor pool.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Oklahoma City North Quail Springs
description: We're walking distance from NOAH's Event Venue, surrounded by local dining, and a mile from Quail Springs Mall. Mercy Hospital, Bluff Creek Park, and Lake Hefner are within four miles, and Oklahoma City center is 15 miles away. Enjoy our indoor saltwater pool and whirlpool, fitness center, and restaurant and bar.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Oklahoma City Quail Springs
description: Set in North Oklahoma City's corporate and medical community, our location puts you right by AT&T, Hertz Administrative Center, Xerox, and Mercy Medical Center. Hit The Shops at Quaint Springs, just four miles down Memorial Road. Back at the hotel, kick back in a comfy suite with full kitchen and connect with free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Oklahoma City/Quail Springs
description: We’re right off Route 74, a 19-mile drive from Will Rogers World Airport. Fuel up with our free hot breakfast before making the quick trip to Martin Park Nature Center and its 2.5 miles of woodland trails. Explore sail boarding, model airplane flying, and golf at Hefner Park, just eight miles away.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Oklahoma City Midtown
description: Near I-44, our hotel is one mile from Penn Square Mall's shopping, dining, and movie theater. We're less than seven miles from the National Cowboy & Western Heritage Museum, downtown Oklahoma City, and Bluff Creek Park trails, by the shore of Lake Hefner. Enjoy our indoor pool, fitness center, all-day restaurant, and 809 Sports Grill bar.

name: Hampton Inn Oklahoma City-Northwest
description: You’ll be just 10 minutes from Oklahoma City University and 15 minutes from the city center. In town, explore Bricktown entertainment district, tour the Oklahoma City National Memorial & Museum, or stop and smell the roses at Myriad Botanical Gardens. Will Rogers Airport is 20 minutes away. Start the day with free hot breakfast, and enjoy WiFi on us.

name: Tru by Hilton Oklahoma City NW Expressway
description: Find us on the Northwest Expressway, three miles from Penn Square Mall. With easy access to I-44 and I-40, downtown attractions like Chesapeake Energy Arena are a 15-minute drive from our hotel. The National Cowboy Museum and Oklahoma City Zoo are seven miles away. Enjoy free hot breakfast, plus coffee, tea, and hot chocolate all day in the lobby.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Oklahoma City NW Expressway
description: We're just 20 minutes from Will Rogers World Airport and within walking distance of Penn Square Mall and a host of restaurants. Bricktown’s buzzy nightlife is also five minutes away. Stock your fridge at our 24-hour store and relax with free WiFi. Breakfast is also on us.

name: Hampton Inn El Reno
description: Just four miles from El Reno Regional Airport, our suites are in a commercial area, walking distance from shops and dining. Explore wider El Reno attractions – Canadian County Historical Museum, Lake El Reno, and the historic Fort Reno are all within 15 minutes. We’re right off I-40, giving you easy access to Oklahoma City, half an hour away. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton El Reno
description: We’re just 25 minutes from downtown Oklahoma City. Closer to home, the Canadian County History Museum is adjacent to the hotel, with Chapel Creek Winery and restaurants nearby. If you feel like a quiet night in, you can always use your in-suite kitchen. WiFi, breakfast, and parking are on us. Pets are welcome.

name: Hampton Inn Oklahoma City/Yukon
description: We're right off I-40, close to Xerox and Armacell, and you can get some work done in our business center. Oklahoma City's historic Bricktown and the Chesapeake Energy Arena (home of Thunder pro basketball) are just 15 miles east. You can reach Will Rogers World Airport (OKC) in a 14-mile drive. Enjoy free daily hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our indoor pool.

name: Home2 Suites By Hilton Oklahoma City Yukon
description: From the Chisholm Trail and Crawfish Festivals to ”Rock the Route" country music scene and Czech Heritage Center, our hotel is a great base to tap into local culture. Here for business? Xerox and Halliburton offices are minutes away and downtown OKC is just five miles away. When you need to retreat back to Home2, free breakfast, WiFi, and the pool await.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Oklahoma City-West
description: We're off I-40, one mile from OKC Outlets and a short drive from State Fair Park. Will Rogers World Airport and Oklahoma City are less than eight miles from our door. Enjoy your in-suite kitchen, our indoor pool, and our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday. Daily hot breakfast, WiFi, and parking are on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Enid
description: We’re a 20-minute drive from Enid Woodring Airport, off Highway 412, and just over three miles from central Enid. You’ll be 10 minutes from Vance Air Force Base, and 15 minutes from both Northwestern Oklahoma University and Northern Oklahoma College. It’s walking distance to Oakwood Mall and great neighborhood grub. Enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Guthrie
description: We’re right off I-35, two miles from the Guthrie Historic District. Fuel up on free hot breakfast before heading to Langston University or Lazy E Arena, both under 11 miles away. Oklahoma Territorial Museum is a five-minute drive. Swim in our indoor pool and enjoy free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Stillwater West
description: Located off Highway 51, we're  five minutes from Oklahoma State University. Tee off at Karsten Creek Golf Club, or visit the National Wrestling Hall of Fame & Museum, just 10 minutes away. Stillwater Regional Airport and Stillwater Medical Center are within nine minutes. WiFi and hot breakfast are on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Stillwater
description: We’re close to Oklahoma State University, museums, and shopping – and a short walk from the city center. Tee off at one of many golf courses, visit the Wrestling Hall of Fame, or stroll through the Botanical Gardens. Stay connected with free WiFi and cook in your in-suite kitchen. Breakfast is free at our Inspired Table.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Stillwater
description: We’re off Highway 177, just five minutes from Oklahoma State University and football at T. Boone Pickens Stadium. You’ll be just as close to Stillwater center, home of OSU Museum of Art and Stillwater History Museum. Free hot breakfast is the ideal start for days at Boomer Lake and Park or for touring the Botanic Garden, both 10 minutes away. WiFi’s on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Guymon
description: We're just off Highway 54, steps from local restaurants and shops. Fill up on free hot breakfast before exploring Thompson Park and Sunset Lake or teeing off at Sunset Hills Golf Course, all 10 minutes away. Educational trips to Oklahoma Panhandle State University and No Man's Land Museum are both a short drive from the hotel. WiFi's on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites McAlester
description: Our hotel is off Highway 69, just 10 minutes from the Old Town Antique District and Tannehill Museum. We’re 35 minutes from Eufaula Lake, the largest in the state, passing by Lake McAlester on the way. Choctaw Casino is 10 minutes south, next to McAlester Regional Airport. Enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi on us.

name: Hampton Inn Miami
description: We’re just off I-44, on an original section of Route 66.
