The local area has something for everyone: water sports at the scenic Grand Lake, a bet at the Tribe Casino, learning about Native American history at the Dobson Museum, or fishing at Noesha River. Our hotel has a heated indoor pool, fitness center, plus free WiFi and hot breakfast.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton OKC Midwest City Tinker AFB
description: Whatever brings you to the Midwest area, our Home2 is your ideal base. Visit friends and family at Tinker Air Force Base or Rose State College, take care of business at the Reed Conference Center, experience the nightlife of Bricktown, or catch a game at Chesapeake Arena. Modern suites, free WiFi, and free breakfast make our hotel feel just like home.

name: Hampton Inn Oklahoma City-I-40 E. (Tinker Air Force Base)
description: We're off I-40, a mile from the Tinker Air Force Base main gate. You'll be able to get downtown in six miles to experience the city's attractions, including Thunder basketball at the Chesapeake Energy Arena and OKC Dodger baseball at the Chickasaw Bricktown Ballpark. Oklahoma City Zoo is a quick eight miles north. Enjoy free hot breakfast and free WiFi.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Oklahoma City Downtown Medical Center
description: We're half a mile from the University of Oklahoma Health Sciences Center (OUHSC) campus, and a mile from the restaurants, bars, and entertainment of Bricktown. We offer an indoor pool and outdoor patio seating with fire pits. Join us daily for free made-to-order breakfast and a complimentary evening reception.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Oklahoma City Bricktown
description: Find us at the heart of Oklahoma City's Bricktown Entertainment District. We're right across from Chickasaw Bricktown Ballpark, home to the Oklahoma City Dodgers, and a short walk from Chesapeake Energy Center, Bricktown River Walk Park, and city dining. Enjoy our 24-hour fitness center, indoor pool, and whirlpool.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton® Oklahoma City-Bricktown, OK
description: Overlooking Chickasaw Bricktown Ballpark in the heart of the entertainment district, we’re surrounded by shops, restaurants, and nightlife. Your stay includes a spacious suite with full kitchen, free WiFi, a complimentary evening social on weeknights, and a daily free hot breakfast. The indoor pool and 24-hour fitness center make staying in shape easy.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Oklahoma City-Bricktown
description: We're in the heart of the Bricktown entertainment district, surrounded by restaurants and nightlife. Our hotel overlooks Chickasaw Bricktown Ballpark and Chesapeake Energy Arena is a 10-minute walk away. Getting around OKC is easy from our location near I-235 and I-40. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our indoor pool.

name: The Skirvin Hilton Oklahoma City
description: Our 1911 building has been carefully renovated and is an official member of Historic Hotels of America. Bricktown, Oklahoma City National Memorial and Museum, and Cox Convention Center are within a mile. We have an indoor pool, a fitness center, and extensive event space. Enjoy all-day dining at our restaurant and live jazz at the piano bar.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Muskogee
description: Look to the past at nearby Castle of Muskogee, Oklahoma Music Hall of Fame, the War Memorial Park, Three Rivers Museum, and Five Civilized Tribes Museum. Unwind after all that with free WiFi, enjoy your in-suite kitchen and kick the next morning off with free breakfast, before heading to River Country Family Water Park and the city center.

name: Hampton Inn Muskogee
description: We’re located at the intersection of US-62 and US-69. Fuel up on our free hot breakfast before hopping aboard the USS Batfish War Memorial Museum, just seven miles away. You can also explore the Five Civilized Tribes Museum and Three Rivers Museum, both within three miles of the hotel. The WiFi’s on us.

name: Tulsa Club Hotel, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: Our 1927 building in historic downtown Tulsa features Art Deco design by world-renowned architect Bruce Goff. We’re in walking distance of restaurants and bars, and The Gathering Place park is two miles away. Perks include our free local shuttle, indoor-outdoor event space for up to 400 guests, and a rooftop terrace.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Tulsa Downtown
description: Discover Tulsa from our downtown hotel, a short walk from BOK Center and Cox Business Center. We're surrounded by local dining – hop aboard our free shuttle to explore the area. The bus also covers Tulsa International Airport, nine miles away. Wake up to free hot breakfast, and enjoy our free WiFi, heated indoor pool, and fitness center.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Tulsa Downtown
description: Our contemporary hotel is located Tulsa’s vibrant business and entertainment district. We're connected to Cox Business Center by a sky bridge, and are within five miles of Tulsa Expo Center, Philbrook Museum of Art, and BOK Center. Tulsa International Airport is around a 15-minute drive away. Enjoy a warm DoubleTree cookie on arrival.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Pauls Valley
description: We're steps from dining and close to retailers. It's a five-minute drive into central Pauls Valley, where you can take the kids (big and little alike) to the Toy & Action Figure Museum or Pauls Valley Waterpark. I-35 provides speedy access to Oklahoma City, an hour away. Grab free hot breakfast before swinging by the Municipal Golf Course, and enjoy free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Ponca City
description: We're located just minutes from many local and chain restaurants down US-77 and Prospect Avenue. Get over to the industrial and business district in under 10 minutes, home to several oil refineries, and visit the famous Marland Mansion and Estate just 1.7 miles south of our hotel. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and a heated indoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn Shawnee
description: Whether you’d like a laidback dinner, shopping at nearby Shawnee Mall, great local wineries or a show at the historic Ritz Theatre, we’ve got it all covered. After a long day at the Santa Fe Depot and Mabee-Gerrer Museums, unwind in our heated indoor pool. While you’re here, WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Stroud
description: We’re right off Route 66, just 6.5 miles away from Stroud Lake where you can fish and hike. Try your luck at Sac and Fox Nation Casino less than six miles away or uncover the charm of Stroud's historic Main Street, just a few blocks away. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast and WiFi.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Tulsa Hills
description: If traveling on business, you’ll be well-placed here. On the northeast corner of Highway 75 and 71st, we’re close to some of Tulsa's largest corporations, as well as downtown, Jenks Riverwalk Crossing, and the Main Event Center. Expect pet-friendly suites with kitchens, make the most of free WiFi, and don’t forget to join us for free breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Tulsa/Tulsa Hills
description: We’re just off US 75, a short walk from Tulsa Hills Shopping Center, and less than eight miles from downtown Tulsa. Take in a show at the BOK Center, or visit Oklahoma Aquarium, seven miles’ drive. Tulsa Air & Space Museum and Tulsa International Airport are both 20 minutes from our door. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, WiFi, and our seasonal outdoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Woodward
description: We’re close to Highway 270, just over a mile from central Woodward. You’ll be 10 minutes from Northwestern Oklahoma State University. Check out Crystal Beach Lake, or brush up on local history at Plains Indians & Pioneers Museum, both within 10 minutes. You’ll find lots of neighborhood dining spots within walking distance. While you’re here, WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Astoria
description: Our hotel is next to Highway 30, surrounded by Oregon forest overlooking the Columbia River. Waterfront dining is steps away – and beaches, cafés, and shops in downtown Astoria are a 10-minute ride on the Astoria Riverfront Trolley. Relax in our indoor pool, and enjoy free daily hot breakfast and WiFi.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Portland Washington Square
description: By Route 217, our suites are steps from Washington Square shopping and entertainment. We're nine miles from downtown Portland, passing by Oregon Zoo and Portland Japanese Garden on the way. Each day starts with free made-to-order breakfast, and our evening receptions are complimentary. Relax with a dip in our indoor pool and whirlpool.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Portland - Tigard
description: Our hotel is just off OR-217 in Tigard, across from tax-free shopping at Washington Square Mall. We're 15 minutes from downtown Portland and Nike and Intel campuses. Our indoor pool and fitness center are open all day, and we offer a free shuttle to destinations within five miles. Every stay starts with a warm chocolate chip cookie.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Portland/Beaverton
description: Off Highway 26, we’re six miles from Hillsboro Airport. Use our free five-mile shuttle to reach Nike, Columbia Sportswear, Intel, and Tualatin Hills parks. Our restaurant serves breakfast and dinner, and there are plenty more dining options in walking distance. We’ve got an indoor pool, patio with fire pit, and free parking.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Hillsboro/Beaverton
description: Find us just off Highway 26, 15 minutes from the buzz of downtown Portland. Tualatin Hills Park & Recreation District is less than a mile away. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are free. Enjoy an in-suite kitchen and our complimentary evening social, Monday – Wednesday. Pets are welcome.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Portland - Beaverton
description: Our hotel is off US-26 near Portland's tech sector, with a free shuttle to area companies within five miles — including Nike World Headquarters and Intel. We're nine miles from downtown, passing by the Oregon Zoo on the way. Work out in our fitness center and cool off in the indoor pool. Every stay starts with our signature warm chocolate chip cookie.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Portland/Lake Oswego
description: We're off I-5, within walking distance of restaurants, and three miles from Bridgeport Village. Our free shuttle will take you to and from businesses within five miles. Downtown Portland and the Moda Center can be reached in 15 minutes, and Portland International Airport is a 25-minute drive away. Enjoy our restaurant and 24-hour convenience shop.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Portland Hillsboro
description: We're off Highway 26, minutes from Tanasbourne Town Center and dining options. Hillsboro Airport, The Rice Northwest Museum of Rocks and Minerals, and Rood Bridge Park are within seven miles, and downtown Portland can be reached in 15 minutes. Enjoy our indoor pool, in-suite kitchen, free WiFi, and free hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Portland/Hillsboro-Evergreen Park
description: We're just off US Highway 26, five miles from Nike's World HQ, and a host of other firms. Start the day with our free hot breakfast, then shop tax free at The Streets of Tanasbourne mall, a mile from our door. Reserve Vineyards and Golf Club, and Helvetia Vineyards & Winery, for tours and tastings, are both within 15 minutes' drive. Enjoy free WiFi, and our indoor pool.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Portland Hillsboro, Oregon
description: We're off Highway 26, a mile from the Streets of Tanasbourne shopping mall and less than five miles from Intel and Nike World Headquarters. Downtown Portland is a 15-minute drive away. Relax at our complimentary evening reception, and enjoy the indoor pool and fitness center. A free cooked-to-order breakfast is served daily.

name: The Porter Portland, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: Our 16-story hotel overlooks Portland's Fountain District, with a sleek design inspired by the nearby waterside. We're at the heart of downtown, two blocks from both the Keller Auditorium and Tom McCall Waterfront Park. Unwind in our full-service Meditation Spa and fitness center, and enjoy delicious bites at our rooftop restaurant.

name: Canopy by Hilton Portland Pearl District
description: Our rooms are nestled amid the vibrant art scene and nightlife of Portland's Pearl District. Trace the cobblestone streets with a complimentary Canopy Bike to discover Portland Japanese Garden, the waterfront trail, and Downtown, all within two miles. Enjoy all-day dining and our 24-hour rooftop fitness center overlooking the neighborhood.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Portland-Pearl District
description: Rest up in Portland's Pearl District, north of downtown. We're surrounded by unique shopping and within a five-minute walk to dining in Portland's brewery blocks. Both the local streetcar and Union Station are a short walk away, and downtown is five minutes from the door. Enjoy our free hot breakfast, free WiFi, indoor pool, and rooftop patio.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Portland Downtown
description: Our hotel is the only Embassy Suites member of Historic Hotels of America, with a building decor blending original architecture with modern convenience. We're within a mile of the convention center, Moda Center, and several theaters. Enjoy free breakfast and our nightly Evening Reception.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Portland
description: Our hotel is in Portland's Lloyd District, within a half-mile of the Oregon Convention Center and the Moda Center. We're one block from Lloyd Center shopping, and the local MAX Light Rail station is next door, linking to downtown Portland and the airport. Enjoy our 24-hour fitness center, outdoor pool, and a warm welcome cookie on arrival.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Bend
description: We're in downtown Bend, walking distance from local eateries, boutique shops, and entertainment. Many breweries are within two miles of our hotel — including Cascade Lakes, GoodLife, Bend, and Deschutes. Borrow a free bike to explore the area and return to a relaxing dip in our indoor pool. Every stay starts with our signature warm chocolate chip cookie.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Bend
description: Find us off Route 97, set in the Old Mill District in Bend. Les Schwab Amphitheater, the Deschutes River Trail, and a variety of restaurants and bars are within walking distance. Mount Bachelor and Redmond Municipal Airport are a half-hour away. Enjoy our indoor pool, fitness center, and rooms with river views.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Bend
description: We're walking distance from the Old Mill District, outdoor recreation along the Deschutes River, and Les Schwab Amphitheater. Redmond Municipal Airport is within 40 minutes of the hotel, as is Smith Rock State Park. We've got an indoor pool, whirlpool, and fitness center. Our free WiFi and free daily hot breakfast complete your stay.

name: Hampton Inn Portland/Clackamas
description: Our Clackamas hotel is 11 miles southeast of downtown Portland, with easy access to I-205. We're within 10 minutes of North Clackamas Aquatic Park, and the shops and restaurants at Clackamas Town Center. Portland International Airport is a 20-minute drive. We have a fitness center and indoor whirlpool, and serve free hot breakfast daily. WiFi's on us.

name: Hampton Inn Portland East
description: We're adjacent to I-84, three miles from I-205. Find what you need within 20 miles of our door – from Portland International Airport, to downtown attractions and the Portland Japanese Garden, to the majestic Multnomah Falls. Enjoy free hot breakfast and free WiFI.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Eugene Downtown University Area
description: We’re five minutes from the University of Oregon, close to downtown Eugene’s many restaurants, shops, and entertainment options. Whether you’re here for a campus visit or a game at Autzen Stadium, our suites offer plenty of space to help you rest, work, and relax. Start each morning with a free hot breakfast or prepare your meals in your in-suite kitchen. WiFi is free and your pets are welcome.

name: Tru by Hilton Eugene
description: We’re off I-5, close to various hiking and biking trails around Willamette River. Hayward Field is three miles away and we’re minutes from Autzen Stadium, home to the Ducks. Downtown Eugene and local shopping and dining at 5th Street Public Market are within two miles. Enjoy our lounge area with a pool table and daily free hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn Eugene
description: We're adjacent to the West End Business District, just three miles from downtown Eugene. The University of Oregon is 10 minutes away – check out Ducks sporting events and the exhibitions at The Jordan Schnitzer Museum of Art. Chill out in our pool and fitness center, and enjoy WiFi and hot breakfast on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Eugene/Springfield
description: We’re off I-5, 10 miles from Eugene Airport. Our free shuttle will get you there and other locations within five miles. Alton Baker Park, the Willamette River, and the University of Oregon are less than 15 minutes away. Our Garden Grille & Bar serves breakfast and dinner, plus evening room service, and our 24-hour Pavilion Pantry offers drinks and snacks.

name: Hampton Inn &  Suites Grants Pass
description: Find us just off the I-5, six minutes from downtown's boutiques and galleries – or waterfront relaxation at Riverside Park. Head 17 minutes down the road to Valley of the Rogue State Park. We’re 25 minutes from Troon and Schmidt Family vineyards. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Medford
description: We’re minutes from Medford International Airport in Rogue Valley. Our location near the I-5 makes it easy to access southern Oregon's outdoor activities, especially the region's celebrated vineyards and wineries. Shop for treasures at local antique stores or trending looks at Rogue Valley Mall: it's all tax-free.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Medford
description: Our hotel is off I-5, less than a mile from Asante Rogue Regional Medical Center campus. We're within five minutes of neighborhood shopping and central Medford, with Table Rock mountain scenery 13 miles from the door. Rogue Valley International Airport is 10 minutes away via free shuttle. Enjoy our heated indoor pool and fitness center.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Medford
description: Just 10 minutes from the airport, we're conveniently located in central Medford with quick access to shopping centers and hospitals. Your apartment-style suite has plenty of space to spread out, with a full kitchen for cooking home-style meals. (We'll even pick up groceries for you.) WiFi and breakfast are free, as is our evening social every Monday – Thursday.

name: Hampton Inn  Sherwood Portland
description: Our hotel is off Highway 99, a mile from Sherwood Market Center and Stella Olsen Memorial Park. We're in the heart of Oregon wine country, within a six-mile radius of an abundance of wineries, including Ponzi Vineyards. Tualatin River National Wildlife Refuge is two miles from our door. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our heated pool.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Hood River
description: We're off I-84, in the Columbia River Gorge National Scenic Area, five minutes from central Hood River. You'll be within a mile of restaurants and a half-mile from Mount Hood Railroad—board a tour through the Hood River Valley. Each day starts with free hot breakfast, and WiFi's on us. Enjoy our fitness center, indoor pool, and whirlpool.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Portland Airport
description: Hop aboard our free shuttle to/from Portland International Airport, 10 minutes away, or within a three-mile radius. We’re just off I-205, 20 minutes from central Portland. Rose City and Glendoveer Golf Courses are just over four miles away. Enjoy complimentary evening socials, Monday – Thursday. Culinary guests can enjoy an in-suite kitchen. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Pendleton
description: We're just off I-84, only a mile from historic downtown, where you can learn about the town’s colorful history on a Pendleton Underground Tour. Get down to the rodeo at Pendleton Round-Up, two miles away. Or take in a show, golf, and try your luck gaming at the Wildhorse Resort & Casino, 10 minutes’ drive. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Portland Airport OR
description: Located off I-205, we're five minutes from Portland International Airport and Cascade Station. Rocky Butte and Mt Tabor Park are within seven miles, and downtown Portland can be reached in 20 minutes. Enjoy our indoor pool, in-suite kitchen, and fitness center. WiFi and daily hot breakfast are free.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Portland Airport
description: Our hotel is five minutes from Portland International Airport, with a free shuttle to PDX and tax-free shopping at Cascades Station a mile away. We're a 10-minute walk from the MAX Red Line, putting Downtown Portland a train ride away. Join us for free made-to-order breakfast and our complimentary evening reception.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Roseburg
description: We’re located off I-5 in Roseburg, less than five minutes from Umpqua Valley Wineries, Mercy Medical Center, and VA Roseburg Health Care System. Wildlife Safari is 10 miles away and Crater Lake National Park can be reached in 1.5 hours. Breakfast and WiFi are free, and we have a heated indoor saltwater pool and a fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Salem
description: You’ll find us by Highways 99 and 22, walking distance from a choice of shops and restaurants. Downtown Salem and Willamette University are two miles away, while it's ten minutes to family fun at the Oregon State Fairgrounds. Relax in our indoor pool and whirlpool, and enjoy daily hot breakfast and free WiFi.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Salem, Oregon
description: Our hotel is off I-5, 10 minutes from downtown Salem and Willamette Town Center. Explore Oregon State Capitol, Riverfront Park, and Gilbert House Children's Museum, all within three miles. Every stay starts with a warm chocolate chip cookie, and we have a fitness center and indoor pool. We're proud sponsors of Western Oregon University Athletics.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Corvallis
description: Our hotel is on the Oregon State University campus, across the street from the OSU Conference Center and ballgames at Reser Stadium and Gill Coliseum. We're within a mile of Avery Park and downtown Corvallis restaurants and pubs. Enjoy our fitness center and indoor pool, and ask us about special rates for Dixon Recreation Center, on campus.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Allentown Bethlehem Airport
description: We are just two miles from B. Braun Medical, Intel Technologies, and Coca-Cola Park. St. Luke’s University Health Network is a short drive away. Catch some fun at nearby Wind Creek Bethlehem Casino. Our restaurant serves breakfast and dinner, and the 24-hour Pavilion Pantry has snacks and ready-to-cook meals. WiFi is free.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Allentown Bethlehem Center Valley
description: Close to upscale shops, golf courses, and three universities, there's something for everyone here. Host meetings or weddings for up to 795 people in our stunning event spaces, or simply enjoy our evening social every Monday – Thursday. Your stay includes free WiFi, daily hot breakfast, and your own kitchen. We have a heated indoor pool, too.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Allentown-Bethlehem Airport
description: Find us five minutes from Lehigh Valley International Airport and 15 minutes from central Allentown. A short drive brings you to Bethlehem, where you’ll be 10 minutes from Lehigh University. Baseball at Coca-Cola Park is just four miles away. Relish quiet nights at our complimentary Monday – Thursday evening social, or in your in-suite kitchen. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Bethlehem
description: We're off Route 22, 10 minutes from Lehigh Valley International Airport via free shuttle. You'll find a 24-hour Wegmans market and café within walking distance. Central Bethlehem, Sands Casino, and Lehigh University and Lafayette College campuses are also 10 minutes away. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our indoor pool.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Allentown-West/Fogelsville, PA
description: Home is 10 minutes from Dorney Park & Wildwater Kingdom amusement park. It’s also near numerous Lehigh Valley wineries. The Da Vinci Science Center, Miller Symphony Hall, and games at Coca-Cola Park are nearby. Stop by our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday, and enjoy WiFi and breakfast on us. Or do it your way in your own in-suite kitchen.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Allentown West
description: We're off I-78 with a free shuttle to corporations within five miles, including Nestle, Amazon, Home Depot, and DSC Logistics. It's six miles to Dorney Park & Wildwater Kingdom, and eight miles to Muhlenberg College and the Allentown Fairgrounds downtown. Breakfast, lunch, and dinner are served daily in our Garden Grille & Bar – room service is available 5 pm – 10 pm.

name: Hampton Inn Quakertown
description: We're one minute from I-476, the PA Turnpike's Northeast Extension. Family fun at Dorney Park and Wildwater Kingdom are just an 18-mile drive north. Grab something farm-fresh from the Quakertown Farmer's Market six miles away. Start each morning with a free hot breakfast. Get work done from your room with our free WiFi, or use our business center.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Easton
description: Welcome to Easton’s newest all-suites hotel, set against the natural beauty of PA, in a town adorned with architectural treasures of a time remembered. Conveniently located off PA-33, near major employers, shopping and restaurants. Enjoy attractions such as the Crayola experience, Karl Stirner Arts Trail and Easton Square Market all within 10 miles.

name: Tru by Hilton Easton
description: With quick access to PA Route 33, our new Tru offers close proximity to Easton, Bethlehem and Allentown. We are within 10 miles of several corporations, Lafayette College and several trails and parks along the Delaware and Lehigh Rivers. Kids will love the Crayola Experience in downtown Easton. Free breakfast and WiFi complete your stay.

name: Hampton Inn Altoona
description: Turn off I-99 and find comfort near Altoona's treasures. You'll be five minutes from ballgames at Peoples Natural Gas Field and within 15 minutes of Pennsylvania history at the Railroaders Memorial Museum and the scenic Horseshoe Curve. Penn State Altoona is also 15 minutes from us. Enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Johnstown
description: It's only a half mile from our front door to big businesses including Galliker, Lockheed Martin, and Kongsberg. The University of Pittsburgh at Johnstown is four minutes away. Visit the Johnstown Flood Museum six miles northeast to learn about the 1889 catastrophe that devastated the city. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our outdoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites State College at Williamsburg Square
description: You’ll find us off I-99, just two miles from the main campus of Penn State University. There you’ll find much to enjoy: a hockey game at Pegula Ice Arena, music at the Bryce Jordan Center, or college football at Beaver Stadium. It’s just 10 miles to Tussey Mountain’s skating, skiing and mini-golf. Or relax in our pool and well-equipped fitness center. Our daily hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Hampton Inn State College
description: Stay wholesome in Happy Valley with our free hot breakfast ahead of walking minutes down the road to Penn State, the Bryce Jordan Center or Beaver Stadium. Or all of them, if you like. Tussey Mountain ski area and Penn’s Cave are also short drives away. Fitness center and WiFi both free.

name: Hilton Garden Inn State College
description: Located off Highway 322, we're walking distance from Penn State University, and within two miles of Beaver Stadium and Bryce Jordan Center. Downtown State College can be reached in five minutes, and The Arboretum at Penn State is only three miles away. Enjoy our heated indoor pool, all-day dining, and 24-hour convenience shop.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Valley Forge/Oaks
description: Off Route 422, we’re in walking distance of the Greater Philadelphia Expo Center, shopping, and dining. Valley Forge National Historical Park is four miles away, and we’re eight miles from the King of Prussia mall. Perks include our free five-mile shuttle, indoor pool, restaurant, and patio with fire pit.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Valley Forge/Oaks
description: We're just off US Highway 422, a mile from the Greater Philadelphia Expo Center. Our free shuttle will take you there – and to other destinations within five miles. The King of Prussia Mall is 14 minutes away. Work out in our fitness center and unwind in our seasonal outdoor pool. Daily hot breakfast, WiFi and parking are on us.

name: Tru By Hilton Audubon Valley Forge
description: Located five minutes from US-422, we’re within a half mile of a choice of popular restaurants. Valley Forge National Historical Park, Greater Philadelphia Oaks Expo Center, and King of Prussia Mall are all less than 10 minutes away. Enjoy daily build-your-own breakfast, free WiFi, and our indoor saline pool and fitness center. Pets are welcome.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Philadelphia-Valley Forge
description: We’re less than four miles from the Greater Philadelphia Expo Center – jump aboard our free shuttle to local corporations. Grab free breakfast before taking the dog to Valley Forge National Historical Park, just 10 minutes away. Enjoy free WiFi and our evening social, Monday – Thursday. Try some neighborhood dining, or whip something up in your in-suite kitchen.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton King of Prussia Valley Forge
description: With the King of Prussia Mall (second largest in the U.S.) and restaurants within walking distance, you’ll barely have a chance to use your in-suite kitchen. WiFi, parking and breakfast are free – an ideal start before visiting Valley Forge National Park. Corporate guests, enjoy proximity to Forge Convention Center and Greater Philadelphia Expo Center.

name: Hampton Inn Philadelphia/King Of Prussia (Valley Forge)
description: Reach us from the Pennsylvania Turnpike and discover King of Prussia Mall shopping five minutes away. You’ll be 10 minutes from Valley Forge Casino and Convention Center, next to the National Historical Park. The interstate gives you easy access to Philadelphia. Start the day with free hot breakfast, and enjoy free WiFi and our fitness center.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Philadelphia Valley Forge
description: We're off Highway 202, less than five miles from King of Prussia, home to the largest mall on the East Coast. Our suites are a half-mile from the Chester Valley Trail and within three miles of Valley Forge National Historical Park. Enjoy free made-to-order breakfast and our complimentary evening reception. Our free shuttle runs Monday through Friday within a five-mile radius.

name: Desmond Hotel Malvern, a DoubleTree by Hilton
description: Our Malvern hotel is just off the Pennsylvania Turnpike, within 15 minutes of Valley Forge National Historic Park and the King of Prussia mall. We have an indoor pool and a fitness center, with tennis and basketball courts outside. With an IACC-certified conference center and outdoor spaces, our facilities can suit a variety of events.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Philadelphia-Great Valley
description: We’re just off Route 202, two minutes from Penn State University. Grab our free shuttle, covering a five-mile radius, to explore the Great Valley Corporate Center area. We’re 20 minutes from both LEGOLAND® Discovery Center and dining at King of Prussia Mall. Or cook in your in-suite kitchen. WiFi, breakfast and evening socials, Monday – Thursday, are free. Pets are welcome.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Philadelphia Plymouth Meeting
description: Located just off I-276 in a commercial area, we're five minutes from shopping, dining, and entertainment at Metroplex Mall. LEGOLAND® Discovery Center is three miles away, and several corporate offices are close by. Return to your suite with fully equipped kitchen before winding down at our complimentary evening social, Monday to Thursday. WiFi and breakfast are free.

name: Hampton Inn Philadelphia/Plymouth Meeting
description: We're off I-476, adjacent to Metroplex Mall. You'll find a Ruby Tuesdays next door, or curb your cravings in our 24-hour Suite Shop. Hop aboard our free shuttle to local companies, or check out Morris Arboretum, 10 minutes away. Central Philadelphia is 20 minutes from the door. Enjoy free hot breakfast, WiFi, and outdoor pool access.

name: Hampton Inn Limerick-Philadelphia Area
description: Located off Route 422, we're within four minutes of Turtle Creek Golf Course, Proconex, and Emerson. For shopping, Philadelphia Premium Outlets is nine minutes away or you can visit Schuylkill River Trail for some outdoor fun. Relax in our pool or stay active in our fitness center. Free hot breakfast and free WiFi keep you content and connected.

name: Hampton Inn Bedford
description: We're just off I-76, only five minutes from the shops and restaurants of downtown. Catch a Civil War re-enactment at Old Bedford Village, under a mile away. Or explore beautifully-woven bed covers at the National Museum of the American Coverlet. Make your stay extra special with a mountain view room. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Belle Vernon
description: We're just off I-70, 15 minutes from Rostraver Airport, and equally close to California University of Pennsylvania. You’ll be within 15 minutes of nearby city business and Cedar Creek Park, with downtown Pittsburgh 50 minutes away. There’s plenty of dining and shopping on the doorstep, and you’ll have free WiFi. Enjoy free hot breakfast each day.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites California University-Pittsburgh
description: Find us off Highway 43, five minutes from California University of Pennsylvania and Convocation Center events. The highway puts you just 50 minutes’ drive from downtown Pittsburgh day trips: catch football at Heinz Field or ballgames at PNC Park. Wake up to free hot breakfast, and enjoy WiFi on us. Our 24-hour Suite Shop can cure any midnight cravings.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Pittsburgh New Stanton
description: Our hotel is just off I-70 and I-76 with several dining options in walking distance. Westmoreland County Community College can be reached in 10 minutes, and Westmoreland Mall and Seton Hill University are 10 miles away in Greensburg. Downtown Pittsburgh is less than an hour from our door. Enjoy free hot breakfast and our heated indoor pool. WiFi's on us.

name: Hampton Inn Pittsburgh/West Mifflin
description: We’re just eight miles from downtown Pittsburgh. Find family fun within 10 miles: catch games at Heinz Field and PNC Park, or spend a day at Kennywood Amusement Park or Sandcastle Waterpark. Or relax in our heated outdoor pool. The fitness center, WiFi, and hot breakfast are all free.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Uniontown
description: We’re off Highway 40 in the Laurel Highlands, two miles from Uniontown Hospital. Laurel Caverns, Frank Lloyd Wright’s Kentuck Knob, and Fallingwater are within 24 miles. West Virginia University is a half-hour drive. We have an indoor pool, a fitness center, and free parking. Enjoy breakfast, dinner, and evening room service from our onsite restaurant.

name: Hampton Inn Uniontown
description: We're down the road from the Uniontown Mall, under a mile from US-119. Explore the depths of Laurel Caverns, Pennsylvania's largest cave, 15 miles away. Hiking and biking in Ohiopyle State Park is a great way to spend a day, and Frank Lloyd Wright's masterpiece Fallingwater is worth the 25-mile trip. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our pool.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites North Huntingdon-Irwin
description: We're just off the I-76/US-30 intersection, nine miles from Seton Hill University and the Palace Theatre in Greensburg. Spend a day having good old-fashioned fun at Kennywood amusement park, 14 miles away. It's a six-mile drive to the Elliot Group in nearby Jeannette. Relax in our heated indoor pool or next to the firepit. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Pittsburgh - Meadow Lands
description: We're near I-79, adjacent to the Meadows Racetrack & Casino and a mile from Tanger Outlets, with a free shuttle to both. Interstate access puts us a half-hour drive from Pittsburgh. Each stay begins with a warm DoubleTree cookie on arrival, and perks include our fitness center, outdoor pool, and ballroom accommodating up to 800 people.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Pittsburgh-Southpointe
description: We are less than a mile from Printscape Arena at Southpointe and two miles away from McDowell Lane Sports Complex and Bella Sera venue. Tee off at Valley Brook Country Club five miles away. Select from diverse dining options less than a mile from us. WiFi, breakfast and our evening social, Monday – Thursday, are free.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Pittsburgh-Meadow Lands
description: We're within walking distance of Meadows Casino and dining and shopping at the popular Tanger Outlets. Enjoy our hot breakfast, then get into the swing of things at Lindenwood Golf Club, nine miles away. Washington and Jefferson College is just five miles away. Wind down in our pool and fitness center and enjoy free WiFi.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Pittsburgh/Southpointe
description: Find us off I-79 in Southpointe Business Park. We're two miles from Printscape Arena at Southpointe and seven miles from Peters Lake Park. The Tanger Outlets and Meadows Racetrack & Casino are 15 minutes from us, and downtown Pittsburgh is 17 miles away. Enjoy our restaurant and indoor pool, and plan events with 20,000 sq. ft. of indoor/outdoor space.

name: Hampton Inn Pittsburgh-Bridgeville
description: We’re off I-79, a half-mile from Bridgeville’s Abele business park. You’ll be 20 minutes from central Pittsburgh, offering football at Heinz Field, ballgames at PNC Park, home of the Pittsburgh Pirates, and NHL events at PPG Paints Arena. Pittsburgh International Airport is 20 minutes from our door. Wake up to free hot breakfast, and enjoy WiFi on us.

name: Hampton Inn Waynesburg
description: We’re at the intersection of I-79 and Route 21, three miles from downtown Waynesburg. Greene County Fairgrounds is five minutes away, and we're a short drive from Morgantown and the WVU Coliseum. The High Point Raceway is 15 miles away. Enjoy our free daily hot breakfast and WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Greensburg
description: Find us off Highway 30, within 10 minutes of the University of Pittsburgh Greensburg campus and Seton Hill University. We’re just as close to central Greensburg, where you’ll find the Westmoreland Museum of American Art and shows at the Palace Theatre. Grab free hot breakfast before heading to Twin Lakes Park, also 10 minutes from our door. WiFi’s on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Philadelphia/Bensalem
description: Find a cozy room off I-276/Pennsylvania Turnpike, half an hour from Philadelphia. You'll be within 10 minutes of Parx Casino and Philadelphia Mills shopping via free shuttle, covering a five-mile radius. Family days at Sesame Place theme park are less than 10 miles from our door. Enjoy our free hot breakfast, WiFi, heated indoor pool, and fitness center.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Newtown - Langhorne, PA
description: We're nestled in a quiet neighbourhood just 50 minutes from central Philadelphia. Closer to home, explore Lake Luxemburg and Sesame Place Amusement Park, both 10 minutes away. Hot breakfast is free – fuel for a day spent wandering Washington Crossing State Park and Baldpate Mountain. Join a free evening social, Monday – Thursday, or cook in your suite's own kitchen.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Newtown
description: We're right of I-295, in the Yardley suburb, near family attractions such as Sesame Place and Shady Brook Farm. Oxford Valley Mall is five miles away, and Carousel Village is a 16-minute drive from us. Philadelphia fun is 34 minutes from our door. Enjoy our outdoor pool, free daily hot breakfast and WiFi.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Warminster Horsham
description: Minutes from Horsham and a short drive from Philadelphia, our suites are suited to fun-seeking families and corporate travelers alike. Fill your plate with free breakfast before heading out to Peddler's Village, Sesame Place, or the Philadelphia Zoo. Business travelers, we're close to Alfa Laval and Capgemini. WiFi is complimentary.

name: Hampton Inn Philadelphia/Willow Grove
description: Located off I-276, we’re within two miles of Horsham Business Center and Willow Grove Station, and less than a mile from a variety of dining options. Prudential, Abington-Jefferson Health, and Honeywell are within five miles. Shop at Willow Grove Park Mall, just seven minutes away. Every stay with us includes free WiFi and free hot breakfast.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Horsham Willow Grove
description: Find our suites right off I-276, less than a 20-minute drive from Parx Casino, Sesame Place, and Glencairn Museum. Warminster train station is four miles away, and can get you into central Philadelphia within an hour. Enjoy our indoor pool, free hot breakfast, and complimentary Monday – Thursday evening social.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Warrington Horsham
description: We're in southern Warrington, walking distance from a range of restaurants and an IMAX theater. The Shops at Valley Square are five minutes away. Warminster, Willow Grove, and the Horsham Business Center are within five miles of us. Enjoy free daily hot breakfast and WiFi, along with our fitness center, indoor pool, and patio with fire pit.

name: Hampton Inn Doylestown
description: Find us off I-276, 10 minutes from Mercer Museum, Delaware Valley College, and downtown Doylestown. Restaurants are within walking distance, and we’re a 15-minute drive from Peddler's Village mall. Free WiFi, hot breakfast, and fitness center and pool use are included with your stay.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Doylestown, PA
description: Join us four miles from central Doylesdown and a 26-minute drive from New Hope. Soak up culture at Doylestown's Mercer Museum and sample world-class grapes at New Hope Winery and the Bucks County Wine Trail. Peddlers Village shops and restaurants are an 18-minute drive away. Stop by our free evening social, Monday – Thursday, and enjoy hot breakfast and WiFi on us.

name: Hilton Philadelphia at Penn's Landing
description: Overlooking the Delaware River with views across to New Jersey, our hotel is less than a mile from Liberty Bell, the Museum of the American Revolution, and Benjamin Franklin Museum. We’re adjacent to Spruce Street Harbor Park and Society Hill is under a mile away. Our indoor pool has views of the river, and we also have a sauna, and waterfront dining.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Blairsville
description: Find us where Route 22 meets Route 119, right next to Chestnut Ridge Golf and Conference Center. In addition to events and dining, you'll find two championship golf courses and a spa. We’re about 20 minutes from Indiana University of Pennsylvania and a museum celebrating Indiana County's greatest star, Jimmy Stewart. Enjoy our free WiFi and hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn Latrobe
description: Our Latrobe rooms are off Highway 30, five minutes from Saint Vincent College and Arnold Palmer Regional Airport. You’ll be less than a mile from Winnie Palmer Nature Preserve and just 15 minutes from Idlewild theme park. Jump back on the highway for day trips to downtown Pittsburgh, an hour away. Explore nearby dining, and enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Pittsburgh/Monroeville
description: We're off I-376 in Monroeville, next to UPMC East and five minutes from Forbes Hospital. Miracle Mile shops are just down the street, and the Monroeville Convention Center is two miles away. Heinz Field, PNC Park, and PPG Paints Arena are a 25-minute drive. Enjoy free hot breakfast, WiFi, and our indoor pool – plus an Outback Steakhouse attached to the hotel.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Pittsburgh - Monroeville Convention Center
description: Off the PA Turnpike, we're next to the Monroeville Convention Center. Just across the parking lot is Monroeville Mall, and we're a half-hour from Heinz Field and the Phipps Conservatory and Botanical Gardens. Enjoy our indoor pool, fitness center, and a warm DoubleTree cookie on arrival.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Pittsburgh/Harmarville
description: We're just off Route 28, close to PA Turnpike and I-76, and in walking distance to a variety of stores and restaurants. Galleria at Pittsburgh Mills is five miles away, while the city of Pittsburgh is a 20-minute drive following the Allegheny River. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, WiFi, parking, and access to our indoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn Bloomsburg
description: We're just off I-80, two miles from Bloomsburg University. Step back in time at Bill's Old Bike Barn, with its Harley-Davidsons, or picnic and fish in Bloomsburg Park along the banks of the Susquehanna River – both are a 10-minute drive. The Children's Museum is three miles away. Enjoy daily hot breakfast, WiFi, and parking on us.

name: Hampton Inn Hazleton
description: You'll find us at the intersection of I-80 and I-81, surrounded by stunning views of the valleys and mountains. Sugar Loaf Golf Club is eight miles away or, for an adrenaline rush, a rafting trip at Pocono Whitewater, is 37 minutes' drive away. Unwind in our pool and fitness center and enjoy daily hot breakfast, WiFi, and parking on us.

name: Hampton Inn Lewisburg
description: We're under 10 minutes from Bucknell University and Evangelical Community Hospital, close to several shops and restaurants. Susquehanna University is a 16-mile drive away. Visit Clyde Peeling's Reptiland 12 miles north, or head one mile to Fero Vineyards and Winery. We've got free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and a heated indoor pool waiting for you.

name: Hampton Inn Selinsgrove/Shamokin Dam
description: Nearly 300 years old, our area breathes history: check out the home of Joseph Priestley (credited with ‘discovering’ oxygen), or the Susquehanna Valley and River, America’s longest non-navigable waterway. Explore Monroe Marketplace Mall and local antique shops or spend a high-octane day at Selinsgrove Speedway. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Williamsport-Faxon Exit
description: We're just off I-180, with shops and restaurants an easy walk from us. Lycoming College and the Pennsylvania College of Technology are both six minutes away. Cruise on the Hiawatha Paddlewheel Riverboat or take the kids to the World of Little League Museum, then head back to relax in our pool and fitness center. WiFi and daily hot breakfast are included.

name: Hampton Inn Williamsport-Downtown
description: We’re off I-180, in the heart of downtown Williamsport. The Susquehanna River Walk, and Lycoming College are just a mile away. Pennsylvania College of Technology and the World of Little League Museum are five minutes from our door.  Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, WiFi, and our indoor pool and fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Kutztown
description: Off Route 222, we're a half-mile from Kutztown University of Pennsylvania and a mile from downtown. The annual Kutztown Folk Festival grounds are five minutes away, and Crystal Cave and wineries are within 10 minutes. Your stay includes free WiFi, daily hot breakfast, and indoor pool and fitness center access. We have a free local shuttle and patio with fire pit.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Reading
description: Our hotel is next to Santander Arena, home of the Reading Royals ECHL team. We're half a mile from GoggleWorks Center for the Arts and two miles from Reading Pagoda — our free shuttle will take you there. Enjoy our indoor pool, 24-hour fitness center, and a warm DoubleTree cookie when you arrive.

name: Hampton Inn Reading/Wyomissing
description: Right off Route 422, we're next door to Berkshire Mall and 10 minutes from central Reading. You'll be within 10 minutes of both Albright College and Penn State Berks campus. Head into the city for Santander Arena events and city views from the Pagoda atop Mount Penn. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our indoor pool.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Reading
description: We’re 10 minutes from Reading Regional Airport and adjacent to Broadcasting Square shopping. Hike your way through French Creek State Park, 20 minutes away, or catch a ballgame at FirstEnergy Stadium, just seven miles from the doorstep. WiFi and breakfast are on us, or scramble your own eggs, in-suite. Enjoy complimentary socials, Monday – Thursday. Pets are welcome.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Pittsburgh - Green Tree
description: Our hotel is by I-376, 15 minutes from Pittsburgh International Airport via free shuttle, available on request. We're less than six miles from downtown Pittsburgh attractions, such as Heinz Field, home to the Pittsburgh Steelers. Amenities include our indoor-outdoor pool, fitness center, free parking, and a warm DoubleTree cookie on arrival.

name: Hampton Inn Pittsburgh/Greentree
description: Our pet-friendly hotel is three miles from downtown Pittsburgh, where you can explore attractions like The Carnegie Science Center and The Heinz History Center. Catch a nearby sporting event or concert at Heinz Field, PNC Park, or PPG Paints Arena. The David L. Lawrence Convention Center and Rivers Casino are within five miles. Free parking, WiFi, and hot breakfast are on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Pittsburgh Airport South–Settlers Ridge
description: Our hotel is a 10-minute ride from Pittsburgh International Airport. Shop and dine across the street at Settlers Ridge, and take advantage of our free shuttle service to the airport and businesses within three miles. Downtown Pittsburgh is 10 miles away – Penguins, Steelers, and Pirates games are easy to reach via I-376. Enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Pittsburgh Airport South-Robinson Mall
description: We're walking distance from Robinson Town Centre and The Mall at Robinson. Pittsburgh International Airport is 10 minutes away via free shuttle. Central Pittsburgh is less than 12 miles from our door – take in Heinz Field football, PNC Park ball games, and Point State Park. We have a 24-hour fitness center and indoor pool.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Pittsburgh Airport Robinson Mall Area PA
description: Home is just over a mile from the Mall at Robinson, with Pittsburgh International Airport 15 minutes away. Grab our 24-hour shuttle to/from the airport. We’re 20 minutes from downtown Pittsburgh and ballgames at PNC Park. Try some neighborhood restaurants, or cook for yourself, in-suite. Enjoy complimentary evening socials, Monday – Thursday, and WiFi and breakfast on us.

name: Distrikt Hotel Pittsburgh, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: Housed in the former Salvation Army Building, our 1920's structure is listed on the National Register of Historic Places. Today, contemporary design sits alongside original limestone, woodwork, and stained glass. We're within a half mile of Point Park University and Market Square. Enjoy our roof terrace, two restaurants, and free-to-borrow bikes.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Pittsburgh Downtown
description: We're next to Market Square in downtown Pittsburgh, footsteps from PPG Industries and PNC Plaza. Pro sports at Heinz Field, PPG Paints Arena, and PNC Park are all within two miles. It's under a mile to the convention center and Duquesne University. Enjoy cooked-to-order breakfast as well as lunch and dinner at our two restaurants, Revel and Roost.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Pittsburgh Downtown
description: Our hotel sits on the top floors of the historic Henry W. Oliver building in downtown Pittsburgh. We're a block from Wood Street Station — Heinz Field, PNC Park, and the Andy Warhol Museum, are a 10-minute Metro ride away. Enjoy our heated indoor pool, and join us for free made-to-order breakfast and our complimentary evening reception.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel & Suites Pittsburgh Downtown
description: Off I-579, our hotel is at the heart of the downtown area, a half-mile from PPG Paints Arena – home to the NHL's Pittsburgh Penguins. We're blocks from Steel Plaza Station, providing rail access to PNC Park, Heinz Field, and South Shore entertainment district. Enjoy our fitness center, indoor pool, and a warm DoubleTree cookie on arrival.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Pittsburgh-Downtown
description: Off I-579, we’re adjacent to the Heinz History Center and David L. Lawrence Convention Center. PNC Park and other downtown attractions are in walking distance, and Pittsburgh International Airport is a 35-minute drive from us. Enjoy our indoor pool, fitness center, and views of the Allegheny River. Free parking, WiFi, and daily hot breakfast complete your stay.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Pittsburgh Downtown
description: We're off I-579, four blocks from David L. Lawrence Convention Center. PPG Paints Arena, Heinz Field, and PNC Park are less than 10 minutes away. Discover the Strip District's restaurant scene, or prepare meals in your full in-suite kitchen. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast and our evening socials, Monday – Thursday.

name: Hampton Inn Butler
description: Our hotel is off Highways 422 and 356. Enjoy free hot breakfast before exploring Moraine State Park, or teeing off at Krendale or Aubrey’s Dubbs Dred Golf Courses, all within 15 minutes. Explore shopping and dining, steps from your room. You’ll be half an hour from Slippery Rock University. WiFi’s on us, and our 24-hour Suite Shop can curb any cravings.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Pittsburgh/Cranberry
description: Find us five minutes from the center of Cranberry Township, a short walk from Cranberry Commons shopping and dining. We're partnered with UPMC Lemieux Sports Complex, also five minutes away. I-79 is close by, putting us within 22 miles of Moraine State Park and downtown Pittsburgh. Enjoy our indoor pool, whirlpool, and fitness center.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Pittsburgh Cranberry, PA
description: We're at the crossroads of I-76 and I-79, 20 minutes from downtown Pittsburgh. While you’re there, explore the Pittsburgh Zoo, the Carnegie Science Center, and the Carnegie Mellon Museum of Natural History. Day trips to Moraine State Park are perfect for hiking, swimming or just walking the dog. Breakfast’s free, or do it your way in your in-suite kitchen. WiFi’s on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Cranberry Pittsburgh
description: Find us nestled in the trees off I-76 in central Cranberry. We're just 1.5 miles from Cranberry Woods Business Park and close to I-79, providing great access to Pittsburgh, 25 minutes away. Grab free hot breakfast before walking the dog on neighborhood trails or visiting North Park, 20 minutes from your door, home of zip-lining and a golf course. WiFi's on us.

name: Hampton Inn Pittsburgh/Cranberry
description: Find us just off I-76 and I-79 in Cranberry Township, walking distance from shops and dining options. We’re a mile from Thorn Hill Industrial Park, home to over 100 businesses. Play a round at the Cranberry Highlands Golf Course, four miles away, or relax in our indoor pool. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Pittsburgh - Cranberry
description: Find us off I-79, the Pennsylvania Turnpike, and Route 19 — 10 minutes from Cranberry Woods Business Park. Downtown Pittsburgh and the riverside North Shore are 25 minutes away. Our hotel has an indoor-outdoor pool, a sauna, and a fitness center. Perks include our six-mile shuttle and a warm DoubleTree cookie at check-in.

name: Hampton Inn Pittsburgh/ Wexford-Sewickley
description: Find us just off I-79, six miles from Cranberry Township and 20 minutes from downtown Pittsburgh. Catch a Steelers game at Heinz Field, or watch the Pirates at PNC Park, both 15 miles away. Start your day with our free hot breakfast, dine locally, and unwind in our pool before a great night's sleep in your comfy bed. WiFi and parking are on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Pittsburgh / McCandless, PA
description:
Just eight miles from downtown Pittsburgh,
our suburban location puts you close to local businesses, restaurants, and colleges but within easy reach of the excitement of downtown. Catch a game at Heinz Field or take the family to Pittsburgh Zoo. Breakfast and WiFi are on us and you can make yourself right at home in a comfy, flexible suite with a kitchen.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Grove City
description: We're off I-79, 10 minutes from Grove City. Grove City Premium Outlets and Wendell August Forge, America's oldest and largest working forge, are less than a mile away. Both Grove City College and Slippery Rock University are within 20 minutes of us. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our indoor pool and hot tub.

name: Hampton Inn Pittsburgh Area-Beaver Valley-Ctr Township
description: We're only a minute away from I-376, next door to the Beaver Valley Mall. Downtown Pittsburgh is 32 miles away, home to Steelers football at Heinz Field, Pirates baseball at PNC Park, and Penguins hockey at PPG Paints Arena. It's only 16 miles to the Pittsburgh International Airport (PIT). Enjoy free daily hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our heated indoor pool.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Pittsburgh Area Beaver Valley
description: Located off I-376, we're less than two miles from Beaver Valley Mall, Penn State Beaver campus, and the Golf Club at Shadow Lakes. Pittsburgh Airport and Rochester Riverfront Park are within a 15-minute drive. Our hotel features a restaurant and bar with patio seating, along with a saltwater pool and a fitness center.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Pittsburgh Area Beaver Valley
description: We're just off I-376, walking distance from Beaver Valley Mall and two miles from Penn State Beaver and Community College of Beaver County campuses. It's 32 miles to downtown Pittsburgh for Steelers, Penguins, or Pirates games. Relax in our heated indoor saline pool. WiFi and breakfast are on us, or whip up a snack of your own in your in-suite kitchen. Pets are welcome.

name: Hampton Inn Pittsburgh University/Medical Center
description: We're off I-376, less than a mile from the University of Pittsburgh. Our free shuttle will take you there – and to Carnegie Mellon University, Duquesne University, and UPMC. PPG Paints Arena and downtown Pittsburgh attractions are three miles from our door. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Pittsburgh University Place
description: The University of Pittsburgh's School of Medicine is one block away, and it's a mile to Carnegie Mellon University and the Carnegie Museums. We offer a free shuttle to destinations within three miles (reservation required), including Duquesne University and PPG Paints Arena. Breakfast, lunch, and dinner are served daily in our Garden Grill & Bar. WiFi's on us.

name: Hampton Inn Carlisle
description: Off I-76, we’re a short drive from the Carlisle Barracks, Dickinson College, Ahold USA, and Carlisle Construction Materials. Keystone Aquatics Center is 10 miles from our door. Bikers and hikers can enjoy the Appalachian Trail 20 minutes away. We’re 45 minutes from Gettysburg and 30 miles from Harrisburg International Airport. Breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Mechanicsburg
description: Primely placed just off I-81, our eco- and pet-friendly hotel is close to Carlisle and 30 minutes from Hersheypark®. If you’re here on business, expect to be close to a host of office parks. Dine your way through an array of local restaurants – or cook for yourself in your own in-suite kitchen. WiFi and breakfast? Both on us.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Harrisburg-West Hershey Area
description: Enjoy proximity to downtown Harrisburg, seven miles away, with Whitaker Center for Science and the Arts nearby. We’re just a short drive from events at Hersheypark Stadium and family days at ZooAmerica. Make the most of free WiFi, breakfast, and an in-suite kitchen. Kick back at our free evening social, Monday – Thursday. Pets are welcome.

name: Hampton Inn Harrisburg West
description: Find us off I-76 and Highway 15, less than a mile from local dining options and seven miles from Williams Grove Speedway. Visit The State Museum of Pennsylvania and the Pennsylvania State Capitol Complex, both within 15 minutes. Finish your day with a dip in our outdoor pool. WiFi and hot breakfast are on us.

name: Hilton Harrisburg
description: We’re in the heart of downtown Harrisburg, a mile from the State Capitol Complex and the Susquehanna River. The Whitaker Center and shops of Strawberry Square are directly connected to our hotel, and the chocolate-themed attractions of HersheyPark™ are 20 minutes away. We’re home to an indoor pool, fitness center, and steakhouse restaurant.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Harrisburg/North
description: Our North Harrisburg hotel is off I-81, four miles from downtown. We're within two miles of the Shoppes at Susquehanna Marketplace, neighborhood dining, and a local cinema. Harrisburg University of Science and Technology and the Pennsylvania State Capitol are within five miles. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our indoor pool.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Harrisburg North
description: Find us off I-81, less than five miles from central Harrisburg, Colonial Park Mall, and the Pennsylvania Farm Show Complex and Expo Center. Hersheypark, The State Museum of Pennsylvania, and Susquehanna Art Museum are within a 15-minute drive. Each suite features a kitchen, and free hot breakfast is served daily.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Harrisburg East-Hershey Area
description: Central Harrisburg is just 4.5 miles away, with the State Museum of Pennsylvania, Broad Street Market, and quick access to City Island. For business travelers, we’re close to TechPort Business Center, the Hershey Corporation, and Fort Indiantown Gap. Hot breakfast and WiFi are free, as are Monday – Thursday evening socials.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Harrisburg East
description: Just off I-83 and I-283, we’re five miles from The State Museum of Pennsylvania and Pennsylvania State Capitol in downtown Harrisburg. Our free airport shuttle will take you Harrisburg International Airport, six miles away. Hersheypark is only 20 minutes from our door. Enjoy our restaurant, indoor pool, fitness center, and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Harrisburg-East (Hershey Area)
description: We're just off I-83, five miles from Harrisburg attractions like the Farm Show Complex and the Capitol Complex. It's a nine-mile drive to Hersheypark and Chocolate World. Large companies like Sysco and Pepsi are five minutes south, and Harrisburg International Airport is nine miles away. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our outdoor pool.

name: Tru by Hilton Chambersburg
description: At the junction of Interstate 81 and PA-31, we are less than three miles from downtown Chambersburg, Wilson College, and Nitterhouse Soccer Complex. Shippensburg University is less than 20 minutes away. Beautiful state forests, parks, and scenic trails surround the area; we’re happy to suggest spots for a Tru-ly local experience.

name: Hampton Inn Chambersburg
description: We're just off I-81, three miles from downtown and 10 minutes from Wilson College. Shippensburg University is 14 miles from us and historic Gettysburg is just 30 minutes. Enjoy a hot breakfast, then grab your clubs and head to Conocodell Golf Club, six miles from us. Relax in our pool and fitness center and stay connected with free WiFi.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Gettysburg
description: Off Route 30, we’re within 10 minutes of the Gettysburg National Military Park, Gettysburg College, Jennie Wade House, and downtown. Liberty Mountain ski trails are a half-hour away, and we’re less than two hours from Washington DC. Enjoy our indoor pool and whirlpool, restaurant, and fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn Gettysburg
description: We're next to the US-15/US-30 intersection, three miles from Gettysburg National Park. Head five minutes into town to find over a dozen historical sites, museums, and Gettysburg College. It's four miles south to The Outlet Shoppes. Relax in our indoor pool and whirlpool, and enjoy free hot breakfast. WiFi's on us.

name: Hampton Inn Clarks Summit
description: We're just off I-476 and I-81, within six miles of Clarks Summit University and Marywood University. Discover railroad history at the Steamtown National Historical Site, or shop the day away at The Marketplace – both are six miles away in downtown Scranton. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us. Relax in our heated indoor pool and hot tub.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Dickson City Scranton
description: We've got Viewmont Mall on our doorstep and the Steamtown National Historic Site within 15 minutes. The slopes of Elk Mountain Ski Resort are just a half-hour drive. Catch a RailRiders baseball game or a movie at Regal Cinemas – or simply relax in your spacious, pet-friendly suite. Breakfast and WiFi are both included in your stay.

name: Hilton Scranton & Conference Center
description: Our conference center hotel sits in downtown Scranton, directly off Highway 11. We're three blocks from the University of Scranton and the Marketplace at Steamtown shopping. Wilkes-Barre Scranton International Airport is 10 minutes away via free shuttle. Enjoy our 24-hour fitness center and indoor saltwater pool with whirlpool.

name: Hampton Inn Scranton At Montage Mountain
description: We're off I-81, 10 minutes from central Scranton. The Shoppes at Montage are five minutes away, surrounded by local restaurants. Montage Mountain skiing and outdoor events are 10 minutes from the door, as is Wilkes-Barre/Scranton Airport. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our indoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn Tunkhannock
description: We're nestled along Route 6, right down the road from the Nimble Hill Vineyard and Winery. Quaint downtown Tunkhannock is home to the historic Dietrich Theater and several restaurants. Procter & Gamble's factory is in nearby Mehoopany. Scranton and Wilkes-Barre are about a 27-mile drive away. Enjoy free hot breakfast and free WiFi.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Wilkes Barre
description: Off I-81, we're a half-mile from the Mohegan Sun Arena and seven miles from Mohegan Sun Casino. We offer a free shuttle to and from both. Downtown is 10 minutes away. Our Garden Grille & Bar serves breakfast and dinner, with evening room service including from local restaurants. Head for our 24-hour Pavilion Pantry for drinks and snacks.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Wilkes-Barre/Scranton, PA
description: We're next to I-81, five minutes from the Wyoming Valley Mall and the Wilkes-Barre VA Medical Center. Walk to a concert at Mohegan Sun Arena, or head two miles over to Wilkes University and King's College. It's 10 minutes to Mohegan Sun Pocono casino. Take a dip in our indoor pool and whirlpool. Hot breakfast, WiFi, and shuttle rides to Wilkes-Barre/Scranton Airport are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Clearfield
description: Just off I-80, we’re 10 minutes from Lock Haven University Clearfield Campus. We’re just as close to central Clearfield, home to Grice Clearfield Community Museum and Clearfield County Fair & Park. Fill up on free hot breakfast, and explore the Pennsylvania Wilds at Parker Dam State Park, 20 minutes away. Enjoy free WiFi and our indoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn DuBois
description: We're one mile from I-80, a quick walk from the DuBois Mall and four miles from Penn Highlands DuBois hospital. Get in a round of golf at the DuBois Country Club two miles away, and stop in at local wineries or the Boxcar Brew Works — all within three miles. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our outdoor pool and hot tub.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton DuBois, PA
description: Set in the heart of DuBois just off I-80, we’re a 20-minute drive from DuBois Regional Airport. Explore nearby state parks: Parker Dam, Cook Forest, and the Allegheny National Forest are less than 45 minutes away. Our suites include fully equipped kitchens – give us a grocery list, and we'll help with the shopping. Hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Hampton Inn Pine Grove
description: We’re just off I-81, surrounded by the Appalachian Mountains. Wake up to a free hot breakfast, then put a 4x4 through its paces at Rausch Creek Off Road Park, less than 10 miles away. Devour a day full of chocolate and rides at Hersheypark, around 30 minutes’ drive away. Your stay includes free WiFi and use of our indoor pool and fitness center.

name: Tru by Hilton Denver
description: We're off I-76 in a hilly, scenic area near Pennsylvania Dutch Country. You'll find unique gifts and homeware at the German Trading Post and the Lancaster County Antique Center, both within a mile of us. Get work done in our semi-private alcoves or pick up some free coffee and a board game in the lobby. Build-your-own breakfast awaits, and WiFi's on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Ephrata - Mountain Springs
description: We're off US 322 in historic Ephrata, with local restaurants just up the street. Visit the Ephrata Cloister – among the country's oldest religious sites – or see a show at Ephrata Performing Arts Center. Both are within a mile of the hotel. Adamstown's antique malls and Pennsylvania Dutch Amish country are a 20-minute drive. Enjoy our pool, free hot breakfast, and free WiFi.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Ephrata
description: We are in Ephrata Township across the road from the local community park which features two ponds for fishing and large amounts of field space. The Seiverling Antique Car and Pedal Car Museum is about two miles away. Visit the Ephrata Cloister Museum less than 10 minutes away. Our pet friendly hotel features a heated indoor saline pool.

name: Tru by Hilton Lancaster East
description: Immerse yourself in Pennsylvania Dutch culture in family-friendly Amish country. Minutes from the Rockvale and Tanger outlets, our rooms offer a comfortable spot to set down your shopping bags and rest your feet before another round of bargain hunting.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Lancaster
description: Enjoy easy access to Lancaster City’s corporate side and even easier access to the fun side. Take the kids to Dutch Wonderland theme park or try some games at Spooky Nook sports complex. For a little drama, check out Sight & Sound Theatre or the American Music Theatre. WiFi and breakfast are on us, or do breakfast your way, in-suite. Pets are welcome.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Lancaster
description: Located off Highway 30, we're within four miles of Clipper Magazine Stadium, Fulton Theatre, and Lancaster Central Market. Spooky Nook Sports and Dutch Wonderland can be reached in 10 minutes, and Amish Village is 10 miles away. Relax in our indoor pool and heated spa, and enjoy dining in our restaurant, and evening room service from 5pm – 10pm.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Downingtown Exton Route 30
description:
Our Home2 Suites hotel is close to the town of Downingtown, its Country Club and Exton, but what’s better is what you’ll get when you stay with us.
We’ll be your driver with our free shuttle to areas in a five-mile radius, we’ll be your kitchen with a free mix-and-match breakfast and cooking space in all suites and we’ll be your home with roomy suites with separate living and sleeping areas.

name: Hampton Inn Downingtown/Exton
description: We're just off PA-100, within walking distance of stores and restaurants. Eagleview Corporate Center and Bentley Systems are five minutes' drive and other business parks are about 10 minutes away. It's four miles to Exton Square mall for shops, or the trails at Marsh Creek State Park. Daily hot breakfast, WiFi, and parking are on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Exton/West Chester
description: We’re off I-76, one mile from DSM and West Pharmaceuticals, surrounded by a variety of eateries. Hop on our free five-mile radius shuttle to visit Marsh Creek State Park or Exton Square, both 10 minutes away. QVC Studio Park and Valley Forge are both 20 minutes from us. Our Garden Grille serves breakfast, dinner, and evening room service.

name: Hampton Inn Philadelphia/Great Valley/Malvern
description: Find us in Malvern, five minutes from Immaculata College and 15 minutes from the King of Prussia Mall. Pennsylvania attractions are easy to reach from our I-30 location – from Valley Forge National Park and Brandywine Battlefield 20 minutes away, to downtown Philadelphia, an hour's drive. Relax in our outdoor pool and enjoy daily free hot breakfast and WiFi.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Kennett Square
description: Off Route 1, we’re a five-minute drive from Longwood Gardens. Brandywine River Museum and Winterthur are within 15 minutes, and there’s a variety of wineries just as close. Philadelphia International Airport is 45 minutes away. We have an indoor pool, 24-hour shop, fitness center, and restaurant open for breakfast and dinner.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Chadds Ford
description: Located near Highways 1, 202, and 322, we’re less than a mile from dining options and three miles from Brandywine Battlefield. Visit Penns Woods Winery and Brandywine River Museum, just nine minutes away. Longwood Gardens and Winterthur Museum are within nine miles. Enjoy our indoor pool and whirlpool. We’ve got WiFi and hot breakfast covered.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Glen Mills Chadds Ford
description: Our location just a block off US-322 and US-202 is half a mile from The Shoppes at Brinton Lake and Concordville Town Center. Our spacious pet-friendly suites offer a living area with sofa bed, working wall, fully equipped kitchen and spacious bathroom. WiFi and breakfast are included in your stay. Stay active in our fitness center or take a relaxing dip in our indoor heated pool.

name: Hampton Inn Stroudsburg/Poconos
description: We're off I-80, 20 minutes from the Poconos Mountains. Bushkill Falls is a half-hour away, and East Stroudsburg University is a five-minute drive from our hotel. Downtown Stroudsburg's shops and restaurants are within walking distance. WiFi, daily hot breakfast, and pool and fitness center use are all free.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Stroudsburg Bartonsville
description: We’re located off I-80, a half mile from a variety of shops and restaurants. The Pocono Mountains are 20 minutes away and it's eight miles to Camelback Mountain ski resort. Crossings Premium Outlets is a 10-minute drive and Mount Airy Casino and Kalahari resorts are both within 12 miles. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our indoor pool and fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn Manheim
description: Our Manheim hotel is off I-76, less than a mile from Mount Hope Estate and Winery. See the historic Cornwall Iron Furnace or relax at Mt. Gretna Lake & Beach, just 10 minutes away. A half hour drive will take you to Hersheypark. Enjoy our heated pool or work out in our fitness center. We’ve got hot breakfast and WiFi covered.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Mount Joy/Lancaster West
description: We’re off Highway 283, two miles from the Spooky Nook sports complex. The Amish Farm and House and the Amish Experience are both within 20 minutes. Treat yourself at Chocolate World in Hershey, 30 minutes away. Unwind in our heated indoor pool. Hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Erie Bayfront
description: Enjoy lakeside views and downtown Erie from our bayfront hotel. A bus stop on our doorstep makes getting around a breeze. Erie Maritime Museum is next door and we’re a half-mile from Bicentennial Tower. Presque Isle State Park’s sandy beaches are a 10-minute drive away. We have an indoor pool, fitness center, and rooftop bar and restaurant.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Erie
description: Located on the Millcreek Mall Complex, we're eight miles from Erie International Airport and close to attractions like Waldameer Water World and Presque Isle State Park. Enjoy a spacious suite with fully equipped kitchen, free WiFi, and space to live, work, and entertain. A free hot breakfast is served daily, while our complimentary evening social is the place gather, Monday through Thursday.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Erie
description: We’re next to the Ambassador Banquet & Conference Center, within a mile of family fun at Splash Lagoon, and two miles from Millcreek Mall. Downtown Erie is six miles away – visit Erie Zoo, Erie Maritime Museum, and Presque Isle State Park while you’re in town. Enjoy our restaurant, indoor pool and fitness center, and free WiFi

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Erie, PA
description: Close to I-90 and I-79, we’re minutes from downtown Erie and a range of businesses, including LORD Corporation and GE Transportation. If you’re here for the outdoors, be sure to pay a visit to Presque Isle State Park where you can hike, swim, boat, and chill. Speaking of chilling, kick back in your studio or one-bedroom suite, complete with a kitchen and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Erie-South
description: We're just off I-90, a great place to break your journey or explore Erie. Millcreek Mall Complex and Presque Isle Downs & Casino are within five miles of us. Downtown Erie, the Bayfront Convention Center, and the coastline of Presque Isle State Park are all 20 minutes' drive away. Enjoy daily hot breakfast, WiFi, and parking on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Philadelphia/Ft. Washington
description: We're just off the PA Turnpike, within three miles of large companies like McNeil, Regus, and SofterWare. The Fort Washington SEPTA station is a 10-minute walk away, for easy access to Philadelphia. Plymouth Meeting Mall and Metroplex Mall are six miles away. Breakfast, lunch, and dinner are served daily at our Garden Grille & Bar. WiFi's on us.

name: DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Philadelphia West
description: Our hotel is in the Plymouth Meeting Executive Campus, just off the Pennsylvania Turnpike. We're less than half a mile from Plymouth Meeting Mall and LEGOLAND Discovery Center. Suites feature separate living and sleeping areas, and we have a fitness center and indoor pool. Enjoy our signature warm chocolate chip cookie when you arrive.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Philadelphia Montgomeryville
description: Our rooms are close to what you need in Montgomeryville/North Wales—Elmwood Park Zoo, the Valley Forge National Historic Park, and shows at Ambler Theater are all within half an hour. We’re off Highway 309, putting you 40 minutes’ drive from Philadelphia. Explore neighborhood dining and shopping at Montgomery Mall, and enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Lansdale
description: Home’s in a residential area with a city park in our backyard. We’re 5 minutes from Merck and Safeguard offices and 30 minutes from King of Prussia mall and Valley Forge National Park. You’ll find shops and restaurants nearby, or eat at home in your in-suite kitchen. Stop by our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday. Breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Pittsburgh-Mcknight Rd.
description: We’re off Highway 19, near the junction with I-279. It’s 10 minutes to the Convention Center and downtown Pittsburgh’s shops and restaurants. Explore the Carnegie Science Center and the Andy Warhol Museum, and try your luck at the Rivers Casino. Relax in our indoor pool and whirlpool. Hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Hampton Inn Hanover
description: We're within four miles of Hanover's biggest companies including Hanover Foods, Utz Quality Foods, and ESAB Welding.
