Central PA is famous for snack foods, so stock up at the Utz and Snyder's of Hanover factory outlets. Get your other shopping done at North Hanover Mall half a mile away. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our indoor pool.

name: Tru by Hilton York
description: Visiting York on business? We're close to Harley-Davidson, Dentsply, and Voith Turbo & Hydro, with York Hospital nearby. WiFi and build-your-own breakfast are on us – parking's free, too. Check what’s playing at the Strand Theater, work up a sweat at Spooky Nook or catch a game at PeoplesBank Park.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton York
description: Just off I-83, close to Route 30, we’re convenient for central York, 2.5 miles away. You’ll be six miles from Penn Sate York campus, and four miles from York College of Pennsylvania. Historic downtown York offers museums and great restaurants. For a cozy night, try your in-suite kitchen, or our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Philadelphia/Media
description: Find us off I-476, just four minutes from The Media Theatre and Pennsylvania Veterans Museum. Retail therapy is six minutes away at Springfield Mall. A half hour drive will take you to Philadelphia International Airport. Stay active in our fitness center. Let our hot breakfast fuel you for your day - it’s free, just like our WiFi.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Newtown Square Radnor
description: We’re part of the Ellis Preserve development, surrounded by shops and restaurants and six miles from Pennsylvania scenery at Ridley Creek State Park. Philadelphia International Airport is 16 miles away. Our Great American Grill Restaurant serves breakfast and dinner, and the Pavilion Pantry is open 24 hours for drinks and snacks.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Ridley Park Philadelphia Airport South
description: Our all-suite hotel is less than three miles from Widener University and less than six miles from Philadelphia International Airport and Talen Energy Stadium. Our convenient airport shuttle and Spin2 Cycle are available 24/7, and breakfast and WiFi are always free. We're pet-friendly, too!

name: Tru by Hilton Grantville
description: We are located between I-81 and Route 22. Hollywood Casino and Penn National Racecourse are only five minutes away. Take a less than 15-minute trip and visit the Hershey Amusement and Water Park as well as Tanger Outlets shops. Guests can enjoy our family gaming area and indoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn Harrisburg/Grantville/Hershey
description: Find us off I-81, 20 minutes northeast of Harrisburg. Hersheypark and Hershey's Chocolate World are within 15 minutes of the hotel, and Hollywood Casino is a five-minute drive. Harrisburg International Airport is half an hour away. Perks include our indoor pool, fitness center, parking for trailers, and free breakfast and WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Hershey Near The Park
description: Our rooms are near top attractions – Hersheypark, Hershey Gardens, Giant Center events, and the AACA Museum are all within 10 minutes. We're off Route 39, 15 minutes from Penn State Hershey Medical Center. Hot breakfast and WiFi are free, and our fitness center and heated indoor pool are yours.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Hershey
description: Turn off Highway 422/East Chocolate Ave. to find our Hershey hotel. We're steps from local dining and within two miles of Hersheypark, ZooAmerica, and Hershey Theatre. Wake up to free hot breakfast and enjoy WiFi on us. Our 24-hour Suite Shop covers cravings, and our fitness center and indoor pool are all yours.

name: Tru by Hilton Hershey Chocolate Avenue
description: Find us in the heart of Hershey, minutes from Hershey's Chocolate World, the Hershey Story Museum and Hersheypark. The Giant Center and ZooAmerica are a mile away, and we're surrounded by restaurants. Start your day with a free build-your-own hot breakfast. WiFi is on us too.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Hershey
description: Our hilltop hotel is near Highway 422, around three miles from Hershey Medical Center and downtown. Discover "The Sweetest Place on Earth" with visits to Hersheypark and Hershey's Chocolate World, and take in the Hershey Gardens and Giant Center events, all within 10 minutes. Enjoy our 24-hour fitness center and indoor pool with whirlpool.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Pittsburgh/Waterfront-West Homestead
description: Find us by the side of Monongahela River. We're walking distance from shopping at the Waterfront and surrounded by neighborhood dining. The Great Allegheny Passage trail runs by our doorstep, ideal after filling up on our daily free hot breakfast. Downtown Pittsburgh is seven miles away. Enjoy our free WiFi, our heated indoor pool, and fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites York South
description: Comfort is off I-83, steps from York County School of Technology and local quick bites. You'll find York College 10 minutes away. York Expo Center & Fairgrounds, PeoplesBank Park, and Richard M. Nixon Country Park are 15 minutes from the door. Enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi, and our fitness center and indoor pool.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton York
description: Where culinary meets corporate in the White Rose City: we're in a retail corridor off I-83, surrounded by local restaurants and within 15 minutes of York's corporate offices and cultural attractions. Fill up on free hot breakfast before exploring the city's Heritage Rail Trail, events at the Fairgrounds, or York Galleria shops. WiFi's on us and pets are welcome.

name: Hampton Inn Lehighton-Jim Thorpe
description: Philadelphia history is yours to explore. Eckley Miners’ Village’s 100-acre ‘living history’ museum is close by, as is the Harry Packer Mansion, inspiration for Disney World’s Haunted Mansion. Head to Glen Onoko Falls for some beautiful hikes. For family fun, take a short drive to Dorney Park, for rides, or Blue Mountain, for skiing. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Mansfield
description: Find us off Highway 15, one mile from Mansfield University. We're five minutes from Lambs Creek Bike & Hike Trail, and Tioga-Hammond Recreation Area is 20 minutes away. Fill up on free hot breakfast before visiting Pine Creek Gorge, ‘the Grand Canyon of Pennsylvania’, an hour’s drive from the door. Enjoy WiFi on us.

name: Hampton Inn Sayre
description: We're off I-86, steps from Bluestone Brewing Company and down the street from numerous restaurants and shops. Place your bets at Tioga Downs Casino, just 20 minutes away, or discover the beautiful scenery of the New York/Pennsylvania border. Enjoy free hot breakfast each morning and take advantage of our free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Matamoras/Milford
description: We're right on I-84, in a great location for the tri-state area of NY, PA and NJ. Wake up to our free hot breakfast, tee off at High Point Golf Club, nine miles from us, or take a 10-minute drive to Delaware Water Gap National Recreation Area. Milford, for art galleries and gifts, is six miles away. Cool off in our pool, and enjoy WiFi on us.

name: Hampton Inn Meadville
description: You’ll find us off Route 19 and I-79, just 10 minutes from Allegheny College in Meadville center. We’re at the heart of Pennsylvania’s Great Lakes region, putting you only 15 minutes from Conneaut Lake Park and half an hour from Pymatuning State Park. Start each day with free hot breakfast, and enjoy fitness center access and WiFi on us.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Philadelphia Airport
description: Our suites are a mile from Philadelphia International Airport, and our free shuttle to and from the terminal can be arranged prior to arrival. We're five miles from Phillies, Eagles, Sixers, and Flyers games at the South Philadelphia Sports Complex, and Center City is a 20-minute drive away. Enjoy free made-to-order breakfast and our complimentary evening reception.

name: Hampton Inn Philadelphia-International Airport
description: Off I-95, we’re less than one mile from Philadelphia International Airport, with a free 24-hour airport shuttle. Ruby Tuesday restaurant is next door, and free hot breakfast is included with your stay. Perks include long-term parking, an outdoor pool, fitness center, and free WiFi.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Philadelphia Airport
description: Smell the signature chocolate chip cookies moments after you land: we're five minutes from Philadelphia International Airport, with a free 24-hour shuttle service. Wells Fargo Center and Citizens Bank Park are 15 minutes away, and we're nine miles from the historic sites of Center City. We have a fitness center and heated indoor pool.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton University City Philadelphia, PA
description: We're conveniently just a block away from University of Pennsylvania campus, very close to Children's Hospital of Philadelphia, Penn Medicine, and Presbyterian Hospital. Take a short cab ride downtown to experience fantastic historical sites, dining and shopping. Feel at home with daily free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and a full in-suite kitchen.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Philadelphia-City Avenue
description: We're just across from the Bala Cynwyd commercial district in City Avenue, five miles west of downtown and only 20 minutes from the airport. Spend a day at Philadelphia Zoo, then unwind in your suite with fully-equipped kitchen or join our complimentary evening social, Monday to Thursday. Breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hilton Philadelphia City Avenue
description: Our hotel is across from the Bala Cynwyd Business District and three miles from the Please Touch Museum and shopping in Manayunk. Philadelphia Museum of Art, Pennsylvania Convention Center, and Independence National Historical Park are within a 15-minute drive. Enjoy skyline views and our Steakhouse and Polo Lounge.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Sharon
description: We're right off the I-80/I-376 intersection, six minutes from UMPC Horizon-Shenango Valley, LindenPointe Business Campus, and Estes Express Lines. Spend an afternoon in Buhl Park six miles north, or relax here with a swim in our indoor pool. Start off your day right with free hot breakfast, and stay connected with free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites New Castle
description: We're under a mile from I-376, just off US Highway 224, and less than 10 minutes' drive from downtown New Castle for shops, restaurants, and businesses. The corporate headquarters of Pyrotecnico Fireworks is just a mile from us. Enjoy our hot breakfast, then head to Living Treasures "Wild" Animal Park, 13 miles away. WiFi is on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Lamar
description: Right by I-80, in the Mill Hall area, we’re just half an hour from Penn State University campus. While you’re there, catch football at Beaver Stadium and explore Palmer Museum of Art. You’ll also be within half an hour of Lock Haven University to the northeast and Penn’s Cave & Wildlife Park, south. Free hot breakfast is yours, and WiFi’s on us.

name: Hampton Inn Pittsburgh-Airport
description: We're off the I-376BL, seven miles from Pittsburgh International Airport via our free shuttle, and 10 minutes from The Mall at Robinson. The UPMC Events Center and Robert Morris University are within 2 miles, and local restaurants are a short walk away. Downtown Pittsburgh and S&T Bank Music Park are 25 minutes away. Enjoy daily hot breakfast, parking, and WiFi on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Philadelphia - Convention Center, PA
description: We’re in the heart of the city, yards from Philadelphia Convention Center and city business. You’ll be fifteen minutes from the iconic Liberty Bell, ten minutes from Philadelphia Museum of Art and walking-distance from Independence Hall. Fill up on free breakfast before you go exploring, and take advantage of an in-suite kitchen. WiFi’s on us, pets are welcome.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Philadelphia Center City
description: Our Center City hotel sits along Philadelphia's Avenue of the Arts, between the Wilma Theatre and the Academy of Music. We're across from the Kimmel Center and a five-minute walk from the SEPTA Broad Street Line. Enjoy city views from top-floor rooms and relax on the sundeck by the rooftop pool. Every stay starts with a warm chocolate chip cookie.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Philadelphia Center City
description: Relax at the heart of Philadelphia, steps from the Philadelphia Convention Center. Reading Terminal Market is next door and Independence Hall is minutes away. We're two blocks from Jefferson Station and 13th St. Trolley Station – hitch a ride to explore the wider city or reach the airport, 12 miles away. We have an indoor heated pool and whirlpool.

name: Hampton Inn Philadelphia Center City-Convention Center
description: We're across the street from the Pennsylvania Convention Center and a 20-minute walk from the Liberty Bell and Independence Hall. Countless restaurants can be found within half a mile, near City Hall, or in Chinatown, while Pub 1301 is here in the hotel. The Franklin Institute and Philadelphia Museum of Art are within two miles. Enjoy free hot breakfast and free WiFi.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Philadelphia Center City
description: Our hotel is next to Logan Square in Philadelphia’s Center City, steps from the Franklin Institute, Comcast Center, and Pennsylvania Convention Center. The University of Pennsylvania and Philadelphia Museum of Art are a mile away. Enjoy our fitness center and skyline views from the 28th-floor meeting rooms. We serve free made-to-order breakfast daily.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Warren
description: We’re off Route 62, just a mile from Warren State Hospital. You’ll be 10 minutes from Warren historic district, home to Warren County Historical Society and shows at the iconic Struthers Library Theatre. Free hot breakfast is fuel for hiking Allegheny National Forest’s wealth of trails, just 20 minutes away. Enjoy free WiFi and fitness center access.

name: Hampton Inn Coventry-Warwick Area
description: We’re off I-95, within a half-mile of a variety of restaurants. T.F. Green Airport is a free 15-minute shuttle ride away, and downtown Providence, home to Brown University and Roger Williams Park, is 20 minutes from our door. Seaside day trips to Newport and Narragansett Beach take 30 minutes. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and access to our indoor pool and fitness center.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Providence-Warwick
description: With beaches, shops, galleries, and restaurants close by, finding things to do is easy. If you prefer the indoors, take advantage of your fully equipped in-suite kitchen to whip up a home-cooked meal, or relax and use our free WiFi to your heart's content. Daily breakfast is on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Providence Airport/Warwick
description: It's easy to catch a flight from TF Green Airport, half a mile from our hotel, with our free around-the-clock shuttle. Nearby I-95 provides access to Warwick Mall 10 minutes west, and Providence attractions within 10 miles like the zoo, Brown University, and Rhode Island Convention Center. Enjoy breakfast, lunch, and dinner in our restaurants.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Providence/Warwick-Airport
description: We're right next to the TF Green Airport with 24-hour shuttle service. A dozen restaurants are within a mile, and you can find shopping at Warwick Mall three miles west. Downtown Providence is a 10-mile drive, passing Roger Williams Park Zoo and the Museum of Natural History and Planetarium along the way. Enjoy free hot breakfast and free WiFi.

name: Hilton Providence
description: We’re off I-95 in Downtown Providence, a short walk from the Rhode Island Convention Center and Dunkin’ Donuts Center. Providence Place mall and historic Federal Hill are within a mile. Brown University and Johnson & Wales University are a short drive and we’re 10 minutes from Roger Williams Park Zoo. Enjoy our indoor pool, fitness center, and Starbucks.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Providence Downtown
description: Our hotel is minutes from I-95 in the heart of downtown Providence, minutes from the Dunkin' Donuts Center and Providence Performing Arts Center. Brown University, Johnson & Wales University, and the Rhode Island School of Design are less than a mile from our door. Enjoy free hot breakfast, WiFi, and our shuttle to local transportation hubs.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Providence Downtown
description: Home is a half-mile from Rhode Island State House, walking distance from Brown University and the Rhode Island Convention Center. Providence city is minutes away, boasting attractions like the Performing Arts Center and WaterFire, an award-winning downtown sculpture. WiFi, breakfast and our evening social, Monday – Thursday, are free. Enjoy an in-suite kitchen.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Providence
description: We’re next to the bay and India Point Park, with some views of both. Downtown, Brown University, the Rhode Island School of Design, and Providence College are within four miles. Enjoy breakfast in our restaurant and a drink in the Pavilion Lounge. Grab a snack at the 24-hour Pavilion Pantry.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Smithfield Providence
description: Corporate guests can enjoy proximity to Fidelity Investments, CVS and Citizens Corp Park, with Bryant University just a mile away. WiFi and breakfast are free, but you could always whip something up in your in-suite kitchen. Hike Wolf Hill Forest Preserve, explore Roger Williams Zoo, or see if divine providence is on your side at Twin Rivers Casino.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Providence/Smithfield
description: We offer a free shuttle to places within 10 miles including Bryant University, the Fidelity Investments corporate office, and Twin River Casino. We're close to I-295, getting you to downtown Providence in 14 miles to visit Rhode Island College, Brown University, or Providence College. Start your morning off right with free hot breakfast. WiFi's on us.

name: Hampton Inn Pawtucket
description: We're next to I-95 in central Pawtucket, connected to Murphy's Law Irish Pub. Brown University, Providence Place, and other downtown Providence destinations are three miles away. Catch a baseball game at McCoy Stadium a mile east, or hit the slots at Twin River Casino four miles west. Enjoy free hot breakfast and free WiFi.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Newport Middletown, RI
description: We're at the juncture of Routes 138 and 114 – and of business, history, and nature. Expect to be short drives from downtown Newport on Aquidneck Island, Sachuest Point, and companies including Raytheon and the Navy Base. Free hot breakfast is on us, as is WiFi and our complimentary evening social Monday – Thursday.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Newport/Middletown
description: Find us minutes from Route 114, two miles from Newport Naval Station. Our seasonal shuttle will take you downtown. Newport attractions, including historic mansions and the Cliff Walk, are five minutes' drive from our door. It's four miles to Sachuest Beach, and Newport Vineyards is nearby. Unwind in our pool, and enjoy daily hot breakfast and WiFi on us.

name: Hampton Inn South Kingstown - Newport Area
description: We're right next to US-1, six miles from the University of Rhode Island. Entertainment and dining options are within walking distance. Head down to Adventureland Family Fun Park or over to Narragansett Town Beach, known for surfing, both three miles away. Relax all year round in our heated indoor pool and whirlpool. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Aiken
description: Find us 10 minutes from downtown Aiken, surrounded by local shopping, dining, and the Regal Aiken Mall movie theater. We're within four miles of Hopelands Gardens, Hitchcock Woods, and SRS Heritage Foundation offices. The University of South Carolina – Aiken is less than eight miles from us. Enjoy our outdoor pool and 24-hour fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn Aiken
description: Located just moments from local shops, spas, and restaurants in the historic downtown. We’re just a 30-minute drive from Augusta National Golf Course. Find equestrian statues dotted around the town and nearby Aiken Thoroughbred Racing Hall of Fame and Museum. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, free WiFi, a fitness center and outdoor pool.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Anderson
description: Located off I-85, we’re next to Lake Harwell, and within seven miles of Anderson University and Tri-County Technical College. Clemson University is 15 minutes away, and Anderson Motor Speedway is only 10 miles from our door. Our Garden Grille restaurant serves breakfast and dinner, and offers evening room service from 5-9 pm.

name: Hampton Inn Anderson/ Alliance Business Park
description: We're right off I-85 in upstate South Carolina's manufacturing corridor, just minutes from businesses like Bosch, TTI Ryobi, and Walgreens Distribution Center. Downtown Anderson is under 10 miles away and Clemson University is just a quick 15-mile drive west. During your stay with us, start each morning with free hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn Clemson-University Area
description: Located off US 123, we’re two miles from Clemson University. Hit the shops at University Square Shopping Center over the road. Visit Clemson Area African American Museum, two miles away. Or explore the garden trails of South Carolina Botanical Garden, just 10 minutes’ drive. Oconee County Regional Airport is six minutes away. Breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Tru by Hilton Seneca Clemson
description: Our hotel on Highway 123 is under five minutes from Clemson University campus and Lake Hartwell. A small selection of dining and shopping options are within walking distance. The South Carolina Botanical Garden is four miles away. Free hot breakfast is served every morning.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Seneca-Clemson Area
description: We’re just six minutes from Clemson University. Go boating at Lake Keowee, explore the World of Energy and Patriots Hall Museum, or visit the botanical gardens – all just 15 minutes away. More lakes and parks, Chattooga River rafting, and scenery at Chattooga Bell Farm are within 35 miles of our door. Enjoy free WiFi and free hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn Easley
description: Our Easley hotel is off Highway 123, within 25 minutes of Furman University and central Greenville. Tour Greenville’s historic district, catch events at the Expo Center, or take in shows at the Peace Center. Free hot breakfast is fuel for exploring South Carolina nature at Table Rock or Paris Mountain State Parks, half an hour from our door. WiFi’s on us.

name: Hampton Inn Greenville/Simpsonville
description: We're just off I-385, less than three miles from South Chase Business Park and a 10-minute drive from CCNB Amphitheater at Heritage Park. Shops and dining are within walking distance and Discovery Island Water Park is 10 minutes away. Work out in our fitness center and pool, and stay connected with free WiFi. Enjoy free hot breakfast daily.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Greenville Downtown
description: Downtown, Falls Park on the Reedy, Peace Center concerts, and restaurants are all a short walk away. We're so close to Fluor Field baseball, we're practically home plate. Greenville Zoo is two miles from our West End hotel. Cook for yourself in your in-suite kitchen. WiFi, breakfast, and our evening social, Monday - Thursday, are free.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Greenville-Downtown-RiverPlace
description: Our downtown hotel is walking distance from the Peace Center for Performing Arts, Falls Park, and Main Street shopping and dining. The Greenville County Museum of Art and Upcountry History Museum are just one mile away. Enjoy easy access to nearby Highway 123. Start your day with our daily hot breakfast – it’s free, just like our WiFi.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Greenville Downtown
description: Discover one of Greenville city’s oldest neighborhoods, boasting more than 100 restaurants, bars, and shops within a one-mile radius. Make the most of easy access to shows at Peace Center, scenic strolls through Falls Park, and events at Bon Secours Wellness Arena. Cook something up in your in-suite kitchen, and enjoy WiFi and breakfast on us. Pets are welcome.

name: Tru by Hilton Greenville Woodruff Road
description: Eight miles from Greenville-Spartanburg Airport, and with downtown Greenville just 15 minutes away, you'll barely have a chance to enjoy free WiFi. Hot breakfast is free, too, perfect for a day exploring Paris Mountain State Park, Bon Secours Wellness Arena, Falls Park on the Reedy, or shopping at Greenridge. Check your travel dates for a ballgame at Fluor Field.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Greenville
description: Near I-85 and Woodruff Road, we’re less than a mile from The Shops at Greenridge. The GE Gas Turbine plant and the North American HQ of Michelin are within six miles of our hotel, and Greenville-Spartanburg Airport is 20 minutes away. Our Garden Grille Restaurant serves breakfast and dinner, and The Shop is open 24 hours for drinks and snacks.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Greenville
description: Exit off I-85 and you’ll be with us, 15 minutes from central Greenville one way and Greenville-Spartanburg Airport the other. It’s just 15 minutes to Greenville Convention Center. We’re steps from the Shops at Greenridge, also offering great dining, or try your in-suite kitchen. Join our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Greenville I-385 - Woodruff Rd.
description: You’ll find us off I-385/Woodruff Rd, 10 minutes from Greenville, surrounded by shopping and neighborhood dining. You’ll be within 15 minutes of Greenville Convention Center, shows at the Peace Center, and scenic Falls Park on the Reedy. Greenville-Spartanburg International Airport is 15 minutes away. Breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Greenville/I-385 Haywood Mall
description: Off I-385, we're 15 minutes from Greenville-Spartanburg International Airport and across the street from the mall. Downtown, restaurants, Falls Park on the Reedy, and Paris Mountain State Park are all within 15 minutes. Enjoy our outdoor pool, fitness center, daily free hot breakfast, and WiFi.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Hilton Head
description: We're one mile from the Tanger Outlets and several local eateries. Experience the charm of Old Town Bluffton, just four miles away, or spend the day at Hilton Head Island Beach and Burkes Beach, both within nine miles. Hilton Head Airport is only a 15-minute drive from us. Enjoy dining at our Garden Grille & Bar, or grab a snack from our 24-hour convenience shop.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Bluffton-Sun City
description: Find us off Highway 278. We’re five minutes from The University of South Carolina Beaufort and less than a mile from dining options. Visit Old Town Bluffton and the Heyward House, or shop at Tanger Outlets – all within 10 miles. Hilton Head Island is 19 minutes away. We've got a pool and fitness center, and WiFi and hot breakfast is on us.

name: Ocean Oak Resort by Hilton Grand Vacations
description: Find us along Hilton Head Island’s coastline, just steps from its sandy beach and five miles from the iconic lighthouse and restaurants of Harbour Town. We’re a 10-minute walk from Coligny Beach Park and two miles west of Shipyard Golf Club. Enjoy our oceanfront pool and bar, and picnic area with charcoal grills.

name: Hampton Inn Hilton Head
description: We're next to three golf courses, just a mile from Hilton Head Airport. You'll find several restaurants and bars within a mile, too. The hospital and Hilton Head Island Beach are both two miles away. Enjoy live music at The Jazz Corner, six miles from our hotel. Relax in our outdoor pool. Hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Tru by Hilton Beaufort
description: Within four miles of historic downtown Beaufort, our hotel is just off US-21. Marine Corps Air Station Beaufort (Merritt Field) and Beaufort National Cemetery are within three miles of us. Parris Island is 10 miles away. We have a meeting room, fitness center, and Topgolf Swing Suite for your enjoyment.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Beaufort
description: Where military bases meet mother nature: we’re close to Marine Corps Recruitment Depot, Parris Island, and Merrit Field, with local beaches nearby and downtown down the road. Start each day with free breakfast, or cook your own in your suite’s very own kitchen. WiFi is free, as is the fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn Beaufort
description: We’re off Highway 21, a mile from downtown and 10 from the Marine Corps training center on Parris Island. The Beaufort Plaza mall is next to our hotel, and you’ll find several dining options a few steps away. Enjoy a bike ride on the Spanish Moss Trail, which passes a few yards from our hotel. Relax in our outdoor pool. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Beaufort
description: Our hotel is 20 minutes from Parris Island Marine Recruit Depot. The Bay Street waterfront, historic district, and Spanish Moss Trail are within five minutes, and Hunting Island State Park is a half-hour away. We’ve got all-day dining, room service, and restaurants in walking distance. Enjoy our free parking, fitness center, and outdoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn Camden
description: We're just north of I-20, under two miles from the Historic Camden Revolutionary War Museum. It's a five-minute drive to local restaurants and shops in downtown Camden. The site of The Carolina Cup horse race is six miles away. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our heated indoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn Columbia I-20-Clemson Road
description: Find us just off I-20, three minutes from Sparkleberry Plaza dining and five minutes from Thunder Tower Harley-Davidson. Head to the Village at Sandhill, less than 10 minutes away, for an afternoon of retail therapy. The University of South Carolina and Fort Jackson MEPS are just a 20-minute drive. Enjoy our free hot breakfast and 24-hour coffee bar.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Columbia Killian Road
description: Head into downtown Columbia, 20 minutes away, home of the Columbia Museum of Art, EdVenture Children's Museum, and South Carolina State Museum. The Riverbanks Zoo and Botanical Garden is also worth exploring. You'll be just 10 minutes from Northwoods Golf Club and South Carolina scenery at Sesquicentennial State Park. Enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Columbia/Northeast
description: We’re off I-77, six miles from the Village at Sandhill and 10 miles from the University of South Carolina. A 15-minute drive will take you to shopping and entertainment in downtown Columbia, and to Fort Jackson Military Base. Relax in our heated indoor pool, grab a snack from our Pavilion Pantry, and enjoy all-day dining at our Garden Grille & Bar.

name: Tru by Hilton Sumter
description: Ten minutes of travel will take you downtown, and 12 minutes will get you to Shaw Air Force Base. While you're with us, WiFi and build-your-own breakfast are free, with a 24/7 market for any cravings. Stop by the Patriot Park sportsplex for a game, explore The O'Donnell House, tour the Swan Lake Iris Gardens, or take in a show at Sumter Opera House—all nearby.

name: Hampton Inn Sumter
description: Off Highway 378, we’re 10 minutes from Sumter’s artistic center, home to historic Sumter Opera House, Sumter Little Theatre, and the Gallery of Art. You’ll be just as close to the University of Carolina and Central Carolina Tech, and 15 minutes from Shaw Air Force Base. Free hot breakfast is fuel for day trips to Columbia, 50 minutes’ drive away. WiFi’s on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Columbia Southeast Fort Jackson
description: Find us off I-77, less than 15 minutes from downtown Columbia and the University of South Carolina. The Riverbanks Zoo and Botanical Garden, South Carolina State Museum, and the Columbia Museum of Art are all within 10 miles of our hotel. Unwind in our outdoor pool, and enjoy free WiFi and hot breakfast daily.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Columbia/Southeast-Ft. Jackson
description: You’ll find us off I-77, a mile from a variety of shops and restaurants. Downtown Columbia, the University of South Carolina, Fort Jackson, and Williams-Brice Stadium are all within six miles of our door. Congaree National Park is 20 minutes away. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our outdoor area with fire pit and grill.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Columbia Downtown
description: We're a five minute walk from The University of South Carolina and one mile from Colonial Life Arena. Head to campus to see Columbia Museum of Art and Columbia Metropolitan Convention Center, or take a 10-minute drive to visit Riverbanks Zoo and Garden. Enjoy all-day dining and evening room service at our Great American Grill.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Columbia Downtown
description: Welcome to the heart of the business, financial and entertainment districts, close to restaurants. If you want a home-cooked meal, take advantage of your in-suite kitchen. Enjoy free WiFi and breakfast, a great start for a day at Riverbanks Zoo, touring museums, or taking in a show at Colonial Life Arena or Williams Brice Stadium. Your pets are welcome, too.

name: Hilton Columbia Center
description: Find us in Congaree Vista, listed on the National Register of Historic Places. We're within meters of restaurants, the Metropolitan Convention Center, and Colonial Life Arena. SC State House is a half-mile away and Riverbanks Zoo and Garden is three miles from our door. We have an outdoor pool, Ruth's Chris Steak House, and a 24-hour snack shop.

name: Hampton Inn Columbia-Downtown Historic District
description: Our downtown location is an easy walk from the University of South Carolina, the Metropolitan Convention Center, and many local restaurants and bars. Take the family three blocks down to EdVenture Children's Museum and the South Carolina State Museum. It's three miles to the Riverbanks Zoo. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our outdoor pool.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Charleston Historic District
description: Our hotel is in the restored former Citadel Military College in the heart of downtown Charleston. We're across from Marion Square and less than a mile from Charleston City Market, the College of Charleston, and the South Carolina Aquarium. Walk to nearby local restaurants and enjoy our free made-to-order breakfast and complimentary evening reception.

name: Hampton Inn Charleston-Historic District
description: The historic district is right on our doorstep; we’re adjacent to the Charleston Museum (the nation’s oldest), with easy access to Gibbes Museum of Art and the Children’s Museum. WiFi’s on us – kick off your day with free breakfast, before braving a ghost tour, carriage ride or visiting Fort Sumter, where the first shots of the Civil War were fired.

name: Liberty Place Charleston by Hilton Club
description: Liberty Square, the South Carolina Aquarium, King Street shops and dining – they're all within a 15-minute walk of our hotel. The Battery is 1.5 miles away. We have premier studios with a balcony on higher floors, and suites offer a separate living area and full kitchen. Join us in the lobby bar, and enjoy our fitness center and 24-hour business center.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Charleston Historic District
description: We're right next to King Street, home to many of the Historic District's best boutique shops and restaurants — not to mention plenty of historical attractions. A five-minute drive will get you to the city center or the Medical University of South Carolina. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, and relax at our complimentary evening social Monday – Thursday.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Charleston Waterfront/Downtown
description: We’re on the Ashley Marina, two miles from the Charleston Historic District – ask about our free shuttle. The VA Hospital, MUSC, College of Charleston, and The Citadel are within 10 minutes, and Charleston International Airport is 12 miles away. We have a seasonal outdoor pool and free parking available.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Mt. Pleasant Ferry Wharf
description: Located off US-17, our hotel overlooks Charleston Harbor and is just six miles from both downtown Mount Pleasant and Charleston. Patriots Point Links, the Naval & Maritime Museum, and Mount Pleasant Memorial Waterfront Park are all within five minutes. Spend a day at the beach, just 15 minutes away. Rest well in our beautiful, spacious suites with free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Charleston/Mt. Pleasant-Patriots Point
description: Find us off Highway 17, between Mt. Pleasant and Charleston, both five miles away. We're five minutes from Patriots Point maritime museum and Shem Creek Park, while Sullivan's Island beach is 10 minutes from our door. Wake up to free hot breakfast, and enjoy our free WiFi, outdoor pool, and fitness center.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Charleston / Mt. Pleasant
description: Just off Highway 17, we’re within two miles of Ravenel Bridge and Patriots Point, and four miles from King Street. Downtown Charleston and Sullivan’s Island are five miles from our door. Enjoy our breakfast, dinner, and evening room service, and relax with a drink on our terrace.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Charleston Mount Pleasant
description: We are located southwest of Mt. Pleasant Towne Centre, with quick access to I-526 and US-17. Beaches are just 10 minutes away, and we are less than 20 minutes from downtown Charleston attractions like the aquarium, historic city market, and the Battery. Choose from a wide variety of local eateries, or dine on-site at Pleasant Café.

name: Home2 Suites Charleston West Ashley
description: We're minutes from the Citadel Mall and West Ashley's dining spots, while downtown Charleston is a short drive down the I-17. Those looking to relax can do so at Folly Beach and Kiawah Island, less than an hour away. Enjoy breakfast on us ahead of a day’s strolling. Pets always welcome, WiFi always free.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Charleston/West Ashley
description: We're right off I-526 and US-17, eight miles from the College of Charleston and the South Carolina Aquarium downtown. Plenty of stores and restaurants are with a 10-minute drive. It's two miles to Bon Secours St. Francis Hospital and seven miles to the convention center. Relax in our outdoor pool, and start your morning right with free hot breakfast. WiFi's on us.

name: Tru by Hilton Mt Pleasant Charleston
description: We're moments off I-526, about five minutes from shops and restaurants at Mount Pleasant Towne Centre. Boone Hall Plantation & Gardens and military history at Patriots Point are within five miles. You can reach downtown Charleston and the South Carolina Aquarium in eight miles. Enjoy free hot breakfast.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Charleston Daniel Island
description: Nestled among the trees on Daniel Island, our all-suite hotel is perfect for overnight trips and extended stays in Charleston. Volvo Stadium is home to major concerts and is just half a mile away. The Daniel Island Trail winds along the Wando River and is a great way to stretch your legs.

name: Hampton Inn Charleston - Daniel Island
description: We're just off I-526 in Daniel Island's corporate park, five minutes from concerts and games at Volvo Car Stadium. Charleston International Airport is 10 miles away and our free shuttle will take you both ways. Historic downtown Charleston and Isle of Palms are both within 16 miles of our door. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast and WiFi, and access to our outdoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Charleston/Mt. Pleasant-Isle Of Palms
description: It’s time for a vacation. Staying with us means easy access to historic areas and the harbor of Charleston. Don’t miss Boone Hall Plantation, one of the nation’s oldest working plantations. Breakfast and WiFi are free.  Decision time: Fort Sumter and the Charleston Museum or the relaxing beaches of Isle of Palms? (The correct answer is: all of the above.)

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Charleston - Mt. Pleasant
description: Historic Charleston awaits just 20 minutes from our door, with its revered Historic City Market, South Carolina Aquarium, plentiful eateries and museum-filled French Quarter. Closer to home find Ft. Sumter, Boone Hill Plantation and Alhambra Hall. Enjoy free hot breakfast, WiFi and Monday – Thursday evening socials.

name: Tru by Hilton Charleston Airport
description: Reach the airport in 5 minutes from our front door. The Charleston Area Convention Center and North Charleston Coliseum & Performing Arts Center are just across the road. Free parking and breakfast make for a Tru-ly great stay. Our efficient rooms feature free WiFi, large TVs, and a comfy bed.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Charleston Airport
description: Complimentary shuttles take you anywhere within a five-mile radius. In-suite kitchens bring home comforts straight to your plate – though hot breakfast is free like the WiFi. We’re minutes from the North Charleston Coliseum and Convention Center, Tanger Outlet Mall and a host of companies like Boeing and Verizon.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Charleston Airport
description: Culinary and cultural experiences await: We’re a short drive from the historic streets of Charleston, with North Charleston Performing Arts Center nearby and the Convention Center across the street. Enjoy free WiFi and hot breakfast – or grab and go before taking our complimentary shuttle anywhere within a five-mile radius.

name: Hampton Inn Greenville/Travelers Rest
description: Find us between Highway 276 and 25, three minutes from Furman University. Explore the bike trails at Gateway Park, tee off at Paris Mountain Golf Course, or go shopping at Cherrydale Point, all within 10 minutes. A 20-minute drive will take you to Upcountry History Museum and Paris Mountain State Park. Start your day with our free hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Clinton - I-26
description: Located off I-26, we’re five minutes from the restaurants and shops of downtown. Step back in time at the 30 Revolutionary War battle sites in the area. Fish or swim Lake Greenwood, 30 minutes’ drive from our hotel. Enjoy a hearty evening meal at Fatz Southern Restaurant right next door. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Newberry-Opera House
description: In historic downtown Newberry, we're across from the Opera House and the Firehouse Convention Center, and a mile from Newberry College. You’ll find a choice of restaurants, bars, and stores within a 10-minute walk. Relax in our indoor pool and our fitness center, and enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Greenville Airport
description: You'll find us off I-85, four miles from Greenville-Spartanburg Airport. We offer a free 24-hour airport shuttle, plus free drop-off/pick-up within a five-mile radius of the hotel. It's 15 minutes to downtown Greenville's restaurants and historic sites, passing the Bon Secours Wellness Arena on the way. Relax in our indoor pool. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Greenville Airport
description: Located four miles from Greenville-Spartanburg Airport, we’ll pick you up or drop you off with our free shuttle. We've got shops and dining just steps away, and we're a short drive from Greenville Convention Center. Our suites have kitchens and free WiFi, ideal for extended stays.

name: Tru by Hilton Columbia Greystone
description: Our new Tru is three minutes from fun at Riverbanks Zoo and Gardens. Less than four miles from downtown Columbia, we are just off I-126. Enjoy free WiFi, a large HDTV with premium channels and our free ‘Top It’ breakfast bar. Our 24/7 market offers local snacks, single-serve beer and wine.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Columbia Greystone
description: We're off I-126, less than a mile from Riverbanks Zoo and Garden. Downtown Columbia and the University of South Carolina are within four miles. We have an indoor pool, free shuttle to and from Columbia Metropolitan Airport, and a discounted five-mile local shuttle. Enjoy daily made-to-order breakfast and our complimentary evening reception.

name: Hampton Inn Columbia-I-26 Airport
description: Down the road from Downtown Columbia, we’re your base for culinary and cultural discovery. Dine your way through nearby Soda City Market’s eclectic international cuisine. Shop for treasures at West Columbia Antique District. WiFi and hot breakfast are free during your stay.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Columbia Airport
description: We are located across the highway from the Lexington Medical Center and at the intersection of I-26 and State Highway 378. The University of South Carolina is about a 12-minute drive away. Visit the Riverbanks Botanical Garden and Riverbanks Zoo and Garden less than five miles from our doorstep. We provide an airport shuttle to Columbia Metropolitan.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Columbia, South Carolina
description: Every stay starts with a warm chocolate chip cookie at our hotel in Columbia, near the I-20/I-26 junction. We're 10 minutes from downtown, the Riverbanks Zoo and Garden, and the University of South Carolina. With 22,700 square feet of space, we're one of the area's largest event venues. Take our free shuttle to Columbia Metro Airport, a 15-minute ride away.

name: Hampton Inn Columbia I-26/Harbison Blvd.
description: We're off I-26 next to Lake Harbison – rent a bike and helmet from our front desk and check out the trails. Columbiana Centre shops and restaurants are a mile away, as is Frankie's Fun Park. Harbison State Forest is three miles from us, a great spot for hiking and canoeing. Reach downtown and USC's campus in 20 minutes. Hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Tru by Hilton Harbison Columbia
description: While you're here, enjoy easy access to downtown Columbia and Lake Murray—don't worry, our parking is free, just like WiFi and build-your-own breakfast. Corporate travelers are ideally placed for the University of South Carolina and Columbia Metropolitan Convention Center. The Columbiana Centre mall is nearby, and our 24/7 market offers snacks and sundries.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Columbia/Harbison
description: We’re one mile from Columbiana Centre and 15 minutes from Lake Murray, surrounded by nearby restaurants. Riverbanks Zoo and Garden, and The University of South Carolina are within 12 miles. A 20-minute drive will take you to Columbia Metropolitan Airport. Enjoy cooked-to-order breakfast, dinner, and evening room service from our Garden Grille & Bar.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Columbia Harbison
description: We're 10 minutes from downtown Columbia and close to Fort Jackson and Williams Brice Stadium. Play a round of golf, rent bikes, jet-ski, and snorkel: we've got lots of variety for outdoor activity. With spacious pet-friendly suites equipped with separate kitchen and living areas, we’re a great choice for extended stays. WiFi and hot breakfast are included.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Charleston Airport Hotel & Convention Center
description: Our hotel is next to the Charleston Area Convention Center and North Charleston Coliseum & Performing Arts Center, and we're five minutes from Tanger Outlets. We offer a free shuttle to Charleston International Airport, less than two miles away. Enjoy our indoor pool, and join us for free made-to-order breakfast and our complimentary evening reception.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel North Charleston - Convention Center
description: Our hotel is next to I-526, offering free shuttle rides to Charleston Area Convention Center, International Airport Charleston, and Tanger Outlets Charleston – all within two miles. The historic downtown area and Mount Pleasant are less than 15 miles away. Enjoy free WiFi, a chocolate chip cookie on arrival, and access to our Tiki-style patio and pool area.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Charleston Airport/Convention Center, SC
description: Find our all-suite hotel three miles from Charleston International Airport and right across the street from the convention center. We redefine corporate travel with pet-friendly suites, full-size kitchens, an outdoor pool, and free breakfast and WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Greenville/Spartanburg I-85
description: We're just off I-85, 20 minutes' drive from the cities of Greenville and Spartanburg. Our free shuttle runs to the airport, eight miles away, and area businesses. BMW Manufacturing and SC Inland Port are both seven miles from our door. Unwind with a round of golf at River Falls Plantation, two miles away, or swim in our pool. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Duncan
description: If you’re traveling for work, you’ll find in our neighborhood the likes of Spartangreen Business Park, BMW Manufacturing and Tyger River Industrial Park. Situated just off I-85 and I-26, we’re close to Tyger River Sports Park and a number of local colleges – including Wofford and Converse. Build your own breakfast and take advantage of the WiFi, complimentary each day of your stay.

name: Tru by Hilton Spartanburg
description: Our new Tru is just off US Route 29 and I-26, less than five miles from downtown Spartanburg, sporting events at Upward Star Center, and iconic diner fare at The Beacon Drive-In. WestGate Mall is across the highway, and Greenville-Spartanburg International Airport is 15 minutes away. Free hot breakfast and WiFi are included in your stay.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Spartanburg
description: We're off I-26 and US 29. WestGate Mall and Westgate Crossing shops are steps away, and downtown Spartanburg is 10 minutes' drive from our door. Enjoy cooked-to-order breakfast in our restaurant, as well as dinner. Drinks and snacks are available from our 24-hour Pavilion Pantry. Relax in our outdoor pool. WiFi is on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Spartanburg-I-26-Westgate Mall
description: We're off I-26 in Spartanburg, next to 1881 Events Center and WestGate Mall. Regal Cinemas and quick eats are within a mile of your room. We're 10 minutes from Spartanburg Downtown Memorial Airport via free weekday shuttle. Start the day with free hot breakfast, and enjoy our free WiFi, heated indoor pool, and 24-hour fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Florence-North-I-95
description: Stop over in our Florence hotel, just off I-95. You'll be within a mile of quick bites and shopping, with both the city center and Darlington Raceway 10 minutes from the door. Start the day with free hot breakfast, and enjoy WiFi on us. Our fitness center, heated indoor pool, and convenience store are all yours.

name: Tru by Hilton Florence I-95
description: We can try and tempt you indoors with free WiFi and free hot breakfast, or our vibrant lobby with free printing and 24/7 market, but the truth is that there's just too much to do outside. We're close to the Florence Center, Timrod Park, Florence County Museum, Jeffries Creek Park, and the high-octane action of Darlington Raceway.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Florence
description: Find us by the I-208/I-95 junction, walking distance from the Florence Center and Florence Veterans Park. We're a half-mile from Magnolia Mall shopping and dining and less than five miles from central Florence. Darlington Raceway is 11 miles from our door. Enjoy our fitness center, indoor pool and whirlpool, and restaurant and bar.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Florence Center
description: We're moments from the I-20B/I-95 intersection, a five-minute walk from events at the Florence Center, and half a mile from GE Healthcare. Get your shopping done at Magnolia Mall right across the interstate. Campus visits at Francis Marion University are 11 miles east. Take a dip in our outdoor pool, and enjoy free hot breakfast and free WiFi.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Florence
description: Just off of I-95 and I-20, we’re five miles from Florence center. The thrills of Darlington Raceway and Museum are 20 minutes from the door. Make the most of close proximity to Florence Regional Airport, eight miles away, and city business. Wind down at our complimentary evening socials, Monday – Thursday, or with some in-suite cooking. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Hartsville
description: Located in downtown Hartsville, you can wander unique boutiques and parks, dine at a range of restaurants, or take in an open-air movie at Screen on the Green. NASCAR fans can experience high-octane excitement at Darlington Raceway, less than 20 minutes away. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Fort Mill
description: We're off I-77, less than a mile from Baxter's shops, restaurants, and businesses. Several parks and golf courses are within 15 minutes. Visit the President James K. Polk State Historic Site, nine miles away. It's only 18 miles to downtown Charlotte. Take a dip in our outdoor pool or relax on the patio by the fire pit. WiFi and daily hot breakfast are free.

name: Home2 Suites By Hilton Fort Mill
description: We are within two miles of the Fort Mill professional park, LPL Financial, and Keller USA. Baxter Town Center shopping mall and The Kingsley multi-use development are within a mile. Get your thrills from Carowinds Amusement Park, only a 10-minute drive away. Enjoy our outdoor patio with firepit and heated indoor saline pool.

name: Tru by Hilton Fort Mill
description: We’re located off I-77 and South Carolina Hwy 460, just 10 minutes from Charlotte International Airport. Carowinds amusement park is only three miles away and Carolina Place Mall is only five miles from our front door. WiFi and breakfast are on us. Explore our collection of board games in the lobby or show off your skills with a friendly game of pool.

name: Hampton Inn Rock Hill
description: We're off I-77, next to Rock Hill Galleria mall, with a good choice of shops and dining within a mile. Winthrop University is 10 minutes away. Manchester Meadows Park, with its trails and soccer fields, is less than two miles from our hotel. Take a stroll along the shore of Lake Wylie, 20 minutes away, or take a dip in our outdoor pool. Hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Rock Hill
description: Find us off I-77 in Manchester Village where restaurants, outlet shopping, and the movies are within a 10-minute stroll. Meadows Park, Glencairn Gardens, and Carowinds Amusement Park are all within a 15-minute drive. There’s an indoor pool, whirlpool, and fitness center. The WiFi’s on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Rock Hill
description: We’re off Highway 177, under a mile from Rock Hill Galleria. Rock Hill Sports & Event Center, Winthrop University, and Manchester Meadows Park are within a 10 minute drive. Enjoy daily free breakfast and WiFi. We offer work spaces and access to our Spin2 Cycle laundry and fitness center. Pets are welcome.

name: Tru by Hilton Rock Hill
description: Find us just off I-77, a stone's throw from Rock Hill's retail mall and plenty of restaurants. Downtown Rock Hill, Winthrop University, and Cherry Park are all a 10-minute drive. Waterford Business Park, home to 3D Systems, Omnova, and more, is 2.5 miles away. Enjoy daily breakfast, parking, and WiFi on us.

name: Hampton Inn Gaffney
description: An ideal place for shopping, we are just off I-85, adjacent to the Gaffney Outlet Market Place. Fuel up on our free hot breakfast before exploring Kings Mountain National Military Park and Cowpens National Battlefield, both located within 26 minutes. Our location puts you within 10 minutes of Nestle Distribution Center and Newark Electronics.

name: Hampton Inn Spartanburg-North I-85
description: We’re just off I-85, five miles from Wofford College. Explore the past at Spartanburg’s historic Morgan Square, Cowpens National Battlefield, or the Walnut Grove Plantation – all within 20 minutes. Nature is close too: Croft State Natural Area, Hatcher Garden & Woodland Preserve and Lawson's Fork Creek are all within half an hour. WiFi and hot breakfast are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Georgetown-Marina
description: Find us off Highway 17, next to Georgetown Landing Marina and Winyah Bay. Visit the Georgetown Historic District and Rice Museum, both a mile from our door. Georgetown County Airport is a 15 minute drive away and you'll be just as close to Pawleys Island. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our indoor pool and fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn Pawley's Island
description: We're off US 17, a half-hour from Myrtle Beach and Myrtle Beach International Airport. Golf courses and North Litchfield Beach are five minutes away, and several cafés and local restaurants are in walking distance. Perks include our outdoor pool, fitness center, free WiFi, and hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn Murrells Inlet/Myrtle Beach Area
description: We're just off US-17, five minutes from local cuisine along the Marsh Walk boardwalk. Huntington Beach State Park and the zoo at Brookgreen Gardens are five miles away. Head northeast for 15 miles to arrive at Myrtle Beach destinations like Family Kingdom Amusement Park or the airport. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our outdoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Myrtle Beach/Oceanfront
description: The white sands of Myrtle Beach are moments away, and we've got two lazy rivers, three outdoor pools, four indoor pools, and a kids' water play area. Find shops, dining, and entertainment at The Market Common, Coastal Grand Mall, or Broadway at the Beach, all within four miles. Take our free shuttle to the airport. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Myrtle Beach Coastal Grand Mall
description: We're a quick walk from mall shops and dining, and three miles from sinking your toes in the sand along the Atlantic coast. Myrtle Beach Airport is five minutes away. Fuel up on free hot breakfast before a round of golf – there's five courses within 15 minutes of us – or prep a meal in your suite with full kitchen. A fitness center and outdoor pool await.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Myrtle Beach/Coastal Grand Mall
description: We're by US-17, steps from Coastal Grand Mall. Our free shuttle will take you to and from Myrtle Beach International Airport, two miles away. Visit the shores of Myrtle Beach State Park and entertainment at Broadway at the Beach, both within five miles. Breakfast and dinner are served daily in our Great American Grill. Enjoy our indoor and outdoor pools.

name: Ocean Enclave by Hilton Grand Vacations
description: Enjoy Atlantic Ocean views and easy beach access from our resort, just two blocks from the Boardwalk and four blocks from the SkyWheel. There’s a great range of restaurants and entertainment within half a mile of us and we have two pools, complete with a children’s area, whirlpools, kid’s activity center, poolside bar, and an oceanfront restaurant.

name: Hampton Inn Myrtle Beach Broadway at the Beach
description: We’re right next door to Broadway at the Beach, home to entertainment, shopping, and restaurants. Dave & Buster’s and Topgolf are less than a mile away. Myrtle Beach Sports Center is a five-minute drive and we’re six miles from Myrtle Beach International Airport. Enjoy our indoor and outdoor pools, daily free hot breakfast, and WiFi on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Lexington
description: Off I-20, we’re a short drive from a variety of shopping and dining. Riverbanks Zoo & Garden is eight miles away, and we’re 15 minutes from the views and hiking at Dreher Shoals and the Lake Murray Dam. Lexington Medical Center, the University of South Carolina, and downtown Columbia are each within 10 miles. Enjoy our outdoor pool and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Manning
description: Find us right off I-95 in Manning, less than five minutes from downtown, and walking distance from shops and restaurants. Santee State Park is a half-hour drive away, located on the western edge of Lake Marion. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our outdoor pool and fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn Santee-I-95
description: We’re off I-95 in Santee, within a half mile of a variety of restaurants and Lake Marion Golf Course. Lake Marion and Santee National Wildlife Refuge are five miles away, and Santee State Park is a 13-minute drive. Enjoy free daily hot breakfast and WiFi, along with our outdoor swimming pool, fitness center, and business center.

name: Hampton Inn Myrtle Beach-West
description: Located off US 501, we're across the road from the Tanger Factory Outlets and surrounded by a range of restaurants. Coastal Carolina University, Conway Medical Center, and AVX Corporation are within 15 minutes of the hotel. The Myrtle Beach coastline is seven miles' drive. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our outdoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn Myrtle Beach-Northwood
description: Off Highway 17, we’re 20 minutes from Myrtle Beach International Airport and 15 minutes from Myrtle Beach. Grande Dunes Golf Club is a five-minute drive from the hotel, and dining and entertainment at Broadway at the Beach are 10 minutes away. We’ve got free WiFi and hot breakfast, an indoor pool, and a fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn North Myrtle Beach-Harbourgate
description: We're right off I-17, five minutes from the beach and restaurants at Cherry Grove. Charter boats and seafood at Harbourgate Marina are next door. Spend a day shopping at Tanger Outlets nine miles away, and then relax right here in our lobby bar. It's four miles to youth league ballgames at North Myrtle Beach Park and Sports Complex. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Tru by Hilton Charleston Ashley Phosphate
description: We're off I-26, making it easy to reach Charleston International Airport in 15 minutes and downtown in under half an hour. Northwoods Mall and Charleston Southern University are within 10 minutes of us. Our large lobby is a great place to snack, work, or play. Start each day with free hot breakfast. WiFi's on us, too.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton North Charleston
description: Located off I-26, we’re walking distance from the shops and dining options at Northwoods Mall and North Rivers Marketplace. Charleston International Airport is eight miles away, while vibrant downtown Charleston is a short drive. Return to your suite with full kitchen, before kicking back at our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday. WiFi and breakfast is included.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel & Suites Charleston Airport
description: Our hotel is off I-26, half a mile from Northwoods Mall. Our free shuttle covers destinations within six miles, and Charleston Airport is a 15-minute ride. We're within half an hour of Middleton Place, Magnolia Plantation and Gardens, and downtown Charleston. Enjoy our fitness center, outdoor pool with cabanas, and a welcome cookie on arrival.

name: Hampton Inn Charleston-North
description: We're right off I-26, 14 miles from downtown Charleston and five minutes from shopping at Northwoods Mall. It's four miles to Charleston International Airport, Joint Base Charleston, and Boeing. Head five miles north to reach Charleston Southern University. Enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi, and escape from the heat in our outdoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites North Charleston-University Blvd
description: Free parking and hotel cruise packages make it that bit easier to experience Charleston. Corporate travelers can take advantage of our proximity to Boeing, DuPont, Nexan, Charleston Southern University and more. WiFi and breakfast are on us. Check your dates: you might catch the North Charleston Annual Arts Festival, in the spring, or the Autumn Family Fall Festival.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton North Charleston University Blvd
description: Located off I-26, we're four miles from Charleston Southern University, Wannamaker County Park, and Whirlin' Waters Adventure Park. Historic downtown Summerville and the Summerville Farmer's Market can be reached in 15 minutes. Enjoy our in-suite kitchens, outdoor pool, free WiFi, and free hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Orangeburg
description: We're right off I-26, four miles from South Carolina State University. The Regional Medical Center, Orangeburg-Calhoun Technical College, and area businesses like Koyo Corporation and Husqvarna are all within 10 minutes. Stop and smell the roses at the Edisto Memorial Gardens, six miles away, and cool off in our outdoor pool. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Tru By Hilton Orangeburg
description: We're just off I-26, a quick walk from several dining options and five minutes' drive from Orangeburg-Calhoun Technical College and The Regional Medical Center. South Carolina State University and Claflin University are three miles south near downtown. Enjoy free hot breakfast each morning with a Top It bar featuring over 30 toppings. WiFi's on us.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Summerville
description: We're off I-26, within a mile of big retailers and Nexton Square shops and dining. Reach Boeing and Volvo offices in less than 20 minutes. Lake Moultrie and Charleston are 30 minutes away. We have 14,000 sq. ft. of event space across our two-story conference center, and WiFi is free. Check out the walking trails nearby or unwind in our resort-style pool.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Summerville
description: Find us off I-26, within a mile of local dining and major retailers. Whirlin' Waters Adventure Waterpark is 15 minutes away, and we're 30 minutes from Charleston and Lake Moultrie. Relaxation's easy with our resort-style pool and several walking trails nearby. Cooked-to-order breakfast awaits, and our two-story conference center has meetings covered. WiFi's on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Summerville
description: We’re off I-26, two miles from downtown and walking distance from area dining. Volvo Cars USA and Charleston International Airport are 20 minutes away. Downtown Charleston, home to Waterfront Park and the historic homes of Rainbow Row, is a 30-minute drive via the interstate. Enjoy an in-suite kitchen, free hot breakfast, and free WiFi. Pets are welcome.

name: Hampton Inn Summerville
description: Find us directly off I-26, within 20 minutes of the historic district’s antique stores, Colonial Dorchester State Historic Site, and Azalea Park & Sculpture Garden. Central Charleston is half an hour away, home to Fort Sumter National Monument and Joe Riley Waterfront Park. Wake up to free hot breakfast, and enjoy WiFi on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Walterboro
description: We're next to I-95, in easy reach of several restaurants. Local attractions including the Colleton County Museum and South Carolina Artisans Center are four miles away, and it's 10 minutes to Colleton Medical Center. Start your morning right with free hot breakfast, and relax in our outdoor saltwater pool. Stay connected with free WiFi and our 24-hour business center.

name: Hampton Inn Yemassee/Point South
description: You'll find us just off I-95. We're close to several historic attractions: the Frampton Plantation House is just across the highway, and the Old Sheldon Church Ruins are 10 minutes away. It's less than an hour to Savannah and the beaches and golf courses of Hilton Head Island. Cool off in our outdoor pool. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Aberdeen
description: We’re off Highway 12, just steps from Dakota Event Center and five minutes from Aberdeen Regional Airport. You’ll be 10 minutes from both Northern State University and Aberdeen city center, home of Dacotah Prairie Museum. Fill up on free hot breakfast before delving into Wylie Park’s attractions, including Storybook Land, 15 minutes away. WiFi’s on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Rapid City
description: Set against the Black Hills of South Dakota and just off the I-90, we’re less than 35 minutes from Mount Rushmore and the trails of Custer State Park. Fill up on free breakfast and head next door to WaTiki Indoor Waterpark Resort – or minutes down the road to local corporations like Coca-Cola and South Dakota Department of Transportation. Airport shuttles and WiFi are on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Rapid City
description: We're located off I-90, within an hour of Black Hills National Forest, Mount Rushmore, Badlands National Park, Devils Tower, and Wind Cave National Park. Rapid City Regional Airport is 20 minutes away and our hotel features free WiFi, an indoor pool, and fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Rapid City Rushmore
description: Nestled among casual eateries off I-90, We're within a mile of Rushmore Mall. It’s less than 10 minutes to Rapid City, Dinosaur Park, and South Dakota Air & Space Museum. Mount Rushmore National Memorial is 27 miles away. Wake up to a free hot breakfast, and enjoy our indoor pool with two-story waterslide.

name: Tru by Hilton Rapid City Rushmore
description: Find our hotel off I-90, within walking distance of Rushmore Mall. Rapid City and South Dakota Air & Space Museum can be reached in 10 minutes. Animal attractions such as Bear Country USA and Reptile Gardens are within 12 miles. Enjoy games and complimentary hot drinks in the lobby, and take a dip in our pool with two-story waterslide.

name: Hampton Inn Rapid City
description: We're just off I-90, within walking distance of local restaurants and four minutes' drive from Rushmore Mall. For drive-by encounters with wolves, elk, and bears, head to Bear Country USA, 25 minutes' drive away, or marvel at Mt. Rushmore, 27 miles from our door. Wake up to our free hot breakfast, unwind in our pool, and enjoy WiFi on us.

name: Hotel Alex Johnson Rapid City, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: Built in 1927, our hotel combines historic architecture with handcrafted Native American art in tribute to the area's Lakota and Sioux culture. Main Street Square is a block away, and we're 25 minutes from Mt. Rushmore. We feature a rooftop bar, Irish pub, salon, and spa. Stop by Chubby Chipmunk Chocolates and Alex Johnson Mercantile for some on-site shopping.

name: Tru by Hilton Deadwood
description: Grab the camera. It doesn’t get much more iconic than Mount Rushmore Memorial, in the nearby Black Hills National Forest; but don’t overlook Custer State Park and Spearfish Canyon. If you’re interested in a different kind of dead president, try knocking on (dead) wood at Jack’s Gaming Resort, attached to the hotel. WiFi and build-your-own breakfast are on us.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Deadwood at Cadillac Jack's
description: Our hotel is connected to Cadillac Jack's Gaming Resort, less than a mile from the center of Deadwood off Highway 14. Try your luck with slots and table games on the smoke-free gaming floor, and choose from four restaurants at the resort. Relax by the outdoor pool and patio fire pits, and enjoy a warm chocolate chip cookie when you arrive.

name: Hampton Inn Spearfish
description: Reach us off I-90, three miles from Black Hills Airport. You’ll be 10 minutes from Black Hills State University, passing by Spearfish Canyon and Spearfish city center on the way. The interstate puts you 90 minutes from Black Hills National Forest, home of Mount Rushmore. Wake up to free hot breakfast, and enjoy WiFi on us.

name: Hampton Inn Mitchell
description: Our hotel is just off I-90, attached to the Highland Conference Center. We're two miles from Dakota Wesleyan University and seven minutes from downtown Mitchell, home of the World's Only Corn Palace. The Prehistoric Indian Village archaeological site and museum is six miles away. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our indoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn North Sioux City
description: We’re right off I-29, 10 minutes from downtown Sioux City. Enjoy free hot breakfast before exploring the Lewis & Clark Interpretive Center, just six miles away. Head 40 miles north to Blue Bunny's Ice Cream Capital of the World Visitor Center. WiFi is free, and our business center is available 24 hours a day.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Sioux Falls Downtown
description: Discover downtown delights from our hotel by the Big Sioux Falls River. Riverside trails are on the doorstep, and we're a half-mile from Washington Pavilion events, Sioux Falls SculptureWalk, and a variety of city dining. Sioux Falls Regional Airport is five miles away. We have free underground parking and an outdoor fire pit area.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Sioux Falls/ Sanford Medical Center, SD
description: Academic and corporate travelers have it made. We’re joined at the hip to Sanford Medical Center, with Augustana College and University of Sioux Falls nearby. When work is over, take the dog for a walk in Falls Park, visit Great Plains Zoo, or check out downtown Sioux Falls’ nightlife. WiFi and breakfast are on us. Expect an in-suite kitchen while you’re here.

name: Hampton Inn Sioux Falls
description: We’re located off I-29, a short walk from shops and restaurants and a mile from The Empire Mall. The University of Sioux Falls, Augustana University, and Washington Pavillion are a 10-minute drive away. We’re 20 minutes from Sioux Falls Regional Airport via our free shuttle. Enjoy free WiFi and breakfast as well as access to our indoor pool and fitness center.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Sioux Falls
description: We’re near I-229, five miles from central Sioux Falls. Grab our free shuttle (5am – 10pm) to/from Sioux Falls Regional Airport, 20 minutes away. Free breakfast is fuel for exploring Sertoma Park and its Butterfly House & Aquarium, five minutes from the door. Make the most of an in-suite kitchen, or try our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday. WiFi’s on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Southwest/Sioux Falls
description: We're right off I-229, down the road from Avera Heart Hospital and five minutes from MetBank, Midland National, and shopping at the Empire Mall. Head up to the Great Plains Zoo four miles north, or a mile further to the Sioux Falls Convention Center. The airport shuttle, daily hot breakfast, and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Watertown
description: We're in the Great Lakes region of South Dakota, near the junction of I-29 and Highway 212, and a few minutes' drive from the center of Watertown. Bramble Park Zoo and the Family Aquatic Center are equally close. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, free WiFi, an indoor pool and fitness center.

name: Hilton Knoxville Airport
description: We’re off US-129, connected to McGhee Tyson Airport via a covered walkway. University of Tennessee and World’s Fair Park are 20 minutes away, and we’re 14 miles from Knoxville Convention Center. We have a free shuttle available within a five-mile radius. Enjoy our indoor pool and fitness center. Parking and WiFi are on us.

name: Tru by Hilton Alcoa Knoxville Airport
description: We're located off Airport Hwy just five minutes from the Mcgee Tyson Airport. Take our airport shuttle for easy access. Maryville College, Neyland Stadium and the Tennessee Theater are only 20 minutes away. WiFi and a hot breakfast are must haves and included in your stay.

name: Hampton Inn Knoxville-Airport
description: Tucked away in small-town Alcoa with the Great Smoky Mountains and Knoxville down the road, we’re impeccably placed for a tranquil Tennessee trip. Try a tipple at Loudon Valley Winery, tour the Lost Sea in Sweetwater or hike the Cherokee National Forest – all short drives away. Stay for free breakfast or grab and go. WiFi is complimentary and corporate guests can use the 24-hour business center.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Knoxville West
description: Family fun is a short drive away. Enjoy Zoo Knoxville, hikes with the dog at Ijams Nature Center, Vols football games at Neyland Stadium, or events at Thompson-Boling Arena. We’re close to West Town Mall and Turkey Creek's shops and restaurants. For a night in, take advantage of your in-suite kitchen. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Knoxville West/Cedar Bluff
description: We're close to I-40/ I-75 and I-140, with shops and dining within walking distance. Downtown Knoxville is about 20 minutes away, with attractions like Clarence Brown Theatre and Neyland football stadium. Our Garden Grille restaurant and bar serves breakfast and dinner. The 24-hour Pavilion Pantry offers drinks, snacks, and ready-to-cook meals.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Knoxville Papermill Drive
description: We're next to I-40/75, six miles from downtown Knoxville and Volunteer games and events at the University of Tennessee. You'll find lots of great restaurants within a half mile, and the shops at West Town Mall are 10 minutes away. It's a seven-mile drive to the University of Tennessee Medical Center. Relax in our heated indoor pool. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Knoxville-West At Cedar Bluff
description: Find us off I-75 in Cedar Bluff, West Knoxville. We're within a half mile of restaurants, six minutes from Market Place Shopping Center. The University of Tennessee, Knoxville Convention Center, and Neyland Stadium are 11 miles’ drive. McGhee Tyson Airport is 22 minutes away. Enjoy free daily hot breakfast, WiFi, and our outdoor pool.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Knoxville Papermill Drive
description: Located off I-40, we're within a 10-minute drive of downtown Knoxville and the historic Market Square. Knoxville Convention Center, Tennessee Theatre, and Ijams Nature Center are within six miles. Our hotel offers cooked-to-order breakfast and dinner, along with an indoor pool and a sun-lit meeting space. WiFi's on us.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Knoxville West
description: Our hotel is just off I-40 in West Knoxville, within walking distance of several restaurants and shops and 10 minutes from Turkey Creek Shopping Center. Take a dip in our indoor pool, work out in the fitness center, and revive sore muscles in the sauna and whirlpool. A free cooked-to-order breakfast and evening reception are available daily.

name: Tru by Hilton Knoxville West Turkey Creek
description: Find us just off I-40/75, close to a bundle of Turkey Creek eateries and retailers. Concord Park is 5 miles away, home to lake waters, a golf course, and walking trails. McGhee Tyson Airport is 20 minutes from our door. Grab some fresh air in the rec area outside our hotel – we've got games and 24/7 snacks in our lobby, too. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Knoxville West at Turkey Creek
description: We’re nestled in Turkey Creek shopping center. You’ll find entertainment and restaurants nearby, or eat at home in your in-suite kitchen. Hike or bike the Turkey Creek Greenway, five miles of paved trail, or tee off at one of the numerous golf courses close by. Finish the day at our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Knoxville-Turkey Creek/Farragut
description: You’ll find us just off I-75, less than a mile from Knoxville’s biggest shopping area, Turkey Creek. There you’ll find all kinds of stores and restaurants, from national chains to independents. Downtown Knoxville is 20 minutes away: spend a family day at the World’s Fair Park and Knoxville Zoo, or relax in our outdoor pool. WiFi and hot breakfast are free.

name: Cumberland House Knoxville, Tapestry Collection by Hilton
description: Located in downtown Knoxville overlooking World's Fair Park and the Knoxville Convention Center, we are one minute away from The Sunsphere. The University of Tennessee is right across the street and Neyland Stadium is less than half a mile away. We're within walking distance to Market Square and area restaurants.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Knoxville-Downtown
description: We’re off I-40, 20 minutes from McGhee Tyson Airport.
