We’re just 14 miles away from the Anzalduas International Bridge into Mexico and its tourist-friendly towns. Fuel up our on free hot breakfast before exploring Bentsen-Rio Grande Valley State Park, just nine miles away. WiFi’s on us.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel El Paso Downtown
description: Our downtown hotel is next to I-10, under 10 minutes' walk from El Paso Convention and Performing Art Center. It's a mile to the University of Texas at El Paso. Sunland Park Racetrack & Casino, Western Playland, and El Paso Zoo are within eight miles. We offer a shuttle to the airport, free fitness center access, and an outdoor pool.

name: Hilton Garden Inn El Paso / University
description: We’re on the campus of the University of Texas at El Paso, half a mile from Cincinnati Avenue. El Paso Airport is nine miles away – we offer a free shuttle both ways, and to other locations within five miles. Our Great American Grill restaurant serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner. The Pavilion Pantry is open 24 hours for drinks and snacks.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton El Paso
description: Off I-10, our suites are three miles from El Paso International Airport. El Paso Zoo is five minutes away, and we’re 10 minutes east of downtown. Our hotel has an indoor pool, fitness center, patio, and 24-hour convenience store. Enjoy made-to-order breakfast and our complimentary evening reception.

name: Home2 Suites By Hilton El Paso Airport
description: Easy access to Fort Bliss, Sun Bowl Stadium, the El Paso Zoo, Ascarate Park, and a wealth of local restaurants – all of this will be yours within minutes of landing. While you're with us, expect free WiFi and free breakfast. Or cook at your own pace in your in-suite kitchen. Pets are welcome.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton El Paso Airport
description: Find us just off I-10, five minutes from El Paso International Airport. We’re less than 10 minutes from downtown El Paso, Ascarate Park, and El Paso Zoo. Head out for a day of shopping at a choice of nearby malls—our free 24-hour shuttle will take you anywhere within a three-mile radius. Later, stop by our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday, or do some in-suite cooking. WiFi and breakfast are included.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites El Paso-Airport
description: Cultures blend in vibrant El Paso. Whether you're visiting the UTEP campus, Fort Bliss army base, or Franklin Mountains State Park, our multi-lingual staff is happy to help you discover the area. Our hotel is conveniently located on I-10, about a mile from the El Paso Airport. Enjoy free breakfast and WiFi during your stay.

name: Hilton Garden Inn El Paso Airport
description: We’re off I-10, two miles from El Paso International Airport. We offer a free shuttle to and from the airport and other locations within three miles. Fort Bliss and downtown El Paso are both 10 minutes away. Enjoy breakfast and dinner in our Great American Grill restaurant, and a drink in our Pavilion Lounge. Grab snacks in our 24-hour Pavilion Pantry.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites El Paso West
description: Located off I-10, we’re just 15 minutes from downtown and 20 minutes from El Paso International Airport. Hike or bike the Franklin Mountains State Park, five miles away. Or take our free shuttle service to any El Paso attractions within 10 miles of the hotel. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites El Paso/East
description: Located on I-10, enjoy easy access to downtown El Paso and major corporations including Cisco Systems and Coca-Cola. See what the Sun City has to offer with a trip to El Paso Zoo, or spend a day perfecting your swing at Butterfield Trail Golf Club. After a busy day, retire to your spacious guest room with free WiFi access. A hot breakfast is also included in your stay.

name: Tru by Hilton Frisco Dallas
description: Surrounded by sports, shops, and entertainment, our hotel is minutes away from Frisco’s finest attractions. Dr Pepper Ballpark, Stonebriar Center, and IKEA are within half a mile, and The Ford Center at The Star is less than two miles away. There are tons of restaurants nearby, too, from fine dining to eclectic food stalls at Legacy Hall.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Frisco
description: We're adjacent to Comerica Center and Frisco Conference Center events, minutes off the Dallas North Tollway. Dr Pepper Ballpark and Stonebriar Centre shopping are a short walk away, and Ford Center at the The Star is a mile from our door. We have a free shuttle covering five miles, including downtown Frisco and Legacy West.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Dallas-Irving-Las Colinas
description: With a central location in Las Colinas, we're close to DFW Airport, the Irving Convention Center, and Toyota Music Factory. Your stay includes a spacious suite with fully equipped kitchen, WiFi access, a free hot breakfast, and a complimentary evening social—available Monday through Thursday.

name: Hampton Inn Dallas-Irving-Las Colinas
description: Time for adventure. Texas Motor Speedway, JFK Memorial, Globe Life Park, Cowboy stadium and Six Flags Over Texas are all nearby. Business travelers can take advantage of our corporate neighbors: Zales, Verizon Exxon/Mobil and Chase Bank. Deals and dining are just eight miles away, at the Grapevine Mills and Galleria malls. Breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Fort Worth Medical Center
description: Fort Worth's major hospitals are within a mile of our hotel along I-30. We're about two miles from the city's popular attractions, including Texas Christian University, the zoo, museums, and Sundance Square. Our meeting and event space is large enough for 200 guests. Enjoy our Garden Grille & Bar, kid-friendly indoor pool, and free WiFi.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton® Fort Worth - Medical Center, TX
description: Find us off I-30, 10 minutes from downtown Fort Worth. We’re within 1.5 miles of multiple medical centers, and just 10 minutes from Texas Christian University campus and its Amon G. Carter Stadium. Neighborhood dining is within walking distance, or try your in-suite kitchen. Join us for a complimentary evening social, Tuesday – Thursday, and enjoy WiFi and breakfast on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Fort Worth Downtown
description: We're close to I-30 and I-35W, and steps from the Fort Worth Convention Center. Sundance Square shops and dining, and the Fort Worth Water Gardens, are five minutes' walk away. It's four miles to Texas Christian University. Relax in our pool, order drinks from the lobby bar at night, and enjoy our outdoor fire pit. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hilton Fort Worth
description: Our hotel is noted by the National Register of Historic Place and is recognized as the site of JFK’s last presidential address. We’re in downtown Fort Worth, two blocks from Fort Worth Convention Center. Sundance Square is a five-minute walk, home to theatres, restaurants, and shops. Enjoy all-day dining onsite and local tips from our concierge.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Fort Worth Downtown
description: Our suites are within a five minute walk of Sundance Square Plaza, Bass Hall, and Fort Worth Convention Center. Explore the neighborhood with the free downtown trolley, which stops outside the hotel. We have an indoor pool, fitness center, and concierge services. Enjoy daily made-to-order breakfast and our evening reception.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Fort Worth Cultural District
description: Located in the cultural district, staying with us puts you two miles from Dickies Arena and a five-minute drive to Kimbell Art Museum. Fuel up on our free breakfast and discover the Japanese Gardens, just two miles away. Our conference room can host up to 45 people, and we offer a 24-hour fitness center and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Fort Stockton
description: Find us off I-10, just 10 minutes from the historic Fort Stockton and Annie Riggs Memorial Museum. Grab free hot breakfast, and tee off at Desert Pines Golf Course, five minutes from the door, or take a day trip to Big Bend National Park, an hour and a half’s drive away. Try our business center for work, or the fitness center to work up a sweat. WiFi’s on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Fort Worth-West-I-30
description: We're next to I-30, under 10 minutes from Lockheed Martin and across the highway from Ridgmar Mall. Visit Fort Worth Zoo or stop in to Texas Christian University, both six miles away. It's seven miles to downtown shops and restaurants near Sundance Square. Start each morning with free hot breakfast, and relax in our indoor pool. WiFi's on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Dallas/Frisco North-FieldhouseUSA
description: We’re across the street from two excellent sports facilities: Fieldhouse USA and Exos. It’s just half a mile to the Toyota Stadium, home of the FC Dallas soccer team as well as concerts and events. Over 100 companies are based at Hall Office Park, six miles from our hotel. Our meeting space can host up to 200 people, and hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Gainesville
description: Find us off I-35, steps from local shopping and restaurants. The WinStar World Casino, Leonard Park, and the Frank Buck Zoo are within 10 minutes of our front door. Spend a day at Ray Roberts Lake State Park, 25 minutes away, or dabble in Texas city life and county history in Denton, 40 minutes south. Enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Galveston Beach
description: Find us on Seawall Boulevard, adjacent to the beach. We’re 10 minutes from Galveston Island Historic Pleasure Pier, and within two miles of Port of Galveston Cruise Terminal — covered by our shuttle. Enjoy an outdoor pool complete with swim-up bar, private cabanas, and poolside dining. Perks include our fitness center and beach cruiser rentals.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Galveston
description: Set on the east end of popular Seawall Boulevard, we're a two-minute walk from Gulf Coast beaches and less than a mile from shops and restaurants. Our free shuttle takes the stress out of local trips, and WiFi and daily hot breakfast are on us. Check in to a spacious suite featuring fully equipped kitchen, before joining our complimentary evening social, Monday to Thursday.

name: Tru by Hilton Webster Houston NASA
description: We're an ideal base for all things Houston. Voyage to nearby shops, restaurants, and attractions. WiFi and build-your-own breakfast are free—there's no better way to start the day before boldly going to NASA Johnson Space Center or Space Center Houston. Parking is free: handy for Ellington Field and Armand Bayou Nature Center, both a short drive away.

name: Tru by Hilton Garland Richardson
description: With the Richardson Technology Corridor and major corporations such as Raytheon and State Farm nearby, we’re ideal for corporate guests. Enjoy free parking and WiFi; kick your day off with free build-your-own breakfast. Keeping the family entertained is a walk in the Hawaiian Falls Water Park – and the Curtis Culwell Event Center is close by too.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Dallas/Richardson
description: Off US-75 and near I-35, we're in the Telecom Corridor, minutes from tech companies including Ericsson, Samsung, and Texas Instruments. The Eisemann Center for Performing Arts and Sherrill Park Golf Course are within a few miles of our hotel. Enjoy free WiFi and hot breakfast and take a break from the Texas heat in our outdoor pool.

name: Tru by Hilton Round Rock
description: We like things convenient 'round here. Round Rock Sports Center and several local restaurants are a short walk, while downtown Austin is 25 minutes away. Enjoy free WiFi while you're here and kick off each day with free hot "Top It" breakfast. Check out Inner Space Cavern and the Round Rock Premium Outlets, or catch a Round Rock Express game at Dell Diamond.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Austin/Round Rock
description: Off I-35, we're in walking distance of Round Rock Sports Center and a variety of restaurants. Round Rock Premium Outlets is five minutes away, and we're 15 minutes from Dell Diamond. Downtown Austin and the University of Texas are a half-hour from our hotel. We have an outdoor pool, free WiFi, fitness center, and 24-hour snack shop.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Hutto Austin
description: Our hotel features an outdoor pool and small-town peace and quiet. We're five miles from Rock'N River Waterpark and Dell Diamond Baseball Park. If you prefer city life, downtown Austin is 27 miles from the hotel. Perks include laundry facilities, free WiFi, and free hot breakfast.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Austin/Round Rock, TX
description: Just off I-35, we’re the nearest hotel to Dell Technologies, half a mile away. Texas Hill Country gives you easy access to family days at Lake Travis. Check out H-E-B Center at Cedar Park for sports and Dell Diamond for minor-league baseball. Finish the day our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday, or with some in-suite cooking. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Austin-Round Rock
description: We're just off I-35, next to Dell, Inc. corporate headquarters, just 20 minutes' drive from Austin and 16 miles from the University of Texas. Start your day with our free hot breakfast, and spend your downtime exploring the shops, galleries and restaurants of historic downtown, three minutes' drive away. WiFi and parking are on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Austin Round Rock
description: Downtown Round Rock is around the corner – for you, that means close proximity to its range of boutiques and vibrant local restaurants… though you’ll have an in-suite kitchen at your disposal. We're ideally located next to Emerson. Expect free WiFi and breakfast each day.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Cedar Park Austin
description: Right off US-183, we're a 15-minute drive from Lakeline Mall, the H-E-B Center at Cedar Park, and Austin Aquarium. Austin-Bergstrom International Airport, the University of Texas, and downtown Austin are within 24 miles. Enjoy freshly prepared breakfast and dinner at Garden Grille as well as our outdoor pool, whirlpool, and fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn Weatherford
description: We’re right off I-20, 30 miles outside of Fort Worth. Fuel up on our free hot breakfast before heading 11 miles to Lake Weatherford, or practice your putting at Live Oak Golf Course, only five miles away. Work in our business center or in your room with free WiFI.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Greenville
description: We're just off I-30, right down the road from the Greenville Sports Complex. The excitement of the Dallas/Fort Worth Metroplex is 30 miles west, while history can be found at the Audie Murphy/American Cotton Museum three miles away. Enjoy free daily hot breakfast and take a dip in our outdoor pool. Stay connected with free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Dallas-Rockwall
description: We're right off I-30 next to Lake Ray Hubbard. Downtown Dallas is across the lake, just 30 minutes away – catch a Mavericks or Stars game at American Airlines Center, or spend an afternoon in the Arboretum and Botanical Garden. Enjoy free hot breakfast daily and free WiFi, and take a dip in our outdoor pool.

name: Hilton Dallas/Rockwall Lakefront
description: Overlooking Lake Ray Hubbard, our hotel is under half a mile from the restaurants and movie theaters of the lakefront Harbor Rockwall. Downtown Dallas is 22 miles away, and we’re a 40-minute drive from Dallas-Fort Worth International Airport. Our outdoor pool has plenty of seating, including cabanas and we have a restaurant and bar.

name: Hampton Inn Sulphur Springs
description: Just off I-30, it's an easy walk or short drive to popular stores and local restaurants. Discover antique shops, eateries, and museums in the historic square, just 1.5 miles north. Cooper Lake State Park is 25 minutes away – bring your hiking shoes or fishing gear. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and a dip in our outdoor pool.

name: Tru by Hilton Terrell
description: We're off I-20, three miles from the Tanger Outlets mall. Downtown attractions like Ben Gill Park and the Terrell Heritage Museum are 10 minutes away. With board games, comfy chairs, and hot coffee and tea, our lobby has plenty of space to gather and recharge – and WiFi is free.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Dallas-Mesquite
description: We're off I-635, adjacent to the Mesquite Convention Center and next door to the Mesquite Championship Rodeo Arena. You'll find local dining within a mile, and each day starts with free hot breakfast. Downtown Dallas is a 20-minute drive, passing by Fair Park on the way. Enjoy our free WiFi, outdoor pool, and fitness center.

name: The Sam Houston, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: Our downtown hotel was first opened in 1924 and is listed on the National Register of Historic Places. Houston attractions like Astros baseball, Brown Convention Center, and the aquarium are within a mile. Nearby Preston Station connects you by rail to NRG Stadium. Our fitness center features state-of-the-art equipment.

name: Hampton Inn Houston Downtown
description: We're in the heart of downtown, in walking distance of shops, dining, and businesses. Minute Maid Park is two blocks away and Discovery Green is just down the street. The George R. Brown Convention Center is 10 minutes' walk, and it's the same to catch a Rockets basketball game at the Toyota Center. Refresh in our outdoor pool. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Houston Downtown
description: We're in the heart of downtown, four minutes' walk from the George R. Brown Convention Center. Take a Segway tour through the city or visit NASA Space Center, 30 minutes away. Eat out at Nancy's Hustle or cook up dinner in your suite's fully-equipped kitchen. We offer a complimentary evening social Monday – Thursday, and WiFi and breakfast are on us too.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Houston Downtown
description: Just off I-69 and overlooking Discovery Green, our suites are within a half mile of Minute Maid Park, Toyota Center, and George R. Brown Convention Center. Enjoy the views over downtown Houston from our heated rooftop pool, and work out in the 24-hour fitness center. We serve a free cooked-to-order breakfast and evening reception daily.

name: Hilton University of Houston
description: We're on the University of Houston campus, adjacent to the Conrad N. Hilton College of Hotel and Restaurant Management. Downtown Houston, Minute Maid Park, and the Galleria Mall are all less than 15 minutes away. Your stay includes free access to the Campus Recreation and Wellness Center — complete with basketball, rock climbing, pool, and fitness classes.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Houston I-10/Central
description: We're off I-10, across from Memorial Park's trails and golf course. Check out premier shops at The Galleria, just 10 minutes away. Downtown Houston, the George R. Brown Convention Center, and Minute Maid Park are only seven miles from us. Start your day by fueling up on our free hot breakfast. We'll keep you connected with free WiFi.

name: Hilton Houston Plaza/Medical Center
description: Our hotel is across the street from the Texas Medical Center and four blocks from Rice University, with free shuttle service to both campuses. We're minutes from Dryden Metro Station links to downtown Houston, and NRG Stadium is two miles away. Enjoy our fitness center, and take in city views from the rooftop pool and bar.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Houston - Greenway Plaza
description: Find us at the center of Houston's Greenway Plaza business development off Highway 59, half a mile from Lakewood Church. Our free shuttle covers a three-mile radius — including The Galleria, Texas' largest mall, just 10 minutes away. Enjoy our 24-hour fitness center, heated outdoor pool, and a warm DoubleTree cookie on arrival.

name: Hampton Inn Houston-Near The Galleria
description: We're just off I-610, five minutes' drive from The Galleria, the largest shopping center in Texas. George R. Brown Convention Center and Texas Medical Center are eight miles away, while Marathon Oil Tower and Bechtel are five minutes from our door. Unwind in our heated outdoor pool, and enjoy daily hot breakfast and WiFi on us.

name: Hilton Houston Post Oak by the Galleria
description: We’re half a mile from the shops and restaurants at The Galleria – America’s fourth largest mall – and three miles from Memorial Park and the Houston Arboretum and Nature Center. Downtown Houston is six miles away. Our second-floor outdoor pool has plenty of seating, and we also have a 24-hour fitness center, as well as two restaurants and a bar.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Houston/Galleria Area
description: Near the I-69/I-610 intersection, we're at the heart of uptown Houston, two blocks from the Galleria. Interstate access puts us three miles from Memorial Park's 1,500 acres of wooded scenery and within eight miles of downtown Houston, Houston Zoo, and the Museum of Natural Science. We have a fitness center, outdoor pool, and whirlpool.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Houston Near the Galleria
description: Find us steps from The Galleria and a variety of Houston dining. Rice University is five miles away, and we’re within nine miles of the University of Houston and downtown attractions like Minute Maid Park and the Houston Museum of Natural Science. Enjoy our indoor pool, fitness center, free made-to-order breakfast, and complimentary evening reception.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Houston Near the Galleria
description: We're a five-minute walk from the The Galleria mall in uptown Houston, boasting a great choice of shops and restaurants 15 minutes from downtown. NASA Space Center is a 40 minute-drive away. Explore the city and relax in your suite with fully-equipped kitchen. Free WiFi and hot breakfast are on us, and your pets are welcome too.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel & Suites Houston by the Galleria
description: Nestled in uptown Houston, our hotel is next to the Galleria mall and steps from local dining. I-610 access puts us within nine miles of Hermann Park, home to Houston Museum of Natural Science and the downtown area. Soak up the sun on our outdoor pool deck, and enjoy a modern fitness center and a complimentary DoubleTree welcome cookie.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton at the Galleria
description: Indulge in some retail therapy in the boutique-filled Galleria or take the kids to explore Houston Zoo and the Downtown Aquarium, both just a few miles away. WiFi and breakfast are free – perfect fuel for a day’s wandering or dip in the indoor pool. Pets are always welcome.

name: Hilton Houston Galleria Area
description: We’re in the Galleria Shopping & Business District, just 10 miles from downtown Houston and George R. Brown Convention Center. A free shuttle service connects you to local businesses and Texas’ largest shopping mall, The Galleria, which is just five miles from our hotel. We have an outdoor pool with a sundeck and a fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn Houston/Humble-Airport Area
description: You’ll be 10 minutes away upon landing at Bush Intercontinental Airport – grab our free shuttle (5am – 10pm Monday – Friday, and 7am – 10pm weekends). It’s less than five miles to Humble Civic Center events, and walking distance to Deerbrook Mall’s shops and dining. We’re off I-69, providing access to central Houston, 20 minutes away. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Houston/Atascocita
description: Our Atascocita hotel is within 20 minutes of Lake Houston, football at Turner Stadium, and Humble Civic Center events. We’re 10 minutes off I-69, half an hour from central Houston. George Bush Intercontinental Airport is 15 minutes away, and neighborhood dining is steps from your room. Wake up to free hot breakfast, and enjoy WiFi on us.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Houston-Kingwood Parc-Airport Area
description: A short drive from George Bush Intercontinental Airport, we’re close to shopping, restaurants, and the cinema at Greenspoint Mall. The city center and Houston Zoo are just 30 minutes away and NASA Space Center is 45 minutes away. Your suite includes a fully equipped kitchen and free WiFi. Start your day with a free hot breakfast, and kick back at our evening social, Monday through Thursday.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Houston-Bush Intercontinental Aprt
description: Find us by I-69, two miles from George Bush Intercontinental Airport. We'll pick you up or drop you off in our free shuttle – just call to make arrangements. Houston attractions like the Arboretum and Nature Center are a 30-minute drive away. Relax in our heated outdoor pool and whirlpool, and enjoy free daily hot breakfast and WiFi.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Houston Intercontinental Airport
description: From IAH to warm cookies in just five minutes: our hotel is two miles from the terminals at George Bush Intercontinental Airport, just off the Sam Houston Tollway. We offer free shuttle service to and from the airport, with park and fly packages available. Enjoy our fitness center and outdoor pool.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Houston/Bush Intercontinental Airport
description: Close to I-69, we're three miles from George Bush (IAH) Airport via our free scheduled shuttle. Deerbrook Mall is 15 minutes away, and we're within a half-hour of downtown Houston and the George R. Brown Convention Center. Get to Rockstar Energy BMX Bike Park in 10 minutes. Enjoy our outdoor pool, fitness center, all-day restaurant, and 24-hour snack shop.

name: Homewood Suites By Hilton Houston IAH Airport Beltway 8
description: We're seven miles from George Bush Intercontinental Airport, and three miles from Greenspoint Mall. Downtown Houston and Houston Zoo are 30 minutes away and NASA Space Center is 45 minutes away near Galveston Bay. Unwind at our free evening social, Monday through Thursday, or make a meal in your fully equipped kitchen. WiFi and daily breakfast are free with your stay.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Houston North IAH
description: Reach us from the Sam Houston Tollway, near I-45.  George Bush Intercontinental Airport is just 10 minutes away in our free shuttle. With easy interstate access, dining, pro sports, and downtown Houston attractions are just 20 minutes away. Wake up to free hot breakfast and enjoy free WiFi throughout the hotel.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Houston IAH Airport Beltway 8
description: We're on Beltway 8 close to I-45, seven miles from George Bush Intercontinental Airport (IAH) – use our free airport shuttle to catch your flight. Corporate offices for Halliburton, GE, and Baker Hughes are less than 10 minutes away, and we're 15 miles from downtown Houston. Enjoy free hot breakfast and our outdoor pool. WiFi's on us. We're pet-friendly.

name: Hilton Houston North
description: Our hotel is off the I-45/Route 8 intersection in North Houston's Business District. We're 10 minutes from George Bush Intercontinental Airport via free shuttle, with the shopping, dining, and entertainment of Greenspoint Mall across from us. Enjoy free parking and access to our fitness center and outdoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Houston-Cypress Station
description: We're right off I-45, 13 miles from George Bush Intercontinental Airport. The ExxonMobil campus is just 10 minutes north. Fuel up with our free hot breakfast before checking out The Woodlands Mall or teeing off at Champions Golf Club. Use free WiFi to plan your day trip to Battleship Texas or Johnson Space Center, both 45 minutes away.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Houston Cypress Station
description: We’re just off I-45, four miles from Mercer Arboretum & Botanic Gardens, with dining options in walking distance. The Woodlands Mall, Minute Maid Park, and Toyota Center are all within 11 miles. George Bush Intercontinental Airport is 20 minutes from our door. Enjoy our restaurant and evening room service.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Huntsville
description: Our cozy hotel is off I-45. Explore the Sam Houston Memorial Museum, Texas Prison Museum, and H.E.A.R.T.S. Veterans Museum of Texas, all within seven minutes. Tee off at Raven Nest Golf Course or visit Sam Houston State University, just three miles away. Our free hot breakfast will help you start your day on the right foot.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton TechRidge Parmer @ I-35
description: Our suites are just off I-35, 15 minutes from The University of Texas Austin campus. You’ll be within 10 minutes of numerous major corporations. Check out downtown Austin’s live music scene, 20 minutes away, or stop by our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday. Enjoy WiFi and breakfast on us, and get creative in your in-suite kitchen.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Austin North
description: We’re off I-35 in Austin’s premier tech corridor with Samsung, 3M, and The Domain within 10 minutes. Downtown attractions like the University of Texas, 6th Street, and the convention center are within 11 miles. Cooked-to-order breakfast, lunch, and dinner are served daily at our Garden Grille & Bar. Enjoy free parking, our outdoor pool, and WiFi on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Austin North/Near the Domain
description: Austin’s music scene is close by at 6th Street, West 6th, and Rainey Street. Make the most of easy access to South by Southwest® festival in March and Texas State Capitol. The Domain retail center is minutes away, near the offices of local tech companies. Make the most of your in-suite kitchen, and enjoy WiFi and breakfast on us. Pets are welcome.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Austin NW/Arboretum
description: Our hotel is just off Highway 183, within 10 minutes of Apple and Cisco We're within easy reach of a variety of restaurants, shops, and entertainment – such as the Regal Arbor movie theater and Dave & Buster’s. Enjoy our indoor pool and fitness center. A hot breakfast is available in our Garden Grille & Bar, and the WiFi’s on us.

name: Hampton Inn Austin-NW/Arboretum
description: Find us just off Highway 183. The Arboretum mall and The Domain, for shops and dining, are within five minutes' drive, and we're also close to high-tech firms. The University of Texas is 15 minutes away. After a long day, cool off in our outdoor pool and if you're after a night on the town, downtown Austin is a 20-minute drive. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Austin-Arboretum/NW
description: Browse the Arboretum, Northcross Mall, and the Domain retail center, all within 10 minutes of your room. Free breakfast is ideal fuel for Lady Bird Lake hikes or exploring 6th Street entertainment district. You’ll have easy access to South by Southwest® in March. An in-suite kitchen is yours, or join us for complimentary evening socials, Monday – Thursday. WiFi’s on us.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Austin Arboretum
description: We’re five minutes from the Arboretum and a variety of shops, restaurants, and breweries. Charles Schwab and Applied Materials are within three miles – our shuttle will take you there. We're just off the MoPac Expressway, 10 miles from The University of Texas, Sixth Street, and downtown. Enjoy free made-to-order breakfast and our complimentary evening reception.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Austin Northwest Arboretum
description: Explore Austin's Arboretum from our hotel, a 10-minute shuttle ride from shopping and restaurants at The Domain. Our location near Interstate 183 and Loop 1 offers easy access to the University of Texas and Sixth Street attractions, a 20-minute drive away. The Overlook restaurant is open all day, and every stay starts with a warm chocolate chip cookie.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Houston/Katy Mills Mall
description: Home is a few minutes from Katy Mills Mall and a 35-minute drive to Houston – head there for Space Center Houston, The Museum of Fine Arts, and an international food scene. We’re also less than 15 minutes from corporations like Grundfos, Sulzer Pumps and Aker Solutions. Enjoy free WiFi and hot breakfast daily, or cook your own in your in-suite kitchen.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Houston West Katy
description: Off I-10, we’re walking distance from Katy Mills mall, No Label Brewing Company, and Typhoon Texas Waterpark. Our restaurant offers breakfast, dinner, and evening room service - and there are plenty more dining options within one mile. Our hotel has an indoor pool and whirlpool, fitness center, 24-hour shop, and free WiFi.

name: Tru by Hilton Katy Houston West
description: With quick access to the interstate, our new Tru is ideally located for your next visit to Katy, Texas. We're within three miles of Katy Mills mall, Typhoon Texas Waterpark, and Legacy Stadium. Play a game of pool in our vibrant lobby or take advantage of the fitness center. Free breakfast and WiFi are always included.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Houston-Katy
description: We're next to I-10, making the 25-mile trip into downtown Houston easy. Visit the aquarium and the Houston Zoo, or see the Texans play at NRG Stadium, 30 miles away. Stay local and discover great shopping at the Katy Mills Mall just five miles west. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our outdoor pool.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Houston/Katy
description: We’re off I-10, within 10 minutes of the Houston Energy Corridor and corporations such Newpark Drilling Fluids and GEICO. Andretti Indoor Karting and Games and the Great Southwest Equestrian Center are within four miles, and we’re 10 minutes from shopping and dining at Katy Mills. Enjoy daily hot breakfast, WiFi, and parking on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Houston I-10 West Park Row
description: We’re off I-10, walking distance from Texas Children’s and Houston Methodist hospitals and less than a mile from the NACE training facility. Hop on our free shuttle to Energy Corridor businesses. Downtown Houston is just 25 minutes away and we’re under two miles from AECOM and Murchison Drilling School. Enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi on us.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Houston West - Katy
description: We’re off I-10 in Houston's Energy Corridor and our free shuttle covers a five-mile area. Downtown Katy, home to Katy Mills Mall and Typhoon Texas Waterpark, is 15 minutes away. We’re 20 miles from Minute Maid Park, the Houston Astros’ home stadium. Enjoy free hot breakfast, our indoor pool, 24-hour fitness center, and evening reception.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Houston West-Energy Corridor
description: Find us in the Energy Corridor district, half an hour from central Houston. Offices for BP Credit Union, Exxon and ConocoPhillips World HQ are in the neighborhood. After work, swing by Pine Forest Country Club, explore Bear Creek Pioneers Park, or join us for complimentary evening socials, Monday – Thursday. WiFi and breakfast are on us. Get creative in your in-suite kitchen.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Houston/Sugar Land
description: Off Highway 6, we're a mile and a half from Fort Bend Children’s Discovery Center, Houston Museum of Natural Science at Sugar Land, and baseball games at Constellation Field. Downtown Houston is 23 miles away along I-69. Our Great American Grill restaurant serves daily meals and the Pavilion Pantry is open 24 hours for drinks and snacks.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites San Antonio Northwest/Medical Center
description: Leisure, close: we’re just a short drive from SeaWorld and Six Flags Fiesta Texas, with shopping and dining at La Cantera and the Rim nearby. Business, done: United Services Automobile Association is a few blocks away. Study, easy: we’re three miles from San Antonio Medical Center, numerous hospitals and University of Texas. WiFi and breakfast: free.

name: Hampton Inn Kilgore
description: We're two minutes off I-20, just 10 miles west of Longview. Kilgore College, home of the monthlong Texas Shakespeare Festival in July, is within easy reach. Take a dip in our outdoor pool and work out in the fitness center. Hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Longview
description: Find us less than a mile from downtown Longview. Free breakfast is fuel for exploring the Paul Boorman Trail Park, just five minutes from the door. We're near Komatsu Mining Corp, Eastman Longview, and LeTourneau University. Stop by our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday. Try some city dining, or have a quiet night with your in-suite kitchen. WiFi’s on us.

name: Tru by Hilton Longview
description: Find us right off Highway 259, close to Loop 281. Each day starts with build-your-own favorites in our Top It breakfast bar, and there are plenty of restaurants nearby. LeTourneau University and Longview World of Wonders are 15 minutes away. Our lobby has a foosball table, comfy seating, and lots of space to gather and recharge – and WiFi is free.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Longview North
description: Huddled in the ‘hub of Texas Lake Country’, we’re close to Lakes Palestine, Caddo, Murvall and Lake O’ The Pines, and there’s ample hiking at Cargill Long Park. Take advantage of free WiFi during your downtime and enjoy daily hot breakfast on us. With Longview Arts Center, R.G. Letourneau, Texas Country Music Hall of Fame and more, we ought to be the ‘museum hub’, too.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Longview
description: Near Highway 259, our hotel is 10 minutes from the downtown area. Longview Towne Crossing and Longview Mall shopping and dining are less than two miles away, and we're in five miles of Paul Boorman Trail Park and Longview Museum of Fine Arts. Enjoy our heated indoor pool and lazy river, fitness center, and outdoor patio and fire pit.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Tyler
description: On the edge of Tyler’s medical district, we're five minutes from UT Health Tyler other healthcare facilities. Tyler's famous Rose Garden, the Azalea Trail, and Goodman-LeGrand Museum are all within a 15-minute drive. Make the most of your in-suite kitchen, or grill a feast outside. WiFi is free, as is our hot breakfast.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Tyler
description: We're next to US-69, less than 10 minutes from shopping at Broadway Square Mall and The Village at Cumberland Park. Tyler Junior College and the city's medical district are six miles away. Head 20 minutes to The Discovery Science Place and the Goodman-LeGrand House & Museum downtown. Enjoy our indoor pool, whirlpool, and Great American Grill.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Tyler-South
description: Find us off Highway 69, moments from dining and shopping in The Village at Cumberland Park. A 16-minute drive will take you to The Children’s Park of Tyler or Kiepersol Estate's vineyards, winery and distillery. Stay active in our fitness center and relax in our whirlpool. Every stay includes free WiFi and free hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn Temple
description: We're at the junction of I-35 and US Highway 90, three miles from Temple College, and 10 minutes from Bell County Expo Center. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast before taking the nine mile trip to Belton Lakeview Park for hiking, boating, and fishing. Shop and eat at Temple Mall, eight minutes away. WiFi is on us.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Waco, Texas
description: We're just off I-35, a few minutes from a variety of dining options and Hillcrest Baptist Hospital. Bears events at Baylor University, the Magnolia Market Silos, the Dr Pepper Museum, and the Texas Ranger Hall of Fame & Museum are all six miles north. Enjoy free hot breakfast each morning, and relax at our complimentary evening social Monday – Thursday.

name: Tru by Hilton Waco South
description: We are near I-35 and mere steps away from the Texas Central Market Place. The Baylor Scott & White Medical Center is about two miles away. Baylor University and the Texas Ranger Hall of Fame & Museum is only about a 10-minute drive away. We provide our guests with a 2800 sq. ft. game area with billiards.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites San Marcos
description: Off I-35, we’re five minutes from Texas State University, home to Strahan Arena events and football at Bobcat Stadium. We’re just as close to central San Marcos’ riverside parks, boasting water sports and scenic strolls. Half an hour’s drive brings you to Austin, while San Marcos Regional Airport is 10 minutes away. Free WiFi and hot breakfast are yours.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton San Marcos
description: We're off the I-35, five miles from Texas State University. Whether you're here for a campus visit or a game at Bobcat Stadium, our suites offer a cozy base to relax with free WiFi, a fully equipped kitchen, and plenty of space to recharge. 15 minutes away, tour Spring Lake in a glass-bottom boat or hike along the natural area's 251 acres of trails.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Laredo
description: We're just off I-35, opposite Mall del Norte and 10 minutes from downtown Laredo and the Mexican border. Laredo International Airport is less than five miles away. Relax in our atrium during the complimentary evening reception, and enjoy our indoor pool. A free cooked-to-order breakfast is served daily.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Laredo at Mall del Norte
description: We’re half a mile from I-35, 15 minutes from downtown Laredo. Grab free breakfast before teeing off at Casa Blanca Golf Course or taking the kids to TAMIU Planetarium, both 15 minutes away. Discover shops and dining at Mall del Norte, across the street, or try some in-suite cooking. Join us for complimentary evening socials, Monday – Thursday, and enjoy free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Laredo
description: We’re off I-35, next to North Creek Plaza shopping mall. Bank of America, Union Pacific Railroad, and other major businesses are within 10 minutes, and we’re under five miles from the Uni-Trade Stadium and Sames Auto Arena. Lake Casablanca is 20 minutes away. Enjoy daily hot breakfast, WiFi, and parking on us. We have an outdoor pool and fitness center.

name: Tru by Hilton Laredo Airport
description: We’re off Bob Bullock Loop, two miles from the Airport. Hop on the shuttle, the ride is free. Keeping the family entertained is a walk to Regal Movie Theater and Unitrade Baseball Stadium. Texas A&M University is a five-minute drive. Recharge at our lobby – with WiFi, board games, hot coffee and tea.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Laredo Airport
description: Just off Bob Bullock Loop, we are located less than two miles from the Airport and Texas A&M International University. The Sames Auto Arena, Regal Movie Theater, and Unitrade Baseball Stadium are all within walking distance. Take advantage of the free airport shuttle. Breakfast is on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn San Antonio-Live Oak Conference Center
description: Find us off I-35, five miles from Randolph Air Force Base. Our hotel is surrounded by restaurants within walking distance, and the Garden Grille serves cooked-to-order breakfast, lunch, and dinner daily. We're within six miles of Amazon, Rackspace, and other corporate offices, and San Antonio is a half-hour drive away.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Selma-San Antonio-Randolph AFB Texas
description: We're just off I-35, five miles from Randolph Air Force Base and just across the street from The Forum at Olympia Parkway, one of the biggest shopping centers in Texas. Fuel up on our free hot breakfast, then head to SeaWorld® San Antonio, 31 minutes' drive away, or tour The Alamo, 16 miles from us. Unwind in our pool, and enjoy free WiFi and parking.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites San Antonio/Northeast I-35
description: We're just off I-35, seven miles from San Antonio International Airport and four miles from the AT&T Center, home of the San Antonio Spurs. Explore historic Spanish fortress The Alamo, just 11 minutes away – and when you're ready to relax, head home to our pool and fitness center. Enjoy daily hot breakfast, WiFi and parking on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Schertz
description: We're right off I-35, just 20 minutes from Randolph Air Force Base. You’ll be 25 minutes from central San Antonio and 15 minutes from New Braunfels Historic District. For a little Texas outdoors, try Canyon Lake, 40 minutes away, passing by the iconic Natural Bridge Caverns on the way. Wake up to free hot breakfast, and enjoy WiFi on us.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton San Antonio Airport
description: Everything’s easy here: easy access to downtown San Antonio’s historic Alamo and Riverwalk, and easy-going days with the family at Sea World, San Antonio Zoo, and Six Flags Fiesta Texas (discount tickets available). It gets better – WiFi is free, just like our breakfast and Monday – Thursday evening socials. Don’t worry, our free shuttle will get you to/from the airport.

name: Hilton Garden Inn San Antonio Airport South
description: Find us off I-40, two miles from San Antonio International Airport via free shuttle. We're five minutes from North Star Mall and 10 miles from downtown San Antonio, providing access to the Alamo and San Antonio River Walk. Lackland Air Force Base and BMT campus are a half-hour drive away. Enjoy our indoor pool and fitness center.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton San Antonio Airport
description: Our suites are half a mile from San Antonio Airport. We offer a free shuttle to and from SAN and other destinations within three miles of our hotel. The Alamo, downtown, and the River Walk are a 15-minute drive away. Enjoy our fitness center and indoor pool, and join us for free made-to-order breakfast and our complimentary evening reception.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites San Antonio-Airport
description: We’re just a short drive from the Alamo, San Fernando Cathedral, and La Villita, with King William Historic District and Spanish Governor’s Palace close by. Check out the River Walk, Alamodome, the UTSA Institute of Texan Cultures, or enjoy family days at SeaWorld, San Antonio Zoo, and Six Flags. WiFi and breakfast are free. Phew.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton San Antonio Airport, TX
description: Located just off I-410, we’re less than two miles from San Antonio International Airport – easily reached via our free shuttle. Downtown San Antonio is less than 15 minutes away, and attractions including Six Flags Fiesta Texas and San Antonio Zoo are within easy reach. Fill up on a free hot breakfast each day, or prepare meals in your in-suite kitchen. The WiFi’s on us and pets are welcome.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel San Antonio Airport
description: Our hotel is five minutes from San Antonio International Airport, with a free shuttle both ways. We're half a mile from North Star Mall, and getting around is easy from our location off Interstate 410. Downtown and the River Walk are 15 minutes away. Spanish-inspired rooms overlook our courtyard pool, and every stay starts with a warm chocolate chip cookie.

name: Hampton Inn Livingston
description: Kick back in a room five minutes from downtown Livingston. We're just off Highway 59, with great links to city dining and historic attractions like Polk County Memorial Museum. Fill up on free hot breakfast before exploring Lake Livingston State Park, 10 minutes away, or tee off at Livingston Municipal Golf Course, two miles from our door. WiFi's on us.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Lubbock University Area
description: We're a block south of US-82, walking distance from the Buddy Holly Performing Arts Center. We're within three miles of the UMC Health System Hospital and Red Raider games and events at Texas Tech University. Work out in our free fitness center and cool off in the indoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn Lubbock
description: Staying with us means having a wealth of award-winning vineyards at your door, best experienced as part of a wine tour - the West Texas Walk of Fame lets you walk it off, beginning at the famous Buddy Holly statue. Enjoy free, hot breakfast, WiFi and an indoor pool while you’re under our roof. South Plains Mall and Mackenzie Park, home of Joyland Amusement Park, are nearby.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Lubbock
description: We're in Lubbock, surrounded by restaurants, shops, and entertainment options, 10 minutes from Texas Tech University, and within easy reach of several of the city’s medical centers. We have an indoor pool and fitness center, and host a complimentary evening reception in our atrium. A free cooked-to-order breakfast is served daily.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Lubbock
description: Welcome to the birthplace of a rock’n’roll legend. We’re a 10-minute drive from central Lubbock – head there for the Buddy Holly Center, Joyland Amusement Park, and a vibrant art scene anchored by Texas Tech University. Enjoy free breakfast and use the (equally free) WiFi to plan a trip to the area’s burgeoning local wineries.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Lubbock Southwest
description: We're right off US-289 close to US-62, with easy access to Red Raider games and events at Texas Tech University, five miles away. Discover the story of Lubbock's most famous son at the Buddy Holly Center, 12 minutes up the road. It's 14 miles to Lubbock Preston Smith International Airport (LBB). Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our indoor pool.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Lubbock
description: Central and convenient, our suites are a few minutes from Texas Tech University, the National Ranching Heritage Center, and a host of local attractions. Make a splash with the family at nearby Lubbock Water Rampage. Breakfast and WiFi are both on us, and pets are welcome.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Lubbock
description: Find us next to Highway 62, walking distance from Canyon West Shopping Center and Main Event entertainment complex. We're four miles from Texas Tech University campus and within eight miles of downtown Lubbock, the Buddy Holly Center, and Science Spectrum Museum. We have an indoor pool, fitness center, and 4,000 sq. ft. of event space.

name: Tru by Hilton Lubbock Southwest
description: We’re just off Highway 62, 10 minutes from Texas Tech University and 20 minutes from the airport. Fill up on daily free hot breakfast before visiting Joyland Amusement Park, nine miles away. The Llano Estacado Winery is less than 20 minutes from our door. Take advantage of our 24/7 market for gourmet snacks, drinks and sundries. WiFi is free.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Lufkin
description: 10 minutes from Angelina County Airport, we're just off Highway 59. You’ll be less than a mile from Angelina College – and 10 minutes from downtown Lufkin and the George H. Henderson Expo Center. Brush up on natural history, Texas style, at Naranjo Museum, five minutes away. Start each day with free hot breakfast, and enjoy WiFi on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Nacogdoches
description: Located off Highway 59, we're just a three-mile drive from the galleries, shops, and restaurants of historic downtown. Explore the reconstructed 19th century log cabins and Victorian homes of Millard’s Crossing Historic Village, only 10 miles away. Return home for a deserved soak in our outdoor pool. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Center
description: We’re just off Highway 96, in Texas’ Piney Woods area. You’ll be 10 minutes from the historic downtown area of Center, home to Shelby County Museum and Courthouse, and shows at Rio Theatre. Explore neighborhood dining and shopping, just steps from your room. Start each day with free hot breakfast. Enjoy WiFi on us, and remember pets are welcome.

name: Hampton Inn Midland South
description: We're located off I-20 and State Highway 349 within two miles of the Walmart Supercenter and Midland County Courthouse. Visit the nearby Permian Basin Petroleum Museum. The Midland County Horseshoe Arena Fairground is within two miles. Our meeting room holds up to 30 people.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Midland East
description: Located off Loop 250, our all-suite hotel is less than three miles from Midland Airpark, Midland College, and downtown. We’re within two miles of several sport complexes, parks, and oil and natural gas company offices. Downtown Odessa is about 30 minutes away. Our spacious suites are perfect for work trips and family vacations; you can bring your pet, too!

name: Hilton Garden Inn Midland
description: Our hotel is right off Loop 250, less than a mile from Chevron, EOG Resources, and Occidental Petroleum. Midland Airport and downtown Midland's museums and dining are within a 15-minute drive. We have 4,500 sq. ft. of meeting space, an outdoor pool, and fitness center. Breakfast and dinner are available in the Garden Grille & Bar. WiFi's on us.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton® Midland, TX
description: At the center of the Permian Basin, we're between the Dallas/Fort Worth Metroplex and El Paso. Our suites are minutes from Midland International Airport and close to TX-191, the TX-250 loop, and I-20. Chevron, Weatherford International, and other oil and gas corporations are minutes away. During your stay, enjoy free breakfast and our Monday – Thursday evening social.

name: Tru by Hilton Midland
description: At the junction of Loop 250, SH-191, and SH-158, we are adjacent to Sharbauer Sports Complex. Midland International Airport is nine miles away, and downtown Midland is six miles away. We’re convenient to several corporate offices, including Chevron Midcontinent Headquarters and Oxy Permian. Our efficient rooms feature free WiFi and a large HDTV with premium channels.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Midland
description: We’re off US-250, less than a mile from Chevron Campus, Oxy Permian, and other corporate offices. Schlumberger is a 10-minute drive and we’re six miles from Midland.  The George Bush Childhood Home Museum and the Wagner Noel Performing Art Center are within six miles. Enjoy your in-suite kitchen and WiFi on us. Pet’s are welcome.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Odessa
description: Just off TX-191, our hotel is within a mile of several restaurants and a brewery. The University of Texas of the Permian Basin is five minutes from our door, while downtown Odessa and Midland International Airport are 15 minutes away. Our spacious suites let you spread out while working or relaxing with the family, including your pets.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Odessa
description: Find us just off Highway 191, located 2.5 miles from the University of Texas Permian Basin campus (boasting Stonehenge Odessa). Dollar Family Distribution Office, Kinder Morgan and Salisbury Industry are all under 5 miles away, and art lovers will be 10 minutes from Ellen Noel Art Museum. WiFi, breakfast, and our evening social, Monday – Thursday are free.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Odessa
description: We're within five minutes of the University of Texas of the Permian Basin campus and Stonehenge Replica, Ellen Noel Art Museum, and Music City Mall. Downtown Odessa is six miles from our door, and we're 13 miles from Midland International Air & Space Port. Enjoy access to our outdoor pool, whirlpool, and fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn Odessa
description: We're right across the street from The University of Texas of the Permian Basin. Find shopping and dining options and take a spin around the ice rink a half-mile away at Music City Mall. Midland International Airport is just 10 miles east. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Missouri City, TX
description: We're minutes from the business and industrial parks of Missouri City, home to corporations like FedEx, UPS, and Twinstar Bakery. It's only three miles to I-69, giving you easy access to First Colony Mall, the youth sports complex next door, and Houston Methodist Sugar Land Hospital. Free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our outdoor pool are included.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Houston Stafford Sugar Land
description: We're 30 minutes from downtown Houston, walking distance from shopping, restaurants, and the cinema.  It’s less than a 15 minute drive to the Houston Funplex, Cullinan Park, and the Houston Museum of Natural Science. The NASA Space Center is 40 minutes away. Your stay includes a spacious suite with fully equipped kitchen, free hot breakfast, WiFi, and an evening social (Mon-Thurs).

name: Hampton Inn Houston/Stafford
description: History is our present: George Ranch Historical Park and Sugar Land Museum are minutes away, with Rosenberg Railroad and Fort Bend Museums nearby. Wake up to free breakfast and WiFi before exploring 5,000 acres of hiking, biking and fishing at Brazos Bend State Park. NASA Space Center is in driving distance, or stop by a golf course for a different kind of drive.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Houston Stafford
description: About 12 miles from the heart of the city, we're planted near the area's most popular green spaces. Fill up on our free breakfast and explore the picturesque Cullinan Park. Save the wallet for the Galleria, minutes from our doorstep. While you're here, enjoy our free WiFi and fitness center.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Houston-Pearland
description: We’re off Route 288, near Shadow Creek Ranch, and three miles from Pearland Town Center. Centennial Park, Sri Meenakshi Devasthanam, and William P. Hobby Airport can be reached in about 20 minutes, and downtown Houston is only 17 miles away. Perks include our restaurant, indoor saltwater pool, lounge, and evening room service.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Houston Westbelt
description: Set in the heart of Chinatown, we're mere minutes from Hong Kong City Mall and three miles from the Westchase District. Memorial City Mall and The Galleria Mall are both within 15 minutes. William P. Hobby Airport and George Bush Intercontinental can be reached in 35 minutes. Our restaurant serves breakfast and dinner, and we're surrounded by dining options.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Houston-Westchase
description: We're just off the Sam Houston Tollway close to Chinatown, three miles from Houston Baptist University and the Arena Theater. See the Texans play at NRG Stadium or head downtown to the Toyota Center, both about 14 miles away. Enjoy free daily hot breakfast and free WiFi. Cool off in our outdoor pool.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Houston Pearland
description: We're off the South Freeway at TX-8, three miles from Pearland Town Center, Merit Medical Manufacturing, and Cook Compression. EthosEnergy, Ref-Chem, and GHX Industrial can be reached in five minutes, and the Houston Museum District is only 11 miles from our door. Enjoy our outdoor saltwater pool, in-suite kitchen, free breakfast, and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Monahans
description: We're off I-20, six miles from Sandhills State Park. Roy Hurd Memorial Airport-E01 is about two miles from our hotel. Diverse eateries, ranging from local to fast-food chains, are within a mile. Experience part of the oil boom history of Texas at Million Barrel Museum. Our hotel features an outdoor pool with lounge area.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Mount Pleasant
description: We're right off I-30, just five minutes from downtown Mount Pleasant. Boat and fish at Lake Bob Sandlin and Lake Monticello, less than nine miles away, or explore the scenery as you hike through nearby Dellwood Park. Your stay includes daily free hot breakfast, WiFi, and use of our indoor pool and fitness center.

name: Hilton Garden Inn New Braunfels
description: Off I-35, we’re 10 minutes from Schlitterbahn Waterpark, Gruene Hall, and San Marcos Premium Outlets Mall. Go tubing down the Comal or Guadalupe rivers, with plenty of rental stores within 20 minutes. We’re 35 minutes from San Antonio and 45 minutes from Austin. Perks include an outdoor pool, restaurant, 24-hour shop, and fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites New Braunfels
description: Just off I-35, we are within 10 minutes of Comal River, Schlitterbahn Waterpark New Braunfels, and the Walmart Distribution Center. Visit Gruene Historic District, just three miles away. A 15-minute drive will take you to retail therapy at Tanger Outlets San Marcos and San Marcos Premium Outlets. Enjoy our free hot breakfast and free WiFi.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton New Braunfels
description: We’re near I-35 and 10 minutes from New Braunfels Regional Airport. You’ll be 10 minutes from the Comal and Guadalupe Rivers. Free breakfast is fuel for family days at Schlitterbahn Waterpark, five miles away. Enjoy easy access to San Antonio, Gruene, and San Marcos. WiFi and our evening social, Monday – Thursday, are on us. For a cozy night, try your in-suite kitchen.

name: Hampton Inn Seguin
description: We’re right off I-10, about 30 minutes outside San Antonio. Fuel up on our free hot breakfast before heading to SeaWorld or The Alamo, both are within 50 miles of the hotel. Take in some local history at the Las Nogales Historical Museum, just 3.5 miles away. Take a 10-minute drive and relax at Lake Placid and The Guadalupe River.

name: Hampton Inn Ozona
description: Our hotel is right off I-10, a three-minute drive from the Crockett County Museum and Ozona Town Square. Fuel up on our free hot breakfast before you explore our historic West Texas town. Cool off in our outdoor pool and work out in our fitness center. WiFi is free.

name: Hampton Inn Paris
description: Right off Loop 286, we’re only three miles away from historic downtown Paris. Explore our roots at the Sam Bell Maxey State Historical Structure, only a 10-minute drive away. No trip to Paris is complete without the Eiffel Tower – the Texas version is only three miles away. Breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Houston Hobby Airport
description: Located off I-45, we're one mile from William P. Hobby Airport, with a free airport shuttle to get you there. Enjoy our convenient location, minutes from Downtown Houston and the Houston Livestock Show & Rodeo. Make the most of your stay with our fitness center, outdoor pool, and whirlpool.  WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Houston Hobby Airport
description: Our rooms are five minutes from William P. Hobby Airport via free 24-hour shuttle – also covering a three-mile radius on demand. We're within two miles of many local corporate offices and easy dining, with downtown Houston 11 miles northwest along I-45. We have event space for up to 440 guests, a 24-hour fitness center, and outdoor pool.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Houston Hobby Airport
description: Our hotel is less than a mile from William P. Hobby Airport via free shuttle, also covering a three-mile radius. We're within five minutes of local dining and shopping, with downtown Houston 10 miles away via I-45. Enjoy our fitness center, outdoor pool, event space for up to 500 people, and a warm DoubleTree cookie on arrival.

name: Hampton Inn Houston-Pearland
description: Our hotel is south of Houston, minutes from Highway 35 and Beltway 8. We're 10 miles from William P. Hobby Airport, with Downtown Houston attractions and Space Center Houston just a half-hour from our door. Enjoy free WiFi, our outdoor pool, and daily free hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn Pecos
description: We’re right off I-20, just over a mile away from the Pecos Municipal Airport. Saddle up to some free breakfast before you explore the West of the Pecos Museum, only a 10-minute drive away. Check out an 18th-century saloon or the West of the Pecos Rodeo. Enjoy free WiFi and work out in our fitness center.
streetAddress: 215 South Frontage Road I-20 West Exit 39

name: Hampton Inn Pleasanton
description: Our rooms are less than five minutes from Pleasanton Municipal Airport, and just 10 minutes from the city center. While you’re there, take in some cowboy-era history at Longhorn Museum. You’ll be nestled in Pleasanton’s business district, five minutes from Coastal Bend College, with lots of restaurants within walking distance of your room. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites San Antonio Brooks City Base
description: Find us off I-37, within a mile of dining and major retailers in Brooks City Base. Take in the sights at San Antonio Missions National Historical Park, just four miles away. We're a 15-minute drive from Historic Market Square and the San Antonio River Walk. San Antonio International Airport is 19 minutes away. Start your day with our free hot breakfast. WiFi's on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites San Antonio-Downtown/Market Square
description: Market Square is moments away, and the San Antonio River Walk, the historic Alamo and Bexar County Courthouse are just blocks from us. Boeing, Accenture, Brooks City-Base and Lackland AFB are nearby. SeaWorld and Six Flags Fiesta Texas, a short drive away, are ideal for family days out. Enjoy free WiFi and breakfast.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel San Antonio Downtown
description: We're off I-10/I-35, minutes from Historic Market Square and one mile from the Riverwalk. We offer a free shuttle to downtown San Antonio attractions like Henry B. Gonzalez Convention Center, the Shops at Rivercenter, and the Alamo. The airport is 10 miles away. Enjoy our outdoor courtyard, pool, and welcome cookie on arrival.

name: Hilton Palacio del Rio
description: We’re on San Antonio’s River Walk, surrounded by shopping, dining, and nightlife. Henry B. González Convention Center is one block away and we’re a five minute walk from the Rivercenter Mall and the Alamo. Rio San Antonio cruises and shuttles board over the river from our hotel. Enjoy our rooftop pool and riverside restaurant.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton San Antonio-Riverwalk/Downtown
description: We're just steps from San Antonio's famous River Walk, a scenic waterway lined with restaurants, shops, and attractions. Henry B. Gonzalez Convention Center, Rivercenter Mall, and the Alamo are an easy 10-minute walk away. Enjoy our complimentary evening social (Monday – Thursday), free hot breakfast, and a full in-suite kitchen.

name: Canopy by Hilton San Antonio Riverwalk
description: We’re next to the San Antonio River, right on the River Walk. The Alamo, La Villita Historic Arts Village, and San Fernando Cathedral are a half-mile from our door, and the San Antonio Botanical Garden is 15 minutes away. Enjoy all-day dining and our free evening tastings at Canopy Central. WiFi’s on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites San Antonio Riverwalk
description: Our hotel is in San Antonio's historic district, right on the River Walk. The Alamo, the 18th century San Fernando Cathedral, Historic Market Square, and La Villita Historic Arts Village are within walking distance. River boat rides can also be picked up just a short walk from the hotel. We have a pool and fitness center, and the WiFi’s on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton San Antonio Riverwalk
description: In the heart of San Antonio's vibrant downtown, we're within walking distance of cultural must-sees like the Alamo, River Walk, Hemisfair Park, and Henry B. Gonzalez Convention Center. Six Flags Fiesta Texas, SeaWorld, and San Antonio Zoo are also a short drive away. Whether you’re here for one night or one month, expect pet-friendly suites with kitchens. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Tru by Hilton San Antonio Downtown Riverwalk
description: As the first historic building to be turned into a Tru property, you can’t get closer to history than staying with us. Although, you can try at the Alamo, just walking distance away, or by strolling the San Antonio River Walk. WiFi and build-your-own breakfast are free; business travelers enjoy free printing and proximity to the Henry B. Gonzales Convention Center.

name: Hilton Garden Inn San Antonio Downtown
description: Our downtown hotel is within walking distance of the Alamo, San Antonio River Walk, restaurants, and shopping. We're within a mile of the Henry B. Gonzalez Convention Center, Alamodome events, and the Historic Market Square. San Antonio International Airport is nine miles away. Enjoy our 24-hour fitness center and rooftop pool and sundeck.

name: The Emily Morgan San Antonio - a DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel
description: The Emily Morgan Hotel has towered above the historic Alamo since 1924, and today we're recognized by Historic Hotels of America. Our downtown rooms are three blocks from the restaurants and shops along the San Antonio River Walk. Enjoy a warm DoubleTree cookie at check-in and access to our 24-hour fitness center and outdoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn San Antonio-Downtown (River Walk)
description: We're right off I-37, steps from the Alamo and less than 10 minutes' walk from shops and dining on the River Walk. The Henry B. Gonzalez Convention Center and the Shops at Rivercenter are also in walking distance. It's eight miles to San Antonio International Airport. Refresh in our outdoor pool, and enjoy daily hot breakfast and WiFi on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton San Antonio Downtown - Riverwalk, TX
description: Nestled in an urban neighborhood, we're a five-minute walk from downtown San Antonio and equally close to the Alamo, San Antonio River Walk, and Henry B. Gonzalez Convention Center. Fill up on free breakfast and head out to see the city from above at Tower of the Americas, get your adrenaline hit at Six Flags Fiesta Texas, or explore San Antonio Zoo. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton San Antonio Riverwalk Downtown
description: Take in River Walk views from our downtown suites, just a 10-minute walk from San Antonio sights like the Alamo, Majestic Theatre, and the Buckhorn Saloon. The Alamodome and Tower of the Americas are a mile away. We have a fitness center and an outdoor pool. Enjoy free made-to-order breakfast and our complimentary evening reception.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites San Antonio Lackland AFB SeaWorld
description: We’re just a hop, skip and short drive away from the historic River Walk and visits to the Alamo and Tower of Americas. While you’re under our roof, WiFi and breakfast are free. Keep the kids happy at the Main Event, within walking distance, or at SeaWorld, five miles away. If you’re visiting stationed friends, we’re five miles from Lackland Air Force Base.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Lackland AFB/SeaWorld, TX
description: Downtown San Antonio is 12 miles away, and SeaWorld® just 10 minutes from the door. More family days are a short drive away at San Antonio Zoo and Six Flags® Fiesta Texas. Make the most of free WiFi and finish the day at our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday. Breakfast is on us too, or you can cook for yourself in your in-suite kitchen.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton San Antonio Lackland SeaWorld
description: Our cozy hotel is off Highway 151, a short drive from restaurants and shops. SeaWorld, NSA Texas, and Texas Biomedical Research Institute are within four miles. Lackland Air Force Base and Port San Antonio are 12 minutes away. Enjoy fitness center access, daily free hot breakfast, and our indoor pool. WiFi’s on us and pets are welcome.

name: Tru by Hilton San Antonio Lackland SeaWorld
description: Find us four miles from SeaWorld San Antonio and within a 20-minute drive of both downtown San Antonio, and Six Flags Fiesta Texas. Our lobby area includes a pool table and board games, and there’s an outdoor patio with gas grills and firepits. We have an indoor pool and fitness room, free WiFi, and a free ‘Top It’ breakfast bar.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Rockport-Fulton
description: We’re just off Highway 35, near Aransas Bay, five minutes from Aransas County Airport. Fill up on free hot breakfast before enjoying lazy days at Rockport Beach, or exploring scenic Goose Island State Park across the Bay – both 10 minutes away. It’s a short walk to central Fulton dining, shopping and historic sites. WiFi’s on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Houston - Rosenberg
description: Find us just 10 minutes from central Rosenberg, off I-69 – putting you only half an hour’s drive from Houston. Tour Rosenberg Railroad Museum or explore Seabourne Creek Nature Park. Our rooms and suites are steps from neighborhood dining, shopping, and Cinemark Theater. Start the day with free hot breakfast, and enjoy WiFi on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Rosenberg Sugar Land Area
description: Staying with us places you at Sugar Land’s heartland – minutes from Houston Zoo, First Colony Mall, and a range of restaurants and grocery stores. Stock your in-suite kitchen or start your day with more than 400 breakfast options, all complimentary. WiFi is free, as is the fitness center.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Houston Westchase
description: Business travelers and culture-seekers rejoice: we’re in close proximity to both local corporations and the Galleria Mall, Museum District, NRG stadium and downtown’s myriad attractions. Expect apartment-style suites with kitchens, and feel free to bring pets. Free breakfast and WiFi are yours for the taking.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Houston-Westchase
description: Just one block from Westheimer Avenue, getting around Houston is easy – from the famous Galleria, five miles away, to Astros games at Minute Maid Park, a 20-minute drive. Our location near Beltway 8 offers easy access to businesses in Westchase and the nearby Energy Corridor. Enjoy free hot breakfast daily and our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Houston Energy Corridor
description: We're two miles from TechnipFMC and Terry Hershey Park, and seven minutes from Memorial City Mall—hop on our free five-mile shuttle to get there and to area businesses. Visit the Alkek Velodrome or shop at Town & Country Village, both within seven miles. Typhoon Texas is 15 minutes from our door. Enjoy breakfast, dinner, and room service from our Garden Grille & Bar.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton San Antonio NW I-10
description: Our suites in San Antonio are a six-minute drive to Six Flags Fiesta Texas, and 20 minutes from SeaWorld San Antonio. The famous River Walk and historic Alamo are a 15-minute drive. We have a heated pool and fitness center and host a complimentary evening reception. A free cooked-to-order breakfast is served daily.

name: Hilton San Antonio Airport
description: We’re off I-410, a short ride from San Antonio International Airport via our free, three-mile local shuttle. San Antonio, The Alamo, and the river walk are within 10 miles. San Antonio Zoo is 13 minutes away and we’re 16 miles from SeaWorld. Enjoy our fitness center, outdoor pool, and sauna. WiFi and parking are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Snyder
description: Getting here is easy with Highways 180 and 208 nearby, and Winston Field Airport 10 minutes away. It’s a 10-minute drive to Western Texas College campus, where you can also tee off at Sammy Baugh Golf Course. You’ll be five minutes from central Snyder business, such as GE Oil & Gas and Reef Services Llc, and a number of historical sites. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hilton Houston Westchase
description: Our hotel is off the Sam Houston Tollway in the Westchase business district. Enjoy panoramic Houston views through floor-to ceiling windows, and relax by our tree-lined outdoor pool. We're within 15 minutes of the Energy Corridor and The Galleria, and downtown Houston is 14 miles away. Try a taste of Texas at our award-winning Rio Ranch restaurant.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Waco-South
description: You'll find us off I-35, a short walk from shopping and dining at Central Texas Marketplace. Baylor University, Texas Sports Hall of Fame, and Magnolia Market Silos are all five miles from our door. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, free WiFi and parking, and our indoor pool and fitness center.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Waco
description: Stay just six minutes from Magnolia Market Silos and Baylor University, with Texan culture a short walk away at Mayborn Museum Complex. Start each day with free hot breakfast – perfect fuel for hiking the nearby Mouth of Bosque's riverside trails. Or cook your own in your in-suite kitchen. WiFi is free and your pets are welcome.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Texarkana
description: Located off I-30, we're less than a half mile from shopping and dining at Central Mall. Downtown galleries, bars, and businesses are less than 10 minutes away. While you’re with us, take in a show at the Perot Theater, or tour the nearby Ace of Clubs House, both less than 10 minutes away. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Texarkana
description: We’re off I-30, connected to Texarkana Convention Center, and across from Central Mall. The State Line Post Office and Federal Building, Perot Theatre, and Ace of Clubs House are four miles away, and Texarkana Regional Airport can be reached in 10 minutes. Enjoy our restaurant, evening room service, and 24-hour convenience shop.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Plano Legacy West
description: Located off highway 121, we’re five minutes from Legacy West and our free shuttle will take you within three miles. The Shops at Willowbend, Crayola Experience, and Kidzania are 10 minutes away, and corporate headquarters are within five miles. The Comercia Center is 10 minutes from our door. Enjoy your in-suite kitchen, daily hot breakfast, and WiFi on us.

name: Hampton Inn Uvalde
description: With so much to see and do in picturesque Uvalde County, our location five minutes from the city center is ideal for exploring downtown or day tripping to Fort Inge. Recharge your batteries and take advantage of free WiFi in your spacious guest room. After a good night’s sleep, start the day with a free hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn Van Horn
description: Find us between El Paso and Midland, off I-10. Learn about Van Horn history by visiting Clark Hotel Museum, or tour of Red Rock Ranch, just two miles away. Pack the clubs - great golf is just four minutes away at Mountain View Golf Course. Our hotel welcomes your furry friends. Relax in our indoor pool and hot tub. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Vernon
description: We’re right off Highways 287 and 70, minutes away from the Oklahoma border. Enjoy our free hot breakfast before checking out the Red River Valley Museum– it's just a nine-minute walk. Fishing, golf, and horseback riding are 40 miles away at Copper Breaks State Park. WiFi is free, and our business center is available 24 hours a day.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Victoria
description: We're off Route 463, five minutes from Victoria Mall and the Children’s Discovery Museum, and 10 minutes from the University of Houston, Victoria. The Texas Zoo and Nave Museum are just five miles away. Our restaurant serves breakfast and dinner, and our indoor/outdoor pool has a swim-up bar. Enjoy our fitness center and 24-hour convenience shop.

name: Hampton Inn Victoria
description: Wake up just 10 minutes from central Victoria, where you'll find The Texas Zoo, Riverside Golf Course, and miles of scenic trails at Athey Nature Area. Equally nearby are Spring Creek Place Event Center and a Cinemark movie theater. Business guests, we're close to Patterson-UTI, Baker Hughes, and Caterpillar. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Victoria, TX
description: We're minutes from the Texas Zoo, Riverside  Golf Course, and Children’s Discovery Museum. Across the street, you’ll find the Victoria Mall. Phew. Remember to grab free breakfast before exploring. If you feel like a night in, stop by our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday, or do a little home-cooking in your in-suite kitchen. WiFi’s on us.

name: Hilton Waco
description: Find our hotel in downtown Waco, within five minutes of Waco River Park and the Suspension Bridge. Magnolia Market, Baylor University, Dr Pepper Museum, and Waco Convention Center are within a mile of our door. Cameron Park Zoo is less than two miles away. We have a free local shuttle, an outdoor pool, and a fitness center. Enjoy WiFi and parking on us.

name: Hampton Inn Waco
description: You'll find us right off I-35, four miles from Baylor University and McLane Stadium, home of the Baylor Bears.
