Magnolia Market and the Cameron Park Zoo are less than 10 minutes from our door. Downtown is five miles away. Daily hot breakfast, access to our fitness center and outdoor pool, and WiFi are on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Wichita Falls
description: We're along Sikes Lake – bring your pet and enjoy the waterfront trail just outside our door. Sikes Senter mall shops and dining are a 10-minute walk, as is Midwestern State University. Join us for free breakfast and treat cravings in your in-suite kitchen. We have an outdoor saline pool, and a combined fitness/laundry area keeps you on your routine.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Wichita Falls
description: Wake up to Sikes Lake, a beautiful one-mile stroll right on your doorstep. Catch a show at Backdoor Theatre and Wichita Theatre, five miles away, or walk out to Wichita Falls Museum of Art, by the lakeside. Free WiFi and breakfast are yours while you’re here, as is an in-suite kitchen. Unwind after a long day at our free evening social, Monday – Wednesday.

name: Hampton Inn Wichita Falls-Sikes Senter Mall
description: Nature and history are our specialty; Lake Arrowhead State Park is nearby – over 500 acres of fishing, swimming and water skiing. Kell House, Wichita Falls Fire & Police Museum and the Heritage Center are just a short drive away. With free WiFi and hot breakfast, save the wallet for Sikes Senter Mall, walking distance from us, or Castaway Cove Waterpark – ideal for kids.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Dallas The Colony
description: None

name: Hampton Inn Brigham City
description: We're in the heart of the city, just minutes from the iconic Box Elder Tabernacle and Brigham City Utah Temple. Find local eateries up and down Main Street, and Crystal Hot Springs Waterpark just 11 miles north. Drive to Ogden in 30 minutes and Salt Lake City in an hour. Enjoy free hot breakfast daily and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Tremonton
description: Find us at the junction of I-15 and I-84, minutes from downtown Tremonton. Relax in the soothing waters of Crystal Hot Springs, 11 miles away, or head 20 minutes south to Willard Bay State Park for boating, swimming, and fishing. Enjoy daily hot breakfast and free WiFi during your stay.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Logan
description: Our central Logan hotel sits in the theater district, home to Ellen Eccles, Caine Lyric, and Utah Theatres. You'll be five minutes from Utah State University, where you can explore the Nora Eccles Harrison Museum of Art, and scenic Logan Canyon is just as close. City dining and shopping are steps away. Enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi on us.

name: Tru by Hilton Ogden
description: A few steps from Historic 25th Street eateries and attractions, our hotel is situated in downtown Ogden near Union Station and Lindquist Field. The airport and Weber State University are less than five miles away. Hit the trails with your choice of plenty of trailheads within 10 minutes or drive up Mt. Ogden for skiing and more.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Ogden
description: We're connected to the Eccles Conference Center in the heart of downtown Ogden. Within a few blocks you'll find entertainment at The Junction, Peery's Egyptian Theater, and Ogden Amphitheater. Over a dozen unique local restaurants are nearby, while MarketStar Corporation and the FBI are a quick walk away. Start each morning with free hot breakfast. WiFi is on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Ogden
description: Our hotel is located the heart of downtown Ogden, just a few steps away from Historic 25th Street restaurants, entertainment, and Union Station. We are less than five miles from Ogden-Hinckley Airport and Weber State University Ogden. There are several trailheads within 10 minutes, and we’re about an hour from ski slopes on Mt. Ogden.

name: Tru by Hilton Clearfield Hill Air Force Base
description: We're off I-15 near Hill Air Force Base. Weber State University Davis is about three miles away. Practice your swing at Hubbard and Sun Hills golf courses, only 15 minutes from our door. SeaQuest Utah Aquarium is only a five-mile drive. We provide a build-your-own-breakfast bar every morning and 24/7 market for snacks and sundries.

name: Hampton Inn Salt Lake City/Layton
description: It's an easy walk from our front door to Davis Conference Center. Go 10 minutes north to Hill Air Force Base, or half a mile south to shop at Layton Hills Mall. Downtown Salt Lake City is half an hour away, passing by Legacy Center Indoor Arena and Lagoon Amusement Park on the way. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our outdoor pool.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Salt Lake City/Layton
description: We’re attached to the Davis Conference Center, within walking distance of more than a dozen restaurants. Our hotel is 10 minutes from Hill Air Force Base and 25 miles from Salt Lake City via I-15. Our Great American Grill serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner daily, and we have an indoor pool and whirlpool.

name: Hampton Inn Cedar City
description: Directly off I-15, we’re 10 minutes from central Cedar City, home of Southern Utah University, the Museum of Art, and the Utah Shakespeare Festival. Utah nature is 20 minutes away at Kolob Canyons, in Zion National Park. You’ll be a short walk from local dining and shopping, while Cedar City Regional Airport is 10 minutes’ drive. Enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Salt Lake City/Farmington
description: Our Farmington hotel is off I-15/Highway 89, 20 minutes from downtown Salt Lake City. You'll be within five minutes of Lagoon Amusement Park and Station Park shops, dining, and cinemas. Start your day with free hot breakfast, and enjoy WiFi on us. Legacy Parkway Trail is 10 minutes away, ideal for walking the dog.

name: Hampton Inn Salt Lake City-North
description: We're right off I-15, nine miles north of Salt Lake City where you'll find the iconic Salt Lake Temple and Utah Jazz basketball at Vivint Smart Home Arena. There's a variety of restaurants within a mile of our door and Salt Lake City International Airport is 15 minutes away via free shuttle. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our indoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn Draper Salt Lake City
description: Find us by the Route 154/I-15 intersection, 10 minutes from the center of Draper. We're 19 miles from downtown Salt Lake City, passing by Loveland Living Planet Aquarium and Cowabunga Bay Water Park on the way. Wake up to free hot breakfast, and enjoy WiFi on us. Guests have access to our outdoor patio, fire pit area, and 24-hour fitness center.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Salt Lake City Draper
description: Easy access to Salt Lake City International Airport means more time for local attractions. Kids love the Living Planet Aquarium and Cowabunga Bay Water Park. Swing by Vista Station, less than a mile away, and grab the train into downtown SLC. Enjoy an in-suite kitchen, and stop by our free evening social, Monday – Thursday. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Salt Lake City/Sandy
description: We’re just off I-15, about 20 minutes from downtown Salt Lake City and the airport, and even closer to world-class skiing and snowboarding. Rio Tinto Stadium and the Mountain America Expo Center are just two miles away. The Shops at South Town mall is opposite the hotel, with a choice of stores and restaurants. WiFi and hot breakfast are on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Salt Lake City/South Jordan, UT
description: Located in the heart of Salt Lake City, discover miles of hiking, biking, and jogging trails, or take the chance to perfect your slope skills. Relax after a busy day in a spacious suite, equipped with kitchen and free WiFi. Fill your (walking) boots with our free hot breakfast and enjoy access to our indoor pool and Spin2 Cycle facility.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Salt Lake City/Sandy
description: We're next to I-15, within walking distance of Hale Centre Theatre and corporate offices including E*Trade and Acima. The Mountain America Exposition Center and The Shops at South Town are both within a mile. Salt Lake City is 14 miles north. Breakfast and dinner are served daily in our Garden Grille & Bar. Enjoy our heated indoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn Lehi-Thanksgiving Point
description: We're just off I-15. It's a 20-minute drive to American Fork Canyon and Timpanogas Cave, and about half an hour to Sundance for skiing. We’re right by Utah Lake, and less than a mile from Thanksgiving Point's gardens, shops, and entertainment. Unwind in our large indoor pool or fitness center. WiFi and hot breakfast are on us.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Salt Lake City-Midvale/Sandy
description: We’re minutes from world-class ski resorts like Alta and Snowbird, 15 minutes from Salt Lake City, and just 10 miles from historic Temple Square. Heading to the slopes? Take the Ski Bus – it's a short walk from the front door. Whichever way you spend your day, start it with free breakfast and finish it at our evening social, Monday – Thursday.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Lehi
description: We’re in the heart of Silicon Slopes, within 5 miles of Thanksgiving Point, the Museum of Natural Curiosity, and the Utah Southern Railroad Depot and Museum. Technology and research companies are 10 minutes from our door via UT-92. We offer a complimentary shuttle service to nearby businesses, outlets at Traverse Mountain, and within a 5 mile radius.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Lehi/Thanksgiving Point
description: Avid hikers, shoppers, and snow sports lovers will be well-placed here. We’re at the heart of Lehi, Utah: home to the American Fork Canyon and Traverse Mountain Outlet Malls, and minutes from Sundance Ski Resort. Cook at leisure in your own kitchen, or try out one of the many local restaurants. Breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Tru by Hilton Salt Lake City Midvale
description: Just off I-15 in the Salt Lake City Valley, we're close to all kinds of attractions such as Topgolf, Temple Square, Olympic Park, Rio Tinto Stadium, and several ski resorts. While you're with us, enjoy free WiFi and build-your-own breakfast—take advantage of our 24/7 market for snacks, drinks, and any forgotten sundries.

name: Tru by Hilton Lehi
description: Next to Thanksgiving Point and right off I-15, our new Tru in Lehi is close to it all. The Outlets at Traverse Mountain, Seven Peak Fun Center, Cabela’s and Jordan Narrows Park are all within three miles of our hotel. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, indoor pool and a big lobby with pool table.

name: Hampton Inn Salt Lake City Cottonwood
description: You’ll find us off I-215, at the base of Little Cottonwood Canyon. We’re within half an hour of the Brighton, Solitude, Alta and Snowbird ski resorts and hiking in the Big and Little canyons. Downtown Salt Lake City and the airport are about 20 minutes away. Relax in our heated indoor pool and whirlpool. Hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Salt Lake City-West Jordan
description: Take a break from the high-energy pace of Salt Lake City and relax in the friendly suburb of West Jordan. The newly renovated Hampton Inn & Suites Salt Lake City-West Jordan is located only a few minutes from downtown Salt Lake City and within easy reach of dining, shopping, entertainment and the area's major attractions.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Salt Lake City-Downtown
description: Our pet-friendly suites are a launch pad into Vivint Smart Home Arena and Salt Palace Convention Center, both 0.5 mile away. Find Temple Square seven minutes away, and be at the slopes of The Canyons Ski Resorts or the Great Salt Lake in less than 30 minutes. Fuel your day with free hot breakfast, and join a complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Salt Lake City Airport
description: Our hotel is five minutes from Salt Lake City International Airport via free 24-hour shuttle. We're within eight miles of downtown Salt Lake City, Temple Square, and Vivint Smart Home Arena. Great Salt Lake State Park is 20 minutes from our door. We have meeting space for up to 300 guests, a heated indoor pool, and 24-hour fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Salt Lake City Airport
description: We’re just off I-80 in the Salt Lake City International Center, where you’ll find offices of many large businesses, including Wells Fargo and Netflix. It’s five minutes to Salt Lake City International Airport, and we offer a free shuttle service both ways. In 10 minutes you’re in downtown. Our meeting space can hold up to 350 guests. Hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Salt Lake City Airport
description: Our new hotel has a free 24-hour airport shuttle, call us for pickup. We are located within three miles of SLC International Airport and less than 15 minutes from downtown, Salt Palace Convention Center, and Vivint Smart Home Arena. Enjoy all-suite living, an indoor pool, and free WiFi. Daily breakfast and the evening social Monday – Thursday are on us.

name: Tru by Hilton Salt Lake City Airport
description: We’ll make things easy for you. Let’s start with a 24-hour free airport shuttle and proximity to Salt Lake City’s main attractions. While you’re here, enjoy free WiFi and build-your-own breakfast, an ideal start for a day at the Great Salt Lake, touring Red Butte Garden, visiting Antelope Island or chasing the kids around Hogle Zoo. Bring the pets, too.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Salt Lake City-Murray, UT
description: With downtown Salt Lake City just nine miles away and skiing close by, you can enjoy a balance between quiet and excitement. Check out Wheeler Historic Farm or Gardner Village shops. Catch an event at the Maverik Center or Rio Tinto Stadium. If you feel like a night in, take advantage of your in-suite kitchen. WiFi and breakfast are free. Pets are welcome.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Salt Lake City-East
description: We’re located at the mouth of Parley’s Canyon, just three exits north of Big Cottonwood Canyon, putting five of Utah's major ski resorts at your fingertips. Fill up on a daily free hot breakfast before exploring the heart of Salt Lake City, four miles away. WiFi and breakfast are on us, and you’ll have your own in-suite kitchen. Pets are welcome, too.

name: Hampton Inn Salt Lake City/Murray
description: Our Murray hotel is off I-15, near I-215. You’ll be 10 minutes from central Salt Lake City’s Vivint Smart Home Arena and Salt Palace Convention Center. It’s a 15-minute drive to the University of Utah, Utah State Capitol, and historic Temple Square – and just as quick to SLC International and South Valley Regional Airports. Enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Salt Lake City/University-Foothill Dr.
description: Off Foothill Drive, we're less than 10 minutes from the University of Utah hospital and campus. You'll be a short walk from shops and dining and 10 minutes from downtown Salt Lake City, home of the Utah State Capitol. Free hot breakfast is fuel for exploring Big Cottonwood Canyon, 15 minutes from us. Enjoy our free WiFi, fitness center, and indoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn Salt Lake City Central
description: We're five miles from downtown attractions like Clark Planetarium, Temple Square, and NBA Jazz games at the Vivint Smart Home Arena. Salt Lake City International Airport (SLC) is a six mile drive away. Walk next door to Glendale Golf Course, and relax afterwards in our indoor pool and whirlpool. Enjoy free hot breakfast and free WiFi.

name: DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel Salt Lake City Downtown
description: Explore downtown Salt Lake City from our hotel, within six blocks of Infinity Event Center and Salt Palace Convention Center. City Creek Center and Temple Square are a mile away, and we offer a free shuttle to SLC International Airport. Enjoy our indoor pool and fitness center, and a warm chocolate chip cookie when you arrive.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Salt Lake West Valley City
description: Set in the Fairbourne Station mixed development off I-215, we're a half-mile from Valley Fair Mall. West Valley Central Station is one block away, providing easy railway access to downtown Salt Lake City, and we're five minutes from Maverik Center events. Enjoy made-to-order breakfast, complimentary evening receptions, and an indoor pool.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Salt Lake City Downtown
description: Our downtown hotel is three blocks from I-15. We're 10 minutes from Salt Lake City Airport, with a free shuttle both ways. Hiking and skiing are 11 miles away at Millcreek Canyon. Our Garden Grill restaurant serves breakfast and dinner, with room service every evening. The 24-hour Pavilion Pantry offers drinks and snacks.

name: Hampton Inn Salt Lake City-Downtown
description: We're off I-15, a half-mile from Salt Palace Convention Center. You'll be a short walk from local restaurants and within a mile of Vivint Smart Home Arena basketball and Temple Square. The University of Utah and Salt Lake City International Airport are 15 minutes away. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our indoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn Kanab
description: We’re on Highway 89 in Kanab, a small town with a real Western vibe. We’re close to several natural attractions, such as the Moqui Cave, six miles away. It's easy to get to Zion National Park, thirty miles away. An hour or so and you’re at the Grand Canyon. Or relax in our indoor pool and whirlpool. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are free, and pets are welcome.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Springdale/Zion National Park
description: We're just off Route 9, less than a mile from local restaurants and cafés. The town shuttle stops right outside our door and will take you to shops, galleries, and Zion National Park Visitor Center, five minutes' drive away. Explore Utah's natural wonders, then return to relax by our outdoor pool and fireplace. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Orem
description: Find us off I-15 north of Provo, across the street from Utah Valley University and four miles from Brigham Young University. Enjoy our free hot breakfast and over 70 restaurants nearby. Explore museums and shops at Thanksgiving Point, 20 minutes' drive. In winter, head for the hills at the Sundance Ski Resort, 16 miles away. WiFi and parking are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Provo
description: We're off I-15 in the East Bay Technology Park, two miles from Brigham Young University and 10 minutes from Utah Valley University. Shop and eat at Provo Towne Centre, a short walk from us. Utah Lake State Park is six miles away for fishing, boating, and swimming. Fuel up on our free hot breakfast and enjoy free WiFi. When it's time to jet, Provo Airport is 10 minutes away.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Salt Lake City / West Valley City, UT
description: We're in the Lake Park Corporate Centre, close to a host of local companies. Relaxation is easy to find: we're surrounded by a golf course, and downtown Salt Lake City is just 15 minutes away. When you're in your suite, expect your very own kitchen, free breakfast, and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn West Valley Salt Lake City
description: Located off Route 201, we're within eight miles of Maverick Centre and Salt Lake City International Airport. Downtown Salt Lake City can be reached in 15 minutes, and Trolley Square is only 12 miles from our door. Relax in our indoor pool, and start your day with our hot breakfast – it's free, just like our WiFi.

name: Hoodoo Moab, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: Our hotel offers views of Moab’s red rocks 10 minutes from Arches National Park. We’re a block from Main Street and Canyonlands National Park is 30 miles away. Our hotel features an outdoor pool, full-service spa, and interior design that pays homage to the surrounding Western landscape.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Moab
description: Sitting snug on the outskirts of Arches National Park, we’re an ideal base from which to hike its world-class trails, take in its picture-perfect scenery – and refuel at the eateries of nearby downtown Moab. Expect free hot breakfast, WiFi and Monday – Thursday evening socials during your stay.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Spanish Fork Provo
description: Our convenient location on I-15 off Exit 257 is seven miles from Utah Lake and just an hour from Park City. You'll find a variety of shops and restaurants within a couple blocks of our hotel. Fill up on our free hot breakfast each morning. WiFi is included in your stay as well as access to our fitness center, indoor heated pool and whirlpool, and meeting space for up to 80.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Park City - The Yarrow
description: Enjoy mountain views less than a mile from the largest ski resort in the US. Our hotel is five minutes from Main Street, and the free Park City Transit System stops right outside. We have a year-round heated outdoor pool, whirlpool, and fitness center. Lift passes for Park City Mountain can be purchased in the lobby, and Deer Valley is two miles away.

name: Sunrise Lodge by Hilton Grand Vacations
description: Find our ski-in retreat nestled in the mountainside village of Canyons Resort, right next to the Sunrise Lift. As part of the Park City Mountain Resort, we offer a free shuttle to the resort’s shops, restaurants and historic district – all just five miles away. We have a heated outdoor pool and on-site ski valet where you can rent or store your gear.

name: Tru by Hilton St. George
description: Surrounded by natural beauty, historic landmarks, and a thriving arts scene, we're Tru-ly spoiled here. You can be, too, by checking out Pioneer Park, the Dixie Convention Center, Zion National Park, and Snow Canyon State Park. Catch an outdoor show at Tuacahn Center for the Arts. Better still, enjoy free WiFi, parking, and build-your-own breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn St. George
description: We're just off I-15 at the gateway to Utah's diverse natural wonders. Our hotel is an easy walk to restaurants and outlet finds at The Shoppes at Zion. Our free shuttle will take you to Saint George destinations including the Dixie Center, three miles away. Take a dip in our indoor and outdoor pools, and enjoy our free hot breakfast and WiFi.

name: Hilton Garden Inn St. George
description: We're off I-15, next to Dixie Convention Center and two miles from downtown St. George. Explore Utah's wild side – Pioneer Park, Red Hills Desert Garden, and St. George Dinosaur Discovery Site are within four miles. Zion National Park's trails are a one-hour drive away. We have a restaurant and bar, fitness center, and heated outdoor saltwater pool.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites St. George SunRiver
description: Located off I-15, we're on the route to Zion National Park, Bruce Canyon, and Lake Powell. Dixie State University, St. George Regional Airport, and Dixie Convention Center are within 15 minutes of our hotel. We've got an indoor pool and fitness center, and every stay includes free WiFi and hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn Tooele
description: We're just two miles south of Tooele Army Depot, and you can find plenty of dining and shopping options north on Main Street. Take a scenic drive toward Clipper Ridge, or drive 40-minutes northeast along the Oquirrh Mountains to reach Salt Lake City. During your stay enjoy daily free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our indoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn Bennington
description: Find a comfy room five minutes from Bennington College. Free hot breakfast is fuel for uncovering Vermont's beauty on the Molly Stark Trail, beginning 10 minutes away. We're just as close to Bennington Museum and Bennington Battle Monument, the tallest structure in the state. Enjoy free WiFi and access to our indoor pool and sauna.

name: Hampton Inn Brattleboro
description: You'll find us just off I-91, a short walk from popular stores and restaurants. Downtown Brattleboro is three miles away, where you'll find Brattleboro Museum and Art Center and the weekly farmer's market. Saxton's River Distillery is less than five minutes from our door. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, WiFi, parking, and our indoor pool.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Burlington Downtown
description: We’re a half-mile from Church Street Marketplace, Lake Champlain waterfront, South End Arts District, and the University of Vermont. There’s a comedy club next door, and Burlington International Airport is four miles away via free shuttle. Enjoy our terrace and fire pit, indoor pool, and fitness center.

name: Hilton Burlington Lake Champlain
description: Our downtown rooms are one block from Waterfront Park, where you can board a cruise and explore the idyllic waters of Lake Champlain. We're surrounded by restaurants, with Church Street Marketplace a five-minute walk away. Hop aboard one of our rental bikes and explore the Burlington Bike Path, or enjoy our onsite fitness center.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Burlington Vermont
description: Our stylish midtown hotel is within two miles of Burlington International Airport and the University of Vermont. Lake Champlain, Ben and Jerry’s Ice Cream Factory, and Church Street Marketplace are around a 10-minute drive from our door. We have a pool and offer a free local shuttle. Enjoy a warm DoubleTree cookie on arrival.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Burlington
description: Just off Interstate 89 at exit 14E, you’ll be 1.5 miles from downtown Burlington and Lake Champlain – and our free shuttle will take you there. Enjoy free breakfast and head out to shop Church Street Marketplace, visit Shelburne Museum or tour the Ben & Jerry’s factory. Join us Monday – Thursday for our complimentary evening social.

name: Hampton Inn Colchester
description: Find us just off I-89, five miles from Burlington International Airport and the University of Vermont. Saint Michael's Playhouse and University Mall are less than 10 minutes' drive away. Relax in our saltwater pool, or head to nearby North Beach Park. The Lighthouse Restaurant, for lunch and dinner, is next door. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Williston Burlington, VT
description: Find us in Tafts Corner, half a mile from Maple Tree Place shops and dining. Burlington International Airport is three miles away, and the University of Vermont and downtown Burlington are a 15-minute drive. The Shelburne Museum's charming folk art is 20 minutes from us. Bring along your pets to our all-suite hotel, and count on free WiFi and breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn St. Albans
description: We're in the center of downtown, an easy walk to shops, restaurants, and 14th Star Brewing Co. Enjoy outdoor family fun at Lake Champlain, two miles away, or tour the Ben & Jerry's Factory. We have quick access to I-89 for the half-hour drive to Burlington International Airport. Daily hot breakfast, WiFi, and garage parking are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Rutland
description: Located in the Green Mountains off Highway 7 and Highway 4, we’re across from Green Mountain Shopping Plaza, and within walking distance of eateries. Enjoy retail therapy at Diamond Run Mall or explore Chaffee Art Center – both within five minutes' drive. Norman Rockwell Museum and Aitken State Forest are 10 minutes away. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Hampton Inn White River Junction
description: Find small-town charm off I-91. We’re five minutes from downtown White River Junction, playing host to shows at Northern Stage theater and Briggs Opera House. You’ll be 10 minutes from Dartmouth College and Hood Museum of Art, just over the New Hampshire border in neighboring Hanover. Free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and an indoor pool are yours.

name: Hampton Inn Alexandria-Old Town/King St. Metro
description: Our hotel is a three-minute walk from the King St–Old Town Metro station and Alexandria Station. Close to I-495, our location offers easy access to Washington DC, nine miles away. Take the free trolley from our door to the waterfront and local attractions, like the Torpedo Factory Art Center and Friendship Firehouse. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Alexandria Old Town King St. Metro
description: Located in Old Town Alexandria, we’re two blocks from the King Street Metro with easy access to Washington, D.C. and Reagan National Airport. Take a five-minute walk to King Street to shop, ride the free King Street Trolley, and visit the George Washington Masonic National Memorial. Enjoy our rooftop terrace and all-day dining.

name: Hilton Alexandria Old Town
description: We’re located on King Street in Alexandria’s vibrant Old Town. King Street Metro Station is across the street, providing easy links to Washington D.C. and Reagan National Airport. The free King Street Trolley stops on our doorstep and we have rental bikes available to help you explore the neighborhood. Enjoy all-day dining at King Street Tavern and our in-house Starbucks.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Alexandria Old Town
description: Find us steps from bustling King Street. We're across from the King Street Metro Station, providing easy access to Downtown Washington, DC attractions. Waterfront amenities such as restaurants, bars, and water taxis are within a mile. Torpedo Factory Art Center and the George Washington Masonic Memorial are less than a 10-minute drive. Breakfast and an evening drinks reception are included in your stay.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Alexandria Old Town Area South
description: History is in our roots. We’re minutes from Mount Vernon – George Washington’s estate – Christ Church and the Old Town area. Downtown Alexandria is just over two miles away, and Washington D.C. is a short drive to the north. Catch a game at the Capital One Arena or RFK Stadium while you’re there. Closer to home, free WiFi and breakfast are yours.

name: Hilton Crystal City at Washington Reagan National Airport
description: Off Highway 1, our hotel is less than five minutes from Ronald Reagan Airport via free shuttle — also covering the local area and Crystal City Metro station. We're within walking distance of neighborhood restaurants and Crystal City shopping, and the Metro provides easy access to downtown D.C. Our 24-hour fitness center is free to enjoy.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Arlington Shirlington
description: We're 10 minutes from Ronald Reagan Airport via free shuttle. We can also take you to Pentagon City Metro station – hop on the train and be in D.C. in 20 minutes. Signature Theatre and local shopping and dining are in walking distance. Our restaurant offers breakfast, dinner, and evening room service, and our sundries store is open 24 hours.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Reagan National Airport
description: Our hotel is on Jefferson Davis Highway, five minutes from Ronald Reagan National Airport via free shuttle. We're adjacent to Crystal City Shops and a short walk from the Crystal City Metro Station, putting you 25 minutes from downtown D.C. by train. Stop by the Garden Grille & Bar for dinner, and enjoy Pavilion Pantry snacks day and night.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Reagan National Airport
description: Find us just off Highway 1. Reagan Airport is a mile away and we're five minutes' walk from the Crystal City Metro Station—our free shuttle will take you to both. Several restaurants are just down the street, and the White House and George Washington University are 10 minutes' drive from our door. Wake up to free hot breakfast, and unwind in our pool. WiFi's on us.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Crystal City National Airport
description: We're less than two miles from Reagan National Airport via our free scheduled shuttle. Fashion Centre at Pentagon City,  Crystal City Shops, and the Pentagon City Metro station are within a mile of our hotel. Enjoy made-to-order breakfast, our complimentary evening reception, and access to the fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn Alexandria/Pentagon South
description: Just off Leesburg Pike, we're 15 minutes from Alexandria Old Town Waterfront. Hop on our free shuttle to Braddock Road Metro station for trips to Washington D.C., 15 minutes away, or shopping at the Village at Shirlington. We're less than 10 minutes from Pentagon City. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our seasonal outdoor pool.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Alexandria/Pentagon South, VA
description: Just seven miles from Washington DC, we’re your launch pad into city highlights like the Pentagon, The White House, and Arlington Cemetery. Also on on our doorstep find the BRAC133 at Mark Center/ Washington Headquarter Services. Start each day with free hot breakfast, and enjoy free WiFi and Monday – Thursday evening socials.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Arlington/Courthouse Plaza
description: Less than five miles from Reagan National Airport and Washington DC’s major attractions, our hotel is a short walk to the Metro and three miles from Arlington National Cemetery. We're surrounded by restaurants and bars in downtown Arlington, and our Garden Grille & Bar serves breakfast and dinner. Free perks include WiFi and a two-mile shuttle.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Arlington Rosslyn Key Bridge
description: We're one mile from Georgetown across the Francis Scott Key Bridge, and under three miles from downtown Arlington and Washington DC's monuments. Find plenty of nearby dining and shopping in Rosslyn, or prepare meals in your suite's fully equipped kitchen. Enjoy a daily free hot breakfast and complimentary evening socials, Tuesday – Thursday.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Washington DC - Crystal City
description: We're half a mile south of The Pentagon near I-395. We offer a free shuttle to Reagan National Airport, the Fashion Centre Mall, and the Pentagon City Metro station. The metro stops near Arlington National Cemetery and major DC attractions near the National Mall. Enjoy our revolving rooftop restaurant.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Dulles North Loudoun
description: Our suites are within five miles of AOL, Cisco, Visa, and Washington Dulles International Airport, via free shuttle. Attractions such as the Steven F. Udvar-Hazy Center can be reached in 15 minutes. Enjoy our free made-to-order breakfast and complimentary evening reception.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Dulles-North/Loudoun
description: Three miles north of Washington Dulles International Airport, DC metro destinations are easy to reach from our suites. Lace up your skates at Ashburn Ice House just two minutes away, or play a round at one of the area's many golf courses. Washington DC is just 30 miles away via the Dulles Toll Road. Our hotel is pet-friendly, and WiFi is free.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Dulles North
description: Reach us off Route 267, 10 minutes from Dulles International Airport via free shuttle. We're 15 minutes from both the Steven F. Udvar-Hazy Center, part of Washington's Smithsonian National Air and Space Museum, and Dulles Expo Center. Our restaurant offers breakfast, dinner, and evening room service, and our 24-hour shop covers snacks.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Sterling - Dulles Airport
description: Washington Dulles International Airport is 10 minutes away on our hotel's free 24-hour shuttle. Our location off Interstate 28 puts Dulles Tech Corridor companies and tech parks in easy reach — and Washington, D.C. is 30 miles away. We have an indoor pool and our bistro serves food all day. Every stay starts with a warm chocolate chip cookie.

name: Hampton Inn Dulles/Cascades
description: We're just off Route 7, nine miles from Dulles International Airport, and our free shuttle will get you there. Find a great range of shopping and dining at Dulles Town Center Mall, less than 10 minutes away. Start your day with our free hot breakfast, and unwind in our pool and fitness center. WiFi and parking are on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Washington-Dulles International Airport
description: We’re just off Highway 28, near Highway 267 and four miles from Dulles International Airport. We offer a free shuttle there and back, and to local businesses. You’ll find shops at the Dulles Town Center mall, four miles away. Sample craft ales at the two breweries within a mile of our hotel. Our event space can host up to 175 guests. Hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Leesburg, VA
description: We’re five minutes from central Leesburg business and 10 minutes from Leesburg Executive Airport. Fill up on free breakfast before exploring the historic downtown area, or touring Morven Park, a 1,000-acre estate, just five miles away. Unwind with some in-suite cooking or at our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday. WiFi's on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Leesburg
description: Find us off Route 15 in Leesburg, within walking distance of a variety of restaurants. Leesburg Corner Premium Outlets is just across the road, and Leesburg Animal Park is four miles away. We're 15 miles from Dulles International Airport and 35 miles from Washington, DC. Enjoy free daily hot breakfast and WiFi, and our fitness center and pool.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Dulles Int'l Airport
description: Find us in the DC area's tech hub, five minutes from Dulles International Airport. With a 24-hour business center, meeting facilities, WiFi, and free transportation, your working needs are satisfied. Unwind with a round of golf at nearby Herndon Centennial, or head into the capital for a day of sightseeing. Enjoy free breakfast and our Monday – Thursday evening social.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Dulles Airport
description: Find us three miles from Washington Dulles International Airport via free shuttle. We’re within 15 minutes of Reston Town Center and metro links to Washington DC, 25 miles away. Our hotel has an indoor pool, fitness center, and a free shuttle to the metro. Enjoy daily cooked-to-order breakfast and our complimentary evening reception.

name: Hilton Washington Dulles Airport
description: Off Route 28, our hotel is five minutes from Dulles International Airport via free shuttle. We're two miles from Steven F. Udvar-Hazy Center and seven miles from Reston Town Center — packed with shopping, dining, and entertainment. Parking's on us, and our fitness center and indoor saltwater pool and whirlpool are free to enjoy.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Herndon-Reston
description: Located off Route 286, we're moments from Boeing and restaurants. Our free shuttle will take you within a three-mile radius and to/from Dulles Airport, 11 minutes away. Tee off at Herndon Centennial Golf Course or shop at Reston Town Center, both within seven minutes. Our fitness center will help you maintain your goals. We've got WiFi and hot breakfast covered.

name: Hampton Inn Richmond-North/Ashland
description: Reach us from I-95, less than a mile from historic Ashland and Randolph-Macon College. You'll be 10 minutes south of family fun at Kings Dominion and 25 minutes from Richmond attractions, passing by Lewis Ginter Botanical Garden along the way. The city boasts the State Capitol Building and the Virginia Museum of Fine Arts. Enjoy our free hot breakfast and WiFi.

name: Tru by Hilton Ashland
description: We are located off I-95 near the heart of Ashland outside of Richmond. Randolph-Macon College and the Ashland Train Station about a mile away from our hotel. Get your thrills at Kings Dominion Theme Park less than 10 minutes away. Meadow Event Park is nine miles away. We provide free breakfast and have a game room for you to enjoy.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Richmond/Virginia Center
description: We're just off US Highway 1, less than a mile from I-95, and I-295 and an easy walk to local restaurants. Unwind with a stroll in Lewis Ginter Botanical Garden, four miles away, or tee off at championship course The Crossings Golf Club, four minutes' drive away. Daily hot breakfast, WiFi, and parking are on us.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Richmond-West End/Innsbrook
description: We're surrounded by corporate headquarters near Richmond's West End. Whether you're here for work or fun, we offer an easy base for a comfortable stay. The University of Richmond is just five miles away, and Short Pump Town Center, less than three miles away, offers upscale shopping, dining, and entertainment.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Richmond Innsbrook
description: Find us in Innsbrook Office Park, off Highway 250 and 20 minutes from downtown Richmond via I-64. We're walking distance from local dining and business offices, with Short Pump Town Center mall less than three miles away. We have a 24-hour fitness center, heated indoor pool and whirlpool, and meeting space for up to 120 guests.

name: Hampton Inn Richmond-West
description: Find us off US 250, a quick walk to local dining and two miles from Short Pump. We're just 15 minutes from the University of Richmond, the Cultural Arts Center at Glen Allen, and Richmond Raceway. Downtown and the State Capitol are 15 miles away and the airport's a 30-minute drive. Relax in our outdoor pool, and enjoy hot breakfast and WiFi on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Richmond/Glenside
description: Find us close to I-64, 10 minutes from the University of Richmond. You'll be five minutes from local shopping, quick bites, and the Lewis Ginter Botanical Garden. We're 15 minutes from Richmond, home to the Virginia Museum of Fine Arts and the State Capitol. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, our outdoor pool, and fitness center.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Richmond
description: Our hotel is just off I-64 in northwest Richmond, close to corporate offices and three miles from the University of Richmond. The Science Museum of Virginia, Virginia Commonwealth University, and the convention center are within eight miles. Enjoy free breakfast and our nightly Evening Reception.

name: Hampton Inn Richmond-Mechanicsville
description: Located at the crossroads of US 360 and I-295 in Mechanicsville, we're eight miles from downtown Richmond. Visit the site of the Battle of Coldharbor, five miles from us, or tee off at Belmont Golf Couse or Jefferson Lakeside Country Club, both nine miles away. Daily hot breakfast, WiFi and parking are on us and pets are welcome too.

name: Hampton Inn Christiansburg/Blacksburg
description: Find us off Highway 460, a few steps from shops and dining. We're 10 minutes to the campus of Virginia Tech and to Blacksburg’s cultural attractions. The Appalachian Trail and the Blue Ridge Parkway are within about 20 miles of our hotel. Take a dip in our outdoor pool, and enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Christiansburg
description: We're just off I-81, less than a mile from Christiansburg Industrial Park and three miles from an art museum and local dining downtown. Virginia Tech and the Christiansburg Aquatic Center are only 10 minutes away. Enjoy free WiFi, breakfast, and evening socials, Monday – Thursday. Our shopping service can have your favorites waiting in your in-suite kitchen.

name: Tru by Hilton Radford
description: Located off I-81 at exit 109, our new Tru is five minutes from Carilion New River Valley Medical Center. We're less than four miles from Radford University and under 20 minutes from New River Community College, Virginia Tech, and Christiansburg Aquatic Center. Enjoy our indoor pool, outdoor patio, fitness center, and inviting lobby with seating area.

name: Hampton Inn Salem
description: Find us off I-81, 10 minutes from central Salem's Roanoke College campus. Each day starts with free hot breakfast, and you'll be within five minutes of shopping and local bites. Salem Civic Center events and Dixie Caverns tours are also 10 minutes from the door. Enjoy our free WiFi, fitness center, and heated indoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn Dublin
description: We’re off I-81 in the New River Valley with easy access to hiking, boating, and fishing spots like Claytor Lake State Park, five miles away. Take a dip in our indoor pool or take the kids to Randolph Park’s waterpark and playground, just three miles away. Enjoy free hot breakfast daily and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Salem East-Electric Road
description: Next to LewisGale Hospital and across the street from a greenway trail, we offer free daily breakfast to get you started. Find restaurants and groceries in walking distance. Moyer Sports Complex, Roanoke College, and Salem Civic Center are within three miles, and downtown Roanoke is six miles away. Enjoy free WiFi, electric car charging, and our courtyard.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Roanoke
description: Enjoy mountain views from our hotel 10 minutes south of downtown Roanoke. We're less than a mile from Tanglewood Mall, with a Texas Roadhouse adjacent, and three miles from the Blue Ridge Parkway, passing through Highway 220. Roanoke-Blacksburg Regional airport is 10 miles away. We have a fitness center, indoor pool, and landscaped terrace.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Roanoke Airport
description: You'll find us just off I-581, five minutes from Roanoke-Blacksburg Regional Airport. Get there and back on our free shuttle. We’re next to shops and restaurants at the Valley View mall. Explore natural attractions like the Dixie Caverns, 15 miles away. The Blue Ridge Parkway passes nine miles from our hotel. Our pet friendly hotel features a heated indoor pool. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Roanoke
description: Minutes from downtown Roanoke, we’re a short walk from Valley View Mall and a choice of popular restaurants. Take in the views from nearby Mill Mountain, or hike the trails of Virginia's Blue Ridge. Back at base, our fitness center, indoor pool, and outdoor patio grill area will help you unwind after a busy day. WiFi and breakfast are on us, or prepare something tasty in your in-suite kitchen.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Roanoke-Downtown
description: Discover downtown Roanoke from our comfy hotel on top of Market Parking Garage. We're a short walk from Roanoke City Market and Elmwood Park and surrounded by restaurants. Both Virginia Museum of Transportation and the Taubman Museum of Art are within a half-mile. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our fitness center.

name: The Hotel Roanoke & Conference Center, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: Our Tudor-style hotel, built in 1882, is on the National Register of Historic Places. Our restored antique decor is blended with modern comforts. We're well-suited for conferences with 63,000 square feet of meeting space. Our enclosed walkway delivers you to the Taubman Museum of Art and downtown Roanoke.

name: Tru by Hilton Roanoke Hollins
description: With Blacksburg Regional Airport just 10 minutes away, you'll be kicking back with free WiFi in no time. Once you're settled in, check out the scenery of Carvins Cove Reservoir and Read Mountain Preserve or take the kids to Splash Valley waterpark—all minutes away. Start the day with free hot breakfast before exploring historic Salem or the Eleanor D. Wilson Museum.

name: Hampton Inn Roanoke/Hollins - I-81
description: We’re just off I-81, with several shops and restaurants within a mile. It’s 15 minutes to downtown, with educational attractions like the Science Museum of Western Virginia, the Hopkins Planetarium, and the Roanoke Valley History Museum. Catch a show at the Mill Mountain Theatre. Relax in our indoor pool. Hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Bristol
description: We're off I-81, within five minutes of a variety of restaurants and shops. Downtown Bristol and the Birthplace of Country Music Museum are five miles down the road. It's 10 miles to Bristol Caverns and 25 minutes to Bristol Motor Speedway. Breakfast, lunch, and dinner are served daily in our Garden Grille & Bar. Enjoy our indoor pool and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Washington-Dulles Int'l Airport South
description: Find us 10 minutes from Dulles International Airport via free shuttle, just off Highway 50. We're five minutes from local quick bites and the Steven F. Udvar-Hazy Center, part of the Smithsonian's National Air and Space Museum. Washington D.C. is 40 minutes away. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our indoor pool and whirlpool.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Fairfax
description: Located off Highway 50, we’re minutes from Fair Ridge Park and Fair Oaks Mall, and five miles from Dulles Expo Center. We offer a free shuttle to area attractions within a three mile radius and the Vienna Metro Station. Washington Dulles Airport is 11 miles from our door. Enjoy breakfast, dinner, and evening room service from our Garden Grille & Bar.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Chantilly Dulles Airport
description: From PepsiCo to IMB, we’re close to major corporations and just 10 miles from Dulles Airport. When you’re not working, visit the Loudoun County Wine Trail or see what’s happening at the Dulles Expo Center. Feel at home in one of our pet-friendly suites, complete with kitchen, living area, and free WiFi. Free hot breakfast is also provided.

name: Hampton Inn Fairfax City
description: We're just off US Highway 29, and a mile from I-66. Enjoy our free hot breakfast before exploring historic Old Town Fairfax or teetime at Penderbrook Golf Club, both two miles from our hotel. Shopping and dining at Fair Oaks Mall and Tysons Corner Center are less than 10 minutes, and it's 19 miles to Washington DC for the big city buzz. WiFi is on us.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Reston
description: We're off Highway 267, 10 minutes east of Dulles Airport. Reston National Golf Course and Town Center shops and dining are three miles away. Enjoy free breakfast, and cook favorites anytime in your suite's full kitchen. We offer a 24-hour fitness center and three meeting rooms. Bring your pet along and hit the trails at Lake Fairfax Park.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Manassas
description: We're just north of I-66, five minutes from Manassas National Battlefield Park. Old Town Manassas is within 20 minutes of the hotel, as are nearly a dozen golf courses. Join us for cooked-to-order breakfast or enjoy an evening cocktail on the patio by our fire pit. We offer an indoor pool, 24-hour fitness center, and sunlit meeting space. WiFi is free.

name: Hampton Inn Manassas
description: Located off I-66, we’re five miles from Manassas, and surrounded by restaurants, including grills and Italian. Step onto key Civil War battlegrounds at Manassas National Battlefield Park, a mile away. Dulles International Airport and Manassas Regional Airport are less than 25 minutes’ drive as are the historic attractions of Washington D.C. Breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Charlottesville Downtown
description: Between downtown and the University of Virginia campus, we're steps from Charlottesville's best restaurants and breweries. Wine lovers, discover award-winning wineries three miles away along the Monticello WIne Trail. Each suite features a kitchen and separate living and working areas, with plenty of space to stretch out – no matter how long you're here.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Charlottesville-At The University
description: Home is in downtown Charlottesville, minutes from the University of Virginia campus and Medical Center via free shuttle—also covering Albemarle Airport. We're a short walk from Charlottesville Amtrak station and five minutes from Downtown Mall shopping and dining. Wake up to free hot breakfast, and enjoy our free WiFi and fitness center.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Charlottesville
description: We’re off Interstate 64, half a mile from Martha Jefferson Hospital. Downtown and the University of Virginia are 10 minutes from our hotel – our free shuttle will take you there, and to other Charlottesville destinations. The Garden Grille offers cooked-to-order breakfast and dinner daily, with evening room service available.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Charlottesville, VA
description: We're three miles from the city center, less than half a mile from Seminole Square Shopping Center, and five minutes from the University of Virginia. Grab a bite downtown, just 10 minutes away. Back at base, cook in your suite's fully equipped kitchen before joining our complimentary evening social, Monday to Thursday. WiFi and daily hot breakfast are free.

name: Hampton Inn Charlottesville
description: We’re in the Seminole Square Shopping Center, off Highway 29. You’ll find more shops and restaurants within a mile of our hotel. The University of Virginia and UVA Medical Center are within three miles, and Charlottesville-Albemarle Airport is seven miles away. Our free shuttle takes you to/from all three of them. Relax in our outdoor pool. Hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Charlottesville
description: Our hotel overlooks the Rivanna River, five miles from the University of Virginia and historic sites in downtown Charlottesville. More than 20,000 square feet of conference space includes two ballrooms, and we're 10 minutes from Charlottesville-Albemarle Airport.  We have a fitness center and an indoor pool and whirlpool.

name: Hampton Inn Waynesboro/Stuarts Draft
description: Find us off I-80, just four minutes from Augusta Health. A 10-minute drive will take you to Plumb House Museum, Frontier Culture Museum, and Barren Ridge Vineyards. The Hershey Company and Staunton Amtrak station are within 16 minutes. Breakfast and WiFi are on us, and you can use our fitness center for free, too.

name: Tru by Hilton Staunton
description: It's much ado about culture here. We're near the American Shakespeare Center, Frontier Culture Museum, and Woodrow Wilson Presidential Library. Make the most of local shopping and dining or take a short drive into downtown—Gypsy Hill Park is always worth a look. While you're with us, WiFi and build-your-own breakfast are free.

name: Hampton Inn Harrisonburg - University
description: With the Natural Chimneys and downtown area nearby, staying here means having history on your doorstep. Free hot breakfast is the ideal start for exploring over 100 miles of Shenandoah National Park hikes. Bringing the kids? Take advantage of our free WiFi, fitness suite, outdoor pool and proximity to Harrisonburg’s Children’s Museum, great for ages 2 – 12.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Harrisonburg
description: We're right off I-81 in Virginia's Shenandoah Valley, two miles from James Madison University. Our location near US-33 puts Shenandoah National Park in easy reach, just half an hour away. Our restaurant serves lunch and dinner, and you'll find plenty of dining options nearby. Every stay starts with our signature warm chocolate chip cookie.

name: Tru by Hilton Harrisonburg
description: Situated between US-11 and I-81, our hotel is three miles from James Madison University. Downtown Harrisonburg is just four miles away and has a plethora of local shops, eateries, and attractions. Bring your four-legged family members—we welcome pets!—and enjoy free WiFi and breakfast in our big, bright lobby.

name: Hampton Inn Harrisonburg - South
description: Close to the arts district, with the Oasis gallery and a quilt museum nearby, we’ve got culture covered and tucked in. Want some action? How about skiing, hiking or golf set against the Shenandoah Valley. Our fitness center and indoor pool are quieter alternatives after all that mountain air. WiFi, daily hot breakfast and parking are yours for free.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Culpeper
description: Welcome to Culpeper: We're a six-minute drive to watersports at Lake Pelham Adventure Park, and four minutes from Southgate Shopping Center. Enjoy free hot breakfast before a day hiking the trails of Shenandoah National Park, 40 minutes away, or sampling fine wines at nearby Mountain Run Winery. WiFi's on us.

name: Hilton Norfolk The Main
description: Wake up to Elizabeth River views in downtown Norfolk, minutes from the waterside. We're a 10-minute walk from shows at Scope Arena and more than 50 restaurants. Enjoy fresh air and cold brews at Norfolk's first rooftop garden bar, and historic details and curated art throughout the hotel. We feature an indoor pool and 24-hour fitness center.

name: Hampton Inn Norfolk/Chesapeake (Greenbrier Area)
description: Find us off I-64 in Chesapeake, a short walk from the Chesapeake Conference Center. Chesapeake Regional Medical Center is a five-mile drive, and we're 15 minutes from Hampton Roads-area attractions like the Nauticus museum and USS Wisconsin. Enjoy free hot breakfast and WiFi, and our fitness center and indoor pool.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Chesapeake/Greenbrier
description: We're just off I-64, minutes from Greenbrier Mall and surrounding restaurants. Chesapeake Conference Center is across the highway, and Regent University and Greenbrier Sports Park are under four miles away. Cooked-to-order breakfast, lunch, and dinner are served daily in our Garden Grille & Bar. WiFi's on us.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Chesapeake-Greenbrier
description: Guests landing at Norfolk International Airport will be just 10 miles from us. Nearby, explore Princess Anne Park or work up a sweat at Hampton Roads Soccer Complex. Free breakfast is the ideal start for lazy days at Virginia Beach, 25 minutes away. Unwind at our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday. Enjoy WiFi and breakfast on us, and your own in-suite kitchen.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Chesapeake-Battlefield Blvd.
description: You’ll find us near I-64 and I-464, about eight miles from downtown Norfolk. Enjoy the many parks within a few miles of our hotel, or drive 10 minutes to explore the shops in Chesapeake’s Antique Alley. Relax in our indoor pool and whirlpool. Hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Hampton Inn Norfolk/Virginia Beach
description: We're off I-264 in Virginia Beach, a short walk from shops and dining. You'll find Military Circle Mall within 10 minutes, or head to downtown Norfolk for Battleship Wisconsin's military history. Free hot breakfast is fuel for striking out east for Virginia Beach boardwalk attractions, 20 minutes away. Enjoy free WiFi and our seasonal outdoor pool.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Virginia Beach/Norfolk Airport
description: Located on I-264, we're just 20 minutes from the beach and the airport. From here, you can explore Norfolk Naval Base, Virginia Aquarium, and Virginia Zoo. Enjoy free hot breakfast every morning, or cook your own meals in the privacy of your in-suite kitchen. Be sure to check out our indoor pool and whirlpool for year-round relaxation. WiFi is on us, and pets are welcome.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Virginia Beach Town Center
description: We're on US-58, a short walk from the shopping, dining, and entertainment of Virginia Beach Town Center. Ocean Breeze Waterpark and Naval Air Station Oceana are within 20 minutes, and we're 9 miles from the beach. Breakfast and dinner are served daily in our Garden Grille & Bar. Enjoy our indoor pool, fitness center, and WiFi on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Chesapeake-Square Mall
description: Located off I-664, we’re a mile from Chesapeake Square Mall. Hit the nature trails of Bennett’s Creek Park & Boat, or the fairways of Sleepy Hole Golf Course, less than 15 minutes’ drive. The naval city of Norfolk is 13 miles from our door. Take a dip in the hotel pool. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Chester
description: Our location puts you between Richmond and Petersburg. Shop at Southpark Mall or see a show at Swift Creek Mill Theatre, both within eight miles. Visit the James River Plantations. We provide free hot breakfast daily. Get energized in our fitness center, or take a dip in the pool. Stay on top of work by taking advantage of our free WiFi.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Richmond-Chester
description: Find us tucked between Henricus Historical Park and Point of Rocks Park, 15 minutes south of downtown Richmond. We're just off I-95, 15 miles from Richmond International Airport. Enjoy free hot breakfast before visiting Richmond's colonial and Civil War sites or commuting to the Meadowville Technology Park, three miles away.

name: Hampton Inn Richmond - South
description: We’re off I-95, 10 minutes from downtown Richmond, home of the Virginia Capitol, Virginia Museum of Fine Arts, and the Lewis Ginter Botanical Garden. You’ll be within 15 minutes of several industrial parks and just as close to Richmond International Airport. Kick off the day with free breakfast, and enjoy our indoor pool and free WiFi.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Richmond South/Southpark
description: We’re off I-95, next to the Southpark mall where you'll find shops and dining. Downtown Colonial Heights is two miles away, with parks, stores, and businesses. Virginia State University and Fort Lee are both within five miles. Our restaurant, The Garden Grille, serves breakfast and dinner. The Pavilion Pantry is open 24 hours for drinks and snacks.

name: Hampton Inn Petersburg-Southpark Mall
description: You'll find us off I-95, across the street from the Southpark Mall. It's two miles to downtown Petersburg’s antique shops, restaurants, and attractions. We're 25 miles from downtown Richmond and Richmond International Airport, and only three miles from Fort Lee Army Base and Virginia State University. Our daily hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Hampton Inn Richmond-Southwest-Hull Street
description: We're off US-360 with only a 10-minute drive to league sports games at River City Sportsplex, Own Touch Southside, and XL Sportsworld. Explore downtown Richmond 12 miles up Hull Street, and spend a culture-filled day visiting the Virginia Museum of Fine Arts and nearby Science Museum of Virginia. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our indoor pool.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Richmond - Airport
description: Five minutes away from Richmond International Airport, we offer easy access to downtown attractions such as the Richmond Convention Center, VCU, and Siegel Center.  We are also minutes away from corporations including Coca-Cola, Mondelez, West Rock, and Facebook. Grab our free airport shuttle when you land. Free breakfast is great fuel for a day at Richmond International Raceway. Finish the day with some in-suite cooking or with our free evening social, Monday – Thursday.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Richmond Airport
description: We're five minutes from Richmond International Airport, with a free shuttle both ways. Downtown destinations like the Richmond Coliseum and VCU are 15 minutes away. Our bistro serves breakfast and dinner and the Made Market is open all day. We have a fitness center and indoor pool. Every stay starts with a warm chocolate chip cookie.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Richmond Airport
description: We’re two miles from Richmond International Airport, with a free shuttle both ways. Our hotel is five miles from outdoor fun on the James River, and seven miles from Downtown Richmond and historic attractions like St. John's Episcopal Church. Our restaurant serves breakfast and dinner, and drinks and snacks are available in the 24-hour Pavilion Pantry.

name: Hampton Inn Richmond - Airport
description: We’re off I-64, less than one mile from Richmond International Airport and located 12 minutes from White Oak Technology Park home to Facebook and more. We are close to VCU medical center, Coca Cola, Bizerba, West Rock, Mondelez, Dominion Energy, and Richmond Raceway. Visit beautiful downtown Richmond less than 15 minutes away. Start your day with our free hot breakfast, and work out in our indoor pool and fitness center. WiFi’s on us.

name: Hampton Inn Richmond-Midlothian Turnpike
description: We're just off the Midlothian Turnpike, surrounded by restaurants and businesses, and across the street from Chesterfield Towne Center. Providence Golf Club is five miles away, and you can reach downtown attractions like the Maymont estate and the Virginia Museum of Fine Arts in 20 minutes. Enjoy free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our indoor pool.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Richmond - Midlothian
description: Find us off Highway 60 in Midlothian's retail district and adjacent to Johnston-Willis Hospital. We're within a mile of Chesterfield Towne Center shopping and our free shuttle covers a five-mile radius. Downtown Richmond is 12 miles from our door. Enjoy our fitness center, indoor pool, and a warm DoubleTree cookie on arrival.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Chincoteague-Waterfront
description: Our waterfront hotel is just off Route 175 on Chincoteague island. We're minutes from local seafood restaurants and two miles from the beach in Chincoteague National Wildlife Refuge, home to wild ponies. NASA Wallops Flight Facility Visitor Center is five miles away. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our indoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Exmore - Eastern Shore
description: We're next to US-13 on the Eastern Shore, nestled between the Chesapeake Bay and the Atlantic Ocean. Head 10 miles south to Chatham Vineyards & Winery. Start each day right with free hot breakfast, and get work done using our free WiFi, business center, and meeting rooms. Take some time to relax with a swim in our outdoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn Hillsville
description: Find us off I-77 in the Blue Ridge Mountains, steps from the Southwest Virginia Farmers Market. Take in the views from the Beaver Dam Creek Walking Trail, New River Trail State Park, and Shot Tower State Park, all within 15 miles of our front door. Work out in our 24-hour fitness center, and enjoy free WiFi and hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn Petersburg-Ft. Lee
description: Just off I-95, we’re within 15 minutes of Ft. Lee and Petersburg’s old town area, home to Centre Hill Mansion and Oak Antique Mall. It’s just as short a trip to Virginia State University and Civil War history at Petersburg National Battlefield and Pamplin Historical Park. Start the day with free hot breakfast, and enjoy free WiFi and fitness center access.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Richmond - Downtown
description: We're in the heart of the action in Richmond, half a mile from the convention center and two blocks from the State Capitol. Virginia Commonwealth University and a wide variety of downtown restaurants and bars are all within a mile. Enjoy the view of downtown from our lounge. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Richmond-Downtown
description: Explore the heart of downtown Richmond, minutes from events at Richmond Coliseum and shows at the National Theater. The iconic Virginia State Capitol is steps away. Take advantage of our free grocery service to have your favorites delivered to your in-suite kitchen. Finish the day at our free evening social, Monday – Thursday. WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hilton Richmond Downtown
description: Housed in the historic former Miller & Rhoads department store, our hotel is two blocks from the Greater Richmond Convention Center and Richmond Coliseum. Boasting original features such as marble floors and high ceilings, we also have an indoor pool, whirlpool, fitness center, meeting facilities, and three on-site dining options.

name: Hampton Inn Stony Creek/Petersburg Area
description: We're 20 minutes south of Petersburg on Interstate 95. In the city, you can browse antique shopping, tour Civil War history at Petersburg National Battlefield, or head out to Pamplin Historical Park for the National Museum of the Civil War. Wake up to free hot breakfast, and enjoy WiFi on us. Our fitness center and pool are yours.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Lewisburg
description: Located near the junction of I-64 and US-219, we are less than two miles from downtown Lewisburg. Lost World Caverns, Greenbriar Valley Airport, and West Virginia State Fairgrounds are within six miles. Our all-suite hotel welcomes pets and features in-suite kitchens, ample storage space, and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Lexington-Historic District
description: Our hotel grounds feature seven acres of land and the historic Col Alto Mansion, with 10 restored manor rooms available. Discover restaurants and Stonewall Jackson House tours in Lexington town center, five minutes away. It's one mile to Washington and Lee University or the Virginia Military Institute. Relax in our outdoor pool and whirlpool. Hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Warrenton
description: We’re off US 29, within a half mile of restaurants and Warrenton Village Center shopping. The Fauquier History Museum at the Old Jail is three minutes away. Washington D.C. is 45 miles away. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast and WiFi, along with our fitness center, 24-hour business center, and indoor pool.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Fredericksburg
description: Next door to the Expo Center and minutes from Central Park Marketplace, we have everything you need for your stay in Fredericksburg. Take advantage of the full kitchen in your suite, or walk to nearby restaurants. Our evening social every Monday – Thursday is the perfect way to unwind at the end of the day. Pets are welcome, and your WiFi and breakfast are on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Fredericksburg-at Celebrate Virginia
description: We're next to I-95, a short walk from the Fredericksburg Expo and Conference Center and the Virginia Welcome Center. The University of Mary Washington is five minutes away near downtown Fredericksburg, home to historical attractions like the Mary Washington House and the Kenmore mansion. Relax in our outdoor pool, and enjoy free hot breakfast and free WiFi.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Fredericksburg
description: By I-95, our hotel is walking distance from Fredericksburg Expo and Conference Center. We're a half-mile from Central Park shopping center and surrounding easy eats, with historic downtown Fredericksburg 10 minutes away. Enjoy access to our fitness center, indoor pool, and whirlpool, plus free passes to the nearby Gold's Gym.

name: Hampton Inn Gainesville-Haymarket
description: Find us off Highway 29, steps from dining and shopping at Virginia Gateway mall. Visit local attractions like Manassas National Battlefield Park and Haymarket Museum, both within three miles. Grab a drink at The Winery at La Grange, just 15 minutes from our doorstep. Every stay with us includes free WiFi and free hot breakfast.

name: Tru by Hilton Manassas
description: Find us off VA-234 in the growing Cannon Branch area. Old Town Manassas and the Hylton Performing Arts Center are three miles from our door. Grab free hot breakfast or enjoy a snack from our 24/7 market. We have foosball and games in the lobby, plus a 24-hour fitness center. Our efficient rooms offer free WiFi, a 50-inch HDTV, and a big bright bathroom.

name: Hampton Inn Gretna
description: Off US-29, we’re next door to Centra Gretna Medical Center and Mama Rosa’s – a popular spot for authentic Italian dining. Smith Mountain Lake is a half-hour away for scenic hiking and biking trips. Gretna is minutes from our door, home to shops, restaurants, and Gretna theatre. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, our 24-hour fitness center, and WiFi on us.

name: Hampton Inn Martinsville
description: We’re off US 220, less than 10 minutes from the shops and restaurants of downtown Martinsville. Ride, hike, or drive Appalachian Blue Ridge Parkway, just a few miles away. Learn about everything from dinosaurs to tiny insects at Virginia Museum of Natural History, just a 10-minute drive. Or enjoy high-octane NASCAR action at Martinsville Speedway. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Ft. Chiswell-Max Meadows
description: You’ll find us just off Interstate 81, in the center of Fort Chiswell and a mile south of Max Meadows. The Gatorade/Pepsi plant in Wytheville, Virginia, is just seven miles away. Our daily hot breakfast and WiFi are free, and you can relax in our outdoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn Wytheville
description: Find us off I-77 and I-81 in Wytheville. We're five minutes from Haller-Gibboney Rock House museum, and eight minutes from Wohlfahrt Haus Dinner Theatre. Our staff can advise on the best restaurants to eat at near the hotel. Enjoy free daily hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our indoor pool and hot tub.

name: Tru by Hilton Wytheville
description: When you're with us, you get to combine beautiful scenery with classic culture. We're minutes from hiking and biking trails, as well as the Claw of the Dragon motorcycle route. Museums and the Wohlfahrt Haus Dinner Theatre are eight minutes away and Big Walker Lookout is a short drive. Enjoy free WiFi and hot breakfast. Psst. Don't miss out on our 24/7 market.

name: Hampton Inn Dumfries/Quantico
description: Located off I-95, we’re just two miles from downtown, and 10 minutes from Potomac Mills outlet mall. Hike or bike the forest trails of Prince William Forest Park, only six minutes away. Quantico Marine Corps Base and the FBI Academy are both 10 miles from the hotel. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Woodbridge
description: Whether you're visiting a Marine at Quantico or in town for meeting at Fort Belvoir, our location off I-95 is ideal for military travelers and families. Our suites feature fully equipped kitchens. Take advantage of free hot breakfast and our Monday – Thursday evening social, or eat at one of the many restaurants at Stone Bridge, just a mile away.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Woodbridge
description: We're next to I-95, minutes from shops at Potomac Town Center. Sentara Northern Virginia Medical Center and Potomac Mills Mall are about two miles away. The National Museum of the Marine Corps and Quantico Base are both within 12 miles. Our meeting and event space can host up to 250 guests. Breakfast, lunch, and dinner are served daily in our Great American Grill.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Woodbridge Potomac Mills
description: The shops and restaurants of Potomac Mills Mall are right on our doorstep: dine and shop your way around them or stock your in-suite kitchen at our 24-hour store. Washington DC is 25 minutes away. Choose from more than 400 free breakfast options, make the most of our free WiFi, and feel free to bring your pets.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Stafford Quantico
description: Military guests will be just a short drive from Quantico Marine Corps Base and four miles from Stafford city center. Top-secret guests will be near the FBI Academy. Finish the day with a sip at Wild Run Brewing Co., next door, or a glass at Potomac Point Winery. Grab free breakfast before exploring Crow’s Nest Natural Area with the dog. WiFi’s on us.

name: Hampton Inn Stafford/Quantico & Conference Center
description: Our hotel is off I-95, a 15-minute drive from Quantico Marine Corps Base, and National Museum of the Marine Corps. Shops and dining at Stafford Marketplace and North Stafford Plaza are a mile from us. We have an indoor pool, fitness center, and game room with foosball and a pool table. Free perks include hot breakfast, an evening reception Monday – Wednesday, and WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Potomac Mills/Woodbridge
description: Find us just off I-95 in Woodbridge. You’ll be 10 minutes from shopping and dining at Potomac Mills mall, and within 20 minutes of Leesylvania State Park and George Washington’s Mount Vernon estate. Start your day with free hot breakfast, and enjoy free WiFi. The interstate puts you half an hour from Washington D.C.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Springfield
description: Our LEED-certified hotel is in Springfield's business district, off the I-95/Route 286 intersection. We're within three miles of Fort Belvoir campus and Franconia Springfield Metro Station, which runs to downtown D.C. Perks include a free metro station shuttle, made-to-order breakfast, complimentary evening reception, and an indoor pool.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Fort Belvoir Alexandria South
description: We're the closest hotel to the historic Mount Vernon Estate and Gardens, just a mile's drive from Fort Belvoir, and 40 minutes from Washington, D.C.  Your stay includes a spacious room, free breakfast and WiFi, plus access to our fitness center and indoor pool.

name: Hilton Springfield
description: We’re off I-395/I-95, across the street from Springfield Town Center mall. Fort Belvoir military base is nine miles away and we’re a half-hour drive from Washington DC. We offer a free shuttle to and from Franconia-Springfield Metro Station, less than two miles away. Enjoy our indoor pool, fitness center, and free parking. WiFi’s on us.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton® Springfield, VA
description: We’re next to the Capital Beltway and close to the Department of Defense, Northrup Grumman, and Boeing. Downtown Washington DC is also a 20-minute drive away. Closer to home, find an eclectic food scene – or cook for yourself in your in-suite kitchen. Hot breakfast is free, as are the WiFi and Monday – Thursday evening socials.

name: Hampton Inn Dahlgren
description: From our lobby it's a quick walk to several tech companies including SAIC, Northrop Grumman, Lockheed Martin, and BAE Systems. The majority of Dahlgren's businesses and restaurants are just five minutes south, including the Naval Support Facility. During your stay, enjoy daily hot breakfast, free WiFi, and our indoor heated pool.

name: Hampton Inn South Hill
description: We’re off I-85, five minutes from South Hill history at Tobacco Farm Life Museum of Virginia and South Hill Train Museum. Or fuel up with free hot breakfast, and explore John H. Kerr Dam & Reservoir, 25 minutes away, near numerous wildlife areas. 35 minutes’ drive brings you Lake Gaston day trips, over the North Carolina border. WiFi’s on us.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Falls Church - I-495 @ Rt. 50
description: Just off I-495, we offer easy access to Washington, DC-area corporations. Our free shuttle runs in a three-mile radius to destinations including Northrop Grumman and Defense Health headquarters – and to the Metro station, for Capitol sightseeing. Stop by our complimentary evening social, Monday – Thursday, or do a little in-suite cooking.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Tysons Corner
description: We're just off I-495, across the highway from shopping and dining at Tysons Corner Center. Our free shuttle will run you anywhere within two miles, including the Metro silver line at Greensboro Station and nearby corporate offices. Downtown DC and Dulles International Airport are both 14 miles away. Enjoy breakfast and dinner in our Garden Grille & Bar.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Tysons Corner
description: We're less than three miles from Wolf Trap National Park and Fortune 500 giants like AT&T and Freddie Mac. Meadowlark Botanical Gardens, Great Falls Park, and Dulles International Airport are within a 20-minute drive. Spring Hill Metro station is a five-minute walk and gets you into central DC within the hour. Enjoy free made-to-order breakfast and our complimentary evening reception.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton McLean Tysons
description: Our hotel is within a half-mile of Tysons Corner Center, Tysons Galleria, and direct metro links to Washington DC. We're 15 minutes from the banks of the Potomac River and Great Falls Park, home to one of the nation’s first canals. Perks include our large indoor pool, free one-mile shuttle, convenience market, and a warm DoubleTree cookie on arrival.

name: Hilton McLean Tysons Corner
description: Our hotel in the heart of Fairfax County's business district offers easy access to numerous corporate headquarters, with more than 27,000 sq.ft. of flexible space for meetings and conferences. We're five minutes from the Metro Silver Line, putting DC destinations within reach. Our free shuttle stops at Tysons Galleria and other locations within a mile.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Falls Church
description: We're walking distance to the Cherry Hill Farmhouse and several eateries, and one mile from The State Theatre and West Falls Church metro station.
