It's 10 miles to the University of Wisconsin-Madison. Enjoy a meal in our restaurant, Johnny's Italian Steakhouse, and snacks from our 24-hour Pavilion Pantry.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Oconomowoc
description: We’re off I-94, with cafes, dining, and shopping within walking distance. Many businesses are within a mile, including the Aurora Medical Center. Enjoy the views at Lapham Peak park, six miles away. Milwaukee is about 20 miles from our hotel. Eat breakfast and dinner in the Garden Grille restaurant, and grab a drink or snack at the Pavilion Pantry.

name: Hampton Inn Plover-Stevens Point
description: Our hotel is located off I-39 in central Plover. We’re a five minute walk from O’so Brewery, Great Northern Distillery, and plenty of local bars and restaurants. The University of Wisconsin Stevens Point and The Green Circle Trail are within nine miles. Enjoy free daily hot breakfast, our indoor pool, and free WiFi during your stay

name: Hampton Inn Superior Duluth
description: We're just off US Highway 53, three minutes drive from the University of Wisconsin-Superior and local restaurants – and 10 minutes from Calumet, BNSF, and other Twin Ports firms. Stroll, shop an sip at Canal Park, seven miles away. Duluth International Airport is a 15-minute drive. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: Hampton Inn Tomah
description: Our Tomah hotel is off Highway 21, near I-90/I-94. Fort McCoy Army Base and Volk Field Air National Guard Base are within 20 minutes’ drive. Change gears for the Tomah Sparta Speedway, five minutes from the door, or brush up on nearby Warrens’ fruit history at Wisconsin Cranberry Discovery Center, 15 minutes away. Free hot breakfast and WiFi are yours.

name: Hampton Inn Wausau
description: Right off US Highway 51, we're three miles from Granite Peak Ski Area, great for all abilities. Shop or dine downtown, or hit the stores at Wausau Center Mall, both two miles from our door. The spectacular gorge and falls at Dells of the Eau Claire River are half an hour away. Daily free hot breakfast, WiFi, parking, and pool access are included in your stay.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Wausau
description: We're a mile from Rib Mountain State Park and the Granite Peak Ski Area. Some rooms have views of the Peak. Within a five-minute drive there’s shops, bars, dining, and entertainment. Relax in our large indoor pool with whirlpool. Our Garden Grille restaurant & bar serves breakfast and dinner. The Pavilion Pantry is open 24 hours for drinks and snacks.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Wisconsin Dells
description: We’re next to US-12, a 10 minute walk from Noah’s Ark Waterpark. Mirror Lake and Rocky Arbor State Parks are within six miles. We’re 30 minutes from Woodside (Mauston) Sports Complex and Circus World Museum. Our Garden Grille & Bar serves breakfast and dinner daily, and Del-Bar Restaurant is next door. Enjoy our indoor pool and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites at Wisconsin Dells Lake Delton
description: Off I-90 and I-94, we’re less than one mile from Kalahari Waterpark, Wilderness Resort, and Outlets at the Dells discount shopping. Mt. Olympus Water Park is a 10-minute drive away, and plenty of restaurants are within walking distance. Perks include our family-friendly indoor pool, fitness center, free WiFi, and free hot breakfast.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Casper
description: Just off I-25, we're the ideal base for exploring the heart of Wyoming. After a free hot breakfast, stroll 15 minutes to the National Historic Trails Interpretive Center, or visit the Nicolaysen Art Museum, two miles from us. Tee off at Three Crowns Golf Club, five minutes' drive, or enjoy the Platte River trails. WiFi and parking are free.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Casper
description: Off I-25, we're within a mile of the Casper Events Center, Historic Trails Center, Mike Lansing Field, and Platte River. The UW Casper campus is 10 minutes south, and the Wyoming Medical Center and Casper/Natrona County Airport are within 15 minutes. We've got a restaurant and lobby bar, indoor pool, and event space for 140 guests. WiFi is free.

name: Tru by Hilton Cheyenne
description: The Frontier Days are back, with local horseback riding, scenic hikes and rodeos within lassoing distance. While you’re here, enjoy free WiFi and daily build-your-own breakfast – you’ll need it for the Terry Bison Ranch. We’re close to the Wyoming State Capitol and State Museum and there’s no better way to explore than with a Cheyenne Street Railway Trolley tour.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Douglas
description: We're right of I-25, with a variety of restaurants within walking distance. Enjoy free breakfast and WiFi during your stay, as well as access to our indoor pool and fitness center. Nearby, you'll find plenty of walking trails along the North Platte River. Check out the Wyoming Pioneer Museum and sample the local flavors at one of Douglas' popular saloons.

name: Hampton Inn Evanston
description: Find us off I-80, less than a mile from Purple Sage Golf Course, and five minutes from Evanston history and dining. Fill up on a free hot breakfast before walking the dog at Bear River State Park, 10 minutes away. We're close to the interstate, putting you half an hour from Fort Bridger and 10 minutes from Evanston-Uinta County Burns Field airport. Enjoy WiFi on us.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Gillette
description: With so much to do, you’ll barely have time to enjoy free WiFi or your in-suite kitchen. Start the day with free breakfast, before teeing off at Gillette Golf Club, visiting Dalby Memorial Park, or heading into the city center – Gillette Planetarium and Avenues of Art are highlights. Stop by the front desk and introduce us to your pets – they'll love Bicentennial Park.

name: Hampton Inn Gillette
description: Within five miles, you’ll find nature at Bicentennial, Dalbey Memorial and Overlook Parks. Grab some free hot breakfast before teeing off at Bell Nob Golf Course, three miles away, or taking the kids to Campbell County Recreation Center. Drinks connoisseurs will be just over a mile from Gillette Brewing Company and Big Lost Meadery and Brewery. WiFi’s on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Green River
description: Find us off I-80, five minutes from Green River center, surrounded by Wyoming nature. Expedition Island Park, Green River Bike Park trails, and Seedskadee National Wildlife Refuge are all within half an hour of our door. For local history, stop by Sweetwater County Museum in town. Wake up to free hot breakfast, and enjoy free WiFi and fitness center use.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Rock Springs
description: Less than a mile from I-80, we’re near White Mountain Mall, and  historic downtown Rock Springs shopping district is just three miles away. It’s a short drive to see wild horses at Pilot Butte, or  take a day trip to the dormant volcano at Boars Tusk. Your stay includes a spacious suite with full kitchen, free WiFi, and free breakfast. Meet and mingle at our evening social, Monday to Wednesday.

name: Hampton Inn Rock Springs
description: Just off I-80, we're less than an hour from some of the largest sand dunes in North America. Closer to home, you'll find ancient rock carvings at White Mountain, Rock Springs' historic district, and Flaming Gorge Recreation Area with a 91-mile reservoir. We've got laundry facilities, an indoor pool, and fitness center. Every stay includes free hot breakfast and WiFi.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Jackson
description: Snow sports fans and those who’d rather appreciate the mountains from afar have equal place here. We’re at the heart of Jackson Hole valley, home to Grand Teton and Yellowstone National Parks and just 20 minutes from the airport. Local shops and restaurants are aplenty – or cook at your own pace in your in-suite kitchen. Hot breakfast and WiFi are free.

name: Hampton Inn Jackson Hole
description: Off the Teton Pass Highway and US 191, we’re 20 minutes from Jackson Hole Airport. Grand Teton National Park is within 15 minutes and Yellowstone National Park is just over an hour’s drive away. We’ve got outdoor seating with cozy fire pits, an indoor hot tub, and restaurants within walking distance. Perks include free WiFi and daily hot breakfast.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Laramie
description: Find us off I-80 next to the University of Wyoming. The college conference center and War Memorial Stadium are a short walk away. A variety of shops and restaurants line Grand Avenue in front of the hotel. Enjoy meals in Garden Grille Restaurant and drinks in Pavilion Lounge. We have an indoor pool, fitness center, and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Laramie
description: We’re five minutes from University of Wyoming, just off I-80. Check out the Geological Museum while you’re on campus. Local and state history is 10 minutes away in Laramie, home of the Wyoming Territorial Prison and Laramie Plains Museum. Our daily free hot breakfast is fuel for hikes at Medicine Bow National Forest, an hour away. WiFi’s on us.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Pinedale
description: You’ll find us on the scenic route of Highway 191. Take in views of the Wind River Mountains, just five miles away. Play golf at Rendezvous Meadows Golf Course one mile away, or go fishing in Wyoming’s second largest lake, Fremont. Enjoy our free hot breakfast served daily and free WiFi.

name: Hampton Inn Rawlins
description: We're just off I-80, betwen Salt Lake City and Cheyenne. Our pet-friendly hotel is surrounded by natural wonders and frontier history, from the Uplift rock feature to the Wyoming Frontier Prison Museum. Play a round at the Rochelle Ranch Public Golf Course, three minutes away, or unwind in our fitness center and pool. WiFi and our hot breakfast are free.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Riverton
description: Find us off Highway 26, just 10 minutes from Central Wyoming College, home of the Robert A. Peck Arts Center. Historic central Riverton boasts Wind River Heritage Center, five minutes away. Highway access puts you 40 minutes from Boysen State Park, ideal for hikes with the dog. Enjoy daily free hot breakfast, manager’s receptions, Tuesday – Wednesday, and WiFi on us.

name: Hampton Inn Sheridan
description: Just off I-90, we're a five-minute drive from downtown Sheridan. Get a feel for the Wild West at the Sheridan WYO Rodeo just three miles away, or take a three-minute walk to visit the Sheridan County Museum. Relax in our heated pool, or get energized in our fitness center. Every stay with us includes free hot breakfast daily and free WiFi.

name: Home2 Suites Birmingham Colonnade
description:
Your Home Base To Explore Birmingham, AL

Make yourself at home at the Home2 Suites by Hilton Birmingham Colonnade. Our welcoming extended stay hotel provides a great location for exploring all that Birmingham, AL has to offer. We’re located in the heart of the Colonnade Shopping Center and Corporate Park. We offer easy access to the airport, Grandview Medical Center, AT&T, Southern Company and Summit Shopping Center, and are within half a mile of a several restaurants, shops and businesses. Enjoy a relaxing vacation or business trip when you stay at our all-suites Birmingham hotel. All our suites offer a living room with pull out sleeper sofa and a stylish, functional kitchen area. Keep connected with free WiFi or get work done at the large work desk. Home2 is your pet’s home too – all our suites are pet-friendly, so you can bring your furry friend along. Our modern, eco-friendly hotel offers great amenities. Enjoy a complimentary hot breakfast every day from 6am to 9am, with over 400 mix and match options. Grab a snack or drink from The Market, available 24 hours a day. Take a dip in our outdoor saline pool, get a workout done in the Fitness Center, or socialize around the Outdoor Fire Pit. Business travelers can keep on top of work in our Business Center. At Home2 Suites by Hilton Birmingham Colonnade, our friendly staff are happy to recommend local restaurants or give you directions to nearby businesses. We can’t wait to welcome you.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Huntsville Hotel & Spa
description: Stay in downtown Huntsville at Embassy Suites Huntsville Hotel & Spa. Our all-suite hotel is connected via a Sky Bridge to the Von Braun Center, a multi-purpose arena, meeting and performance arts venue. Walk to the Huntsville Museum of Art or enjoy the scenery in Big Spring Park. Take a short drive to area businesses like Toyota, Lockheed Martin and Cummings Research Park. This hotel offers a complimentary shuttle within a three-mile radius and to Huntsville Airport, Bridge Street Town Center or Huntsville Hospital. Stay in comfort with extra space at our Huntsville hotel All 295 two-room suites at our downtown hotel offer extra space to rest, work and entertain. The hotel’s ten-story atrium provides a relaxing atmosphere to unwind. Wake up to a complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast each morning, and drinks and snacks every evening at the complimentary Evening Reception*. Casual dining and spa rejuvenation onsite at our Huntsville hotel Treat the family to fast and casual American fare dining at The R. Stay active throughout your stay in Huntsville at the fitness center and indoor saltwater pool. Rejuvenate after a busy day with a massage or facial at Spa Botanica. Ideally located downtown Huntsville event venue Host a business meeting, social event or wedding in downtown Huntsville. Enjoy a choice of versatile meeting rooms or an elegant ballroom. The hotel offers a 24-hour BusinessLink™ Business Center with complimentary WiFi. * Service of alcohol subject to state and local laws. Must be of legal drinking age

name: Boulders Resort & Spa Scottsdale, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: Nestled in the scenic Sonoran Desert, the renovated Boulders Resort & Spa Scottsdale, Curio Collection by Hilton provides a luxurious hideaway. The tranquil atmosphere allows you to take in all this outstanding resort – ranked as a  U.S. News & World Report Best Hotel in Arizona – has to offer. Combining world-class service, luxurious amenities, elegant accommodations, and Southwestern flair, this resort is ideal for corporate groups, family reunions, and romantic getaways. Indulge in healing spa therapies and meditate in the labyrinth or shamanic tipi. Our two 18-hole Jay Morrish-designed golf courses were added to Golf Digest's Editors' Choice 2019 list. Enjoy nature on foot, by bike, with a fishing pole, or on horseback. The surrounding desert inspired the design of our adobe Casitas and suites, which feature wood-burning fireplaces, Southwestern accents, wood-beamed ceilings, and natural stone showers. For more space and all the comforts of home, reserve a private, fully furnished one-, two- or three-bedroom Hacienda or Villa. These luxury vacation homes feature private patios with grills, laundry rooms, bathrooms for every bedroom, and fully equipped kitchens. Dining at Boulders is an all-encompassing experience. Multiple restaurants and bars serve dramatic scenery along with selections ranging from light dishes for the health-conscious and refreshing beverages to bistro fare and Southwestern-inspired cuisine. Hold a wedding or business event in this unique space that offers rooms with floor-to-ceiling windows and picturesque outdoor venues for up to 500 guests.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Phoenix Tempe, University Research Park
description:
A Fresh and New Home2 Hotel in Tempe, AZ

Welcome to Home2 Suites by Hilton Phoenix-Tempe University Research Park. Conveniently located off Loop 101, our extended-stay hotel is based in Discovery Business Campus and University Research Park, within 15 minutes of Chandler, Gilbert, and PHX Airport. Discover the Mill Avenue District in Tempe, or catch a spring training game while you’re here. We’re happy to offer free shuttle service within a 5-mile radius of the hotel. All our suites have a comfy living area and a ‘Working Wall’ with ergonomic desk and plenty of storage spaces. Arrange the movable furniture to your liking, connect to free WiFi, and relax on the sofa watching the 47-inch HDTV. Suites also have a full kitchen with sink, dishwasher, microwave, full-size refrigerator/freezer, and plenty of cookware, plates and utensils. Breakfast is on us, with your choice of oatmeal, hot sandwiches, yogurt and other favorites. Enjoy Mediterranean-style menu at our TRES restaurant, open for lunch and dinner. Our hotel is connected to Hilton Garden Inn Phoenix/Tempe University Research Park, which also has a restaurant serving breakfast and dinner. Make the most of Arizona’s pleasant weather at our outdoor pool and whirlpool, relax by the crackling fire pits, or go for a run on the jogging path. We also have a fitness center, business center, guest laundry facility, and convenience shop – all open 24 hours. Plan an event with 1,050 sq. ft. of Tempe, AZ meeting space.

name: DoubleTree Resort by Hilton Hotel Paradise Valley - Scottsdale
description:
Located minutes from downtown Scottsdale, Arizona and 12 miles from Phoenix Sky Harbor International Airport, DoubleTree Resort by Hilton Paradise Valley – Scottsdale offers a warm welcome and comfortable stay in tranquil surroundings. Relax in our beautifully landscaped property surrounded by lavish courtyards, cacti and palm trees.
Swim in one of our two outdoor pools, work out in the health club or enjoy a game of tennis or basketball. Our Scottsdale, AZ hotel offers a prime location in the heart of the city. Just steps from the hotel are great dining, nightlife and shopping options in Old Town. Visit the spa for a day of relaxation. Our complimentary shuttle is great for exploring the area.
Every spacious guest room at this Paradise Valley resort offers impressive views from your private balcony or patio. Upgrade to a suite for extra space and cozy bathrobes, private pool and spa in our Presidential Suite.
Refuel after a busy day in our restaurant, Asadero Cocina and Cantina, offering Southwestern cuisine. Our Made Market has you covered when you’re in a hurry. Enjoy a hot cup of Starbucks® coffee, bagel or sandwich. Stop by the Catina or the Azure Pool Bar for a cocktail or glass of wine.
With a range of function rooms including intimate boardrooms and grand ballrooms, we are a great choice amongst Scottsdale, AZ hotels to host your next meeting, corporate getaway or wedding.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Tucson - Reid Park
description:
Relax in the resort-style setting of DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Tucson – Reid Park, a great hotel in Tucson, Arizona. The moment you arrive, you’ll receive a warm chocolate chip cookie as a welcome gift. Surrounded by the Sonora Desert and four miles from downtown Tucson, the hotel is across the street from Reid Park featuring a zoo and golf courses. Take the complimentary shuttle to attractions within a 4-mile radius of the hotel.

Set on 14 acres of lushly landscaped grounds, this Tucson, AZ hotel boasts many recreational and relaxation facilities including a heated outdoor pool and whirlpool in a citrus tree-lined courtyard, a 24-hour fitness center, and gift shop. Dine at the Cactus Rose or the onsite Copper Rock Craft Eatery and savor contemporary Southwestern cuisine.

Host meetings and events in the picturesque setting, taking advantage of 22,000 sq. ft. of versatile space. Choose from the grand ballroom, several meeting rooms or an outdoor space, and rely on the expert events team to help organize the details. Keep in touch at the business center with useful services and enjoy the complimentary WiFi access in the lobby.

Wind down in a guest room with a 42-inch television, WiFi access, and modern amenities. Choose a suite for stunning views of the surrounding mountains or citrus courtyard.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Tucson East
description:
Discover the Embassy Suites by Hilton Tucson East hotel, conveniently located near the University of Arizona and a short drive from downtown Tucson. We're just 25 minutes from the Tucson International Airport, minutes from local businesses and popular attractions like the Arizona-Sonoran Desert Museum, Sabino Canyon and Park Place Mall.
Unwind in a stylish guest suite featuring a range of comfortable amenities including a separate living room with sofa bed, 50-inch flat-screen TV, complimentary WiFi, wet bar, refrigerator and microwave. Some suites offer stunning views of the Santa Catalina Mountain range. Upgrade to an Executive Suite for more space, a dining room and bedroom with a king-sized bed.
Start your day with an omelet from our free made-to-order breakfast or grab a coffee to go. Dine at 4 Elements Restaurant and Bar and discover Chef Rich’s menu, which incorporates seasonal products with a taste of the southwest. Spend a relaxing evening with your favorite beverage at the complimentary Evening Reception*.
Stay active during your stay in the 24-hour fitness center or consider a lap in our heated pool. Host a business meeting or special event at our Embassy Suites hotel, with rooms and ballrooms accommodating up to 280 guests. We combine custom packages and committed service to create memorable events the way they should be – effortless.
*Service of alcohol subject to state and local laws. Must be of legal drinking age.

name: Hilton Sedona Resort at Bell Rock
description:
Tranquility and elegance at this Sedona resort

Set against world-famous red rocks, Hilton Sedona Resort at Bell Rock is just minutes from shopping, dining, hiking, mountain bike trails and over 40 art galleries. Following a multi-million dollar renovation, our hotel boasts refreshed suites and a reimagined lobby, designed with locally-inspired elements that capture the essence of Sedona. Our facilities include a large outdoor pool, spa, sauna, steam room, fitness center, golf course and more.

Directions

Love On The Rocks

Relax, Reconnect, Recharge. Join us for an unforgettable Valentines Weekend. Two night minimum stay.

Book Now

Good to Know

  • On-site adventure concierge and hike shop
  • Patio or balcony, gas fireplace, microwave oven and small refrigerator in all suites and guest rooms
  • eforea: spa by Hilton and full service Athletic Club with outdoor cross-training arena
  • Two outdoor pools, three lighted tennis courts and on-site 18-hole championship golf course
  • Newly redesigned restaurant featuring patio dining and outdoor event space
  • 14,400 sq. ft. of indoor meeting space including two ballrooms

Meetings & Events

Looking for the perfect space for your meeting, special event or wedding? Request Proposal

Relax and unwind

Hilton Sedona Resort at Bell Rock offers deluxe guest rooms featuring WiFi access, an in-room fireplace, mini-fridge, microwave, flat panel LCD TVs and private balcony or patio. Select an exquisite two-room suite to enjoy the privacy of a separate bedroom and a dedicated living and dining area.

View all rooms

Picturesque location

Hilton Sedona Resort at Bell Rock is set amidst the spectacular beauty of the magnificent red rock formations surrounding Sedona, AZ and is located just 90 minutes north of Phoenix, AZ with the Grand Canyon two and a half hours away.

Local attractions

- Tlaquepaque crafts village
- Pink Jeep Tours
- Over 230 hiking and mountain bike trails
- Red Rock Scenic Byway
- Bell Rock and Cathedral Rock
- Sedona Golf Resort

Daily adventures

Venture out of the hotel to enjoy horseback riding, mountain biking, a jeep tour or even drifting through the skies in a hot air balloon, all just minutes away. Inside there are lots of things to keep you busy, too, including tennis, fitness classes, lap pool, spa and an 18-hole championship golf course.

Learn more

Vibrant dining

Kick back and recharge at our newly reinvented ShadowRock restaurant with outdoor porch, featuring comfort food with a flair. Gather after a day exploring Sedona’s high desert. Dine al fresco on the patio at the poolside Blue Water Café (seasonal), enjoy a snack at the Compass Café or order room service.

Dining

Weddings and events

The breathtaking beauty of Arizona's red rocks serves as a perfect backdrop for your destination wedding, special event or conference. With over 14,400 sq. ft. of meeting space, two ballrooms and four executive meeting rooms with the latest technology this hotel is perfect for Sedona events.

Plan an event

name: Pointe Hilton Tapatio Cliffs Resort
description:
Adventure awaits at Pointe Hilton Tapatio Cliffs Resort

With spectacular views of the Phoenix North Mountain Preserve from our 584 spacious suites, Pointe Hilton Tapatio Cliffs Resort is perfect for the active traveler or family vacation. Play golf at our 18-hole Troon course or unwind at The Falls Water Village, featuring two pools, waterfalls and private cabanas. A full-service spa, six additional pools and a range of restaurants are also available.
Directions

Another Day In Paradise
Treat yourself to a little longer in paradise by enjoying a free night with us.

View Details

Good to know

  • All-suite resort in Phoenix, 15 miles from Phoenix Sky Harbor International Airport
  • The Falls Water Village with 2 pools, a 138-foot waterslide and private cabanas
  • Award-winning on-site championship Troon golf course
  • Fitness center, 2 tennis/pickleball courts, Tocaloma Spa and Salon
  • 6 additional pools located throughout the resort
  • 36 meeting and banquet rooms, including outdoor reception venues in the heart of Phoenix

Meetings & Events

Looking for the perfect space for your meeting, special event or wedding? Request Proposal

Relaxing suites

Looking for a special treat? The Signature and Ambassador Suites offer an expanded layout and a spacious bathroom with vanity, perfect for a romantic getaway. We now feature PURE® Wellness accommodations, which are nearly 99.9% allergen-free, an experience that enhances your well-being so you can sleep better and be at your best.

Suites

Premier golf course

The highly praised greens of Lookout Mountain Golf Club were designed by Bill Johnston and Forrest Richardson. Test your game, take lessons with a pro and experience this world-class Troon course given a Four-Star Award by Golf Digest.

Local attractions

• Lookout Mountain Golf Club
• North Mountain Visitor Center
• Chase Field & State Farm Stadium
• Downtown Pheonix cityscapes
• Cactus League Spring Training - 10 Stadiums

Amazing amenities

As well as outdoor activities, our hotel offers a wealth of spa and beauty treatments at Tocaloma Spa and Salon. Looking to keep up with your fitness routine? The Precor® Fitness Center features weights and cardio machines. Children can enjoy a range of fun activities at Kids Korral in the spring and summer.

Amenities and services

Dine in style

The award-winning Different Pointe of View offers modern American Cuisine and stunning views of the surrounding landscape, while Pointe In Tyme will tempt your taste buds with traditional steak and seafood favorites. Looking to relax? Cascades Café offers casual dining by the pool.

Dining

Meet in Phoenix

With 36 meeting rooms, stunning views of the surrounding landscapes and outdoor venues, Pointe Hilton Tapatio Cliffs Resort in Phoenix is the perfect setting for a special event or corporate meeting. Looking for a spectacular wedding setting? Our large ballroom can cater to 1,200 guests.

Plan an Event

name: Pointe Hilton Squaw Peak Resort
description:
An all-suite, all-fun resort in Phoenix

Fun days by the pool. Relaxing at the spa. Award-winning Coyote Camp for kids. Pointe Hilton Squaw Peak Resort, a mountainside Phoenix retreat, offers activities for the whole family. Check out our Hole-in-the-Wall River Ranch, complete with four acres of pools, lazy river, waterslide, miniature golf, and four tennis courts. With all-suite accommodations, you'll find plenty of space to feel right at home. View our resort map.

Directions

Good to know

  • All-suite resort near downtown Phoenix and Scottsdale
  • Exclusive concierge, pool at redesigned Agave Suites at North Pointe
  • River Ranch Water Park with pools, waterslide and lazy river
  • Tocasierra Spa & Salon, fitness center, tennis courts, miniature golf
  • Poolside dining, seasonal barbeque and Rico's American Grill
  • 48,000 sq. ft. meeting & event space, indoor/outdoor receptions

Meetings & Events

Looking for the perfect space for your meeting, special event or wedding? Request Proposal

Space for the family

From spacious studios to three-bedroom Casitas with their own car port, there's a suite to fit your needs at Pointe Hilton Squaw Peak Resort. Each suite offers modern amenities including WiFi, HDTV, and plenty of living space.

Rooms & Suites

What's nearby?

When you're ready to explore you’ll find lots to do nearby. Nature fans can hike or horseback ride in the stunning Sonoran Desert. Shopping more your thing? Head to Biltmore Fashion Park to indulge in some retail therapy. Old Town Scottsdale and downtown Phoenix are also easily accessible from the hotel.

Time to relax

Need to unwind? Choose from a range of relaxing treatments at Tocasierra Spa & Salon.

Find out more

A whole lot of fun

Enjoy the Arizona sunshine at our popular River Ranch Water Park, complete with waterfalls, a water slide, lazy river and multiple pools. Stay active on our tennis and basketball courts, nearby hiking trails or in our spacious fitness center. There's always something fun to fill your time.

Things to Do

Delicious dining options

Located in an old ranch house, Hole-in-the-Wall is a seasonal venue with great fare. Choose Rico’s American Grill for breakfast, lunch, and dinner inside or on the patio. Grab a bite by the pool at Slim Picken’s – there’s something for everyone!

Dining

Meetings and Events

Set in 27 acres of beautifully-landscaped grounds, Pointe Hilton Squaw Peak Resort is the ultimate venue for meetings, weddings, events, and corporate retreats. With more than 48,000 sq. ft. of indoor/outdoor event space and professional event staff on hand, let us help make your unique vision a reality.

Plan A Meeting

name: Hilton Scottsdale Resort & Villas
description:
Relaxing spa and resort in Scottsdale, AZ

Experience breathtaking Camelback Mountain views from our AAA Four Diamond Scottsdale resort. Hilton Scottsdale Resort & Villas offers two-bedroom villas that sleep up to eight with a full kitchen and dining area. Plan your next event in the 25,000 sq. ft. of indoor and outdoor space for up to 800 people. Our complimentary shuttle service takes you where you need to go. 

Hotel Video

Directions

Hotel facts

  • 2-bedroom villas with private pool access
  • Complimentary shuttle service
  • Walking distance to restaurants
  • Close to Arizona State University
  • 25,000 sq. ft. event space

Highlights

  • Resort atmosphere with breathtaking views of Camelback Mountain
  • 1,600 sq. ft. two-bedroom villas with private patio and full kitchen
  • Three restaurants: BlueFire Grille, Fleming’s Steakhouse and Oasis Bar
  • Wellness center with spa, cardio equipment and outdoor heated pool
  • 25,000 sq. ft. of versatile indoor and outdoor space for up to 800
  • Complimentary shuttle within two-mile radius including Old Town Scottsdale

Meetings & Events

Looking for the perfect space for your meeting, special event or wedding? Request Proposal

Rooms and suites

Experience our private two-bedroom villas with endless amenities. Ranging between 1,600 - 1,800 sq. ft., the villas offer privacy and space to sleep eight comfortably. The master bedroom has one king-sized bed and the other has two double beds. Explore our other types of rooms and amenities for the space that's right for you.

Rooms & Suites

Things to do

  • Old Town Scottsdale
  • Championship golf courses
  • Spring Training - Salt River and Scottsdale stadiums
  • Scottsdale Fashion Square Mall
  • Camelback Mountain

Spa

Be well and relax at Beyond Massage Therapy, a Scottsdale spa located within the fitness center of Hilton Scottsdale Resort & Villas.

Hotel amenities

Find plenty of amenities including two outdoor pools, three restaurants/bars and a Wellness Center with spa and fitness center. Dine on a tender steak at Fleming's Steakhouse or Southwest cuisine at BlueFire Grille. Explore Old Town Scottsdale with our complimentary shuttle within a two-mile radius.

Amenities

Dining at our hotel

Visit any of our three on-site restaurants for a delicious breakfast, lunch or dinner. Stop by Bluefire Grille for a taste of the southwest for any meal of the day. Enjoy a cold beverage or quick bite to eat by the pool at Oasis Bar & Grille. Sit down for the finest steaks, seafood and wines at Fleming’s Prime Steakhouse.

Dining

Meeting space

Our resort features a range of meeting spaces, from a large conference in one of our two ballrooms to a wedding reception in our climate-controlled outdoor pavilion (seasonal). An idyllic Phoenix wedding venue, the poolside Oasis Bar is the perfect spot to socialize before and after the ceremony.

Plan an Event

name: El Conquistador Tucson, A Hilton Resort
description:
Discover a desert oasis at our Tucson, AZ hotel

Discover a uniquely Southwest experience at our Hilton resort in Tucson, AZ. Feel the stress melt away under the Arizona sun at El Conquistador Tucson, A Hilton Resort. Spend the day on the golf course, poolside or at the spa. Lush desert terrain, tropical drinks and southwestern décor welcome your arrival to the foothills of the Santa Catalina Mountains. With suites offering private patios and balconies, enjoy unmatched views and sunsets.
Directions

Highlights

  • 428 spacious guest rooms, suites & available 1 or 2 bedroom casitas at the resort
  • 5 outdoor swimming pools featuring a 143-foot waterslide, kids' pool, hot and cold jetted tubs and adult-only pool
  • More than 100,000 sq. ft. of flexible indoor & outdoor meeting & event space
  • Four restaurants with a variety of Southwest-style dining options, including Last Territory
  • Recipient of 34 consecutive AAA 4-Diamond Awards

Meetings & Events

Looking for the perfect space for your meeting, special event or wedding? Request Proposal

Choose your view

Select the view that's best for your stay in Tucson and enjoy unmatched sunset views from our resort. Guestrooms, suites and 1 or 2 bedroom casitas are offered at our resort.

View our rooms

Hotel Facts

  • 45 minutes from Tucson International Airport
  • 13 miles from Tucson Convention Center
  • Only IACC-approved venue in Southern Arizona
  • Situated on 500 acres
  • On-site Elements Spa with a variety of massages and wraps

We love pets.

We are a pet-friendly hotel.

An outdoor oasis

Bask in the southwestern sun with a game of tennis or golf and cool down in the pool. Enjoy miles of equestrian, birding and hiking trails at Catalina State Park and Coronado National Forest. Work on an outdoor patio with WiFi or get away from it all in a private Casita Suite.        

Our amenities

4 distinctive restaurants

With 4 restaurants at the resort, enjoy locally and culturally inspired cuisine. Grab a Starbucks coffee to start your day. Stay in your bathing suit for lunch at Desert Springs Grill or try some locally sourced specialties at Epazote Kitchen.

Our restaurants

Outdoor weddings

Sunset Point provides a grass terraced venue ideal for ceremonies, receptions and luncheons. Take your vows in the warm sun or under the starry skies. The temperate climate is ideal for outdoor events.

Events at our hotel

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hot Springs
description:
Enjoy modern design and stunning lake views when you choose DoubleTree by Hilton Hot Springs for your stay. Explore the Lake Hamilton area, with direct lake access, or take a short trip to Oaklawn for the races. Our hotel is a great option for your next corporate meeting, convention or family reunion.
Experience a warm greeting as well as our signature DoubleTree Chocolate Chip Cookie upon your check-in. Have your choice of a modern designed guest room with complimentary WiFi, work desk, USB outlets, and more. Upgrade for lake views or choose a suite for a more spacious stay.
Dine in our Made Market Restaurant that features clean and simple American inspired food. Use our room service and eat in the comfort of your room during our restaurant’s operating hours. Are you looking for a modern setting and a cocktail or beer? visit the Made Market Bar. Visit the Made Market pantry for grab and go and fresh items.
Our Hot Springs hotel is located right on the lake, ideal for all kinds of activities. Take a dip in our lakeside pool or bring your boat and make use of our lake access and boat docks. Stay connected or up to date with business in our business/connectivity center. Keep up with your fitness routine in our modern fitness center. At DoubleTree by Hilton Hot Springs we have all you need for a positive stay.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Hot Springs Hotel & Spa
description:
The Embassy Suites Hot Springs – Hotel & Spa is ideally located within Hot Springs National Park, Arkansas. Unlike other Hot Springs, Arkansas hotels, we are connected to Bank of the Ozarks Arena and the Hot Springs Convention Center. Our hotel is only 3 miles from Memorial Field Airport (HOT). Easily access attractions such as Bathhouse Row, mountain biking at Hot Springs Northwoods Trail System, the Gangster Museum of America, Oaklawn Racing & Gaming and companies like Weyerhaeuser and Triumph.
Decorated in warm, soothing tones, our Hot Springs, Arkansas hotel offers spacious, well-equipped suites featuring a private bedroom and separate living area. Watch a movie with the whole family on one of two flat-screen TVs or catch up with emails using high-speed internet access. Unwind on the comfortable sofa bed or prepare a snack using the kitchenette.
Our Hot Springs, Arkansas hotel is an all-suite, full-service hotel with a dedicated event staff to help plan your business meeting or event. Attend to business affairs in our complimentary, 24-hour BusinessLink™ business center. Enjoy a sumptuous, complimentary made-to-order breakfast in our open-air atrium. In the evenings, join us for the complimentary Evening Reception with snacks and beverages*. Indulge in a treatment from Spa Botanica or work out in our fitness center or indoor pool.
* Service of alcohol subject to state and local laws. Must be of legal drinking age.

name: Embassy Suites Northwest Arkansas - Hotel, Spa & Convention Center
description:
Relax and stay connected at Embassy Suites Northwest Arkansas - Hotel, Spa & Convention Center, located in Rogers, Arkansas. Enjoy easy access to the home offices of WalMart and Tyson Foods. The cities of Bentonville, Springdale, and Fayetteville are located a short drive away. Take our complimentary shuttle service to restaurants and attractions within a five-mile radius of our Embassy Suites hotel in Rogers, AR.
Whether you are hosting a meeting for 15 or 4,000, our extensive meeting venues cater to your every need. Keep in touch at the BusinessLink™ Business Center with an array of supportive services and complimentary internet access.
Beautifully decorated to make you feel at home, each spacious two-room suite features a private bedroom and living room equipped with two HDTVs, a coffeemaker, internet access, a refrigerator, microwave and sofa bed.
Begin your day with a complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast each morning and wind down with beverages at our complimentary Evening Reception* in the open-air atrium. Savor American cuisine for lunch and dinner at Cedar Creek Bistro or perk up with a Starbucks® coffee at Caffeina's Marketplace Café.
Indulge in a treatment at our Spa Botanica, a pampering amenity unique among hotels in Rogers, AR. Swim in the heated, indoor pool with a whirlpool and sauna or work out at the complimentary fitness center featuring the latest cardiovascular and strength equipment.
* Service of alcohol subject to state and local laws. Must be of legal drinking age.

name: Hampton Inn Irvine Spectrum Lake Forest
description: The Hampton Inn Irvine Spectrum Lake Forest hotel is off I-5, a short drive from local shops, restaurants, and major business parks. The Big Air Trampoline Park, Laguna Woods Golf Club, and Irvine Spectrum Center are within 10 minutes. Laguna Beach is nine miles away and Newport Beach is a half-hour drive. Enjoy our bar and meeting space for up to 200 guests. Daily hot breakfast and WiFi are on us.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel & Spa Napa Valley - American Canyon
description:
Located eight miles from Napa, CA, you’ll find a tranquil retreat at the world’s first Gold LEED-certified hotel, the DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel & Spa Napa Valley - American Canyon. First, receive a freshly baked DoubleTree chocolate chip cookie upon arrival. Then, our attentive staff will handle all important details of your stay. Sleep in a king or double queen guest room with an HDTV and complimentary WiFi.
De-stress at Spa Gaia with a range of restorative treatments that blend the latest in skin care and healthy lifestyle philosophies with traditional eastern therapies. Dine at Table 29 Bistro & Bar to enjoy the freshest, locally-grown ingredients for breakfast, lunch or dinner – with a tasty wine list and happy hour menu (local laws apply) including Napa wine selections. Additional hotel amenities include: an outdoor pool and whirlpool spa, 24-hour fitness room with modern workout equipment, 24-hour complimentary business center, hotel bar area, concierge desk, room service, multi-lingual staff and free self-parking.
Start planning your meeting, retreat or wedding in one of our five diverse meeting rooms for up to 250 guests, or choose to host your event on our outdoor event deck. Enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout all public areas of our hotel. Doing business with us a pleasure.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Fullerton
description:
Explore Orange County from our DoubleTree by Hilton Fullerton hotel. Located just 20 minutes from John Wayne Airport (SNA), we’re just three blocks from the California State University Fullerton campus, five miles from the Nixon Library and just 10 miles from Disneyland®, Anaheim’s theme parks and major corporations.
Relax in a contemporary guest room with WiFi access, a 50-inch HDTV and Keurig® coffeemaker and room service. Opt for a suite featuring a separate living area, full kitchen and balcony. Some suites also feature Five Feet to Fitness in-room workout equipment.
After a busy day of sightseeing, take a relaxing swim in the outdoor pool or enjoy an invigorating workout in the fitness center. Savor a delectable meal at 57 Bar & Grill, our onsite restaurant, and enjoy a tasty after dinner cocktail at our Lobby Bar.
Let us help plan your next conference or special event for up to 200 guests in our event room or one of our Ballrooms. Our team can provide state-of-the-art A/V equipment and first-class catering services. Our Lobby business center is always open for your convenience and offers printing and copying services.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Golf Resort Palm Springs
description:
Named among Palm Springs Life Magazine’s best hotels and resorts, the recently renovated DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Golf Resort Palm Springs sits at the foot of the San Jacinto Mountains. The desert landscape inspired our new design with neutral colors, wood accents and splashes of color.
Recharge in one of our spacious guest rooms, which feature either a king or two queen beds. Our updated rooms include free WiFi, a 49-inch TV and mini-refrigerator. All rooms have either a patio or balcony, perfect for enjoying the panoramic views. For more space choose a suite, which has a living room, dining room and two bathrooms.
Our Palm Springs resort boasts a 27-hole championship golf course with views of the mountains and lake. Get pampered at The Spa At Desert Princess with a massage or facial. Swim in our Olympic-sized pool, which features two hot tubs, private cabanas and a 5,000 sq. ft. sundeck. Burn some calories in our modern fitness center featuring state-of-the-art equipment.
Dine at either of the two new restaurants added during the renovation or choose room service. Polanco Kitchen, which serves Southern California inspired cuisine. Mira Bar features mountain views, indoor or outdoor seating and is the perfect place to watch sports.
Enjoy 23,000 sq. ft. of flexible meeting and event space. Host a business conference or dream wedding for up to 1,200 guests in the Mesquite Ballroom or use the majestic San Jacinto Mountains as a beautiful backdrop for an outdoor wedding.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Mandalay Beach Resort
description:
The oceanfront Embassy Suites Mandalay Beach - Hotel & Resort in Oxnard, CA is the only southern California all-suite beachfront resort, located by the beautiful Channel Islands Harbor.
This California vacation destination is situated near Ventura, Ojai, Camarillo, Malibu and Port Hueneme, and is sandwiched between Los Angeles and Santa Barbara. Enjoy your vacation time in Oxnard to the fullest using local area transportation.
All 250 rooms at the Embassy Suites Mandalay Beach Resort are beautifully decorated with a private bedroom and a spacious living room, and two full marble baths. Use the Hilton Honors app on your smartphone to access your suite's Digital Key. Our oceanfront property spans 8.5 acres, giving you spectacular views of the ocean, sparkling pool with cascading waterfalls, exotic gardens, and streaming lagoons.
This southern CA resort also offers the perfect location for a beautiful beach ceremony, beach and garden wedding reception, meeting, or special event in Oxnard. Amidst 16,000 sq. ft. of flexible tropical splendor and serenity, this beach hotel is ready to cater to all of your function's needs.
Guests on business appreciate the complimentary BusinessLink™ Business Center with printing services, as well as internet access throughout the hotel. Enjoy the complimentary made-to-order breakfast to start your day, as well as a complimentary Evening Reception*.
* Service of alcohol subject to state and local laws. Must be of legal drinking age.

name: Miramonte Indian Wells Resort & Spa, Curio Collection by Hilton
description:
Miramonte Indian Wells Resort & Spa, Curio Collection by Hilton is a peaceful desert oasis nestled at the base of the Santa Rosa Mountains. Set amid olive trees and citrus groves, you’ll feel immediately at ease and at home at our Palm Springs resort, with an award-winning spa and world-class golf right at your fingertips. Our location in prestigious Indian Wells provides easy access to music festivals in the East Valley as well as downtown Palm Springs in the West Valley.
Settle into a newly refreshed guest room with contemporary décor, a 42-inch HDTV, WiFi access and Juliet-style balcony. Suites offer a larger living area, TV and patio/balcony, and our Villa Suites feature a dining area and separate shower/soaking tub. For the ultimate stay, choose our 1,100 sq. ft. Miramonte Suite with residence-like amenities.
Our signature restaurant, Citrus & Palm, is an experience that’s entirely unique in the Palm Springs valley, with many ingredients grown here at the resort or in partnership with local farmers. The Tavern bar features hand-crafted cocktails with herbs from our gardens as well as a local Koffi coffee area.
Play golf on your choice of two premier 18-hole courses or spend an indulgent day at the Well Spa. Our Palm Springs resort also has three swimming pools, a fitness center and wellness classes for your enjoyment. Plan a business meeting or destination wedding in over 35,000 sq. ft. of event space, including a 6,000 sq. ft. ballroom and lush outdoor settings.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton    La Quinta Hotel & Spa
description:
The Embassy Suites La Quinta - Hotel & Spa is the ideal place for relaxing spa breaks, leisurely vacations and local business trips. This all-suite hotel is located in the picturesque Palm Springs valley, playing host to some of the most spectacular golf courses in the country. Relax in a two-room suite offering thoughtful amenities such as WiFi, two televisions, and telephones in both the living room and bedroom. Enjoy the view of the pool from your patio.
The hotel atrium is the heart of this hotel in La Quinta,  CA. Enjoy the ambiance of the modern water feature during the complimentary breakfast or Evening Reception*. The open-air atrium is also home to Terra Bistro, serving lunch and dinner daily. This inviting space boasts several seating areas where guests can view the big screen TV or chat with friends,  family or colleagues.
Take advantage of our complimentary 24-hour BusinessLink™ business center offering professional secretarial and printing service. Book a meeting or host an event in this Palm Springs/Palm Desert area hotel. With easy access to the atrium, the ballrooms work well for meetings and banquets of various sizes. For smaller groups or breakout sessions, the room can be divided into size-appropriate rooms using sound-resistant air walls.
*Service of alcohol subject to state and local laws. Must be of legal drinking age.

name: Hotel del Coronado, Curio Collection by Hilton
description:
On the edge of the Pacific Ocean where powdery white sands sparkle like gold, the legendary Hotel del Coronado, Curio Collection by Hilton offers a magical seaside experience. An iconic presence since 1888, Hotel del Coronado combines majestic Victorian architecture, modern luxuries and beachfront recreation for a resort experience that’s uniquely Southern California.
Choose from ocean, partial ocean or resort view rooms in the charming Victorian building, Ocean Towers or newly upgraded Cabanas. Spacious suites feature options such as a living room, private balcony, multiple bedrooms and ocean-themed kid’s rooms. Stay in a beachfront cottage or ocean view villa at Beach Village at The Del, an exclusive enclave within the hotel grounds.
From upscale bistros overlooking the ocean to alfresco fire pits with front-row views of the sunset, drinks and dining at Hotel del Coronado feature an incomparable coastal backdrop. Discover a new adventure each day with seven gourmet restaurants and five lively lounges.
Immerse in beach life with Hotel del Coronado’s resort amenities. Relax into ocean-inspired treatments at Spa at The Del, or take a cutting-edge class such as Beach Spin, Sunrise Yoga or Mermaid Fitness along the sparkling shore.
Plan an oceanfront meeting or celebrate the love story of a lifetime in our breathtaking wedding venues. With 65,000 sq. ft. of event space, Hotel del Coronado is a one-of-a-kind destination for beach weddings and special occasions in San Diego.

name: Beach Village at The Del, Curio Collection by Hilton
description:
Welcome to Beach Village at The Del, Curio Collection by Hilton, an exclusive enclave of residential cottages and villas along the golden sands of Coronado Beach. Located within Hotel del Coronado, Beach Village offers luxurious resort amenities, highly personalized concierge service and a secluded seaside charm.
Beach Village’s cottages and villas are just steps from the sand and provide immediate beach access and stunning ocean views. Choose luxurious guest rooms and suites from one to three bedrooms, each offering ultra-stylish interiors with a cozy fireplace, marble bathroom, and patio or balcony. Suites offer plush amenities including a gourmet kitchen, dining area and living room. Several suites also feature outdoor fire pits and soaking tubs.
Begin each morning with a beachfront breakfast in the exclusive Windsor Cottage. You’ll find multiple restaurants and bars throughout Hotel del Coronado with breathtaking ocean views and locally inspired cuisine.
From ocean-inspired spa treatments to private beach bonfires, surf camps and clambakes, Beach Village at The Del offers the best of the Southern California lifestyle. Relax into ocean-inspired treatments at Spa at The Del, experience a cutting-edge Beach Spin, Sunrise Yoga or Mermaid Fitness class. Or enjoy a peaceful swim in the secluded pools and hot tubs scattered throughout Beach Village's private grounds.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites El Cajon San Diego
description: We are off San Vicente Freeway and I-8 in El Cajon, California. The Parkway Plaza Mall, Walmart, Target, and other shopping opportunities are less than a mile away. Both Venture and Cuyamaca Business Parks as well as the San Diego Air & Space Museum are within a three-mile radius. Stay in and enjoy our cozy fireplace.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Modesto
description:
Located in the heart of downtown Modesto, CA, the DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Modesto offers you a warm welcome with a famous DoubleTree cookie and a great place to stay while exploring Modesto or attending an event at the Centre Plaza. Conveniently located on Highway 99, Modesto is easily accessible from throughout California. Stay busy and keep in touch in the 24-hour business center. Complimentary WiFi lets you get work done in your bright and airy California-style guest room or suite.
Soak up the sun as you take a swim in the outdoor pool, open from 6:00 am -10:00 pm. Keep up your exercise routine with a visit to the fully equipped 24-hour fitness center or treat yourself to a massage or facial in the Erin Milan Salon & Spa. Refuel and catch up with friends in Maxi’s restaurant. Choose from a range of fresh California cuisine or start your day off in style with a cooked-to-order full American breakfast. With 25 flexible meeting rooms, from intimate boardrooms to grand ballrooms, this hotel is an ideal choice as a Modesto meeting venue, or the perfect setting for your important celebration.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Sonoma Wine Country
description:
Centrally located in one of the most beautiful regions of Northern California, the DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Sonoma Wine Country awaits you. Nestled within two 18 hole championship golf courses, the hotel features roses, vines and our Chef’s herb garden, echoing our Sonoma Wine Country surroundings. Relax in our open lobby in front of the fireplace, or grab a glass of wine and enjoy the outdoor patios, then retire to a spacious guest room.
The perfect ‘base camp’ for your wine country getaway, explore the diversity of Sonoma county, all within a 30-minute drive. Visit over 400 well-known wineries, zip line through the Redwoods, visit the rugged Bodega Coastline or take in a world class musical performance at the Green Music Center. With San Francisco and Napa Valley less than an hour away, you have reason to stay another day!

name: Hilton Oakland Airport
description:
Iconic Oakland Airport Hotel

Hilton Oakland Airport is a comfortable retreat, featuring a complimentary shuttle service to Oakland International Airport. Our hotel is situated very close to Oakland Coliseum. Set in a 12 acre, resort-like setting, we are two miles from the Bay Area Rapid Transit (BART) system, with subway access to San Francisco and the greater Bay Area. Enjoy business and leisure amenities, including a fitness center, outdoor pool, indoor/outdoor event space, and our dining options for Breakfast, Lunch & Dinner.

Directions

Fast Facts

  • Complimentary shuttle to Oakland Airport
  • Fitness center and outdoor pool
  • 24-hour business center
  • 16,000 sq. ft. indoor/outdoor event space
  • Earhart's Tavern
  • Amelia's Café

Good to Know

  • Located less than a mile from Oakland International Airport (OAK)
  • Near Oakland Coliseum and Oracle Arena
  • 2 miles from Bay Area Rapid Transit, with subway access to downtown San Francisco
  • Pet-friendly guest rooms available
  • Complimentary Oakland Airport (OAK) shuttle from 4 am–2 am

Meetings & Events

Looking for the perfect space for your meeting, special event or wedding? Request Proposal

Rooms and Suites

Unwind in a spacious guest room, equipped with a comfy Hilton Serenity Bed, a 37-inch TV and WiFi. One and two-bedroom suites are also available, offering more space and amenities including a refrigerator and a sofa. For the ultimate stay, choose a luxury suite for a wet bar and a dining table.

View more

Location, location, location

Our Oakland hotel is only two miles from the BART system, and is not only convenient for getting to the airport and downtown San Francisco, but also offers a fantastic base for sightseeing around the Oakland area. Oakland Zoo and Jack London Square on the waterfront are both just a short drive away.

 

Local Attractions

  • Oakland Coliseum
  • Oracle Arena
  • Oakland Zoo and Oakland Museum
  • Jack London Square waterfront dining and shops
  • Downtown San Francisco via BART

Fitness and Recreation

It’s easy to keep up with your exercise routine when you stay at Hilton Oakland Airport. Work out with the latest cardio, resistance and weights equipment in the fitness center, or unwind with a dip in the heated outdoor swimming pool.

Bars and Restaurants

Get your day off to a great start with a delicious Hilton breakfast buffet in the aviation-themed Amelia's Café. Cheer on your favorite sports team as you watch the big game on one of 13 HDTVs at the Earhart's Tavern.

Our venues

Meetings and Events

name: Parc 55 San Francisco - a Hilton Hotel
description:
Contemporary high-rise in the heart of Union Square

Hop on San Francisco's iconic cable cars, located steps from the hotel. Or enjoy the world-class shopping and live theater in Union Square. Wherever your adventures take you, Parc 55 is a convenient home base for exploring one of America's favorite cities. As a major conference hotel, we also offer thoughtful accommodations and flexible meeting space for business travelers and conventioneers.

 
Directions

Chase Center Partner
Get your game on and extend your weekend to save up to 50% on Sunday night stays.

Property highlights

  • Central downtown San Francisco location, with views of the city and bay
  • Walking distance to Cable Cars, Union Square, Powell St. MUNI & BART Station and Moscone Convention Center
  • 24-Hour Fitness Center
  • Full-service restaurant and FedEx business center on site

Meetings & Events

Looking for the perfect space for your meeting, special event or wedding? Request Proposal

An urban retreat

After a busy day in the city, enjoy WiFi, cable TV, and all of the comforts of home in your spacious guest room or suite. Upgrade to a Deluxe View room to enjoy panoramic views, or take advantage of our state-of-the-art 5 Feet to Fitness™ rooms, a Hilton exclusive.

Rooms and Suites

Getting around

Public transit options abound in Union Square, making our neighborhood an ideal home base for exploring the city. San Francisco's iconic cable cars, MUNI & BART trains, and historic street cars all have stops within a three-minute walk from the hotel.

Pets welcome

We look forward to hosting your four-legged family members!

Pet Policy

Amenities and services

The 55 Fitness Center is ideal for a workout, with cardio and weight equipment, to keep up with your fitness routine on the road. Here on business? FedEx offers faxing, printing and shipping capabilities and the hotel provides on-site valet parking for added ease.

Amenities and Services

Indulge in California cuisine

Taste the many flavors of the Bay Area at Cable 55, our signature restaurant and bar serving a variety of locally inspired dishes and California wines. Also located on property is Kin Khao, a Michelin rated Thai restaurant.

Dining

Meet in San Francisco

With more than 30,000 sq. ft. of flexible meeting space and a buzzing atmosphere, Parc 55 San Francisco hotel is the perfect venue for business meetings and social events in downtown San Francisco. Looking to plan your special day? Our hotel offers a professional catering service and a dedicated events team.

Plan an Event

name: Hilton San Francisco Union Square
description:
Hotel in the San Francisco Theater District

The largest hotel on the West Coast, Hilton San Francisco Union Square embodies the energetic spirit that makes our city one of the world's most popular business and tourism destinations. Located in the heart of downtown near bustling Union Square, we’ve proudly delivered world-class accommodations, exceptional food and beverage offerings, and Hilton’s distinct brand of hospitality for more than 55 years.
Directions

Spend a long weekend in Dub Nation: save up to 50% on Sunday night stays.

Book Now

Property highlights

  • Cityscape Lounge, the city's tallest skybar with inventive cocktails
  • Two full-service restaurants, a lobby bar, and grab-and-go café
  • Outdoor pool and whirlpool
  • Convention hotel with award-winning banquet offerings
  • On-site parking, fitness center, and business center

Meetings & Events

Looking for the perfect space for your meeting, special event or wedding? Request Proposal

Rooms and suites

Searching for a suite with a balcony and sweeping views? We've got it. A family-friendly room overlooking the pool? We've got those, too. Explore our Rooms & Suites offerings and select the ideal home base for your stay in the City by the Bay.

Rooms & Suites

Explore Union Square

Enjoy shopping from popular stores along Market Street or luxury retailers along Maiden Lane. Catch a world-class production at historic theaters like The Curran and The Geary, or stop for an impromptu street performance at the bustling Powell Street cable car turnaround. Many of the city's best art galleries, bars and restaurants are in or around Union Square, making it the ideal starting point for any San Francisco adventure.

Getting around

San Francisco's iconic cable cars, historic street cars, and MUNI & BART public transit lines all have stops within a 5 minute walk of the hotel.

Inspired gatherings

From boardroom meetings to massive international conferences, we cater to events of all sizes with a variety of modern and customizable meeting spaces. Our innovative team of event planners, caterers and award-winning banquet chefs will work closely with you to ensure your event is the talk of the town.

Plan a meeting or event

Drinks and dining

Enjoy an expansive breakfast buffet at Poached, local cuisine and craft beer at Urban Tavern, and grab-and-go coffee and snacks at Herb N' Kitchen. When it's time for a cocktail, The Lobby Bar is a great spot for people watching, while Cityscape Lounge offers some of the best views and most inventive cocktails in the city.

View our Outlets

Wellness options

Unwind from a busy day of work or sightseeing in our heated outdoor pool and whirlpool, open year-round. We also have an expansive fitness center featuring state-of-the-art Precor cardio equipment, free weights, stretching mats and more.

Amenities & Services

name: Hilton Anaheim
description:
Family-friendly hotel in the heart of Orange County

Our fantastic location across the street from Anaheim Convention Center and just one mile from Disneyland® Resort, makes us the perfect choice when visiting sunny Orange County. Inside the hotel, visit the Disney® Desk, where cast members will offer expert advice, provide tickets and organize a shuttle service to the world-class attractions. Comfortable rooms and suites, fantastic dining and first-class facilities for business and recreation all combine to ensure you have an unforgettable stay in Anaheim, California.

Buy Tickets, Make Dining Reservations, and Plan Your Trip.

Sun-seekers will love deck-access rooms, and spacious suites offer families and executives double the living space.

Rooms & suites

While you're in town

Located in the heart of Orange County, Hilton Anaheim is close to world-class shopping, dining and entertainment. Visit Garden Walk, for all three under one roof or spend a day basking in the sun at Newport Beach. Guests of this ‘Disney Good Neighbor’ hotel benefit from special tips, discounts and convenient access to the world-famous Disneyland® Resort, just 1 mile away.

The outdoor pool features a water slide and is ideal for families, which means you can indulge in a soothing spa treatment while the children make new friends at the Kids' Club water play area!

name: Hilton Palm Springs
description:
Desert retreat in downtown village of Palm Springs

Welcome to the Hilton Palm Springs hotel in Southern California. Located downtown in the desirable village of Palm Springs, this stunning desert retreat is situated at the foot of the spectacular San Jacinto Mountains. Work out in the modern fitness center, rejuvenate at Elements Spa or simply relax with a cocktail from the Al Fresco bar by the outdoor pool.

Our on-site spa offers an assortment of rejuvenating services. Indulge in a Swedish, deep-tissue or reflexology foot massage. Exfoliate, revitalize and purify your skin with various facials and skin treatments. Pamper yourself with manicures, pedicures and more.

name: The Beverly Hilton
description:
The Beverly Hilton: a true Hollywood experience

Opened in 1955 by distinguished hotelier Conrad Hilton, The Beverly Hilton combines the excitement and entertainment of Hollywood with the prestige of Beverly Hills. Nestled at the crossroads of the iconic Wilshire and Santa Monica Boulevards, the hotel features 569 guest rooms designed to evoke the best of relaxed Californian living, including 101 suites with panoramic city views and indoor-outdoor living spaces. Consider the nine private luxury suites within The Penthouse Collection.

 

Directions Email us

Beverly Hilton LIVE

From history to glam, the Beverly Hilton has become a legend — hosting many of the world’s iconic guests and important events.

Play Video

Video Transcript

The Beverly Hilton is at the heart of Hollywood’s

most memorable moments in history.

Since opening in 1955, this legendary hotel

has seamlessly combined the glamour of Tinsel

Town with the prestige of Beverly Hills in

order to host so many of the world’s most

iconic guests and important events.

From presidents, politicians and royalty

To major athletes, musicians and celebrities

No other hotel equals the guest list of global

trendsetters, tastemakers and industry leaders

Or its annual roster of countless red-carpet

galas and international conferences.

The Beverly Hilton’s renowned International Ballroom

has hosted the star-studded Golden Globe Awards with spectacular style and grace since 1961.

This Hotel has become home to Clive Davis’s Pre- Grammy Gala

and so many more international events.

Over a billion dollars has been raised through

celebrity-centric charities held at the hotel.

The Beverly Hilton is also where Hollywood comes to work.

Major feature films and television shows are often filmed throughout the hotel

including the 2013 Best Picture of the Year winner Argo.

The gorgeous suites and storied settings also provide

the perfect backdrop for celebrity

photo shoots and magazine editorials.

The industry-savvy staff also regularly welcomes

worldwide press junkets and releases for some

of entertainments biggest blockbusters, best

sellers, and mega-hits.

The Beverly Hilton is where Hollywood always

comes to play.

No other hotel hosts more parties in one night.

Over 60,000 square feet of indoor and open-air space

the most experienced service in the

industry and the property’s state- of-the-art

event production technology allows for HBO,

InStyle, Warner Brothers, NBC/Universal and

every other entertainment company to spare

no expense throwing exclusive viewing parties

and envy-inducing events.

From dazzling red carpet events and business

meetings to relaxing vacations

And key moments in Hollywood history, this is the

place to see-and-be-seen...

Welcome to The Beverly Hilton.

Top Features

  • Many rooms and suites offer outdoor living spaces and sweeping views of the Hollywood Hills
  • The Aqua Star Pool is Beverly Hills’ largest pool and is the setting for many photo and film shoots
  • Home of the Golden Globe Awards and over 100 annual red carpet galas
  • Upgrade Labs, a luxurious health and fitness retreat offering over 15 customized high-tech experiences for your brain and body

Meetings & Events

A central location

Set between Wilshire and Santa Monica Boulevards, you’re within walking distance of the world-famous shopping and dining of Beverly Hills, CA. Rather soak up the sun?  Both Santa Monica Beach and Venice Beach are just minutes away. Don’t forget to visit the Hollywood sign, the Staples Center in downtown LA, and the Getty Center.

Breakfast included

Save on our breakfast when you combine it with your room rate.

View package details

All you need and more

From our fully equipped fitness center to Olympic-sized outdoor pool, we've got you covered for workouts and relaxation. Night out planned? Host an event in the famed International Ballroom or hold an intimate dinner on the Stardust rooftop.

Amenities

Exquisite dining

Market-fresh, traditional Californian dishes await at Circa 55, while the Lobby Lounge and Barista Bar are your go-to spots for evening cocktails or morning coffee.

Dining

Golden Globes and Special Events

Home of the Golden Globes Awards™, The Beverly Hilton combines style with comfort. The brightest of Hollywood have entrusted our hotel because we are masters at keeping secrets and managing details.

description:

Each room has updated amenities including a 55-inch TV. Looking for an extra special treat? Select a suite for even better views and an oversized terrace, perfect for private dining.

name: Hilton San Diego Bayfront
description:
San Diego hotel on the waterfront

Alluring and inspired by maritime culture, the distinctive coastal influence is clear the moment you arrive at our 30-story waterfront hotel. Featuring newly renovated guest rooms that are authentically San Diego in their design, our hotel is conveniently located adjacent to the San Diego Convention Center. We are also situated across from the Padres’ Petco Park and the bustling Downtown Gaslamp Quarter. Enjoy stunning bay and city views, relaxing leisure facilities, extensive meeting space, and unique dining venues.

  • AAA Four-Diamond hotel, adjacent to the San Diego Convention Center

Many of San Diego’s most exciting attractions are within walking distance of the hotel, including the vibrant Gaslamp Quarter, home to fabulous shopping, dining and nightlife. Taking the kids? San Diego offers a wealth of family-friendly attractions, including Legoland®, San Diego Zoo and the Birch Aquarium.

Spa

From creative cocktails to decadent desserts, take your pick of the six dining venues at Hilton San Diego Bayfront. Whether you want to kick back with a craft beer and the game, dine with a view of the San Diego Bay, or indulge in an innovative dish, we’ve got you covered.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Loveland Hotel Conference Center & Spa
description:
An award-winning hotel in Loveland, Colorado, the Embassy Suites by Hilton Loveland Hotel Conference Center & Spa offers full-service and all-suites accommodations. Located at the intersection of I-25 and Crossroads Boulevard, within The Ranch, home of the Budweiser Events Center, our hotel is ideal for short breaks or extended stays in Colorado. Enjoy easy access to popular attractions, including Rocky Mountain National Park, Loveland Sculpture Parks and the Promenade Shops at Centerra. Experience the John Q. Hammons Conference Center with ample space and business services, perfect for groups.

Enjoy expansive luxury two-room suites, featuring a private bedroom and separate living room, each with a wet bar, mini-refrigerator, microwave and coffeemaker. Book an upgraded PURE® Wellness room. Our PURE® rooms use a patented 7-step purification process to treat every surface, including the air, removing up to 99.99% of pollutants and allergens, so you can breathe easily and rest peacefully.

Stay active during your stay with a workout in the fitness center or a swim in the indoor pool. Unwind in the hot tub or indulge in a treatment at our Loveland, Colorado spa, the Spa Botanica. Each morning, savor our free made-to-order breakfast served in the open-air atrium. This lush, contemporary setting is also host to our complimentary Evening Reception*, where you can join us for drinks. Enjoy a delicious meal in a relaxed atmosphere at Rocky River Bar & Grille.

*Service of alcohol subject to state and local laws. Must be of legal drinking age

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Grand Junction
description:
The warm, contemporary DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Grand Junction offers all the necessities for fun-filled family vacations or productive business trips. Spacious guest rooms, suites, and executive accommodations have two-line speaker phones with voice mail and data ports and complimentary WiFi access. The extensive recreational amenities include a putting green, seasonal outdoor saline pool and whirlpool, and fully equipped fitness center. Dine at the stylish Bistro 743, serving regional favorites for breakfast, lunch and dinner daily. Enjoy a wide selection of wines including local choices and Colorado micro-brews in the inviting Lounge 743.
DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Grand Junction offers a complimentary business center that keeps you in touch while on the road. For conventions, conferences and events small or large, this Colorado hotel features many flexible meeting spaces, including a lovely Grand Ballroom that will accommodate up to 350 banquet guests. The beautifully landscaped grounds provide additional scenic venues for business functions and weddings during warmer months. Close to nearby attractions such as the majestic Colorado National Monument, Colorado's wine country and the Grand Mesa National Forest, DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Grand Junction is awaiting your arrival with a special, signature warm chocolate chip cookie.

name: Hilton Denver City Center
description:
Denver's ONLY full-service Hilton Hotel

Mountains meet modern at Hilton Denver City Center. We’re located in the heart of downtown, walking distance from the Mile High’s top restaurants and attractions. Redesigned in 2017, our hotel offers unbeatable amenities, including a 24-hour fitness center, heated indoor pool, on-site Starbucks® and 33,000+ sq. ft. of event space. Walk one block to the 16th Street Pedestrian mall for a day of shopping, or hop on the light rail train to explore the rest of the city.

Directions

Locals, Rejoice!
Enjoy an upgraded suite, free valet parking, and a locally curated welcome basket.

Hotel highlights

  • Near downtown businesses and attractions; house car service available

  • Restaurant and bar, a Starbucks® shop, and 24-hour room service

  • Event space for meetings and celebrations of up to 2,500 guests
