Looking for the perfect space for your meeting, special event or wedding? Request Proposal

Newly renovated rooms

Relax in a chic guest room with comforts like complimentary WiFi, a Hilton Serenity Bed, 42-inch HDTV, mini-fridge, coffeemaker, ergonomic workspace and a walk-in shower. Spacious junior suites feature a larger king guest room with a dedicated dressing area and a separate living area with sofa bed and wet bar.

Rooms and suites

Executive benefits

Treat yourself to an executive room for indulgences like complimentary bottled water, cozy bathrobes, and enhanced views of the city and Rocky Mountains.

Location, Location, Location!

Top Denver attractions are within walking distance of our hotel, including Larimer Square, Coors Field, Union Station and the Performing Arts Center. We offer a dedicated Uber/Lyft station and close proximity to pedicabs, the 16th Street Mall shuttle and light rail stations. We also provide complimentary car service (7:00 am - 10:00 pm) within 2 miles of the hotel.

All the right amenities

Recharge after a busy day with a workout in our complimentary 24-hour fitness center, or take a dip in the heated indoor pool. Our warm and welcoming lobby is a great place for networking or relaxing, and there's a UPS Business Center on-site for your convenience.

More amenities

Local dining options

Join us at Prospect's Urban Kitchen & Bar - open all day and showcasing fresh, local ingredients and Colorado breweries - or stop by our Starbucks® shop for pastries and a cup of coffee. We're also happy to deliver a meal to your door with 24-hour room service.

Restaurants and bars

Memorable events

Hilton Denver City Center has over 32,000 sq. ft. of sophisticated and flexible event spaces for board meetings up to lavish receptions. Plan your occasion with a choice of conference rooms and ballrooms as well as the expertise of our in-house A/V team.

Meetings and events

name: Hilton Denver Inverness
description:
A relaxing retreat near downtown Denver

Take in stunning views of the golf course and pond at Hilton Denver Inverness. Located just 30 minutes from Denver International Airport and downtown Denver, this modern Colorado hotel offers award-winning dining, a full-service spa and fitness center, and an 18-hole championship golf course, as well as spectacular indoor and outdoor event space.

Directions Email us

HOLIDAY BRUNCH
Call 303-397-6411 to reserve your table at our Thanksgiving brunch, 10 am – 4 pm Nov. 28.

Adults $65.95, children $31.95.

Good to know

  • In Denver Tech Center, close to Park Meadows Mall, with easy access to downtown Denver
  • Light rail to many attractions and restaurants
  • Complimentary shuttle service within 5-mile radius of the hotel
  • Four on-site dining options, including the award-winning Garden Terrace
  • Over 60,000 sq. ft. of IACC-certified meeting space

Meetings & Events

Looking for the perfect space for your meeting, special event or wedding? Request Proposal

Relax and recharge

Our modern guest rooms provide the perfect space to relax or catch up with work. Sleep well in the Hilton Serenity bed and stay connected with WiFi access. Our spacious suites boast a separate bedroom and sunken living room, as well as a private balcony and Club Level access.

View our rooms

Meetings and events

Hilton Denver Inverness boasts over 60,000 sq. ft. of indoor and outdoor function space for up to 1,000 attendees. Whether you are planning a conference, business seminar, banquet or wedding, we have the facilities to meet your needs.

Local attractions

  • Park Meadows Mall
  • Downtown Denver/Union Station
  • Red Rocks Park and Amphitheatre
  • Craft breweries
  • Fiddler's Green Amphitheatre

Spa and fitness

Escape the stresses of everyday life at our on-site spa and fitness center. Indulge in a calming treatment in one of seven treatment rooms or simply unwind in the Relaxation Suite. The spa also features a private outdoor patio with lounging area, hot tub and fireplace.

Services and amenities

Dine in style

Choose from four tempting dining outlets at Hilton Denver Inverness. From light bites to hearty entrees, craft beers and authentic pub fare, you'll find something for everyone. Our award-winning Champagne Sunday Brunch is served weekly in the Garden Terrace, featuring over 100 items.

Hotel dining

Outdoor events

Our outdoor event space at Hilton Denver Inverness ranges from garden ceremonies to tented reception sites. All of the outdoor space, with the exception of Lower Mountain View, has beautiful views of the Golf Course and the pond, surrounded by lush flowerbeds and planters.

Plan an event

name: Madison Beach Hotel, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: Welcome to Madison Beach Hotel, Curio Collection by Hilton, our AAA 4 Diamond rated hotel is set on the scenic Connecticut shoreline in the picturesque town of Madison, CT. The perfect destination for couples and romantic getaways. The hotel is near a private beach and walking, biking, kayaking, fishing and bird-watching options. Explore downtown boutiques, restaurants, specialty shops and even an old-fashioned movie theater. Tour a local winery, enjoy live theater or visit historic and quintessential New England villages nearby. Our elegantly decorated guest rooms are ideal for a couples' retreat, featuring a furnished porch overlooking the Atlantic Ocean and a stunning Italian marble bathroom. Feel at home with complimentary WiFi, a refrigerator and luxurious bedding. For sophisticated Madison Beach weddings, social events, and corporate retreats, the hotel offers stunning outdoor space and four meeting rooms with views of the Long Island Sound shoreline. Our ballroom accommodates up to 200 and 160. The Wharf serves classic New England dishes with a contemporary twist and has an expansive porch for year-round al fresco dining and romantic meals. Enjoy a cozy, pub-style dinner at the Wharf Bar. Energize in the contemporary 24-hour fitness center and yoga studio, or treat yourself to a massage or beauty therapy in the full-service spa. Golfers can take advantage of the Madison Country Club, a short walk away. Keep an eye out for outdoor concerts and weekly film festivals on the lawn or the beach during the summer months.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Washington DC/U.S. Capitol
description:
• Modern hotel, located on the Red Line Metro
  • 24-hour fitness center
  • 3,000 sq. ft. of flexible event space for up to 300 guests
  • Complimentary facility-wide WiFi
  • LEED® Gold-certified property
 

Welcome to our inviting and modern Capitol Hill hotel

Welcome to the Hilton Garden Inn Washington DC/U.S. Capitol Hill hotel, situated adjacent to the Red Line Metro/NoMa-Gallaudet U station, offering easy access to the city. The White House, US Capitol, Smithsonian Museums, National Mall and Gallaudet University are easily reached from our Washington, DC hotel. Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport (DCA) is seven miles away. After a busy day, retreat to a spacious guest room, some featuring views of the U.S. Capitol. Continue your work with complimentary internet and a spacious work desk. Or, indulge during your leisurely retreat by stocking the fridge and sinking into the plush bed to watch a movie. Ideal for families or an extended stay, our Capitol Hill hotel suites feature a separate seating area with a sofa bed. Along with chic accommodations, our downtown DC hotel offers an array of amenities including a 24-hour business center, indoor pool, and fitness facility. Treat yourself to breakfast, lunch, and dinner in our on-site restaurant Lily & the Cactus. Sip a cocktail while relaxing in our modern bar. Let our expert event staff help host your special event in one of the attractive event spaces at our Capitol Hill hotel.

name: Capital Hilton
description:
A stylish hotel in the heart of the nation's capital

Historic and sophisticated downtown Washington DC hotel located just two blocks from the White House and the capital’s best attractions, featuring comfortable rooms and balcony suites with city views, exceptionally friendly, multi-lingual staff, multiple on-site dining options including the iconic Statler Lounge & Bar, a robust, state-of-the-art fitness center, and an extensive selection of easy-to-navigate, naturally-lit event space all located on one floor. Combining modern style, historical character, and an enviable location, Capital Hilton is the place to stay when visiting Washington DC.

See Inside
Directions Email us

Good to know

  • Walk to the White House and National Mall
  • Enjoy DC’s top attractions, shops, dining and nightlife
  • Member of Historic Hotels of America
  • Central location to family-friendly DC attractions
  • The meeting place for Presidents, Diplomats and DC elite

Meetings & Events

Looking for the perfect space for your meeting, special event or wedding? Request Proposal

Modern guest rooms

Whether you're in town for museum hopping, sightseeing, a big meeting, or just to explore, our modern guest rooms and suites are the perfect retreat – a space to recharge after a busy day in DC. All rooms include flat-screen TVs and modern amenities. We now feature PURE® Wellness accommodations, which are nearly 99.9% allergen-free.

View All Rooms

Location, location, location

  • 2 short blocks from the White House
  • 2 blocks from Farrugut North, Farragut West, McPherson Square Metro stations
  • 5 miles from Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport (DCA)

Attractions

White House
National Mall and Memorials
U.S. Capitol
17 Smithsonian Museums
Georgetown

Historical Suites

Book a spacious historical suite at Capital Hilton. With natural light in plentitude, expansive balconies overlooking the city, and kitchenettes a suite will ensure a perfect stay whether you're in DC for leisure, business or bleisure.

Check suites

Downtown DC dining

North Gate Grill, located in our Washington DC hotel, serves a menu of contemporary American cuisine – think reinvented classics using farm-fresh ingredients. Choose from the fabulous selection of signature cocktails in Statler Lounge, providing a sophisticated setting to start off a night on the town.

Dining

Experience DC

Many of D.C.'s top attractions are free to the public, including all of the Smithsonian's 11 museums. Check out our Things to Do page for links and additional info on fun local activities.

Things to Do Details

name: The Madison Washington DC, a Hilton Hotel
description:
Washington hospitality made for the history books

The Madison, a Hilton Hotel, is a refined heritage property in the heart of Washington D.C. The Smithsonian Museums, National Mall, The White House, and two metro stations are just steps away. We are six blocks from The Walter E. Washington Convention Center. As you enter our lobby, feel inspired by the hospitality of our 4th president and First Lady. Enjoy a sophisticated guest room or suite with terrace.
Directions Email us

Good to know

  • Lady Madison lounge bar & restaurant, Executive Lounge for breakfast, refreshments
  • The Marketplace, locally sourced quick bites and Starbucks® Coffee
  • 15,000 sq. ft. event space with an elegant split-level ballroom
  • Renovated and modernized health club
  • 356 guest rooms including 27 suites, select with terraces
  • Steps from iconic attraction, parks, and memorials

Meetings & Events

Looking for the perfect space for your meeting, special event or wedding? Request Proposal

Sophisticated comfort

Historical and homey, our downtown hotel in the heart of Washington D.C. features colonial-inspired guest rooms with elegant finishes, and many with wall-to-wall windows. All of our guest rooms are pet-friendly.

Rooms and suites

The heart of downtown

  • The White House: 4 Blocks
  • The National Mall: 6 Blocks
  • Walter E. Washington Convention Center: 6 Blocks
  • Farragut North and West Station: 3 Blocks
  • Union Station: 1 Mile
  • DCA Airport: 5 Miles

Pet-friendly

Our downtown Washington D.C hotel is pet friendly. We welcome all our 4 legged guests.
Pet deposits and maximum weight restrictions apply.

Evening libations

Lady Madison features farm-to-table small plates, classic cocktails, rotating craft beer handles, and a unique bourbon tasting experience. Stop in, make yourself at home, and enjoy the legendary spirits.

View Menu

Executive Lounge

Upgrade to gain access to the exclusive Executive Lounge, with daily complimentary continental breakfast and late afternoon refreshments.

Convene confidently

An event at The Madison is more than a special occasion. It’s an opportunity to create an indelible memory for you and your guests. The versatile interior spaces, creative adaptability, and state-of-the-art functionality are some of the reasons why meetings at The Madison are seamlessly stress-free.

Events and meetings

When you're on the go

Located in the lobby, The Marketplace serves a hot breakfast buffet, grab-and-go lunch options, and an assortment of snacks.  Serving Starbucks® coffee and espresso drinks, tea, and freshly baked pastries, The Marketplace offers a refreshing gourmet salads, sandwiches and wraps, chips, and an array of juices, soft drinks, bottled beer and wine.

Restaurants and lounges

With our compliments

Enjoy exclusive guest access to our modern fitness center, with state of the art Life Fitness equipment and plenty of room for a full body workout.

More amenities

name: The Diplomat Beach Resort Hollywood, Curio Collection by Hilton
description:
A South Florida icon.
Voted one of the top 10 resorts in Florida by Condé Nast Traveler Choice Awards 2018, The Diplomat Beach Resort is ideally situated between Miami and Fort Lauderdale along Hollywood's Gold Coast.
Soak up the breezy South Florida lifestyle at our playground by the sea. Our oceanfront resort features two beachside pools, Kids’ Club, Dip & Slide Waterpark, and a private beach with an array of water sports options such as jet skiing, kayaking, and paddle boarding.
Spa lovers will want to indulge at Diplomat Spa, where rhythms of the ocean inspire soothing treatments and healing therapies. Yoga enthusiasts will enjoy a magical sunrise practice on the sand.
Take your pick from 8 culinary concepts led by celebrity chefs Geoffrey Zakarian and Michael Schulson, including Monkitail, voted #1 Best New Restaurant of 2017 by USA Today's reader's choice, and Four Diamond AAA-rated Diplomat Prime.
Our sun-splashed and spacious rooms and suites feature stunning views of the Atlantic Ocean or Intracoastal Waterway and thoughtful touches like vintage-inspired art, luxurious amenities, and plush bedding.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Deerfield Beach - Boca Raton
description:
Feel welcome the moment you arrive at the DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Deerfield Beach – Boca Raton hotel. Enjoy a freshly baked chocolate chip cookie. Located between Fort Lauderdale and Boca Raton, Florida, our hotel offers a convenient sanctuary from the bustling neighboring cities. Relax on the stunning east coast beaches of Florida within minutes of our hotel, or explore our charming city that has a thriving business district and vibrant cultural diversity.
Relax during your stay with our array of recreational amenities. Take a dip in the sparkling heated outdoor pool or stay active at the fitness center. Creating a casual, yet refined atmosphere, The Spotted Stag provides excellent food, drinks and company.
With 20,000 sq.ft. of versatile meeting space, DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Deerfield Beach – Boca Raton serves as the ideal venue for meetings and events in Deerfield Beach. Let our professional staff help plan every detail to ensure truly unforgettable events in Florida's sunshine.
Make yourself comfortable in a guest room or suite with thoughtful amenities for work and relaxation, including complimentary WiFi and a 40-inch HDTV. Choose a suite for more space and upgraded amenities at our hotel in Deerfield Beach, FL.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Deerfield Beach Resort & Spa
description:
Welcome to our pristine beachfront resort, ideally located between Boca Raton and Ft. Lauderdale. Embassy Suites by Hilton Deerfield Beach Resort & Spa is one of the best Deerfield Beach hotels on Florida’s Gold Coast. Enjoy two miles of Florida's white sand beaches, accessible from our walkway. Getting here is easy with our proximity to Ft. Lauderdale International Airport and the Palm Beach International Airport.
Join us at BT's Oceanfront restaurant for a free made-to-order breakfast. Savor a custom omelet with coffee and ocean views. Enjoy a cocktail* and snacks at our complimentary Evening Reception. The kids will enjoy our tropical heated pool or wading in the Atlantic, just steps from the resort in Deerfield Beach. Relax with an aromatherapy bath or massage at our Spa950. The 3,300 sq. ft. spa includes a full-service salon.
Maintain your workout routine at our 24-hour fitness center, equipped with leading-edge cardio and balance equipment as well as resistance training options. Host a business meeting, reception, or wedding in one of our seven meeting and event spaces.
Reserve one of our 244 spacious two-room, two-bathroom suites with private bedrooms and separate living areas. Select the deluxe oceanfront suite with wraparound balconies or an ocean view suite overlooking the tropical pool and Atlantic for your Florida vacation or wedding night at this Deerfield Beach hotel.
* Service of alcohol subject to state and local laws. Must be of legal drinking age

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Cocoa Beach Oceanfront
description:
Welcome to DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Cocoa Beach Oceanfront, located in Cocoa Beach on the Florida Space Coast and 45 minutes from Melbourne and Orlando International Airports. Kennedy Space Center, Patrick AFB and Port Canaveral are within easy reach. Boeing and Lockheed Martin are nearby. Our staff ensures that your stay exceeds expectations and our signature warm DoubleTree Chocolate Chip Cookie awaits you on arrival at our Cocoa Beach, Florida hotel.
Most rooms at our hotel in Cocoa Beach feature Atlantic Ocean views, private balconies, microwaves, refrigerators, complimentary WiFi and remote printing. Choose a two-room suite for a private living room.
Hold business events in over 10,000 sq. ft. of flexible space, including conference and meeting rooms, with access to our oceanfront pool deck. Work in our 24-hour business center. Celebrate weddings in elegant ballrooms with a beach setting and the help of our experienced staff. Our meeting services include in-house A/V support and catering. Dine poolside in the 3 Wishes restaurant and lounge, featuring fresh Florida seafood and brick oven pizza. Stroll along our private beach, relax by the heated outdoor pool or tone up in the fitness center.

name: Hotel Maren Fort Lauderdale Beach, Curio Collection by Hilton
description:
Hotel Maren Fort Lauderdale Beach, Curio Collection by Hilton is a contemporary boutique hotel overlooking the Atlantic ocean. Conveniently located near Downtown Las Olas, our oceanfront hotel is steps away from trendy restaurants, corporate offices, boutique shops and cultural attractions. A resort-style hotel stocked with amenities, Hotel Maren Fort Lauderdale Beach is a perfect getaway for families and business travelers.
Make your way to our bright and modern guest rooms, adorned with contemporary ocean-inspired artwork. Settle into plush bedding and enjoy comfortable amenities including a 55-inch HDTV and a mini refrigerator. Opt for larger room with oversized oceanfront balconies.
Revel in the stunning, breathtaking views from our fifth floor oceanfront pool deck featuring our celebrity chef restaurant and lounge. We have your convenience in mind and offer a complimentary fitness room and a 24-hour business center.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Orlando Lake Buena Vista Resort
description: Welcome to your perfect Orlando vacation at Embassy Suites Orlando - Lake Buena Vista Resort, just minutes from Walt Disney World® Resort. This resort near Disney has recently completed a redevelopment and will be the only Embassy Suites resort in Orlando. Wake up to a free cooked-to-order breakfast. Enjoy the enhanced amenities in our newly redesigned resort, featuring fire-pits, tennis courts, a putting green, indoor and outdoor pools, basketball court, beach volleyball court, fishing dock, kids splash pad, dive-in movies and outdoor cabanas with TVs and refrigerators. Work out in our redesigned fitness center. A Walt Disney World Good Neighbor®, our Lake Buena Vista resort features complimentary theme park shuttle service to all four Walt Disney World® Resort Theme Parks®. Disney Magic Your Way tickets are available for purchase at our guest services desk. We are less than 25 minutes from Orlando International Airport (MCO), providing easy access to Orange County Convention Center meetings. Each fully redesigned two-room suite includes a refrigerator and microwave, along with a sofa bed for flexible sleeping arrangements. Join us at our complimentary Evening Reception* with snacks and drinks in the atrium. Unwind with poolside cocktails or choose family favorites in our pizza and ice cream shop. *Service of alcohol subject to state and local laws. Must be of legal drinking age.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Homestead
description: We're off Florida's Turnpike, steps from Homestead Pavilion shops and dining and a mile from Homestead Hospital. Coral Castle sculpture garden is five minutes away, and Homestead-Miami Speedway is 10 minutes from us. Fill up on cooked-to-order breakfast or join us for an evening cocktail. A fitness center, indoor pool, and sunlit meeting room have convenience covered.

name: Baker's Cay Resort Key Largo, Curio Collection by Hilton
description:
Nestled on the largest of Florida Keys’ 1,700+ islands - Key Largo - Baker’s Cay Resort Key Largo, Curio Collection by Hilton delivers unparalleled views of Florida Bay. Offering a prime location that’s just the right amount of being-away-from-it-all, this luxury resort lends itself to unforgettable beach experiences.
This is a place where time slows and adventures race. Where panoramas unfold and senses soar. Where spirits rise and tensions fall. Whether it’s pampering yourself at the Greenhouse Salon, cooling off in waterfall pools or satisfying your daring side with watersports galore - our seaside spot and indulgent resort facilities make Baker’s Cay a playground for all ages.
Renowned among Key Largo hotels, Baker’s Cay inspires effortless refinement and relaxed comfort. Our guest rooms and suites rise as a personal oasis, with private balconies, modern décor, comprehensive amenities, and sweeping coastal views reigning supreme.
Calusa restaurant, set high above the island’s lush swath of hardwood hammocks, is a feast for all your senses. Where sweeping turquoise sea views and a menu of Caribbean-Creole cuisine with Cajun flair blend effortlessly.

name: The Reach Key West, Curio Collection by Hilton
description:
Welcome to The Reach Key West, Curio Collection by Hilton. Situated on the only natural sand beach in Key West, our oceanfront resort boasts stunning views and an exceptional location.
Immerse yourself in the Key West culture upon arrival with the stunning murals and local artwork. Our guest rooms feature subtle nods to our nautical roots. Choose an upgraded room, which offers a resort or ocean view plus additional space.
Savor delectable cuisine amid sea breezes on the open-air wood deck of the Four Marlins Restaurant, open for breakfast, lunch and dinner, or indulge in a refreshing beverage poolside. Enjoy craft cocktails at HMF Sidecar Speakeasy, daily rum tasting at RUMba, or poolside dining at Sun Sun bar & Grill at our sister property, Casa Marina, A Waldorf Astoria Resort, just a short stroll away. The Sand & Sea Gift Shop features a variety of grab-and-go items.
Power up at the fitness center, equipped with cardio and strength equipment in addition to Peloton. Bask in the sun at our beachfront pool featuring cabanas and a poolside concierge. With an array of outdoor activities, including bocce ball and water sports, there is something for everyone at The Reach.
Our intimate boutique-style resort offers indoor and outdoor venues to accommodate over 300 people. We offer 4,700 sq. ft. of flexible meeting space plus a terrace with panoramic views of the Atlantic.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites MacClenny I-10
description: We are located less than a mile from the intersection of State Highway 121 and I-10. MacClenny Park and Heritage Park Village are both within two miles of our hotel. We are also about a 10-minute drive from the Walmart Distribution Center. Check out Bayside Paintball Center for a little recreational fun. We have 728 sq. ft. of meeting space available.

name: Hilton Palm Beach Airport
description:
Stylish and comfortable hotel near West Palm beaches

Hilton Palm Beach Airport hotel offers relaxation in a prime location. We provide free airport shuttles, multiple dining options, a conference center and easy access to Interstate 95. Find us a short drive from downtown West Palm Beach, luxury shopping and energetic nightlife. Indulge in our breakfast buffet and award-winning Tony Roma’s ribs, or enjoy live entertainment at our poolside Tiki Bar.

Directions

Good to know

  • Lakefront property with poolside tiki bar, outdoor heated pool, whirlpool
  • Airport convenience with a resort feel, 24-hour free airport shuttle
  • New fitness center with lake and lush grounds view
  • Close to downtown West Palm Beach, County Convention Center and sandy beaches
  • 21,000 sq. ft. of flexible event space accommodating up to 750 guests
  • Complimentary transportation to and from CityPlace (based on availability)

Meetings & Events

Looking for the perfect space for your meeting, special event or wedding? Request Proposal

Relaxing rooms and suites

Our elegantly-decorated guest rooms and suites boast complimentary WiFi and tropical garden, Lake Cloud or skyline views. Fancy an upgrade? Enjoy upper-floor views, upscale amenities and even more space in our Executive rooms.

View all rooms

Local attractions

  • CityPlace & Clematis Street
  • Equestrian Center & Polo Field
  • The BallPark of the Palm Beaches
  • Norton Museum of Art
  • Kravis Center of the Performing Arts
  • Jupiter, Juno and Palm Beaches

Family fun

Wake up to breakfast for four and internet access when you book your next stay.

View Offer Details

Fantastic services

At Hilton Palm Beach Airport, we believe play is just as important as work. Exercise in our modern fitness facility or unwind in our heated outdoor pool and whirlpool overlooking Lake Cloud.

View amenities

Dine in style

Savor a delicious hot breakfast buffet in Veranda Restaurant, or visit the award-winning Tony Roma's restaurant for all your sports, dinner and cocktails. Poolside lunch and dinner are available at the Lakeside Tiki Bar, while you can choose your favorite Starbucks® coffee and snacks at Le Café.

Find out more

Memorable events

Let us help you plan your perfect day, and toast to the future under a starry sky on our poolside patio. Enjoy 21,000 sq. ft. of meeting space for up to 750, including the 9,000 sq. ft. foot Majestic Ballroom with green outdoor space. We’ll tailor your wedding and event package to fit your style and budget.

Plan your event

name: Hilton West Palm Beach
description:
Sleek new hotel in downtown West Palm Beach, FL

Experience casual elegance at the contemporary and luxurious Hilton West Palm Beach. Located in the heart of Downtown West Palm Beach, the AAA 4-Diamond Hilton West Palm Beach features indoor/outdoor dining, a vibrant pool scene and is for any event. Our hotel is connected to the Palm Beach County Convention Center, located just 2 miles from Palm Beach and directly across the street from Rosemary Square shopping and dining.
Directions Email us

UPGRADE TO A SUITE

Starting at $50 More Than a Standard Room.

View Suites

Good to know

    • Connected to Palm Beach County Convention Center by enclosed walkway
    • 3 miles from Palm Beach International Airport
    • Minutes from several of Palm Beach's best golf courses and beaches
    • Walk to Rosemary Square and Kravis Center for the Performing Arts
    • Expansive, lush pool deck and resort-style pool
    • Luxuriously styled, thoughtfully designed guest rooms

      Meetings & Events

      Looking for the perfect space for your meeting, special event or wedding? Request Proposal

      A peaceful place to rest

      Relax and unwind in any one of our modern guest rooms, including 43 suites. Sophisticated and contemporary natural wood furnishings, deluxe linens and amenities make your vacation feel like a home away from home. Enjoy city or pool views featuring floor-to-ceiling windows, a 55-inch HDTV, mini-fridge and WiFi.

      Rooms and suites

      What's nearby

      • Kravis Center for the Performing Arts (0.2 mile)
      • Norton Museum of Art (0.6 mile)
      • Palm Beach Atlantic University (0.7 mile)
      • Henry Morrison Flagler Museum (1.8 miles)
      • Atlantic Ocean shoreline (2.0 miles)

      Palm Beach bliss

      Less than two miles away, pristine Palm Beach awaits. Enjoy the sun and sand, or stroll down Worth Avenue, an international shopping destination.

      Pool, sun, happiness

      Enjoy tropical cocktails, sunbathing, pool floats and year-round fun in the sun in the heart of downtown West Palm Beach. Make a splash in the vibrant pool scene featuring a zero entry resort-style pool, lawn games, La Playa Bar & Grill, poolside cabanas and more!

      Dive In

      Exceptional Dining

      Enjoy the South Florida weather with outdoor seating and a poolside bar. Indulge in breakfast or lunch at Manor. Experience Galley, featuring farm-to-table cuisine infused with locally sourced ingredients, craft cocktails and a speakeasy feel. Provisions offers a variety of grab-and-go options.

      Dine with Us

      Events and weddings

      With over 29,000 sq. ft. of indoor and outdoor event space including the elegant Oceana Ballroom and modern Coral Ballroom, our hotel is ideal for conferences and celebrations. Plan a reception on our beautiful event lawn or wow your guests with a formal ballroom affair.

      Plan an event

name: Hilton Clearwater Beach Resort & Spa
description:
Tropical allure hotel in Clearwater, FL

Newly renovated February 2017 and seated on 10 acres of the #1 Beach in the Country as voted by Trip Advisor, Hilton Clearwater Beach Resort & Spa overlooks the Gulf of Mexico. This iconic hotel offers food and drink service nearly to the water's edge, and features the only tiki bar on the sand, private beach cabanas and new pools. Refresh and revitalize in our beautiful new Hibiscus Spa or take in a legendary sunset while dining on fresh, local fare.
 
Directions Email us

Good to know

  • Newly renovated, in the heart of Clearwater Beach and next to legendary Pier 60
  • 10 acres of the #1 beach in the United States with beachside food & drink service
  • Restaurants with spectacular views and fresh seasonal food
  • Coastal, city, harbor or partial gulf view from most room balconies
  • 35,000 sq. ft. of flexible event space, 4 beachside covered decks
  • Hibiscus Spa featuring a variety of treatments including Vichy Shower

Meetings & Events

Looking for the perfect space for your meeting, special event or wedding? Request Proposal

A place to recharge

Unwind in your guest room, suite or accessible room with signature bedding, work space, WiFi and scenic views of the city, harbor or Gulf available in most rooms. Our Junior Suites feature dining tables, mini-refrigerators and sofa beds.

Rooms & Suites

Local attractions

  • Sunsets at Pier 60 (0.3mi)
  • Clearwater Marine Aquarium (1mi)
  • Clearwater Marina (2.6mi)
  • Salvador Dali Museum (20mi)
  • Raymond James Stadium (21mi)
  • St. Pete Times Forum (25mi)

2X points offer

Be rewarded with Double Hilton Honors Points when you book at Hilton Clearwater Beach.

View Offer

Tiki Bar and more

Stay hydrated with cold beverages from Tommy's Tiki Bar whilst enjoying beautiful sunsets. Sand Bar & Grill has diverse dishes that can be enjoyed poolside. Enjoy all meals at Carambola with inside drinks at Coasters Lounge. Our new Spotted Donkey Cantina serves up modern Mexican cuisine, "cantina style".

Dine with us

Spectacular beach weddings

Have your celebration on the beach, in one of our covered beachside decks or maybe inside our Grand Ballroom. We have 40,000 sq. ft. of indoor/outdoor event space available. Tell us about your favorite foods and our catering staff will turn out a menu to impress.

Plan your event

Amazing amenities

Swim in our beachside pools or work out in our fitness center, outfitted with free weights, ellipticals and treadmill. When you're finished exercising, let us add some excitement to your stay. We can arrange wave runner rentals, snorkeling trips, deep sea fishing and private charters.

Amenities & Services

name: Hilton Orlando Buena Vista Palace Disney Springs Area
description:
Steps from Disney Springs®

Experience a relaxing retreat within walking distance of Disney Springs. Our resort features two heated pools, Float Lagoon lazy river, Kids's Splash Pad, and private poolside cabanas.

Guests enjoy scheduled shuttle service to all four Walt Disney World Theme Parks. Guests have access to Disney FastPass+ service and Disney's Extra Magic Hours benefit for stays through 12-31-21 (requires valid Walt Disney World Theme Park tickets).

NOTE: At this time Disney has temporarily suspended Extra Magic Hours, FastPass+, fireworks shows, and character breakfast.

Directions

Official Walt Disney World Hotel

Resort amenities you'll love

  • Official Walt Disney World® Hotel
  • Walking distance to Disney Springs® via Pedestrian Skybridge
  • New Float Lagoon pool and Kids Splash Pad
  • Scheduled shuttle transportation to all four Disney Theme Parks
  • Disney FastPass+ service (temporarily suspended)
  • Access to Disney's Extra Magic Hours (temporarily suspended)

Meetings & Events

Looking for the perfect space for your meeting, special event or wedding? Request Proposal

Enjoy continuous motor coach transportation to Walt Disney World® Theme Parks and Disney Springs®. The daily transportation schedule is available at the front desk and through the Concierge. Shuttles run approximately every half hour.

name: Hilton Daytona Beach Oceanfront Resort
description:
Vibrant dining and fun at beach resort in Daytona

Set in the heart of the Ocean Walk Village on the ‘World’s Most Famous Beach,' Hilton Daytona Beach Oceanfront Resort offers stunning views of the Atlantic Ocean and easy access to the thriving seaside attractions and the business district in Daytona Beach. Step out onto the beach for a day in the sun, or relax by the outside pool with a refreshing cocktail in hand. Enjoy diverse dining options and fun daily activities – no need to leave the hotel!

    • 60,000 sq. ft. of meeting space, ideal for weddings or conferences

Our guest rooms feature a signature tropical decor and are equipped with an HDTV and WiFi. Upgrade to a suite for extra space and special amenities including cotton bathrobes.

      View all rooms

      Location

      Our hotel is connected to Ocean Walk Shoppes featuring additional dining, entertainment and shopping. Across the street is Daytona Lagoon Waterpark, ideal for for a fun day out. Behind the hotel, you’ll find the historic Daytona Beach Bandshell offering outdoor concerts and fireworks every Saturday.

      The Spa

      Relax with a soothing massage and sample the latest skin treatments at The Spa.

      Whether you wish to stay active or simply relax, enjoy endless recreational facilities at our Daytona Beach resort. Rejuvenate at the modern fitness center, outdoor pools or whirlpools, while the kids have fun at D-Dawg’s Kidszone, offering a playground and fun daily activities.

      Amenities and Services

      Diverse dining

      Hilton Daytona Beach Oceanfront Resort boasts an extensive range of bars and lounges. Indulge in oceanfront dining at Doc Bales' Grill, the hotel’s signature restaurant serving seafood specialties in an elegant atmosphere, or enjoy a casual meal at the beachfront poolside Blind Turtle Bar.

      Find out more

      Weddings and events

      With over 60,000 sq. ft. of on-site meeting space, our Hilton Daytona Beach Oceanfront Resort is perfect for anything, from a conference to a fancy dream wedding. We have a ballroom for up to 2000 guests, a large oceanfront pre-function area, expert catering staff and wedding coordinators to help make your event a success.

description:

Hilton Sandestin Beach Golf Resort & Spa is the perfect location for a family vacation, a romantic getaway, a business meeting or a destination wedding. Lounge on the beach or by one of our 3 pools or find yourself indulging in our first-class amenities such as golf, tennis, and our award-winning onsite spa. Dine at our Four Diamond steakhouse or join us outdoors at our beachside bar and grill. At Hilton Sandestin Beach there is plenty to do to create memories that will last a lifetime.

name: Hilton Fort Lauderdale Beach Resort
description:

Centrally located on Fort Lauderdale's North Beach, Hilton Fort Lauderdale Beach Resort is set between Sunrise and Las Olas boulevards. name: Hilton Marco Island Beach Resort and Spa
description:
Island Style Redefined

A beach paradise on the gulf awaits at Hilton Marco Island Beach Resort & Spa. Just off the southwest coast of Florida, this resort is located directly on the beach, minutes from attractions, watersports, adventurous activities and world-class golf. Enjoy a brand-new heated outdoor pool, casual and fine dining, stunning views, family activities and a luxurious spa. Whether it’s a romantic getaway or a family get-together, every detail is designed with you in mind. With a choice of indoor and outdoor venues, we’re great for events, too.

Renovation Recap

Hilton Marco Island Beach Resort & Spa has completed a $60 million transformation to bring our guests a completely reimagined best in class Gulf-Front experience. Renovations include a revamped lobby and upgraded accommodations, all with expanded Gulf-front views. The Resort unveiled luxury family suites with adjoining rooms and poolside suites with spacious verandas. Guests will enjoy a new outdoor pool, upgraded event spaces, a grab-and-go market and brand new restaurant & bar.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Flowery Branch Lake Lanier
description:
let your trip to Lake Lanier blossom at the Hampton Inn & Suites Flowery Branch.

Located on the banks of Lake Lanier, in the foothills of Appalachia, Flowery Branch is a quaint southern town with an adventuresome spirit. The Hampton Inn & Suites Flowery Branch is located for great access to the I-985, just three miles from scenic Lake Lanier and minutes away from hiking and mountain biking opportunities on the trails of the Blue Ridge Mountains. If you’re looking for something with a little more pace, the Lanier Speedway, which hosts some 2,500 race fans each and every weekend, is also located close to this Hampton Inn hotel in Flowery Branch. Catch a glimpse of preseason practice of the NFL's Atlanta Falcons, who also call this city home. Enjoy a warm welcome at a hotel that offers an idyllic location and easy access to great dining and entertainment. Our clean, comfortable, spacious Guest Rooms and Suites will make you feel right at home, and a host of services and amenities are designed with you in mind. Choose the Hampton Inn & Suites hotel in flowery Branch whether you’re visiting Flowery Branch to meet with clients and customers or you’re here for a fun-filled break with the family.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Atlanta Marietta
description:
• Situated in the heart of the Wildwood Business Park
  • Complimentary on-site parking
  • Complimentary WiFi access throughout the hotel
  • Freshly prepared breakfast daily in the Great American Grill®
  • 2,550 sq. ft. of divisible event space, accommodating up to 220 guests
  • Extra in-room amenities for a feel of home with the in-room hospitality center
 

Where you need to be in Wildwood, northwest Atlanta

Located in northwest Atlanta, a business suburb of Marietta, Georgia, in the Wildwood Business Park, the Hilton Garden Inn Marietta hotel in Atlanta, GA is the ideal location to access major corporations including IBM, GE, Coca-Cola, Indus Int'l, The Weather Channel, Lockheed Martin, Dobbins AFB, and Manhattan Associates among others. This Wildwood, Atlanta hotel is within walking distance to restaurants and shopping areas including Cobb Galleria Mall. Hotel policy requires that all guests reserve complimentary transportation services a minimum of 24 hours in advance. Wheelchair accessible transportation available. Business guests benefit from complimentary parking on site and a fully equipped 24-hour business center for staying in touch wherever they are. A host of additional amenities and services make the Hilton Garden Inn Maietta GA the natural choice for the busy executive and visitors to Atlanta. Let our friendly, helpful staff help make your stay successful.

name: Hilton Atlanta
description:

Located in the heart of Downtown Atlanta, Hilton Atlanta is within one mile of renowned attractions and premier venues. Our hotel is close to the interstate and MARTA rapid transit for convenient accessibility to Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport and surrounding neighborhoods. Recharge and rejuvenate in our modern guestrooms and enjoy a full range of amenities to conduct business, maintain a fitness routine or unwind. From inspired spaces to three unique dining options, thoughtful amenities and excellent service, Hilton Atlanta reflects Atlanta’s hospitable spirit.

  • Covered pedestrian sky bridge to MARTA and Peachtree Center Mall
  • Award-winning restaurants and lounges with unique options for breakfast, lunch and dinner
  • Fully equipped fitness center, outdoor jogging track, tennis and basketball courts

Meetings & Events

Looking for the perfect space for your meeting, special event or wedding? Request Proposal

A space to recharge

From modern guestrooms to spacious suites, choose the space that is right for you at Hilton Atlanta. 1,249 updated rooms feature thoughtful amenities including HDTVs, WiFi, Hilton Serenity beds and mini-refrigerators. Select an executive room or suite and benefit from access to the Executive Lounge with complimentary breakfast and refreshments.

Rooms and suites

Explore Atlanta

  • Center for Civil & Human Rights (0.7 mi)
  • Centennial Olympic Park, Georgia Aquarium & World of Coca-Cola (1 mi)
  • College Football Hall of Fame (0.9 mi)
  • Fox Theatre (1.2 mi)
  • Inside CNN Studio Tour at CNN Center (0.8 mi)
  • Mercedes-Benz Stadium (1.2 mi)

Pet-friendly

Our downtown Atlanta hotel features a pet-walk area for our four-legged guests.

(Pet deposits and maximum weight restrictions apply.)

Executive Upgrades

Benefits include skyline views, private check-in, private access lounge, concierge on-duty, complimentary WiFi, continental breakfast and evening hors d’oeuvres.

Executive rooms

Authentic Dining

Hilton Atlanta is home to four unique dining venues:
- Nikolai’s Roof & Lounge – Panoramic views and innovative cuisine
- Trader Vic’s & Mai Tai Bar – Pan-Asian dishes and tropical cocktails
- Southern Elements – Modern twist on southern cuisine
- Marketplace – Quick-serve café open 24 hours

Dining

Memorable Meetings

Boasting 129,000 sq. ft. of flexible function space with two ballrooms and 23 breakout rooms on a single floor, Hilton Atlanta has the space, style and service you need. Our certified meeting professionals will handle the details, from delicious catering options to A/V requests.

Plan an event

name: Hilton Atlanta/Marietta Hotel & Conference Center
description:
Idyllic and Historic Hotel in Marietta

Hilton Atlanta/Marietta Hotel & Conference Center's grand structure and idyllic location warmly welcome Guests traveling for business and leisure. Stay at this hotel in Marietta, GA, and be near hiking, mountain trails and the on-site City Club Marietta Golf Course. Business Guests will appreciate the convenience of the flexible conference space while families can experience the many amenities accompanied by lush views.

Directions

Good to Know

  • Set on City Club Marietta Golf Course, a top public course
  • Historic Kennesaw Mountain views from our Marietta, GA hotel rooms
  • 25,000 sq. ft. flexible conference space for up to 600 guests
  • Corner Pantry Express in the lobby, for snacks and drinks
  • The Pub with 8 TVs, Wii's and pool tables; dinner served nightly
  • On-site Brumby Gardens houses Gone With The Wind Museum

Meetings & Events

Looking for the perfect space for your meeting, special event or wedding? Request Proposal

Rest, Relax and Recharge

With views of the golf course and Kennesaw Mountain, our luxurious rooms were created with your comfort in mind. Suites include a separate seating area and every room is equipped with a flat screen TV, work desk and ergonomic chair. After a busy day, relax in a rocking chair on the stunning Southern-style patio.

See our rooms

Discover Marietta

The town features a historic downtown, Kennesaw Mountain, and nearby attractions such as Six Flags White Water, Dobbins Air Reserve, and Gone With the Wind Museum. We are close to a myriad of dining options in Marietta Square and just 15 minutes from Sun Trust Park, home of the Atlanta Braves.

Seasonal Hiking Package

Enjoy breakfast for 2, free WiFi, Kennesaw Mountain transport, trail snack & map.

View Special Offer

City Club Marietta Golf Course

This beautiful 18-hole championship course is adjacent to the hotel and just a few blocks from historic Marietta Square. Situated amidst rolling hills and towering pines, the course has various shot selections and will test all skill levels. Practice driving and putting before taking to the bentgrass greens.

Golf course details

Hamilton's Restaurant

Featuring the best in 'New South' cuisine, Hamilton's is an upscale dining establishment fashioned after the Southern estates of the past. The restaurant offers a 250-seat dining room with two private salons, seating an additional 50, and an elegant outdoor 'Veranda Patio' with breathtaking golf course views.

More dining options

Marietta Wedding Venue

Celebrate your wedding or event in the beautiful grounds of the Hilton Atlanta/Marietta Hotel. Our idyllic setting, impressive event space and stunning views make us the perfect venue.

Plan an event

name: Grand Naniloa Hotel Hilo - a DoubleTree by Hilton
description: Boasting a stunning oceanside location with magnificent views of Hilo Bay and Mauna Kea, Grand Naniloa Hotel Hilo - a DoubleTree by Hilton occupies a historic site amidst a lush, tropical landscape. Our setting also offers guests access to Hilo Airport, just 2 miles away. Tee off on our 9-hole golf course, or soak up the sunshine in our beautiful outdoor swimming pool. Energize in the complimentary fitness center, or rent some water sports equipment and take to the waves. Our inviting guest rooms offer WiFi, a generously sized work desk, microwave, refrigerator, and in-room safe. Upgrade to an ocean-view suite with a separate living area and a balcony offering ocean views. Savor breakfast, lunch and dinner in our restaurant, which has indoor and outdoor seating. Admire sweeping vistas of Hilo Bay from the large deck of our Lobby Lounge. Watch Our Hotel Video Our Hilo hotel features the most extensive catering facility and the largest showroom on the east side of the Big Island - a stylish venue providing nightlife and a space to showcase talented local musicians. With 13,000 sq. ft. flexible meeting space, including a wedding gazebo and a large ballroom which holds up to 400 people, this Hilo hotel is the ideal venue for meetings, conferences and weddings. Take advantage of onsite catering and the latest A/V technology, and stay productive in the 24-hour business center. Our friendly, professional staff look forward to welcoming you with a signature chocolate chip cookie upon check-in.

name: Grand Waikikian by Hilton Grand Vacations
description:
Wonderful oceanfront hotel on Waikiki Beach

Welcome to the Grand Waikikian Suites by Hilton Grand Vacations. Our splendid hotel is idyllically set within the 22-acre Hilton Hawaiian Village Beach Resort & Spa on world-renowned Waikiki Beach. Make the most of our convenient location in the heart of Waikiki, unwind in a comfortable suite, and enjoy fabulous facilities including four pools, a spa, fitness center and kids adventure program.

Directions Email us

Local attractions

  • Waikiki Beach Walk
  • Royal Hawaiian Center
  • Kapiolani Park
  • Honolulu Zoo
  • Waikiki Aquarium

    • Good to know

    • Oceanfront location on world-renowned Waikiki Beach
    • All-suite hotel featuring balconies with ocean and city views
    • All suites with full kitchens, washer/dryers
    • Excellent choice of bars and restaurants
    • Spa, fitness center and four pools
    • Camp Penguin™ program for children

    Meetings & Events

    Looking for the perfect space for your meeting, special event or wedding? Request Proposal

    Serenely spacious suites

    Our Waikiki hotel offers 331 elegant one- and two-bedroom suites equipped with separate living and dining areas, a full kitchen, washer/dryer, HDTV and sofa sleeper. Soak in stunning ocean or city views from your own private balcony.

    View all rooms

    Location, location, location

    Fantastic restaurants, shops and, of course, the beach are right on our doorstep. We're just ten minutes from downtown Honolulu and 20 minutes from Honolulu International Airport. Visiting Waikiki for a conference or event? The Hawaii Convention Center is only a ten-minute walk away.

    Four pools!

    Take a refreshing dip in one of our four pools. Enjoy an invigorating work-out in the fitness center or an indulgent beauty treatment at our spa.

    Family fun

    Featuring slaloming slides and pouring waterfalls, our Paradise Pool is guaranteed fun for all the family. The Camp Penguin™ children's program, meanwhile, is ideal for kids aged 5-12 keen to meet new friends and have some adventures.

    View amenities

    Tantalizing casual dining

    After a memorable day on Waikiki Beach, stop in at one of our oceanfront restaurants for delicious cuisine. Rainbow Lanai offers tasty crowd-pleasers in a relaxed environment, while Tropics Bar & Grill, our newest sizzling hot spot, specializes in succulent steaks and uniquely Hawaiian creations.

    Find out more

    Waikiki: the place to be

    Stroll along the sandy shores of Waikiki Beach, swim in the ocean or try snorkeling and kayaking. Pick up an authentic Hawaiian souvenir from the shops on Waikiki Beach Walk or the Royal Hawaiian Center. Kapiolani Park is perfect for picnics, while Honolulu Zoo and Waikiki Aquarium are firm family favorites.

    Things to do

name: Hilton Hawaiian Village Waikiki Beach Resort
description:
A family-friendly oceanfront paradise

Take a trip of a lifetime and stay at the Hilton Hawaiian Village Waikiki Beach Resort. Set among a tropical landscape covering 22 acres, our hotel boasts Waikiki’s widest and most spectacular white sand beach as well as Waikiki’s only saltwater lagoon. Stunning natural surroundings, luxurious amenities, vibrant dining options, the most adventurous daily activities and more make for a perfect holiday in Honolulu.

Explore our hotel

Directions

Good to know

  • Set on 22 acres of white sand beach close to Waikiki shopping
  • World-class Mandara Spa and five swimming pools
  • Diverse dining with over 20 restaurants and bars
  • Daily activities ranging from Hula to outdoor yoga
  • Camp Penguin children's program
  • The Ali’i, Waikiki's Private Paradise with a Concierge
  • Rainbow Tower rooms and suites with stunning views

Meetings & Events

Looking for the perfect space for your meeting, special event or wedding? Request Proposal

A place to unwind

Set across five towers, each spacious room features views of the resort, Honolulu coastline or Pacific Ocean. Select a suite for extra space and amenities, or choose a room at our exclusive oceanfront Ali’i Tower offering private check-in and enhanced services.

View all rooms

Heart of Waikiki

Ideally located in the heart of Waikiki, this hotel is 10 minutes from Pearl Harbor and 25 minutes from Honolulu International Airport (HNL). Ala Moana, the largest shopping mall in Hawaii, is just a five-minute drive away giving you easy access to over 340 shops, services and entertainment.

Local attractions

Waikiki Beach
Diamond Head
USS Arizona Memorial
Hanauma Bay
Ala Moana Mall
Honolulu Zoo

Daily adventures

Catamaran trips, turtle and whale watching tours, snorkeling, kayaking, surfing and submarine tours await right at the hotel. Unwind in one of our five pools or visit Mandara Spa for a customized spa treatment. Our Camp Penguin program offers daily adventure-packed activities for kids aged 5 to 12.

Find out more

Vibrant dining venues

With over 20 resort restaurants and bars, you'll find plenty of culinary experiences waiting to delight you. For a full Hawaiian experience, immerse yourself in the on-site Luau, and join us every Friday at the beach for Waikiki’s biggest fireworks display - a captivating awe-inspiring ritual.

Dining

Weddings and events

Big or small, your events are a breeze to plan with more than 150,000 sq. ft. of indoor and outdoor meeting space. We can accommodate up to 4,000 guests and are nearby Hawaii Convention Center. The hotel’s gorgeous natural surroundings create a perfect backdrop for your paradise Dream Wedding.

Plan an event

name: Hilton Grand Vacations at Hilton Hawaiian Village
description:
Comfort and style in Honolulu

With a 22-acre paradise of exotic plants and flowers, shimmering swimming pools and whispering waterfalls, the Hilton Grand Vacations Suites at Hawaiian Village is the perfect setting to experience Honolulu. Located on Waikiki Beach, our hotel is close to Hawaiian cultural attractions including Honolulu Zoo, Waikiki Aquarium and Diamond Head Crater. You can also enjoy a range of outdoor activities, from scuba diving to championship golf.

Directions Email us

Fast facts

  • 4 swimming pools, including 1 adults only pool
  • Fitness center
  • Mandara Spa
  • 20 restaurants and lounges

Good to know

  • Located in the heart of Waikiki, 20 minutes from the airport
  • Encompasses Lagoon Tower and floors 12-18 of Kalia Tower
  • 5,000 sq. ft. aquatic playground
  • Shows and live events
  • Activities on site for all ages
  • Suites come with full kitchens

Meetings & Events

Looking for the perfect space for your meeting, special event or wedding? Request Proposal

A place to unwind

Our modern guest rooms feature a kitchenette with coffeemaker and TV. Looking for an extra special treat? Suites offer spectacular views of the mountain or the ocean and come with one or two bedrooms.

Rooms and Suites

An island paradise

Just 20 minutes from Honolulu International Airport, the Hilton Grand Vacations offers easy access to all that Honolulu has to offer. Waikiki is a five minute walk away, and just beyond the village there are numerous activities to experience, including scuba diving, snorkeling and championship golf.

Top attractions

  • Honolulu Zoo
  • Waikiki Aquarium
  • Iolani Palace
  • Ala Mona Beach Park

Amazing amenities

The Mandara Spa is a great place to unwind during your stay, and the kids can enjoy supervised recreation programs at Camp Penguin™ while you indulge in a treatment. The hotel features four swimming pools, including the Paradise Pool, a 5,000 sq. ft. aquatic playground boasting the largest water slide in Waikiki.

Amenities and Services

Dine in style

Offering 'Authentic Beach Cuisine', the Tropics Bar and Grill is the perfect place to experience the true taste of Hawaii. Rainbow Lanai is a beautiful, casual dining restaurant that overlooks the waters of Waikiki. The award-winning Pacific Rim serves delicious meals in an open-air dining room.

Dining

name: Hilton Waikiki Beach
description:
Luxury and comfort offered at this Waikiki hotel

Discover sweeping ocean views just steps from the beach. Ideally located in the heart of the island, Hilton Waikiki Beach is only one block from the sea. With Leahi (Diamond Head) as a stunning backdrop, this contemporary Waikiki hotel offers a true Hawaiian paradise. Find rooms and suites with gorgeous views of the surroundings, resort-style amenities, and delicious dining options any time of day.
Directions

7th Night Free Package

Book a 7-night stay and get the 7th night free, $75.00 Hotel credit per stay, plus 2 welcome cocktails.

View Offer Details

Why stay with us

  • Unobstructed ocean views and resort-style amenities
  • Just 1 block from Waikiki Beach, near shops, attractions and restaurants
  • World-famous M.A.C. 24/7 Restaurant + Bar, 24-hour room service
  • Over 17,000 sq. ft. indoor/outdoor space
  • Ocean views at Altitude @ 37 space, tropical Garden Gazebo

Meetings & Events

Looking for the perfect space for your meeting, special event or wedding? Request Proposal

Rooms with a view

Relax in a spacious guest room, suite or executive room at the Hilton Waikiki Beach hotel, perfect for couples, families and business guests alike. Each guest room features a large lanai to enjoy ocean, mountain or city views and modern amenities including WiFi access. Choose an executive room for upgraded amenities.

View rooms & suites

Location, location, location

Hilton Waikiki Beach is close to International Marketplace, Honolulu Zoo, and Kapiolani Park. Explore the shops and restaurants in walking distance or relax on the beach, just a block away. Waikiki Trolley and the bus stop at the hotel, which was named #6 hotel in Hawaii by Conde Nast Traveler Readers' Choice Awards 2018!

Relaxing amenities

Lounge on our relaxing pool deck, take in daily live music in our lobby and indulge at multiple happy hours.

Live music nightly

The Lobby Bar is located just inside the main dining area. Enjoy live music while enjoying pupus (appetizers) and exotic cocktail blends at our sophisticated lounge. The Lobby Bar is open 1pm – 10pm, featuring live music nightly from 7pm – 10pm.

View more details (PDF)

Award-winning M.A.C. 24/7

Satisfy your cravings with gourmet comfort food, featuring Hawaii's ‘Best Breakfast’ at M.A.C. 24/7. The ‘round the clock restaurant won the People’s Choice ‘Ilima Award 2018-2019. Enjoy anything any time with full menu served 24 hours, and full bar flowing until 3:30am.

Find out more

Unique Waikiki event space

Conveniently located just one mile from the Hawaii Convention Center, the Hilton Waikiki Beach hotel boasts 17,000 sq. ft. of flexible indoor and outdoor function space. Our talented Catering Team and Event Planners are available to help you plan the details.

Plan an event

name: Kings' Land by Hilton Grand Vacations
description:
Discover paradise on the Big Island of Hawaii

Reminiscent of a lush, Hawaiian plantation, and nestled among championship golf courses and the beauty and serenity of the Kohala Coast, Kings' Land by Hilton Grand Vacations is the perfect setting for your vacation in the South Pacific. Enjoy access to the abundant facilities and amenities at the nearby Hilton Waikoloa Village hotel, including sparkling swimming pools, a lagoon beach, restaurants, boutiques and spa facilities.

Directions Email us

Fast facts

  • All-suite hotel on the Big Island of Hawaii
  • Free shuttle service every 30 minutes (7:00 am - 9:30 pm)
  • Beautiful recreation/pool area
  • Complimentary fitness center
  • Great Lawn for outdoor events

 

 

Good to know

  • Easy access to Anaeho'omalu Beach
  • Five distinct pools and whirlpool tubs
  • Golf at Waikoloa Beach Resort
  • Kings Land Bistro & Lounge and Kings Land Pool Bar with TVs
  • Activity center with game tables, video game systems and movies
  • Free shuttle to area shops and facilities at Hilton Waikoloa Village

Meetings & Events

Looking for the perfect space for your meeting, special event or wedding? Request Proposal

Stunning suites

Choose from a variety of spectacular hotel accommodations at our resort, with spacious one- and two-bedroom suites incorporating a casually elegant tropical style, and featuring superb amenities such as kitchens, washers/dryers and private balconies.

Our suites

Our location

Kings' Land by Hilton Grand Vacations is set in the heart of Waikoloa, on the Big Island of Hawaii. Travel to the stunning Akaka Falls and swim beneath cascading water, visit the Macadamia Nut Farm, or admire the breathtaking scenery of the Hawaii Volcanoes National Park.

Local attractions

  • Akaka Falls
  • Hawai‘i Volcanoes National Park
  • Waikoloa Beach Resort
  • Macadamia Nut Farm
  • Waimea

Fitness and leisure

Set amidst waterfalls and lava rocks, our beautiful recreation area boasts plunge pools, whirlpools and loungers. Relax in the sand-bottomed pool, or zip along on a water slide as it cascades between rock formations. Try a spot of volleyball in the sports pool, or energize in our fitness center.

Relaxed dining

The open-air Kings Land Bistro & Lounge serves dishes inspired by the flavors of Hawaii and the South Pacific. Sip cocktails at Kings Land Pool Bar, which features a stunning hand-carved bar and 60-inch plasma TVs. An on-site deli café offers a variety of snacks and drinks.

Our venues

name: Ocean Tower by Hilton Grand Vacations
description:
Experience paradise on the Kohala Coast

Bask in the beauty of Hawaii when you stay at Ocean Tower by Hilton Grand Vacations. Surrounded by breathtaking views of the Pacific Ocean, tropical gardens and mountains, our hotel is an idyllic retreat just 20 minutes from Kona International Airport. We’re situated within Hilton Waikoloa Village Resort, granting you access to the resort’s many amenities, including the salt water lagoon, pools, spa, fitness center, restaurants and shopping.

Directions Email us

Local Attractions

  • Hapuna Beach State Park
  • Anaeho'omalu Beach
  • Mauna Kea Summit & Observatory
  • Kona Coffee Farms
  • Captain Cook Monument

Resort highlights

  • Spacious rooms and suites with private balcony and streaming services to TV
  • Located on the stunning Kohala Coast, just 20 minutes from Kona International Airport
  • Salt water lagoon with white sand beach, and three pools with water slide and waterfalls
  • Access to the Hilton Waikoloa Village Resort’s many amenities, including spa and fitness center
  • Golf courses, shopping, restaurants and daily resort activities
  • Trams and boats available within the resort to help you get around

Meetings & Events

Looking for the perfect space for your meeting, special event or wedding? Request Proposal

Rooms for relaxation

Take in stunning ocean, mountain or garden views from the balcony of your room or suite. Our comfortable guest rooms feature a mini-refrigerator, coffeemaker, and HDTV with PlayStation 3. Choose a suite for a full kitchen and separate living/dining area, and room to sleep up to 8 people.

Rooms & Suites

Bring the family

With three pools featuring waterfalls and a water slide, and an ocean-fed lagoon with a white sand beach, kids will love our Hawaii resort. Check out the Legends of Hawaii Luau and swim with dolphins at Dolphin Quest. Our Daily Resort Activities include hula and ukulele lessons, lei making, and games.

Penthouse perks

For added sophistication and space, choose a penthouse suite. Located on the top three floors, these suites offer two or three bedrooms and superior views.

Indulgent amenities

Enjoy access to three swimming pools, including an adults-only pool, our four-acre lagoon with white sand beach, luxurious Kohala Spa and Precor® fitness center. Our resort offers watersports, tennis and shopping, and the championship golf courses at Waikoloa Beach Resort are adjacent to our property.

Amenities & Services

Culinary delights

Indulge in delicious indoor and outdoor dining when you stay at Ocean Tower by Hilton Grand Vacations. With access to fourteen diverse restaurants and lounges, you can enjoy exotic flavors, fresh ingredients and vibrant dishes every day.

Dining

What to do around here

With a wealth of natural beauty to explore right on our doorstep, you’ll never be short of things to do. Head out to the stunning surrounding beaches, go snorkeling, or visit Mauna Kea Summit and the Kohala Volcano. Take a tour of the Kona Coffee Farms or visit the Captain Cook Monument.

Things to do

name: Hilton Waikoloa Village
description:
Breathtaking Waikoloa resort on the Kohala Coast

Experience Hilton Waikoloa Village, a unique resort on the Island of Hawaii, along the exclusive Kohala Coast. Just 20 minutes north of Kona International Airport, this Waikoloa resort features tropical gardens with waterways, electric canal boats, air conditioned trams, and a museum walkway with artwork from around the Pacific. Enjoy recreational amenities including two championship golf courses, a stadium tennis courts, three swimming pools, dolphin encounters and a lagoon beach with water toys like kayaks and paddle boards.

Explore our hotel

Directions

EXPLORE HAWAII
See all the islands have to offer through our destination guides. A unique experience awaits you there.

Learn More

 

Highlights

  • 62-acre oceanfront Waikoloa Beach Resort hotel on the sunny Kohala Coast of Hawaii, The Big Island
  • Spectacular pools, swimming and snorkeling lagoon, and interactive dolphin encounters
  • Canal boats and air-conditioned trams to travel the lush tropical grounds
  • Kohala Spa with 25,000 sq. ft. of pampering and fitness amenities
  • 2 championship golf courses and stadium tennis court
  • Museum Walkway featuring 1,800 art pieces from around the Pacific

Meetings & Events

Looking for the perfect space for your meeting, special event or wedding? Request Proposal

Comfort in a serene setting

Our delightful guest rooms and suites are based in unique towers, with balconies and WiFi access. Treat yourself to an expansive suite, complete with separate living area and sofa bed. Choose from Makai Tower or Palace Tower.

View all rooms

Wonderful resort facilities

Indulge with a revitalizing treatment or massage in Kohala Spa. Exercise in the fitness center or stroll the meditative gardens. Snorkel or kayak in the ocean-fed lagoon, filled with tropical fish. Participate in daily Hawaiian cultural activities such as lei making, hula dancing and ukulele lessons.

Attractions

  • Waikoloa Beach Resort
  • Anaehoomalu Bay
  • Mauna Kea Summit
  • Charming towns of Kailua-Kona, Waimea and Hilo
  • South Kona coffee and macadamia nut farms
  • Hawai'i Volcanoes National Park and Kilauea Volcano

    • Host your event with us

    With 235,000 sq. ft. of flexible indoor and outdoor event space, Hilton Waikoloa Village is a splendid venue for extravagant banquets, receptions and small meetings. Celebrate your wedding in our oceanside pavilion and chapel. Take advantage of supportive services and WiFi in the business center.

    Plan an event

    Culinary journey

    Savor indoor and outdoor dining at our Waikoloa, Hawaii hotel. Fourteen restaurants and lounges offer exotic settings and fresh ingredients sourced from and inspired by our island home. Kamuela Provision Company offers stunning sunset dining, and Kona Tap Room features 16 brews on tap and a pub-style menu. Try the Legends of the Pacific luau buffet at Kamehameha's Court while enjoying the music and dance of the Pacific Rim.

    Dining options

    What to do around here

    Take in live entertainment or the festive luau. Browse the resort’s shops, specializing in clothing, artwork and jewelry. Rent cruiser bikes and ride to the sandy beach of Anaeho’omalu Bay. Our helpful team will tell you about helicopter and airplane excursions, whale watching, manta ray diving, and trips to the quaint village of Kailua-Kona.

    View attractions

name: theWit Chicago - a DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel
description: Unlike any other, theWit Chicago – a DoubleTree by Hilton is more experience than hotel. Located in the heart of Chicago’s theater, arts and shopping district, theWit Hotel stands as a homage to creativity and is home to ROOF on theWit, Chicago’s award-winning rooftop lounge. With breathtaking design features, stunning views, unparalleled restaurants, award-winning service and state-of-the-art technology, theWit is a Four Diamond, multisensory hotel, truly meant to be experienced. Elevate your stay at ROOF on theWit, a newly renovated rooftop patio set 27 stories above it all. Rated one of the Top 3 Rooftop Bars in the World by Travel+Leisure, ROOF offers world-renowned DJs, live entertainment, and a kaleidoscope of contemporary digital art in the Gallery. Named after the iconic intersection, State and Lake Chicago Tavern is a modern gastropub featuring artisanal American cuisine from the finest locally sourced ingredients, a diverse rotating selection of Chicago craft brews, and unique handcrafted cocktails. theWit’s 310 guest rooms and suites are designed with a boutique feel, and feature downtown Chicago city views, 49-inch HDTVs, music docking stations and touchscreen phones. Unwind at Spa@theWit, with a couples massage, pedicure, facial, or summer special. Recharge in the newly renovated fitness center featuring modern cardio equipment while enjoying views of the city skyline. With over 7,000 sq. ft. of event space, plan an unforgettable event in one of 17 spaces, boasting floor-to-ceiling windows and panoramic city views. Explore countless nearby attractions including the Chicago Riverwalk, Chicago Theatre District, Millennium Park, and the Magnificent Mile.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Chicago Downtown Riverwalk
description:
• Downtown Chicago Loop hotel, near Magnificent Mile & Millennium Park
• Bella Bacino's open for breakfast, lunch and dinner
• Complimentary WiFi access throughout the hotel
• Modern fitness center
• Keurig®, refrigerator and microwave in all rooms
• Executive boardroom    

Heart of Chicago North Loop Riverwalk

  Our new Hilton Garden Inn Chicago Downtown Riverwalk hotel is located on the north side of Chicago's business loop, close to many businesses and corporations, and offers easy access to both Chicago airports. This downtown hotel is set near River North, just blocks away from the Magnificent Mile with its upscale shops and boutiques. Have a picnic in the nearby Millennium Park, enjoy museums and seasonal events at Navy Pier, or visit one of Lake Michigan beaches. Theatre enthusiasts will enjoy our hotel’s proximity to Chicago’s bustling theatre district. Enjoy delicious dining in our onsite restaurant, Bella Bacino's, for breakfast, lunch and dinner. In the evening, pop in for a relaxing after-work cocktail, work off some calories in the 24-hour fitness center, or simply unwind in your room and order room service. Host your business meeting at our Chicago Loop hotel that features a boardroom with A/V equipment rental and a capacity of 12 people conference-style.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Rockford Riverfront
description:
Welcome to Embassy Suites by Hilton Rockford Riverfront. Our all-suite hotel is ideally located near the shops and restaurants of Rockford Main Street, close to UW Health Sports Factory, Coronado Performing Arts Center, BMO Harris Entertainment Center and Anderson Japanese Gardens.
Feel at home in your studio or two-room suite, complete with a work desk, HDTV, sofa bed, a kitchen with mini-refrigerator and microwave, and complimentary WiFi. Start your day with free made-to-order breakfast, then relax after a busy day at our complimentary Evening Reception*.
We offer delicious dining options in our two restaurants, a seasonal rooftop bar, and an outdoor patio, perfect for relaxation. Work out in our Fitness Center, enjoy a soothing swim in our heated indoor pool and whirlpool, and have fun in our superior Gaming Room. If you’re looking for an event venue in Rockford, our Embassy Suites hotel offers flexible meeting space for up to 550 guests.
*Service of alcohol subject to state and local laws. Must be of legal drinking age.

name: Hilton Rosemont/Chicago O'Hare
description:
Friendly hotel near Chicago O' Hare International Airport

Stay at Hilton Rosemont/Chicago O’Hare, easily accessible from I-294 and I-90. Take advantage of our complimentary airport shuttle service to and from each terminal. Energize in the fitness center or plunge into the heated indoor pool. Savor American classics in Liberty Tavern, or unwind after your flight with a cocktail in the lounge. Plan an event with over 22,000 sq. ft. versatile function space and state-of-the-art A/V technology.
Directions

Full-Service Starbucks® in Lobby

Good to Know

  • Minutes from Chicago O’Hare International Airport, with free shuttle service
  • Connected to the Donald E. Stephens Convention Center via enclosed sky bridge
  • 10 minute walk to the CTA Blue Line station, linking to downtown Chicago
  • Free area shuttle 7am–11pm upon request, based on availability
  • Over 22,000 sq. ft. of versatile meeting and banquet space
  • Parking is not available for buses, trailers, or oversized vehicles

Meetings & Events

Looking for the perfect space for your meeting, special event or wedding? Request Proposal

Rooms and Suites

Flooded with natural light through floor-to-ceiling bay windows, our well-appointed guest rooms feature classic décor and amenities like WiFi, and a plush bed with a Serta Suite Dreams® Mattress and a Pacific Coast® Down Duvet. Upgrade to a beautiful suite for a separate living area.

View more

Our Location

We are situated moments from the airport and a 10 minute walk to the CTA Blue Line station, providing links to downtown Chicago. Take in a show at the adjacent Donald E. Stephens Convention Center. Within walking distance, The Park at Rosemont offers dining, entertainment and a seasonal courtyard.

Local Attractions

  • Parkway Bank Entertainment Park
  • Donald E Stephens Convention Center
  • Rosemont Theater
  • All State Arena
  • Rivers Casino
  • The Fashion Outlets of Chicago

Fitness and Leisure

Start your day with an invigorating workout in our fully equipped 24-hour Life Fitness© fitness center. Unwind in the heated indoor swimming pool, which showcases panoramic views of the downtown Chicago skyline.

Bars and Restaurants

Enjoy tasty, all-American favorites in Liberty Tavern, and relax with a chilled glass of wine or a refreshing beer in Liberty Tavern Lounge. Pick up your favorite hot drink and a snack to-go in our full-service Starbucks cafe.

Connected to the Donald E. Stephens Convention Center covered sky bridge, our Rosemont hotel is an ideal venue for your next business meeting or event. Enjoy more than 22,000 sq. ft. of versatile meeting and banquet space, including a Grand Ballroom and Executive Conference Center.

description:
Oak Brook resort near Chicago

Nestled in a serene, 150-acre estate, the Hilton Chicago/Oak Brook Hills Resort & Conference Center is perfect for business and leisure. Our hotel boasts the Audubon-certified 18-hole Willow Crest Golf Club and over 42,000 sq. ft. of IACC-certified event space. Located just west of downtown Chicago in the upscale area of Oak Brook, IL, this resort is ideal for getaways, golf trips, family vacations, celebrations or business events.

Experience the beauty of the resort grounds from B. Restaurant. B. Restaurant offers fresh, local and seasonal ingredients in a casually dramatic setting. Our bar & grille is a social gathering place with craft beers, pub food and the best outdoor seating in the suburbs.

Our Chicago-land golf resort offers flexibility when booking your corporate, charity and associate golf events. Designed by famed architect Dick Nugent, this Certified Audubon Cooperative Sanctuary features 18 holes for all skill levels.

name: Palmer House a Hilton Hotel
description:
Hip and historic spaces at Chicago landmark

Palmer House® A Hilton Hotel has 140 years of experience, winning over downtown Chicago travelers with award-winning service. Set in the theatre and financial district, this landmark hotel is close to well-known attractions. You’ll find famous frescoes, stylish suites, massive meeting space and artful dining at Lockwood and Potter's Chicago Burger Bar. Relax at The Spa at Palmer House or work out in the sizeable fitness center.

Good to know

  • AAA Four Diamond Chicago hotel with historic guest rooms
  • In walking distance to Millennium Park, the Art Institute and theaters
  • The Spa at Palmer House offers a menu with both classic and trending services

Meetings & Events

Looking for the perfect space for your meeting, special event or wedding? Request Proposal

Rooms, suites and more

Grand Chicago meeting spaces

Small or large, formal or informal, Palmer House has the spaces for all of your meetings and events. This Chicago hotel boasts seven ballrooms, 77 breakout meeting rooms and more than 50 VIP suites. Expect fast internet access, A/V expertise and a connectivity center.

Conferences, events, weddings

Restaurant and bars

Lockwood Restaurant & Bar offers seasonally inspired American cuisine. The Bar at Lockwood provides an escape from the everyday with the timeless ceiling as your backdrop. Head to Potter’s Chicago Burger Bar for one "L'' of a flavorful burger, or stay in and order Room Service.

Dine with us

Did you know we provide Afternoon Tea as well as complimentary WiFi in the lobby? We also host a UPS Business Center outfitted with computers and staff to assist with shipping packages. Buy some flowers, get a manicure or read the latest from the newsstand.

name: Hilton Chicago
description:
Close to everything. Far from ordinary.

Overlooking Grant Park, Lake Michigan, and Museum Campus, Hilton Chicago is in walking distance of Soldier Field’s games and concerts, and near Pilsen neighborhood’s bar and restaurant scene. Hop on the 'L' to Chinatown or simply absorb the arts featured in Wabash Arts Corridor. Enjoy a soulful evening at Buddy Guy’s Legends. Ours is the closest downtown Chicago hotel to McCormick Place Convention Center.
TIMELAPSE - Rooftop Views

Suites range in size from 800 to 1400 sq. ft.

Upgrade to a specialty suite

Feel cozy near the fireplace in 720 South Bar + Grill with a handcrafted cocktail or local beer. Tap into a pint or pick from 100 whiskeys while enjoying traditional Irish classics and some not-so traditional bites at Kitty O’Sheas. Stop by Herb N’ Kitchen for upscale on-the-go items.

Explore Dining Options

Classic meets cool

Hilton Chicago has a long history of creating events that make a lasting impression. You’ll team up with one of our certified meeting planners dedicated to the finite planning details to create a seamless and successful event.
