name: Hilton Grand Vacations Chicago Downtown Magnificent Mile
description:
Contemporary comfort in the heart of Chicago

Enjoy a premium location between the Magnificent Mile and Navy Pier when you stay at Hilton Grand Vacations Chicago Downtown Magnificent Mile. Located on the top floor of the DoubleTree, our vibrant hotel places you walking distance from top Chicago attractions. Savor delicious onsite dining, enjoy a workout in our state-of-the-art fitness center, or relax by our seasonal rooftop pool, complete with bar and terrace.

Directions Email us

Local attractions

  • Magnificent Mile
  • Navy Pier
  • Oak Street Beach
  • Millenium Park
  • Grant Park

Resort highlights

  • Excellent location near Michigan Avenue, close to shopping, dining and world-class attractions
  • Walking distance from Navy Pier and Magnificent Mile
  • Spacious guest rooms and suites featuring contemporary décor, HDTVs and free WiFi
  • State-of-the-art fitness center and seasonal rooftop pool, bar and terrace
  • Cocktails and dining at HotHouse lobby bar and restaurant, with buffet breakfast available
  • 24-hour Business Center for internet and printing needs

Meetings & Events

Looking for the perfect space for your meeting, special event or wedding? Request Proposal

Stylish accommodations

Every spacious room and suite at our Downtown Chicago hotel features a coffeemaker, mini-fridge, and 55-inch wall mounted HDTV. Upgrade to a suite for a living room with queen sofa bed, wet bar, dining table with 4 chairs, and a microwave.

View all rooms

Excellent location

Our North Michigan Avenue hotel is centrally located between Magnificent Mile and Navy Pier, placing you walking distance from top Chicago attractions, shopping and dining.

In-room dining

For cozy dining in the privacy of your room or suite, choose Room Service, available between 6am and 11pm.

Exceptional amenities

Enjoy all the amenities you need to unwind or stay productive throughout your stay in Chicago. Get work done in the 24-hour business center, swim in our seasonal pool, lounge by the rooftop bar and terrace, grab snacks in the lobby market, or work out in our state-of-the-art fitness center.

Amenities and services

Savor the moment

Enjoy warm, friendly dining at our HotHouse restaurant, ideally located in the open-concept lobby. Fill up on a buffet breakfast, savor shareable plates, sliders, flatbreads, salads and desserts, then relax with Illinois craft beers and exceptional cocktails.

Restaurants and lounges

name: The Drake
description:
Iconic hotel in Chicago's Gold Coast neighborhood

From New Year's Eve 1920 to today, The Drake, a Hilton hotel has been a purveyor of hospitality excellence. This AAA 4-Diamond hotel in the Gold Coast neighborhood at the start of the Magnificent Mile is just footsteps from Oak Street Beach and Lake Michigan. Iconic dining venues, elegant guest rooms, and modern recreation, relaxation, and business facilities offer everything you need for a remarkable stay in Chicago.

Directions

Good to know

  • Iconic Chicago hotel – a symbol of elegance since 1920
  • Prestigious Gold Coast neighborhood location
  • Situated at the beginning of the Magnificent Mile
  • The closest hotel to Oak Street Beach
  • Event space for up to 600 guests with views of Lake Michigan and the Chicago skyline

Meetings & Events

Looking for the perfect space for your meeting, special event or wedding? Request Proposal

Your elegant space in the city

Lake Michigan or city views await you from our modern rooms and suites. Upgrade to an Executive Room and benefit from top-floor Executive Lounge access. Looking for something extra special? We have 74 specialty suites, from The Princess Diana Suite, graced by the Princess during her Chicago visit in 1996, to our Junior Suites with a Lake Michigan view.

Room & suites

While you're in town

Discover some of the best shopping in country just footsteps from the hotel or explore the many landmark attractions nearby such as Water Tower Place, 360 CHICAGO and American Girl Place. Spend time browsing some of the world’s most important art collections at the Art Institute of Chicago.

Local attractions

Michigan Avenue shopping
360 Chicago at John Hancock
Museum of Contemporary Art
Oak Street Beach
Navy Pier

Whiskey Club at Coq d'Or

Be among those who enjoy a good Old Fashioned and special tastings and discounts throughout the year. Membership is complimentary.

Afternoon Tea

Spend an afternoon with flavored teas and festive treats. On select days sip Afternoon Tea while a harpist plays. Make a reservation here.

Breakfast before the mile

Save with breakfast for two included in your stay — the perfect start to an adventure on Chicago's Magnificent Mile. Start your day right, then enjoy the convenience of our iconic location on the Magnificent Mile near Michigan Avenue shopping, Gold Coast dining, Lakeshore Drive and Oak Street Beach.

Magnificent breakfast package

Classic dining venues

Relax with a cocktail in Coq D'Or, one of the first establishments in Chicago to serve alcohol after the repeal of Prohibition. Enjoy a memorable brunch at Cafe on Oak, or sip traditional afternoon tea at the famed Palm Court.

Restaurants & bars

Plan for business

The Drake, a Hilton hotel offers downtown Chicago event facilities, spectacular views and versatility for your next event that is sure to impress your attendees. Your business meeting or social gathering will be given the same attention as that given to NATO Summit VIPs, corporate conferences, and hundreds of stylish weddings.

Plan an event

name: Hotel Fort Des Moines, Curio Collection by Hilton
description:
Stay where the presidents stayed at the historic Hotel Fort Des Moines, Curio Collection by Hilton, and experience contemporary sophistication that rings with charm from its storied past. Opened first in 1919 and listed on the National Register of Historic Places, our newly renovated boutique hotel evokes nostalgia from the moment you step into the grand two-story lobby and resonates all the way to our beautifully restored grand ballroom.
Boasting a prime location in the heart of downtown Des Moines, staying with us means you’re near all that the city has to offer. This classic, brick-style hotel is an eight-minute walk from Western Gateway Park and less than two miles from the Iowa State Capitol.
Revel in fantastic downtown views from our modern guest rooms and sink into plush bedding while taking comfort with amenities like complimentary WiFi, refrigerators, smart HDTVs, and coffeemakers. Opt for a suite and sprawl in spacious living areas or spoil yourself in our sumptuous Presidential Suite.
With 12,000 sq. ft. of meeting space, the Hotel Fort Des Moines is the perfect place to host corporate trainings, team building events, seminars, and much more. A full banquet team can meet the needs for hosted dinners, work lunches, or quick coffee breaks.

name: Hilton Des Moines Downtown
description:
Directly connected to the convention center

Part of the Des Moines Skywalk system, Hilton Des Moines Downtown is the only hotel directly connected to the Iowa Events Center. Hilton Des Moines Downtown is the only downtown hotel with natural light in every meeting room, and the pre-function space opens onto an inviting outdoor terrace. Dine downtown with an outside fireplace on the patio of Park Street Kitchen, and relax in the indoor pool and expansive fitness center.

Directions Email us

Local attractions

  • Iowa State Capitol
  • Historic East Village
  • Court Avenue Entertainment District
  • Iowa Events Center
  • John & Mary Pappajohn Sculpture Park
  • Simon Estes Riverfront Amphitheater

Good to know

  • Connected to Iowa Events Center and Des Moines Skywalk
  • Blocks from I-235 and just 5 miles from DSM Airport
  • 330 guest rooms, including suites and executive suites

  • Heated indoor pool and complimentary fitness center
  • Event space for 400 guests, including a 10,000 sq. ft. ballroom

Meetings & Events

Looking for the perfect space for your meeting, special event or wedding? Request Proposal

Home away from home

Work or relax in comfort in our modern guest rooms. Draw the black-out curtains for a great night’s sleep, then greet the day with a cup of coffee and a cozy bathrobe. All rooms include a refrigerator, WiFi, a 50-inch TV, a large work space, MP3 connectivity, an in-room safe and deluxe bath products.

View our rooms

Executive benefits

Here a few days? Choose a modern suite for extra space and amenities – great for executives and families. Enjoy a living area and private bedroom, plus Executive Lounge access for all-day refreshments and evening cocktails. Select a suite with Iowa State Capitol views or a corner suite overlooking downtown.

Airport shuttle

Our hotel offers complimentary shuttle service to Des Moines International Airport. Please see the Front Desk for more details or to arrange a ride.

Directly connected to best Iowa events

As the only downtown hotel directly connected via skywalk to the Iowa Events Center, Hilton Des Moines Downtown offers convenient access to events at Hy-Vee Hall or a concert at Wells Fargo Arena.

See What's On

Downtown dining options

Enjoy a meal amid the sights of downtown at Park Street Kitchen. Join us for breakfast, lunch or dinner in the modern and inviting setting, or cozy up on the outdoor patio with a fireplace for al fresco dining. Order your favorite local brew or cocktail at Park Street Bar, or relax with room service delivered to your door.

Restaurants and lounges

Innovative events

Plan a conference or reception with 14,000 sq. ft. of meeting space, filled with natural light, including a pre-function area that opens onto an outdoor terrace. Located on the same level for easy flow, features include touch-screen navigation signage, smart window lighting, and a dedicated office for meeting planners.

Meetings and events

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Wichita Downtown Delano
description: None

name: The Higgins Hotel New Orleans, Curio Collection by Hilton
description:
The Higgins Hotel New Orleans, Curio Collection by Hilton provides a nostalgic hotel experience sure to intrigue and delight. Embrace the romanticism of years gone by in our Art Deco building, situated within the vibrant New Orleans Art District. We’re the official hotel of The National WWII Museum, and our passionate staff are ready to share their knowledge or help you purchase admission passes to the museum.
Our guest rooms offer striking 1940s-style décor, free WiFi, enhanced technology and 55-inch HDTVs. For even more space, upgrade to a VIP suite or deluxe corner king room for stunning city views. Check in with ease using Digital Key, and relax throughout your stay with our fitness center, bell service and valet parking.
Enjoy French-inspired cuisine at Café Normandie, our full service restaurant, or unwind at our casual yet classic bar, Kilroy's at the Higgins. Sip coffee or pick up grab and go options at Provisions, the Higgins Hotel's marketplace and shop. When you’re ready to socialize, head to Rosie’s on the Roof. Our high energy rooftop bar provides unparalleled views of the city and the Bollinger Canopy of Peace.
An excellent choice for extraordinary events, the Higgins Conference Center offers stunning, flexible event space with a distinctive Art Deco vibe. Host a cocktail reception for up to 1,900 and utilize The National WWII Museum’s uniqueness for an unmatchable guest experience.

name: Hilton New Orleans Riverside
description:
Spectacular riverfront location in New Orleans cityscape

It's all about location in New Orleans and the Hilton New Orleans Riverside places you at the center of it all. Nestled against the banks of the Mississippi, guests can watch the ships come sailing in or dive into the city life just steps away. Grab a beignet, listen to live jazz, ride a streetcar, or hop into a parade, you never know what you’ll experience in the vibrant culture and excitement of New Orleans just outside our front door. Make it a trip to remember with Hilton.

Watch our Video
Directions

Park & Stay
Get parking with every night of your stay.

Find out more

Good to know

  • Downtown New Orleans hotel in the Warehouse and Arts District
  • Walking distance to the French Quarter and Jackson Square
  • Contemporary and comfortable guest rooms and suites
  • Amazing downtown or Mississippi River views from upper floor rooms
  • Drago's Restaurant, Riverblends Café, Spirits Bar and Public Belt
  • Two outdoor pools, Health Club by Hilton Fitness Facility
  • Award-winning meeting space with highly trained staff

Meetings & Events

Looking for the perfect space for your meeting, special event or wedding? Request Proposal

A Spacious Southern Oasis

Our inviting guest rooms and suites offer quiet relaxation, away from the endless excitement of New Orleans. Take a break between the festivities with spacious rooms offering HDTVs and mini fridges. Upgrade to enjoy city skyline or Mississippi River views, or choose a suite for more space. Accessible rooms are also available.

Rooms & Suites

Location, location

Shop the Outlet Collection, attached to our hotel and enjoy easy access to Morial New Orleans Convention Center. You also can walk to the French Quarter, Audubon Aquarium, and Butterfly Garden and Zoo, as well as countless restaurants, art galleries and more.

Great deals

At Hilton New Orleans Riverside we have special offers including Parking, Shopping, Hilton Honors Points and more.

HealthClub by Hilton

Never miss a workout? We’ve got you covered. The 100,000 sq. ft HealthClub by Hilton boasts everything from tennis, basketball, and racquetball courts to fitness classes, weight training equipment, outdoor pools and saunas. Work out your way and play the day away only in New Orleans!

HealthClub

Real New Orleans dining

From breakfast at Le Croissant to dinner at Dragos, Hilton New Orleans Riverside serves authentic New Orleans dishes to guests and locals alike. Savor favorites such as Charbroiled Oysters and Mama Ruth's Gumbo here.

Dine with us

Memorable meetings

Whether you're gathering an exclusive list or a city-wide convention, Hilton New Orleans Riverside has the space, style and service you need. Our certified meeting planners will cover all the details, from delicious catering options to the latest equipment.

Plan your event

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Portland Airport ME
description:
Stylish New Portland Airport Hotel

Located right across from Portland International Jetport, Home2 Suites by Hilton Portland Airport ME is the perfect place to rest after a long day. Whether you’re here for business or an extended stay, our convenient location is just off I-95 near the Maine Mall. Attractions in downtown Portland,Maine are only 15 minutes away. Our stylish, spacious suites include everything you need for a comfortable stay. Prepare meals in the in-suite kitchen, including a full-sized refrigerator, cooktop, microwave and utensils. Relax while watching the 50-inch HDTV, or work comfortably at the desk with ergonomic chair and free WiFi. Start your day with complimentary oatmeal, fruit, waffles, breakfast sandwiches and more at our Inspired Table™. When you need a snack, visit our 24-hour Home2 MKT® for snacks, beverages and sundries. Unwind in the heated indoor pool or on the outdoor patio after a long day, or multitask in our Spin2 Cycle facility by running a load of clothes while you work out.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Hanover Arundel Mills BWI Airport
description: We're across the highway from Arundel Mills outlet shops and the Live! Casino, and BWI Airport is eight minutes away. Enjoy a dip in our indoor pool and whirlpool, or torch calories in the 24-hour fitness center. Our restaurant serves cooked-to-order breakfast, as well as dinner and cocktails. Host meetings in our conference and boardroom space. WiFi's on us.

name: Canopy by Hilton Baltimore Harbor Point
description:
Hello and welcome to Canopy by Hilton Baltimore Harbor Point, perfectly nestled between Harbor East and Fells Point with waterfront views of the Inner Harbor and Patapsco River. Fine dining, shopping, nightlife, an array of museums and more are just steps from our door. Explore Baltimore in style with our complimentary Canopy Bikes. We'll introduce you to the neighborhood with a local welcome gift at check-in.
At Canopy, we've got you covered. Our LEED Silver hotel features a Just-Right Room with a positively local vibe. Enjoy views of the waterfront from floor-to-ceiling windows, custom art and nautical décor, as well as amenities like free WiFi and exclusively designed Canopy bed. Suites offer added space, a separate living area and cozy extras like bathrobes and Canopy socks. Every floor has a filtered spring water station so you can refresh and feel great going forward.
Welcome the day in the café with a delicious artisanal breakfast made with fresh ingredients and local produce or have a Canopy Break Fast bag delivered to your door. Dine indoors or on our outdoor waterfront terrace, and sample local beer, wine and more at our complimentary evening tastings. Work up a sweat in our fitness center, and host your next meeting or function in one of our event spaces. Choose from our professional boardroom, 1,700 sq. ft. meeting room, 9th floor terrace or Canopy Central.

name: Hampton Inn Silver Spring Washington DC
description:
a modern retreat near the nation's capital.

This Hampton Inn hotel in Silver Spring, MD is just steps from the lively dining, shopping, and entertainment district of downtown Silver Spring. Walk or take our local area shuttle to the Red Line Metro station, just three blocks away, for access to historic sites, national monuments, and the sports venues of Washington DC. Nearby pedestrian-friendly streets boast shops, art galleries and restaurants. Hampton Inn Silver Spring is conveniently located near Interstate 495/Capital Beltway and within 45 minutes of all three area airports. The headquarters of organizations such as Discovery Communications, United Therapeutics, and the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) are in walking distance. Visit the AFI Silver Theater and Cultural Center, which offers movie buffs a look at the art and mystery of movie-making, or enjoy a premier performance at Live Nation’s new Fillmore Silver Spring, less than one block away. Guests of our Hampton Inn hotel in Silver Spring, MD unwind in our heated indoor pool and whirlpool and keep up routines in our fitness center. Connect with home and the office using free WiFi in each guest room. Wake up to Hampton's free hot breakfast or simply grab one of our free Hampton On the Run® Breakfast Bags, available Monday to Friday, for a quick, healthy meal to go. This hotel has a Suite Shop on the lobby level for beverages and snacks. For business or leisure, our hotel is a comfortable home away from home.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Washington DC North/Gaithersburg
description:
Set in the I-270 Technology Corridor, DoubleTree by Hilton Washington DC North/Gaithersburg offers an upscale, convenient base – for business, meetings and events, and family travel. Enjoy a warm DoubleTree welcome with our signature DoubleTree chocolate chip cookie.
This hotel in Gaithersburg is located between Rockville and Germantown and about an hour north of Washington DC. Take advantage of our complimentary shuttle to the Shady Grove Metro station for a ride on the Red Line to points south. The shuttle also travels within a five-mile radius of the hotel.
Small meetings, weddings for 400, and banquets for 800 people will be memorable in our 16,000-square-foot space. Facilities include two ballrooms, a large pre-function space with floor-to-ceiling windows, and smaller breakout rooms. Expect modern audio-visual service, in-house or outside catering options, and the option to expand your event using outdoor spaces.
Rooks Corner, our American-style restaurant, is open for breakfast, lunch, and dinner and features a kids’ menu. Get Starbucks® coffee on weekday mornings or grab-and-go snacks any time. Room service is available from 6:30am to 11pm.
When work, meetings, and sightseeing are done, unwind in our indoor pool or 24-hour fitness center. Our sparkling outdoor pool is open seasonally.

Guest rooms and suites at DoubleTree Washington DC North/Gaithersburg feature garden or city views, comfortable Sweet Dreams® beds, and spacious work desks.

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Hanover Arundel Mills BWI Airport
description: None

name: Hilton Baltimore Inner Harbor
description:
Baltimore Inner Harbor hotel in downtown

Hilton Baltimore Inner Harbor holds a prime place in the Inner Harbor, a popular historic, cultural and business district. Our downtown hotel is next door to Camden Yards and across the street from M&T Stadium. We’re also connected to the Baltimore Convention Center and a quick 15 minutes to BWI Airport. Restaurants, indoor/outdoor event spaces, fitness options - we have something for everyone.
Directions Email us

Family friendly

Quality time is simplified with our amenities:

  • Children's menu
  • High chairs and playpen
  • Children's video rental
  • Close to Inner Harbor attractions

 

Highlights

  • Connected to Baltimore Convention Center by sky bridge
  • 2-minute walk to Camden Yards
  • Walking distance to Inner Harbor dining, shopping and attractions
  • Fitness center, pool and many rooms and suites overlook Camden Yards
  • The Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf - the only one in the region
  • 24-Hour Heated indoor pool, whirlpool and sauna

Meetings & Events

Looking for the perfect space for your meeting, special event or wedding? Request Proposal

A great night's sleep

Our guest rooms and suites have a flat-screen TV and work area with remote printing – some also have views of Camden Yards. Enjoy a light breakfast and evening snacks in the Executive Lounge when you book an executive room. Our 20 suites have concierge service and several room layouts.

Rooms and suites

Location, location, location

Hilton Baltimore Inner Harbor is set in the Inner Harbor, an iconic seaport area of restaurants, museums, shops, sports complexes, nightclubs and historic ships. We’re a quick walk to Camden Yards, M&T Stadium, the National Aquarium, Maryland Science Center and a waterfront concert at Pier Six Pavilion.

Baltimore pride

We display 40 pieces of local art, and many guest rooms and public areas overlook Camden Yards. Our structure includes bricks from the famous ballpark.

The amenities you want

Enjoy a range of perks during your stay. Use the computer workstations or ship packages at the UPS Store® in the lobby. Check out the 24-hour indoor pool, sauna and whirlpool, surrounded by palm trees for a vacation feel in the city. We also have a gift shop, dry-cleaning service and 24-hour business center.

Hotel services

Grab a bite

Have a meal on the patio or in the comfort of your suite - the choices are delicious at Hilton Baltimore. Get the morning going at our exclusive Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf. Diamond Tavern serves breakfast, crab cakes, salads and other favorites for whenever hunger strikes. Our lobby bar is a great spot for happy hour.

Hotel dining

Weddings and events

A conference room with ballpark views, a grand ballroom - we have 29 perfect spaces for any event. In fact, cvent called us a Top 100 US Meeting Hotel in 2014. Our meeting rooms can seat 12 to 2,500 guests, and our catering team and certified event planners are here to help personalize your event or wedding.

Plan an event

description:
An airport hotel near downtown Boston

As the only hotel directly connected to Logan International Airport, just two miles from downtown, Hilton Boston Logan Airport connects you to it all. Arrive from your flight in minutes via climate-controlled walkways or 24-hour shuttle service. AAA Four Diamond amenities include full-service dining, room service, a grab-and-go Cafe, Fitness Center, indoor pool, and digital key. Surrounded by a park-like setting, enjoy aeronautical or Boston city skyline views from our rooms and suites.

See Inside

Directions

WEEKEND LIKE A LOCAL
Enjoy up to 50% off Sunday stays + exclusive local Boston experiences when you book with us.

  • Ride or walk via enclosed sky bridge to our Logan Airport hotel
  • 10 minutes from downtown via taxi or water taxi
  • 24-hour courtesy bus to all airport terminals, subway and water taxi
  • 30,000 sq. ft. of function space located on one level for ease of flow

Rooms and Suites

Connecting you to it all

Whether you have a full day or just one hour to spend in Boston, our team at Hilton Boston Logan Airport can help you find the best attractions, entertainment, food, and of course, sports in the city. From the Public Gardens and world-class museums, to fresh seafood and eclectic tastes, our neighborhood guide offers sightseeing highlights and transportation options.

24-hour service

Need something? Text our personal Concierge at 617-681-8899 for assistance any time of day.

AAA Four Diamond Amenities

Stay connected to personal success and wellness on the road with AAA Four Diamond amenities including full-service dining options, room service, a grab-and-go Cafe, 24 Hour Fitness Center, indoor pool, digital check-in and digital key, and 24-hour guest assistance via text.

Amenities and Services

Casual dining

Enjoy three distinct dining outlets, offering only the freshest ingredients. Choices abound at Berkshires with the breakfast at Hilton buffet, served daily. Café Presto is your one stop for Starbucks beverages, pastries, snacks and evening beer and wine service, while Connolly's Publik House believes in quality food and drink in a relaxed atmosphere, with extensive beer, wine and spirit options.

Dining

Convenient meetings

When meeting at Hilton Boston Logan Airport, you're sure to create meaningful connections and engage your attendees. Our hotel offers two pillar-less ballrooms, spacious foyers for networking, media-ready boardrooms, 18 multi-purpose breakouts and versatile indoor/outdoor event spaces for banquets for up to 500. Combined with our Four Diamond Amenities and expert staff, your attendees are assured an enjoyable experience.

Plan an Event

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Ann Arbor North
description:
Experience a warm welcome at our newly renovated DoubleTree by Hilton Ann Arbor North. Within five miles of downtown Ann Arbor, the University of Michigan, local museums and parks, our hotel is perfectly located off Highway 23. Visit during one of the many seasonal festivals or catch a football game at The Big House for the full Ann Arbor experience.
Check-in to a great stay and enjoy a warm DoubleTree Chocolate Chip Cookie upon arrival. Each guest room includes complimentary WiFi, a 55-inch HDTV, workstation and coffeemaker. Choose a suite for more space, a separate living room and larger HDTV, or stay in our Five Feet to Fitness Room™ with an indoor cycle, digital kiosk and strength, suspension, body weight, core and yoga options.
Our onsite restaurant offers American cuisine in a casual setting, serving breakfast and dinner along with handcrafted cocktails from our full bar. Our 24-hour Made Market features a variety of fresh snacks, beverages and grab-and-go items for your convenience.
Keep up your fitness routine in our 24-hour fitness center or relax in the swimming pool or hot tub. Busy travelers can also take advantage of our on-site car rental, hair salon and complimentary shuttle to local areas. Host your next meeting or special event at our hotel, with 8,000 sq. ft. of flexible event space for up to 400 guests.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Auburn Hills
description:
Welcome to the newly renovated Embassy Suites Auburn Hills by Hilton situated in the peaceful northern suburbs. With freshly decorated guest suites and meeting spaces, a newly re-designed atrium featuring a waterfall, expanded breakfast and lounge areas, enjoy space to unwind while at work or play!! Our relaxed, all-suites hotel is conveniently located near I-75, across from the Chrysler Fiat Headquarters and just a few miles from Great Lakes Crossing Outlet Mall and Somerset Collection Shopping Mall.
Each updated and spacious suite at the Embassy Suites Auburn Hills features a private bedroom with king-sized bed or two double beds, separate living room with sofa, chair, desk and hospitality center with coffee maker, refrigerator and microwave, plus two HDTVs. Enjoy free made-to-order breakfast every morning of your stay, and an Evening Reception with drinks and light snacks. Children go free, making us an ideal choice for families.
Delicious all-day dining is available at our Great American Bar & Grill restaurant, or you can have a meal delivered to your suite with Room Service. Shop for toiletries, snacks and beverages at our 24-hour gift shop. Relax with a swim in our updated pool with hot tub, outdoor oasis or work out in the fitness center.
Host a corporate meeting in one of our three boardrooms or larger conference spaces or hold a social event for up to 250. Our 24-hour business center makes it easy to catch up on work, any time.

name: Canopy by Hilton Grand Rapids Downtown
description:
Hello and welcome to Canopy by Hilton Grand Rapids Downtown, perfectly situated in the heart of the city. Our hotel’s mid-century-modern design nods to Grand Rapid’s “furniture city” history, with imaginative moments throughout. Chic restaurants and coffee houses, local breweries, galleries, concert venues, and theaters – the highlights of downtown are steps from our front door. Grab a complimentary Canopy Bike and discover your new favorite places. We'll introduce you to the neighborhood with a local welcome gift at check-in.
At Canopy, we've got you covered. All our thoughtfully designed Just-Right Rooms include a canopy fashioned by Amish artisans, a unique hand-crafted bed, and a locally made luxurious mattress. Enjoy modern, comfortable furnishings, a walk-in shower, upscale bathroom comforts, free WiFi, and a 55-inch TV.
Choose our spacious suites for a balcony, enhanced views, a separate living area, plus cozy extras like bathrobes and Canopy socks.
Start the day with an artisanal breakfast in Canopy Central or have a Canopy Break Fast Bag delivered to your door. Our modern, fresh restaurant offers all-day dining and cocktails. Our beer garden style rooftop bar is steeped in natural light, serving cocktails and small bites.
Get ready ahead of check-in in the Transition Room. Unwind, play, and work in our Retreat space, and enjoy 24-hour fitness center access.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Grand Rapids Downtown
description:
Welcome to Embassy Suites by Hilton Grand Rapids Downtown. Our modern, all-suite hotel is ideally located in the Monroe North district. Enjoy the many shops, restaurants and breweries within a block of our building, or if you're in the mood for adventure, hike, bike or kayak along the Grand River. Business travelers will appreciate our proximity to the DeVos Place Convention Center, just 2 blocks away.
Feel at home in a studio or two-room suite with a work desk, two HDTVs and complimentary WiFi. All suites and studios feature sofa beds, mini-refrigerators and microwaves. Upgrade for a Grand River view and Five Feet to Fitness, Hilton's revolutionary new fitness room concept.
Start your day with free made-to-order breakfast, and unwind later with our complimentary Evening Reception*. Enjoy dinner and drinks at our high-energy sports bar, Big E's Sport Grill, or sip a locally roasted coffee at Whitewater Cafe. Cocktail time? Visit our Whitewater Lounge, featuring a spacious outdoor patio overlooking Sixth Street Bridge Park and the Grand River.
Work out in our fitness center or get work done in the business center. Our hotel boasts a unique, Michigan-shaped indoor pool and indoor/outdoor whirlpool spa. If you're looking for an event venue in Grand Rapids, our Embassy Suites hotel offers 6 flexible meeting spaces to accommodate up to 250 guests.
*Service of alcohol subject to state and local laws. Must be of legal drinking age.

name: Tru by Hilton Monroe MI
description: None

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Roseville Minneapolis
description:
A New Extended Stay Hotel Close to Minneapolis and St. Paul

Stay a while at our new Home2 Suites by Hilton located in Roseville-Minneapolis. Conveniently located just minutes from downtown, International Airport, Symantec, Oracle, Boston Scientific and the Mall of America. You’ll feel right at home in our spacious suites offering a well-equipped kitchen complete with a full-sized refrigerator, dishes, microwave and flatware. Utilize the moveable furniture options to create a customized home or office environment. Choose from a suite with one or two queen beds and take advantage of the sofa bed in the separate living area. Unwind at the indoor saline pool or cozy up by the fire on our outdoor patio. Wake up to our complimentary breakfast of over 400 various options including hot breakfast sandwiches, fresh fruit, coffee and juices. Gather with others around the Inspired Table and swap travel stories while sharing a meal. Manage your time effectively at our Spin2 Cycle Center—Laundry and Fitness Facility.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Roseville Minneapolis
description:
Enjoy a warm welcome and excellent service at our DoubleTree by Hilton Roseville Minneapolis, situated just a few minutes north of Minneapolis and St. Paul. Adjacent to I-35W, we are just minutes from Rosedale Shopping Center and less than 30 minutes from Minneapolis-St. Paul International Airport and the Mall of America. We are also within minutes of several of the area’s major corporations and universities, including Land O’Lakes, Medtronic, Target, University of Minnesota and more. Enjoy our complimentary shuttle to the Rosedale Mall, State Fairgrounds and more within a 5-mile radius of the hotel.
We'll greet you at check-in with a warm DoubleTree Chocolate Chip Cookie, then you can unwind in a comfortable and spacious guest room or suite. Enjoy all the amenities you need for a productive and relaxing stay, including WiFi, a large work desk and room service. Suites include additional space and a luxurious jetted tub.
Discover delicious fine dining at Axel’s restaurant, serving breakfast, lunch and dinner. We also offer a full bar with handcrafted cocktails and fine wine. Fuel up with Starbucks coffee and a snack at our 24-hour convenience shop. Take a dip in our large, heated indoor pool or keep up your routine in our fitness center. Host your next meeting or event in our spacious Ballroom, with 4,600 sq. ft. of elegant function space for up to 300 people.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Minneapolis Mall of America
description: None

name: Tru by Hilton Minneapolis Mall of America
description: None
streetAddress: 2415 East Old Shakopee Rd. Suite B

name: Hilton Minneapolis
description:
Minneapolis hotel linked to convention center

Via skyway, our hotel connects to shopping, dining, entertainment and the Minneapolis Convention Center. Spacious guest rooms offer scenic downtown views and reflect a sophisticated urban finish. The open lobby welcomes world travelers to indulge in lively offerings from Ten 01 Social, our centrally situated bar and restaurant; enjoy Starbucks® and provisions-on-the-go at Ten 01 Market.

Directions Email us

Local attractions

  • Minneapolis Convention Center
  • Theatre District
  • Minneapolis Institute of Arts
  • Mississippi Riverfront
  • Craft Beer Brewery Tours
  • Mall of America

Good to know

  • Complete redesign of lobby, function space and food offerings
  • Spacious guest rooms with refrigerator, safe and 50-inch TV
  • Skyway to Minneapolis Convention Center and city center
  • Meeting space for 10 to 2,800 people; 3 ballrooms, 35 meeting rooms
  • Ten 01 Social and Ten 01 Market offer entertainment and dining experiences
  • Complimentary 24-hour fitness center featuring Peloton Bikes™, indoor pool and sauna

Meetings & Events

Looking for the perfect space for your meeting, special event or wedding? Request Proposal

Enjoy skyline views

Select from standard guest rooms, corner suites or a parlor suite with a conference table for eight. We also provide executive and accessible rooms. We now feature PURE® Wellness accommodations, which are nearly 99.9% allergen-free…an experience that enhances your well-being so you can sleep better and be at your best.

Rooms with Views

Our downtown location

  • 12 miles from MSP Airport; light rail & SuperShuttle available
  • Just steps from Target Center and Target Field
  • 10 miles or less from Mall of America, Science Museum of Minnesota

    • Pet friendly hotel

    Four-legged animals are welcome. Pets up to 75 lbs. are allowed with $75 non-refundable deposit.

    We know business

    To make your work easier, our downtown Minneapolis hotel offers an expansive meeting venue, an Executive Lounge and a business center. But wait, there's more. Rent a car from Enterprise onsite or ship a parcel from The UPS Store.

    Plan an Event

    Dining

    Ten 01 Social elevates any occasion with a menu that intrigues and service that soothes. On the go? Satisfy your appetite at Ten 01 Market, our all-day destination for everything from Starbucks® beverages to salads, sandwiches and made-to-order pizzas. Find the provisions you need and variety you’ll love here.

    Dining

    Things to do in walking distance

  • Nicollet Mall
  • MN Twins at Target Field
  • MN Timberwolves at Target Center
  • MN Vikings at US Bank Stadium
  • Walker Art Center
    • Things to do

name: Tru by Hilton Oxford
description:
Stay near the fun at our new Tru by Hilton Oxford, just off Highway 7 in Oxford, Mississippi. We are minutes from Ole Miss, Oxford Square and Oxford Conference Center. Get a great night’s rest in our efficient rooms; they have everything you need and nothing you don’t! You can count on each uniquely Tru room for free WiFi, a large HDTV with premium channels, clean and comfy bed, and a big, bright bathroom.
Wake up to a free, hot breakfast with healthy and indulgent options, from waffle boats to eggs and fruit. Grab a gourmet snack at our 24/7 market, also serving beer and wine. Fresh LavAzza coffee, Stash tea and hot chocolate is always available, as well as flavored syrups so you can jazz up your cup.
Play games, work hard or charge your device in our spacious lobby. Stay focused in a semi-private alcove and enjoy free wireless printing. Keep up your routine in our fitness center or shoot some pool in the lobby.
Affordable travel now comes with unexpected things – like certainty.

name: Hampton Inn Moss Point Pascagoula
description:
your home from home in relaxing Moss Point, MS.

Welcome to the Hampton Inn Moss Point Pascagoula hotel, located off I-10, off exit 69, less than 30 miles from the Mississippi Gulf Coast Region in the city of Moss Point, MS. Explore the revitalized downtown area riverfront views along with quaint boutiques, delicious cafes, and plenty of green space for enjoying outdoor activities. Take a walk on the wild side while feeding the gators at the Gulf Coast Gator Ranch. Visit the McCoy's River and Marsh Tours and admire the Pascagoula River. Or take a quick drive to Biloxi or Gulfport and discover some of the South's best casinos and outlet malls. The Hampton Inn Moss Point, MS hotel is also located within eight miles of the Chevron Refinery, Ingalls Shipyard, MS Power-Plant Daniel, VT Halter Marine, Signal International, Rolls Royce, KBR employment agency, and many other businesses. Free business services and meeting facilities make this a great place for your next meeting, reunion or getaway at our hotel in Moss Point, MS. Whether you’re with family or on business, we want to help you start your day off right. You’ll always get a clean and fresh Hampton bed®, free WiFi, Hampton’s free hot breakfast and our southern hospitality.

name: Doubletree by Hilton Hattiesburg
description:
Welcome to the DoubleTree by Hilton Hattiesburg. Set in a quiet, residential area, the hotel is just 5 minutes from Lake Terrace Convention Center and 10 minutes from the University of Southern Mississippi. Enjoy easy access to Camp Shelby, William Carey University and the Historic Downtown area, and count on friendly service throughout your stay, starting with a warm DoubleTree chocolate chip cookie at check-in.
Every stylish guest room offers plush bedding, a microwave, mini-refrigerator, coffeemaker and 42-inch HDTV. Check email with complimentary WiFi, and work smart with an ergonomic desk area and complimentary remote printing. In addition you can choose a suite with a wet bar and sofa sleeper.
When you're ready to unwind, stop by The Local Kitchen and Tap to experience some of Mississippi's best craft beer offerings. From India Pale Ales and Lagers, to Porters and Wheat Ales, you are sure to find a style that fits your tastes. To accompany your selection you will find a food friendly menu of appetizers such as Street Tacos, Flat Breads, Hamburger Sliders, Vidalia Onion Rings and more. The Local Kitchen and Tap offers Certified Angus Beef steaks such as the Ribeye Steak and Filet Mignon.
With an indoor pool, fitness center, outdoor pool, putting green and sport court, it’s easy to stay entertained at our hotel. Our hotel can also accommodate meetings, conferences and celebrations – plus catering – for up to 200 people in our 3 event spaces. Stay connected in the 24-hour business center.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton St. Louis St. Charles
description:
Embassy Suites St. Louis St. Charles, MO hotel offers space and a quality touch. Located just one mile from the Main Street of historic St. Charles, the hotel provides a great base for visitors to St. Louis to explore nearby casinos and shopping, only 20 miles away. Travel to Lambert-St. Louis International Airport from our hotel in just ten minutes.
The hotel is connected to the St. Charles Convention Center, offering an ideal accommodation when attending events. Take the family to the St. Louis Zoo or head to Six Flags St. Louis for an exciting day out. Browse the stores at one of the nearby malls including Mid Rivers Mall, St. Louis Mills Mall and St. Louis Galleria, or catch a concert at the Verizon Wireless Amphitheater. Lindenwood University is located close to the hotel, making our hotel the ideal accommodation for students and visitors.
Relax in a two-room suite with separate living and sleeping areas at our St. Charles, MO hotel. Warmly decorated suites provide thoughtful amenities to make you feel at home, including two TVs, a microwave, fridge and internet access. Enjoy a made-to-order breakfast every morning and sip a tasty beverage at the complimentary Evening Reception* before dining in the Cyprus Grille.
Treat yourself to an aromatic Starbucks® coffee from Caffeina's Marketplace. Take a dip in the indoor pool or enjoy an invigorating workout at the fitness center.
*Service of alcohol subject to state and local laws. Must be of legal drinking age.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton St. Louis Forest Park
description:
Expect quality service and care when you stay at the newly renovated DoubleTree by Hilton St. Louis Forest Park. We're just west of downtown in the trendy Central West End, near Washington University School of Medicine and the BJC Medical Campus. Forest Park, the St. Louis Zoo, the Missouri Botanical Garden, and history and art museums are all within three miles of our hotel.
We offer guests a warm greeting with our DoubleTree chocolate chip cookie upon check-in. Relax in a contemporary guest room or suite, each with a mini-refrigerator, microwave, HDTV and WiFi. Other hotel amenities include a fitness center, garage parking, and 1,100 sq. ft. of meeting space.
Dine with us at Applebee's Grill & Bar or have a meal delivered to your room. We also offer snacks and beverages at our 24-hour Made Market.
Our hotel shuttle travels to several local attractions including The Hill, a charming neighborhood with family-owned delis, restaurants, bakeries and markets. Ask our front desk for shuttle details.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton St. Louis/Forest Park
description:
Welcome to the all new Home2 Suites in Forest Park

Welcome to Home2 Suites by Hilton St. Louis/Forest Park, conveniently located on I-64/US40 near Central West End. Ideal for extended-stays, families and business travellers, our contemporary hotel is located less than 15 minutes from many major St. Louis attractions, including the Fox Theatre, Missouri Botanical Gardens, City Museum, and the Cathedral Basilica of Saint Louis. Busch Stadium and Forest Park are both less than five minutes away. Within minutes, guests can take advantage of the fantastic shopping and dining options that the downtown area has to offer. The St. Louis International Airport (STL) is just 12 miles north of our all-suite St. Louis hotel. Unwind in a stylish studio suite, equipped with complimentary WiFi, an LCD TV, a sleeper sofa, a work desk with ergonomic chair, and a kitchenette with full-size refrigerator, microwave and dishwasher. Upgrade to a larger suite, with additional seating and bedding options. Work out in the fitness center, which includes two treadmills, one cross trainer, and a stationary bicycle. Swim lengths of the sparkling indoor pool, and relax in the company of loved ones in the outdoor dining area with grills. Enjoy complimentary breakfast every morning of your stay, and stock up on snacks, frozen foods and general sundry items at our suite shop. Laundry facilities are available on-site to all guests at our Forest Park St. Louis extended-stay hotel.

name: St. Louis Union Station Hotel, Curio Collection by Hilton
description:
Within sweeping archways, fresco and gold leaf detailing, mosaics and glass windows, you’ll find the St. Louis Union Station Hotel, Curio Collection by Hilton. Our AAA Four Diamond Hotel provides a truly elegant experience in the heart of a bustling metropolitan area. Transport yourself to a time when travel was an art and the fine details were important.
Every guest room boasts timeless décor, a work area, a flat screen TV and spacious bathroom. Opt for a suite with a courtyard view, concierge lounge access and added amenities. Several of our suites offer exclusive access on the historical side of the building and are individually railroad themed.
Dining is a unique experience at our Union Station hotel with offerings ranging from American cuisine to a quick sandwich or dessert. Savor delicious breakfast, lunch and dinner at the Station Grille with lovely fountain views. Stop by the Grand Hall Market for your morning Starbucks coffee and grab a local treat or souvenir.
After a busy day in St. Louis, unwind with one of our many hotel amenities. Workout in the fitness center, swim some laps in the outdoor seasonal pool and revel in The Grand Hall Experience 3D Light Show. Plan your next St. Louis event in our 130,000 sq. ft. of flexible space for up to 2,000 people. Our unique venue, on-site event staff and catering options make your wedding day as perfect as possible.

name: Hilton Branson Convention Center
description:
Branson's Convention Center Hotel

Located in the heart of historic downtown Branson, the sleek 12-story tower of the Hilton Branson Convention Center hotel is attached to the Branson Convention Center. Re-energize in the hotel’s fitness center or relax in your private cabana by the pool. Indulge in a delicious steak dinner at Level 2 Steakhouse or begin the day with the Hilton Branson Convention Center hotel’s signature breakfast.

Directions

Celebrate in Style Package
Enjoy a complimentary drink upon arrival and in-room breakfast for two. Get away in style.

View Offer Details

Highlights

  • Connected to Branson Convention Center and adjacent to Branson Landing, with shopping and dining
  • Minutes from over 50 live shows
  • Amenities including an indoor and outdoor pool, fitness center and business center
  • 220,000 sq. ft. of flexible event space in Branson
  • Onsite dining at Level 2 Steakhouse
  • Outdoor swimming pool and cabanas

Meetings & Events

Looking for the perfect space for your meeting, special event or wedding? Request Proposal

Rooms and Suites

Each of our rooms and suites provide a place to unwind or catch up on work. Sit down to your favorite show on the 32-inch LCD TV or at the work station designed to help you be productive away from home. Choose views of Branson Landing, Lake Taneycomo, downtown or the Ozark Mountains.

Rooms & Suites

Local Attractions

Branson Landing
Historic Downtown Branson one block away
Lake Taneycomo
Titanic Museum
Silver Dollar City

Branson Landing

We are located next to the Branson Landing, a scenic boardwalk filled with shopping, restaurants and entertainment.

Amenities

Our hotel offers golf packages, on-site restaurants and bars and private cabanas for a truly relaxing experience. Spend time at the outdoor pool or unwind in your room with complimentary WiFi and in-room dining from Level 2 Steakhouse.

Amenities

Dining

Take your pick of dining options at our hotel. From the seasonal Clear Lounge to Level 2 Steakhouse, you'll find something to enjoy at the hotel for breakfast, lunch and dinner. After a long day, opt for in-room dining and spend a peaceful evening away from the city in the comfort of your own room.

Dining

Plan an Event

Our hotel adjoins the 220,000 sq. ft. Branson Convention Center, with access to attendees moving between properties. Host an industry exhibition in one of two exhibit halls, organize a fundraiser for 2,000 in the Taneycomo Ballroom, or hold meetings in one of 12 smallerareas or 3 board rooms.

Plan an event

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Omaha Southwest
description:
Enjoy upscale amenities and a great location at Doubletree by Hilton Omaha Southwest. Newly remodeled and conveniently situated just off I 80, we grant you easy access to Baxter Arena, Henry Doorly Zoo and the University of Nebraska Omaha.
Unwind in your spacious guest room, featuring floor to ceiling windows, free WiFi, a large desk, and an elegant bathroom, complete with large backlit mirror and contemporary barn door entrance. Suites offer additional space, a sofa bed, a wet bar with microwave and refrigerator, and a sitting nook with reading lamp.
Dine in style in our sleek, custom-designed Vida Restaurant and Lounge, or unwind for the evening in our VIP hospitality suite. Work out in our 24-hour fitness center, then relax in our heated, glass-enclosed pool, featuring outdoor recreation space. If you’re here on business, get work done in our open-concept business center, or impress your guests by hosting an event in our flexible, modern meeting space.

name: Hilton Omaha
description:
Stay next to the Omaha Convention Center

Hilton Omaha is located in the heart of downtown near the Old Market Entertainment District and 7 minutes from Eppley Airfield Airport. Our hotel is one block from TD Ameritrade Ballpark and joined to the CHI Health Event Center via an enclosed sky bridge. Take our complimentary shuttle to the airport and to sites in the downtown area. Our lobby shop offers snacks, sundries and Starbucks® coffees.

Directions

Local Attractions

  • CHI Health Event Center
  • TD Ameritrade Park
  • Omaha's Old Market
  • Henry Doorly Zoo
  • Omaha Children's Museum
  • Holland Performing Art Center

Highlights

  • 7 minutes from Eppley Airfield Airport (OMA)
  • Over 39,000 sq. ft. of flexible conference and banquet space
  • Walking distance to Omaha attractions including TD Ameritrade Ballpark
  • Access to our health club and spa, featuring a crystal clear pool and whirlpool
  • Connected to CHI Health Event Center via sky bridge

Meetings & Events

Looking for the perfect space for your meeting, special event or wedding? Request Proposal

Rooms and Suites

Each room at our downtown Omaha hotel features comfortable guest room chairs, an ergonomic work desk and 32-inch HDTV. Suites offer more space with a sofa sleeper in the additional oversized living space. Upgrade to an executive room with complimentary breakfast, snacks and hors d’oeuvres.

Rooms & Suites

Hotel Facts

Our Omaha hotel is perfect for your next meeting or event. With 39,000 sq. ft. of flexible space, you have plenty of layout options. Plan a wedding or social gathering in the 6,900 sq. ft. Blackstone Ballroom or the 10,000 sq. ft. Grand Central Ballroom.

Creighton University Partner

As a partner of Creighton University, Hilton Omaha offers special rates that include WiFi. Book your room today.

Amenities

Business travelers appreciate our location and amenities designed for a successful stay. From FedEx office business services to the enclosed walkway to the convention center, we make it easy to get work done even away from the office.

Amenities

Dining

Experience our signature menu and the finest wines in the inviting restaurant; enjoy after work appetizers and cocktails in the vibrant lounge; or take in the sights and sounds of north downtown Omaha on the patio, complete with a full bar and community table. A private dining room is also available.

Dining

Plan an Event

With 39,000 sq. ft. of column-free flexible space on one level, Hilton Omaha is an ideal conference location. Deliver a keynote address, stage a product rollout or set up a tradeshow for industry professionals in the 10,000 sq. ft. Grand Central Ballroom and adjoining foyer. The CHI Health Event Center is connected to the hotel via a sky bridge.

Plan an Event

name: Hampton Inn Las Vegas Strip South
description: Situated on the south end of The Strip, our hotel is less than half a mile from Las Vegas South Premium Outlets. We offer a complimentary shuttle to McCarran International Airport, Town Square, and Mandalay Bay. Enjoy quick access to I-15 and I-215, plus a clean and comfy bed, free WiFi, and breakfast.

name: Tropicana Las Vegas - a DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel
description:
Experience the excitement of Las Vegas at the casually elegant Tropicana Las Vegas - a DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel with acclaimed restaurants, premier entertainment options, and unsurpassed service.
Receive a warm welcome with a freshly baked chocolate chip cookie before settling into a stylish, residential-style guest room with a breezy beach atmosphere. Decorated in a sunset palette of warm shades, each room features custom-designed furnishings, a 42-inch HDTV, and Serta Perfect Sleeper beds™ with 300-thread count linens.
Choose the Paradise Tower to be seconds from the casino floor or the Club Tower for a guest room near the conference center. From glamorous weddings to business meetings of all sizes, the flexible conference center is an ideal venue for up to 2,500 people.
Try your luck in our casino and choose from table games and slots or raise the stakes in our high limit area. Enjoy world-class entertainment with the Laugh Factory comedy club or indulge in a signature treatment at Glow®, a Mandara Spa, featuring a modern fitness center overlooking our award-winning pool and gardens.

name: Hilton Lake Las Vegas Resort & Spa
description:
Convenient, comfortable Resort near Las Vegas Strip

Boasting an ideal location in Henderson, NV, 20 miles from the Las Vegas Strip but worlds away from an ordinary Las Vegas experience, Hilton Lake Las Vegas Resort & Spa offers a thrilling escape with easy access to the bright lights of the city. Indulge at our on-site Spa and Salon, reserve a private cabana and relax at our resort style pool. Keep up your routine at our fitness center or explore the outdoors with a visit to Hoover Dam and Lake Mead.

Directions

 

AAA Four Diamond Award Winner

Highlights

  • 20 miles from Las Vegas Strip, 17 miles from McCarran Airport
  • Shuttle to Las Vegas Strip 3X daily, reserve with Guest Services
  • Adjacent to Village at Lake Las Vegas, with marina, shops, restaurants
  • Resort pool with private cabanas and full-service Spa and Salon
  • Versatile meeting & event space, ballroom; 24-hour business center
  • Private cabanas; food and drink from Lagoon Bar & Grill poolside

Meetings & Events

Looking for the perfect space for your meeting, special event or wedding? Request Proposal

Rooms and Suites

Our spacious guest rooms feature peaceful views of the lake or the surrounding desert mountains. Enjoy luxurious marble bathrooms, current movies on HDTVs and complimentary WiFi. Upgrade to a balcony suite for more space to work or relax.

See Our Rooms

Location information

Adjacent to MonteLago, a Tuscan inspired Village at the Lake, including a marina with water sport activities, weekend concerts, boutique shopping, eclectic restaurants, championship golf and Lake Mead fishing adventures are moments away.

View Map (PDF)

Digital Key

Head straight to your room when you use the Digital Key in our Hilton Honors App.

Learn More

Spa Ravella

Mediterranean inspired Spa Ravella is an oasis-like wellness retreat at Lake Las Vegas. Our resort's spa offers complete treatment packages, including saltwater pool, healing waters, yoga sessions, salon and skin care. Daily activities are on our Spa Calendar (PDF) .

Book a Treatment

Restaurants and Bars

Overlooking the fire pit and Florentine Garden, Medici Café and Terrace exemplifies our fresh seasonal dining approach, with salads, sandwiches, and hot, healthy dishes for breakfast and lunch. Sip a morning coffee in our hotel lobby lounge or evening cognac in the high-tech library of Firenze Lounge, or dine alfresco in a private cabana at the Poolside Lagoon Bar & Grill.

More Dining Options

Golf Excursions

Ready to play? Two Jack Nicklaus Signature courses, at SouthShore Country Club and Reflection Bay Golf Club, are adjacent to the resort, while two Rees Jones-designed courses are a short distance away. After golf, Lake Mead fishing charters, Hoover Dam, and other attractions are within reach.

More Information

name: Hilton Grand Vacations on the Las Vegas Strip
description:
Family-friendly resort on the Las Vegas Strip

Discover Hilton Grand Vacations on the Las Vegas Strip, set in the heart of all the action. Situated at the north end of the Las Vegas Strip, our resort hotel offers a non-gaming family refuge in the 24-hour city, with all the comforts of home. Located within 15 minutes of McCarran International Airport (LAS) and convenient to I-15, our hotel offers a retreat from the bright lights of the city and is within easy reach of downtown.

View Video

Directions Email us

Local attractions

  • Lake Mead and the Hoover Dam
  • Red Rock Canyon
  • Las Vegas Speedway
  • Las Vegas Premium Outlets
  • Vegas Indoor Skydiving
  • Downtown Las Vegas

Good to know

  • Studios, 1, 2, and 3-bedroom suites
  • Suites have full kitchens and washer/dryers
  • Two heated outdoor pools, two hot tubs, plus an adult only hot tub
  • Therapies and pampering at eforea spa
  • Poolside gas grills and cabanas available
  • Contemporary fitness center and outdoor sports courts

Meetings & Events

Looking for the perfect space for your meeting, special event or wedding? Request Proposal

Spacious accommodations

An ideal resort destination featuring updated one-, two- and three-bedroom suites in two towers. Suites include king-sized beds, a sofa sleeper, fully equipped kitchens, washers and dryers. Studios have a kitchenette.

View more details

Local information

Enjoy being central to all things Las Vegas when you stay with us at the Hilton Grand Vacations on the Las Vegas Strip. Conveniently located off the I-15 freeway, we're only 5 miles from McCarran International Airport, Signature Flight Support, and Las Vegas Executive Air Terminal.

eForea Spa

Escape for facials, lash extensions, body treatments or a relaxing massage. Spa Info

Amenities

Enjoy first-class amenities during your stay. Swim in our two pool areas, workout in the fitness center, shoot some hoops on the basketball court or relax in a cabana. Our business center offers everything you need to stay productive. Escape to our spa for the ultimate relaxing and pampering experience.

Find out more

Fresh fare

Grab a quick breakfast or lunch in the newly redesigned Marketplace featuring Starbucks® coffee. Relax after a busy day in the Lobby bar with a cocktail or local craft beer. Plan a cookout at the gas barbeques for some family fun. The seasonal Waves Pool Bar and Grill is a great way to grab a snack or refreshing beverage poolside.

View on-site dining

Meetings and events

Hilton Grand Vacations on the Las Vegas Strip offers comfort and convenience when planning your next meeting or event. Enjoy spacious suites, an on-site business center and WiFi access. Contact our Sales Team at 1-877-651-4482 for assistance with reserving 10 rooms or more.

Plan an event

name: Canopy by Hilton Jersey City Arts District
description:
Hello and welcome to Canopy by Hilton Jersey City Arts District, a fun and vibrant new lifestyle hotel in the heart of downtown Jersey City. Surrounded by endless restaurants, art galleries and transportation options, the attractions and entertainment of Jersey City and New York are just minutes away. Take one of our complimentary Canopy Bikes to explore the neighborhood, use the PATH train station next door or rideshare.
At Canopy, we have got you covered. Our Just-Right Rooms have a positively local vibe with décor and art inspired by the area. Enjoy residential comforts like free WiFi, a 55-inch TV, built-in fridge drawer, and beds designed exclusively for Canopy. Choose a suite for a separate living area, more space and cozy extras like bathrobes and Canopy socks. Every floor has a filtered spring water station so you can refresh and feel great going forward.
Welcome the day in Canopy Central Bar and Bistro with a delicious artisanal breakfast made with fresh ingredients and local produce or have a Canopy Break Fast bag delivered to your door. Host weddings and events in our 1,400 sq. ft. of function space, featuring the latest A/V technology and space for up to 250 guests. We also offer an outdoor event terrace for small groups, a transfer lounge and 24-hour fitness center.

name: Hilton Newark Airport
description:
Newark Airport hotel with easy access to NYC attractions

Enjoy the convenience of staying close to the airport. Set just a five-minute drive away, the Newark Airport is accessible by our free 24-hour shuttle. New Jersey businesses and attractions are within easy reach, and sports fans will enjoy close proximity to Newark's Prudential Center and the MetLife Stadium. If you prefer to stay in, we have great amenities including an on-site Newarker Restaurant, Amelia's Bar, indoor pool and a 24/7 gym.
Directions

Good to know

  • Situated 1 mile from Newark Airport, with free 24-hour shuttle
  • Modern 24-hour fitness center and indoor pool
  • Newarker Restaurant with early breakfast and all-day dining
  • On-site Amelia's Bar serving drinks and light snacks
  • Room service available from 6:30am to 12:30am
  • Convenient access from Newark Airport to NYC via AirTrain

Meetings & Events

Looking for the perfect space for your meeting, special event or wedding? Request Proposal

A place to unwind

Choose from a range of spacious guest rooms and suites with soundproof windows at this Newark, NJ airport hotel. Our recently renovated deluxe rooms feature artistic historical detail woven into their design. Upgrade to an executive room for extra care and special amenities including a fluffy bathrobe and slippers.

View all rooms

Location, location, location

Our hotel is located just one mile from Newark Liberty International Airport (EWR) and three miles from downtown Newark. Enjoy easy access to local businesses, corporations and many New Jersey attractions that are just minutes away. Explore New York City excitement, only 15 miles from the hotel.

Day use rooms

Perfect for long layovers, unexpected delays or small meetings. Same day check-in & check-out, 10am to 6pm.

Book Now View Terms

Hotel perks

To help you follow your exercise regimen we offer a 24-hour modern fitness center and a heated indoor pool. For a lazy breakfast in bed, order some room service, available till noon. To keep you on schedule, we run a 24-hour airport shuttle service and have flight information displayed on the lobby TV.

Amenties and serivces

On-site dining

Catching an early flight? Pop into our Newarker Restaurant for an early breakfast. The restaurant boasts a stylish setting and offers all-day dining including steaks, seafood and Chef’s specials. A great bar menu and your favorite cocktail await in our Amelia's Lounge – no need to leave the hotel!

Dining

Weddings and events

We offer over 9,000 sq. ft. of flexible event space plus a variety of rooms with high-tech services and a business center. Celebrate your Big Day with us, weather it is an intimate gathering or a lavish reception for 250 guests, and enjoy personalized service and a range of complimentary features.

Plan an event

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Albuquerque
description:
Welcome to Embassy Suites by Hilton Albuquerque, a centrally located hotel in downtown Albuquerque, New Mexico. Our all-suite hotel is near the University of New Mexico and the Albuquerque Convention Center, only three miles from Albuquerque International Sunport. We're within walking distance of TriCore Laboratories, Kindred Hospital Albuquerque and Early College Academy, and a short drive from Intel, Wells Fargo, Fidelity and Sandia National Laboratories. Close to attractions including the Albuquerque Natural History Museum, Balloon Fiesta Park, historic Old Town, Sandia Peak Tramway and Sandia Ski Basin.
Each two-room suite features a separate living room with a sofa bed, WiFi, a large desk, a mini-refrigerator and microwave. We now feature PURE® Wellness accommodations, which are nearly 99.9% allergen-free…an experience that enhances your well-being so you can sleep better and be at your best. Start your day with a free made-to-order breakfast or stop by Caffeina's for a bagel and coffee. Gather in the open-air atrium for our complimentary Evening Reception Evolution*. The Cyprus Grille serves Southwestern cuisine for lunch and dinner.
Exercise in our fitness center and indoor pool or unwind in the whirlpool. Consider our 12,136 sq. ft. ballroom, which accommodates up to 1,000, for your event. Our complimentary Business Center provides business services and equipment.
*Service of alcohol subject to state and local laws. Must be of legal drinking age.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Los Alamos White Rock
description:
unwind with breathtaking surroundings at Hampton Inn & Suites Los Alamos White Rock.

Enjoy a warm welcome at the newly renovated Hampton Inn & Suites Los Alamos White Rock, New Mexico, centrally located in White Rock, NM, ten minutes from the Los Alamos area. This Los Alamos hotel is situated close to the Los Alamos National Laboratory as well as a choice of fascinating area attractions including the Bandelier National Monument. Check out things to do in Los Alamos, NM. Take in breathtaking landscapes at Valles Calderas National Preserve, explore the Tsankawi ruins, or discover Native American Pueblos. Unwind in a bright and airy guest room with free WiFi and feel rested with a peaceful night’s sleep in a comfy, fresh bed. Choose a suite and enjoy the extra space of a separate living area featuring a pull-out sofa bed, microwave, refrigerator, and coffee maker. Start your day right with Hampton’s free hot breakfast or grab one of our free Hampton On the Run® Breakfast Bags, available Monday through Friday. Snack on treats from this Los Alamos hotel’s 24-hour Suite Shop or lounge in the cozy hotel lobby with tea or coffee any time of the day. Re-energize in the modern fitness center or catch up with work in the business center. Offering freeWiFi, this Los Alamos area hotel offers a professional meeting room. Host a private meeting or conference for up to 25 guests.

name: Hilton Santa Fe Buffalo Thunder
description:
New Mexico's most exciting casino hotel

The Hilton Santa Fe Buffalo Thunder is a 587-acre oasis and the largest destination casino hotel in the state of New Mexico. Located 15 miles north of downtown Santa Fe on the sovereign Native American land, Pueblo of Pojoaque, Hilton Santa Fe Buffalo Thunder offers one of Santa Fe's most unique golf, spa, and gaming hotel experience. Inspired by Pueblo architecture and decor, the casino contains 1,200 slot machines, 18 game tables and a poker room. Sneak off to Wo’P’in Spa for deep tissue massages, manicures, pedicures, as well as skin and body treatments. Tee off at our award-winning championship Towa Golf or lounge by our seasonal outdoor pool.
Directions

Highlights

 

  • Views of the Spectacular Northern New Mexico Countryside
  • Wo'P'in Spa featuring nourishing Native American-inspired treatments
  • Award-Wining 27-hole Towa Golf Course
  • Home to hundreds of pieces of unique Native art, sculptures and architecture.
  • Five terrific dining and entertainment options under one roof.
  • On-site Wedding Chapel and 72,000 sq.ft. of Meeting Space

 

Meetings & Events

Looking for the perfect space for your meeting, special event or wedding? Request Proposal

A space to recharge

Our delightful guest rooms are decorated in a Spanish-Pueblo style and feature hand-designed furnishings, a 37-inch flat-screen TV and oversized windows or balcony overlooking the mountains. Stretch out in one of our suites - the premium Governor’s Suite spanning 2,000 sq. ft. over two levels.

View all rooms

Location, location, location

When you want to experience all that Northern New Mexico has to offer, we've got you covered. We have a little bit of everything to you started. Enjoy easy access to skiing, hiking, and fascinating cultural events or just lounge by the pool and enjoy panoramic views of the Sangre de Cristo and Jemez Mountain ranges.​

Ski Map (PDF)

Casino Fun

Las Vegas-style gaming awaits with 1,200 slot machines, 18 tables, poker tournaments & top live entertainment! Join the Lightening Rewards Players Club for exclusive giveaways, discounts and points.

Find out more

Tee off at Towa

Towa, this Santa Fe hotel’s on-site golf club, boasts three courses, each taking advantage of the natural features of the landscape. The final par 3 on the Bill Phillips-designed Boulder Course drops 100 feet from tee to green. Get fitted for top brand rental clubs by PGA professionals in the golf store. Practice on a driving range in view of Santa Fe Ski Basin.

Find out more

Tantalizing dining options

Find six terrific dining and entertainment options under one roof. Old West favorites are on the menu at Red Sage Restaurant, while the Iguana Café offers Old Mexican, New Mexican, and American entrées. Catch sport or live entertainment in one of our bars before boogieing on down in the Shadeh Night Club.

View all venues

Tranquility awaits

Pamper yourself at Wo’ P’In Spa, our very own blissful retreat. A full-service salon, revitalizing treatments and therapeutic massages all await on the second floor. Enjoy the sauna and steam room, or relax in a private couples’ treatment room. Work out in the private fitness center with 24-hour key access.

View our treatments

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Syracuse Destiny USA
description:
Our new upscale Syracuse, NY hotel welcomes you with extra-large two room suites, daily complimentary made-to-order breakfast, and evening reception* with drinks and appetizers. Stay at a modern all-suite hotel at Destiny USA Syracuse, NY Official Hotel of Syracuse University Athletics.
Enjoy our free area shuttle to attractions within 5 miles. The Embassy Suites Destiny USA is near L-3 Communications, General Electric, Lockheed Martin, Siemens and the Syracuse Hospital district, only six miles from Syracuse Hancock International Airport (SYR). The Carrier Dome, Museum of Science & Technology and the NY State Fairgrounds are a short shuttle ride away.
As a part of Destiny USA, New York's largest shopping, dining, outlet, and entertainment destination, all hotel guests receive exclusive savings with the Stay & Save offer booklet (over $300 in savings). Take advantage of our Shop & Drop program and have your bags securely delivered to the hotel while you explore Destiny USA. Ask about the FunPass at the front desk.
Swim in our indoor heated pool or work out in the fitness center. Stacks restaurant offers comfort food and appetizers in a relaxed atmosphere. Daily room service is available.
Relax in a studio or one-bedroom suite, featuring a separate living area with sofa bed and flat-screen TV in each room, wet bar, refrigerator, microwave and complimentary WiFi.
*Service of alcohol subject to state and local laws. Must be of legal drinking age.

name: Canopy by Hilton Ithaca Downtown
description:
Hello and welcome to Canopy by Hilton Ithaca Downtown, perfectly situated among Ithaca’s most walkable streets and adjacent to the Ithaca Commons – Ithaca’s outdoor pedestrian mall. Grab a complimentary Canopy Bike and explore local waterfalls or the Cayuga Lake Waterfront trail or take our complimentary shuttle to nearby Cornell University, Ithaca College or Ithaca Tompkins regional airport. We'll introduce you to the neighborhood with a local welcome gift at check-in.
At Canopy, we've got you covered. Rest well in a Just-Right Room with positively local décor and residential comforts. Each includes free WiFi, a 55-inch TV, built-in refrigerated drawer and bed designed exclusively for Canopy. Choose a suite for additional space, stunning downtown views, and cozy extras like bathrobes and Canopy socks. Every floor has a filtered spring water station so you can refresh and feel great going forward.
Welcome the day in the café with a delicious artisanal breakfast made with fresh ingredients and local produce or have a Canopy Break Fast bag delivered to your door. With retractable floor-to-ceiling glass windows, The Strand Café is a welcoming and comfortable space featuring thoughtful American fare and handcrafted cocktails. Enjoy complimentary tastings each evening, or head up to the second-level outdoor terrace to relax and connect with friends. Keep up your routine in our 24-hour fitness center. We also offer two meeting rooms for events and gatherings for up to 50 people.

name: New York Hilton Midtown
description:
It's not just another stay, it's a new story

New York Hilton Midtown is your launch pad for new adventures. Whether you’re traveling for work or for fun, we’ve got what you want. You’ll be in walking distance of Central Park, Radio City Music Hall, MOMA, and Broadway. Discover exceptional WiFi, an expansive fitness center, and seasonal favorites from Herb N' Kitchen. Take on a new view and immerse yourself in a new experience. 

Explore our hotel

Discover more

Many of New York's most popular attractions are within walking distance of this Hilton NYC hotel near Radio City Music Hall. Experience the buzz of Times Square, catch a Broadway show, or shop the day away on 5th Avenue. The Rockefeller Center, MOMA and Central Park are all just minutes away.

name: Millennium Hilton New York One UN Plaza
description:
High-rise hotel with outstanding NYC views

Experience a New York City venture of a lifetime with the Millennium Hilton New York One UN Plaza. Expect world-class hospitality, 439 high-rise rooms and breathtaking views of the Manhattan skyline. Located in Midtown East Manhattan, we're the closest hotel to the United Nations, a short walk from Grand Central Station, and a convenient home base for exploring NYC's most popular attractions.
Directions Email us

What's Nearby

  • United Nations Headquarters
  • Grand Central Terminal
  • Chrysler Building
  • Bryant Park
  • Roosevelt Island Tramway
  • St. Patrick's Cathedral
  • Times Square
  • Rockefeller Center
  • Morgan Library & Museum

Highlights

  • Located in Midtown Manhattan on the United Nations campus
  • 439 guest rooms and suites with city skyline or East River views

Meetings & Events

Looking for the perfect space for your meeting, special event or wedding? Request Proposal

Fabulous high-rise views

Beautiful, unobstructed city views will draw you to our spacious guest rooms. These renovated rooms feature HDTVs and complimentary WiFi for Hilton Honors members. For extra space and an additional wow factor, try a luxurious apartment-style suite.

Rooms and suites

An architectural gem

Designed by Pritzker Prize-winning architect Kevin Roche, One UN Plaza is the sister property of the UN Secretariat building. The hotel’s iconic lobby and restaurant received New York City Interior Landmark status in 2017 and are widely considered to be masterpieces of postmodern design.

Ideally placed

A 10-minute walk to Grand Central Terminal, central to Midtown, and an easy distance from Times Square.

See Attractions

Stay fit, be well

Our 24-hour fitness center features cardio and strength training equipment as well as expansive East River views. After your workout, enjoy a healthy snack or juice from our grab-and-go UN Cafe.

More amenities

One-of-a-kind dining

Ambassador Grill & Lounge is our signature restaurant and a New York City landmark that has served celebrities, dignitaries, and heads of state for more than 40 years. Try something unique from Executive Chef Ayman Mustafa's seasonal menus, featuring American cuisine with globally inspired accents.

On-site meals, drinks and snacks

Room to gather

Host your next event in one of our 10 unique and versatile meeting spaces. The Landmark Room is an especially stunning venue, with floor-to-ceiling windows and photo-worthy views of the Manhattan cityscape.

Events and meetings

name: Millennium Hilton New York Downtown
description:
Unbeatable NYC location, room views

Located in the heart of Manhattan's Financial District, Millennium Hilton New York Downtown is world famous for its one-of-a-kind room views, proximity to popular attractions, and convenient access to Midtown and Brooklyn. We've served the Lower Manhattan community for over 25 years and are proud to offer exceptional Hilton service, as well as some of the largest hotel rooms and suites in the downtown area.
Directions

WEEKEND LIKE A NYC LOCAL
Stay 3 nights and receive up to 50% off Sunday plus exclusive dining and city offers.

View Offer Details

  • Breathtaking high-rise city views from guest rooms and suites

Photo-worthy views

Our guest rooms and suites have unique Manhattan perspectives, from a bird's eye view of the Oculus to the East River and Brooklyn Bridge vista. Consider a high-rise room or a suite with a separate sitting area and private bedroom.

View all rooms

Explore downtown

It's all about location. Stay in the heart of Lower Manhattan at our hotel near the World Trade Center and walk to the Financial District and popular sights like the Statue of Liberty, Brooklyn Bridge and South Street Seaport. Hail a cab or ride the subway and discover SoHo, Tribeca and Greenwich Village.

  • One World Trade Center

    • Swim year-round
