name: Hilton Garden Inn Southern Pines Pinehurst
description: We are located about two miles from Downtown Southern Pines. There are two shopping centers less than a mile from our hotel. Southern Pines Country Club is about two miles away and Pinehurst Country Club is five miles away. Guests can enjoy our onsite restaurant and bar as well as conference facilities for up to 72 people.

name: Hampton Inn Lexington, NC
description: With quick access to I-85, we are just three miles from downtown Lexington, North Carolina. Fly High Lexington/Davidson County Airport is less than 10 minutes away, and Davidson County Community College is 15 minutes away. Take a dip in our outdoor pool, enjoy free WiFi, and rest well on a clean, comfy bed.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Charlotte Steele Creek
description: Off hwy 160 and I-485, our new hotel is near the Charlotte Premium Outlets, entertainment venues, and local and chain restaurants. We provide a complimentary shuttle to the outlets and the Charlotte Airport, free WiFi, free hot breakfast and free coffee and tea in the lobby 24/7.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Fayetteville
description:
The DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Fayetteville is conveniently located off of I-95 at Exit 49 and is only minutes away from Fort Bragg and historic downtown Fayetteville. DoubleTree by Hilton Fayetteville hotel offers bright guest rooms with thoughtful amenities such as a large flat-screen HDTV, MP3 clock radio and internet access. For more space, simply upgrade to a spacious, two-room suite with living room, dining/work area and a private bedroom at our hotel in Fayetteville, NC.
On-site services include an inviting lobby, an outdoor fresh-water waterfall pool and a complimentary fitness center. Treat yourself to a treatment at the day spa: The Sanctuary at Cedar Creek. Enjoy breakfast, lunch and dinner at Marquis' Bistro, serving delectable cuts of meat, seafood and poultry dishes combined with renowned Southern hospitality.
Host a business meeting or conference at this modern hotel, offering over 12,000 sq. ft. of contemporary event space with the capacity for groups of up to 400. There is also a business center on-site that has many convenient and professional services such as a photocopying service. This conference center and hotel in Fayetteville, NC is less than 15 minutes from the Fayetteville Regional Airport (FAY) with complimentary shuttle service.

name: Canopy by Hilton Charlotte Southpark
description:
Hello and welcome to Canopy by Hilton Charlotte Southpark, perfectly set near Southpark Mall and just six miles from Uptown Charlotte. Luxury shops, excellent dining and major corporations are just minutes from our doors. Take a complimentary Canopy Bike to get around Southpark. We’ll introduce you to the neighborhood with a local gift at check-in.
At Canopy, we've got you covered. Relax in a Just-Right Room with traditional Southern residential décor and local artwork, each featuring free WiFi, a 55-inch HDTV, Nespresso® machine and comfortable bed designed exclusively for Canopy. Choose a one- or two-bedroom suite for added privacy, extra space and a living area, as well as cozy extras like soft bathrobes and Canopy socks. Stay hydrated and feel your best with a filtered spring water station on each floor.
Welcome the day in the café with a delicious artisanal breakfast made with fresh ingredients and local produce or have a Canopy Break Fast bag delivered to your door. Gather with friends and family around the open fireplace or outside on the verandah and enjoy menus showcasing local dishes. Complimentary evening tastings let you sample local beer, wine and spirits in a comfortable, casual atmosphere.
Host a reception, meeting or elegant soiree with our 9,000 sq. ft. of event space with rich finishes and curated art. From the Grand Ballroom to the library-inspired breakout room, each space pays homage to traditional Southern residences with a relaxed formality.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Charlotte Concord Golf Resort & Spa
description:
Stay in the heart of NASCAR racing at Embassy Suites by Hilton Charlotte Concord Golf Resort & Spa. Our pet-friendly, all-suite hotel in Concord, NC offers convenient access to the Charlotte Motor Speedway, SEA LIFE Aquarium, NASCAR Speedpark and Roush Fenway Racing Museum. Hendrick Motorsports, TIAA, Wells Fargo and other corporations are nearby. We are near the Concord Mills Mall off I-85, and only 20 miles from Charlotte-Douglas International Airport. The hotel overlooks the Rocky River Golf Course, ranked in the top 100 golf courses in North Carolina.
Our spacious suites feature a separate living room with sofa bed, two flat-screen TVs, refrigerator and microwave. We now feature PURE® Wellness accommodations, which are nearly 99.9% allergen-free – an experience that enhances your well-being so you can sleep better and be at your best. Our complimentary Evening Reception* serves drinks and light snacks. Dine on classic American cuisine at The Rocky River Grille, or order room service. Indulge in a soothing massage at Spa Botanica, or work out in the fitness center and indoor pool.
With over 50,000 sq. ft. of flexible function space, our conference center is ideal for your business meeting, conference, wedding or event. It includes a spacious ballroom for up to 2,800 guests. Let our expert sales and event staff assist with planning the details.
*Service of alcohol subject to state and local laws. Must be of legal drinking age.

name: Hilton Asheville Biltmore Park
description:
Relaxing stay in Biltmore Park Town Square

Experience a relaxing stay in a vibrant location at the Hilton Asheville Biltmore Park hotel. Located in the heart of the lively shopping, dining and entertainment scene of Biltmore Park Town Square, our hotel ensures an exciting, relaxing stay. Savor gourmet meals at our Roux restaurant and stay in shape at the fitness center and indoor pool. Pure bliss is easily achieved with a relaxing massage or treatment at our Sensibilities Spa.

Directions

Good to know

  • In Biltmore Park Town Square, minutes from Biltmore Estate, with easy access to downtown Asheville
  • Innovative cuisine at our on-site Roux restaurant and bar
  • Complimentary internet access throughout the hotel
  • Sensibilities Spa, indoor pool and whirlpool
  • 4,500 sq. ft. of flexible event space, for up to 225 guests
  • One-day Biltmore Estate passes available for purchase at front desk

Meetings & Events

Looking for the perfect space for your meeting, special event or wedding? Request Proposal

A space to recharge

Our guest rooms with king bed are beautifully decorated with a modern utopian appeal. Each room offers amenities including a 50-inch TV, exclusive Suite Dreams® mattress, a handsomely appointed marble bathroom and glass enclosed shower and bath amenities.

View all rooms

Location, location, location

We are located in Biltmore Park Town Square, a vibrant, modern town center featuring a variety of entertainment, shops and restaurants. Take a short drive to Biltmore Estate or downtown Asheville and catch our complimentary shuttle to and from Asheville Regional Airport, just three miles away.

Pets welcome

We're a pet-friendly hotel and can't wait to meet your furry friend.

Hotel policies

Sensibilities Day Spa

Find total serenity at Sensibilities Day Spa, Asheville’s oldest spa establishment. Choose from a variety of spa treatments from manicures and pedicures to therapeutic massages and rejuvenating body treatments. Our professional staff will customize your treatments to fit your needs.

Visit our spa

Gourmet dining

Enjoy a gourmet meal prepared with local ingredients at our award-winning signature restaurant, Roux, open for breakfast, lunch, dinner and weekend brunch. Relax with cocktails in the lounge or dine in the comfort of your guest room with in-room dining. Roux received the top Hilton Americas food & beverage award for 2016.

Dining

Meetings and events

Host a business meeting, special event or wedding in the midst of Biltmore Park Town Square. We offer indoor and outdoor venues for a variety of events, as well as full catering services. Select from flexible meeting rooms, an elegant ballroom and the outdoor patio and terrace.

Plan an event

name: Charlotte Airport Hotel
description:
All suites hotel

Located less than four miles from Charlotte Douglas International Airport, we invite you to touch down, grab your bag and embrace the unexpected. Set in a business park featuring a beautifully manicured landscape, our all-suite hotel provides easy access to uptown, convention center and sporting venues. Complimentary shuttle service easily connects you to the airport and the best of Charlotte.

Directions

Local attractions

  • NASCAR Hall of Fame
  • Carowinds Amusement Park
  • Bank of America Stadium
  • U.S. National Whitewater Center
  • BB&T Ballpark
