  • All-suite property
  • On-site restaurant and bar, plus daily room service
  • Complimentary 24-hour fitness center
  • Flexible meeting space to accommodate groups of any size
  • Open-air atrium providing natural lighting and modern decor

Meetings & Events

Looking for the perfect space for your meeting, special event or wedding? Request Proposal

Location, location, location

It’s all about convenience at the Charlotte Airport hotel. Located less than four miles from Charlotte Douglas International Airport, our hotel is the perfect location to get work completed while giving you easy access to the surrounding area. Find Charlotte’s city pulse in Uptown or explore vibrant landmarks and Charlotte history. Take the complimentary shuttle directly to your airport terminal or travel for up to a three-mile radius on us.

View all rooms

Guest room suites

Settle into our spacious suites featuring large windows that welcome in plenty of natural light. Our suites come equipped with comfortable bedding, complimentary WiFi, well-lit work space, sofa bed, refrigerator and coffee maker. Upgrade to an executive or presidential suite for a unique experience.

Upgrade your stay

Ask about our presidential suite or our executive suites.

Great amenities

After tending to business or conferences all day, kick back at our hotel and enjoy a range of amenities during your stay. The 24-hour fitness center features weights and cardio equipment, while the indoor pool is a great place to relax. Our hotel also features a business center with complimentary WiFi.

More amenities

Enticing hotel dining

Our Clocktower Restaurant features made-to-order American food selections over contemporary and relaxed environment. At the end of the day, enjoy a customized cocktail or a local Charlotte beer in our chic Atrium Lounge.

Restaurants and lounges

Experts at events

With an airport location and complimentary airport shuttle, our hotel is the perfect location for a business meeting or a social event. We have up to 30,000 total sq. ft. of flexible meeting space and can cater to all events and organizations with 19 different meeting space options.

Meetings and events

name: Hampton Inn Circleville
description: Located right off State Route 23; Hampton by Hilton Circleville offers 87 rooms with all the comforts of Home and then some. Relax and Recharge in our comfortable guest rooms with plenty of USB/charging outlets to meet your needs. Don't miss a single episode while away from home using our Guest Connected Netflix Streaming Service as your car recharges at our Electric Car Charging Stations! Start your day with our free, hot daily breakfast buffet or relax with a dip in the indoor heated saline pool; whatever your way is to unwind to rewind; we've got you covered. Be our guest and experience the Passion of Hospitality!

name: Hilton Cleveland Downtown
description:
A contemporary hotel in Cleveland

Hilton Cleveland Downtown is in the heart of Cleveland's vibrant downtown area and connected to the Huntington Convention Center of Cleveland. Popular attractions, dining, and entertainment are just minutes away. With contemporary guest rooms, convenient on-site amenities, and 50,000 sq. ft. of event space, our hotel is the perfect base for exploring Cleveland.
Directions

Park & Stay

Book the Park and Stay package and get parking for one vehicle per night of your stay.

View Offer Details

Good to know

  • Located in the heart of downtown Cleveland
  • Directly connected to the Huntington Convention Center of Cleveland
  • Over 50,000 sq. ft. of meeting space
  • Indoor pool and fitness center
  • On-site dining and top-floor Bar 32 with views of the lake
  • Rooms with views of Lake Erie and the Cleveland skyline

Meetings & Events

Looking for the perfect space for your meeting, special event or wedding? Request Proposal

Enjoy the view

Our downtown Cleveland hotel offers guest rooms and suites with sleek, contemporary decor. Take in the exceptional views of Lake Erie and the Cleveland skyline. Find amenities including a mini-fridge, safe and built-in workstation. WiFi is available for a fee.

Rooms & suites

Explore the city

Enjoy your stay in the heart of downtown Cleveland, minutes away from attractions and sports venues, such as the Rocket Mortgage FieldHouse — home to the Cleveland Cavaliers. Visit the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame, see a Broadway musical at Playhouse Square, and go shopping on East 4th Street.

More attractions

  • Playhouse Square
  • West Side Market
  • Great Lakes Science Center
  • Cleveland Museum of Art

Conferences and events

With a total of 50,000 sq. ft. of meeting space, our hotel offers the ideal venue for any business or social occasion. This flexible space includes our Superior Ballroom, which seats up to 2,300 guests theatre-style. The Hope Ballroom and nine breakout rooms are great for more intimate functions.

Plan an event

The Burnham

Our dining destinations include the signature Burnham Restaurant, proudly featuring sustainable conscious cuisine steeped in Mid-West traditions. Enjoy Eliot's Bar named after famed Clevelander Eliot Ness, the grab-and-go marketplace Noshery or Bar 32 on the highest floor for panoramic views of Lake Erie and the cityscape.

View dining options

name: Hilton Columbus Downtown
description:
Experience our unique downtown Columbus hotel

Hilton Columbus Downtown offers a contemporary presence in the eclectic hub of Columbus. Explore our $1 million art collection featuring original works from more than 100 area artists. Our Columbus, OH hotel is within walking distance to over 300 dining and entertainment venues. Take our unique spiral staircase for dining and fitness options. Unwind over dinner and drinks at our Gallerie Bar.
Directions Email us

BOOK DIRECT for the BEST Rates

Book Now

Highlights

  • Downtown Columbus hotel near Arena District, Short North Arts District and North Market
  • Over 32,000 sq. ft. of event space adjacent to the Greater Columbus Convention Center
  • Gallerie Bar & Bistro, a 160-seat full-service restaurant and bar
  • Amenities including a fitness center, indoor pool and whirlpool
  • Near Ohio State University
  • Stunning art collection showcasing local artists

Meetings & Events

Looking for the perfect space for your meeting, special event or wedding? Request Proposal

Rooms and Suites

From standard guest rooms to suites and executive rooms, you’ll find the right option. Each room offers a 42-inch LCD TV, large work desk, WiFi and more. Upgrade to an executive room for access to the Executive Lounge for complimentary breakfast and refreshments throughout the day.

Rooms & Suites

Hotel facts

  • Enclosed skybridge to Greater Columbus Convention Center
  • Located in the vibrant Short North Arts District
  • 15,000 sq. ft. atrium skylight with natural lighting
  • Rooms with interior or exterior view, abundant power outlets, and local artwork
  • Less than 15 minutes from John Glenn International Airport

LEED Gold Certified

Our downtown Columbus hotel is a LEED Gold Certified hotel.

Executive Lounge

Looking for a little extra? Upgrade to an Executive Room or Suite and enjoy a range of benefits including complimentary breakfast, evening hors d’oeuvres and non-alcoholic beverages.

Learn More

Art Collection

During your stay, explore our beautiful art collection of more than 225 pieces by 100 area artists.

Dining at our hotel

Choose from three dining options at our Columbus hotel. Grab a coffee, tea or quick bite at the Coffee Bar. Kick back with a glass of wine and appetizers at the Gallerie Bar. Dine on informal lunches and relaxed evening meals at Gallerie Bistro with local produce in this French-inspired bistro.

Dining

Amenities at our Hotel

Walk up the spiral staircase from the lobby to the atrium to find plenty of sunlight, dining options and the fitness center. The 15,000 sq. ft. skylight provides a feeling of being in the great outdoors while in the middle of a bustling city.

Amenities

Events at our hotel

Our downtown hotel offers 32,000 sq. ft. of event space for up to 1,200 people. The enclosed sky bridge connects the hotel to the Greater Columbus Convention Center. With proximity to 2 major airports, on-site event planners and catering services, we ensure a successful event.                

Plan an Event

name: Hilton Columbus/Polaris
description:
Award-winning hotel next to Polaris Mall in Columbus

A spacious guest room with granite countertops, soft earth tones and rich dark woods awaits your arrival at Hilton Columbus/Polaris. Stay comfortable with a 55-inch HDTV, mini-refrigerator and complimentary WiFi. Our convenient location and complimentary shuttle within a 5-mile radius make it easy to get to Columbus attractions and the airport (24 hours advance notice is requested). Take time to enjoy our fitness center, indoor pool and whirlpool.

Directions

Good to know

  • Modern Columbus/Polaris hotel in northside commercial district
  • Complimentary shuttle: 5-miles & airport. Shuttle requests & accessible transport require 24-hour notice.
  • Over 15,000 sq. ft. conference & event space for 1,000 people
  • Complimentary WiFi throughout

Meetings & Events

Looking for the perfect space for your meeting, special event or wedding? Request Proposal

Modern and inviting

Choose one of our 252 guest rooms and suites for your stay. Combining modern conveniences, such as WiFi and 55-inch HDTVs with a convenient location for both business and nights out, our accommodations are the perfect place to unwind and recharge.

Rooms & Suites

Location information

  • Polaris Fashion Place (0.1 mi)
  • Columbus Zoo/Zoombezi Bay (8.8 mi)
  • IKEA (0.6 mi.)
  • Crew (Mapfre) Stadium (10.5 mi)
  • Magic Mountain Fun Center (0.1 mi)
  • JP Morgan Chase McCoy Center (0.5 mi)

Get fired up

Take advantage of our 2 cozy fire features while lounging on the patio. It's a great way to warm up on a cool Columbus evening.

Upgrade your stay

Stay fit with our Five Feet to Fitness program. Our dedication to movement and mindfulness allows you to work out in the comfort of your own room. A digital touchscreen kiosk monitor serves as a guide through equipment tutorial and exclusive Hilton workout content including yoga, cycling & strength conditioning.

Amenities

Delicious dining options

Experience one of many culinary delights or signature cocktails from the innovative menu at the Gemini Grille and Bar. Enjoy savory and nutritious dishes prepared by our chefs with only the freshest ingredients.

Dining

Flexible event spaces

Whether you're planning a small gathering or large corporate event, Hilton Columbus/Polaris has the flexible space and personal service you need. From catering options to the latest A/V equipment, our certified meeting planners will work with you from start to finish for a memorable meeting.

Plan an Event

name: Tru by Hilton Monroe OH
description: None

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Oklahoma City Northwest
description:
Welcome to Embassy Suites by Hilton Oklahoma City Northwest, located in the historic Founders District. Our all-suite hotel is conveniently located across from Integris Baptist Medical Center on Northwest Expressway and within minutes of some of Oklahoma City’s most popular attractions such as Penn Square Mall, the Oklahoma City Zoo, Science Museum of Oklahoma, Lake Hefner Recreational Area and the Remington Park Racetrack and Casino.
Kick back in a studio suite with free WiFi, a 55-inch HDTV, sofa, coffeemaker, mini-fridge and microwave, or treat your family to a two-room suite featuring a private bedroom, separate living room with two 55-inch HDTVs, sofa, side chair and ottoman.
Begin your day with a free made-to-order breakfast and relax at our Complimentary Evening Reception*. Enjoy classic Midwest cuisine in The Local Kitchen and Tap featuring local beers and wines or count on room service. The 24-hour market is always open for cravings and munchies during your stay.
Swim in the heated indoor pool or work out in the fitness center. When work can’t wait, our business center is open 24 hours a day. For meetings and events from 15 to 1,200, we offer pre-set boardrooms, a Grand Ballroom, breakout rooms, private dining and a Hospitality Suite, as well as an array of catering options, the latest in A/V Technology and a dedicated staff. Our Oklahoma City Northwest hotel has everything you desire for memorable events.
*Subject to state and local laws. Must be of legal drinking age.

name: Tru by Hilton Tahlequah
description: None

name: Hilton Garden Inn Wilsonville Portland
description: We're off I-5, just north of the Willamette River and down the street from Memorial Park. Shop tax-free at the Woodburn Premium Outlets or head for downtown Portland – both are 20 minutes away. We have comforts covered with a restaurant, indoor pool, and sunlit conference space. Enjoy a cocktail in our bar and ask our staff about Oregon Wine Country tours.

name: Hilton Portland Downtown
description:
Newly redesigned Hilton in downtown Portland

Conveniently located in the heart of the city, Hilton Portland Downtown has been newly redesigned with an inviting, vibrant lobby and rooms that incorporate a timeless and contemporary feel. Host impactful gatherings and unforgettable events with over 70,000 sq. ft. of Portland meeting space, the most expansive and versatile offering in the state. Take a short walk to downtown’s business district, exclusive tax-free shopping, exciting entertainment venues and the MAX Light rail, just one block from the hotel.
 
Directions

The Duniway Portland, a Hilton Hotel

Experience Luxury at the New Duniway Hotel, located adjacent to Hilton Portland.

Learn More

Good to know

  • HopCity Tavern, The Market with Stumptown Coffee, in-room dining
  • Complimentary access to newly renovated fitness center
  • 1 block from eco-friendly MAX Light Rail line, easy access to Portland International Airport and Oregon Convention Center
  • 8 Tesla charging stations for your electric vehicle
  • 80,000 sq. ft. of flexible meeting and event space

Meetings & Events

Looking for the perfect space for your meeting, special event or wedding? Request Proposal

Rooms and Suites

Relax in one of our newly redesigned, spacious rooms or suites featuring 65-inch HDTVs, Hilton Beds with 250 thread-count triple sheeting and signature bath products. Enjoy spectacular views of downtown Portland from one of our upper level rooms.

Learn more

Central downtown location

Located in Portland's business and entertainment district and one block from the MAX Light Rail system, this hotel offers easy access to top attractions including the Portland Saturday Market, the Oregon Museum of Science and Industry, Portland Art Museum and the Oregon Convention Center.

What's nearby

  • Pioneer Courthouse Square
  • Arlene Schnitzer Concert Hall
  • Powell's Bookstore
  • Tom McCall’s Waterfront Park
  • Oregon Convention Center

Find more things to do in town.

Leisure and recreation

Enjoy complimentary access to the newly renovated fitness center and work out using state-of-the-art equipment. Just 5 blocks from the hotel are jogging paths along Waterfront Park on the banks of the Willamette River.

Locally inspired dining

HopCity Tavern offers thoughtful, locally-sourced American gastropub cuisine helmed by Executive Chef Marissa Burback. The menu features seasonal ingredients and the finest products that the Pacific Northwest has to offer.

Our venues

Meetings and weddings

With a convenient location just 10 miles from Portland International Airport, contemporary A/V technology and over 66,000 sq. ft. versatile meeting and event space, including 30 modern function rooms; our hotel is ideal for conferences, corporate events, training sessions and weddings of all sizes.

Learn more

name: The Duniway Portland, a Hilton Hotel
description:
Unexpectedly bold and authentically Portland

Inspired by the bold spirit of American pioneer Abigail Scott Duniway, our boutique hotel embraces the artistic, creative, and independent nature of Portland. Located in the center of one of the country’s most creative cities and complemented by celebrity chef Chris Cosentino’s inventive cuisine at Jackrabbit PDX, the Duniway creates memorable and authentically Portland experiences.
 
Directions

STAY. SHOP. SHIP.
Shop tax free and we'll cover shipping up to 20 lbs. Save 10% on your stay and enjoy late check-out.

View Offer    Book Now

The Duniway Hotel Highlights

  • Jackrabbit Restaurant and in-room dining by Chef Chris Cosentino, Gourmet Coffee Bar, and Lobby Wine Bar
  • Bold, stylish boutique hotel rooms with modern furnishings and upscale amenities
  • 65-inch HDTVs with StayCast technology in all rooms
  • Fully equipped workout facility and heated indoor waveless lap pool
  • Exclusive 11th floor outdoor patio space, Abigail's Hideaway
  • Pet-friendly hotel with food/water bowls, beds, and other pet amenities

Meetings & Events

Looking for the perfect space for your meeting, special event or wedding? Request Proposal

Designer rooms and suites

Thoughtfully designed to be spacious and stylish, each boutique room provides a 65-inch HDTV with StayCast technology and a Vittoria Coffee espresso machine. Enjoy bespoke touches such as Badgley Mischka bath products, 500 thread-count linens, plush bathrobes and curated book selections.

Rooms & Suites

Prime downtown location

Set in downtown Portland's business and entertainment district, our hotel's proximity to the MAX light rail makes it easy to explore the city. Walk to music and theater venues, tax-free shopping, Pioneer Courthouse Square, Providence Park and craft breweries.

Pets welcome

We roll out the red carpet for your four-legged travel buddy, with pet beds, water and food bowls, and a new toy to take home. Stop by the concierge desk for their Welcome Letter and special treat.

Pool and Fitness

On the 11th floor, you'll find our newly renovated fitness center and indoor pool - everything you need to unwind and keep on top of fitness throughout your stay.

Our Amenities

Our story

Learn all about the interesting history that epitomizes our unique hotel.

Our Story

Abigail's Hideaway

Experience the 11th floor social hub, including our outdoor rooftop patio Abigail's Hideaway. The Hideaway features events such as live music, wine tastings, games, and stunning downtown Portland views.

Our Amenities

Jackrabbit PDX

Dine like royalty at Jackrabbit Restaurant by celebrity chef Chris Cosentino, specializing in shared feasts, unique brunch and bar snacks, house-cured meats and craft cocktails. Savor an espresso in the lobby coffee bar, or relax anytime with 24-hour room service.

Restaurants and lounges

Portland meetings, events

You'll love our curated event space and downtown wedding venues in Portland, Oregon. Plan executive meetings in our two boardrooms or a social event in the ballroom. Our A/V technology, catering options, and dedicated staff will ensure your event is a success.

Meetings and events

name: the Alloy King of Prussia - a DoubleTree by Hilton
description:
Welcome to the Alloy King of Prussia - a DoubleTree by Hilton, set in the welcoming Pennsylvania town of King of Prussia, where one of America's biggest shopping malls is located. Take a day out to shop or play golf at one of the many local public courses. Enjoy a freshly baked DoubleTree Chocolate Chip Walnut Cookie on arrival as our friendly staff welcomes you. All guest accommodations at this King of Prussia hotel feature modern decor and excellent amenities, including comfortable bedding and large TVs. Wheelchair accessible transportation is available. Hotel policy requires that all guests reserve complimentary transportation services a minimum 24 hours in advance.
Our hotel features many elements that set it apart from other King of Prussia hotels. We offer great amenities to make your stay successful, whether you're here for work or play. Swim laps in the hotel's three seasonal outdoor pools, relax on the patio, and stay active in the fully equipped fitness center with cardio machines and weights.
Keep up with work in the business center with fax, photocopying and printer access. Make use of our 24,000+ sq. ft. of meeting space to host meetings, receptions and other special events. To start you off in the morning or to unwind after a long day, savor delicious cuisine in the hotel's restaurants, Restaurant THREE01 and T.Burke's Gastro Pub.

name: DoubleTree Resort by Hilton Hotel Lancaster
description:
Discover all that Lancaster City has to offer with the DoubleTree Resort by Hilton Hotel Lancaster. Situated in the heart of Pennsylvania Dutch country, our resort is located 45 minutes from Harrisburg International Airport (MDT) and within 90 minutes of Philadelphia and Baltimore. Our hotel is the ideal family friendly destination to enjoy local attractions including Hersheypark, Strasburg Railroad, Amish Experience, Dutch Wonderland, and Sight & Sound Theatre. If shopping is your pleasure, Tanger Outlets and The Shops at Rockvale are just minutes away. We are also located within minutes of the Lancaster County Convention Center. Relish a warm welcome and a delicious DoubleTree Chocolate Chip Cookie at check-in.
Stay connected at your desk or over morning coffee with complimentary WiFi throughout this Lancaster resort. Spacious suites offer sofa beds in the parlor and two LCD TVs. Accessible rooms designed for easy movement feature roll-in showers.
Dine at the Cafe 24 Hundred, a participant in the ‘Buy Fresh, Buy Local’ program, and stop in at our lounge to sample local microbrews.
Host any function at our Lancaster, PA resort. Our spacious and flexible meeting rooms are easily set for corporate meetings or family banquets. Consider a wedding celebration in our elegant chapel and the open-air Palm Court atrium.

name: Canopy by Hilton Philadelphia Center City
description:
Hello and welcome to Canopy by Hilton Philadelphia Center City, placed in the blooming Midtown Village neighborhood. Once the notable Stephen Girard Building, our modern design is inspired by local history and creatively adapts the building’s 19th century style. We’re steps from Reading Terminal Market, the Fashion District, the Pennsylvania Convention Center, and City Hall. Grab a complimentary Canopy Bike and discover more of our beautiful city. We'll introduce you to the neighborhood with a local welcome gift at check-in.
At Canopy, we've got you covered. Every aspect of our hotel is carefully designed with the modern guest in mind. All our Just-Right Rooms feature signature Canopy beds, free WiFi, 55-inch TVs, work spaces, and a Nespresso Machine.  Choose a suite for more space, enhanced views, larger bathrooms, a wet bar, plus cozy extras like bathrobes and Canopy slipper socks. You can find Canopy water bottles and filtered water stations on every floor.
Start the day with an artisanal breakfast in Canopy Central or have a Canopy Break Fast Bag delivered to your door.  Enjoy a rotating variety of complimentary wine, cocktail, or beer sample tastings every evening, plus access to our 24-hour fitness center and Transfer Lounge, which allows you to get ready and store your luggage prior to check-in or after check-out.

name: The Logan Philadelphia, Curio Collection by Hilton
description:
Welcome to The Logan Philadelphia, Curio Collection by Hilton, a stylish hotel that captures the true spirit of its surroundings. The lobby and guest rooms are vibrant with local artwork, and our downtown location is just a mile from many iconic Philadelphia landmarks.

Several museums and iconic sites are walkable from our Logan Square hotel, including The Franklin Institute, Philadelphia Museum of Art and the Liberty Bell. Live the film and climb the Rocky Steps, or see the birthplace of the Declaration of Independence and the Constitution at Independence Hall. The financial district and Pennsylvania Convention Center are just blocks away plus Rittenhouse Square home to some of city's best shopping and dining options.

Guest rooms offer a 42-inch HDTV and a laptop-sized safe. Enjoy views of the city or hotel courtyard with your morning coffee and our cozy Rocky-themed bathrobe. Suites feature marble bathrooms, and French doors seclude the bedroom from the living area. Reserve the Presidential Suite for the ultimate stay.

Meals are memorable at The Logan Philadelphia. Urban Farmer is Philadelphia's modern steakhouse with farmhouse charms. Our rooftop lounge, Assembly, serves expertly made cocktails along with enviable city views. Kick back and unwind at The Commons lobby lounge. Relax and rejuvenate with a couple’s treatment at The Underground Spa & Wellness or a dip in the heated indoor pool. Decompress with the latest cardio equipment in the fitness center. Our courtyard with waterfall is perfect for wedding ceremonies, and the ballroom seats 550 guests for a conference.

name: The Inn at Penn, a Hilton Hotel
description:
Set on University of Penn campus near downtown

Enjoy a refreshing and rewarding experience at The Inn at Penn, A Hilton Hotel in University City. This AAA Four Diamond hotel is located on the University of Pennsylvania campus. Stay at this hotel and be near famous attractions, museums, and the medical and business districts, and just 20 minutes from Philadelphia International Airport. An ideal base with a prime location to explore all Philadelphia has to offer.

Directions

Good to know

  • 20 minutes from Philadelphia International Airport
  • Walking distance to downtown, dining and shopping
  • Complimentary WiFi
  • Complimentary use of iPads in each guest room
  • Farm-to-table breakfast in The University Club
  • In-room dining and evening bites in The Living Room

Meetings & Events

Looking for the perfect space for your meeting, special event or wedding? Request Proposal

Renovated rooms and suites

With each room equipped with complimentary WiFi and new iPads, guests can enjoy their “virtual office” right in the comfort of any room. We now feature PURE® Wellness accommodations, which are nearly 99.9% allergen-free, an experience that enhances your well-being so you can sleep better and be at your best.

View Our Rooms

Location, location, location

Easily explore Philadelphia from the hotel; walking distance to downtown, shopping, dining and entertainment. A prime location for visitors and fans alike; situated on the University of Pennsylvania campus and just three blocks from Drexel University. Enjoy easy access to the Philadelphia International Airport, 20 minutes away.

What's nearby

• Amtrak 30th Street Station
• Philadelphia Zoo
• Philadelphia Center City
• Philadelphia Art Museum
• Children’s Hospital

Delicious eats

Our in-house dining options include a farm-to-table breakfast experience in the University Club, in-room dining, and evening small bites and cocktails in our comfortable Living Room. Additionally, guests have the opportunity to explore multiple nearby restaurants that are within walking distance of the hotel.

More Dining Options

Amenities you need

Take advantage of our long list of amenities for your personal health as well as your business needs. From meeting spaces to the business center and fitness center, The Inn at Penn, Hilton Hotel, cares for all your needs.

See More Amenities

Exquisite events

The Hilton Inn at Penn Philadelphia hotel is a diverse meeting and wedding venue with 17,000 sq. ft. of versatile event space. This includes a divisible Grand Ballroom and two primary meeting rooms that open into a junior ballroom. Additionally, our boardroom has an attached private lounge and a pre-function space.

Plan An Event

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Greenville Golf Resort & Conference Center
description:
Enjoy the newly renovated all-suite surroundings that Embassy Suites by Hilton Greenville Golf Resort & Conference Center has to offer. Located in the foothills of the Blue Ridge Mountains in Greenville, SC, we're minutes from downtown Greenville, Greenville-Spartanburg International Airport and Clemson University. If you're looking for hotels in Greenville, SC, this South Carolina resort offers a par-72 championship golf course. The Preserve at Verdae surrounds the hotel and is perfect for a friendly game with friends or colleagues.
Relax on a luxurious bed in one of 268 suites at this full-service hotel in Greenville, SC, or allow guests to stay on the sofa bed. Prepare a delicious meal or snack using the microwave and refrigerator. Workout in the fitness center, have a relaxing swim in the indoor / outdoor hotel swimming pools, or play a few sets on one of four lighted tennis courts at one of the best resort destinations of all hotels in Greenville, SC.
Enjoy a complimentary priority airport shuttle with curbside pick-up to and from Greenville-Spartanburg International Airport. In addition, our hotel offers limited local shuttle service within a 5 mile radius for $5 per person, each way. Relax with a few drinks in the bar/lounge, then spread out in one of our Greenville suites. Start the day with a free made-to-order breakfast and return home to the comfort of an Evening Reception, with complimentary snacks and beverages*.
* Service of alcohol subject to state and local laws. Must be of legal drinking age.

name: DoubleTree Resort by Hilton Myrtle Beach Oceanfront
description:
Enjoy a coastal getaway at the DoubleTree Resort by Hilton Hotel Myrtle Beach Oceanfront. Set across 27 acres on the south end of Ocean Boulevard, this resort has beautiful private beaches, and plenty of activities, with Myrtle Beach State Park just to the side. Kick off your vacation with a warm DoubleTree chocolate chip cookie at check-in. We are thrilled to announce the opening of Springmaid Pier in June 2020.

Our guest rooms feature exterior corridors with ocean views and private balconies. Enjoy complimentary WiFi, a 40-inch HDTV, mini-refrigerator, microwave and coffee maker. One-bedroom suites are perfect for families, with a king bed or two queen beds plus a living area with sofa sleeper. Accessible rooms are also available. Pet friendly rooms with tile floors are also available for your convenience.

Conveniently located by the Myrtle Beach International Airport & the Market Common District are within a quarter mile. Enjoy watching the planes take off over the ocean into the horizon. We offer outdoor pools, heated indoor pools, and two lazy rivers, and a brand new fishing pier opening June 2020.

Our Myrtle Beach hotel has 35,000 sq. ft. of meeting space, including three ballrooms accommodating 500 guests each. Let our friendly event planners oversee your beachfront party or conference.

name: Kingston Plantation Condos
description:
Kingston Plantation Condos, offering Myrtle Beach vacation rentals managed by Hilton, are located on the north end of Myrtle Beach, South Carolina on the Grand Strand. Named by USA Today as one of the 'Top 10 Luxury Hotels in Myrtle Beach,' Kingston Plantation Condos are nestled on 145 lush acres along a mile-long stretch of Myrtle Beach, minutes from area attractions, dining, and recreation.
Reserve a spacious oceanfront condo, lodge, or villa with all the amenities you need. Options range from guest rooms in oceanfront towers to four-bedroom villas, many with full kitchens and washer/dryers. All condos and villas provide private balconies with panoramic ocean, lake, or plantation views.
Resort destination activities and dining are steps away. Lounge on the beach or next to one of nine pools. Enjoy family fun at Splash! Water Park with water slides, a lazy river, and children’s pools.
Maintain your usual fitness routine or enroll in a class at The Landing. Play at one of over 100 Myrtle Beach golf courses nearby. Learn from a tennis pro, then test your skills on our courts. Unwind in a whirlpool or take a walk on the beach.
Our Myrtle Beach resort destination provides access to 70,000 sq. ft. of event space for your special celebration, meeting, or conference. Dining options include restaurants at Embassy Suites Myrtle Beach-Oceanfront Resort and Hilton Myrtle Beach Oceanfront Resort, both nearby. Take our complimentary shuttle or stroll the beautiful plantation grounds.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Myrtle Beach Oceanfront Resort
description:
Nestled on the north end of Myrtle Beach, South Carolina, on the Grand Strand, Embassy Suites Myrtle Beach-Oceanfront Resort is part of a complex of Myrtle Beach hotels offering an array of amenities including nine swimming pools, Splash! Waterpark, the full-service Spa33 and 78Fitness. Enjoy easy access to the Boardwalk, Broadway at the Beach, the House of Blues, Barefoot Landing and Tanger Outlet Mall. Tee off at one of over 100 Myrtle Beach golf courses nearby.
Start each day with our free, cooked-to-order breakfast. After a relaxing day on the beach, enjoy a cold beverage at our oceanfront bar or join friends at the complimentary Evening Reception*.
All 255 of our two-room suites boast private balconies and picturesque views of the resort, North Myrtle Beach and the Atlantic Ocean. Each suite features a separate living room with a sofa bed and a private bedroom. Stay connected with WiFi or catch a movie on one of the two flat-screen TVs. Feel at home with a refrigerator and microwave. If you need to catch up on work, the large table provides a well-lit work space.
Take advantage of our 70,000 sq. ft. Conference Center to plan a meeting, complemented by our catering and business services. Create the beach wedding you have always dreamed of, right here at our Myrtle Beach oceanfront resort.
* Service of alcohol subject to state and local laws. Must be of legal drinking age.

name: Ocean 22 by Hilton Grand Vacations
description:
Oceanfront resort hotel in Myrtle Beach, SC

Ocean 22 by Hilton Grand Vacations puts you within minutes of attractions, including Broadway at the Beach, numerous golf courses and country music hot spots such as The Bowery and The Carolina Opry. This luxurious, all-suite hotel in Myrtle Beach is only two blocks from Myrtle Beach Convention Center and just eight blocks from the lively Myrtle Beach Boardwalk.

Directions Email us

Fast Facts

  • Stunning oceanfront setting
  • Complimentary mini golf
  • Multi-lingual staff
  • Business center
  • On-site deli and bar
  • Garage and Valet Parking
  • Children's Activity Center

Highlights

  • All-suite oceanfront hotel along the Grand Strand of Myrtle Beach
  • Suites with full kitchens, living areas, washer/dryer and balcony
  • Complimentary fitness center, covered and outdoor pools, and whirlpool
  • Complimentary admission to seasonal Wild Water & Wheels parks included with stay
  • Special golf savings - some restrictions apply
  • Unlimited DVD rentals with DVDNow

Meetings & Events

Looking for the perfect space for your meeting, special event or wedding? Request Proposal

All-Suite Resort

Each of our suites offers a king-sized bed and sleeper sofa along with a fully equipped kitchen and separate living and dining areas. With a spacious master bedroom, washer and dryer and flat-screen TVs, you'll feel right at home.

Rooms & Suites

Location Information

In a convenient location along the Grand Strand in Myrtle Beach, our hotel puts you close to all the attractions. Spend the day at Wild Water & Wheels Water Park, stroll the boardwalk or perfect your golf swing, all just minutes from our hotel.

Local Attractions

  • Myrtle Beach and Boardwalk
  • Myrtle Beach golf
  • Broadway at the Beach
  • Family Kingdom Amusement Park

Dining

Pick up coffee, fresh pastries, light snacks and crisp salads from our ‘grab-and-go’ deli. Sip cocktails as you soak up the sunshine from the pool bar, or relax with a glass of wine in the inviting lobby lounge.

Dining

Amenities

Cool down with a refreshing dip in the outdoor pool, or relax in the covered pool and whirlpool. Work out in the on-site fitness center, while the kids play in the Activity Center. Get one of the many DVDs from the Lobby for a night in with the family. Stay connected to work in the business center.

Amenities

Golf

Enjoy championship golf when staying at Ocean 22. At select courses, Ocean 22 guests receive complimentary greens fees when tee time is booked within 48 hours of play. Guests also enjoy discounts at select courses when tee time is booked outside of 48 hours before play.

Golf

name: Hilton Myrtle Beach Resort
description:
Stylish North Myrtle Beach Oceanfront Resort

Just minutes from shopping, entertainment and attractions, Hilton Myrtle Beach Resort features stylish guest rooms with private balconies, relaxed bars and restaurants, a Spa, and over 35,000 sq. ft. of flexible event space. Enjoy access to all Kingston Plantation Resort amenities, including Splash! Waterpark, sparkling resort pools and the Sport and Health Club, with tennis facilities, aerobics classes and an indoor pool.

Directions

Good to Know

  • Private balconies in all our guest rooms overlooking the Atlantic Coastline
  • Convenient location near Myrtle Beach activities, 100+ golf courses and many other things to do
  • Access to Splash! Waterpark, Spa33, Lazy River and other amenities at Kingston Plantation
  • Access 78Fitness gym with tennis and pickleball courts, indoor pool, whirlpool and Kids Splash Pad
  • Myrtle Beach Resort deals and vacation packages, Kid's Activities from mid May - early September
  • Enjoy a variety of on-site oceanfront and ocean view dining and lounge options

Meetings & Events

Looking for the perfect space for your meeting, special event or wedding? Request Proposal

Rooms and Suites

Bright, airy and inviting, the guest rooms at our Myrtle Beach hotel have private balconies, and many offer beautiful ocean views. Stay connected with WiFi and enjoy homelike amenities including a mini-fridge and a coffeemaker. Choose a suite for more space in the comfy living area.

View more

Location, location, location

Set on the Grand Strand at the north end of Myrtle Beach, the hotel is moments from unique shops, delicious dining as well as Broadway at the Beach and Barefoot Landing. Shop at the Tanger Outlet Mall and enjoy entertainment options at the Myrtle Beach House of Blues, Carolina Opry or the Alabama Theatre.

Local Attractions

  • Over 100 Myrtle Beach golf courses
  • Tanger Outlet Mall (1 mi)
  • Barefoot Landing (4 mi)
  • House of Blues (4 mi)
  • Broadway at the Beach (7 mi)

View More

    Leisure and Recreation

    Visit Splash! Waterpark, open seasonally, or work out at 78 Fitness - both located at our sister property, just a short distance away. Tee off at one of over 100 area golf courses, refresh in the sparkling resort pool or indulge in a treatment at Spa 33.

    Myrtle Beach Dining

    Discover casual fine dining at our oceanfront restaurant, Café Amalfi, open daily. Savor an al fresco lunch in our seasonal poolside restaurant, Beachcombers. Sip drinks in the stylish Veranda Bar, or enjoy cocktails and live music beside the swimming pool at the seasonal Wet Whistle.

    Our venues

    Weddings and Events

    An ideal venue for conferences, corporate gatherings and weddings of all sizes, we offer over 35,000 sq. ft. of indoor and outdoor event space, including a stunning oceanfront lawn. The adjacent conference center has 14,400 sq. ft. of space, two registration desks, and large pre-function areas.

    Events at Myrtle Beach

name: Royale Palms Condominiums
description:
Oceanfront condos in Myrtle Beach

Soak up the beach life in the comfort of the Royale Palms Condominiums by Hilton in an ideal oceanfront location at the north end of Myrtle Beach at Kingston Resorts. We are attached to the Hilton Myrtle Beach Resort so you can enjoy all the amenities and services both resorts have to offer including the spa, resort pools, a waterpark and so much more. We are also close to many South Carolina attractions.

Directions

Good to know

  • A short drive from Myrtle Beach International Airport
  • Access to Kingston Plantation, Splash! Waterpark, 78Fitness and Spa33 with an indoor pool, tennis and sand volleyball
  • Condos feature private balconies with ocean views

Meetings & Events

Looking for the perfect space for your meeting, special event or wedding? Request Proposal

Oceanfront condos

Each Myrtle Beach condo rental features a private balcony with views of the Atlantic Ocean, a 32-inch TV, and WiFi. Our two- and three-bedroom condos offer separate dining and living areas and include full kitchens with a washer and dryer.

View all rooms

Local information

We are on the north end of Myrtle Beach in Kingston Resorts. Golfers love our proximity to over 100 courses. We are also within minutes of Broadway at the Beach, Myrtle Beach House of Blues and Tanger Outlet Mall.

Local attractions

  • Over 100 golf courses
  • Tanger Outlet Mall (1 mi.)
  • Barefoot Landing (4 mi.)
  • House of Blues (4 mi.)
  • Broadway at the Beach (7 mi.)

Benefits and privileges

As a Guest of Royal Palms, you can enjoy all the services and amenities available at the Hilton Myrtle Beach Resort and Kingston Plantation Resort. Enjoy impeccable dining, premier treatments at Spa33 as well as access to Splash! Waterpark, resort pools and 78Fitness.

Amenities and services

For your dining pleasure

Discover casual fine dining at our oceanfront restaurant, Café Amalfi, located in the Hilton Myrtle Beach. Savor an al fresco lunch in our seasonal poolside restaurant, Beachcombers. Sip drinks in the stylish Veranda Bar, or enjoy cocktails and live music poolside at the seasonal Wet Whistle.

Dine with us

Special events

An ideal venue for conferences, corporate gatherings and weddings of all sizes, we offer over 35,000 sq. ft. of indoor and outdoor event space, including a stunning oceanfront lawn. The adjacent conference center has 14,400 sq. ft. of space, two registration desks, and large pre-function areas.

  

Plan an event

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Knoxville Downtown
description:
Welcome to Embassy Suites by Hilton Knoxville Downtown, a unique and modern hotel in a historic setting. Our prime location is less than two miles from the convention center, top attractions, dining and University of Tennessee Knoxville, ideal for business travelers, football fans and leisure guests. Play Topgolf signature games with friends and coworkers at Topgolf Swing Suite, located off the lobby.
Spread out in our modern suites, complete with two large HDTVs, a sofa bed and free WiFi. Each two-room suite features a spacious living room and private bedroom, a mini-fridge, microwave, coffeemaker and spacious dining area/work desk.
Discover a taste of the South at our award-winning restaurant, Knox Mason, serving seasonal menus with a focus on hyper-local ingredients. Enjoy beautiful views of the Tennessee River from our rooftop bar, serving tapas and a wide selection of beer, wine and cocktails. When you need a pick-me-up, stop by our KBrew coffee shop for specialty beverages and bagels. Don’t miss our daily complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast buffet and complimentary Evening Reception*, featuring light snacks, beer, wine and more.
Unwind with a massage at the Wake Spa, or take a dip in our rooftop pool. We also offer a complimentary fitness center and business center. Host a wedding, reception, party or conference at our hotel, with a beautiful ballroom for up to 250 people.
*Service of alcohol subject to state and local laws. Must be of legal drinking age.

name: The Harpeth Franklin Downtown, Curio Collection by Hilton
description:
The Harpeth Franklin Downtown, Curio Collection by Hilton hotel is located in the heart of Historic Franklin. Situated in the cornerstone of Franklin, discover boutique and antique shopping, one of a kind restaurants, live music and historical landmarks, right on our doorstep. The Harpeth is located a short distance to the Cool Springs business district, home of Nissan, North American Headquarters, MARS Petcare, Schneider Electric and countless more.
Unwind in our elegantly appointed guest rooms, featuring one king- or two queen-beds with views of historic Franklin and/or our tranquil courtyard. Our rooms combine a timeless décor with subtle touches of Franklin’s history and the modern comforts of today. Enjoy our 55-inch HDTVs, in-room coffee, WiFi, flexible workspace, robes, slippers, oversized bathrooms, and closets. We’re pleased to welcome your furry family members in our pet-friendly rooms.
The Harpeth Hotel Franklin offers sustainable cooking and local ingredients at 1799 Kitchen and Cocktails, where you can savor handcrafted cocktails, regional wines and beers, and whiskey from our extensive beverage program. Enjoy a warm and welcoming atmosphere at McGavock’s Coffee Bar & Provisions, a European-style coffee bar partnering with Honest Coffee Roasters, offering a selection of savory breakfast items, lunch featuring gourmet salads and artisanal sandwiches, and small plate offerings.
Begin your story with us by planning your upcoming wedding or corporate meeting. Our Riverside Ballroom provides natural light and an upscale setting with our tech forward event space.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Nashville SE Murfreesboro
description:
Welcome to your Tennessee home away from home at the Embassy Suites Nashville SE-Murfreesboro hotel. Our spacious full-service hotel is located less than 35 minutes from Nashville International Airport (BNA), 30 minutes from downtown Nashville and close to local businesses such as General Mills, Amazon and St. Thomas Rutherford Hospital.
This Murfreesboro hotel provides a variety of suite options, including a sofa bed in the living area to meet the needs of families. Enjoy a complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast every morning including fresh omelets. Snacks and drinks are also available every evening at the complimentary Evening Reception*. Spend family and networking time in our open-air atrium at the communal tables with access ports. Dine on Tennessee favorites for dinner at Gateway Grille. Take your laptop to the WiFi-enabled Caffeina’s Marketplace and check emails over coffee and pastries.
Host any function at Embassy Suites Nashville SE-Murfreesboro. Within easy reach of Nashville corporations such as Nissan, Dell and Bridgestone, our chic executive boardrooms are perfect for briefings. The Mirabella Grand Ballroom holds 2,800 guests for the grandest Tennessee conventions. Work your schedule in our 24-hour BusinessLink™ business center or from the comfort of your suite with high-speed internet access.
Maintain your exercise routine in the hotel’s fitness center, combining a large pool with modern cardio equipment and a weight room.
* Service of alcohol subject to state and local laws. Must be of legal drinking age.

name: The Central Station Memphis, Curio Collection by Hilton
description:
Welcome to The Central Station Memphis, Curio Collection by Hilton and experience the spirit of the city famed for its musical contribution. Our hotel puts travelers in the South Main Arts District of downtown Memphis, where artists including Elvis, B.B. King and Johnny Cash launched their music careers. Nestled within a cluster of restaurants, vintage music shops and studios that lend to the distinct charm of Memphis, our Curio offers guests a perfect base to experience the city dubbed ‘Home of the Blues.’
Each guest room includes artwork that narrates the stories of the train stop communities between Chicago, Memphis and New Orleans. Our rooms and suites feature quality bedding, a 49-inch HDTV and a custom-built personal speaker transmitting the curated playlist from our listening lounge.
As the custodian of the historic Amtrak Station since 1914, the Central Station is an anchor of the neighborhood. We are within blocks of the National Civil Rights Museum, Memphis Rock 'N' Soul Museum, the Memphis Blues Hall of Fame and a short drive to Graceland and Stax Museum.
After a full day exploring the iconic Beale Street and its music treasure troves, come back and unwind with our unique listening room and lounge. 8 and Sand, the listening lounge bar boasts a 30-foot record wall with Eggleston Works speakers and a 3500-album vinyl record collection. Plan an unforgettable and timeless event in our 6,576 sq. ft. ballroom with dramatic 33-foot-high ceilings.

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Memphis East Germantown
description: None

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Keller Town Center
description: Our hotel is located in Keller Town Center, walkable to local shops, restaurants, coffee houses, and a movie theater. The Keller Pointe recreation center and walk/bike trails are across the road. Dallas-Fort Worth International Airport is less than 15 miles away. We offer a 24-hour business center and 1,200 sq. ft. of event space for up to 80 people.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton San Antonio Northwest
description:
Welcome to DoubleTree by Hilton San Antonio Northwest, ideally located in near popular entertainment and shopping options as well as Six Flags Fiesta Texas® and The University of Texas San Antonio. Come experience a wonderful stay. We have 3 meeting venues including larges flexible spaces of 2,400 sq. ft. and 1,000 sq. ft. as well as a 250 sq. ft. board room. Our San Antonio hotel is a great place for your next event or small meeting.
We look forward to greeting you with a warm DoubleTree Chocolate Chip Cookie when you check in to our San Antonio hotel. Relax in a guest room featuring complimentary WiFi, a 50-inch HDTV, spacious work desk and modern décor. Upgrade to get a more spacious room with an even larger work area.
Lounge by the outdoor heated pool in a cabana, enjoy a dinner at our restaurant with outdoor and indoor seating or if you’re in a hurry, stop by our 24-hour convenience shop.

name: The Highland Dallas, Curio Collection by Hilton
description:
Revel in an elevated hotel experience when you stay at The Highland Dallas, Curio Collection by Hilton. Nestled between the Highland Park, Park Cities and vibrant Lakewood neighborhoods, we offer close proximity to Mockingbird Station and a wealth of upscale dining, shopping and entertainment. Situated within walking distance to Southern Methodist University (SMU), our luxury Dallas hotel is just five miles from Dallas Love Field Airport. Enjoy easy access to downtown Dallas via US Route 75 and close proximity to chic shopping options at NorthPark Center. We offer free transportation to attractions within a four-mile radius.
Our pet-friendly hotel boasts an array of amenities to enhance your stay. Energize with a workout in the 24-hour fitness center, unwind with a soothing swim in our heated outdoor infinity pool, or indulge in a signature treatment in Exhale Spa, located adjacent to our hotel.
Dine in style at our sophisticated steakhouse, Knife Restaurant, led by four-time James Beard 'Best Southwest Chef' and restaurateur, Chef John Tesar. Our boutique hotel offers 13,490 sq. ft. of flexible meeting and event space, perfect for show-stopping events and unforgettable celebrations.

name: Tru By Hilton El Paso East Loop 375
description:
Close to El Paso International Airport and Fort Bliss, Tru By Hilton El Paso East Loop 375  welcomes you. Stay in our smaller, efficiently designed rooms featuring large TVs, big bathrooms and innovative storage.
Find free, hot breakfast and 24/7 LavAzza coffee, Stash tea and hot chocolate in the lobby. Enjoy our uniquely Tru breakfast bar, with over 30 toppings to create a healthy or indulgent meal. Our Eat. & Sip. Market is open all day and night for when you want a gourmet snack, as well as single-serve beer and wine.
Hang out in our huge lobby. Work with free WiFi and wireless printing, play a game or shoot some pool. Stay fit in our modern fitness center, then sit back and enjoy the view from our outdoor patio.
Affordable travel now comes with unexpected things – like certainty.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Dallas Frisco Hotel Convention Center & Spa
description:
Welcome to Embassy Suites by Hilton Dallas Frisco Hotel Convention Center & Spa, located in the north Dallas suburb of Frisco, Texas. Our all-suite Frisco hotel is connected to the Frisco Conference Center, adjacent to the Dr Pepper Ballpark, and less than a mile from The Ford Center at The Star, home of the Dallas Cowboys World Headquarters and Training Facility. We are only 20 minutes from Dallas-Fort Worth International Airport (DFW), 15 miles from Dallas Love Field (DAL), and 10 miles from Addison Executive Airport with convenient access to restaurants, bars, shopping and sports facilities. Corporations such as Hewlett Packard, Dr Pepper-Snapple Group, PepsiCo, Capitol One and Toyota are less than five miles away.

Relax in a newly renovated two-room suite featuring a separate living room with a sofa bed and private bedroom. We now feature PURE® Wellness accommodations, which are nearly 99.9% allergen-free…an experience that enhances your well-being so you can sleep better and be at your best. Start your day with a free made-to-order breakfast or grab a bagel and coffee from Starbucks. In the evening, gather for our complimentary Evening Reception*. Indulge in a soothing massage or facial at Spa Botanica.

Host a meeting or social event in Frisco in over 90,000 sq. ft. of flexible newly renovated meeting and event space at the Frisco Conference Center. The largest room accommodates up to 4,000 guests.

* Service of alcohol subject to state and local laws. Must be of legal drinking age.

name: Hampton Inn Bulverde Texas Hill Country
description:
a Texas Hill Country hotel near north central San Antonio.

Nestled in the beautiful Texas Hill Country, Hampton Inn Bulverde Texas Hill Country combines tranquil scenery and a central location just minutes from north central San Antonio on Highway 281 North. Experience a variety of fun attractions near our Bulverde, TX hotel including a championship golf course, outlet mall shops, restaurants, outdoor water recreation and a winery and vineyards. Get a good night’s rest on your clean and fresh Hampton bed®. Keep your drinks cold in your convenient mini-refrigerator or use the microwave to heat up a meal. All rooms have an HDTV with premium channels for watching movies or your favorite shows. Get your day off to a great start with a free hot breakfast daily Even if you’re in a hurry, you have time to grab Hampton’s On the Run™ Breakfast Bags, available Monday through Friday. For scenic Hill Country area dining options, our friendly staff is happy to recommend one of the nearby restaurants. The hotel has over 3,000 sq. ft. of flexible meeting space for up to 240 guests. The large ballroom features doors that open to the welcoming outdoor pool and patio area. Natural beauty and shady trees provide pleasant scenery for memorable hilltop wedding receptions and special events. Our 100% non-smoking hotel has a fitness center with premium exercise equipment and complimentary self-parking.

name: Canopy by Hilton Dallas Frisco Station
description:
Hello and welcome to Canopy by Hilton Dallas Frisco Station, perfectly located next to The Star and just minutes from endless shopping, dining, sports and entertainment at Stonebriar Centre, Dr Pepper Ballpark, Toyota Stadium and Frisco Square. Grab a complimentary Canopy Bike and start discovering your new favorite places. We'll introduce you to the neighborhood with a local welcome gift at check-in.
At Canopy, we've got you covered. Our Just-Right Rooms have a positively local vibe with modern ranch-style décor and the comforts you expect like free WiFi, a 55-inch HDTV and exclusive Canopy bed. Choose a suite for a separate living area, wetbar, balcony and cozy extras like bathrobes and Canopy socks. Every floor has a filtered spring water station so you can refresh and feel great going forward.
Welcome the day in the café with a delicious artisanal breakfast made with fresh ingredients and local produce or have a Canopy Break Fast bag delivered to your door. Enjoy fresh, locally inspired menus and complimentary tastings of local beers and spirits each night. Keep up your workout routine in our fitness center with cardio, strength and stretching equipment. We also offer a transfer lounge, hospitality suite and bridal suite for special occasions.

name: C. Baldwin, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: Bold, locally connected, & soulful, C. Baldwin, Curio Collection by Hilton delivers a special hotel experience in the heart of Houston's financial district. Named after the 'Mother of Houston’, Charlotte Baldwin, our hotel is a destination for those who seek out individuality. This groundbreaking hotel is conveniently connected to the Allen Center and Heritage Plaza, placing you within walking distance or a short drive from the city's richest cultural attractions, including downtown, Montrose, The Heights, and Buffalo Bayou Park. We operate a complimentary house car service within the immediate downtown area. Our accommodations offer boldly stylish décor, floor-to-ceiling windows, glamorous textures, and 55-inch multimedia TVs. Premium rooms & suites provide enhanced views of the city. A special collection of 14 corner guest rooms have been curated to feature Peloton bikes for those looking to enjoy a workout in the privacy of their room. We invite guests to experience unforgettable dining with a social vibe in our restaurant with a celebrity chef at its helm. Sip handcrafted cocktails in our glamorous lobby bar. Work out in the well-equipped fitness center, stroll through the outdoor space, pick up an item in our lifestyle boutique, sloan/hall or enjoy a manicure or facial at Paloma. With 14,000 sq. ft. of flexible meeting space accommodating up to 500 guests, our hotel is perfect for elegant gatherings, private dining events, and executive board meetings. Stay up-to-date with our rotating calendar of curated programming.

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Houston Medical Center NRG Park
description:
a comfortable room in the center of it all.

Relax in your comfortable guest room or suite at Hampton Inn & Suites Houston-Medical Ctr-Reliant Park hotel, just 12 miles from William P. Hobby (HOU) Airport. The hotel’s central location makes it an excellent choice for guests visiting the nearby business parks, medical center and famous sporting grounds. Our NRG (formerly Reliant) Stadium hotel provides easy access to all the exciting nearby events including NFL games, concerts and special events. Whether you’re traveling on business or on vacation with loved ones, enjoy free in-room WiFi, a fitness center and pool and Hampton’s free hot breakfast. Savor delicious waffles and oatmeal and as much juice and coffee as you’d like. Early appointments? Grab one of our free Hampton On the Run® Breakfast Bags, available Monday to Friday, for a quick, healthy meal to go. Recline on our signature clean and fresh Hampton bed®, available as one king-sized or two doubles. Enjoy the additional living space, private kitchen and full-sized sleeper sofa available in our spacious suites. Business guests can work at the large desk or prop a laptop on the portable lap desk and sit back in the comfortable armchair. Take advantage of the 24-hour business center at our NRG (formerly Reliant) Stadium hotel. We have an elegant meeting room available for functions of 10 to 35 guests. Ride on our free shuttle service – which covers a three mile radius of the hotel - and explore the local area.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Temple Medical Center
description:
• Proximity to University of Mary Hardin-Baylor and Temple College
  • Located in Temple's shopping district, minutes from downtown
  • Complimentary WiFi and business center
  • Complimentary fitness center and outdoor pool
  • Great American Grill® and The Shop®, available 24-hours
  • 6,000 sq. ft. of flexible meeting and event space, including Grand Ballroom
 

Discover Style at our Temple Medical Center Hotel

Welcome to our Hilton Garden Inn Temple Medical Center hotel. Located across from Scott and White Hospital and in Temple's shopping district, our convenient Temple hotel is the ideal venue for conferences, business meetings, weddings and other social events. Celebrate a special occasion in one of our elegant ballrooms or conduct business in our Executive Boardroom. Enjoy excellent catering services and complimentary use of our 24-hour business center. Our Hilton Garden Inn Temple Medical Center hotel will ensure your stay in Temple is successful and hassle-free. Get a great night’s sleep on our Serta Perfect Sleeper Mattresses. Our rooms feature two telephones with voicemail, complimentary WiFi, and spacious work desks with ergonomic Mirra® by Herman Miller chairs. The 42-inch LCD/HDTVs are sure to keep you entertained with complimentary HBO, Showtime, WE, and the NFL Network. Dine at our Great American Grill®, offering cooked-to-order breakfast, lunch, dinner, and full-service bar, or unwind with evening room service. After a long workday, refresh in our heated indoor pool and whirlpool or rejuvenate in our fitness center.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton San Marcos Hotel Conference Center & Spa
description:
Set just a short drive from the bustling center of downtown San Marcos, the Embassy Suites by Hilton San Marcos Hotel Conference Center & Spa is a contemporary and spacious hotel that offers more space and flexibility during your stay.
Each of the San Marcos hotel’s 283 two-room suites provides a superb range of modern hotel amenities, including two flat-screen TVs and wired and wireless internet access. Whether you want to dine on a free made-to-order breakfast or prepare one yourself using the suite’s mini refrigerator, microwave and coffeemaker, our hotel in San Marcos, TX is designed to give you more freedom.
Offering a stunning 72,727 sq. ft. of meeting space, this hotel in San Marcos, TX is one of the best places to host large conferences and events in San Marcos and the Central Texas area. The 28,800 sq. ft. Veramendi Ballroom accommodates up to 3,000 guests in various seating arrangements. Utilize our A/V equipment and technical support for a successful conference or event.
After a long day, plunge into the heated outdoor swimming pool or stay active in the fitness center, fully equipped with weights and cardio machines. Sip a drink and meet with colleagues at the complimentary Evening Reception*, or enjoy delicious dishes at this San Marcos hotel’s restaurant, the Rocky River Grille.
*Service of alcohol subject to state and local laws. Must be of legal drinking age.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton San Antonio Brooks Hotel & Spa
description:
Welcome to Embassy Suites by Hilton San Antonio Brooks Hotel & Spa. Our contemporary, all-suite hotel is located in the thriving community of Brooks City Base, just 11 minutes from the famed Alamo and downtown San Antonio. Explore attractions such as the San Antonio Riverwalk and San Antonio Missions - a UNESCO World Heritage Site, which includes Mission Conception, Mission Espada, Mission San Jose and Mission San Juan. We are also just 25 minutes from San Antonio International Airport.
Make yourself at home in one of our spacious two-room suites which each feature a separate living room with sofa sleeper, a work desk, and a wet bar area with mini-fridge, microwave and coffeemaker.  Consider booking one of our premium suites for more room, which include in-room snacks and beverages. Keep fit in the fitness center or swim lengths in the outdoor pool. Our full-service spa offers the perfect spot to unwind and indulge in a treatment.
We offer 20,000 sq. ft. of flexible meeting space, including executive boardrooms and an IT oasis. Hangar 9, our restored WW1 airplane hangar, is perfect for large scale events. Plan your dream wedding for up to 500 guests in our grand ballroom or choose a smaller space for a more intimate function.
Each morning you’ll enjoy our complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast in Nineteen17, as well as a-la-carte options for lunch and dinner. Relax with your favorite drink at the bar or simply stock up on snacks from our Gourmet-to-Go shop to enjoy in your suite.

name: Hilton Dallas/Park Cities
description:
Chic style at our upscale North Dallas hotel

Experience the recently refined Hilton Dallas/Park Cities, a boutique hotel with Southern charm and a luxury feel. Set on a picturesque tree-lined street in the affluent Park Cities, just north of downtown Dallas, there are endless walkable dining and entertainment options nearby. Enjoy proximity to multiple churches, corporations, North Park Mall, and SMU. We're convenient to Dallas North Tollway, DFW International and Dallas Love Field Airports.

Directions Email us

SHORT-TERM BOOKING INCENTIVES
Enhance your meeting & event experiences with these great value add-ons

Group Booking Incentives (PDF)

Good to know

  • Upscale North Dallas hotel near SMU (Southern Methodist University)
  • Convenient access to DFW International and Dallas Love Field Airports
  • Grain Restaurant with Outdoor Patio and Woodbine Bar & Lounge
  • Elegant Dallas wedding venue for up to 400 guests, near 30+ churches
  • Rooftop pool sunsets and second-floor 24-hour fitness center
  • 175 retail shops and restaurants - all within walking distance

Meetings & Events

Looking for the perfect space for your meeting, special event or wedding? Request Proposal

Premium Rooms

Our private-level Park Cities Rooms include WiFi, breakfast buffet in Grain, snacks and newspapers on the private floor, plus in-room water bottles. Our Presidential Suite, featured above, includes private rooftop pool access and can adjoin for an even more expansive space.

All Rooms and Suites

A location in Park Cities

The Park Cities neighborhood of Dallas has a charming small-town feel while also offering easy access to cultural attractions, shopping facilities and many local corporations. Looking for things to do? Our hotel is just minutes from premier shopping centers, Southern Methodist University and also a variety of activities, from art to sports.

Dallas attractions

  • The Plaza at Preston Center
  • Highland Park Village, NorthPark Center and West Village
  • SMU, Dallas Arts District and the Dallas Museum of Art

Sunsets and services

Experience a relaxing urban retreat while taking in city sunsets all year from our heated rooftop pool. Our fitness center provides an engaging space to keep up with workouts while traveling. Digital Key is now available for ease of access to your room and more. Valet, concierge and additional services are available.

Amenities and Services

New Signature Dining

Farm-to-table fresh, Grain Restaurant & Woodbine Bar offer an open concept social space. Exciting menus include Texas-raised beef while daily happy hour is frequently refreshed. Grab a Starbucks coffee, order food to go, or relax on the outdoor patio. Enjoy live music on Tuesday nights. Breakfast is served daily and private dining is available upon request.

Dining

Meet in Dallas

With 8 inspirational meeting and event spaces offering over 7,000 sq.ft. of versatile indoor and outdoor options, our seasoned professional teams will ensure your vision comes to life. Warm color schemes provide perfect backdrops and local partnerships offer luxury experience add-ons for social events.

Plan an Event

name: Home2 Suites by Hilton Plano East North Hwy 75
description: None

name: Hilton Austin
description:
1 block to Austin's 6th Street entertainment

Hilton Austin is situated adjacent to the Convention Center in downtown Austin, TX. We're a quick walk from exclusive shopping, amazing restaurants and fun live music venues on 6th Street and the surrounding area. Guests of our renovated hotel also enjoy fantastic views of the Capitol of Texas and Lady Bird Lake from 31 stories up. Hotel dining, a full-service spa, VIP perks - we've got you covered for a great stay in Austin.

Directions

Highlights

  • Cannon + Belle restaurant, bar and biergarten; 24-hour room service
  • Austin Taco Project restaurant featuring craft beer and fusion taco bar
  • 8th Floor lap pool, whirlpool and sundeck overlooking Austin
  • Spa, sauna and steam room, plus a fully equipped fitness center
  • Flexible meeting spaces, including one of Austin's largest ballrooms
  • 24-hour business center with fax/print/photocopy services

Meetings & Events

Looking for the perfect space for your meeting, special event or wedding? Request Proposal

Renovated guest rooms

Modern design meets comfort and style in our renovated guest rooms. Unwind in a sophisticated guest room with space to work and relax. An upgrade to an Executive Room or Suite allows you access to the Executive Lounge, serving free breakfast and refreshments throughout the day.

Rooms and suites

We're near...

  • 6th Street Entertainment District (1 block)
  • University of Texas at Austin (1 mi)
  • Lady Bird Lake Hike & Bike Trail (1 mi)
  • Texas State Capitol (1 mi)
  • Austin-Bergstrom International Airport (7 mi)

Pet-friendly

Your four-legged friend is welcome at our hotel. Pets up to 75 lbs. are permitted with a $50 deposit.

Spa at the skyline

Treat yourself at our spa and leave refreshed for your stay in Austin. Our setting on the 8th Floor overlooks downtown - a unique view from the lap pool and whirlpool. Book a deep-tissue massage, nourishing facial, mani/pedi or salon treatment. We also offer spa packages, group events and couples treatments.

Spa details

Restaurants and lounges

Hilton Austin has a variety of dining options for every palate. With menus and cocktails as ambitious and unexpected as Austin itself, enjoy Tex-Fresh cuisine at Cannon & Belle or go international with tacos and craft beer at Austin Taco Project. For a quick coffee and meal, Starbucks offers all your favorites.

Hotel dining

Weddings and events

From boardroom to grand ballroom, we have 38 perfect spaces for any event. In fact, CVENT called us a Top 100 US Meeting Hotel in 2014. Our meeting rooms can seat 6 to 2,000 guests, and meeting and wedding planners are here to help. Menus, room layouts, A/V equipment - it's your event, your way.

Plan an event

name: Hilton Dallas/Southlake Town Square
description:
Stylish Sophistication and Texas Hospitality

Hilton Dallas/Southlake Town Square is surrounded by over 200 high-end specialty stores, restaurants, and entertainment venues in the award-winning Southlake Town Square. Doing business in Dallas? Here to explore Fort Worth? Whatever brings you to the area, you’re minutes from the entire metroplex! Here at the hotel, you’ll find an outdoor pool, 24-hour fitness center, and great restaurant, as well as flexible event space and inviting rooms.  And, with famous Texas hospitality at every turn, you’ll be sure to feel right at home.

Directions Email us

Things to do

The entire Dallas Fort Worth metroplex is on our doorstep. Discover some of these attractions:

  • Grapevine Wine Tours & Shopping
  • Dallas Cowboys’ AT&T Stadium
  • Texas Rangers’ Globe Life Park in Arlington
  • Victory Park in Dallas
  • Sundance Square in Fort Worth

Good to know

  • 19,000 sq. ft. of meeting space for conferences, workshops and weddings
  • 15 minutes from Dallas/Fort Worth International Airport (DFW)
  • Complimentary WiFi access in guest rooms, suites and meeting rooms
  • Copeland's of New Orleans Restaurant serving breakfast, lunch and dinner
  • Complimentary valet and self-parking
  • Over 150 retail, dining and entertainment options in walking distance

Meetings & Events

Looking for the perfect space for your meeting, special event or wedding? Request Proposal

A space to recharge

Choose from 248 spacious guest rooms offering European-inspired design and modern amenities including flat-screen TVs, oversized soaking tubs, balconies and complimentary WiFi. Looking for more? Upgrade to one of the hotel’s 40 suites for extra space with a separate bedroom and sitting area.

Rooms & Suites

A central location

Whether you prefer the rustic charm of the Fort Worth Stockyards or urban chic of Uptown Dallas, you are only a short drive away from all the area has to offer. Huge sports fan? Catch the Dallas Cowboys at AT&T Stadium or the Texas Rangers at Globe Life Park. If rollercoasters are more your thing, take the kids for an exhilarating day out at Six Flags over Texas.

Fitness and wellness

In the mood for a midnight workout? No problem! We offer a 24-hour fitness center, equipped with modern cardio and resistance equipment. If you love to swim, you’ll appreciate soaking up the Dallas sunshine in our outdoor pool.

Amenities

Taste of NOLA in Southlake

Experience a little piece of Louisiana in Copeland’s of New Orleans restaurant at our hotel. Think authentic cuisine, the freshest ingredients, and one-of-a-kind dishes. Open for breakfast, lunch, and dinner, come along for a fun and memorable experience.

Dining

Weddings and events

With over 19,000 sq. ft. of flexible meeting and event space, Hilton Southlake Town Square is the ideal venue for your Dallas conference or workshop. From the latest facilities and personal service, to catering and online event planning tools you’ll find all you need for a productive and successful event.

Plan an Event

Spanning 45 lush acres, just north of downtown, Hilton Anatole is a Dallas icon in the vibrant Design District. Discover our indoor and outdoor facilities including V Spa, Verandah Health Club, the new JadeWaters resort pool complex and a private Sculpture Park. Add our four exclusive dining venues, impressive meeting space and elegant rooms and suites, and you’ll see why our guests keep returning for more.

description:
Southern charm, Texas art, an inspired community

Set in the heart of Granite Park’s business and leisure community, our Plano, TX hotel's story starts from Texas Prairie-inspired architecture to unique wildflower art. Relax by our serene pool or on our patio with tranquil firepit at our North Dallas hotel. Enjoy creative cocktails in Prairie Fire or tasty dining in Carso. Host a grand event or an intimate affair in our event spaces. A waterfront stroll along The Boardwalk at Granite Park is just a few steps away.

Watch our Video: an Endless Welcome

name: Hilton Americas-Houston
description:
Houston hotel connected to George R. Brown Convention Center

Conveniently located in the heart of downtown Houston, Hilton Americas-Houston is connected to the George R. Brown Convention Center via two indoor skywalks. Our AAA Four-diamond hotel is just steps away from a range of attractions such as Discovery Green Park, Toyota Center, BBVA Compass Stadium and Minute Maid Park. Looking for fun for the whole family? GreenStreet premier dining and entertainment center is also close by.

  • Downtown Houston restaurant, bars, spa and health club, indoor infinity pool
  • First Green Seal-certified hotel in Texas

Meetings & Events

Looking for the perfect space for your meeting, special event or wedding? Request Proposal

Relaxing rooms

Upgrade to a suite and enjoy a separate living area. Our Executive Rooms feature key access to the exclusive R24 Executive Rooftop Lounge serving complimentary beverages and both savory and sweet snacks. We now feature PURE® Wellness accommodations, which are nearly 99.9% allergen-free, an experience that enhances your well-being so you can sleep better and be at your best.

Rooms and Suites

Downtown Houston

Our hotel is located in Houston's bustling downtown area just steps from Toyota Center, Discovery Green Park, Minute Maid Park and BBVA Compass Stadium. Looking for Houston attractions? The Bayou Place entertainment district includes the Bayou Music Center, Alley Theater, Jones Hall and Hobby Center for the Performing Arts.

Houston events

Houston Events
