name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Salt Lake City Airport
description:
Enjoy stunning mountain and lakeside views when you stay at the DoubleTree by Hilton Salt Lake City Airport. Don’t forget your warm chocolate chip cookie when you check in. Only two miles from Salt Lake City International Airport, this modern Salt Lake City Airport hotel offers spacious accommodations, modern facilities and a fantastic location just ten minutes from downtown Salt Lake City. Enjoy easy access to a number of major Salt Lake City companies and attractions, including Salt Palace Convention Center, Vivant Smart Home Arena and Great Salt Lake, just a short drive from the hotel. 13 world-class ski resorts located less than an hour away, including Snowbird and Park City Mountain Resort.
Unwind in a modern guest room at this Salt Lake City Airport hotel with a variety of thoughtful touches and amenities, including comfortable beds, a spacious work desk, TV and WiFi. Upgrade to a suite for additional space and amenities. Hold an event with 13,000 sq. ft. of flexible meeting space and the latest A/V equipment and stay connected in the 24-hour business center. Maintain your exercise regimen with the 24-hour fitness center, basketball court and putting green, swim in the indoor pool or stroll along the walking path set around the eight-acre lake. Relax with a glass of wine by the fireside in The Club before enjoying American classics and a stunning lakeside view.

name: Cliffrose Springdale, Curio Collection by Hilton
description:
Escape to the high desert at Cliffrose Springdale, Curio Collection by Hilton. Nestled along the Virgin River and bordering Zion National Park, our historic Springdale lodge and spa lets you relax amid lush desert foliage and breathtaking canyon views. Established in 1988 by Dale Dockstader, Cliffrose is a sanctuary of peace and a place to enjoy the beauty of our surroundings. Enjoy a five-minute walk to the main park entrance, or take the complimentary Zion Canyon shuttle into and through the park.
Unwind in our cozy guest rooms and suites with fresh, modern décor. Take in the views from your private patio or balcony, keep drinks cool in the fridge and stay connected with complimentary WiFi. Our spacious suites include premium views, a separate living room, double vanity, soaking tub and a fully equipped kitchen with full-size refrigerator and stovetop. Book a Grandview Suite for a truly memorable stay.
Discover fresh and delicious meals at Anthera, open for breakfast, lunch, dinner and room service. Dine indoors or al fresco with incredible views of Zion’s cliffs and pure blue skies.
Enjoy the fresh air in the natural setting of our lush desert gardens , take a dip in our heated outdoor pool or play in the Virgin River. Enjoy the outdoors with our fire pits, outdoor grills, lawn games and two hot tubs. Business travelers will enjoy our business center, 750 sq. ft. of meeting space and outdoor event pavilion.

name: Hilton Salt Lake City Center
description:
Vibrant downtown SLC hotel amid mountain peaks

Towering over Temple Street is the 18-floor Hilton Salt Lake City Center. From our central downtown location, walk to the awe-inspiring Salt Lake Temple, the landmark Capitol and Eccles Theater. Hike City Creek Canyon Historic District and indulge in downtown’s trendy food-and-drink scenes. Easy access to the TRAX train system makes exploring the city affordable and convenient. We offer the latest in hotel technology with Digital Key.

Directions Email us

Top reasons guests love Hilton SLC

  • Centrally located to downtown dining, shopping and Salt Lake City Winter Activities
  • Indoor pool, whirlpool and seasonal sundeck (May-Sep)
  • Spencer's for Steaks and Chops, Best of State restaurant, 2018 Wine Spectator Best of Award of Excellence
  • Pet friendly with in-room amenities and nearby off-leash dog park
  • Avis Rental Cars in lobby, great for exploring

    • Meetings & Events

    Looking for the perfect space for your meeting, special event or wedding? Request Proposal

    A space to recharge

    Our hotel features 19 luxury suites and oversized guest rooms on the top three floors with panoramic views of the Salt Lake Valley and Wasatch Mountain Range. We now feature PURE® Wellness accommodations which are nearly 99.9% allergen-free, enhancing your well-being so you can sleep better and be at your best.

    View all rooms

    Mormon heritage and skiing, a gateway to the West

    Discover your genealogy at the Family History Library, ski the six top-rated Ski Resorts within a 30 minute drive, and visit the mighty five iconic national parks.

    Attractions

  • City Creek Shopping
  • Temple Square
  • Family History Museum
  • Vivint Smart Home Arena
  • University of Utah
  • 6 Ski & Summer Resorts

    • Fun for the family

    • Large family suites and connecting rooms, indoor pool
    • 2 blocks from City Creek Mall
    • 15-minute walk from City Creek Canyon hiking trails
    • Near Hogle Zoo and other summer attractions
    Amenties and services

    Spencer's for Steaks and Chops

    Recognized in 2018 with Wine Spectator Best of Award of Excellence and Best of State in America's Traditional Fine Dining, Spencer's is one of only six restaurants in Utah to boast this wine honor. Other awards include TripAdvisor Certificate of Excellence and OpenTable Diner's Choice.

    Find out more

    Meet @ Hilton SLC

    Big or small, your event will be taken care of at our hotel that boasts 24,000 sq. ft. of flexible meeting space, including a 52-seat tiered seminar theater and a 5,000 sq. ft. pre-function foyer space. Your Big Day will be a breeze to plan with our customizable packages and a dedicated consultant.

    Plan an event

name: Hilton Garden Inn Blacksburg University
description:
• Adjacent to the Virginia Tech campus
  • 2 meeting rooms for 10 – 86 attendees and 24-hour business center
  • Complimentary WiFi and printing service
  • Complimentary fitness center, heated indoor pool
  • Restaurant, bar and 24-hour convenience store
 

Welcome to the newly renovated Hilton Garden Inn in Blacksburg

Located adjacent to the Virginia Tech campus, Hilton Garden Inn Blacksburg University is perfect for corporate travelers and is a favorite among leisure guests and sports teams coming to compete in the New River Valley. Stay at this hotel in Blacksburg, VA for easy access to the university, businesses and mountain attractions. Admire the view along the nearby Blue Ridge Parkway and the Appalachian Trail from our updated hotel, fully renovated April 2019. In addition to the updates, you'll enjoy the same complimentary extras such as free WiFi throughout the hotel, remote printing at the 24-hour business center, fitness center access and indoor pool access. Prepare for tomorrow in a spacious guest room featuring our signature Garden Sleep System® bed, a microwave, a refrigerator and an HDTV. Wake up to your favorite song on the MP3 alarm clock before enjoying a cooked-to-order breakfast. Conduct meetings using A/V equipment in our conference space for up to 92 guests. Refresh with a cold drink in the bar before a delicious meal at the The Garden Grille & Bar®. If you’d prefer to eat in your room, order room service or grab something from the Shoppe to heat up in the microwave.

name: Hampton Inn Hopewell Fort Lee
description:
enjoy a refreshing stay at our hotel in Hopewell, VA.

Welcome to the Hampton Inn Petersburg/Hopewell hotel. Our renovated hotel in Hopewell, VA is situated near romantic gardens, brick mansions and iconic military buildings. Explore the Quartermaster Museum at Fort Lee military base, less than one mile away. Visit Grant's Headquarters and the historic Petersburg Battlefield—just a short drive from the hotel. Spend an afternoon at the Southpark Mall and Pamplin Park, or travel to Richmond and enjoy a diverse choice of excellent shops, stores and restaurants. We are situated conveniently off of I-295, which provides easy access during your travels. Relax in a modern guest room with welcoming amenities for all your needs at our hotel in Hopewell, VA. Unwind on a clean and fresh Hampton bed® and stay entertained with a range of premium TV channels and free high-speed internet access. Select a spacious suite with a microwave and refrigerator, and enjoy extra room to relax. Wake up to a Hampton's free hot breakfast before heading off for the day. Stay active in the fitness center and refresh with a swim in the outdoor pool. Make business easy and stay in touch with work in the modern business center with internet access and A/V equipment rental. Our versatile meeting room is suitable for business meetings, receptions and social gatherings for up to 40 guests.

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Hampton Convention Center
description:
Connected by a covered walkway to the Hampton Roads Convention Center, Embassy Suites by Hilton Hampton Convention Center is a great place to make the most of your stay. Within easy reach of some of the area's largest corporations and most popular attractions, this all-suite hotel has excellent access to I-64 and is less than 20 miles from Norfolk International Airport and the Newport News/Williamsburg International Airport. Stay connected and productive thanks to the complimentary BusinessLink™ Business Center, or get some work done from the comfort of your spacious two-room suite. A private bedroom and separate living area, featuring a sofa bed, means you have the flexibility to relax with the whole family. Start every day in style with a free made-to-order breakfast. In the evening, unwind with a drink and snack at the complimentary Evening Reception*. Keep active by swimming laps in the indoor pool or by utilizing the fitness center. The adjoining Hampton Road Convention Center features a 363,595 sq. ft. conference and exhibition space, making this the ideal choice as a Hampton conference hotel. Plan your wedding with the assistance of our professional staff and take advantage of our flexible space and wedding services. * Service of alcohol subject to state and local laws. Must be of legal drinking age.
Embassy Suites by Hilton Hampton Convention Center

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Virginia Beach Oceanfront South
description:
Enjoy ocean views along the boardwalk at our DoubleTree by Hilton Virginia Beach Oceanfront South hotel. Our modern and relaxed hotel is ideally located for both business and leisure travelers to Virginia Beach. We are just two miles from Virginia Beach Convention Center and 30 minutes from Norfolk International Airport (ORF). Families will love our proximity to Ocean Breeze Waterpark and the Virginia Beach Aquarium.
Check-in to a warm welcome and our signature DoubleTree Chocolate Chip Cookie. Relax and unwind in our modern guest rooms, complete with Sweet Dreams® bedding. Enjoy magnificent ocean views from your private balcony, get some work done at your desk with complimentary WiFi or watch your favorite show on the HDTV.
Savor delectable seafood and sushi at Mahi’s, our modern and iconic on-site restaurant offering great food in a casual setting. Room service is also available for breakfast, lunch and dinner, and our Made Market is open 24 hours a day for snacks, sandwiches and more.
When you need a break from the beach, work out in our fitness center or take a dip in our indoor pool. Host a meeting or event for up to 200 people in our flexible oceanfront ballroom, or make use of our business center.

name: Hilton Richmond Hotel & Spa/Short Pump
description:
A modern Richmond hotel in the heart of Short Pump

Enjoy the convenient location of Hilton Richmond Hotel & Spa/Short Pump, off Broad Street and Interstate 64, just 20 minutes from Richmond International Airport. The nearby Short Pump Town Center features a selection of entertainment options including shopping, movie theaters and dining. The hotel features 254 rooms and suites, 23,000 sq. ft. of meeting space, Aura Spa and Salon and Shula's Steakhouse.

name: The Chrysalis Inn & Spa Bellingham, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: Relax and unwind at The Chrysalis Inn & Spa Bellingham, Curio Collection by Hilton, nestled along the waters of Bellingham Bay. Our warm and welcoming hotel along the Washington coast overlooks the San Juan Islands and is tucked away in a lovely, walkable neighborhood. Walk or bike along the peaceful trails or explore the local shops, restaurants and festivals in Fairhaven Village and Bellingham. Admire views of the bay from the window seat or snuggle up by the fireplace in your comfortable guest room. Each room includes complimentary WiFi, a 55-inch HDTV and double soaking tub. Upgrade to a suite for additional space, a separate living area, premium views, another HDTV and a double jetted tub. Enjoy panoramic views of the bay and fine Northwest cuisine from our restaurant and bar, Keenan's at the Pier, a casual yet elegant space to dine for breakfast, lunch or dinner. For a cozy night in, order room service, available from 7:00 am to 9:00 pm. Relax in our luxurious spa with a eucalyptus steam bath, massage or facial, or admire the lush foliage and koi pond from the relaxation room. For special events and meetings, we offer three fully equipped meeting rooms and a beautiful Living Room and Terrace for small weddings and occasions of up to 75 people. We also have a business center and gift shop for your convenience. Please note, this property is located adjacent to railroad tracks, therefore trains go by frequently during the day and at night.

name: Hilton Seattle Airport & Conference Center
description:
Seattle airport hotel close to downtown

Only minutes from Seattle-Tacoma International Airport, we're convenient and friendly. Make yourself comfortable in one of our modern rooms, offering everything you need for a great stay. Watch a movie on your 55-inch flat screen or freshen up in the stylish bathroom. Savor a delicious meal at Spencer's Steakhouse or take a dip in the outdoor pool. Host a conference or event for up to 1200 people in a range of flexible meeting spaces.

Directions

What's nearby

Enjoy a day or two exploring Seattle, starting with these:

  • Pike Place Market
  • The Space Needle
  • Westfield's Southcenter Mall
  • Seattle Mariners' and Seahawks' grounds
  • Seattle's Waterfront piers and boardwalks

Good to know

  • Complimentary 24-hour airport shuttle service
  • 500 steps from Seattle Tacoma International Airport
  • Easy access to light rail station connecting to downtown Seattle
  • 2 business centers, complimentary WiFi, and remote printing
  • Fully equipped fitness center, whirlpool, and outdoor pool

Looking for the perfect space for your meeting, special event or wedding? Request Proposal

A place to unwind

Feel at home in our spacious guest rooms offering WiFi, a 55-inch flat-screen TV and a Hilton Serenity Bed. Freshen up in the luxurious bathroom and find all the amenities you need for a comfortable stay. Explore the various room types and views that best suit your stay.

View rooms

Location, location, location

Stay with us for easy access to Seattle's shopping, restaurants, vibrant cultural scene and must-see attractions. You can be in downtown Seattle within 35 minutes using the Seattle Light Rail network, right next to the hotel. Spend an afternoon strolling around the bustling Waterfront - packed with shops and excellent seafood restaurants.

Spring Escape

Enjoy on-site parking and premium in-room WiFi when you book our Free of Fees package.

Book Now

Fantastic services

We have all the amenities you need to have an enjoyable stay. Use one of our two business centers to keep on top of work and maintain your exercise regime in our fitness room. Go for a swim in the outdoor pool or have a relaxing soak in the whirlpool.

Amenities

Dining

Enjoy breakfast, lunch or dinner at Spencer's for Steak and Chops. It's one of the country's finest steakhouses and offers the best prime beef, succulent chops and sensational seafood. Too comfortable to move? Order from our extensive room service menu and let us bring you something delicious.

Dining

Memorable events

We offer 40,000 sq. ft. of functional meeting space over 26 rooms for up to 1,200 people. Make use of the complimentary shuttle service to and from nearby airports, or use the Link Light Rail station to access the rest of Seattle.
